basic_info.title:
Hajime no Ippo
Hajime no Ippo: Fighting Spirit!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Sports
            
                Sports
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Fighting!, Fighting Spirit, The Fighting! Ippo, Hajime no Ippo Gaiden: Naniwa Tiger

content.synopsis: Makunouchi Ippo, a 16-year-old high school student balancing family responsibilities with a lackluster social life, faces relentless bullying until a chance encounter with boxer Mamoru Takamura changes everything. Rescued from a beating, Ippo joins Kamogawa Boxing Gym, where his hidden boxing talent emerges. Despite doubts from Mamoru, Ippo commits to rigorous training, determined to prove himself. Through unwavering dedication, Ippo navigates a path of self-discovery, forging bonds, and confronting formidable opponents on his journey to unlock his true strength.

basic_info.title:
Shounen no Abyss
Boy's Abyss
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Shounen no Abyss Bangai-hen: Senkou Shoujo

content.synopsis: Born and raised in the countryside, Reiji Kurose feels trapped in his small town, torn between caring for his shut-in brother and demented grandmother, and being controlled by Gen Minegishi. His childhood friend Sakuko Akiyama dreams of the excitement of Tokyo, contrasting Reiji's resigned existence. Seeking solace in the idol group "Acrylic," Reiji becomes captivated by the enchanting Nagi Aoe. A chance encounter with Nagi in their dreary town unravels a chain of scandalous events rooted in dark secrets. As Reiji is drawn into a world of sin and deception, he struggles to navigate the treacherous path ahead, haunted by lies, obsession, and betrayal threatening to shatter his world.

basic_info.title:
Kimi no Na wa.
Your Name.

content.synopsis:
In the tranquil town of Itomori, high school girl Mitsuha Miyamizu yearns for the bustling streets of Tokyo, weary of her countryside existence. Meanwhile, in Tokyo, aspiring urban planner Taki Tachibana harbors a fascination for architecture. 

Their lives take a mystical turn when Mitsuha dreams of inhabiting Taki's Tokyo life, while Taki envisions himself in Itomori as Mitsuha. Astonishingly, they realize these are not mere dreams but a baffling phenomenon – they actually swap bodies each time they sleep! As they navigate this extraordinary twist of fate, Mitsuha and Taki must join forces to grapple with this supernatural occurrence and its repercussions on their daily lives in Kimi no Na wa.

basic_info.title: Skip Beat!
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Polygon
            
                Love Polygon,                    Showbiz
            
                Showbiz
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: スキップ・ビート!

content.synopsis:
Sixteen-year-old Kyouko Mogami embarks on a journey to Tokyo with her childhood friend and crush, Shoutarou "Shou" Fuwa, who aspires to become a top idol. Shocked to discover that Shou sees her only as a maid, Kyouko vows to seek vengeance by entering the entertainment world herself.

Facing an initial setback when rejected by her desired talent agency, Kyouko is granted a second chance by the agency's president, who assigns her to the unique "Love Me" section. Determined, Kyouko sets off on a path towards stardom, honing her acting skills and forging new friendships as she navigates the competitive industry.

basic_info.title:
Mahoutsukai no Yome
The Ancient Magus' Bride
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Magician's Bride

content.synopsis:
Despite her unique ability to perceive otherworldly beings, Chise Hatori's life has been far from charmed. Abandoned by her parents, she finds herself at a desperate crossroads, leading her to offer herself at the slave market in search of a place to belong.

At the auction, she is unveiled as a rare "Sleigh Beggy," individuals with a powerful connection to magic, catching the attention of Elias Ainsworth, a enigmatic magus with a beastly aura. Instead of enslaving her, Elias offers Chise an unexpected path - to become his apprentice and future bride.

Transported to Elias's residence in the English countryside, Chise is immersed in a world where mythical creatures like fairies and dragons exist alongside the ordinary. However, she soon discovers that this new realm holds both wonders and dangers. At the core lies the unsettling question of whether she has unknowingly landed in the clutches of a force darker than her own inner turmoil.

basic_info.title:
Hirunaka no Ryuusei
Daytime Shooting Star
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Daytime Shooting Star, Hirunaka no Ryusei, Cookie Girl Cream Boy, Tsuyu Kaoru, A Love Story in Moist Rainy Days, Heroine no Ryuusei, More than Words

content.synopsis:
Embark on a journey with Suzume Yosano, a country girl thrust into the bustling city of Tokyo after her parents' sudden move abroad. Lost on her way to her uncle's home, fate intervenes as a mysterious man, Satsuki Shishio, guides her to safety. Little does she know, he's not just any man but her new homeroom teacher!

As Suzume navigates the challenges of a new school, she must also navigate the complexities of teenage life in the city. Join her as she forges friendships and embraces the exciting unknown that awaits her in this vibrant new chapter. And don't miss out on the captivating one-shots like "Cookie Girl Cream Boy" and "Heroine no Ryuusei" that add an extra layer of charm to her high school tale.

basic_info.title:
Taiyou no Ie
House of the Sun
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis:
High schooler Mao Motomiya finds herself adrift after her mother's abandonment and her father's remarriage. Feeling like she doesn't fit in anywhere, she seeks solace in a shrine, munching on cheap convenience store snacks. It's there that her childhood friend Hiro Nakamura discovers her and extends a simple yet profound gesture – an invitation to dine at a restaurant.

As they share a heartfelt conversation, Hiro proposes a life-changing idea: for Mao to move in with him. For Hiro, who has long been separated from his younger siblings following the loss of their parents, reuniting his family begins with welcoming Mao into the warm embrace of the Nakamura household.

Despite her initial hesitance, Mao decides to take up Hiro's offer. Surprisingly, settling into her new living arrangement with her dear friend feels natural. Now, in addition to navigating her strained relationship with her father and aiding the eldest Nakamura brother in achieving his dreams, Mao must also come to terms with the burgeoning emotions blossoming within her for Hiro.

basic_info.title:
Bungou Stray Dogs
Bungo Stray Dogs
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis:
At the edge of despair, Atsushi Nakajima faces a grim fate after being cast out of his orphanage. Destitute and hungry, he crosses paths with the enigmatic Osamu Dazai, whom he saves from a watery demise. Against Doppo Kunikida's chagrin, Dazai extends kindness to Atsushi, unveiling their affiliation with the Armed Detective Agency—a covert group of extraordinary individuals tackling unsolvable crimes.

Drawn into the agency's fold, Atsushi is enlisted to help hunt down a malevolent supernatural tiger terrorizing the city. Reluctantly joining forces, they successfully close the case, leading Dazai to offer Atsushi a pivotal role within the organization. However, their newfound alliance is swiftly imperiled by the Port Mafia, a powerful criminal syndicate set on asserting dominance.

As tensions escalate, Atsushi finds himself embroiled in a perilous conflict, compelled to harness his latent abilities to shield his comrades, the metropolis, and himself from impending chaos. In a city teetering on the brink, Atsushi must navigate treacherous waters to safeguard his new life amidst the escalating clash between light and shadow.

basic_info.title: Psyren
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Siren

content.synopsis:
Ageha Yoshina, a confident high school student known for aiding others in exchange for a fee, stumbles upon a mysterious calling card labeled "Psyren" in a phone booth. Intrigued, he keeps it, unaware of its significance. The next day, Ageha discovers his classmate Sakurako Amamiya also possesses the same enigmatic card, sparking a chain of events that thrusts them into perilous circumstances.

As Sakurako vanishes, Ageha is compelled to delve into the unknown. Upon contacting the number on the card, a voice quizzes him before posing a fateful question: "Will you venture to Psyren?" Thus initiates a perilous journey for the two teenagers, as they navigate a treacherous realm infested with creatures known as "Taboo." Endowed with psychic abilities dubbed "PSI," they battle to secure their return to the familiar world they once knew.

basic_info.title: Real
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    Team Sports
            
                Team Sports
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: リアル

content.synopsis:
Tomomi Nomiya, once a star on the high school basketball court who turned his back on the game, withdraws from school burdened by remorse after a fateful accident. As he seeks redemption by aiding a troubled girl, he crosses paths with Kiyoharu Togawa, a former sprinter turned wheelchair basketball player due to a debilitating leg injury.

Defeated by Kiyoharu in a humbling one-on-one match, Tomomi rediscovers his passion for basketball and vows to pursue his dream of going pro while assisting those in need. Meanwhile, Hisanobu Takahashi, Tomomi's successor as team captain, faces a life-altering injury that leaves him paralyzed below the waist. "Real" chronicles the intertwined journeys of these three young men as they confront physical challenges and personal demons, united by a shared desire to conquer obstacles and kindle a shared flame of determination.

basic_info.title: Tomie
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 富江

content.synopsis:
In a somber high school classroom, students grapple with the tragic loss of their classmate, Tomie Kawakami, brutally murdered and dismembered. The air heavy with grief, they question how such a radiant and beloved girl could meet such a gruesome end. Their confusion deepens when a familiar figure, the stunningly beautiful Tomie herself, saunters in, tardy but smiling.

Yet, this reunion marks only the beginning of a chilling enigma. Tomie's ethereal allure captivates men, compelling them to both adore and mutilate her—a sinister compulsion that proves irresistible. Each time she is torn asunder, Tomie inexplicably resurrects, weaving a web of unfathomable mystery and terror.

basic_info.title: Gintama
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dandelion, Shiro Kuro, Black and White, Shirokuro, 13, Thirteen, Bankara-san ga Tooru, Here Comes Mr. Uncivilised, Silver Soul

content.synopsis:
In the midst of Japan's Edo period, the land faces an unexpected invasion by otherworldly beings called the Amanto. Despite valiant efforts by the samurai to defend against this alien threat, the Shogun reluctantly acknowledges defeat, leading to a fragile truce between the Shogunate and the Amanto. This fragile peace brings about a nationwide prohibition on swords and a fading of the once-proud samurai spirit.

Amidst this changing landscape, one unconventional figure, Gintoki Sakata, clings to his samurai identity with a wooden sword in hand. With samurais rendered obsolete, Gintoki, along with his loyal companions Shinpachi Shimura, the spirited alien Kagura, and the enormous canine Sadaharu, operates the Yorozuya business, navigating a whirlwind of bizarre escapades and comedic misadventures.

Noteworthy one-shots include:
Volume 1: Dandelion
Volume 2: Shirokuro (Black and White)
Volume 24: 13
Volume 38: Bankara-san ga Tooru

basic_info.title: Vampire Knight
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Watashi to Fukigen na Panya-san, The Sour-Faced Baker and Me, The Sullen Baker and Me

content.synopsis:
Within the walls of Cross Academy, a prestigious boarding school divided into two distinct classes – the Day Class and the Night Class – prefects Yuuki Cross and Zero Kiryuu navigate the delicate balance between humans and vampires. Yuuki, the chairman's adopted daughter, approaches her duties with unwavering dedication, harboring a secret admiration for Kaname Kuran, the enigmatic leader of the Night students. Meanwhile, Zero harbors a deep-seated animosity towards vampires, unafraid to resort to drastic measures.

As the stunning yet dangerous Night Class conceals their true identities, Yuuki and Zero stand as the guardians of their intertwined worlds, safeguarding the fragile harmony between daylight innocence and nocturnal allure. Can these two opposing forces find unity within the confines of Cross Academy, or will their conflicting natures inevitably clash? The answer lies shrouded in the shadows, waiting to be unveiled with each passing night.

Included one-shot in Volume 17: "Watashi to Fukigen na Panya-san (The Sour-Faced Baker and Me)" offers a tantalizing glimpse into a world where secrets simmer beneath the surface, beckoning readers into a realm where love and darkness intertwine.

basic_info.title: Golden Kamuy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ゴールデンカムイ

content.synopsis:
Saichi Sugimoto, known as the formidable "Immortal Sugimoto" for his fierce exploits in the Russo-Japanese war, is far from being hailed as a hero. Discharged from the army for a violent act against a senior officer, Sugimoto is now a lone wolf navigating the harsh wilderness of Hokkaido. His quest? To unearth a fortune in gold, a promise made to his fallen comrade. Despite his relentless efforts, success eludes him until a mysterious wanderer reveals a tantalizing urban myth that could solve all his problems.

Legend speaks of a thief who pilfered the precious gold of the Ainu, the native people of Hokkaido, and concealed it in a place accessible only by a map crafted from the tattooed hides of escaped convicts.

Joined by the spirited Ainu girl, Asirpa, Sugimoto embarks on a perilous journey in pursuit of the tattooed fugitives. Yet, their path is fraught with peril as rival forces, including soldiers and mercenaries, vie for the elusive treasure. With Asirpa's intimate knowledge of the terrain, they venture forth to reclaim the stolen Ainu gold, entwined in a saga of vengeance, bloodshed, and avarice.

basic_info.title:
Yofukashi no Uta
Call of the Night
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: よふかしのうた

content.synopsis: In the midst of his middle school routine, Kou Yamori maintains a facade of normalcy while battling insomnia. His decision to break free from the pretense leads him to encounters with the peculiar Nazuna Nanakusa. She unveils the root of his sleeplessness: a lack of true liberation. Nazuna's unconventional remedy takes Kou on a journey of self-discovery, culminating in a shocking twist when she unexpectedly bites his neck during a vulnerable moment.

basic_info.title: Hellsing
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hellsing Cross Fire, Crossfire

content.synopsis:
For ages, covert factions have united to rid the world of perilous monsters, among them the renowned England-based Hellsing organization led by the shrewd Sir Integra Fairbrook Wingates Hellsing. A formidable figure in her arsenal is Alucard, an invincible vampire enhanced by her father. Though of the undead, he vows to shield and serve her faithfully.

As a fresh crisis looms, Alucard, aided by Seras Victoria, his newly turned vampire comrade, must unearth the truth behind the enigmatic vampire assaults. Amidst a backdrop of distrust, not all allies are human, and Alucard will mercilessly eliminate any obstacle in his path.

basic_info.title: Elfen Lied
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Elven Song, Elfenlied, MOL, Digitopolis, memoria

content.synopsis:
In a world where Lucy, a rare Diclonius with horns and telekinetic abilities, becomes a government experiment victim, her thirst for freedom leads to a brutal escape marked by bloodshed. Suffering a severe head injury during the chaos, Lucy transforms into a childlike persona with limited speech.

Fate brings her to Kouta and Yuka, unwitting college students who extend compassion to the wounded stranger, unaware of her dark past. Their act of kindness unravels a sinister government agenda, plunging them into a dangerous realm of secrets and deception.

Venture into the gripping tales of Lucy's journey through chilling encounters in "MOL," the mysterious "Digitopolis," haunting memories in "Memoria," and the compelling saga of "Elfen Lied."

basic_info.title: 21st Century Boys
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 21stCB, 21 Seiki Shounen

content.synopsis: In the final showdown between Kenji Endo, his childhood comrades, and the enigmatic cult figure known as "Friend," lingering questions loom large: Who is the real "Friend," and was the ominous threat of an "anti-photon bomb" genuine? In a bid for answers, Kenji joins forces with the United Nations to delve into a virtual reality world crafted from Friend's own past. This climactic resolution marks the culmination of a gripping saga that has unfolded over the passage of decades.

basic_info.title:
Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Kenkaku Romantan
Rurouni Kenshin: Meiji Swordsman Romantic Story
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Samurai X, Sengoku no Mikazuki, Crescent Moon in the Warring States, Crescent Moon Over a Country At War, Meteor Strike

content.synopsis:
In the aftermath of the Bakumatsu war, where citizens rose against the Tokugawa shogunate, the dawn of the Meiji era promised peace. However, a decade later, tranquility remains elusive. Swords are forbidden, yet blood stains the streets. Orphaned children of war heroes are adrift, while corruption festers within the government.

Enter Kenshin Himura, a former assassin once feared as Hitokiri Battousai. Haunted by his violent past, Kenshin renounces killing, seeking redemption in a nation teetering on the brink of chaos. In the 11th year of Meiji, he encounters Kaoru Kamiya, a martial arts instructor fighting to save her dojo from a false Battousai imposter. Bound by a shared mission, Kenshin and Kaoru unite to clear their names, but shadows of Kenshin's history loom large.

In this gripping tale of honor and sacrifice, Kenshin's quest for a peaceful future collides with the specters of his deadly legacy. And in the one-shot "Meteor Strike," a new threat emerges, testing Kenshin's resolve in an era where the line between justice and vengeance blurs.

basic_info.title:
Masamune-kun no Revenge
Masamune-kun's Revenge
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Masamune-kun no Revenge: After School, Masamune-kun's Revenge: After School, Masamune-kun no Revenge: Engagement, Masamune-kun's Revenge: Engagement, Masamune-kun no Revenge Tokubetsu-hen: Rental Kareshi Masamune-kun

content.synopsis:
As a young boy, Masamune Makabe endured painful taunts from the stunning and affluent Aki Adagaki, who cruelly labeled him "Piggy" for his plump figure. Fuelled by a thirst for revenge, Masamune transforms himself into a striking, if somewhat self-absorbed, high school student. Armed with his new appearance, he reenters Aki's life, set on retribution.

Guided by Aki's maid, Yoshino Koiwai, Masamune embarks on a subtle journey to win Aki's trust, planning to shatter her heart at the opportune moment. Yet, as their bond deepens, Masamune finds himself torn between his vengeful agenda and the stirring emotions he begins to harbor for Aki. In the midst of his elaborate scheme, he must confront the true desires of his heart.

basic_info.title:
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 3: Stardust Crusaders
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 3: Stardust Crusaders
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kuujou Joutarou: Mirai e no Isan, JoJo's Bizarre Adventure: Legacy to the Future

content.synopsis:
In 1989, Joseph Joestar makes a dramatic entrance in Japan to aid his grandson, Joutarou Kuujou, who is grappling with a mysterious and malevolent force. Joutarou believes he is possessed by an evil spirit, leading him to confine himself in a jail cell out of fear of causing harm. But Joseph unveils the truth: this entity is a formidable "Stand," a physical embodiment of one's inner fighting spirit. Alongside his ally Mohammed Avdol, Joseph demonstrates mastery over their own Stands.

However, Joseph's visit brings more than just revelations. An ancient foe of the Joestar lineage returns, triggering the awakening of their family's dormant Stands. When Joutarou's mother, Holly, falls dangerously ill due to her inability to handle her newly awakened Stand, the men are spurred into action.

Empowered by their Stands, the group embarks on a thrilling adventure that spans from Japan to Egypt, the lair of their formidable adversary. As they cross paths with malevolent Stand wielders and forge new alliances, they set out on a mission to save Holly and vanquish their enemy once and for all.

basic_info.title: Last Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kimi to, Shiawase., Happiness with You, Hidamari no Niwa, Garden of Sunlight, Wasureyuki, Forgotten Snow, Ninkoi

content.synopsis:
Naoto Yanagi, the formidable heir to the Yanagi business empire, seemed to have it all - talent, looks, and wealth. But his reign as the school's golden boy is challenged by the arrival of Mikoto Kujou, a seemingly unremarkable transfer student.

Initially indifferent due to Mikoto's modest background, Naoto is taken aback as she effortlessly surpasses him academically and athletically. Determined to reclaim his superiority, Naoto sets out to outshine her at any cost.

A decade later, both now college students, Naoto, unable to best Mikoto in previous years, devises a final game: win her heart and then shatter it for victory. However, as their entanglement unfolds, Naoto unexpectedly finds himself falling for Mikoto instead.

Accompanied by captivating one-shots like "Happiness with You" and "Garden of Sunlight," their story explores themes of rivalry, love, and self-discovery in volumes such as "Forgotten Snow" and "Ninkoi."

basic_info.title:
Mashle
Mashle: Magic and Muscles
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gag Humor
            
                Gag Humor,                    Parody
            
                Parody,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: マッシュル-MASHLE-

content.synopsis: In a world where magic reigns supreme, Mash Burnedead is the odd one out, deemed a threat to the gene pool. Hiding in the forest, he hones his physical strength to rival even the most powerful spells. But when his true identity is revealed, Mash embarks on a quest to become a Divine Visionary, a position of unmatched power. To protect his peaceful existence, the magic-deficient Mash joins the prestigious Easton Magic Academy, facing off against the elite offspring of powerful families. With no magical abilities, Mash seems destined for failure. To prove himself, he must rely on his fists to conquer every challenge and outmuscle magic itself, all in pursuit of the revered title of Divine Visionary!

basic_info.title:
Tongari Boushi no Atelier
Witch Hat Atelier

content.synopsis:
In a world where magic is shrouded in secrecy, Coco, the daughter of a humble dressmaker, has always harbored a deep fascination for the mysterious witches and their enchantments. When she seizes a rare opportunity to observe the renowned witch Qifrey in action, Coco makes a startling discovery—her beloved picture book is, in fact, a tome of powerful magic! Fueled by excitement, she embarks on a journey of spell-casting experimentation.

However, Coco's enthusiasm leads to a disastrous mishap in her home, prompting Qifrey to intervene and rescue her. Recognizing her untapped potential, Qifrey takes Coco under his wing, envisioning her as a crucial ally in his quest to uncover the Brimmed Caps—a dangerous sect of heretics wielding forbidden magic that threatens the realm. But mastering her magical abilities and navigating the dynamics among Qifrey's other apprentices are challenges Coco must overcome before facing the perilous Brimmed Caps head-on.

In the mysterious town where they dwell, enigmatic creatures known as "Parasites" lurk, their origin and intentions shrouded in secrecy. When one of these tennis ball-sized entities attempts to seize control of the mind of 16-year-old high schooler Shinichi Izumi, a gripping struggle ensues. Though the Parasite's bid to dominate Shinichi's being falters, it manages to nestle into his right arm, forging an unlikely alliance between the two beings. 

Dubbing himself Migi, the Parasite strikes a delicate balance with Shinichi, each retaining their distinct consciousness. Bound in an extraordinary "human and alien" partnership, Migi proposes a risky collaboration to ensure their survival. Forced to navigate this uncharted territory, Shinichi grapples with preserving his principles as he and Migi confront a menacing horde of bloodthirsty Parasites.

basic_info.title:
Fumetsu no Anata e
To Your Eternity

content.synopsis:
In a desolate land lies It, an enigmatic immortal entity devoid of emotions and identity. It possesses a unique ability to morph into the shapes of those driven by intense motivations. Beginning as a shapeless sphere, It transforms into a rock, then absorbs the essence of moss blanketed under snow. When a wounded wolf approaches, It assumes the creature's form, awakening a sense of self-awareness.

Venturing through the barren expanse, It encounters a solitary boy inhabiting a forsaken ghost town abandoned by adults seeking a fabled paradise beyond the icy plains. With the boy on the brink of peril, It assumes his likeness, embarking on an eternal quest for new encounters, landscapes, and connections across the unending tundra.

basic_info.title:
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 4: Diamond wa Kudakenai
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 4: Diamond Is Unbreakable
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Diamond Is Not Crash, Dai 4 Bu: Higashikata Jousuke

content.synopsis:
In 1999, Joutarou Kuujou makes his way to the quaint Japanese town of Morioh on a mission twofold: to seek out his mysterious uncle, Jousuke Higashikata, and to probe into the activities of a potentially perilous Stand wielder. Swiftly achieving his first objective upon arrival, Joutarou is taken aback to discover that Jousuke is not only much younger but also possesses a Stand named Crazy Diamond.

Their initial encounter quickly leads to a chilling revelation: an unknown individual is using a supernatural bow and arrow to breed Stand users across Morioh. Witnessing the imminent threat, Jousuke takes it upon himself to safeguard his town and thwart the proliferation of deadly Stand users. Along this perilous journey, Jousuke navigates a web of allies and adversaries, realizing the profound connection between one's desires and the nature of their Stand, whether it brings malice or benevolence.

As they delve deeper into the investigation, a sinister history of Morioh emerges, unveiling hidden perils and a long-buried enigma that casts a shadow over the town's past.

basic_info.title:
Mirai Nikki
Future Diary
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    High Stakes Game
            
                High Stakes Game,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    Survival
            
                Survival
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 未来日記

content.synopsis:
In the shadows of middle school life, Yukiteru Amano, a solitary student, is unexpectedly thrust into a deadly game orchestrated by the god of time and space, Deus Ex Machina. In a high-stakes competition for ultimate power, Amano and eleven other contestants, all diary keepers, face a chilling twist: their diaries now possess the ability to foretell the future.

Armed with a unique "Random Diary" on his phone that reveals detailed insights into his surroundings, Amano hesitantly embraces the ruthless challenge for survival. Teaming up with his enigmatic classmate and fellow diary holder, Yuno Gasai, a captivating figure fixated on Amano, their alliance is forged by a shared desperation to endure.

As the brutal game unfolds, dark truths emerge, casting a new light on the twisted reality of this gripping battle royale.

basic_info.title: I Am a Hero
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アイアムアヒーロー

content.synopsis: In his mid-thirties, the insecure Hideo Suzuki finds himself assisting a mangaka after his own series flops. Plagued by hallucinations in a lackluster existence, he suspects his girlfriend of cheating with her ex. Confronting her, he regrets his accusations and sets out to apologize. Yet, as he strives to make amends, the world shifts beneath his feet. Society transforms into a chilling nightmare, revealing a horrifying truth that shatters his reality.

basic_info.title:
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 2: Sentou Chouryuu
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 2: Battle Tendency
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dai Ni Bu Joseph Joestar: Sono Hokoritakaki Kettou

content.synopsis:
In 1938 America, Robert E. O. Speedwagon, alongside his foundation and Straits, embarks on a journey to Mexico in pursuit of the mysterious Stone Masks. A treacherous turn unfolds as Straits' thirst for power leads to a deadly betrayal, endangering Speedwagon amidst the ancient ruins.

Meanwhile, responding to Speedwagon's call, Joseph Joestar and his grandmother Erina Pendleton relocate from London to New York City. Adjusting to their new life, Joseph faces constant clashes due to cultural clashes and stubborn locals. Empowered by the Ripple inherited from his grandfather Jonathan Joestar, Joseph effortlessly overcomes adversaries.

During a fateful night at an Italian restaurant, Joseph and Erina face off against a provocateur at a neighboring table, setting the stage for unforeseen challenges.

basic_info.title: Look Back
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ルックバック

content.synopsis:
In the world of manga at school, Ayumu Fujino is a fourth-grade prodigy known for her exceptional artwork. When her teacher assigns a section of the school newspaper to the absentee student, Kyomoto, Fujino's reign as the top artist is challenged. Fuelled by jealousy, Fujino sets out to surpass Kyomoto's talent, but her efforts seem to lead her further from her goal.

As years pass, Fujino reaches sixth grade, feeling defeated and abandoning her passion for manga. However, fate intervenes on graduation day when Fujino is tasked with delivering Kyomoto's certificate. A chance encounter between the rivals sets off a chain of events neither could foresee, shaping their futures in unexpected ways.

basic_info.title:
Tonari no Kaibutsu-kun
My Little Monster

content.synopsis: Shizuku Mizutani, known as a dedicated "study bug" focused on her future career like her mother, gets pulled into the world of the class troublemaker, Haru Yoshida. Haru, known for his troubled past and abrupt ways, unexpectedly proclaims them as friends and even expresses his love for Shizuku. As she gets to know him better, Shizuku discovers a gentle and sincere side beneath Haru's tough exterior.

basic_info.title: Kami nomi zo Shiru Sekai
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Harem
            
                Harem,                    Otaku Culture
            
                Otaku Culture,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: KamiNomi, Kami nomizo Shiru Sekai, The World God Only Knows, TWGOK

content.synopsis: Keima Katsuragi, renowned online as the "God of Conquest," is a high school student who excels at winning over dating sim girls but despises real-life romance. Unexpectedly, he is roped into a contract by Elucia "Elsie" de Lute Ima, a girl from hell on a mission to capture runaway spirits residing in girls' hearts. To save his own life, Keima must now apply his virtual dating skills to conquer real-life girls and fulfill his daunting task.

basic_info.title:
Tate no Yuusha no Nariagari
The Rising of the Shield Hero
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 盾の勇者の成り上がり

content.synopsis:
In the realm of Melromarc, a young otaku named Naofumi Iwatani is unexpectedly whisked away from his world and thrust into a daunting mission. Alongside three others, Naofumi discovers they are the chosen Four Cardinal Heroes tasked with vanquishing the ominous "Waves of Catastrophe."

Despite his noble calling, Naofumi is unfairly burdened with the title of the "Shield Hero," equipped with only a humble shield. Rejected by the kingdom's fighters, his only ally is the alluring princess, Malty Melromarc. Yet, betrayal strikes swiftly when Naofumi wakes to find himself stripped of everything, falsely accused of a heinous crime by the very princess who once offered aid.

Saved from death by his hero status, Naofumi faces a harsh reality of isolation and scorn. Determined to seek justice, he acquires a demi-human slave named Raphtalia and sets forth on a treacherous quest for retribution. Bound by duty and fueled by vengeance, Naofumi unravels the mysteries of this unfamiliar world, forging his path amidst deceit and peril.

basic_info.title:
Jujutsu Kaisen 0: Tokyo Toritsu Jujutsu Koutou Senmon Gakkou
Jujutsu Kaisen 0
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tokyo Metropolitan Magic Technical School

content.synopsis:
Haunted by the ghost of his childhood friend, Rika, who now appears as a formidable entity, Yuuta Okkotsu finds himself entangled in a cycle of violence he cannot control. When "Jujutsu" sorcerers intervene to contain Rika's wrath, Yuuta seeks isolation to prevent further harm. However, the master sorcerer Satoru Gojou sees potential in Yuuta and enrolls him in Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School to harness his powers for good.

As Yuuta navigates the world of Jujutsu arts alongside classmates like weapons expert Maki Zenin, spellcaster Toge Inumaki, and the enigmatic Panda, he discovers a sense of belonging and purpose. Yet, as he delves deeper into his training, Yuuta realizes that malevolent forces lurk beyond the realm of wicked spirits, posing a greater threat than he ever imagined.

basic_info.title:
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 5: Ougon no Kaze
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 5: Golden Wind
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Le Bizzarre Avventure Di GioGio Parte 5: Vento Aureo, Vento Aureo, Dai 5 Bu Giorno Giovana: Ougon naru Isan

content.synopsis:
In Naples, 2001, Giorno Giovanna, a small-time crook, harbors a grand ambition – to ascend as a "Gang-Star." Blessed with a Stand named Gold Experience and ties to the legendary Joestar lineage, Giorno's fate shifts when he crosses paths with Bruno Bucciarati, a prominent mobster. 

Embracing Passione and joining Bruno's crew, Giorno uncovers a complex world where Stand users proliferate within the ranks. Amidst rival squads and shifting allegiances, their mission to revolutionize the organization from within poses formidable challenges. Braving fierce opposition, Giorno strives to climb the hierarchy and draw closer to the enigmatic boss, a figure cloaked in enigma.

basic_info.title:
Owari no Seraph
Seraph of the End: Vampire Reign
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 終わりのセラフ

content.synopsis:
Eight-year-old Yuuichirou Amane finds solace at the Hyakuya Orphanage after losing his parents, but struggles to connect with his new "family." Yet, his challenges multiply when a deadly pandemic strikes, wiping out all over the age of 13. Seizing the turmoil, vampires emerge from their underground slumber to enslave the remaining humans, exploiting them as a blood source.

Four years pass, and Yuuichirou and his fellow orphans navigate life under vampire rule. Despite adapting, Yuuichirou remains resolute in his mission to eradicate all vampires and end their tyranny. His steadfast determination clashes with orphan Mikaela Hyakuya, who advocates for cunning survival tactics. When Mikaela secures the favor of influential vampires, he orchestrates a daring escape plan using insider information. However, their bid for freedom is shattered by the ruthless vampire officer Ferid Bathory, leaving Yuuichirou as the sole survivor.

Alone on the surface, Yuuichirou is rescued by the Moon Demon Company, a military faction dedicated to eradicating vampires. Presented with an opportunity to fulfill his vendetta and honor his family, Yuuichirou eagerly joins their ranks, poised to confront his enemies and seek vengeance.

basic_info.title: Beastars
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BEASTARS

content.synopsis:
In a world where anthropomorphic animals coexist, a troubling bias divides them: carnivores are often viewed as ruthless predators by herbivores. When an alpaca named Tem is tragically murdered at Cherryton High School, the already tense relationship between the two groups reaches a breaking point.

Meet Legoshi, a gray wolf student at Cherryton, whose intimidating exterior belies his gentle nature. As turmoil grips the school, Legoshi is thrust into the heart of the conflict between herbivores and carnivores, forcing him to navigate his place in a society plagued by fear and mistrust. Amidst this chaos, his ambiguous feelings for a herbivore add another layer of complexity to his already turbulent world.

"Beastars" delves into Legoshi's internal battles as he grapples with his identity in a world that struggles to accept creatures like him.

basic_info.title:
Mushoku Tensei: Isekai Ittara Honki Dasu
Mushoku Tensei: Jobless Reincarnation
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 無職転生 ～異世界行ったら本気だす～

content.synopsis: In a fateful twist, a 34-year-old NEET sacrifices his life to rescue a stranger in a traffic accident. To his surprise, he awakens as the infant Rudeus Greyrat in a magical realm. Born to the esteemed adventurers Paul and Zenith Greyrat, Rudeus exhibits extraordinary magical aptitude at the tender age of two, attracting the attention of the skilled mage tutor Roxy Migurdia. Endowed with vast magical prowess and memories of his former life, Rudeus is determined to navigate this new world, striving to avoid past pitfalls and live a life free of remorse.

basic_info.title:
Chi no Wadachi
Blood on the Tracks
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Trail of Blood

content.synopsis: Seiichi Osabe is an ordinary middle schooler with friends, a crush, and caring parents, including an overly protective mother. Perceived as a mama's boy, Seiichi's world shifts when he realizes the peril hidden in her smothering love. Struggling to escape her control, he unravels a startling truth about his supposedly mundane life.

basic_info.title: Beelzebub
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Childcare
            
                Childcare,                    Delinquents
            
                Delinquents,                    Mythology
            
                Mythology,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Beelzebub Bangai-hen

content.synopsis:
Welcome to Ishiyama High, the notorious haven of delinquents where toughness reigns supreme. Meet first-year student Tatsumi Oga, feared as the "Demon King" for his unmatched prowess in battle.

During a routine confrontation with a gang, Oga stumbles upon an unexpected discovery—a helpless infant. Against all odds, Oga takes on the unexpected role of caregiver, only to find the baby forming a strong attachment to him. Desperate for help, he turns to his loyal friend Takayuki Furuichi for support, but their peaceful moment is shattered by the sudden appearance of Hildegard, a demon maid with a startling revelation: the baby is no ordinary child but Kaiser de Emperana Beelzebub IV, destined to bring about humanity's downfall at the behest of his father, Beelzebub III, the Great Demon Lord of the Demon World.

Caught in a dilemma, Oga finds himself thrust into an unlikely role as a surrogate parent to Baby Beel, with a deadly ultimatum hanging over his head—stray more than 15 meters from the infant, and face instant demise. As Oga navigates his tumultuous past and grapples with his tough exterior, he embarks on a tumultuous journey filled with encounters with demons, treacherous classmates, and the challenges of being an unconventional mentor and guardian to Baby Beel. Follow Oga's gripping tale as he treads the thin line between delinquency and responsibility in "Beezelbub."

basic_info.title: Liar Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: LIAR GAME

content.synopsis:
College student Nao Kanzaki, embodying the essence of "foolishly honest," unwittingly steps into the treacherous "Liar Game" when a mysterious package lands her a windfall of one hundred million yen. The high-stakes tournament demands cunning betrayal for riches or faces a lifetime of debt for the losing side. With her fate hanging by a thread, Nao turns to the newly freed con artist, Shinichi Akiyama, renowned for his financial exploits.

Initially reluctant to dive back into deceitful schemes, Shinichi brushes off Nao's plea. However, her unwavering determination eventually chips away at his defenses, compelling him to join forces with her. As they navigate the murky waters of the game, both harbor hidden agendas. Yet, as they delve deeper, they uncover not only the game's true nature but also the dark truths lurking beneath the surface.

basic_info.title: Watashitachi no Shiawase na Jikan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Watashi-tachi no Shiawase na Jikan, Our Happy Hours, Our Happy Time

content.synopsis:
In the shadow of their own despair, they found solace in the depths of darkness.

Juri Mutou, haunted by a troubled past and a fractured relationship with her once-renowned pianist mother, struggles with the ghosts of her own trauma. Her life punctuated by three failed suicide attempts, Juri's existence is shrouded in pain until her aunt Monica, a devout member of the clergy, extends an invitation to visit a death row inmate.

Yuu, a condemned convict grappling with the weight of his actions, finds himself in a relentless battle with his own desire for death. Monica's persistent letters offer a glimmer of hope amidst his despair, though he interprets them as mere charity. When Yuu finally confronts Monica to halt her correspondence, an unexpected encounter with Juri sets into motion a profound transformation for them both.

basic_info.title:
Shinseiki Evangelion
Neon Genesis Evangelion
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 新世紀エヴァンゲリオン

content.synopsis:
In the chilling aftermath of a 1999 meteorite crash in Antarctica that reshaped the world by melting ice caps and triggering catastrophic sea level rises, over half the global population perished. Fast forward to 2015, and Earth is a shadow of its former self, haunted by monstrous beings known as Angels.

Within the fortified confines of Tokyo-3, young Shinji Ikari, aged 14, emerges as the reluctant savior in the battle against the relentless Angels. Pulled into the fray by his father's clandestine group, NERV, Shinji assumes the role of an Evangelion pilot—an immense bioorganic robot designed to combat these otherworldly threats.

As Shinji grapples with the immense burden placed upon him, he must muster the inner strength to defend both humanity's future and his own. Yet, with each clash between Evangelions and Angels, the dark secrets of their world gradually come to light, unveiling a reality more terrifying than imagined.

In the blazing chaos of Tokyo, the Infernals—pyrokinetics who transform into fiery demons—terrorize the city streets. Shinra, recognized for his unique powers, joins Special Fire Force Company 8, dedicated to battling these infernal foes.

Embracing his newfound role, Shinra soon realizes that the path to heroism is fraught with challenges. As Infernal threats escalate nationwide, internal discord within the brigade threatens their unity. To complicate matters, Shinra's past resurfaces when he faces off against a secretive cult, unveiling a sinister conspiracy that threatens to engulf the world in flames.

basic_info.title: Dengeki Daisy
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hetakuso Cupid, The Hopeless Cupid

content.synopsis:
Teru Kurebayashi finds herself alone in the world following the passing of her brother, Souichirou, with only her mysterious confidant "Daisy" to turn to for comfort and support. Despite never having met Daisy and relying solely on a cell phone left by her brother, their uplifting conversations bring light to Teru's life.

In a twist of fate, Teru's encounters with the gruff school janitor, Tasuku Kurosaki, are far from pleasant. Tasked with working for him as penance for an accidental mishap, she faces his harsh demeanor. However, beneath Kurosaki's tough exterior lies a hidden depth. Could there be more to him than Teru initially perceives?

Bonus Story:
Volume 16: Hetakuso Cupid (The Hopeless Cupid)

At Kamome Academy, whispers of the supernatural swirl around the infamous "Seven Mysteries." Among them is the tale of Hanako-san, the ghost of a young girl said to dwell in the third-floor girl's bathroom of the old school building, granting wishes to those who summon her. When first-year student Nene Yashiro conjures Hanako-san seeking love, she is shocked to find a boy instead of the expected apparition.

Despite Hanako-kun's lack of magical artifacts, Nene strives to capture his attention using various tactics. Her quest takes a perilous turn when she accidentally ingests a mermaid scale, transforming her into a fish. In a daring rescue, Hanako-kun saves her life, intertwining their destinies and requiring Nene to serve as his assistant. As they navigate the mysterious forces at play, Nene uncovers that the secrets of the Seven Mysteries run deeper than mere gossip.

basic_info.title:
Yamada-kun to 7-nin no Majo
Yamada-kun and the Seven Witches

content.synopsis: Ryuu Yamada, a tough troublemaker at Suzaku High, crosses paths with the school's top student, Urara Shiraishi, after a scolding for his rebellious ways. In a clumsy attempt to stir trouble, he accidentally swaps bodies with Shiraishi due to an unexpected fall and kiss. Awakening in the infirmary in Shiraishi's body, Yamada realizes the bizarre turn of events. As they navigate this newfound ability, Yamada's high school journey takes a thrilling twist with a touch of the supernatural.

basic_info.title: Mob Psycho 100
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: One Hundred Mob Psycho

content.synopsis:
In the world of Shigeo "Mob" Kageyama, an eighth-grade student harboring immense psychic abilities, keeping a low profile is key. Despite his extraordinary powers, Mob opts to conceal them from the public eye, fearing their destructive impact. To sharpen his skills, he partners with Arataka Reigen, a self-proclaimed esper seeking to harness Mob's potential.

Together with Reigen, Mob navigates the realm of exorcising malevolent spirits, striving to showcase his worth to childhood friend Tsubomi Takane. Yet, as challenges mount and his emotions strain against their confines, Mob's suppressed feelings threaten to surge forth uncontrollably, leaving his fate hanging in the balance.

basic_info.title:
Kokou no Hito
The Climber
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 孤高の人

content.synopsis:
Embark on a thrilling journey with Mori Buntarou as he defies all odds to conquer the heights of the world. His relentless determination leads him to the pinnacle of success, where no one has dared to tread before.

Mori's adventure begins when he changes schools and is persuaded by his classmates to scale the towering school building. Fearless and without hesitation, he ascends, facing a daunting challenge—a treacherous horizontal overhang. With adrenaline fueling his every move, Mori takes a leap of faith to seize victory at the summit.

From this lofty vantage point, a new horizon unfolds before him—a new peak, a new ambition. Fueled by a newfound passion, Mori delves into the exhilarating realm of rock climbing, discovering a life-altering purpose along the way.

basic_info.title:
Masca: The Tale of the Great Mage of Hessed
Masca
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Polygon
            
                Love Polygon,                    Mythology
            
                Mythology
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 마스카 헤셰드의 대마법사 이야기

content.synopsis: In the ominous Devil's Castle, the apprentice Asarella, guided by her good heart, ventures on a mission of goodwill, defying her master, the Arch-Mage Eliwho. A dark turn of events ensues as she becomes entangled in a blood pact with The Devil. Unbeknownst to her, the mage harbors a hidden love for Asarella, adding a complex layer to her training for the impending apocalyptic battle. Thus, an extraordinary love triangle unfolds in a realm fraught with darkness and secrets.

basic_info.title: #Killstagram
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sarinstagram

content.synopsis:
In 21st-century Korea, image is everything, and social media sensation Do Remi reigns supreme in this superficial world. Blessed with beauty, she commands a legion of devoted followers who hang onto her every post. When she's not doling out cosmetic advice, Remi leans on her steadfast companion Lee Jia for support, forming an unbreakable duo. But their unshakeable bond is shattered when influencers start vanishing without a trace.

A chilling encounter with a stalker leaves Jia missing, thrusting Remi into a nightmare she never saw coming. With her friend's disappearance, Remi finds herself in the crosshairs of a potential serial killer, while the indifferent authorities offer little help. As hidden agendas unravel and unexpected allies emerge, Remi grapples with a harsh truth: in a world of illusions, trust is a scarce commodity. Determined to survive at any cost, Remi faces a perilous journey where self-preservation is her only certainty.

basic_info.title: My Girl
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: マイガール

content.synopsis: In the mundane routine of his office job, twenty-three-year-old Masamune Kazama clings to memories of his past relationship with Youko Tsukamoto. But when a sudden call from Youko's mother shatters his world, revealing her tragic passing and the existence of a secret daughter raised abroad, Masamune is thrust into single fatherhood. Amidst grief and newfound responsibilities, Masamune embarks on a poignant journey of family, loss, and embracing the challenges of raising his unexpected child in "My Girl."

basic_info.title: Sigrid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 시그리드

content.synopsis:
In a life bound by strict rules and unwavering loyalty to the emperor, Sigrid faced the sharp edge of the guillotine as her final reward. "Why is this my fate?" she pondered in her last moments. Yet, as she awoke, she found herself five years in the past, questioning the very essence of her existence.

Determined to rewrite her destiny, Sigrid embarked on a transformative journey, altering every aspect of her being. Her newfound path thrust her into the heart of intrigue, only to find the threads of fate tightening once more. As she confronted her old foe, Veramud, Sigrid realized that true change begins with forging unexpected alliances.

basic_info.title: Back to You
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Aneun Yeojaae, Just a Girl He Knows

content.synopsis: Imagine being unexpectedly thrust back ten years in time by a freak accident. For Hayoung, finding herself back in high school presents a chance to alter the course of fate for Jaehyun, the love of her life. Can she rewrite their destinies and save him?

basic_info.title: The Antagonist's Pet
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Pet of the Villainess, Angnyeo-ui Aewandongmul

content.synopsis: In possession of an angelic visage, young Sasha Tartt harbors a life-altering revelation: in this romantic tale where she plays a supporting role, she alone holds the key to the true conclusion! As the story's antagonist develops a keen interest in her, Sasha faces a dilemma: aid the cunning and lovely Rebecca in securing a happy ending, or align with the kind-hearted protagonist to safeguard her own existence? Amidst this turmoil, Sasha must navigate the attentions of her bespectacled admirer and tame a boy with dragon-like qualities. Will Sasha master the art of winning over these central figures with her newfound skills?

basic_info.title: The Perfect Plan for a Fairy-Tale Ending
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Fairy Tale Villain's Perfect Ending Plan, The Perfect Ending for the Villainess of a Fairy Tale

content.synopsis:
In the classic tale, a sorrowful girl sheds diamond tears as she endures mistreatment from her own kin. However, a noble prince emerges to vanquish the malevolent family. Thus, the girl embarks on a joyous life alongside her savior.

But hold on a minute! I've awakened as the wicked sister, Marcia Blick?! This accursed abode! I must flee at once! Yet, can I abandon my sister to her fate? No. I've resolved – we shall escape together!

"Larisa, let's seek out the prince who will bring you bliss! But wait... Prince, why are you pledging your love to me? Your heart belongs to my sister! This sibling of yours will craft the perfect finale!"

basic_info.title: The Regressed Mercenary Has a Plan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Regressed Mercenary's Machinations, Every Returned Mercenary Has a Plan, Hoegwihan Yongbyeong-eun Da Gyehoeg-i Itda

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, Cecil Perdium, renowned as the Mercenary King, meets his end in battle, leaving his quest for vengeance against Duke Delphine unfinished. Confronting his mortality, Cecil discovers that the treacherous Duke had co-conspirators in his family's downfall. Miraculously reborn in his youthful form, Cecil embarks on a journey to redeem his tarnished reputation and reclaim his former strength to protect his kin. With allies abandoning him in the face of adversity, Cecil faces a daunting challenge. Will he rise again as the formidable warrior he once was and alter his family's destiny?

basic_info.title: Weapon Creator
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Weapon Maker

content.synopsis: In the bustling world of magical beings and guilds, Junseo Shin, a humble D-rank support with a unique "Creation" ability, toils in obscurity due to his minimal mana. However, fate takes a turn when the Dawon Guild recognizes his rare gift and enlists him for a crucial mission. Venturing into a treacherous dungeon, Junseo faces perilous foes that push him to the brink of demise. In a miraculous twist, he unlocks a mysterious power: the "Succession" of memories from his previous life, where he witnessed the world's catastrophic downfall. Armed with this newfound knowledge, Junseo embarks on a daring quest to avert disaster and rewrite destiny.

basic_info.title: The Hellbound
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Horror
            
                Horror,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jiok, Hell

content.synopsis:
Across the globe, a chilling revelation strikes countless individuals unexpectedly. In a haunting three-part communication, each recipient is ominously informed of their destined descent to Hell along with the precise time remaining on Earth. Fleeing is futile, and cries for salvation fall on deaf ears. Their impending doom is unescapable, culminating in a terrifying spectacle where ancient entities inflict unspeakable horrors, leaving behind mere shells of their victims.

As per a rising religious sect, these occurrences are divine retribution meted out by God upon the sinful. Spearheading this belief is the youthful leader, Jeong Jinsu, urging society to embrace virtue to avert such a grim end. Tasked with probing a suspicious death linked to this enigmatic phenomenon, Seoul's law enforcement assigns Detective Jin Gyeonghun to the case. Wrestling with personal turmoil stemming from his wife's killer's release, Detective Jin delves into unraveling the enigma surrounding the sect's enigmatic leader and the unsettling fate of those marked for damnation.

basic_info.title: Night of the Goblin
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Goblin's Night, Dokkaebi's Night, Night of the Ogre, Dokkaebi-ui Bam

content.synopsis: Recently, Siu Choi's life took an unexpected turn from typical high school student to a descendant of the goblin clan, making him a half-demon. In a mysterious realm of another world, the formidable Demon King holds dominion, commanding the night and all demons. As the battle for the throne unfolds, Siu Choi is thrust into a perilous quest for power and destiny.

basic_info.title: Vanilla Ice
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 바닐라 아이스

content.synopsis: In a world where opposites attract, the graceful Yoon Sul and the rugged Taehee find themselves inexplicably drawn together. Despite their stark differences, they are bound by an undeniable connection they can't seem to shake. Prepare for a whirlwind of action and humor in this romantic comedy that promises a surprising twist at every turn.

basic_info.title: I Accept You
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 넌 내가 접수한다

content.synopsis: In the halls of Seo High School, Yee Su-yoon reigns supreme as a top student and skilled fighter with a stunning girlfriend named Kang Ha-eun. Yet, his treatment of Ha-eun raises questions. Why does he mistreat her while consistently coming to the aid of another girl, Chae Shin-hee? The tangled web of relationships at Seo High School is about to unveil its secrets.

basic_info.title: Love SOS
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sarang SOS

content.synopsis: Dan-bi, the beloved daughter of a Yakuza boss, witnesses her father's tragic murder and is left blinded by his attackers. In a desperate bid to restore her sight, she undergoes an eye transplant in Korea. Now under her mother's strict orders to lead a quiet life with her aunt, Dan-bi navigates the challenges posed by her cousin's romantic entanglements and the enigmatic Jijang son. Complications arise when she discovers a connection between her aunt's adopted son and a mysterious boy who showed her unexpected kindness during her hospital stay. This somber figure, who once sought permission to kiss her eyes, holds a secret that may unravel Dan-bi's newfound peace.

basic_info.title: Juvenile Offender
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Chokbeop Sonyeon

content.synopsis: Yunseong Lee, a target of school bullying, chooses to seek retribution against his tormentors by turning to delinquency. Upon his entry into a juvenile detention facility, he encounters former school bullies and embarks on his scheme. Yet, there remains one individual awaiting justice. Amidst the flawed societal constructs, Yunseong's journey of vengeance unfolds against those who have wronged him.

basic_info.title: I Raised a Black Dragon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Raise a Black Dragon

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of overwork, Noa unexpectedly inhabits the body of Eleanora, the notorious villainess from a novel. Seeking a tranquil existence, Noa cautiously avoids altering the course of the original tale. However, everything changes when a baby dragon, destined to bond with the heroine, chooses to imprint on Noa instead. The unexpected bond sets off a chain of events that could disrupt the carefully laid out narrative.

basic_info.title: Save Me
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Guwon Hasoseo

content.synopsis: Top student Hyeongoh faces relentless bullying due to his disability, feeling trapped in a bleak reality with no respite in sight. However, a beacon of hope emerges when a mysterious figure steps up to support him in his darkest hour.

basic_info.title: Familyman
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Family man

content.synopsis:
In a heartwarming tale of devotion, factory worker Kwon Gang-Ho toils to support his family, earning admiration for his kindness. Meanwhile, his wife Yeong-Ran in Seoul single-handedly cares for their children, striving to provide despite financial challenges. 

When a workplace accident leaves Gang-Ho disfigured and unemployed, he conceals his misfortune from his family by staying with a friend. Witnessing a close call with his daughter, he dons a mask of the hero "Gugu-man" to secretly watch over them. Thus unfolds a poignant story of a father's silent protection and unwavering love amidst trials of his own.

basic_info.title: Our Beloved Summer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Geu Hae Urineun, Our Beloved Summer: Like Early Summer!

content.synopsis: Guk Yeonsu and Choi Wung are polar opposites, clashing at every turn. Yeonsu, driven by her modest beginnings, prioritizes her studies above all else. In contrast, Wung, born into privilege, values peace over hard work. When they become the focus of a documentary showcasing two students—one excelling academically, the other struggling—the filmmakers face a daunting task. Wung's carefree attitude grates on Yeonsu, making compromise seem impossible. Yet, as they reluctantly participate in the project, hidden layers emerge, hinting at a potential bond that could bridge the gap between them.

basic_info.title: The Duke's Darling Daughter-in-Law
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Adopted Daughter-in-Law Is Preparing to Be Abandoned, I Don't Want to Be the Duke's Adopted Daughter-in-Law

content.synopsis: When I found myself inhabiting the notorious villainess Ellie's body, I vowed to steer clear of her wicked ways. However, everything changed when the duke decided to adopt me and the male lead from the orphanage. To make matters more complicated, he also declared that I would be his future daughter-in-law. How can I navigate this unexpected twist with the presence of another heroine in the story?

basic_info.title: Nephilim John
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 네피림존

content.synopsis: In a world of battle angels, Lucifer, demons, and holy wars, John, a nephilim, is unexpectedly thrust into the chaos when Mikael, a fierce battle angel, crashes into his room.

basic_info.title: A Modern Man Who Got Transmigrated Into the Murim World
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Isekai
            
                Isekai,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    Reincarnation
            
                Reincarnation
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Murim-e Tteoreojin Hyeondaein

content.synopsis: In the dead of night, Jo Hwi, a part-time delivery worker and public official, was struck by a speeding car, leaving him with vivid memories of his untimely death in a hit-and-run. Suddenly finding himself as the second son of the failing Jo Ga-cheol Clan, a family burdened by insurmountable debt and lacking authority, Jo Hwi seeks to save them from ruin. With determination, he steps into a new role, blending his modern expertise with his past experiences to navigate the challenges ahead. The tale unfolds of a man forced to draw upon all his skills in a gripping narrative of survival and redemption.

basic_info.title: I'm a Part-Timer for the Gods
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Part-Time Land of the Gods, I Became a Part Time Employee for Gods, The Part Time Nation of the Gods, Sin-deur-ui Alba Nara

content.synopsis:
In the depths of his jobless struggle, Damduk Yu reluctantly embraces a part-time gig to make ends meet. Desperate and forlorn, he unleashes his frustrations to the divine, only to be unexpectedly struck by lightning and plunged into darkness.

A mysterious awakening reveals a hovering status window, prompting Damduk to ponder, "With nothing to lose, why not ride this wave?"

Thus begins Damduk Yu's odyssey as the humblest deity in the gods' part-time realm, as he ventures forth to carve out a new existence and potentially transform his fortunes for the better.

basic_info.title: Returned as the Duke
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Regressed as the Duke, Hoegwihaetdeoni Gongjak

content.synopsis: In the fiery aftermath of a castle blaze, an elderly butler undergoes a mystical transformation, emerging as a rejuvenated incarnation of his bumbling master, Duke Aaron of Brahn. Armed with a wealth of experience in estate affairs, the "new" duke seizes the reins of power to steer Brahn towards a brighter future. Can the youthful Duke Aaron navigate the treacherous schemes of his malevolent uncle, Emperor Zeron, and shield Brahn from impending doom? As he grapples with the conflicting demands of leadership and survival, the fate of Brahn hangs precariously in the balance, awaiting the verdict of time.

basic_info.title: I Will Fall With the Emperor
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 황제와 함께 타락하겠습니다

content.synopsis: In a moment of defiance, I rejected his offer, choosing loyalty to my country over self-preservation. Little did I know then that betrayal had already woven its way through my life, leading to a cruel fate of abandonment and demise at the hands of my own kin. It wasn't until a journey back a decade in time that the truth unraveled - the bond between us, a mirror of shared darkness. As we stand on the brink once more, intertwined in fate, will we succumb together this time?

basic_info.title: Yongbyeong Maluhan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mercenary Maruhan, Warlord

content.synopsis: In the era of the super-continent, Mercenary Maruhan emerges as a figure shrouded in darkness amid humanity's impending doom. Demonic Beasts breach the East-West divide, shattering peace agreements and prompting a mass exodus of humans seeking safety. A group unites to launch a daring mission to eliminate King Rhode, the leader of the Demonic Beasts. Thus begins the gripping tale of Maruhan, the mercenary, in a world on the brink of chaos.

basic_info.title: Witch Hunt
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 마녀사냥

content.synopsis: On his inaugural day at school, Gamin witnesses an unsettling sight that plunges him into a world of witchcraft, turning his once ordinary life into a cauldron of mysterious and harrowing events.

basic_info.title: Lessa
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lessa: the Crimson Knight, Lessa: Servant of Cosmos

content.synopsis: In a tale about a demon hunter named Rano on a quest to locate his missing sister, he encounters Lessa, an individual who bears the same demonic teeth yet remains unscathed by sunlight. Lessa strangely recalls Rano, who, in turn, has no memory of their past connection. As Rano is haunted by dreams of Lessa, the mystery deepens. What ties bind these two enigmatic figures together?

basic_info.title: Revenge Wedding
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 리벤지 웨딩

content.synopsis: In the glamorous world of Mercedia Sasha, where beauty, riches, and prestige reign supreme, she stands unrivaled. Her disdain for suitors is well-known, leaving her content in her single life. However, her tranquility is shattered when she awakens on a ship in the open sea, clad in a ghastly bridal gown. The mastermind behind this scheme? None other than Admiral Demetriu Cyprosa, a revered war hero—or so the public believes. Forced into an unwanted union, the mismatched pair find themselves en route to a deserted island for an unconventional honeymoon. As tensions flare between the two, will they set aside their differences to plot an escape, or will their stubbornness thwart their plans for retribution against their manipulators?

basic_info.title: I'm the Soldier's Ex-Girlfriend
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I'm the Ex-Girlfriend of a Soldier, Yongsa-ui Jeon Yeochin-imnida

content.synopsis: In a world where every woman dreams of being the leading lady in a romance novel, Maise Hazelnut stands apart. Tasked with playing the role of the perfect partner to the charming protagonist, she rebels against her predestined fate. Maise's heart belongs to her goofy boyfriend, the beloved protagonist, yet the allure of a different path beckons. Enter Eith Lancell, a mysterious man who sweeps her off her feet on a blind date. Despite her infatuation, Maise can't shake the feeling that there's more to Eith than meets the eye. As she delves deeper into his enigmatic persona, she uncovers unsettling truths that threaten to shatter her newfound happiness. Will Maise's quest for her own happy ending lead her to the ultimate betrayal?

basic_info.title: World Bring It On!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Saesang Bring It On!, World! Come on!

content.synopsis: In a world of wealth and privilege, Hyo Yi, a determined and resourceful girl, navigates the elite halls of a prestigious private school on a scholarship. Her top priority is shielding her vulnerable brother from the cruelty of bullies due to his mental disability. Enter Min Ha, a surprising ally who strikes a pact to safeguard the siblings. United by their unique bond, Hyo Yi and Min Ha embark on a journey of understanding and compassion, discovering the true essence of love, one step at a time.

basic_info.title: Act Like a Boss Monster, Mr. Swallow!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mr. Devourer, Please Act Like a Final Boss, The Unbeatable Dungeon's Lazy Boss Monster

content.synopsis: In the heart of the formidable Primordial Core lies an impregnable dungeon, home to Swallow, the legendary Original Monster embodying pure evil. Surprisingly, Swallow is no fearsome tyrant but a lethargic boss who simply craves sleep. Ensuring Swallow's comfort is Renee, an unwaveringly devoted homunculus maid fixated on her monstrous charge. The sole operational mind behind the dungeon is Patrick, an animated skeleton clinging to his last brain cell. Amidst the ensuing chaos, will Mr. Swallow ever find the peace he seeks?

basic_info.title: How to Survive as a Maid in a Horror Game
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: No Exit Horror

content.synopsis:
In the acclaimed game Murderer of Pflatzgraff Manor, players are captivated by its stunning visuals but frustrated by its punishing difficulty. The narrative unfolds with Satan, transformed into a mortal by Lilith's curse, forced to murder to survive. A Korean woman on the verge of quitting is thrust into the body of Hilda, a maid serving the sinister Count Adrian Kaiser von der Pflatzgraff.

Hilda navigates the treacherous game, balancing her fear of Adrian's cruelty with her duty to care for him. As she schemes to protect her fellow maids from harm without arousing Adrian's suspicion, the stakes soar. Failure could mean an endless cycle of death, compelling Hilda to play a deadly game of deception to secure their salvation.

basic_info.title: Flawed Almighty
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cheonchi Jeonneung

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, once-hopeful hoodlum Jeonji Kim faces a new curse: do good or go to hell. The terms appear straightforward until a perky guardian angel arrives, healing his limp. Now, tasked with helping others, Jeonji must navigate the whims of a vengeful deity. Will his efforts be sufficient to satisfy a god with a score to settle?

basic_info.title: Side Characters Deserve Love Too
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: He's a Supporting Character but I Love Him Anyway, Eochapi Joyeon-inde Narang Sarang-ina Hae

content.synopsis: In the world of the fantasy novel King Maker, Geumja Kim is the ultimate devotee of Kyle du Vilteon, an overlooked character. Her unending quest for all things Kyle takes a dramatic turn when she passes away during a book revisit... only to awaken in Kyle's chambers in a startling twist of fate! To her astonishment, she discovers that Kyle can tune into her innermost thoughts, but only when she calls out his name in her mind. With no time to lose, she must set aside her fangirl fantasies as Kyle faces a grim destiny. Can she alter the course of fate for her beloved character and, in doing so, find her own place in this enchanted narrative?

basic_info.title: Couple Breaker
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Couple Breaker

content.synopsis: Love and war collide in a fashion-forward tale of unexpected twists. Taerin and Ju-a, close friends studying fashion at university, find themselves entangled in a love quadrangle. When they discover they'll be competing for both love and money on a couple's show, the stakes are raised. To their shock, partners are swapped, blurring the lines of loyalty and desire. As the battle for affection unfolds, secrets and emotions run high in this tangled web of relationships.

basic_info.title: My Civil Servant Life Reborn in the Strange World
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jeontu Jongjog-euro Hwangsaenghan Naui Gongmuwon Saenghwalgi

content.synopsis: Den vowed to honor his late mother's dying wish by securing a respectable job, but fate had different plans when he was transported to a mysterious realm by truck-kun. Reincarnated as a formidable magic wielder and poised to lead the formidable Crow Tribe, Den decides to pursue his original goal of becoming a civil servant in the capital. Amidst quirky housemates, relentless pursuit by his family, and a sinister conspiracy to destabilize the empire, Den's quest for a quiet life is anything but straightforward. Can he navigate these challenges and fulfill his heartfelt promise?

basic_info.title: Dark Mortal
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Geomeun Ingan

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of an explosion, Nam Kang finds himself scarred, orphaned, and almost blind. Enduring daily taunts, he leans on his loyal imaginary companion, Inky. When Nam awakens from a brutal attack to discover his scars vanished and his sight restored, a new chapter unfolds at a different school. As he embraces a chance at a regular life, Nam realizes that alongside his scars, his beloved friend Inky has also vanished.

basic_info.title: Twilight Poem
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Heeran Love Song, Heeranguk Yeonga

content.synopsis: Princess Soru, born from illegitimacy, possesses a unique gift of seeing ghosts despite her blindness. General Jahyeon, a valiant warrior with the power to repel spirits using the sun's aura. Yato, the most alluring yet lethal ghost, harbors a heart devoid of emotions. Bound by an unwanted marriage, Soru and Jahyeon rely on each other – she for his aura, he for her divine blood. As Soru's unwavering love thaws Jahyeon's icy heart, a similar transformation stirs in Yato. Each holds a key to fulfilling the other's needs and desires. Can they be the salvation they seek in each other's arms?

basic_info.title: My Three Tyrant Brothers
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Pokgun Oppa-ga Sesiraeyo

content.synopsis: In the realm of Ascania, a fateful curse looms over the imperial family, foretelling their demise at the hands of a beloved one. The curse, however, is shattered with the arrival of a slave girl bearing the distinctive, ever-shifting Ascania eyes. Proclaimed as Princess Chloe, the newfound sibling to the three princes, she yearns for the warmth of family. Yet, her brothers, bound by a legacy of stoicism, harbor secrets and guarded hearts.
