Can Chloe's presence ignite a transformation within their icy facade and usher in a new era for the Ascania dynasty?

basic_info.title: Nano List
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 나노리스트

content.synopsis: In a world where android interaction is the norm, Milo finds himself residing with not one, but two androids crafted by his sister. With their formidable strength, how secure is his new living arrangement? The mystery deepens as he questions the purpose behind his sister's gift of a "bodyguard android." Soon, Milo will uncover the unsettling truth firsthand.

basic_info.title: Yeonwoo's Innocence
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yeonwoo-ui Sunjeong

content.synopsis: Yeonwoo, with his gentle and delicate demeanor, often finds himself mistaken for a female student. His heart beats for Haesol Kang, the school's reigning popularity icon. Despite sharing the same classroom, Yeonwoo's timidity has sealed his lips in Haesol's presence, leaving his unspoken crush hanging in the air.

basic_info.title: It's Not Your Baby!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: It's Not Your Child, The Baby Isn't Yours

content.synopsis:
Renowned for her unmatched prowess within the Rohas Empire, Callia Taksecate never imagined a life beyond her warrior's path. Bearing children was an impossibility for women like her, yet destiny weaves an unexpected story when she learns of her pregnancy. Joy fills her heart as her deepest wishes materialize.

The father of her child is none other than Simon Tereloane, a formidable magician and Callia's closest confidant, who harbors a vehement aversion to parenthood. Bound by rigid family traditions, Simon cannot accept a child born out of wedlock. Undeterred, Callia embarks on a clandestine journey to safeguard her newfound happiness, even as Simon, relentless in his pursuit, threatens to uncover long-buried truths that will change everything.

basic_info.title: The Wicked Little Princess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Princess Is Evil, Hwangnyeo-nim-ui Saakhasyeo

content.synopsis: In a realm where Liona stands as the lone fire witch in three centuries, her existence unfolds in seclusion until she crosses paths with Rakus, the prince of Carrell. Love takes root, only to be twisted by betrayal and death at his hands. Reborn as the infant princess of the Hasys Empire, Liona emerges with unmatched power and a regal lineage tied to dragons. Fueled by a thirst for vengeance against Rakus, she embarks on a path paved with hidden mana, loyal allies, and a fierce battle against her eleven siblings for the ultimate throne.

basic_info.title: Revenge on the Real One
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Real Daughter Has Returned, The Real Daughter Is Back

content.synopsis: In a shocking revelation, Helga Yutrit learns she was switched at birth with her half-sister, leading her to strive for acceptance within House Yutrit. However, her facade crumbles when the true daughter, Hillianne, resurfaces. Now facing her imposter status exposed, Helga plots vengeance against her family and the sister who threatens to usurp her identity.

basic_info.title: To Be an Actor
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Will Live as an Actor, To Be an Actor, Baeu-roseo Salgetda, Be the Actor

content.synopsis:
Amid achieving acclaim as a renowned supporting actor, Young-guk Jang was honored with the prestigious Best Supporting Actor Award. However, tragedy struck as he received the news of his mother's passing on the very same day. Consumed by guilt over neglecting his mother for years, Young-guk contemplated ending his own life. As he faced mortality, memories of his mother's love and the cherished moments of his past flooded his mind, leading him to rue his choices. In a moment of reflection, he found himself transported back to his childhood.

"I've returned to the past I yearned for. This time, I will make it right..."

Thus unfolds the tale of a man seeking a fresh start in his acting career. Can he forge a path to happiness that had eluded him in his previous life?

basic_info.title: Reborn Rich
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Chaebeol's Youngest Son, Chaebeol Jip Mangnaeadeul

content.synopsis: From humble beginnings to the pinnacle of success, Hyeonwoo faces a shocking betrayal from the royal family of Soonyang Group, South Korea's biggest corporation, despite his unwavering loyalty over 13 years. As despair looms and he resigns himself to a grim fate, a miraculous twist transports him into the body of Dojun Jin, the youngest heir of Soonyang's influential CEO. Armed with a second shot at redemption, Hyeonwoo sets out on a calculated path to seek vengeance against his treacherous kin.

basic_info.title: Snow Drop
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: What is Fate...?, What is Fate?

content.synopsis:
In the heart of So-Na lies a hidden pain, buried deep in the shadows of her memory. Her solace is found in the sanctuary of her mother's cherished nursery, "Snow Drop." Enter Hae-Gi, a strikingly aloof and captivating model, whose path intertwines fatefully with So-Na's. Their connection sparks a love that transcends barriers, yet a sinister truth looms, threatening to unravel their bond. Echoing the essence of a modern-day Romeo and Juliet, "Snowdrop" unfurls a tale of star-crossed passion and the enduring power of love.

One-shot included in Volume 5: "What is Fate...?"

basic_info.title: M.A.X.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Money Ace X, MAX

content.synopsis: Namu attends a school where the 'non-elites' idolize the elite students, ranging from models to computer geniuses, who earn significant money independently. With the school gates constantly swarmed by adoring fans of these elites, Namu struggles to reach class punctually. But when a new transfer student lends a hand one morning, Namu's status takes an unexpected turn towards the elite category.

basic_info.title: The Adventures of a Demon King's Daughter
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Was Born as the Demon Lord's Daughter, Mawang-ui Ttallo Taeeonatseumnida

content.synopsis: Life proves to be quite the adventure for a child with divine and infernal origins! Jo Ara seizes a fresh opportunity at life, bidding farewell to her troubled past in exchange for a realm brimming with enchantment and sorcery. Reincarnated as Irene Neros Parjunel, the cherished infant of the southern demon monarch, she embarks on a quest to carve out her destiny. Guided by the underworld deity and her departed mother's spirit, Irene navigates a world teeming with possibilities. Factor in a witty angelic fairy godmother and a resolute demon godfather, and the stage is set for delightful mayhem and mischief! Can Irene aid her father in combating the looming perils? Amid forging lasting bonds, will she finally unlock the secrets of true love?

basic_info.title: Fairytale of Winter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 冬日童话

content.synopsis: In a frost-kissed realm, a mesmerizing tale unfolds about a snow princess forged by the hands of mortals.

basic_info.title: Little Witch's Diary
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 小巫女的童話日記

content.synopsis: In a surprising turn of events, the unsuccessful youth pill transforms the charming Pozsi, a witch residing in FairyLand, into a young girl. Despite her enchanting relationship with the handsome and gentle Prince Yvrin, a dilemma arises as he encounters the youthful version of his beloved Pozsi. The storyline intertwines classic fairy tales with a fresh twist, offering a unique viewpoint from the eyes of a witch. The pressing question remains – is there a remedy for this unexpected predicament?

basic_info.title: Zi Bu Yu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Daremo Shiranai: Tsupuuyuu, No One Knows: What Confucius Did Not Speak Of

content.synopsis: Nine-year-old Mou Yuu finds herself whisked away from the bustling city to a serene rural village, owing to her parents' profession as restorers of historic buildings and artworks. Surrounded by untouched nature, Yuu embarks on a journey of friendship and discovery with the villagers. As she immerses herself in the natural world, Yuu stumbles upon enigmatic supernatural occurrences and unexplainable mysteries, shaping her understanding of the world and its people in profound ways.

basic_info.title: Lian Ai Make♥Up!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lian Ai Makeup!

content.synopsis: Xiao Mei, an ordinary high school student with a passion for reading and drawing manga, receives a confidence boost from Xiao Zhu after a failed love confession. Little did she know that a simple makeover would lead to her transformation into the enigmatic "MYSTERY BEAUTY" of the school, thanks to the photography club president's feature in the renowned school magazine 'CLOVER'. As Xiao Mei navigates newfound attention, her journey unfolds with captivating allure. Additionally, delve into the intriguing world of '4x4 Prince's Diary' in this all-encompassing tale.

basic_info.title: Scarlet Cross
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cardinal Cross

content.synopsis: Is it destiny or a beautiful mistake unfolding at school? As tension grips the campus, an electrifying vampire dance is set to ignite passions...

basic_info.title: Aisha
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 艾莎

content.synopsis: In a grand old mansion, twins orphaned by tragedy find their vast inheritance snatched away by their wicked stepmother. As the stepmother's three sons form a complex bond with their stepsisters, a tale of love and betrayal unfolds. Enter a world where romance intertwines with vengeance in this captivating fairy tale.

basic_info.title: Douluo Dalu Waichuan: Shenjie Chuanshuo
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    Super Power
            
                Super Power
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Soul Land: Legend of The Gods' Realm

content.synopsis: In the Divine Realm, tensions escalate as the God of Destruction clashes with the Sea Asura God, sparking a looming war. Meanwhile, the Sea Asura God's pregnant wife hints at a deeper, impending crisis. Tang San foresees a threat surpassing the realm's internal turmoil. What peril awaits beyond the gods' strife?

basic_info.title: Wings
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: WINGS

content.synopsis: In this poetic oneshot, delve into a compelling tale of liberation featuring a diverse cast of characters. Experience the powerful journey of breaking free in a concise yet impactful narrative that will resonate with readers long after the final page.

basic_info.title: Lonesome Eden
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sand Dreams, Sha Meng

content.synopsis: In the heart of a splendid garden resides a doll named Zie, cherished above all by God. Yet, within the confines of the garden's walls, loneliness creeps in. Despite Zie's pleas for companionship, it is only when God grants this desire that the question arises - who will dare to step through the gates into this enchanted realm? Don't miss the accompanying tale, "Hymn to Light."

basic_info.title: Hua Qian
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Flower Ring

content.synopsis: In the heart of the palace resides a young woman named Yu Pan, confined by her mother to the inner chambers. Determined to impress as a potential mistress to the Prince, Yu Pan immerses herself in learning. Her exceptional skills and enthusiasm catch the emperor's eye, leading to an invitation to study alongside the Prince. Amidst this opportunity lies a question: Can she harbor feelings for someone she has never encountered...?

basic_info.title: Steel Rose
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gang Tie Mei Gui, Hoa Hong Thep

content.synopsis: Europe's most eligible bachelor, the charming and wealthy Louis, captures hearts with his billions in assets and undeniable allure. However, his affections unexpectedly turn towards the skilled Taekwondo Champion, Lee Le Ting. Determined to win her love, Louis embarks on a relentless pursuit to bridge the gap between them.

basic_info.title:
Feng Ni Tianxia
Phoenix Goes Against the World
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Phoenix Against the World

content.synopsis: Upon awakening, Huang Beiyue, the renowned assassin dubbed "Ultimate Weapon," is bewildered to discover herself transported through time into a new realm, inhabiting the body of a girl who is the legitimate daughter of the royal princess yet faces constant humiliation. Embracing this unexpected identity, Huang Beiyue emerges from the shadows of anonymity. Simultaneously, a enigmatic young man begins to show a growing fascination with her...

basic_info.title: Binghuo Mochu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Magic Chef of Ice and Fire

content.synopsis: Nian Bing, the gifted offspring of a fire mage and an ice mage, faces a tragic loss when his parents are slain by the Ice Lord. Inheriting their magic gems, Nian Bing finds himself pursued by the Ice Lord's minions. In a desperate moment of need, he surprises all by wielding both fire and ice magic simultaneously, defying the norms of his craft. Plunging off a cliff, he is rescued by a mysterious old man, whose culinary skills captivate Nian Bing's palate like never before. This culinary prodigy, once revered as a spirit chef, extends an unexpected offer to Nian Bing: to become his apprentice. As Nian Bing grapples with the desire for revenge and the dream of culinary greatness, he stands at a crossroads. Will he cook up a recipe for vengeance, or will he savor the opportunity to become the ultimate chef?

basic_info.title:
Qishi Huanxiang Ye
Knight Fantastic Night
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 骑士幻想夜

content.synopsis: In the realm of ordinary high school life, Lin's world is unexpectedly transformed when a video game leads her to the legendary realm of King Arthur. In this enchanting land, she encounters a cryptic wizard who reveals her quest: to seek out and unite the valiant Knights of the Round Table.

basic_info.title: Chicken Cutlet Princess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 雞排公主

content.synopsis: At Rembrandt High School, remarkable tales unfold involving a playboy with a trail of broken hearts, a girl devoted solely to chicken cutlets, a talented student composing poetry about fried cutlets, a hyperactive blond boy on a chicken cutlet delivery spree, the charismatic student council president Wei Luo Li, and the mysterious truth behind a scandalous school newspaper headline. Prepare to be captivated by the extraordinary happenings in this legendary school!

basic_info.title: Love Gashapon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Love Capsule Toy - Welcome, First Love, Love Capsule Toy - A Prince without the Glass Slipper

content.synopsis:
Embark on a journey through three interconnected tales centered around gashapon, where friendships intertwine and school ties bind.

• Love Gashapon

When Yuhan moves into her new home, she is drawn to a peculiar window that overlooks a mysterious neighbor's shadowy presence.

• Love Capsule Toy - Welcome, First Love

Meet YanZhu, a timid girl harboring a deep crush on her senpai. After a fateful encounter at Monmon's shop on the eve of Valentine's Day, she gathers the courage to reveal her feelings.

• Love Capsule Toy - A Prince without the Glass Slipper

Zhou ZiYu, a notorious playboy with a trail of ex-girlfriends, unexpectedly finds his match at a masquerade ball. Delve into this multi-part saga to uncover the twists and turns of his romantic journey.

basic_info.title:
Zaidu Yu Ni
Once More
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 再度与你

content.synopsis: Xun An believed she had lost her opportunity with Yang Muli from their school days. Fuelled by regret, she finds herself working as a PE teacher at their old high school. However, fate has a surprise in store as Yang Muli returns as the new math teacher. Xun An must confront her feelings swiftly in the halls of their alma mater.

basic_info.title:
Toutou Cang Bu Zhu
My Secret Crush
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hidden Love, Hidden Love Can't Be Concealed

content.synopsis: Sang Zhi harbors a clandestine infatuation for her brother's college companion, Duan Jiaxu. Despite her efforts to conceal her emotions, she learns that he has been aware all along. As she matures, will Sang Zhi achieve the happy ending she yearns for?

basic_info.title: Provence
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 普羅旺斯

content.synopsis:
Provence, a bustling cafe owned by siblings Hayes and Hayumi, is a hotspot for young girls smitten with Hayes. Yune, a talented high school student known for her children's book illustrations, finds herself captivated by Hayes. Can she gather the courage to express her feelings?

In a twist, the focus shifts to Hayumi and Alan. Alan harbors deep affection for Hayumi, yet faces repeated rejection. Will he ever succeed in capturing her heart?

basic_info.title: Tiger x Crane: Record of the Demon Master
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 虎X鹤 妖师录

content.synopsis: In the realm of Ghosts and demons, amidst the mystical demon arts and rare treasures, lies a fantastical world where the taming of demons and preservation of tradition reign supreme.

basic_info.title: Digimon Frontier
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Digimon Zero 4, Digimon 04, Dejimon Furontia

content.synopsis: In an ancient tale, ten legendary warriors once saved the Digiworld. Now, these spirits offer new power to the Digidestined! To combat evil and protect their realm, Takuya, Koji, Tommy, J.P., and Zoe must unite and seek their destined spirits. The path ahead leads to the uncharted Digimon Frontier, where their adventure and battle for salvation unfold. Let the journey commence!

basic_info.title: Guang zhi Zi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Child of Light, The Son of Light

content.synopsis: In a realm where few dare to tread the path of light magic, Zhang Gong boldly embarks on a journey to master its secrets. Through unwavering determination, he ascends to the exalted status of the Grand Mage, earning a place in legends. His mission: to bridge the longstanding divide between the eastern and western lands, uniting diverse races under one banner. In this noble quest, he is hailed as the revered Child of Light by all who dwell across the continent.

basic_info.title: Black Dog
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Xueheiquan

content.synopsis: Xiao Hei, a half dog demon half human, embarks on a quest for wealth as a hired exorcist. His path crosses with a zombie in a warehouse, leading to a fateful encounter with a girl who aids him in vanquishing the undead using her exorcism school knowledge. Intrigued, she encourages Xiao Hei to apply to the school. Eager to accelerate his fortune, he takes up the challenge despite the daunting admission process. As he strives for entry, he questions his relentless pursuit of riches.

basic_info.title: Painting Warriors
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 繪戰師

content.synopsis: During the early Song Dynasty (AD 960-1127), fierce clashes erupted at the western border of the Tangut Empire, a crucial hub of the Silk Road. The valiant fighters of Tangut clashed with an enigmatic religious army from the west over a fabled sacred artifact. Amidst the chaos of conflicts, intrigues, and religious strife, the renowned "untouchable war painter" Tao Hui captured only the unvarnished truth on his canvas, right at the heart of the battlefield.

basic_info.title: Ardour
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ruodra

content.synopsis: Ardour reigns as the hottest pop group of the moment, captivating fans everywhere. Lian, a typical student with a casual interest in MTV, finds herself in a peculiar situation. Her father, an employee at a broadcasting company, unknowingly becomes the gateway for her friends, ardent Ardour enthusiasts, to request autographs from the band. The catch? Lian is clueless about the appearance of the heartthrobs causing a frenzy among girls.

basic_info.title:
Tianmei de Yaohen
Sweet Bite Marks
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Sweet Bite

content.synopsis: In a realm where arrogance reigns, vampire prince Sebastian is captivated by the humble human commoner, Lily. Their love is a forbidden dance of predator and prey, unstoppable in its crimson passion. As Sebastian claims Lily as his own, their bond becomes an eternal possession.

basic_info.title: Magic Insulator
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mafa Jueyuanti, Mo Fa Jue Se Ti

content.synopsis:
Within the Kalan empire, a chilling prophecy looms, predicting the world's demise. The key to salvation lies with a young prince, destined to become the revered Archmage. However, a cruel twist of fate has plagued the sole prince of Kalan since birth with a curse, leaving his spellbinding powers uncontrollable.

As the prince matures, his mischievous nature leads him down an enchanting path of magic, often landing him in precarious situations. Now, embroiled in a realm teeming with dragons, elves, and ancient enchantments, he embarks on a perilous journey to break the shackles of his curse. Will destiny beckon him to greatness? Armed with no weapons, lacking mastery over spells, and accompanied by two bickering companions, can he navigate the treacherous road that lies ahead?

basic_info.title: Good Luck, Demon King!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Work Hard, Mage King!, Work Hard, Demon King!, Jiayou Da Mowang!

content.synopsis:
In a mesmerizing realm where magic reigns supreme, ancient myths and legends abound. Lately, one particular tale grips everyone's attention—the epic clash between the malevolent Demon King and the revered sages.

At the renowned Forest Academy of Magic, peculiar creatures are mysteriously appearing, stirring chaos. Amidst the upheaval stands a student known as "Salaman," casting a shadow over the unfolding events. These ominous occurrences hint at an impending revelation, foreshadowing a momentous turn of events in the near future.

basic_info.title: Peony Pavilion
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Waking from a Dream, Wandering in the Garden, You Yuan Jing Meng

content.synopsis: Experience vibrant retellings of renowned Chinese folk tales through a captivating series of full-color one-shot illustrations.

basic_info.title: Fated to Love You
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ming Zhong Zhu Ding Wo Ai Ni

content.synopsis: Chen Xin Yi, a truly unfashionable working-class girl, yearns to secure her handsome boyfriend's commitment. During a romantic voyage on a love cruise, fate takes a dizzying turn when a mix-up with medication lands her in Ji Cun Xi's room instead of her own. Cun Xi, the heir to his family's empire and devoted to his girlfriend Anna, had planned a proposal that never happened. A scheming island owner's drugged drink leads to a fateful night between Xin Yi and Cun Xi. When Xin Yi discovers she's expecting, Cun Xi's grandmother insists on a marriage. Can this unexpected union blossom into true love for the sake of their unborn child?

basic_info.title: Digimon Zero Two
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Digimon 02

content.synopsis: In the wake of Apocalymon's defeat, ominous forces stir once more in the DigiWorld. A formidable adversary known as the 'Digimon Emperor,' a human youth, emerges with a tyrannical agenda to subjugate all Digimon. As darkness looms, a fresh band of heroes must unite to safeguard harmony and combat this rising threat.

basic_info.title: Show Princess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Summer of Foam

content.synopsis:
Yi Summer and Loshii, both orphans, found solace in each other's company under the roof of their adoptive parents. Lingering shadows of their past cast a veil of caution over their bond. However, when a mishap befalls Yi Summer and her brother at a singing contest, Loshii comes to their rescue, thawing the frost between them. Meanwhile, Ozen, ardently in love with Yi Summer and the heir to their school's founding company, schemes to drive them apart by sending Loshii off to England.

Fast forward five years, Loshii has risen as a renowned superstar, adored by a legion of fans. Yi Summer, bereaved once more after losing her adoptive parents, emerges as a budding artist under a record label, reconnecting with Loshii. Ozen, grappling with amnesia from an accident, rediscovers Yi Summer. As the trio reunites, old feelings of love and animosity resurface, sparking a tumultuous web of emotions. Amidst their entangled relationships, the looming question remains: whom will Yi Summer ultimately choose?

basic_info.title:
Lan Chi
Blue Wing
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 蓝翅

content.synopsis: Ming Lan finds herself thrust into a new family when she is adopted by Nan Xi, who sees her as a stand-in for her deceased daughter. Ming Lan's new brothers, Ming Qing and Ming Jing, are unwelcoming. As she navigates this uneasy dynamic, Ming Lan's peaceful existence is shattered by deceitful gestures and playful tricks.

basic_info.title: Wedding
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hua Jia, Huajia Dierbu, Wedding Season 2

content.synopsis: When a fortune teller's whimsical prophecy curses Yang Mimi with dreadful suitors, she refuses to succumb to a life of misery. Determined to secure her own happiness, Mimi embarks on a quest to find a husband who doesn't make her recoil in horror. As the line of bizarre suitors grows longer, Mimi's resolve only strengthens. Will she defy fate and find true love on her own terms?

basic_info.title: Chronos Ruler
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jikan no Shihaisha

content.synopsis: In the heart of "Chronos Rulers," a tale unfolds around those brave souls who combat time-devouring demons that materialize when individuals yearn to rewind the clock. Witness the intense time-manipulation skirmishes as the Chronos Rulers clash with these formidable adversaries.

basic_info.title:
Yi Ren Zhi Xia
The Outcast
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Under One Person, Hitori no Shita, Weirdo

content.synopsis: In a world where outcasts walk among the ordinary, Zhang Chulan has concealed his true nature for 19 years. That is until the enigmatic Feng Baobao discovers him. From that moment on, they are thrust into a perilous adventure, pursued by zombies and ensnared by eccentric kidnappers. Bound together, they set out to unravel the secrets shrouding both their identities and the Zhang family.

basic_info.title: Digimon D-Cyber
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 數碼暴龍D-CYBER

content.synopsis:
In a distant past, a mighty Digimon known as the "Digi Core" was vanquished and sealed by the revered Holy Knights. Millennia later, a viral outbreak ravages the digital realm, sparing only those with the rare D-Antibody. Among the surviving Holy Knights are Omega of Power (Omnimon X), Duke of Courage (MedievalGallantmon/Gallantmon X), and Magna of Miracles (Magnamon X).

The saga unfolds as the ominous "God of Death" MetalPhantomon ensnares Hikaru, Kiyoshi, Masuken, and Teru into the digital domain. Initially stranded with his Dorimon Digimon, Hikaru must confront his controlled friends, Masuken and Teru, manipulated by MetalPhantomon.

In a crucial turn, MetalPhantomon purloins Hikaru's partner's "Dragon Spirit," now embodied in Dorumon. To thwart MetalPhantomon's bid to resurrect the Digi Core, Omega of Power reveals a path to salvation: securing a new Dragon Spirit from Duke of Courage. Thus, the trio embarks on a perilous journey to Duke's realm, encountering daunting trials set by Duke's loyal aide, MameTyramon.

Following arduous tests and a showdown with Duke, they succeed in acquiring a fresh Dragon Spirit for Dorumon. However, their victory is short-lived as MetalPhantomon unleashes the reborn Digi Core as Dexmon. Ultimately, Hikaru and allies rescue their comrade Kiyoshi, ensnared within Dexmon, before returning to the realm of reality.

basic_info.title: Infinity Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 无尽游戏

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, a laid-back high-school student finds himself thrust into a realm where he is dubbed the "Dungeon Master," wielding the power to shape reality itself. Among the wonders he can manifest is a downpour of currency. In this realm, he crosses paths with a troubled young girl whose past has been wiped clean. Together, they craft a fresh game universe to break free from the monotony of school. However, their idyllic creation takes a dark turn when a fatal glitch in the game's code emerges, threatening their very existence.

basic_info.title: Congqian Youzuo Lingjianshan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Spirit Blade Mountain, Once Upon a Time There Was a Spirit Sword Mountain

content.synopsis: Synopsis Rewrite: The Lingjian clan embarks on a quest to locate a child destined by a falling comet to herald disaster. To uncover potential disciples, they revive their rigorous entrance examination. Wang Lu, blessed with a rare soul that emerges once in a millennium, bravely steps forward to participate in the test, setting off on a journey that may lead him to extraordinary wisdom as a sage.

basic_info.title: Digimon Tamers
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Digimon Zero 3

content.synopsis:
When three devoted Digimon enthusiasts - Rika, Henry, and our protagonist Takato - are unexpectedly entrusted with bona fide Digimon companions, they realize that tending to a living being is a whole different challenge compared to managing pixels on a screen. As they embark on their journey as Digimon 'Tamers,' each harbors distinct views on how to fulfill this role. Rika advocates for combat, Henry advocates for peace, while Takato finds himself navigating a middle ground.

Becoming a Tamer transcends mere ideologies. It demands growth, adaptation, and unity for the greater good. However, the trio's diverging perspectives set the stage for a tumultuous path ahead, signaling that their trials have only just begun.

basic_info.title: Snow Love
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Xue Lian, Xue Nian

content.synopsis: On the fateful day known as "Nian," when demons roamed freely, a mysterious young man rescues an abandoned baby, christening her "Xue." Fifteen years pass, and Xue blossoms into a young woman. Suddenly, a stranger arrives, his gentle voice thawing even the iciest hearts, whispering, "I've finally found you after all this time."

basic_info.title: Real/Fake Princess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Real Fake Princess

content.synopsis:
In the midst of the turbulent Sung Dynasty in ancient China, chaos reigns as the Jin Kang Rebellion threatens the land. With a heavy heart, Concubine Liu entrusts her infant daughter, Princess Yi Fu, to the care of a commoner named Tang Hui, fleeing to the south. Princess Yi Fu's fate becomes shrouded in mystery as she disappears from sight.

A decade later, the Tang dynasty is back in power, calling upon exiled family members to return. However, Princess Zi Li, content with her life, hesitates. She faces a dilemma - choosing between her love for a peasant, forbidden by societal norms, and an attraction to Zhong Lu, a renowned palace warrior tasked with locating and reinstating the lost princess to the throne. As tensions rise, a forbidden courtship and a quest for power intertwine in a tale of love, duty, and destiny.

basic_info.title: Jiang Ye
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ever Night

content.synopsis: In the grand era of the Tang Dynasty, a brave young soldier named Ning Que embarks on a mission to escort a carriage from Weicheng to Chang An. With courage in his heart, he bids farewell to his homeland and sets off on a journey that will test his mettle.

basic_info.title:
Qi Shi Gong Zhu
Knight Princess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cavalier Princess

content.synopsis: Yashi spent fourteen years wandering alongside her father until a shocking revelation: her long-lost mother is the reigning queen of Bocinia. Desperate to reunite with her, they venture into the palace, where an unexpected encounter with the Princess of Bocinia leads to an accidental role as the royal's bodyguard.

basic_info.title: Scarlet Palace
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 緋色王城

content.synopsis:
In the strife-ridden lands of Ancient China, amidst the power struggles of warring kingdoms, a captivating tale unfolds within the seraglio of King Xun, the ruler of Ding. Ninghu's family seeks to elevate her to the position of Queen, aiming to win the favor of the enigmatic and formidable King Xun. However, the king shows little interest in his concubines.

Determined not to be overlooked, Ninghu takes on a bold disguise, masquerading as a eunuch to serve her brother Yuanren, the kingdom's esteemed advisor. Upon entering the Scarlet Palace, she catches the attention of Lingyu, the esteemed eunuch, who suspects her true identity and embarks on a probing investigation.

Intrigue deepens with the sudden demise of Lingyu's original attendant, prompting Ninghu to offer herself as Lingyu's personal servant in a bid to approach King Xun. Yet, as their paths intertwine, and feelings stir between them, the lines between loyalty and desire blur. Could their connection blossom into something more profound amidst the palace's intricate web of secrets and ambitions?

basic_info.title:
Tang Yin Zai Yi Jie
Don's Adventure in Another World
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 唐寅在异界

content.synopsis: In a world where power lies dormant within him, Tang Yin remains a skilled assassin, unable to harness his unique abilities in the realm of the living. Yet, when fate transports him to a brutal land where survival hinges on combat prowess, his dormant strength awakens. Embracing the chaos of battle, Tang Yin's true potential is unleashed.

basic_info.title: The Other Side of the Mirror
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 99 Roses, Peggy, The Funeral Procession of Stars

content.synopsis: In the gritty streets of New York City, Southern belle-turned-prostitute Sunny crosses paths with Lou, a college-educated bar champion. Their chance encounter ignites a fiery romance, leading them on a quest for purpose in a world that seems to have abandoned them. Volume 1 follows their journey through 99 Roses, while Volume 2 delves into Peggy and The Funeral Procession of Stars, unraveling their intertwined fates and deepening their bond.

basic_info.title: Bowling King
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gun Qiu Wang, BK

content.synopsis:
In the lively world of Bowling King, we follow the adventures of Shautieh Ley, a spirited youngster known for causing both laughter and embarrassment in the bowling alleys of Taiwan.

Shautieh's heart belongs to Tz'zuhn, whose family is deeply entwined with the local bowling scene. When Shautieh learns of Tz'zuhn's family's hefty $3M debt and her relationship with an American pro bowler, he decides to take matters into his own hands – or rather, his bowling ball. Despite his powerful left arm, Shautieh's knowledge of the game is as shaky as a bowling pin on the verge of a strike. Will his passion be enough to save the day, or will he end up in the gutter?

basic_info.title: Shen Yin Wangzuo
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Shenyin Wangzuo, Sealed Divine Throne, Throne of Seal

content.synopsis: As demons threaten humanity with extinction, six temples emerge as the last refuge. A courageous young boy enlists as a knight in one of these sanctuaries to rescue his mother. Amidst a realm filled with wonders and dangers, he must navigate the realm of temples and demons. Can he rise to become the mightiest knight and claim the throne?

basic_info.title:
Magmel of the Sea Blue
Ultramarine Magmell
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gunjou no Magmel, Killer Domino, Koroshiya Domino, Gunjou no Magmell

content.synopsis:
In the heart of the Pacific Ocean, a miraculous event unfolds - a brand-new continent emerges, unveiling a realm teeming with enigmatic flora, fauna, and minerals.

The resurgence of the age of exploration ignites a spark of exhilaration within humanity.

Don't miss the thrilling one-shot in Volume 3: "Killer Domino."

basic_info.title: Tou Tiao Dou Shi Ta
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: He Is Always The Hot Topic, He Owns The Headlines, The Headlines Are All About Him

content.synopsis: Join the whirlwind adventures of Yin Shen, a member of the renowned idol boy group FLY, in Tou Tiao Dou Shi Ta. Dive into the frenzy surrounding this "retarded" idol - why is he the talk of the town? Is his bad boy reputation deserved? Brace yourself for a rollercoaster of laughter as Yin Shen navigates his way through comical mishaps that never fail to hit the headlines. But as the spotlight shifts, be ready to delve into the emotional depths of friendship, struggles, and the harsh realities of the entertainment industry that lie beneath the glitz and glamour.

basic_info.title: Prince of the Night
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Midnight Prince

content.synopsis: Dive into the newest chapter of the Taiwanese manhuaga, Ryan! Follow Liang You Xin, a gentle and naive soul, as she embarks on a study journey in Tyrol, Europe. A chance encounter with a stray pig leads her to a mystical portal in the Palace Museum, transporting her to a parallel dimension. In this enigmatic realm, she encounters a secretive young man clad in black who escorts her to an abandoned Royal Palace. Little does she know, her destiny intertwines with Tyrol's 17th Century Royal Highness, plunging her into a life of servitude and intrigue.

basic_info.title: Claire de Lune
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 月光

content.synopsis: In the bustling city of New York, a young woman finds herself drawn to a gifted pianist named Adam who harbors a desire to walk away from his musical prowess. However, their budding romance faces an uncertain future as his passion for the piano wanes.

basic_info.title: Shanliang de Adai
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Shanliang de Shisen, Good Reaper, The Kind Death God

content.synopsis: Ah Dai, a pure-hearted soul raised in the world of thievery, has his fate altered when the formidable alchemist Gliss chooses him to craft a divine instrument. His path crosses with the renowned assassin "King of Hell," whose life he saves, setting off a chain of events that sees Ah Dai whisked away for rigorous training. As Ah Dai embarks on this unexpected journey, the question remains: what lies ahead for him?

basic_info.title: My Prince-sama
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yuan Wei Cu Ji

content.synopsis:
Synopsis:
Tsubomi's yearning to uncover the mystery behind her mother's departure from the sprite realm to the human world has always lingered within her. However, a sudden mishap leads Tsubomi to become marooned in the human world. Now faced with the opportunity to unearth the truth about her mother's decision and find her way back, will Tsubomi succeed in her quest to reunite with her roots?

Included one-shot:

Volume 3: Yuan Wei Cu Ji

basic_info.title: Qi Dan Qu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Qi Dan Melody

content.synopsis: Men Ji Yu from the Tian Tai Tribe receives a special invitation from Ba Cha Ke Han to reside with the Qi Dan tribe. However, a language barrier hinders mutual understanding between Men Ji and the people of Qi Dan. The Qi Dan Princess, Ke Yi Gu Chai, captures Men Ji's heart with a rare smile. To bridge the cultural gap, Ke Yi pledges to instruct Men Ji in the art of the Qi Dan dance, hoping to integrate him into their way of life.

basic_info.title: Candy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Star Fruit Candy, The Donut in the Candy Jar, Xingxing Shuiguo Tang

content.synopsis: In the realm of "In The Water," a 17-year-old girl named YingYangChan finds herself facing a sudden twist in her teenage tale. With her parents unexpectedly jetting off on a global adventure, they gift her a cool million before setting sail. Join our spirited protagonist as she navigates the comical ups and downs of coming of age in this delightful manga adventure.

basic_info.title: The Legend of Genghis
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 鬼王天弓传

content.synopsis: In a realm where darkness looms, a princess seeks the aid of a legendary hero to vanquish the newly arisen demon king. Thus unfolds the epic tale of courage and destiny...!

basic_info.title:
Wan Zha Chao Huang
Cheating Men Must Die
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Phoenix Rising Above Evil

content.synopsis: In a thrilling tale of retribution, the heroine Su Luxia and her steadfast companion journey through countless small worlds, confronting and subduing a myriad of villains. The joy of tormenting the wicked knows no bounds as they mete out justice in their own unique way.

basic_info.title: Loulan Yi Meng
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lou Lan Yi Meng, Dream of Loulan Kingdom

content.synopsis: In the ancient Han Dynasty of China, a small county named Lou Lan gifted their prince and princess to the Han empire as a gesture of goodwill. However, tensions arose when one of Han's peacemakers was tragically slain by individuals from Lou Lan. In a fit of rage, the Han emperor sought retribution by sentencing the prince and princess to death. To save them, their loyal childhood friend and the royal protector of the empire, provided them with his gate pass, allowing them to escape. Thus, the prince and princess embarked on a perilous journey back to Lou Lan, facing unknown challenges and dangers along the way.

basic_info.title: The Pearl Grudge
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Pearl Sorrow, Zhenzhu Yuan

content.synopsis:
In the heart of Ancient China, Luuzhu, a radiant pearl gatherer from a humble village in the South, finds herself tangled in a web of fate. Sold by her impoverished parents to the cruel Lord Hong, she faces a bleak future as his mistress. Yet, a twist of destiny alters her path when she captures the attention of the wealthy and kind-hearted nobleman, Jilun, on a moonlit beach. Enchanted by her elegance, Jilun offers a lavish sum to free her from Lord Hong's grasp, revealing himself as one of the wealthiest men in the land.

As Luuzhu navigates the tumultuous waters of her newfound fortune, her beauty draws the covetous gaze of Lord Sima Lun, a power-hungry usurper hungry for her legendary allure. Sparks fly as Sima Lun sets his sights on claiming Luuzhu, even if it means igniting a war with Jilun. Will Luuzhu succumb to the whims of the privileged elite, or will she defy her predetermined destiny? Amidst the turmoil, the question lingers: will her celestial beauty be a blessing or a curse, bringing peril to herself and those she holds dear?

basic_info.title:
The Art of War - Sun Tzu
Sue Zi's Tactics
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Art of War, The Art of War Sun Tzu, L'Art de la Guerre, Sun Zi's Tactics, Sun Zi Gong Lue

content.synopsis: Amidst the tumult of the Eastern Zhou Dynasty's decline, Wu Zixu and Sun Zi embark on a journey from Chu to Wu following a tragic loss. Pledging loyalty to King Helü of Wu, they immerse themselves in the fierce battlegrounds. The narrative unravels the tale of Sun Zi's mastery of warfare, honed through the intense two-year clash between Wu and Chu.

basic_info.title: Claws of Darkness
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Journal of Vampire Hunter D,Journal of the Vampire Hunter

content.synopsis: In the violence-prone border town of Santa Anna, Mexico, a local gang member meets a grisly end on the town's fringes, escalating tensions. Suspicion grips the community as a mysterious stranger appears soon after, prompting questions about his identity and motives.

basic_info.title: Prince Bubble
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 泡沫王子

content.synopsis: Wi-Lan, a girl from a humble fisherman family, dreams of attending the prestigious private high school. Her joy at receiving an acceptance letter quickly turns to anguish as she becomes the target of ridicule for her impoverished background. Amidst the taunts and pranks, a new student, San-Yue, arrives at the school and captures the attention of Wi-Lan and her peers. When Wi-Lan musters the courage to confess her feelings to him, he unexpectedly flees without a word. Little does she know, San-Yue and his family harbor a mysterious and troubling secret that may alter their lives forever.

basic_info.title: Tao Tie Jie
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tantalizing Festival

content.synopsis: In a quaint village, the demon siblings Tao Tie and Kui Long make their ominous presence known as they await the ritual sacrifice that occurs every decade. Disguised as Wu Chen, Kui Long crosses paths with a girl named Tan Hua, who unbeknownst to him, had been saved from death by her brother, the village doctor. Now revived, Tan Hua is destined to be the sacrificial offering, all while the true identities and intentions of those involved remain veiled in secrecy.

basic_info.title: Alice's Dream Files
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Alice Dream Files

content.synopsis: Alice, a skilled dream decipher, becomes intrigued by the class president's sudden increase in classroom naps. With her trusty rabbit companion by her side, she delves into his dreams, determined to uncover the reason behind his unusual behavior.

basic_info.title: Melody Drifting in the Rain
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Historical
            
                Historical,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Playing the Flute, Sailing in the Night Rain

content.synopsis: Following the Emperor's demise, the nation of Li descends into chaos as civil war erupts. To rescue his sibling's troops from certain downfall, Xueya, the 7th prince of Li, strikes a strategic union with the spirited pirate princess Jin Bi Hui. Can her reinforcements arrive swiftly enough to alter the course of battle? Will their political alliance endure the turmoil? And what will Bi Hui do upon discovering Xueya's affections lie elsewhere?

basic_info.title: Gong Ben Wu Cang De Mo Shi Chuan Ren
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Historical
            
                Historical,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Kensei's Calligraphy: The Last Successor of Miyamoto Musashi

content.synopsis: Discover the gripping tale of Miyamoto Musashi's Last Successor, where the challenge lies in halting an assassin who finds joy in the art of murder. How can this deadly adversary be thwarted?

basic_info.title: Gapz Garden
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kinoe Garden

content.synopsis: In a household where she's belittled and scorned, a young girl crosses paths with the new Mrs. Yee, altering her fate. Welcomed into the affluent Yee family, she joins three boys her age. Yet, what lies beneath this newfound privilege? Despite the miracle, she resolves to depart the opulent life at 18. Witness her resilience through over a decade of survival.

basic_info.title: Incandescent Moon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Burning Moon

content.synopsis: In the imperial court, Duan Cheng Feng's aunt, a concubine of the emperor, faces a dilemma when she births a daughter instead of the desired son. Determined to secure her position, she schemes to swap the girl for her nephew. As tensions rise, Cheng Feng's parents resort to a ruse to thwart her ambitions. However, ambition knows no bounds, even in the face of familial deceit.

basic_info.title: Savior
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Savior (Jiushizhu), Saviour

content.synopsis: In the vast expanse of countless worlds bound by the rule of non-interference, resides a Savior armed with a guitar and a solemn mission: to rescue each world from its impending crises. Despite his repeated successes, the weight of his duty leaves him increasingly somber. However, when a shooting star descends upon the city, spreading a mysterious illness that transforms its inhabitants into zombies, a new and daunting challenge emerges before him.

basic_info.title: Close to My Sweetheart
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 甜心零距離

content.synopsis: At the intersection of two different worlds lies a tale of unexpected beginnings. Qu You Lin, a revered national Judo champion, and Yan Ya Qiao, a prodigious talent in traditional Chinese music, find their paths intertwined as they are thrust into each other's schools. You Lin grapples with a struggling Judo club, lackluster teammates, and a coach on the run at the boys' school. Meanwhile, Ya Qiao navigates life as the enigmatic "Little Prince Xiao Qiao" in the girls' school, where she is surrounded by admirers. Despite yearning to return to familiar grounds, they discover new horizons brimming with unforeseen possibilities.

basic_info.title: Spirit of the Ocean
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: El Espiritu del Mar, Ocean Spirit

content.synopsis: In an intriguing manga set against the backdrop of Ming Dynasty China, follow the spirited teenage girl Ning Hai, daughter of a notorious pirate leader. When she leads a daring raid on a Spanish ship, she crosses paths with the English traveler Michael, sparking a risky exchange of treasure for secrets. But trouble brews when Hai's friend is captured by the relentless police inspector Shao ZhiSiün. Determined to rescue her friend, Hai finds herself entangled in a web of deception and alliances, with Michael aiding her in concealing her true identity. As her father's attempts to buy her freedom fail, Hai must rely on her wits to navigate the treacherous waters of loyalty and survival.

basic_info.title:
Jianle Dongxi De Lang
The Wolf Who Picked Up
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Wolf That Picked Something Up, Papa Wolf and the Puppy, King of Wolves

content.synopsis: In the heart of the forest, Wolf's solitary existence is forever changed when he stumbles upon a curious little cub. This chance encounter sets the stage for a poignant tale of friendship and survival in the wilderness. Join Wolf as he navigates the challenges of his daily life, where every choice carries the weight of consequence.

basic_info.title:
Lian Shi Yingcaose
Love Like Cherry Blossoms
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sakura's Love, Love Is Cherry Pink

content.synopsis: In the halls of Westwood High, where secrets whisper and reputations reign, a clandestine pact is forged between the enigmatic heartthrob, Ethan, and the brilliant disruptor, Emma. Bound by mutual knowledge of each other's hidden truths, they navigate a delicate balance of anonymity. However, when Ethan unexpectedly extends a hand to assist Emma in revealing her feelings to her crush, uncertainties loom. Is his gesture genuine, or is it a mere ruse to unravel her world further? As whispers spread and feelings entwine, the line between truth and facade blurs, leaving both to ponder the complexities of their intertwined fates.

basic_info.title: Wolf & Mary
basic_info.genre:
Authors:
    Deng, Zhi Hui (Art), Zheng, Jian He (Story)
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 野狼与玛莉

content.synopsis: Synopsis Rewrite: A regular doujin artist leading a mundane existence is abruptly jolted from his routine when he awakens one morning beside a lifeless, bloodied body.

basic_info.title: Butterfly Read Book
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Proud Prince and the Showgirl, Butterfly Loves to Read, Dragon Teases Phoenix Miraculous Love Fate

content.synopsis: In the enchanting world of Butterfly Read Book, a captivating tale unfolds as Dragon playfully teases Phoenix, setting the stage for a miraculous love destined by fate.

basic_info.title:
Zuihou de Zhaohuan Shi
The Last Summoner
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 最后的召唤师

content.synopsis: In a world where the extraordinary shine, individuals who possess the rare ability to call forth the spirits of all things are known as summoners. Across the ages, tales of these mystical beings have been woven into the fabric of history, evoking images of summoning the very earth, skeletons, souls, and stars themselves. Yet, as time marches on, the once-revered legends of summoners fade from memory, slipping into obscurity. Now, in a dawn of a new era, a formidable summoner emerges from slumber, heralding the resurgence of their formidable powers.

basic_info.title:
Liang Bu Yi
No Doubt In Us
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 两不疑

content.synopsis: When His Majesty, a strikingly handsome figure, is accidentally pushed into a water pool by the flustered queen, their bodies inexplicably swap. Now facing the challenge of reversing this mysterious swap, the furious emperor must navigate the unfamiliar world of his own imperial concubines. Meanwhile, the queen finds herself caught in the midst of high-ranking political affairs. As they struggle to find a way back to their own bodies, chaos ensues in the royal court.

basic_info.title: Agreement of the Glass Shoes
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bo Li Xie Zhi Yue

content.synopsis: In her youth, Raine encountered a charming prince before being abruptly separated. Their only connection: a lost glass slipper pendant. Years later, fate reunites them in a captivating tale spanning two volumes and three parts: (1) Agreement of the Glass Shoe, (2) Dolls Music Staff, and (3) White Night Fantasia. Bound by a pair of marbles adorned with glass shoes, their intertwined destinies unfold once more.

basic_info.title: Xu Ge Yuan Ba! Da Xi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Make a Wish! Daxi

content.synopsis: In the bustling city, the infamous troublemaker Gao Da Xi crosses paths with the only person unafraid to stand up to him, Teacher Dai. When Teacher Dai must tend to his ailing daughter, he reluctantly brings Da Xi along, leading to a fateful encounter with Tian Le. As fate weaves its threads, Da Xi befriends a mysterious boy known as "Angel" at the hospital. Angel offers Da Xi a tantalizing deal: one wish in exchange for a single condition. What desire will Da Xi choose to fulfill? Delve into the poignant tale spun by Ke Li in "Lovely Everywhere," where love blossoms against all odds.

basic_info.title: F.O.X
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: FOX, Little Witch Love Trainee

content.synopsis:
In a twist of fate, Tiem Sum stumbles upon a charming silver fox transforming into a young man. Startled yet intrigued, she finds herself faced with an unexpected proposal: marriage. The man explains that she must wed him as she witnessed his transformation. Moreover, he is on a quest to find his missing brother, all the while attempting to win over Sum's heart.

Volume 5: Little Witch Love Trainee

basic_info.title:
Muyu He Benxiaozhu
Muyu and Stupid Pig
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 木鱼和笨小猪

content.synopsis: In a small town named Taoyuan, a spirited girl named Taobei discovers hurtful words scrawled in her book, branding her as a pig. Enraged by this cruel act, Taobei finds herself at odds with her childhood friend, Muyu. As their friendship is tested by misunderstandings and secrets, Taobei's endearing but clumsy nature leads to humorous situations. Explore the heartfelt journey of Taobei and Muyu in this tale of friendship and self-discovery.

basic_info.title: Bu Sha
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kill No More

content.synopsis: In a realm where chaos reigns, Liola, an assassin bound by an oath of nonviolence, flees from a relentless assassination guild. A twist of fate plunges him into a parallel universe. Determined to uphold his pledge, Liola endeavors to lead an ordinary life. Yet, as unforeseen events unfold, he discovers that navigating the mundane challenges of everyday existence may prove more daunting than his lethal past.

Delve into a collection of intriguing short tales penned by the emerging Chinese Manhua artist, Benjamin. Witness the striking contrast as two stories unfold in stark black and white, showcasing Benjamin's artistic versatility. Meanwhile, immerse yourself in two other vivid narratives that exemplify Benjamin's innate talent for vibrant, colored illustrations. Explore a world where artistry meets storytelling in a captivating blend of monochrome and technicolor.

basic_info.title: Yise Beimian Zhange
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yami no Naka no Crown, 闇の中のクラウン, The Crown Amidst Darkness

content.synopsis: In a world where everyone possesses the innate ability to gather "Life's Light" and harness it within a unique "Light Vessel," the norm is to use this power for everyday tasks. However, when the protagonist, Ruyu, witnesses the aftermath of a fierce clash, she rescues the lone survivor—a mysterious young boy. As she delves deeper, suspicions arise about the boy's potential ties to the king's ruthless soldiers, who recently infiltrated the town with deadly intentions. The unfolding mystery intertwines their fates in unexpected ways, raising questions of loyalty and destiny.

basic_info.title:
Xuhuan Bifang
Vision of the Other Side
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Visionary the Other Side

content.synopsis:
In a realm steeped in chivalry and where heroes are revered, the spirited young princess Nan-Fan of Tang embarks on a remarkable quest. As she faces an impending marriage to the fearsome "Battle Demon" from the rival Li Kingdom, Nan-Fan flees the confines of the imperial palace in pursuit of her true calling.

Venturing beyond her sheltered life, she encounters the struggles and triumphs of ordinary folk, discovering the essence of resilience and fortitude. Determined and unyielding, Princess Nan-Fan strides forward into the unknown, poised to redefine the course of her own legendary destiny.

basic_info.title: Yuexia Meiren
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Beauty Under the Moon

content.synopsis: During the golden era of Beijing Operas, male actors transformed into captivating female roles with their exquisite voices, graceful postures, and, above all, their mesmerizing beauty.

basic_info.title: Vampire Master
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kyuuketsuki Tatsujin

content.synopsis: Yan Zi Ying, a passionate part-time hunter driven by justice, is dedicated to preserving harmony between humans and devils. When the hunter headquarters warns her grandfather of an imminent seal break, Zi Ying and her quirky companion, the chubby parrot Xiu Shou, embark on a daring mission to the vampire Yu Wen Hao's lair. Their goal: to secure a sacred book by any means necessary. However, they are taken by surprise when Yu Wen Hao willingly hands over the precious artifact.

basic_info.title: Remember
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 记得

content.synopsis: In a world where love and hate blur, where broken hearts seek healing, and inhibitions are challenged at a cost, international graphic novel artist Benjamin weaves poignant tales of love and loss. Through his vivid brushstrokes, he captures the essence of risking it all for life's unpredictable journey.

basic_info.title: Xun Zhao Qian Shi Zhi Lu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Journey To The Past, Journey to Seek Past Reincarnations

content.synopsis: Follow the journey of the determined Gong Yao Ying, a young Master on a mission that transcends time itself. As she navigates through various eras, she encounters legendary historical figures who shape her path and inspire captivating tales.

basic_info.title: Eternal Moment
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jiang Ai Qing Jin Xing Dao Di, Cherish Our Love Forever, Love in Kilimanjaro

content.synopsis:
Experience five unique love stories in the Valentine's Day 2011 special releases from Summerzoo Studio.

1. "Eternal Moment" (by Xia Da)

Annie's checklist includes a "bird and roses tiara," lace, fasteners, a brooch, and breaking up with Lin Xian. As Annie struggles to convey her emotions to her busy film director boyfriend, Lin, the question remains: Will their paths cross again one day?

2. "Love in Kilimanjaro" (by Zhu Le Tao)

3. "Oneshot" (by Yao Fei La)

4. "Oneshot" (by Yu Yan Shu)

5. "Oneshot" (by Jiang Xiao Chen)

basic_info.title: Shadow of Visions
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: You Meng Ying, You Mong Ying

content.synopsis:
In the heart of The Song Dynasty, Shan Yu Mu, a gifted artist with the power to depict the future, faces exile from his village for his unconventional abilities. Plagued by premonitions of impending calamities, he embarks on a journey and crosses paths with the lively and pure-hearted Chuei Ying Shuang. United by a chilling prophecy, these unlikely companions venture into an unknown destiny filled with both promise and peril. Their fates intertwined, they embrace the uncertainty ahead, bound by a shared journey through uncharted territories.

Within Volume 5 lies a trove of 2 captivating side-story chapters, adding depth to their unfolding saga.

basic_info.title: Baby.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BABY.

content.synopsis: On December 1, 2043 AD, Earth faces a dire threat as a mysterious entity known as "Baby" infiltrates the planet, seizing control of unsuspecting human hosts and transforming them into monstrous beings called "Organos." These creatures embark on a relentless rampage, plunging humanity into chaos and bloodshed, earning this fateful day the grim moniker of "Extinction Day." Amidst the chaos, our protagonist Elettra discovers that her hand has fallen victim to Baby's infection, setting her on a perilous journey to uncover the enigma shrouding this malevolent force. With her hand throbbing with ominous power, Elettra must navigate the ravaged world, seeking allies and answers to combat the looming threat that threatens to annihilate what remains of civilization.

basic_info.title:
Bu Keai de TA
She May Not Be Cute
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Lovely Girl, My Sweet Girl

content.synopsis: When Ariana's fiancé betrays her on her wedding day, her heart turns cold towards love. Rising to success through hard work, she keeps herself busy to numb the pain. However, when her childhood friend returns, he disrupts her peaceful life and even invades her home. While Ariana never saw him in a romantic light, he has always seen only her. Will he be able to thaw her icy heart and ignite a new love between them? Get ready for a heartwarming tale of romance!

basic_info.title: China Girls
basic_info.genre: Score: 6.521 (scored by 214214 users)1 indicates a weighted score.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Type: Manhua

content.synopsis: Discover a vibrant anthology featuring 12 captivating short stories crafted by a talented group of 12 young female manhua artists.

basic_info.title: Bloodline
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 血族

content.synopsis: In the ancient halls of their dwindling vampire family, Last and Loli stand as the remaining pillars of their lineage. Aiming to expand their fold, with loyal servant Selly by their side, discord arises as Loli's chosen successor clashes with Last's vision. As tensions mount, Loli ventures into forbidden territory, seeking immortality through a dark ritual involving cryptic inscriptions and perilous pacts.

basic_info.title:
Tie Jiang Zong Heng
The Lawless
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 鐵將縱橫

content.synopsis: In the Later Zhou dynasty, during the years 900-960 AD, Chi Wu finds himself imprisoned after a strategic defeat against the emperor. Unbeknownst to his captors, Chi Wu's true aim is not defeat but to uncover a vital clue hidden within the prison walls - a hint leading to the fabled Qi Lin Treasure, the most sought-after riches in the world. News of Chi Wu's capture reaches Tie Zong Heng, also known as Lawless, a seasoned veteran and former imperial officer. Driven by the whispers of Chi Wu's hidden agenda, Lawless makes the bold decision to rejoin the imperial ranks, determined to track down his elusive target at any cost.

basic_info.title: Xing Gui Shi Tian Kong De Dao Lu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Star Trail is the Sky's Road

content.synopsis: In the realm of Ashbourne, Kaphisilia Ailide, the daughter of the noble Duke, carries the weight of her family's expectations since her elder brother vanished. Her days are filled with rigorous sword fighting and etiquette lessons. In preparation for her father's upcoming birthday, she ventures into the wooded expanse of their ancestral lands to secure a gift. However, her peaceful task is shattered when a deadly wolf attacks her. Just as all seems lost, a mysterious figure emerges from the shadows...

basic_info.title:
Bu Tian Ge
Song of the Sky Pacers
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Song of The Sky Walkers

content.synopsis: In the Chen dynasty, Consort Jing welcomed fraternal twins into the world under the radiant sunlight. The prince arrived bearing a distinctive cinnabar mole between his brows, while the princess boasted six fingers. Their birth heralded a mix of blessings and curses, steering the twins towards divergent paths as they were torn from their kin. As an impending heavenly trial looms, can these separated siblings defy fate and find each other once more? What extraordinary measures will they employ to challenge the hands of destiny?

basic_info.title: Taste of Illness
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Byeong-ui Mat, Flavor's Bottle

content.synopsis: Yijun's isolated world takes a bizarre turn when a strange black sludge engulfs them during class. While grappling with this eerie phenomenon, Yijun forms an unlikely connection with fellow loner, Suni, through a school project. However, their budding friendship faces a unique challenge - Suni possesses the ability to manipulate the ominous black goo, which reacts negatively to anxiety. Can Yijun and Suni navigate their individual struggles with solitude and anxiety to nurture their newfound bond?

characteristics: Use of black goo as a visual element

basic_info.title: My Life as a Player
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Starting Today, I'm a Player,  Player From Today Onwards, Oneul-buteo Player

content.synopsis: In a world where ordinary folks transformed into livestock to serve as hunters' captives, I found myself under attack by Eden's Athena in pursuit of the coveted "Diary of the Demon King." With the guidance of my mentor, Sungkoo, I managed to journey back a century in time, only to encounter a startling revelation: "I, the Sky of Apocalypse, shall be your patron." As I grappled with this unexpected alliance, a new role awaited me - that of the player in a game fraught with peril and intrigue.

basic_info.title: Reborn as a Scholar
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Scholar's Reincarnation, Haksa Jaesaeng, Scholarly Reincarnation, Scholar Reincarnation

content.synopsis: Formerly known as a ruthless warrior, despised by many and dreaded by all, my reign of terror meets a cataclysmic end in a brutal confrontation with a monk. Now reborn as Junwoo Hwang, the firstborn of the esteemed Lord of Suzhou, my new father envisions me as a distinguished scholar. Yet, despite his aspirations, my passion for martial arts and thrill of perilous pursuits persist unyielding. Can I embrace my destiny as a formidable warrior, or will the pursuit of knowledge transform me from merciless to honorable?

basic_info.title: The Viridescent Tiara
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nokeum-ui Gwan, Crown of the Deep Green, The Viridescent Crown, Recording Hall

content.synopsis: Once an ordinary grad student, I found myself mysteriously transported into the fantastical realm of a novel I penned in my teenage years. However, peril looms large as the character I now embody was fated to meet a tragic end, and adversaries are closing in on me. Despite the dark shadow of the character's villainous past, I leverage my intimate understanding to navigate through the perils of the Azure Ring's flames, reconcile debts, and restore honor to the House of Latia. Can I win the hero's trust and carve a path to success in this unfamiliar world? Unraveling hidden truths poses a challenge even I may not be prepared for.

basic_info.title: Villainesses Have More Fun
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Another Happy Day for the Villainess, Angnyeo-neun Oneul-do Jeulgeopda

content.synopsis: Sojin's life has been far from smooth sailing, from a troubled upbringing to heartbreak from betrayal. But when she unexpectedly finds herself inhabiting the body of Reilynn Candmion, the wealthy duke's daughter and notorious villainess, all she desires is to enjoy her newfound luxury. However, her peaceful plans are thwarted as Iris, the heroine of the tale, engages in a series of conflicts with her, ranging from wardrobe theft to attempts to charm her betrothed. Despite Reilynn's efforts to avoid drama, Iris and her entourage of four potential suitors persist in disrupting her tranquility. Can't a girl just have some fun without all the interference?

basic_info.title: Pinocchio
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 피노키오

content.synopsis: In a spur-of-the-moment decision, high schooler Choi Ha Ram purchases a necklace, unaware of its supernatural power to reveal the ghost of Yu Ga On. Yu Ga On, plagued by amnesia about his demise, becomes visible to whoever dons the necklace. As questions swirl about his mysterious death and its link to the necklace, a new enigmatic neighbor enters Ha Ram's life, adding to the intrigue.

basic_info.title: Hwaja
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 화자

content.synopsis: In a decrepit house in a quaint city, a solitary girl resides. Regularly, men visit her bearing gifts. Meanwhile, in the same town, a boy aspires to become a hero. Their fateful encounter sets in motion a series of events that will impact them and all connected to Hwaja.

basic_info.title: Gourmet Gaming
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Gourmet
            
                Gourmet
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bamman Meokgo Level Up, Leveling Up, By Only Eating!

content.synopsis: Kang Minhyuk is trapped in a relentless cycle of uncontrollable eating due to a rare disorder. Despite desperate attempts to control his weight through diet and exercise, his health is deteriorating rapidly. In a final attempt to save him, his doctor suggests a radical solution - Athenae, a virtual reality game where indulging in unlimited feasts carries zero repercussions. From crispy fried chicken to delectable samgyetang, the food in Athenae is tantalizingly real, but the challenges to acquire it are anything but easy. To survive, Minhyuk must embark on a thrilling culinary odyssey in a world where taste is king and danger lurks in every bite.

basic_info.title: The Last Adventurer
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Choehu-ui Moheomga

content.synopsis: In the tumultuous Era of Adventure, Gates spawn, ushering in a time of despair and destitution. Amidst the prevailing hopelessness, one figure stands resolute: the Last Adventurer Elpam. When all others have faltered, he alone remains steadfast, refusing to surrender. As the era nears its end, Elpam embarks on a poignant journey back to where it all started, the fate of adventurers hanging in the balance.

basic_info.title: Honggane
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 홍가네

content.synopsis: Nanhee Hong, the sole daughter of the Hong household, finds herself entangled in a complex web of relationships. Her older brother, with a sister complex, holds a powerful position as the school's boss, while her younger brother is part of a rival gang. A chance encounter with the school's boss, Ji Young Jin, sets off a chain of events. Nanhee's world spirals as rumors of a romance with Ji Young Jin spread, and her heart betrays her with every thought of him. Caught in a dilemma, Nanhee must navigate the rumors and her growing feelings. How will she handle this unexpected turn in her life?

basic_info.title: The Phantom King
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yuurei Ou , Yuurei Oh

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of the "Evil Phenomenon" that devastated a village, Eun Sung-min emerged as a rare survivor, rescued alongside his maid by the enigmatic Phantom King and his band, Phantom. A decade later, the Special Environmental Protection Agency delves into the mysteries of that tragic event, aiming to unravel the secrets behind the malevolent "Evil Spirits" that wreaked havoc.

basic_info.title: S.I.D.
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Supernatural Investigation Department

content.synopsis: A young boy named Si Mun once had a unique gift to see and talk to ghosts, thanks to his shaman grandmother. She gave him a talisman to suppress this ability and wipe his memory of the supernatural encounters. Now, as a busy homicide detective in the Korean police force, memories of his past are resurfacing as his grandmother's sealed powers begin to stir once more.

basic_info.title: Forbidden Kiss
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 금지된 키스

content.synopsis: In the midst of chaos, Haeun finds herself tangled in a web of trouble caused by her stepbrother, the notorious gang leader. Falsely accused of his wrongdoings, she becomes an unexpected housemaid after a peculiar twist of fate. Determined to seek retribution for her disrupted life, Haeun plots revenge despite her innocence in matters of the heart. However, her first kiss takes an unexpected turn, leaving her to question what comes next.

basic_info.title: The Crimson Lady
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Reset Lady, Resetting Lady

content.synopsis:
Under a somber sky and amidst the squelching mud, Karen Heyer finds herself trapped in a cycle of reliving her past with each regression, haunted by a relentless drizzle that chills her to the core. Despite her repeated attempts, a tragic demise looms as her only fate. Initially believing herself in a mere novel upon the first rewind, Karen strives to navigate her way to a joyful conclusion, only to realize that happiness eludes her grasp.

No matter her actions, encounters, or words, a cruel death awaits her at every turn. After enduring ninety-nine demises that would test anyone's sanity, Karen, perceiving herself as an ordinary individual, dares to break the pattern by contemplating murder. As she embarks on her 100th iteration, she wonders if this drastic shift in strategy may finally lead her to a different, unforeseen resolution.

basic_info.title: Salty Studio
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 스튜디오 짭쪼롬

content.synopsis: Togeun once toiled at his father's company with little zeal. Seeking his true passion, he breaks free from his family's abode to pursue his dream of drawing. At a reunion party, Togeun implores Sonagi, a renowned illustrator, to guide him on the path to artistic mastery.

basic_info.title: Pig Bride
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Unknown New Bride, Jeongchebulmyeong Saesaegsi

content.synopsis: Lost in the mountains during a summer camp trip, eight-year-old Si-Joon despairs of ever finding his way back. Suddenly, a mysterious girl wearing a pig mask materializes before him. Intrigued, he follows her to a secluded house deep in the woods. There, he learns a shocking truth - he must marry the enigmatic pig-faced girl to absolve the sins of their forefathers. Despite his initial reluctance towards marriage, the allure of the sumptuous wedding feast proves irresistible. However, as the festivities conclude, Si-Joon awakens to reality. Fast forward to high school, and Si-Joon Lee finds himself haunted by vivid dreams of the pig bride. Is it all just a figment of his imagination, or is there more to this haunting connection than meets the eye?

basic_info.title: Leveling Up My Husband to the Max
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nampyeon-eul Man-Level-euro Kiuryeo Hamnida

content.synopsis: In a tale of heartbreak and second chances, Amber faces a loveless marriage, a tyrannical mother-in-law, and a tragic fate. But everything changes when she is mysteriously transported back in time ten years before her death sentence. Confronted with her husband's younger self, she discovers he is now under her sway. Can Amber rewrite history and alter her grim destiny?

basic_info.title: I Belong to House Castielo
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Am a Child of This House, Naneun I Jip Ai

content.synopsis: In an unexpected twist, 11-year-old Estelle finds herself being sold by her mother to the renowned duke of the empire, Ein Castielo.
