To her astonishment, she discovers that the formidable Ein is not just any stranger - he is her father. Known for his chilling blood-red eyes and formidable magical abilities, Ein rules as the aloof master of House Castielo, striking fear across kingdoms. As Estelle navigates this new reality, she must grapple with the possibility of claiming her place as the rare daughter of this powerful house. With enemies lurking and gallant knights at her side, the question remains: is she truly a child of this house?

basic_info.title: Peak
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bukhansan Police Mountains Rescue Squad

content.synopsis: In the bustling city of Seoul, 21-year-old Ryu Yeon-seong gears up to begin his mandatory military service with the ROK Army. His fate takes an unexpected turn when he and four comrades get selected for the mountain police rescue unit at Mt. Bukhan. Initially optimistic about the seemingly tranquil assignment, they quickly realize that the rugged terrain holds unforeseen challenges. As they embark on their mission, they discover that their journey is far from a leisurely stroll, leading them into uncharted territories both physically and mentally.

basic_info.title: My Beautiful World
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Naui Binaneun Segye, My Shiny World, My Shining World

content.synopsis:
In the shadows of her past, Yurim Lee carries a unique burden—a gift that unveils the darkest intentions of others. Faces veiled in sinister clouds reveal the depths of villainy lurking within. Ostracized for this uncanny ability, she navigates college as a solitary figure, haunted by a lack of trust.

A chance encounter changes everything when Yurim is assailed by darkness, only to be rescued by Jooeun Lim, whose hair mirrors the hues of cherry blossoms. A glimmer of light pierces her isolation as a fragile friendship blooms. With Jooeun's support, Yurim confronts her gift, embracing new connections while confronting a past she had long buried.

basic_info.title: I Woke Up as the Villain
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Trapped in a Webnovel as a Good for Nothing, Na Honja Soseol Sok Mangnani

content.synopsis: Yuseong, an unremarkable office worker, unexpectedly finds himself reborn as the hapless side character in a popular web novel bearing his name. Entrapped within the affluent Haesung Group, he endures familial scorn and displays a penchant for explosive outbursts, destined for a grim demise at the hands of manipulative forces. Determined to alter his predestined tragedy, the reincarnated Yuseong unearths a path to join the ranks of the Awakened, individuals blessed with extraordinary abilities. As he embarks on a quest to ascend in power, battling formidable beasts across diverse realms, he must also navigate treacherous adversaries within his own ranks.

basic_info.title: Doctor Player
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dr. Player

content.synopsis: Born as the illegitimate son of the king, Raymond faces a life of struggle due to his poor healing skills. Just when all hope seems lost, he stumbles upon the groundbreaking concept of "medical science" - a new path to curing ailments beyond traditional healing. Armed with this game-changing knowledge, Raymond sets out to defy prejudice and carve his path to fame. Will he succeed against all odds and realize his dreams?

basic_info.title: I Fell into a Reverse Harem Game!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yeok Harem Game Sogeuro Tteoreojin Moyang-imnida

content.synopsis:
Elvia Violette Cecilia, the emperor's formidable sister and expected successor, wields immense influence over many lives. Despite her beauty and status attracting a slew of suitors, she's known to capriciously ruin a man's life to satisfy her desires. Revered and reviled for her selfishness and fiery temperament, she walks a fine line between love and hate. 

Thrown into a perplexing situation, Elvia awakens in a new body after a mysterious phone call, finding herself sandwiched between two alluring strangers. As she navigates this strange realm, she realizes she's trapped in a video game where she's the villain impeding the protagonist's path. To secure her survival and outmaneuver her adversary, Elvia must forge unlikely alliances, perhaps even within the princess's own inner circle.

basic_info.title: My ID Is Gangnam Beauty!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nae ID neun Gangnam Miin

content.synopsis:
In a world where beauty reigns supreme, Kang Mirae has always stood on the sidelines, deemed unworthy of love due to her perceived lack of attractiveness. Tired of rejection, she transforms herself into a "Gangnam beauty," reshaping her appearance through plastic surgery. However, as Mirae navigates university life with dreams of becoming a perfumist, she faces harsh judgment and ridicule for her artificial beauty.

The school's natural beauty, Hyun Sooah, stands as a stark contrast to Mirae's manufactured looks, leading to a constant battle between authenticity and artificiality. Amidst the turmoil, Mirae encounters Do Kyungseok, a childhood acquaintance who challenges her fixation on outward appearances. As she grapples with self-esteem and the true essence of beauty, Mirae embarks on a journey of self-discovery and acceptance.

basic_info.title: A Wicked Tale of Cinderella's Stepmom
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Raised Cinderella Preciously, Cinderella-reul Gopge Kiwotseumnida

content.synopsis:
In a world where reincarnated women step into the lives of beloved novel characters, Mildred Vans finds herself in an unexpected role: the reviled wicked stepmother from the classic Cinderella tale. A 37-year-old widow with three daughters—Iris, Lily, and the charming Ashley—Mildred navigates her modest circumstances with a single wish: to secure prosperous marriages for her girls.

With the grand ball on the horizon, Mildred orchestrates meetings between her daughters and potential suitors, particularly focusing on pairing Ashley with the prince. Amidst her pragmatic schemes, she crosses paths with Daniel Wilford, a enigmatic young baron who shows uncommon kindness to Mildred and her daughters. While Mildred remains closed off to romance, Daniel's unwavering support hints at a future where love might bloom once more.

basic_info.title: Villain Duke's Precious One
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Akdang Daegong-nimui Gwihadi-gwihan Yeodongsaeng, The Precious Sister of the Villainous Grand Duke

content.synopsis: Dietrich Lagrange is set to take the spotlight as the tale's ultimate villain, amidst a family entangled in ruthless power struggles. Surprisingly, Anissa manages to thaw his icy heart, unbeknownst to him that she's a reincarnated reader now his little sister. Determined to rewrite her destiny, she aims to outlive the fatal role she's meant to play. Will she stand beside Dietrich as he ascends in the treacherous world of the Lagrange family?

basic_info.title: Touch My Little Brother and You're Dead
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: If You Touch My Little Brother, You're All Dead, Nae Dongsaeng Geondeulmyeon Neohui-neun Da Jugeun Moksum-ida

content.synopsis: Awakening as Rosalite, the elder sibling of Asterion in the captivating tale of Asterion of the Twilight was quite the surprise. While not the protagonist of the story, stepping into Rosalite's shoes brought a new sense of purpose. Tragically, her brother Asterion is destined to meet his demise at the tender age of 20, a fate that feels unjust given the tumultuous journey he has endured, especially considering the nature of his story. Driven by a newfound determination, I embark on a quest to alter his fate. Despite relentless efforts, Asterion meets his demise repeatedly, causing me to revert to a 16-year-old version of Rosalite with each passing. With each heartbreaking loss, my resolve to rescue him grows stronger. Be it a wealthy magnate, a regal figure, or a charming foreigner, anyone who threatens my dear brother's life will meet their own demise at my hands.

basic_info.title: Banya: The Explosive Delivery Man
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hell's Angel Delivery Man Banya, Pok Ju Baedal Bu Banya

content.synopsis: Amidst a global conflict between humans and monsters, the fearless couriers of the Gaya Desert Post Office stand united by their commitment to swift, flawless deliveries. At the helm is Banya, renowned as the daring Explosive Delivery Man, who embarks on a perilous mission to transport a mysterious package for a wounded soldier. With his unwavering determination and unparalleled skill, Banya leads his comrades through treacherous terrain, facing unknown perils along the way. As they set out on their daunting quest, Banya declares, "No delivery is beyond my reach. I never fail to deliver."

basic_info.title: The Soulless Duchess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Duchess With an Empty Soul, Binkkeopdegi Gongjak-buin

content.synopsis: Inexperienced Yvona is willing to go to great lengths for her extraordinary fiancé. From conjuring magical creatures to sacrificing herself for his benefit, she spares no effort. But when she witnesses his affection for her cousin Tristan and endures his scorn, Yvona's world shatters. Suddenly, Yvona perishes, only to awaken a year back in time, carrying a heavy heart. Empowered by her foreknowledge, Yvona prepares to stand up for herself. Perhaps she'll even join forces with the aloof Duke of Azentine...

basic_info.title: Myst, Might, Mayhem
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Chaotic God of Extraordinary Strength

content.synopsis:
Meet Jeong, known as the Slaughtering Scythe Demon, who finds pleasure in taking lives. Strikingly resembling Mok Gyeongwoon, the third young master of Mok Sword Manor, he is presented with a tempting offer: freedom in exchange for assuming the identity of the real Mok Gyeongwoon.

With a sinister crack, Jeong eliminates the Third Young Master and embarks on a treacherous path to claim his identity. Can the imposter navigate the dangerous game of deception? As the notorious serial killer steps into the role of the Third Young Master at the esteemed Mok Sword Manor, a chilling tale unfolds.

basic_info.title: Lady Baby
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 레이디 베이비

content.synopsis: In a series of tragic events, Calliope Rustichel loses her entire family. When all seems lost, a mysterious woman offers her a second shot at life. But the catch? Calliope is reincarnated as a baby, retaining her adult mind. Now, navigating the challenges of infancy, she must unravel the conspiracy behind her family's demise using her memories of the past to shape the future. Can she solve the mystery while mastering the basics of babyhood? Life as a baby is no walk in the park, especially when it involves solving a dark secret.

basic_info.title: The Villainess Needs Her Tyrant
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Geu Angnyeo-ege-neun Pokgun-i Piryohada

content.synopsis: Orphaned at seven, I once believed my uncle's kindness was genuine. Little did I know, his true motives unfolded as he cunningly withheld the House of Edenbarre and my rightful inheritance. To make matters worse, my own cousin betrayed me, poisoning me upon uncovering my uncle's treacherous schemes against the emperor. But now, reborn with a chance to reclaim what is rightfully mine, I am determined to exact my revenge. Embracing the role of a controversial figure, I will manipulate even the tyrant emperor to achieve my goals. Let the world label me a villainess - I care not. My sights are set on retribution... unless these persistent suitors dare stand in my path.

basic_info.title: World's Strongest Troll
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Game's Top Troll, Game Choegang Troller

content.synopsis: Step into Arcadia, the cutting-edge virtual reality game developed by three industry giants: Ajin Electrons, Sillicoff Industries, and Argos Corporation. Follow Jaeyeong, the renowned gamer known as Dex, as he plunges into the immersive realm of Arcadia using the Dreamer capsule. Brace yourself for a thrilling journey filled with challenges and excitement. Are you prepared to dive into the world of Arcadia?

basic_info.title: F-Rank Fortune Hunter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: F-geup Saju Hunter, F-Class Destiny Hunter

content.synopsis: In a realm where powers called fortunes reign, Seo Kangrim wields a dark gift that casts shadows of dread. Branded for his ability to claim fortunes from the deceased, Kangrim is feared despite his humble standing. When a merciless assassin wipes out his sect, Kangrim plunges back into the past, determined to rewrite their tragic fate. Yet, as he strives to alter destiny, he uncovers the unsettling truth that fortunes are not immutable. Can Kangrim rewrite the stars to rescue his comrades from their cruel demise, or will he unknowingly seal their doom once more?

basic_info.title: Red Lion
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 레드 라이온

content.synopsis: Renowned as the supreme fighter among all schools, a fiery red-haired girl known only as the Red Lion vanishes unexpectedly. Yet, this enigmatic disappearance marks merely the start of the true Red Lion's harrowing journey.

basic_info.title: The World's Strongest Are Obsessed With Me
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Strongest Characters in the World Are Obsessed with Me, Segyegwan Choegangja-deur-i Naege Jipchak Handa, The Most Powerful Characters in the World Are Obsessed with Me

content.synopsis: Thirteen-year-old Dahlia Phesterose unravels a startling revelation about her past life – she was reborn as the sister of the notorious villain in a dating simulation game. In this virtual world, the male protagonists, known as "transcendents," spiral into madness. As Dahlia anticipates the looming threat of family disgrace and her own safety, she grapples with the weight of her newfound identity.

basic_info.title: Grand Warlock Streamer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: BJ Archmage, Archmage Streamer, BJ Daemadosa

content.synopsis: In the VR realm of "God Wars," Jung Hyunwoo struggles as a down-on-his-luck gamer until a fateful accident locks him out of his account. Starting anew, he stumbles upon a unique gift: the power to unveil hidden game secrets. Embracing his newfound ability, he rises as the formidable Grand Warlock. With unrivaled skills and a prestigious class, his journey transforms from zero to hero as he embarks on a quest to ascend to greatness.

basic_info.title: I Failed to Oust the Villain!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Failed to Abandon the Villain, Heungmag-eul Beorineun De Silpaehaetda

content.synopsis: Lady Valeta, reborn as the daughter of a count from a novel she once read, finds herself trapped in a tragic fate foretold to end at the hands of her own house pet, Reinhart. Despite her efforts to rid herself of him, Valeta is powerless against Reinhart's newfound deadly magic. With everyone around her falling victim to his power, Valeta becomes at the mercy of her once lowly companion. As the dynamics shift, Reinhart spares Valeta's life but keeps her close, bound by an unbreakable bond.

basic_info.title: The Poisonous Healer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Poison-Eating Healer, Dok Meongneun Healer

content.synopsis: In a realm where monster hunters are revered, Haesun Cheon faces scorn due to his unconventional appearance. His world is further shattered when a horde of monsters strikes his community on the same day he learns of his terminal sickness. Through his sister's selfless act, Haesun survives and undergoes a transformation, emerging as a Poisoner with unique healing powers. Yet, as he grapples with his newfound abilities, the burning question remains: Can his toxic gift cure his affliction and pave the way for the ordinary existence he craves?

basic_info.title: Baroness Goes on Strike
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Honey, I'm Going On a Strike, Yeobo, Na Paeop Halgeyo

content.synopsis:
Baroness Cassia Ruberno has dedicated ten years selflessly serving her family in the desolate expanse of Greze, while her distant husband Zester Greze fights tirelessly in distant battles for meager pay. Stricken by illness and confined to her bed, Cassia breathes her last at the tender age of 28, filled with remorse for the moments she held her tongue and endured her suffering in silence.

Yet, to her astonishment, Cassia awakens miraculously on the morning after her wedding, a decade in the past. Transformed by her resentment into resolve, she pledges to express her true feelings and embrace life to the fullest this time around. Her newfound assertiveness not only prompts her neglectful husband to reassess his ways but also reveals a tender side she never imagined he possessed. Despite the looming specter of impending conflict, Cassia is compelled to immerse herself in the intricate web of business and politics to safeguard the future of Greze before fate seals her destiny.

basic_info.title: Antique Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Antique Romance: The Picture Album Girl

content.synopsis:
In a world where emotions are deemed unnecessary, Suzette, a young girl known as the 'living painting,' drifts from one owner to the next. Her existence is like that of a doll, physically present but mentally detached. She feels like a painting trapped in a rusted frame or the cold skin of a statue. Her life resembles that of a stuffed bird, prepared for display. 

Enter Ian McPolt, a young aristocrat who acquires Suzette for his extensive collection of curiosities. Will she remain a mere possession in his extravagant array, or will their connection evolve into something deeper? Suzette ponders her fate, wondering on whose display she will ultimately find herself.

basic_info.title: Ciel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ciel: The Last Autumn Story

content.synopsis:
In a tale brimming with the author's trademark wit and imagination, we follow the enchanting journey of a young girl named Yvienne Magnolia. While her striking beauty captivates the villagers of her humble town, Yvienne remains unaware of the extraordinary destiny awaiting her.

When the lord of the manor schemes to abduct her, Yvienne seeks refuge at the renowned Lowood Institution for sorcery and enchantment, a path she never envisioned taking, forsaking her family in the process.

At Lowood, Yvienne encounters a cast of fascinating characters, including January Lightsphere, whose radiant purple aura sets him apart from his aristocratic yet eccentric kin, and Lariatte, the heir to a traditional clan of warriors, destined to become her dearest companion.

basic_info.title: Promise of an Orchid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nanyak, Promised Orchid

content.synopsis: In a haunting dream that has plagued him since childhood, Jaesin Yang hears a red-haired woman's solemn vow: "I'll wait for you." Determined to unravel the mystery, Jaesin ventures to the eerie Orchid Road, known for its ghostly reputation. On his first night, a malevolent demon threatens his life, but salvation arrives in the form of Socheon, a striking woman bearing a striking resemblance to his dream figure. United by a shared mission, Jaesin and Socheon ally to aid benevolent demons and thwart the nefarious schemes of Geumgwan, the demonic overlord.

basic_info.title: Level 1 Player
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 1레벨 플레이어

content.synopsis: In a world transformed by the sudden appearance of portal gates, Choi Hyunseong and his family have faced countless hardships. However, everything changes when Hyunseong awakens to a unique gift—unable to level up conventionally, he discovers a remarkable talent for interdimensional trade. Armed with the ability to acquire stat-boosting items through commerce, he embarks on a journey of skill acquisition, dungeon conquest, monster hunting, and loot collection to support his loved ones. Despite starting as a mere level 1 player, Hyunseong proves that true power lies not in levels, but in his unstoppable determination to thrive through the art of trade.

basic_info.title: Boarding House of Hunks
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 물좋은 하숙집

content.synopsis: Jae Yoo, with a penchant for boys, resorts to sly tactics to secure a spot in a boarding house teeming with attractive young men. Even agreeing to a date with the school's nerdiest boy doesn't faze her – until she callously ditches him, provoking the ire of his good-looking best friend, Ji Hu. Their ensuing rivalry is fierce, akin to cats and dogs. Upon finally gaining entry to the coveted "boarding house of hunks," Jae Yoo believes her dreams have come true. The residence is stunning, the landlady is kind, and a charming guy shows interest in her – until the bombshell drops: Ji Hu is the landlady's son. To make matters worse, he holds a secret about Jae Yoo's most humiliating moment. How will their cohabitation unfold? Can they coexist under the same roof?

basic_info.title: The Lady and Her Butler
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Agassi-wa Ureong-chonggak

content.synopsis: Sooha is determined to avoid romantic entanglements at all costs. Fed up with her mother's matchmaking attempts and societal pressure to find a Prince Charming, she rejects the idea of a relationship. However, her perspective shifts when a destitute man proposes to maintain her home in exchange for shelter. Despite her reservations, Sooha agrees to the unconventional arrangement. Soon, she discovers the unexpected joys of returning to a cozy home filled with delicious meals, crisp linens, and impeccably pressed clothes – all thanks to a man she never expected to welcome into her life.

basic_info.title: The Demonic Contract
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Asmodian's Contract, Ma-jokui Gyeyak

content.synopsis: Yurisina, the daughter of the demon king, harbors a burning desire to earn her demon stripes through her inaugural human contract. Fate intervenes when Princess Marianne of the Pedin Kingdom calls upon her for a mission of vengeance against Queen Orphelius, who had once poisoned her. The princess requests Yurisina to assume her identity and live in her stead, setting the stage for a sinister tale of deception and retribution.

basic_info.title: Unlucky Mansion
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 언럭키맨션

content.synopsis:
Kang Eun Ju, a former designer with a stable living situation, faces a sudden upheaval when she loses her job and home in one fell swoop. Determined to bounce back, she scours the internet for a new opportunity and stumbles upon a promising job listing that could be her saving grace. Thrilled at the prospect, she eagerly applies and lands an interview.

However, her optimism wanes when she meets the employer, Kwak Woo Jin, whose patronizing demeanor and mockery of her credentials dampen her spirits. Despite her reservations about his arrogance, Eun Ju reluctantly accepts the job to alleviate her financial and housing woes. Thus begins her challenging journey as the live-in caretaker at Woo Jin's peculiar mansion, where she must navigate his eccentric demands and unexpected housemates.

basic_info.title: It's Mine
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 이츠마인

content.synopsis:
Yohan's memory is a puzzle, missing crucial pieces of his past. But in his fragmented recollections, one constant shines brightly: Lee Dajeong. She reigns supreme in his world, her every move meticulously tracked, her image omnipresent in his sanctuary. Yohan's vigilance over Dajeong is unwavering, a silent guardian with a heart brimming with protective devotion.

From a distance, Yohan safeguards Dajeong, poised to swoop in at a moment's notice. Yet, shadows loom as another figure fixates on her, their sinister designs veiled from view. Could this enigmatic duo hold the key to unraveling Yohan's enigmatic history?

basic_info.title: A Dance of Swords in the Night
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sword Fanatic Wanders Through The Night, In the Night Consumed by Blades, I Walk, Kar-e Chwihan Bam-eul Geotda

content.synopsis: Kidnapped and trained in poison as a child, Sohan Jin ventures back to his hometown in pursuit of the New Moon Sword Dancers who raised him. However, his homecoming reveals a grim reality: the sword dancers have fallen to a malevolent sect that now dominates the region, having captured some of its members. What was intended as a joyful reunion now unfolds as a vengeful mission for Sohan as he sets out to locate the missing sword dancers, ready to use his lethal skills against anyone obstructing his path.

basic_info.title: As You Wish, Prince
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: What Do You Want to Be, Prince?, Hwangja, Ne Mueosi Doego Sipeunya?

content.synopsis: Yoonsoo leads a double life: a mundane office worker by day, and by night, the renowned author, Wasser. However, her fictional world turns real when the antagonist of her series, Prince Einsen Keit, abducts her. Stuck in her own creation, Wasser struggles to meet Keit's requests with her creative abilities. Yet, she faces unexpected challenges, such as sinister entities and demonic beings not from her stories. Amidst it all, Wasser can't ignore the unsettling fact that Keit is surprisingly charming.

basic_info.title: The Rewards of Marriage
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Found a Husband When I Picked up the Male Lead, Namju-reul Juwot-deoni Nampyeon-i Saenggyeo Beoryeotda

content.synopsis: Renowned for her lavish lifestyle, Wilhazelle Fossier brings her family to the brink of bankruptcy. To settle their debts, she embarks on a mission to locate the missing nephew of the affluent Duke Heillos and claim the reward. Despite finding the boy, Wilhazelle is compelled to stay at the Heillos manor until the duke validates the child's identity. What was meant to be a brief stay stretches into a year, culminating in a contractual marriage. As Wilhazelle grapples with the implications of her extended stay and unexpected union, she begins to question if the pursuit of wealth was truly worth it.

basic_info.title: The Villainess Tames the Beast
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Beast Tamed by the Evil Woman, A Beast Tamed by the Villainess

content.synopsis:
In a world where drugs, magic, and manipulation reign, Ilyana Glayne molds Magnus into her submissive companion, eager to obey her every whim. But when Magnus defies her hold, the tables turn, and he seeks vengeance for his past torment.

Awakening as Ilyana, a reader is determined to break free from this entanglement. Yet, Magnus remains devoted to her, yearning for her presence despite her attempts to sever their bond. No matter how hard she tries to release him, he refuses to stray, always returning to her side. With each surrender to Magnus, Ilyana realizes she may have never truly dictated the dynamics of their relationship.

basic_info.title: Shall we Have Dinner Tonight?
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: How About Having Dinner Together?

content.synopsis: In a bustling city, Do-hee Woo and Hae-Gyung Kim, two young singles with fractured hearts, unexpectedly cross paths at a local eatery. Their chance encounter blossoms into a weekly ritual of shared meals, forging a bond that transcends mere friendship. As they navigate the wreckage of past relationships, their connection deepens, leading them to confront a new reality where the lines between companionship and something more blur.

basic_info.title: She's Hopeless
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nodap Sonyeo

content.synopsis: Despite her affluent background, Gabin is an isolated target of bullying in her school. Her reputation for unwavering strength precedes her, as she refuses to tolerate mistreatment from her peers. Concerned for Gabin's safety, her family covertly hires Tae-ung, offering a hefty sum of $500,000 for him to switch schools and become her protector. Can Tae-ung shield Gabin from the relentless bullies without revealing his true purpose to her or their classmates?

basic_info.title: Awfully Damn Kiss and Hug
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jidokhage Kkeureoango Jidokhage Kiseuhago

content.synopsis:
In a twist of fate, the charming Chae Young Un's routine of fleeting relationships takes a turn when she crosses paths with the mysterious first-year student, Jang Yeon Ho. Their destinies intertwine when she witnesses him defending her against a thief. Despite his resistance, Chae Young becomes his pillar of support as Jang Yeon Ho battles his inner demons. Is it compassion or affection that drives her to stand by him? Unsure of her feelings, Chae Young stands firm in her commitment.

Haunted by his past, Jang Yeon Ho is reluctant to accept Chae Young's unwavering care. Yet, he discovers that life shines brighter with her presence. A poignant tale of damaged souls seeking solace and renewal in love.

basic_info.title: Karina's Last Days
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Time of the Terminally Ill Extra, Sihanbu Extra-ui Sigan

content.synopsis:
In the chilling realm of Zentar, ruled by Duke Milian Pastellio and plagued by demons, a sudden arrival disrupts the peace - his unwanted fiancée, Karina Leopold. Duke Milian, averse to Karina's presence and dreading their impending nuptials, is taken aback by her unexpected demand to stay in Zentar for months before breaking off their engagement for good.

Despite Karina's insistence on independence, Duke Milian can't ignore her fragile health and persistent sickness. As their strained relationship unfolds, secrets and tensions unravel in the frosty air of Zentar.

basic_info.title: The Knight Only Lives Today
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Eternally Regressing Knight, A Knight Who Eternally Regresses, Oneul-man Saneun Gisa

content.synopsis: As a child, Encrid was deemed a genius, yet those words weighed heavily on him like poison. Despite ridicule and skepticism, his dream of knighthood burned brightly within him. Ignoring the naysayers, he dedicated himself to rigorous training. Tragically, his life was cut short by a fatal injury. However, Encrid awoke to a mysterious new beginning, facing a fresh chance to pursue his aspirations.

basic_info.title: Just Leave Me Be
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Want You to Throw Me Away, Na-reul Beoryeo Juseyo, Please Throw Me Away

content.synopsis: Adele, a luckless orphan, faced a dire ultimatum from a duke: step into the shoes of his deceased daughter or face a grim fate on the streets. Embracing her new identity, she found herself thrust into a marriage that soon turned treacherous with a looming assassination order. But a twist of fate sent her hurtling back in time, sparking a determination to reclaim the lost years of deception. As mysterious ancient ruins beckon, Adele must harness her newfound wisdom and an unlikely ally in the enigmatic Black Knight to navigate perilous challenges and rewrite destiny's script.

basic_info.title: Rooftop Swordmaster
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Rooftop Sword Master, Oktapbang Sword Master

content.synopsis:
After enduring a brutal assault that left him in a coma, Seyoung awakens from a nine-month slumber to a grim reality: his father's tragic self-immolation as a desperate plea for justice. The incident reignites the investigation, leading to the overdue sentencing of the classmates responsible for the attack. Yet, despite the semblance of closure, Seyoung's heart remains heavy with anger and apprehension towards a world tainted by injustice.

Retreating from society's harsh gaze, Seyoung becomes a recluse, shunning the outside world as days blend into nights. However, a mysterious sound beckons him to venture beyond his safe haven. To his astonishment, a colossal blade dubbed the "War Sword" emerges on his rooftop, bearing an ominous message from a divine entity, stirring Seyoung's dormant spirit.

basic_info.title: What It Takes to Be a Villainess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Justice of a Villainous Woman, Angnyeo-ui Jeongui

content.synopsis: Heartbroken Hwayoung unexpectedly plunges into the river, only to awaken as the notorious villainess Satiana Altisee Kaylon. Now the sole daughter of House Kaylon, Satiana is thrust into a world of deceit and ambition as she vies for the title of the next empress. Surrounded by manipulative courtiers, she must embrace her dark side to secure her place beside the crown prince, or risk the safety of her newfound family. Can she master the art of villainy and claim her throne, or will her quest for power lead her down a treacherous path? Love may be the ultimate test even for the most wicked of hearts.

basic_info.title: Last on Earth
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Everyone Else Is a Returnee

content.synopsis: Left behind repeatedly, the straggler found themselves abandoned by all of mankind, thanks to a mysterious cloaking technique even unknown to God. "Why am I the sole one left behind? Why me?" Despite God's meticulous list for transporting humans to another realm, you remained elusive, thanks to your extraordinary cloaking skills. Thus, you embarked on a solitary existence on Earth, patiently awaiting humanity's comeback. A millennium later, they reappeared, only to find you had evolved into a formidable force.

basic_info.title: The Superhuman Era
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Era of Overman, Choin-ui Sidae

content.synopsis: As the xenoterran invasion strikes, superhumans emerge as humanity's last defense against the monstrous threat. Among them is Kang Lim, a high school student leading a double life as the vigilante hero White Cap. While some wield their powers for good, others harbor dark agendas. As Kang battles the enigmatic monsters, he uncovers hidden truths about the invasion's origins and the sinister forces manipulating events behind the scenes. The world he safeguards is a realm of secrets and shadows, where reality is not what it appears to be.

basic_info.title: Ginger and the Cursed Prince
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Virtues of the Villainess, Agyeog-i Bepuneun Mideok

content.synopsis: In the enchanting town of Sweet Haven, the starry-eyed Ginger Torte is over the moon as her beloved proposes, making her fairy tale dreams a reality. However, her joy shatters when she discovers her fiancé's heart swayed by her cunning rival. Seeking refuge in a mysterious book chronicling the fateful bond between a damsel and a cursed royal, Ginger is stunned to find her adversary, Lerazie, as the leading lady. As the lines between fiction and reality blur, both women find themselves captivated by the dashing prince. Determined to rewrite her destiny, Ginger sets out to claim not just the prince's affection but the spotlight as well. Yet, lurking within this tale lies a chilling mystery waiting to be unraveled.

basic_info.title: Death's Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ije Got Jukseumnida

content.synopsis: Yijae Choi, grappling with perpetual unemployment, a lost love, and falling victim to a bitcoin scam, reaches a breaking point where he contemplates ending his own life. However, Death intervenes, offended by his cavalier approach to mortality. She presents him with a twisted challenge: to face death repeatedly in 13 alternative existences. If he can outwit the impending demise in each life, he earns the chance to live out the full span of that particular existence. As Yijae navigates this macabre game, he must confront the question: while his own life may seem a failure, what about the destinies of those he embodies?

basic_info.title: For Better or For Worse
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dahaeng Inji Bulhaeng Inji, Is It Fortune or Is It Woe?

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, the spirited Lady Dillion discovers she is the unexpected antagonist in a romantic tale upon meeting Marquess Cedric. Memories of a tragic plot involving her sister and Cedric resurface, prompting Dillion to take matters into her own hands. In a daring move to rewrite destiny, she weds Cedric to avert the impending tragedy, only to face a dilemma as his heart is destined for another. As their union unfolds, both Dillion and Cedric find themselves caught in a web of unforeseen consequences, where love and expectations collide in unexpected ways.

basic_info.title: I Tamed My Ex-Husband's Mad Dog
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Tamed My Ex-Husband's Crazy Dog

content.synopsis:
When Reinhardt Lincke's world crumbled, bitterness and fury consumed her. Crown Prince Michel Allanketh shattered their betrothal and banished her, adding insult to injury after her father's tragic passing. Despite living in luxury within a thriving domain, her soul darkened with each passing moment, seething with betrayal and injustice. But when her anguish reaches its peak, a miraculous twist sends her back 15 years, just before Michel's betrayal.

Determined to avenge her losses, Reinhardt strikes at the prince, leading to a brutal punishment: exile to the treacherous snowy mountains in a remote imperial outpost. As peril looms, a ragged child unexpectedly becomes her savior, revealing himself as the emperor's secret son—a gifted assassin Michel intended to shape into a loyal weapon. Now in possession of Michel's prized asset, Reinhardt is driven by a relentless thirst for retribution, willing to go to any lengths to settle the score.

basic_info.title: How to Hide the Emperor's Child
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hwangje-ui Ai-reul Sumgineun Bangbeop

content.synopsis:
Amid a decade-long betrothal to Crown Prince Kaizen Rastiel, Astelle von Lestern dedicates herself to mastering the art of empresshood. Yet, fate takes a cruel turn on their wedding night as the old emperor breathes his last, prompting Kaizen to seek an immediate annulment, revealing their union as merely his father's decree. With grace intact, Astelle conceals her feelings and disowns her power-hungry kin, labeled the fleeting empress.

Unexpectedly carrying Kaizen's child, Astelle witnesses his radical reforms upon assuming the throne, clashing with her avaricious father. Aware that returning with her son, Theore, would make him a pawn in the escalating power struggle, Astelle opts for a clandestine life with him for six years. However, a twist of fate reunites her with the emperor, igniting a perilous game to shield Theore's true identity from Kaizen's probing eyes.

basic_info.title: I Became the Villain's Mother
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Akdang-ui Eommaga Doeeo-beoryeotda

content.synopsis: Stepping into the pages of her treasured novel as the notorious Duchess Roselia Chade, Haena finds herself immersed in luxury, authority, and even a newfound family. Everything seems perfect, except for one crucial detail - her cherished stepson, Einspanner Chade, is fated to become the malevolent mastermind set on her demise. Despite being an innocent child at this juncture in the tale, Roselia is resolute on preventing him from embracing darkness. Battling against a scheming duke who seeks to harm his own offspring, the challenge of nurturing a child destined for villainy grows more daunting. The fate of both mother and son hangs in the balance as Roselia races to rewrite their tragic destiny and secure a brighter future for them both.

basic_info.title: Masters of Lightning Knives
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lightning Degree, Biroedo

content.synopsis: In a world where a young orphan navigates solitude, fate leads him to encounter the master of an enigmatic martial arts style. Embracing this mystical art demands enduring years of eccentric and punishing training under his sadistic mentor. Yet, why must he perform menial tasks like laundry and cooking to unlock these extraordinary skills? As he battles his own ego, the orphan strives to grasp the power of the formidable lightning knives. Will he conquer the challenges and emerge victorious, or will he fall short of mastering this lethal craft?

basic_info.title: You're So Cool
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: You are So Cool

content.synopsis: In the halls of the school, whispers of Seung-Ha, the flawless prince, echo through as if he were a celestial being. To Nan-Woo, he was a distant dream, seemingly unattainable. But dreams have a way of surprising us. When Nan-Woo's fantasy turns into reality, she discovers a harsh truth—her prince charming is nothing but a cruel facade. The perfect prince reveals his true colors, leaving Nan-Woo to grapple with the cost of her shattered dream.

basic_info.title: The Dungeon Cleaning Life of a Once Genius Hunter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Clever Cleaning Life of the Returned Genius Hunter, Hoegwihan Cheonjae Hunter-ui Seulgiroun Cheongso Saenghwal

content.synopsis: Jun-Woo Kim, the world's first SSS rank genius hunter, possesses unrivaled abilities but struggles with a troublesome reputation due to his abrasive personality. After being ambushed and killed by an unknown assailant, he awakens to find himself ten years in the past. Determined to reclaim his former glory, Jun-Woo faces a daunting challenge - his powers are mysteriously sealed by the karma of his past life. To break this binding curse, he must undertake the grueling task of a "Dungeon Cleaner," renowned for its brutal demands. Yet, Jun-Woo is no ordinary cleaner; he confronts not only monsters but also corrupt hunters, nepotism-driven superiors, and unexpected allies. With strength surpassing even the mightiest hunters, he embarks on a chaotic journey of cleansing and redemption. Get ready for a wild ride as the ex-hunter takes on the ultimate cleaning challenge!

basic_info.title: Kill the Dragon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 킬 더 드래곤

content.synopsis: In a world where humans clash with invading dragons, a new breed of individuals with extraordinary abilities, known as psykers, emerges. As the tide of war turns in favor of humanity through the sacrifices of the psykers, a chilling prophecy shakes their newfound hope. A gifted psyker predicts the dragons' imminent return in 15 years, prompting the development of Ark - a specialized institution to groom psychic children for the ultimate battle. With only three years left until the prophesized conflict, the countdown to destiny begins. What fate awaits them in this impending showdown?

basic_info.title: Tricked Into Becoming the Heroine's Stepmother
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Éminence Grise Female Lead Is Trying to Make Me Her Stepmom, Heungmak Yeojuga Nal Saeeommaro Mandeullyeogo Hae

content.synopsis: Upon her demise, Daisy Heidi finds herself reincarnated into the world of "Why Did the Duke's Daughter Roll Across the Pumpkin Patch?" – a novel known for its tragic tale of the alluring heroine, Pierta, entangled in a web of reckless desires with ten devoted suitors. Despite being reborn as a humble commoner in this realm, Daisy holds a unique advantage – she is the original author of the gripping narrative. As fate intertwines Daisy with Pierta and the distinguished Duke Henstone, she is determined to rewrite the future and shield Pierta from a path of inevitable sorrow.

basic_info.title: I Don't Want This Kind of Hero
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: This Kind of Hero Is the Worst

content.synopsis:
Synopsis Rewrite:
High school student Naga, gifted with psychic abilities, is enlisted by the crime-fighting group SPOON. Alongside his comrades Hyena and Sasa, they unite forces in a mission to safeguard the world. Their ultimate challenge lies in confronting the formidable KNIFE to secure global harmony.

basic_info.title: Reincarnated as an Unruly Heir
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Reincarnated as the Crazed Heir, Mangnani Sogyoju-ro Hwansaeng Haetda

content.synopsis: Once hailed as the formidable Ten Strike Finisher, Jagak Yang, the skilled martial arts prodigy and heir to the Great Martial Alliance, seemed destined for greatness. However, his promising future takes a dark turn when he is treacherously murdered by envious adversaries. Reborn into the debauched persona of Cheonso Ma, the notorious second-in-command of the malevolent Shining Light Cult, Jagak faces a harrowing dilemma. Will he uphold his noble values amidst the shadows of his sinister new existence?

basic_info.title: Pink Lady
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 핑크레이디

content.synopsis: Art student Gyeo-wool is struggling with her drawings until a chance encounter with a striking young man leads to a mix-up with his notebook. Intrigued by the unfamiliar art style within, she sets out to outdo him, only to discover that he is more familiar with her than she could have ever imagined.

basic_info.title: Being Raised by Villains
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Akdang-deur-ege Kiwojineun Jung-imnida, I'm Being Raised by Villains

content.synopsis: Cha Miso yearns for the enchanting world of her treasured novel where she can be the cherished protagonist. Miraculously, she awakens inside the very story, but not as the lead, rather as Eileen Etam, a mistreated supporting character facing eviction. Determined to evade abandonment, she schemes to flee before it's too late. However, her escape is thwarted when Erno Etam, the eccentric scion of House Etam, insists that Eileen is his offspring. Caught in a feud between House Etam and a group of antagonists, Eileen must navigate a perilous path to survival.

basic_info.title: The Knight and Her Emperor
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Emperor and the Female Knight, Hwangje-wa Yeogi-sa

content.synopsis: Pollyanna, an ordinary girl from a prestigious family, is thrust into military service by her desperate parents, hoping she will perish in combat. Determined and resourceful, Pollyanna defies the odds to climb the military hierarchy. Her path crosses with a passionate king who recognizes her potential. Inspired by his vision of unity, Pollyanna pledges her loyalty. As the king's admiration deepens, he finds himself falling for this valiant warrior.

basic_info.title: Oh! Holy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Oh! Lord Jesus, O! Ju Yesu-yeo

content.synopsis: In the halls of Jefferson High, where being invisible is no big deal for Jamie Oh, who has a unique ability to see and communicate with ghosts. Preferring the company of his spectral friends, Jamie leads a quiet existence on the sidelines. However, everything changes when the school's queen bee, Lily Summers, suddenly singles him out. As Jamie's paranormal world collides with high school drama, he finds himself caught in a whirlwind of unexpected events.

basic_info.title: I Stan the Prince
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hwangja-nim-kke Ipdeokhamnida, I'm Stanning the Prince

content.synopsis:
In the wake of the sensational novel "The Prince Among the Roses," Angela emerges as the devoted admirer of the dethroned Prince Rayburn Espelindo. Despite being a commoner inspired by mere sketches of Rayburn, Angela boldly pens a fanfiction piece that unexpectedly catapults her into the limelight when it gets published without her knowledge.

Rayburn and his twin sister, Hoya, bear the weight of being the disgraced offspring banished from the imperial palace. As Rayburn's newfound popularity challenges the empire's control, Angela finds herself labeled an enemy of the state, facing execution. However, Hoya sees an opportunity to salvage Rayburn's tarnished image and enlists Angela to write a sequel to her novel.

Forced into a world of political intrigue after being uprooted from her rural home, Angela assumes the guise of a scholar under the Espelindo's patronage. Despite the risks, Angela revels in the chance to clandestinely indulge in her adoration for Rayburn through her writing, all while navigating treacherous waters of deception and loyalty.

basic_info.title: The Genius Medicinal Mage
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Medicine Genius Wizard, Drug-Eating Genius Mage

content.synopsis: Renoc was intended as a mere video game avatar until he traded a failing body for extraordinary magical abilities. But when his creator unexpectedly inhabits Renoc's form, the rules change, and the game becomes all too real. Struggling to cope, Renoc stumbles upon the enigmatic substance Vyper, unlocking the true extent of his powers. As he teeters on the edge of salvation and ruin, can Renoc navigate this unfamiliar realm and secure his place in it?

basic_info.title: Diamond Dust
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: Diamond Dust 다이아몬드 더스트

content.synopsis: In the heart of a musical dynasty, young Ariel is molded into a piano virtuoso from birth. Her father's relentless drive pushes her to practice rigorously, up to 12 hours daily. Isolated from normal teenage life, she is forbidden friendships and even the simple pleasure of makeup. Will Ariel's talent be her salvation or her undoing in this compelling tale of sacrifice and ambition?

basic_info.title: A Cat That Loved a Fish
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Goyang-ileul Salanghan Mulgogi

content.synopsis: In a tale both heartwarming and bittersweet, follow the journey of two star-crossed young lovers, bound by a love that defies all odds but shackled by a fate that keeps them apart.

basic_info.title: Terror Man
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 테러맨

content.synopsis: In a world where fate is written, Min Jung Woo possesses a unique gift - the "Eyes of Misfortune" that unveil the paths veering towards tragedy. Determined to alter these ominous outcomes, he embarks on a mission to thwart calamities before they unfold. However, his noble endeavors take a dark turn, branding him as a dreaded figure among the populace - a vigilante perceived as a terrorist.

basic_info.title: Caught By the Villain
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Villain Discovered My Identity, Agyeog-ege Jeongche-reul Deulkyeo Beoryeotda

content.synopsis: Eunha, a fencing prodigy, is thrust into a new identity as Selena Evan, a pivotal character and daughter of a legendary swordsman. Trapped in a fictional realm, her fate hangs perilously in the balance as the nefarious Prince Ignus schemes her demise. To shield her family from execution, she assumes the guise of her missing twin, Celestine, risking all to stay hidden. But as her exceptional swordsmanship catches Ignus' eye, she must outmaneuver becoming his right-hand enforcer. Can Selena outwit death's grasp and evade the clutches of the villainous prince?

basic_info.title: Mother's Contract Marriage
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Mother Gets Married Again, My Mother Got Married by Contract, My Mom Entered a Contract Marriage

content.synopsis:
Years ago, a nobleman deserted his wife, Lydia, and their daughter, Lyrica Vans. Their fall from grace led them to the poverty-stricken slums. While Lydia seeks solace in alcohol, young Lyrica bravely shoulders the burden of providing for them, refusing to harbor resentment towards her neglectful and abusive mother.

Unexpectedly, a transformed Lydia awakens one day, showering Lyrica with heartfelt apologies and affectionate words. Claiming she will wed the feared emperor Alterres Takar, Lydia's announcement leaves Lyrica bewildered.

Lydia's swift betrothal to Alterres reveals it to be a strategic union. As Lyrica navigates her new life as a princess, she is thrust into a world of opulence and treacherous politics. Amidst the glittering riches and cunning schemes of the palace, Lyrica's sincerity and kind spirit shine brightly, earning her a place of honor and admiration.

basic_info.title: Navillera: Like a Butterfly
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 나빌레라

content.synopsis: Following the funeral of a close friend, Dukchul Shim makes a bold decision to embark on a new adventure: ballet. Despite the astonishment, and perhaps disapproval, of his family and friends, this septuagenarian dives headfirst into his newfound passion. Guided by the youthful Chaerok and supported by fellow dreamers, Dukchul's journey highlights the significance of chasing one's aspirations, even in the midst of challenges and the inevitability of time.

basic_info.title: I Thought My Time Was Up!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Thought I Didn't Have Long to Live!, I Thought It Was Time!

content.synopsis: When Lariette Blanche pays a visit to Doctor Zakascoff feeling a bit off, she receives shocking news: a rare congenital disease gives her only three months to live. Determined to make the most of her time, Lariette creates a bucket list filled with dreams and adventures. But as she embraces this new outlook on life, a surprising twist reveals that the initial diagnosis was incorrect. Now faced with a life altered by her preparations, Lariette must decide whether to revert to her old routine or embrace the thrilling unknown that lies ahead.

basic_info.title: Our Secret Alliance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gajja Dongmaeng

content.synopsis:
As childhood pals, Kim Jaeha and Yun Se-i once shared a close bond that slowly faded with time. Bound by overbearing parents, they maintain a facade of friendship in front of their families while keeping their true feelings hidden. Jaeha carries a secret love for Se-i.

Their fragile charade faces a test when Se-i's mother insists they perform as a couple at her upcoming wedding. Reluctantly agreeing, they find themselves entangled in unforeseen complexities. Despite the challenges, Jaeha sees an opportunity to win Se-i's heart amidst the chaos.

basic_info.title: The Lone Spellcaster
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Solo Spell Caster, Na Hollo Jumun Sayongja

content.synopsis: In a world threatened by interdimensional monsters, only the chosen "Awakened"—humans with unique powers—hold the key to victory. For everyday office worker Dohyeok Park, the idea of battling these creatures seems a distant fantasy. His focus is on securing a crucial business deal to salvage his career. However, everything changes when Dohyeok unexpectedly confronts a monster rampage. In that moment, he unveils his extraordinary abilities as a rare and formidable Awakened. As newfound powers draw both allies and foes to his side, Dohyeok must navigate a treacherous path. Will he prove his mettle and survive the challenges that lie ahead?

basic_info.title: The Villainess's Maker
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Angnyeo Maker

content.synopsis: Yoon Haneul, a perpetual pushover, suddenly awakens to find herself transformed into Aila Mertensia, the villainess from her own novel penned a decade ago. Preferring a life of luxury and bookish indulgence, Haneul's newfound reality takes a dark turn as she becomes ensnared in a never-ending time loop, trapping her in a cycle of repeating days. The only escape hinges on her ability to emulate the very antagonist she created. Clueless in the art of villainy, Haneul receives an unexpected offer of guidance from the enigmatic warlock, Killian. With no other recourse, she strikes a precarious pact with this charming yet dubious figure. Can Haneul place her trust in this alluring, devilish mentor to navigate her treacherous new existence?

basic_info.title: My Dad Is Too Strong
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Appa-ga Neomu Gangham

content.synopsis: Once a scatterbrained civil servant with no remarkable skills, he resurfaces as the Heavenly Demon, longing for a tranquil life after enduring the tumultuous Murim realm. But his newfound peace is disrupted when he is unexpectedly entrusted with a daughter: "Please be my father until I graduate."

basic_info.title: The Holy Power of Modern Medicine
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: To Hell With Being a Saint, I'm a Doctor, Seongja-neun Gaeppul, Hyeondae Uihak-ui Himida

content.synopsis: Renowned as a brilliant doctor in the medical realm, Yusung's life takes a drastic turn when a fatal accident transports him to a mysterious new world. Surrounded by unfamiliar terms like saints and a holy empire, he discovers a startling new power – healing magic. Struggling to reconcile his medical expertise with this newfound ability to cure with a touch, Yusung grapples with the surreal nature of his new reality.

basic_info.title: The Tyrant Wants to Be Good
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Tyrant Wants to Live Honestly, The Tyrant Wants to Live a Virtuous Life

content.synopsis: Once feared as the tyrant of the Ubera Empire, Dorothea Milanaire faced betrayal and met her demise at the hands of a loved one. To her astonishment, she awoke to find herself back in her childhood. Viewing this as a second opportunity, she vowed to lead a life of virtue. Can she atone for her past sins as a tyrant and embrace righteousness in this new existence?

basic_info.title: The Girl Downstairs
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lee Duna!

content.synopsis: On his first day of college, Joon settles into his new apartment, unaware that the former celebrity, Duna, resides downstairs. Initially cautious, Joon's intrigue with Duna's enigmatic past gradually intensifies, leading him down an unexpected path of discovery.

basic_info.title: Dungeons & Artifacts
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dungeon Ssibeo Meongneun Artifact

content.synopsis: Embark on an exhilarating adventure with explorer Stetch Atelier as a routine dungeon-guiding job takes a treacherous turn. Deceived by the cunning prince who hired him, Stetch unwittingly triggers a deadly curse. Yet, defying death, Stetch is revived by a mystical artifact with a tempting proposition for revenge. Bound by a pact, Stetch ventures on an epic quest filled with dungeon raids, fierce battles, and the forging of alliances amidst brewing rivalries.

basic_info.title: Revolutionary Princess Eve
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Princess Imprints the Traitor, Hwangnyeo, Banyeokja-reul Gagin Sikida

content.synopsis:
Amidst the flames of a crumbling empire, Princess Evienrose Choelle "Eve" Hadelamid faces her imminent demise with unwavering resolve. The rebellion spearheaded by the enigmatic homunculus leader, Mikaelis Agnito, leaves Eve as the last surviving member of her imperial lineage, massacred in the name of freeing the oppressed homunculi from tyrannical subjugation.

Eve, a staunch advocate for homunculi rights, had steadfastly rejected the tradition of binding a homunculus as her loyal knight. Disowned by her family, she garners the attention and respect of Mikaelis, who spares her life and envisions a shared reign. However, Eve's sister, Rosenitte Nadia, driven to madness by her past ownership of Mikaelis, tragically betrays Eve. In the aftermath of this betrayal, Mikaelis, consumed by guilt, resolves to rewrite fate at any cost to revive Eve.

With a sudden leap back in time seven years, Eve alone retains the memories of the grim past. Empowered by this foreknowledge, she realizes she must actively contend for the throne against her treacherous kin to secure a future of harmony. To avert an impending tragedy, Eve must defy her previous stance and appoint a personal knight—the formidable and rebellious homunculus, Mikaelis.

basic_info.title: The Mage: Swallowed the Dragon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dragon-Devouring Mage, Yong-eul Samkin Mabeopsa

content.synopsis:
In a world where magic reigns supreme, Russell Raymond, the last descendant of the fallen Raymond family and a struggling mage, dreams of restoring his family's lost honor. However, his path takes a different turn when he is expelled from the academy and forced to eke out a living as a lowly mercenary mage. One fateful day, as he embarks on a routine assignment, a mysterious artifact known as the "Dragon's Heart" stirs to life, offering Russell a second chance at greatness.

Amidst the twists of fate, Russell finds himself transported back to his academy days, armed with a mana stone as a token of his new mission. With this unexpected opportunity, he embarks on a journey of redemption and self-discovery, akin to a dragon finally unfurling its wings. As he navigates the turbulent currents of destiny that once held him back, Russell sets his sights on a brighter future that was once beyond his reach.

basic_info.title: Chronicles of the Demon Faction
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mado Jeonsaenggi

content.synopsis:
In the world of the Orthodox Murim's Righteous Heavenly Alliance, Hajin Chun reigns as the most formidable assassin. But when his quest for freedom leads to his demise, his story takes a surprising turn.

"May all demons bow before the immortal divine cult. Welcome back, third young master!"

Reborn into the despised role of the Demonic Cult's third young master, Hajin faces a daunting challenge. The epic saga unfolds as Hajin Chun, the Orthodox Murim's ultimate secret weapon, sets out to conquer the treacherous realm of the Demonic Murim.

basic_info.title: Kingdom
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: キングダム

content.synopsis:
In the midst of ancient China's tumultuous Warring States era, Xin and Piao, bonded like brothers, harbor grand aspirations of rising from their humble beginnings as orphaned slaves to claim the title of Great Generals. Their fate takes a dramatic turn when a nobleman offers Piao a chance to serve a crucial role in the royal palace of Qin. As their paths diverge, Xin and Piao pledge to one day stand as the most formidable generals of their time.

Tragedy strikes when a violent coup rocks the palace, leading Xin to a gravely wounded Piao, whose final words ignite a fire within Xin and propel him towards an unexpected encounter with Zheng Ying, the young prince destined to be the future king of Qin.

Initially at odds, Xin and Zheng forge an unlikely alliance, embarking on a treacherous journey fraught with challenges and warfare. While Zheng sets his sights on uniting the warring states under the Qin banner, Xin strives to ascend the ranks of the military hierarchy. Amidst a backdrop of relentless strategic warfare and political upheaval, both on the battlefield and within the palace walls, the duo pursue their audacious dreams that hold the power to reshape the course of history.

basic_info.title: Slam Dunk
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Team Sports
            
                Team Sports
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: SLAM DUNK

content.synopsis:
Hanamichi Sakuragi, a towering and spirited teen with fiery red hair and strength well beyond his age, aims to break his 50-rejection streak and find a girlfriend at Shohoku High. Despite his troublesome past, most students steer clear of him. As he starts school, he grumbles, "I hate basketball" and yearns for a girlfriend.

Haruko Akagi, unaware of Hanamichi's reputation, notices his height and boldly asks if he likes basketball. Caught off guard by a girl talking to him, he impulsively says yes. When Haruko challenges him to a dunk, Hanamichi, a basketball novice, leaps but crashes into the backboard. Impressed by his raw talent, Haruko informs the team captain. Suddenly, Hanamichi is thrust into a world of competition for a girl he hardly knows, where he learns that basketball holds more than he ever imagined.

basic_info.title:
Nanatsu no Taizai
The Seven Deadly Sins
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy

content.synopsis:
In a realm where injustice reigns, the Holy Knights of Britannia wield unmatched magic and strength to safeguard their land. Their prime targets? "The Seven Deadly Sins" - once revered as Britannia's mightiest Holy Knights, now branded as criminals. Accused of plotting against the Kingdom of Liones, they were defeated by their former comrades, yet whispers persist of their survival.

A decade later, the Holy Knights betray their oaths, seizing the throne and imprisoning the King of Liones. Seeking aid, Princess Elizabeth Liones embarks on a quest to locate the Seven Deadly Sins. Her path crosses with Meliodas, the Dragon's Sin of Wrath and ex-leader of the outcast knights, as she discovers his tavern. Together, they journey to reunite Meliodas with his former allies. Will their quest lead to salvation or downfall in a world veiled by uncertainty?

In the shadows of the Imperial court, Minister Honest manipulates the unsuspecting young Emperor with his twisted morals, plunging the capital city into a cesspool of crime and corruption. The privileged few reign supreme, while the downtrodden suffer under their tyranny.

Enter Night Raid, a clandestine branch of the Revolutionary Army, determined to overthrow this oppressive regime. Their weapon of choice? Assassination. Led by a small but fierce team of killers, they strike fear into the hearts of the Empire's enablers and perpetrators.

Tatsumi, a village boy armed with a sword and a heart full of hope, arrives in the capital seeking to save his people. But the city's brutality shatters his innocence, igniting a fire of vengeance within him. Drawn to Night Raid's mission, Tatsumi joins their ranks, setting off on a perilous quest to bring down Minister Honest and his reign of terror.

As Tatsumi navigates the treacherous waters of conflicting ideologies and moral dilemmas, he learns the harsh truths of life and death. Each kill, each sacrifice, brings him closer to his goal of a just world, where humanity reigns once more.

Iori Kitahara embarks on his college journey in the vibrant seaside town of Izu, where he joins his uncle's scuba diving shop, Grand Blue. Envisioning a life of fun and friendship, he is instead swept into a wild escapade by a group of boisterous upperclassmen, leading to unexpected antics and bonding over drinks. His cousin, Chisa Kotegawa, catches him in a compromising situation, causing tension. Undeterred, Iori remains determined to craft his ideal college experience. Will his aspirations sink or swim in the unpredictable tides of university life?

basic_info.title: Dorohedoro
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ドロヘドロ

content.synopsis:
In the heart of the desolate and chaotic district known as Hole, where the powerful prey on the vulnerable and death is a common sight, the name itself speaks volumes. This lawless realm, devoid of morals, serves as a battleground for the dominant magic wielders. Viewing the Hole denizens as nothing more than insignificant beings, these magic users show no mercy, leaving a trail of bodies in the decrepit halls of Hole's hospital.

Amongst the magic users' reign of terror, there is one figure who stands defiant. Caiman, bearing a reptilian visage, relentlessly pursues them in search of answers, armed only with his trusted bayonets and an immunity to magic. Plagued by his cursed appearance and haunting nightmares, Caiman sees the magic users as his only hope for a return to normalcy. Supported by his loyal companion Nikaidou, proprietress of the Hungry Bug restaurant, Caiman navigates the treacherous landscape of Hole.

Immersed in a dark and brutal world of infernal design, "Dorohedoro" skillfully blends humor and darkness, offering a gripping saga that delves into the lives of Hole's inhabitants. With unexpected twists and a cast of unforgettable characters, this tale unveils a realm of unearthly origins and grim aesthetics, not for the faint of heart.

In the world of Noragami, the minor deity Delivery God Yato navigates a tough path as he takes on odd jobs for a mere five yen, dreaming of owning his shrine one day. His journey takes a twist when his loyal weapon partner resigns, leaving Yato weaponless and in a bind. Determined to find a new companion, Yato immerses himself in more tasks, hoping for a stroke of luck.

During a fateful encounter while searching for a missing cat, Yato faces a life-threatening situation that brings him into the orbit of Hiyori Iki. In a selfless act, Hiyori saves Yato but ends up in a peculiar predicament—her soul becomes detached from her body. Motivated to right this wrong, Yato vows to assist Hiyori in exchange for his token five yen fee. To fulfill this promise, he recruits the troubled spirit Yukine as his new Shinki.

As their paths intertwine, Noragami delves into the tale of a girl straddling two worlds and a wandering deity's relentless pursuit for a place to belong.

basic_info.title: Blue Lock
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Sports
            
                Sports

content.synopsis:
In a daring move to elevate Japanese soccer to new heights, the Japanese Football Association enlists the services of the mysterious and unconventional coach Jinpachi Ego in their quest for World Cup victory. Identifying a crucial missing element in Japan's striker lineup – a fierce and goal-hungry ego – Jinpachi launches the Blue Lock initiative. This experimental program confines three hundred promising high school strikers from across Japan in a competitive showdown to unearth the ultimate striker for the national team. The stakes are high: triumph means a shot at glory, while defeat spells a lifetime ban from the national squad.

Among the contenders is Yoichi Isagi, a talented striker haunted by past regrets of not seizing the spotlight during a critical match. Fueled by a burning ambition to prove himself and driven by the desire to rewrite his soccer legacy, Yoichi seizes the chance offered by the Blue Lock Project. With his eyes set on becoming a legendary striker and leading Japan to World Cup triumph, Yoichi dives headfirst into the intense and cutthroat competition of Blue Lock, determined to silence his doubts and etch his name in soccer history.

basic_info.title: Ao Haru Ride
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Blue Spring Ride, Aoharaido, Strobe Edge, Sono Omokage wo Shitteru

content.synopsis:
In a world where popularity reigns supreme, Futaba Yoshioka goes against the norm. Tired of being shunned by her female peers due to her past popularity with boys, she enters high school determined to shed her old image. Embracing an unfeminine persona and indifference towards boys, she finds solace in newfound "friends."

But just as she settles into her new identity, her world is upended by the unexpected return of her first love, Kou Mabuchi. Though memories of their past bond tug at her heart, she faces a stark reality: the gentle boy she once knew has transformed into a distant and cynical figure. While acknowledging their shared history, Kou cautions Futaba that time has changed them irreversibly.

In the poignant tale of "Ao Haru Ride," Futaba navigates the complexities of love and friendship while grappling with her evolving sense of self, determined to find authenticity amidst shifting relationships.

In the glitzy world of showbiz, sixteen-year-old Ai Hoshino shines as a beloved idol, embodying the essence of purity and youth. However, beneath the surface lies a tale of unexpected twists.

When countryside gynecologist Gorou Amemiya, a devoted fan of Ai, encounters the pregnant idol at his hospital, his world is thrown into disarray. Promising her a safe delivery, he could never anticipate the mysterious turn of events that would lead to his apparent demise.

Yet, awakening in the arms of his idol, Gorou discovers a miraculous rebirth as Aquamarine Hoshino—Ai's newborn son. As he navigates this surreal transformation, Gorou delves into a cutthroat industry where talent alone does not guarantee success. Can he safeguard the precious smile of the idol he adores, aided by an unconventional and enigmatic ally?

basic_info.title: Fire Punch
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ファイアパンチ

content.synopsis:
In a world gripped by ice and snow, humanity teeters on the edge of ruin under the shadow of the mysterious Ice Witch. Amidst the chaos and cruelty that the cold has stirred within people, cults rise and violence reigns, with the Blessed—individuals gifted with extraordinary powers—bearing the brunt of persecution.

Orphaned Blessed siblings, Agni and Luna, find solace in each other as they navigate life within a community of elders, seeking comfort amidst the unforgiving elements. Their fragile peace shatters when the ruthless army commander Doma razes their village, leaving Agni's sister among the ruins. Agni, gifted with unparalleled regenerative abilities, is condemned to endure unending agony as Doma's flames refuse to relinquish their grip.

Enduring years of torment, Agni's pain molds into an unquenchable thirst for vengeance against Doma, whose actions tore Luna away from him. With steely resolve, Agni embarks on a treacherous journey through the icy wasteland, fueled by the burning desire to avenge his sister and bring justice to those who have wronged him.

basic_info.title: Soul Eater
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy

content.synopsis:
In Death City lies the Death Weapon Meister Academy, founded by the formidable Shinigami, the grim reaper. Tasked with upholding peace, the academy molds Meisters and Demon Weapons—individuals who can transform into weapons—to safeguard humanity against malevolence. A Meister's ultimate aspiration is to craft a "Death Scythe" deemed worthy by Shinigami, achieved by their weapon partner devouring the souls of 99 malevolent humans and one witch.

Among the aspiring students are Maka Albarn and her partner Soul Eater "Soul" Evans, determined to forge a Death Scythe. They are accompanied by the spirited Black☆Star and his partner Tsubaki Nakatsukasa, along with the meticulous Death the Kid—known simply as Kid—and his partners, the twins Patricia "Patty" and Elizabeth "Liz" Thompson. Together, these ambitious students navigate a path towards mastery as a Meister and Demon Weapon duo, braving escapades, missions, and arduous trials.

Yet, veiled in enigma, a shroud of mysteries envelops them. With new adversaries emerging and secrets unfurling, Maka, Soul, and their comrades find themselves entangled in a battle to safeguard the academy, Death City, and the very world itself from foes more sinister than mere mortals.

basic_info.title: Dr. Stone
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dr. Stone: Terraforming, Dr. Stone: 4D Science

content.synopsis:
When a mysterious light blankets Earth, humanity is frozen in time, turned to stone. Millennia later, lush forests now stand where proud cities once thrived. Among the first to break free is Taiju Ooki, awakening to find his friend Senkuu, a brilliant scientist, ready to unravel the mystery. While Taiju seeks to rescue his beloved, Senkuu is determined to uncover the truth and restore the world.

Their quest leads them to release the formidable Tsukasa Shishiou, hoping for an ally in this strange new world. Yet, Tsukasa has his own agenda. He envisions a fresh start, free from the shackles of technology's corruption. As tensions rise, Senkuu's passion for science clashes with Tsukasa's primal instincts, setting the stage for an epic confrontation that will shape the fate of all.

basic_info.title:
Nisekoi
Nisekoi: False Love
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ニセコイ

content.synopsis:
As a child, Raku Ichijou pledged to marry his childhood friend if they ever crossed paths again. A decade later, the memory has dimmed, but a locked pendant symbolizes their promise, its key in her possession. While navigating high school life and harboring feelings for Kosaki Onodera, Raku is entangled in the yakuza's legacy. When the American Bee Hive gang threatens, he feigns affection for Chitoge Kirisaki, the rival leader's daughter. Forced proximity breeds contempt, yet they must feign love to avert conflict.
