Meanwhile, Raku's quest for the pendant's key grows complex as more girls linked to its past enter his world. Follow Raku's journey as he balances a facade relationship, mediates family feuds, and seeks the key to unlock his heart's true desire.

basic_info.title: Deadman Wonderland
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    High Stakes Game
            
                High Stakes Game,                    Survival
            
                Survival
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: デッドマン・ワンダーランド

content.synopsis:
Following a devastating earthquake that ravaged Tokyo, the infamous Deadman Wonderland emerges from the ruins as a prison unlike any other. Disguised as a theme park, it lures prisoners from across Japan to serve as attractions, concealing sinister secrets behind its façade.

Caught in the web of intrigue is Ganta Igarashi, a regular middle schooler whose life takes a nightmarish turn when a masked figure known as the Red Man slaughters his classmates, framing him for the massacre. Unjustly condemned, Ganta finds himself incarcerated in Deadman Wonderland, where survival hinges on participating in macabre "games."

As Ganta navigates this twisted reality, he encounters Shiro, a mysterious figure from his past with ties to the Red Man. With his fate hanging by a thread, Ganta must uncover the truth behind the horrors of Deadman Wonderland and confront the dark forces at play.

basic_info.title:
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 6: Stone Ocean
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 6: Stone Ocean
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 ストーンオーシャン

content.synopsis:
In Florida, 2011, Jolyne Kuujou finds herself trapped in a jail cell, mirroring her father Joutarou's past. Unjustly accused and manipulated into a prolonged sentence at Green Dolphin Street Jail, Jolyne seems destined for a grim fate. Yet, a mysterious gift from Joutarou unlocks her hidden powers, unleashing her Stand, Stone Free. Empowered to shape her own destiny, Jolyne embarks on a quest to break free from the stone ocean's grasp.

As she delves deeper, Jolyne uncovers a larger conspiracy targeting her family with far-reaching implications. The orchestrator lurks within the prison, shielded by a group of formidable Stand users. Forming unexpected alliances, Jolyne sets out to thwart their scheme, clear her name, and reclaim her freedom.

basic_info.title: Claymore
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: CLAYMORE

content.synopsis:
In the midst of the Middle Ages, humanity teeters on the edge of fear and death, haunted by the ominous presence of the "Yoma" – monstrous creatures driven by an unquenchable thirst for human flesh and the ability to steal memories. Living in constant dread, people struggle to trust even their own kin.

Enter the enigmatic "Claymore" – a secretive group also known as The Organization – their only defense against the Yoma threat. Comprised of half-human, half-Yoma female warriors, they undertake perilous missions to cleanse villages of these malevolent beasts. Death lurks at every turn for these warriors, caught in a relentless battle to retain their humanity amidst their monstrous lineage.

Amidst this turmoil, we follow the resolute Clare, a modest member of the Claymore ranks, on her quest for retribution. Her journey unveils a tapestry of unexpected revelations, from the bonds of sisterhood among her fellow warriors to the unsettling truths concealed within the very foundation of the Claymore Organization.

basic_info.title:
Haikyuu!!
Haikyu!!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Sports
            
                Sports
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: High Kyuu!!, HQ!!, Nisekyuu!!

content.synopsis:
As the whistle blows and the ball soars, the world of volleyball unfolds before us. Two teams clash across a net akin to a fortress wall.

Witness the awe-inspiring "Little Giant," a mere 170 centimeters tall, defying all odds as Shouyou Hinata gazes in admiration at this ace soaring like a crow. Determined to emulate this legend, Hinata forms a team in his final year of junior high, venturing into his first tournament. However, their dreams are shattered by the powerhouse Kitagawa Daiichi, led by the formidable "King of the Court," Tobio Kageyama.

Seeking redemption at Karasuno High, Hinata's plans are thwarted when he discovers Kageyama as a teammate. Now, he must navigate the challenges of teamwork and rivalry, striving to ascend the ranks of high school volleyball, just like his idol, the Little Giant.

In a thrilling one-shot tale in Volume 14: Nisekyuu!!, the journey of triumph and teamwork continues.

basic_info.title: Black Clover
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ブラッククローバー

content.synopsis:
In a realm where magic flows freely, Asta, a spirited orphan devoid of any magical ability, harbors a fervent desire to claim the prestigious title of Wizard King in the Clover Kingdom. His childhood friend and rival, the gifted wind mage Yuno, shares the same lofty goal. Despite Asta's lack of magic, he tenaciously hones his physical prowess each day, yearning to bridge the vast gap that separates him from Yuno.

Upon reaching the age of 15 in the Clover Kingdom, individuals are granted their Grimoires, empowering them to unleash their magical potential. At the pivotal ceremony, Yuno is graced with a legendary four-leaf clover Grimoire, symbolizing unparalleled strength, while Asta remains dishearteningly empty-handed. When Yuno is ambushed by a rogue mage intent on stealing his prized possession, Asta, despite his inferiority, rises to the challenge with unwavering determination. In a twist of fate, Asta defies the odds and is rewarded with a rare black five-leaf clover Grimoire, setting the stage for an extraordinary journey ahead.

basic_info.title:
Uzumaki
Uzumaki: Spiral into Horror
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Spiral

content.synopsis:
In the town of Kurouzu-cho, Kirie Goshima leads a seemingly ordinary life with her family. During a stroll to the train station to meet her boyfriend, Shuuichi Saito, she witnesses his father fixated on a snail shell in an alley. Brushing it off, she shares the odd encounter with Shuuichi, only to learn that his father's behavior has taken a disturbing turn. Shuuichi confides in Kirie about his growing urge to flee the town, convinced that Kurouzu-cho is plagued by spirals.

As his father's spiral obsession escalates, it sets off a series of chilling and inexplicable events, plunging the town into a maddening descent into chaos.

Takemichi Hanagaki hits rock bottom in life, only to discover that his ex-girlfriend, Hinata Tachibana, fell victim to the Tokyo Manji Gang, a ruthless criminal organization wreaking havoc in society. Transported 12 years into the past, back when he dated Hinata, Takemichi seizes the opportunity to alter destiny. Determined to prevent Hinata's murder, he embarks on a mission to infiltrate the Tokyo Manji Gang, maneuvering up its ranks to reshape the future and rescue his lost love.

basic_info.title: Gantz
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gantz/Osaka

content.synopsis:
Lonely high school student Kei Kurono drifts away from society due to his deepening disillusionment with humanity's dark side. A dramatic twist occurs when his classmate, Masaru Katou, heroically plunges onto subway tracks to save a stranger, prompting Kei to follow suit. In a tragic turn of events, both boys meet their demise under the train's wheels.

Suddenly awakening in an unfamiliar apartment alongside Katou, they are surrounded by other deceased individuals and a mysterious black orb known as "Gantz." This enigmatic sphere issues a chilling directive to eliminate a strange alien entity. Equipped with advanced suits and weapons, Kei and his newfound companions embark on a perilous mission.

As the stakes grow deadlier, Kei distinguishes himself through survival amidst the chaos. The survivors are transported back to the apartment, where Gantz assigns them point values based on their combat performance. Despite his demise earlier, Kei is granted a second chance at life with a catch – he must be on standby for Gantz's unpredictable summons to undertake further assassination tasks.

While Katou grapples with the looming dread of Gantz's beckoning, Kei embraces his newfound purpose, thriving in the intense battles and forming bonds with his comrades. However, the line between the extraterrestrial threats in Gantz and the dangers encroaching upon his ordinary existence blurs, propelling Kei into a turbulent journey of self-discovery and survival.

basic_info.title:
Komi-san wa, Comyushou desu.
Komi Can't Communicate
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Komi-san wa, Communication Shougai desu.

content.synopsis:
On her first day at the esteemed Itan Private High School, Shouko Komi becomes an instant celebrity, known as the school's Madonna for her striking beauty and elegant demeanor. Yet, beneath her popularity lies a challenging truth—Shouko struggles profoundly with interpersonal communication.

Enter Hitohito Tadano, an ordinary high school student who lives by the mantra of avoiding trouble by reading the room. However, his world is turned upside down when he unwittingly becomes the class pariah by sitting next to Shouko. A chance encounter leaves Hitohito privy to Shouko's hidden struggle as she inadvertently reveals her vulnerability with a soft "meow."

Realizing Shouko's deep-seated difficulty in connecting with others, Hitohito embarks on a mission to assist her in a remarkable quest—to forge one hundred friendships and conquer her communication barriers. In a heartwarming tale of empathy and friendship, Hitohito and Shouko navigate the complexities of high school life, striving to bridge the gap between isolation and understanding.

basic_info.title: Monster
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Adult Cast
            
                Adult Cast,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: MONSTER

content.synopsis:
Renowned Japanese neurosurgeon Kenzou Tenma finds himself at a crossroads in post-war Germany. Faced with the choice of saving orphan boy Johan Liebert or the mayor of Düsseldorf, he boldly risks everything to rescue Johan, forsaking the mayor to his fate.

Cast aside by hospital director Heinemann and abandoned by his fiancée Eva, Tenma's career crumbles. However, a twist of fate emerges when Heinemann is mysteriously killed, offering Tenma a shot at redemption.

Fast forward nine years, Tenma has risen to lead the surgical department, poised to take over as director. Yet, his newfound success unravels as a series of brutal murders grip Germany, all linked back to the very person he once saved—Johan, now revealed as a monstrous force haunting Tenma's past.

basic_info.title: Fairy Tail
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy

content.synopsis:
In the enchanting realm of Earth Land, magic weaves through daily life, shaping everything from travel to basic utilities. But with its immense power comes the looming threat of dark forces. To safeguard the delicate balance, the Kingdom of Fiore is home to magical guilds, where witches and wizards fulfill diverse job requests under the guidance of guild masters. Among these guilds, one reigns supreme in both strength and camaraderie: Fairy Tail.

Fiery and daring mage Natsu Dragneel, on a mission to reunite with his dragon mentor Igneel, crosses paths with celestial mage Lucy Heartfilia. As Lucy shares her dream of joining Fairy Tail, Natsu and his partner Happy rescue her from danger and welcome her into their guild. Joined by ice wizard Gray Fullbuster and the formidable Erza "Titania" Scarlet, Lucy embarks on thrilling escapades alongside her newfound companions, forging unbreakable bonds and facing formidable adversaries in their path.

basic_info.title:
Koe no Katachi
A Silent Voice

content.synopsis:
In the world of elementary school, Shouya Ishida's mischievous ways collide with the arrival of Shouko Nishimiya, a deaf transfer student. Despite Shouko's efforts to connect with her peers, she becomes the target of relentless teasing led by Shouya and his friends. Their innocent jests soon spiral into cruelty, with the teachers turning a blind eye to the escalating situation.

When Shouko leaves the school due to the relentless bullying, Shouya finds himself isolated and blamed by his classmates. Branded as the culprit, he faces the harsh consequences of his actions, enduring years of loneliness and alienation.

Fast forward to high school, a chance encounter reunites Shouya and Shouko after five long years. Haunted by his past, Shouya is determined to seek redemption and confront the shadows of his past, even if it means overcoming daunting obstacles along the way.

basic_info.title: 20th Century Boys
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 20 Seiki Shounen, Nijuu Seiki Shounen, Nijuusseiki Shounen, 20thCB

content.synopsis:
As the 20th century nears its close, a global unease grips the hearts of many, signaling ominous changes on the horizon.

Enter Kenji Endo, an ordinary manager of a convenience store, navigating the daily grind until a shocking tragedy shakes his world: the apparent suicide of his old friend, known as "Donkey." Simultaneously, a menacing cult led by the enigmatic "Friend" rises to infamy, sparking Kenji's intuition that something sinister looms. Armed with cryptic clues from his late friend, Kenji uncovers a chilling truth—the cult's sinister reach extends to him and his childhood companions, and their collective past holds the key to averting a cataclysmic threat looming over the entire globe.

Kenji's humdrum existence is thrust into chaos as he reunites with his childhood pals, embarking on a quest to unravel the tangled web connecting their history to the cult's machinations. With the impending century shift spelling potential doom, they must race against time to thwart a world-ending catastrophe only they can prevent.

basic_info.title:
Kaguya-sama wa Kokurasetai: Tensai-tachi no Renai Zunousen
Kaguya-sama: Love Is War
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kaguya Wants to be Confessed To: The Geniuses' War of Love and Brains

content.synopsis: Renowned for his top academic standing nationwide, Miyuki Shirogane takes charge as the esteemed Shuchiin Academy's student council president, collaborating with the elegant and affluent vice president, Kaguya Shinomiya. Despite their peers viewing them as the ideal duo, Miyuki and Kaguya harbor unspoken affections after spending countless moments together. Bound by their pride and status, they engage in a silent rivalry to coax a confession from one another without revealing vulnerability. As their playful interactions unfold, the battlefield of love ignites at Shuchiin Academy!

basic_info.title:
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 7: Steel Ball Run
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7: Steel Ball Run
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 7: Steel Ball Run, SBR

content.synopsis:
In the heart of the American Old West, a legendary competition is on the horizon. San Diego becomes the epicenter as a diverse crowd gathers for the monumental journey spanning over six thousand kilometers, all for a shot at the staggering fifty million dollar prize. As the traditional era of horseback racing fades, the rules allow for any mode of transport. Venturing through harsh terrains, traversing up to a hundred kilometers daily through uncharted lands, the Steel Ball Run promises unparalleled challenges and thrills.

Enter the spirited Johnny Joestar, once a renowned horse racer now confined by disability, drawn to witness the race's commencement. It is here that he crosses paths with Gyro Zeppeli, a peculiar contender bearing steel balls in lieu of a firearm. Witnessing Gyro's extraordinary abilities firsthand, Johnny is propelled into a chain of events where a mere touch of the steel ball grants him newfound strength, enabling him to rise on his feet after two long years. Driven by a newfound determination to unravel the enigma behind these steel balls, Johnny embarks on an extraordinary odyssey crisscrossing the vast expanse of America through the captivating Steel Ball Run.

basic_info.title: Hunter x Hunter
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: HxH

content.synopsis: Amid tales of secret treasure hoards and uncharted territories lies the allure of the unknown - a realm of mystique and magic that beckons the hearts of aspirants known as 'Hunters.' Enter Gon Freecss, driven by a quest to locate his estranged father, lost to the call of exploration. To achieve his goal, he must conquer the daunting Hunter Exam, a trial where the odds of success are a mere fraction. Alongside newfound companions like the enigmatic Killua, vengeance-fueled Kurapika, and aspiring doctor Leorio, Gon navigates a landscape teeming with adventure and danger. Embracing this world of possibilities, they set forth on a journey where the title of the greatest Hunter awaits those bold enough to seize it.

basic_info.title: Tokyo Ghoul:re
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Horror
            
                Horror
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tokyo Kushu:re, Toukyou Kuushu:re, Tokyo Ghoul: "Joker"

content.synopsis:
Two years have slipped by since the CCG's decisive strike on Anteiku. Tokyo now simmers with tension under the CCG's tightening grip, yet ghouls persist as a formidable threat, with the notorious Aogiri Tree faction showing strategic cunning in response to the CCG's escalating dominance.

Enter the Quinx Squad, a daring initiative by the CCG to combat the city's ghoul menace head-on. These hybrid operatives, surgically enhanced to wield ghoul powers, engage in high-stakes missions to eliminate the elusive predators. Leading the charge is Haise Sasaki, a unique blend of ghoul and human, mentored by the legendary investigator Kishou Arima. But beneath Sasaki's composed facade lurks a turbulent past, with fragments of forgotten memories surfacing to challenge his newfound identity.

In a world where alchemy reigns supreme, the daring Elric brothers, Edward and Alphonse, defy the forbidden by attempting the ultimate transgression: human transmutation. Their reckless act to revive their deceased mother costs them dearly - Edward loses his arm and leg, while Alphonse's entire body vanishes, his soul bound to a suit of armor. 

Driven by a desperate quest for redemption, the resilient siblings embark on a journey across the land in search of the elusive Philosopher's Stone. Little do they know that this pursuit will not only test their alchemical prowess but also unravel sinister truths far beyond their wildest nightmares.

basic_info.title: Spy x Family
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: SPY×FAMILY

content.synopsis:
Known as "Twilight," the skilled agent Loid Forger fearlessly tackles any mission in the name of peace in the nation of Westalis. Tasked with espionage duties, Twilight recruits the young orphan Anya to pose as his daughter, blending into the prestigious Eden Academy. To complete his facade, he partners with Yor Briar, an unsuspecting office worker who leads a double life as the deadly Thorn Princess. Their sham marriage serves as a perfect front for both their hidden professions.

Unbeknownst to Loid, Anya is not just an ordinary child; she possesses psychic abilities from secretive experiments, allowing her to delve into minds. Despite uncovering the true identities of her new parents, Anya gleefully keeps their espionage activities a secret, reveling in the excitement of having covert agents as guardians.

Operating under the guise of "The Forgers," this unconventional family must navigate their intertwined agendas while masquerading as a united front. As they juggle their deceitful roles, they discover that the essence of family transcends mere blood ties, teaching them valuable lessons about loyalty and connection.

basic_info.title:
Yakusoku no Neverland
The Promised Neverland
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 約束のネバーランド

content.synopsis:
In the idyllic Grace Field House, orphans like Emma and Norman thrive under the care of a loving "Mama" and a tight-knit group of peers. Their days are a blend of warmth and challenge, with tests to ace and outdoor play to enjoy. But a single rule governs their lives: never stray beyond the orphanage walls. 

When Emma and Norman dare to break this rule, they stumble upon a chilling truth that shatters their world. Armed with their sharp minds, the children must unite to defy their destiny and forge a new path forward.

basic_info.title: Vinland Saga
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama

content.synopsis:
In the world of 11th-century Europe, Thorfinn, the son of a legendary Viking warrior, stands out as a formidable fighter in the band of mercenaries led by the cunning Askeladd. Despite his young age, Thorfinn's unmatched skills on the battlefield are fueled not by a thirst for plunder, but by a deep-seated desire for vengeance. Having sworn to avenge a great tragedy inflicted upon his family by Askeladd, Thorfinn remains steadfast in his singular goal—to defeat his nemesis in an honorable duel.

As the mercenary crew navigates the war-torn lands among the bloodthirsty Danes, where violence is a way of life, a fateful turn of events unfolds. When Askeladd learns that the Danish prince Canute has been captured, he devises a daring scheme that has the potential to shape the future of England and forever change the destinies of Thorfinn, Canute, and himself.

In this brutal and unforgiving landscape, "Vinland Saga" paints a vivid and gripping tale of ambition, betrayal, and the unyielding pursuit of justice. For Thorfinn and his companions, life is a relentless cycle of conflict and chaos, where every battle won comes at a harrowing cost.

High school student Kyouko Hori is known for her kindness and academic excellence, but she keeps a hidden life at home, caring for her younger brother and managing household chores due to her parents' busy work schedules. On the other hand, Izumi Miyamura is perceived as a quiet otaku with glasses, yet harbors a gentle nature and struggles with academics. Unbeknownst to many, he sports nine hidden piercings and a concealed tattoo.

A chance encounter outside of school reveals a surprising twist as Hori and Miyamura discover each other's hidden personas. Despite their stark differences, they form an unlikely friendship, opening up to each other in ways they never have before.

basic_info.title: Bleach
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BLEACH

content.synopsis:
From his earliest memories, high school student Ichigo Kurosaki has possessed the unique gift of seeing spirits lingering in the realm beyond. Despite this extraordinary ability, Ichigo's life remains seemingly ordinary until the fateful day when he encounters a mysterious intruder in his room. This unexpected visitor introduces herself as Rukia Kuchiki, a Soul Reaper on a mission to guide departed souls to the afterlife.

Their meeting takes a perilous turn when a malevolent Hollow, a soul-devouring entity, launches a sudden attack. In a daring move to protect Ichigo, Rukia transfers her Soul Reaper powers to him, only to witness him unexpectedly absorb them entirely. Empowered with newfound abilities, Ichigo swiftly dispatches the menacing threat.

Now thrust into the role of a Soul Reaper, Ichigo must shoulder the responsibilities once borne by Rukia, confronting Hollows and safeguarding both the living and the deceased. With the support of his friends Orihime Inoue and Yasutora Sado, who also unveil their spiritual powers, Ichigo embarks on a journey where the implications of his newfound role unfold in ways he never foresaw.

basic_info.title: Death Note
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: DEATH NOTE

content.synopsis:
In the realm of humans, the god of death Ryuk tosses his Death Note into the mortal realm on a whim. Enter Japan, where the brilliant high school student Light Yagami chances upon this ominous notebook. Its deadly promise intrigues Light as he experiments with its power, watching as his written commands bring swift demise to criminals.

Embracing the alias "Kira," Light embarks on a dark mission to rid the world of corruption and mold a utopian society free of crime. But his vigilant pursuit of justice draws the attention of law enforcement, prompting the genius detective L to enter the fray.

Witness the electrifying showdown between Light and L as they wage a battle of wits with global consequences in Death Note.

basic_info.title: Vagabond
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: バガボンド

content.synopsis:
In 16th-century Japan, Shinmen Takezou is a rugged and untamed youth, feared and shunned by his village for his fierce demeanor. Alongside his loyal friend Matahachi Honiden, they escape the confines of their mundane existence to seek glory in the Toyotomi army. Their dreams are shattered when the Toyotomi fall to the Tokugawa Clan in a brutal defeat at the Battle of Sekigahara, leaving the friends on the brink of death.

Separated from his comrade, Shinmen returns home to deliver news of Matahachi's survival but is met with betrayal and false accusations, branded a criminal and sentenced to die for a crime he did not commit. Saved by the compassionate monk Takuan Soho, he is reborn as Musashi Miyamoto, a new identity to evade capture and embark on a journey of self-discovery.

"Vagabond" intricately weaves the tale of Musashi Miyamoto, a legendary swordsman striving for invincibility. From a solitary warrior fixated on power, he evolves into a wise fighter embracing camaraderie, introspection, and the essence of life itself.

basic_info.title: Naruto
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: NARUTO―ナルト―

content.synopsis: In the Village Hidden in the Leaves, Naruto Uzumaki dreams of becoming the Hokage, the most esteemed ninja leader. However, his aspirations are met with skepticism due to the demon sealed within him. Guided by mentor Kakashi Hatake and joined by teammates Sasuke Uchiha and Sakura Haruno in Team 7, Naruto embarks on a journey of growth. Through teamwork, training, and perilous missions, Naruto navigates the path to prove his worth as a ninja and earn the respect of his village.

basic_info.title:
Boku no Hero Academia
My Hero Academia
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Super Power
            
                Super Power
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 僕のヒーローアカデミア

content.synopsis: In a world where 80% of the population possesses unique powers called "quirks," young Izuku Midoriya faces a harsh truth: he is quirkless. Battling discrimination, Izuku clings to his dream of becoming a hero. His determination drives him to aim for UA High, the prestigious hero training academy. Fate intervenes when he crosses paths with his idol, the legendary hero All Might, who offers him a shot at greatness. Through intense training and unwavering resolve, Izuku inherits All Might's abilities. Armed with newfound power, he embarks on a challenging journey at UA High, striving to fulfill his destiny as the next symbol of peace.

basic_info.title: Jujutsu Kaisen
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sorcery Fight

content.synopsis:
In the midst of everyday life, an ancient feud persists. Curses, supernatural beasts that haunt mankind, lurk in the shadows while Jujutsu sorcerers, wielding mystical powers, stand as humanity's shield. When high schooler Yuuji Itadori stumbles upon the desiccated finger of the fearsome Curse Sukuna Ryoumen, his world is upended as he is thrust into this violent conflict.

In a bid to defend himself from a malevolent Curse drawn to the finger's dark energy, Yuuji brashly absorbs its power, gaining strength to combat Curses but also setting free the vengeful Sukuna. Despite containing Sukuna within himself, Yuuji is branded a perilous Curse by the Jujutsu community, marked for extermination.

As Yuuji faces his fate of execution, he encounters Satoru Gojou, a mentor from Jujutsu High School, who reveals a risky alternative. Given Yuuji's unique link to Sukuna, his demise would obliterate the demon as well. To achieve this, Yuuji must consume all of Sukuna's remaining fragments, ensuring the demon's eradication upon his own death. Embracing this opportunity to safeguard the world and extend his own life, Yuuji enrolls in Tokyo Prefectural Jujutsu High School, plunging into a brutal and unforgiving battleground.

basic_info.title:
Kimetsu no Yaiba
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Blade of Demon Destruction

content.synopsis:
In a remote mountain dwelling, Tanjirou Kamado shoulders the burden of caring for his impoverished family following his father's passing. One fateful winter evening, while venturing to the nearby village to sell charcoal, he finds himself in the eerie abode of a mysterious man. Warned about bloodthirsty demons lurking in the night, Tanjirou learns of their insatiable hunger for human flesh.

Upon returning home, Tanjirou is met with a devastating sight - his kin mercilessly slaughtered, save for his sister Nezuko, now transformed into a demon herself. Fueled by grief and determination, Tanjirou vows to protect Nezuko from her monstrous instincts, embarking on a quest for vengeance and a means to restore his sister's humanity.

basic_info.title:
Oyasumi Punpun
Goodnight Punpun
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: おやすみプンプン

content.synopsis: In Japan, 11-year-old Punpun Onodera leads a seemingly ordinary life until he crosses paths with Aiko Tanaka, the new girl in his class. Their encounter marks the beginning of a shift towards adulthood for the idealistic and romantic Punpun. As he navigates the complexities of relationships, Punpun finds himself grappling with unforeseen challenges and growing pains. With each hurdle he faces, Punpun's quiet nature evolves into a self-imposed isolation, deepening his internal struggles. This poignant coming-of-age tale delves into the shadows of maturity as Punpun confronts the harsh realities of life, painting a compelling portrait of his journey towards adulthood.

basic_info.title:
One Punch-Man
One-Punch Man
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Onepunchman, Onepanman, OPM

content.synopsis:
After intense training for three years, the unassuming Saitama unleashes unparalleled strength, capable of vanquishing any foe with a single blow. Eager to make a difference, he embarks on a heroic journey. Yet, the ease with which he dispatches villains leaves him yearning for a worthy adversary to reignite his passion for heroism.

Enter Genos, a determined cyborg awestruck by Saitama's formidable abilities, who seeks to learn from the master. Unrecognized and overlooked by society for lacking affiliation with the Hero Association, Saitama devises a plan to elevate his status. He offers to mentor Genos in exchange for joining forces, setting their sights on proving themselves as true heroes by challenging formidable foes and earning the respect they deserve.

basic_info.title: Tokyo Ghoul
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Horror
            
                Horror
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Toukyou Kushu

content.synopsis:
In the dark alleys of Tokyo lurk terrifying creatures called ghouls, preying on humans under the cover of night. To combat this threat, the Commission of Counter Ghoul (CCG) stands against these monsters. But the real challenge lies in spotting ghouls who blend in seamlessly with society. When unsuspecting university student Ken Kaneki's date reveals herself as a ghoul and attacks him, his life takes a drastic turn.

Left teetering between two worlds, Kaneki awakens in a hospital to discover he's now a half-ghoul due to a life-saving surgery. With an insatiable hunger for human flesh, he seeks refuge with compassionate ghouls running a coffee shop. As he adapts to his new reality, Kaneki is thrust into a conflict between his newfound allies and the relentless CCG. Little does he realize, his existence has ignited a war among ghouls across Tokyo, putting him at the epicenter of a dangerous struggle.

basic_info.title: One Piece
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ONE PIECE

content.synopsis:
In a world where the legend of Gol D. Roger, known as the King of the Pirates, looms large, a pivotal moment unfolds as the World Government prepares to execute him. In his final moments, Roger reveals the existence of a legendary treasure, One Piece, hidden somewhere in the treacherous waters of the Grand Line. With his parting words, he ignites a spark that ushers in the era of the Great Age of Pirates.

Fast forward twenty-two years, a spirited young man named Monkey D. Luffy emerges, determined to follow in Roger's footsteps and claim the title of the new King of the Pirates. Armed with nothing but a straw hat, a humble boat, and a body with elastic capabilities, Luffy embarks on an exhilarating quest. His mission: to assemble a formidable crew and secure a ship capable of navigating the perils of the Grand Line in pursuit of the ultimate prize, One Piece. Join Luffy on his epic voyage as he sets sail to conquer the high seas and carve his name into pirate lore.

basic_info.title: Chainsaw Man
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    Urban Fantasy
            
                Urban Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: チェンソーマン

content.synopsis:
Denji yearns for a carefree life filled with love and laughter, a stark contrast to his harsh reality. Entrapped by the yakuza, he is coerced into exterminating devils to settle his insurmountable debts. Armed with his loyal devil companion, Pochita, he dives into the dangerous world of devil slaying for a meager income.

Tragically betrayed and slain by a devil under the yakuza's command, Denji's fate takes a bizarre twist as Pochita fuses with his lifeless body, transforming him into the formidable Chainsaw Devil. With the ability to morph his limbs into lethal chainsaws, a resurrected Denji embarks on a ruthless quest for vengeance, capturing the attention of elite devil hunters from the Public Safety Bureau.

Offered a role among their ranks, Denji seizes the chance to realize his modest desires with newfound strength. Determined and unstoppable, he sets out to conquer his adversaries and grasp his adolescent aspirations, no matter the cost.

basic_info.title:
Shingeki no Kyojin
Attack on Titan
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama

content.synopsis:
Centuries ago, humanity faced a dire threat in the form of the Titans, monstrous beings resembling humans with an insatiable hunger for mankind. To survive, humans retreated behind colossal walls, their last bastion of safety. 

In the present, within the confines of these walls, peace reigns as Titans remain a distant memory. Young dreamers Eren Yeager, Mikasa Ackerman, and Armin Arlert yearn for adventure beyond the barriers, fueled by tales of the world outside. 

However, their peaceful existence shatters when a colossal Titan breaches the defenses, plunging them into chaos. Witnessing the devastation, Eren vows to obliterate every Titan, envisioning a future where humanity can roam free without fear.

basic_info.title: Berserk
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Horror
            
                Horror
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Berserk: The Prototype

content.synopsis:
In the realm of vengeance and turmoil, Guts, once a mercenary but now known as the Black Swordsman, embarks on a relentless journey for retribution. His trust shattered by a betrayal that robs him of all he holds dear, Guts is thrust into a harrowing fate of being hunted by demons. With his colossal sword and unmatched strength, he forges ahead on a dark path, unwavering even in the face of death itself. His sole purpose: to claim the life of the one who stripped him and his beloved of their very essence.

Also featuring the standalone tale: Volume 14: Berserk: The Prototype

basic_info.title: Pick Me Up
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Pick Me Up!, Infinite Gacha

content.synopsis:
In a renowned mobile gacha game known for its brutal challenges, the world's 5th-ranked master, Loki, suddenly blacks out during a dungeon raid.

Upon regaining consciousness, Loki finds himself transformed into a humble level 1, 1-star hero named Han Yslat. To escape this virtual realm and return to Earth, he must guide a group of novice masters and heroes through the treacherous 100th dungeon floor. Determined and unyielding, Loki vows to show that he's not one to be trifled with in this tale of unwavering resilience and masterful leadership.

basic_info.title: Maybe Meant to Be
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Eojjeoda Boni Cheonsaeng Yeonbun, Match Made in Heaven By Chance

content.synopsis: Han Jia, a 32-year-old freelancer facing parental pressure to settle down, crosses paths with her childhood friend Jin Mincheol, who is also grappling with similar issues. In a moment of spontaneity, Jia suggests they tie the knot, surprising even herself when Mincheol agrees. Despite their quirky personalities leading to frequent clashes, the duo embarks on a unique journey as a married couple. Through their disagreements and discoveries, they gradually unravel the depths of their bond, realizing that perhaps destiny has brought them together.

basic_info.title: The Player Who Can't Level Up
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Player That Can't Level Up, Level Up Mothaneun Player

content.synopsis: Kim Kigyu thought his troubles were behind him when he was invited to join as a unique-ability player. Yet, despite his best efforts, he remains stuck at level 1. Working as a guide for five years, he uncovers his power to connect with "Egos" and boost his stats. With this newfound ability, Kigyu delves into uncharted gates, seizing the opportunity to challenge norms and prove that one's rank does not define their worth.

basic_info.title: Doctor Elise: The Royal Lady with the Lamp
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Oegwauisa Elise, Doctor Elise: Queen with a Scalpel

content.synopsis:
Renowned as a prodigious Korean surgeon, Dr. Song Jihyun is celebrated for her exceptional ability to heal patients regardless of their ailments. Once the ill-tempered Empress Elise de Clorance, her past marred by envy and avarice resulted in tragic losses and her untimely demise. Driven by remorse, she now dedicates herself to preserving life rather than perpetuating ruin.

Following a devastating plane crash, Elise awakens in her former imperial guise, armed with contemporary medical knowledge and a chance for redemption. Resolved to serve the empire as a healer, she faces a dilemma when confronted with an impending betrothal to her beloved Prince Linden de Romanoff—whose love once led her to tragedy. Will Elise succeed in evading a fate she once met with her own downfall?

basic_info.title: Immortal Regis
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 불멸의 레지스

content.synopsis: In a fateful night when the moon glows unusually bright, a boy encounters Serin, a mysterious being from the realm of Chaos. His life takes a dark turn as he is reborn as an immortal undead, bound by an ancient decree that severs his ties with humanity. Forced to navigate this newfound existence, he embarks on a journey back to Chaos, setting the stage for a thrilling saga of revelations and a fresh chapter of adventures.

basic_info.title: The Return of the Disaster-Class Hero
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Resurrection of the Catastrophic Hero, Jaeang-geup Yeongung-nim-i Gwihwan Hasyeotda

content.synopsis: In a world plagued by mysterious "calamities," the zodiac gods select 12 humans, known as saints, to combat these destructive beings. Among them rises Geon Lee, the unchosen hero, betrayed and left for dead by his allies. Now, two decades later, he emerges stronger than ever, seeking to impart a unforgettable lesson to his former comrades.

basic_info.title: Revenge of the Baskerville Bloodhound
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Revenge of the Iron-Blooded Sword Hound, Revenge of the Sword Clan's Hound, Cheolhyeol Geomga Sanyanggae-ui Hoegwi

content.synopsis: In a world where the Baskerville children are bred to be lethal assassins, Bikir, the outcast son, meets a tragic end at the hands of his father. Reborn with a new opportunity, Bikir is determined to break free from his family's dark legacy. With his past life's wisdom, he vows to seek vengeance and defy his upbringing. Now, Bikir is poised to turn the tables and strike back against those who once controlled him.

basic_info.title: Nineteen, Twenty-One
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 19-21, Nineteen, Twenty One

content.synopsis: In the heart of Yun-lee lies a deep emotional wound, a gaping hole where two vital years of her existence once thrived - the tender stretch between 19 and 21, now lost to her. Despite the haunting void that plagues her, she perseveres, navigating the corridors of a preparatory school in a fervent race against time. One fateful day, as she ventures out to tend to stray cats, she crosses paths with a young man who holds what she yearns for - the elusive essence of those stolen years between 19 and 21. A tale originally spun as a webcomic, now immortalized in print.

basic_info.title: Lout of Count's Family
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Trash of the Count's Family, Baekjakga-ui Mangnani-ga Doeeotda

content.synopsis:
In the heart of Birth of a Hero lies Choi Han, a kind soul who endures a tragic loss, plunging him into the depths of despair. Fuelled by a thirst for vengeance, he sets off from his humble abode to a neighboring city. There, a chance encounter unfolds as he confronts a bothersome drunken noble, a seemingly inconsequential event in the making of a hero.

Meanwhile, Kim Roksu finds himself rudely awakened in the shoes of Cale Henituse, the very noble fated to clash with Choi Han. Unwilling to follow the scripted path, Roksu is determined to chart his own destiny of tranquility. Armed with insights from a past life and the riches of his present one, he delves into ancient magic to shield himself from the impending clash with the protagonist.

As Cale yearns for a life devoid of turmoil, the ripple of his decisions threatens to steer both him and the narrative toward uncharted territory, where the line between fate and free will blurs.

basic_info.title: Unholy Blood
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: White Blood

content.synopsis:
A decade ago, the world was forever altered by the sudden emergence of vampires—creatures of immense power and insatiable bloodlust. Indistinguishable from humans, these beings ruthlessly prey on innocent lives to satisfy their own dark desires.

Orphan Park Hayan longs for a simple existence, yearning to shield her siblings from harm and forge connections as a college student. However, as vampire attacks surge, she is gripped by the fear of her world crumbling under the weight of haunting memories.

When a tragic incident marks her as a target for the "Angels of Death," a clandestine group led by the most formidable vampires, Hayan resolves to confront her past. Teaming up with Euntae Hwang, a mysterious police officer with hidden depths, she embarks on a mission to vanquish every vampire and reclaim her future.

basic_info.title: My Blasted Reincarnated Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Damn Reincarnation, Bireomeogeul Hwansaeng

content.synopsis:
In the midst of his quest to vanquish the Demon Kings, the valiant warrior, Hamel, meets an unexpected fate just before the climactic battle. 

A sudden cry echoes through the air, followed by a profanity-laden exclamation. 

Reborn into a new life as Vermouth's descendant, Hamel now known as Eugene Lionheart inherits the formidable lineage of the Great Vermouth. 

Reflecting on his past prowess, Eugene acknowledges a stark contrast in his newfound abilities. With innate talents far surpassing his prior self, he embarks on a journey of unparalleled growth. 

Navigating an unfamiliar world where demons dwell, Eugene grapples with the unsettling reality of his reincarnation. As he contemplates his altered beliefs, Eugene embraces his exceptional gifts and sets forth on a path shrouded in uncertainty, carrying on the legacy of his former existence.

basic_info.title: Second Life Ranker
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dubeon Saneun Ranker

content.synopsis: Yeonwoo's world shatters when he discovers his long-lost brother's tragic fate. Armed with a mysterious pocket watch, Yeonwoo uncovers the dark truth behind his brother's demise in the treacherous Tower of the Sun God. Now known as Cain, he embarks on a perilous journey to avenge his brother's betrayal. With his brother's secrets as his guide, Yeonwoo must conquer the tower, vanquishing enemies and obstacles to claim his rightful place at the pinnacle.

basic_info.title: The Remarried Empress
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jaehon Hwanghu

content.synopsis:
In the esteemed Eastern Nation, Empress Navier Ellie Trovi reigns with elegance and poise, a beacon of noble grace. Her marriage to Emperor Sovieshu may lack the passion of others, but their bond is fortified by years of camaraderie. However, when Sovieshu introduces Rashta, a former slave turned concubine, their tranquil existence shatters.

As time passes, Sovieshu stuns all by seeking a divorce to crown Rashta as the new empress. Unexpectedly, Navier reveals her plan to wed Heinrey, a man whose noble presence astonishes onlookers. Who is this enigmatic Heinrey, and how did Navier navigate this startling turn of events?

In the Eastern Nation, where love intertwines with deceit and intrigue, Navier's courageous stand sets the stage for a saga of secrets and passion that threatens to unravel the empire.

basic_info.title: The Swordmaster's Son
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Swordmaster's Youngest Son, The Youngest Son of a Master Swordsman, Geomsul Myeongga Mangnaeadeul

content.synopsis: Jin Runcandel, once destined to lead his swordmaster clan, faces banishment due to his poor swordsmanship. Through a pact with the god Solderet, he breaks free from a curse that once held him back. Despite a tragic demise, Jin is reborn as a baby, with a fresh start and newfound abilities. With a resolve to fulfill his fate, Jin embarks on a quest to master the sword and reclaim his rightful place.

basic_info.title: Your Throne
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Want to Be You, Just For A Day, Haruman Nega Doego Sipeo

content.synopsis:
Lady Medea Solon, a mastermind with a singular ambition – to claim the title of princess in the esteemed Vasilios Empire by marrying Crown Prince Eros Orna Vasilios. Her calculated plans crumble when the prince selects the innocent Psyche Callista as his bride-to-be instead of her. Determined to eliminate Psyche and secure her royal aspirations, Medea's scheme takes a fateful turn at the Yearly Prayer in the Temple.

Confronting Psyche, Medea is plunged into a mysterious fountain during a divine encounter, leading her to a transformative bargain with the gods. Swapping bodies with Psyche, Medea finds herself in an unexpected twist of fate that may uncover hidden truths beyond her wildest imaginings.

basic_info.title: Weak Hero
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yakhan Yeong-ung

content.synopsis:
In the halls of Eunjang High School, a culture of bullying grips the weak in a vice of fear, waiting for the next victim. Amidst this oppressive atmosphere, a freshman named Gray Yeon, known for his modest height of 157 cm, shatters expectations by fearlessly confronting a bully twice his size, leaving the class stunned by his unexpected strength.

Embracing his newfound reputation as Eunjang's White Mamba, Gray fearlessly takes on larger adversaries, showcasing his resilience and strategic prowess. Determined to break the cycle of torment, he faces off against formidable foes from neighboring schools, standing as a beacon of hope for the downtrodden.

basic_info.title: Doom Breaker
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: To a New Life, Tusin Jeonsaenggi, Reincarnation of the Suicidal Battle God

content.synopsis: In a forsaken world devoid of gods, Zephyr stands as humanity's final warrior against darkness. Death comes for him at the hand of Tartarus, the god of destruction, leaving despair in its wake. Yet, fate takes an unexpected turn as amused deities grant Zephyr a new life—a return to his days of enslavement, far removed from his former glory. Now, armed with a second chance, he seeks vengeance against Tartarus and strives to rescue his beloved. Will Zephyr alter the course of history, or is he condemned to relive his tragic past?

basic_info.title: The World After the Fall
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Myeolmang Ihu-ui Segye, The World After the End

content.synopsis: In the face of impending defeat and certain demise, one must decide between flight or standing firm in the battle for a world on the brink of doom. Across the globe, enigmatic towers materialize, unleashing creatures that prey on humanity. Enter the Tower Walkers, gifted adventurers tasked with combating these monstrous foes. Confronted with mortality, they face a critical decision: to wield a "regression stone" and journey back in time for a shot at redemption, forever altering their reality. Yet, amidst this turmoil, resolute Tower Walker Jaehwan defies this path, opting to defend the original timeline. In his courageous resistance, he unravels startling truths about the Tower, unveiling a web of secrets that challenge everything he knows.

basic_info.title: Return of the Blossoming Blade
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Return of the Mount Hua Sect, Return of the Flowery Mountain Sect, Hwasan Gwihwan

content.synopsis: Upon awakening a century into the future, Cheongmyeong of the Mount Hua Sect is haunted by memories of a brutal clash with the Leader of the Demonic Cult, the sinister Cheonma. This fierce battle nearly obliterated the legendary Ten Great Sects of ancient China, culminating in Cheongmyeong's decisive blow against Cheonma before meeting his own tragic end. Faced with sorrow over their costly triumph, Cheongmyeong is granted a miraculous second chance at life. Discovering his cherished Mount Hua Sect diminished in the modern era, he sets out on a quest to revive its former magnificence.

basic_info.title: Cheese in the Trap Season 1
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 치즈인더트랩 시즌1

content.synopsis: Back at college after a year-long hiatus, Hong Sul, a diligent achiever, unwittingly clashes with the seemingly flawless senior, Yu Jeong. As her fortunes plummet, Sul is convinced of Yu Jeong's involvement. Yet, a year later, his unexpected friendly demeanor raises perplexing questions about his motives.

basic_info.title: Viral Hit
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ssaumdokhak, How to Fight

content.synopsis:
Tormented by his classmate and popular Newtube personality Pakgo, Yoo Hobin endures relentless humiliation and abuse during his high school days. Adding to his woes, Hobin toils away at a part-time job to cover his mother's medical expenses. A chance mishap involving ramen, Pakgo's cameraman Woo "Jiksae" Jihyeok, and a gaming stream sets off a chain of events that leads Hobin to confront his tormentor in a clumsy brawl.

The following day, the fallout from their embarrassing scuffle is unveiled as footage of the fight surfaces on Newtube, quickly going viral and unexpectedly netting Hobin a substantial sum of ten million won in viewer earnings. Intrigued by the financial prospects Newtube streaming presents, Hobin teams up with the unlikely Jiksae to create more content featuring his altercations, delving into the competitive world of online streaming.

Challenging not only Pakgo but also other formidable adversaries, Hobin embarks on a journey to virtual stardom, pushing the boundaries of his newfound platform. As he navigates through fame and rivalry, Hobin must navigate the treacherous waters of online entertainment, where success and defeat loom on the horizon.

basic_info.title: Nano Machine
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 나노마신

content.synopsis: At Mashin Academy, the fusion of nanotechnology and martial arts sets the stage for a gripping tale. Despite his mother not being one of the High Priest's official wives, Yeo-un's lineage entitles him to vie for the coveted role of Minor Priest. As he faces off against formidable half-siblings, a mysterious nanomachine injection from a descendant of the future holds the key to his success. Will Yeo-un harness this unexpected advantage to triumph in the intense competition?

basic_info.title: Something About Us
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Woori, Our Relationship Is, Ulisaineueun

content.synopsis: In the town of Willow Creek, Lily and Rose are inseparable. While they believe in the strength of their friendship, rumors swirl around them. The mysterious bond between them raises eyebrows. The question lingers: what fate awaits this enigmatic duo?

basic_info.title: Eleceed
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 일렉시드

content.synopsis: In a world where kindness meets lightning reflexes, Jiwoo, a compassionate young man, uses his cat-like agility to anonymously aid those in need. Meanwhile, Kayden, a fugitive secret agent trapped in the corpulent form of a fluffy feline, joins forces with Jiwoo. With Jiwoo's extraordinary abilities and Kayden's intellect, they unite to combat the sinister powers threatening to engulf their world. But as they navigate their partnership, they must overcome their differences to achieve their shared mission of vanquishing evil forces.

basic_info.title: I'm the Max-Level Newbie
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Solo Max-Level Newbie, Na Honja Man-Level Newbie

content.synopsis: In a digital realm where Kang Jinhyeok reigns supreme as the master gamer of the "Tower of Trials," his virtual kingdom faces a looming threat as the game's popularity wanes. With his livelihood on the line, Jinhyeok contemplates bidding farewell to his loyal followers after 11 years of virtual conquests. However, fate takes a sudden turn when the Tower materializes in the real world, issuing a chilling ultimatum: humanity's survival hinges on conquering each level within 90 days. Armed with unparalleled expertise, Jinhyeok seizes the opportunity to showcase his prowess and lead the charge in this real-life battle for existence. Brace yourself for a riveting journey as this hardcore gamer rises to the challenge and sets out to save the world!

basic_info.title: Tomb Raider King
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dogul-wang

content.synopsis: In a world where God's Tombs have emerged globally, granting incredible powers to some and enslaving others, a legendary Tomb Raider known as the Tomb Raider King emerges. Fueled by the desire to plunder these coveted relics, he stops at nothing to seize them all. As he challenges those who stand in his way, his mantra echoes: "What you own belongs to me. What I own belongs to me." Join the resurrected Tomb Raider on his relentless quest to dominate all tombs and their treasures!

basic_info.title: Villains Are Destined to Die
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Death Is the Only Ending for the Villainess, Agyeok-ui Ending Jugeum-ppun

content.synopsis:
In the midst of the latest otome game craze, a regular university student delves into the virtual realm to uncover its allure. Swiftly conquering the normal mode, she empathizes with the game's misunderstood antagonist, Penelope Eckhart. Unveiling Penelope's fabricated identity as a stand-in for the missing duke's true heir, the student's confidence is shaken as she ventures into the daunting hard mode, leading to an unexpected collapse.

Upon awakening, a bewildering reality unfolds before her eyes - she has transmigrated into the very essence of Penelope herself! Thrust into a cutthroat realm where peril lurks at every turn, Penelope must navigate treacherous waters to avoid her tragic demise. Amidst a tapestry of intrigue involving a despotic prince, an enigmatic sorcerer, a noble scion of a fallen realm, and her conniving stepbrothers, whose favor will she ultimately secure in this high-stakes game of hearts?

basic_info.title: Teenage Mercenary
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mercenary Enrollment, High School Mercenary, Iphak Yongbyeong

content.synopsis: At the age of eight, Yu Ijin miraculously survived a blazing plane crash in a distant land, emerging as the lone survivor. Forced by circumstance, he transformed into a feared mercenary, refining his combat skills to match that of a lethal predator. A decade later, upon encountering military personnel, Ijin returns to his homeland, only to face a fresh challenge—embracing the ordinary life of a high school student. As he navigates treacherous bullies and forges new bonds, each encounter is a novel experience for Ijin. Yet, as his dark history resurfaces, Ijin must draw upon his battlefield expertise to safeguard those dear to him.

basic_info.title: The Greatest Estate Developer
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The World's Best Engineer, The Greatest Estate Designer, Yeokdaegeup Yeongji Seolgyesa

content.synopsis:
In the world of the Fronteras, Lloyd Frontera is known as the epitome of shame. Neglecting his family's fortune through drink and intimidation, he steers them towards ruin. Meanwhile, Javier Asrahan, the family's knight, aims to carve his name as a swordmaster, watching as the Fronteras' legacy crumbles under debt.

Unexpectedly thrust into Lloyd's shoes, Kim Suho, once a humble engineering student in Korea, now embodies the ungrateful rogue at the heart of Javier's tale. Faced with a dire fate, Suho grapples with his newfound persona, guided by a mysterious status window that sheds light on his predicament.

Determined to rewrite Lloyd's narrative and secure a prosperous future, Suho leverages his engineering prowess and magical talents to revolutionize the medieval realm. Introducing modern marvels and urban advancements, he uplifts the populace and redefines the course of destiny—all while eyeing a lucrative reward.

basic_info.title: Why Raeliana Ended Up at the Duke's Mansion

content.synopsis:
When Park Eunha meets her demise in contemporary Korea, she finds herself reborn as Raeliana McMillan, the firstborn of a wealthy baron in an extraordinary world identical to a novel she once devoured. Though adored by her family, Raeliana is no fairy tale princess but a pawn in a sinister plot, destined to be murdered by her fiancé, triggering a chain of events.

Determined to rewrite her destiny, Raeliana targets the powerful vieux riche protagonist, Duke Noah Volstaire Wynknight. Armed with foreknowledge, she strikes a deal with Noah to alter the course of the original narrative. However, the Duke's duplicitous nature threatens to derail her meticulous plans.

basic_info.title: The Legend of the Northern Blade
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bukgeom Jeongi

content.synopsis: For ages, the courageous fighters of the Northern Heavenly Sect have battled against the malevolent Silent Night to safeguard the world. However, when the fourth generation leader is accused of treason, he sacrifices himself to protect his son, Moowon, by disbanding the sect. Left alone and under constant surveillance, Moowon's world changes with a sudden attack from the Silent Night, offering him a chance to flee to the mountains. There, he hones his skills in the ancient fighting arts of his ancestors. But a mysterious disappearance draws him back to the mainland, propelling him on a quest for vengeance against those responsible for his father's demise and the impending threat of darkness looming over the world. Join Moowon on his journey to confront the forces of evil and uphold his family's legacy!

basic_info.title: Orange Marmalade
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 오렌지 마말레이드

content.synopsis: In a world where vampires dwell in secrecy, shunned by society despite a centuries-old peace treaty, "Orange Marmalade" follows the tumultuous journey of Baek Ma Ri. As a young vampire facing relentless prejudice, she yearns for acceptance and a place to call home. Cynical about love and friendship, Ma Ri's life takes a compelling turn when she encounters Jung Jae Min, whose blood awakens uncharted desires within her. Struggling to navigate the aftermath of their fateful meeting, Ma Ri finds herself entangled in a complex web of emotions as Jae Min unexpectedly falls for her.

basic_info.title: SSS-Class Revival Hunter
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: SSS-Class Suicide Hunter, SSS-geup Jugeoya Saneun Hunter

content.synopsis:
When the Tower mysteriously materializes, it becomes a haven for individuals driven by personal values, earning the moniker "hunters." Among them is Kim Gong-Ja, an underpowered F-Class hunter harboring envy towards the skilled elite. Seized by jealousy, Gong-Ja is granted an extraordinary S-Class skill: the ability to replicate others' skills upon their demise.

In a twist of fate, Gong-Ja confronts the renowned Flame Emperor, unveiling a dark reality about his idol. Empowered with a skill enabling him to rewind time by 24 hours, Gong-Ja plots to journey back 11 years, eradicating the Flame Emperor and claiming the title of the world's greatest hunter.

basic_info.title: The Boxer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 더 복서

content.synopsis:
Enduring relentless bullying that has left him emotionally detached, 17-year-old Yu struggles to connect with the world around him. Despite his uncanny ability to evade physical harm, Yu passively endures the torment inflicted upon him, resigned to his bleak existence.

A glimmer of hope appears when Yu crosses paths with a seasoned boxing coach known as "K," renowned for nurturing champions. Sensing Yu's extraordinary fighting prowess, K extends a guiding hand, undeterred by Yu's initial indifference.

A pivotal moment from his past reignites a spark within Yu, prompting him to embrace K's mentorship in pursuit of rediscovering a lost sense of purpose. Thrust into a realm teeming with formidable foes of both noble and malevolent nature, Yu is compelled to confront his inner turmoil and fight for his newfound identity.

basic_info.title: A Returner's Magic Should Be Special

content.synopsis: In the heart of the "shadow labyrinth," a world teetering on the edge of ruin emerges from a decade-long brutal conflict. Desir Herrman, among the dwindling band of skilled magicians, faces a daunting adversary threatening to obliterate humanity. But just as despair looms large, a twist of fate transports him back to his fledgling days at the renowned Hebrion Academy of magic! Gifted with a rare opportunity to rewrite history, Desir vows to rescue not only himself but also the allies he once mourned. Can his newfound foresight alter their grim fates, or are they destined to replay their harrowing past? A gripping tale adapted from the acclaimed novel.

basic_info.title: Who Made Me a Princess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Eoneu Nal Gongjuga Doeeo Beoryeotda, Suddenly Became A Princess One Day

content.synopsis:
In the captivating tale of The Lovely Princess, Athanasia de Alger Obelia stands out as the most tragic figure. Born into a world where parental love is a distant dream, she meets a cruel fate orchestrated by her own father, Emperor Claude.

A modern-day Korean woman mysteriously finds herself in Athanasia's infant form after taking sleeping pills. Determined to avoid her father's wrath, she strategizes to win his affection. However, her plans unravel when she crosses paths with Emperor Claude at a young age, forcing her to adapt and win his heart to secure her future.

Amidst a web of ambitions and secrets, Athanasia faces challenges from her "sister" Jennette Margarita, power-hungry nobles, and a looming threat from Claude's past that could shatter his world. Will Athanasia navigate these treacherous waters and carve a place for herself in a world where love and power collide?

Haruka Sakura has a clear goal: he seeks out only the strongest individuals and steers clear of the weak. Upon enrolling at Furin High School, infamous for its fierce students, he encounters a community defined by their unrivaled prowess in combat, dedicated to safeguarding their town from harm. Uninterested in heroics or camaraderie, Haruka's sole focus is on ascending to the pinnacle through relentless battles.

basic_info.title: Lookism
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 외모지상주의

content.synopsis:
Park Hyung Suk has always been the target of bullies, enduring years of torment due to his appearance. Tired of the constant ridicule, he makes a bold move to escape his tormentor, Lee Tae Sung, by transferring to Jae Won High School in Seoul. Known for its unique education system and laid-back students, it seems like the perfect fresh start.

However, a bizarre twist awaits Hyung Suk just before his transfer - he wakes up to discover he has transformed into his ideal self overnight. Gone is the short, overweight figure he's always known, replaced by a tall, attractive version of himself. The catch? He now switches between his original body and this new, perfect one every time he falls asleep.

Caught between two vastly different identities, Hyung Suk must navigate his newfound popularity at J High while unraveling the mystery behind his sudden transformation into a near-perfect version of himself.

basic_info.title: Annarasumanara
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Sound of Magic

content.synopsis:
Rumors swirl around a mysterious magician residing in a tent near the deserted theme park, with whispers of his extraordinary powers. Every performance begins with a simple question: "Do you believe in magic?" Yoon Ah-ee, burdened by the weight of poverty and responsibility for her sister, has long forsaken the enchantment of magic, much like her pragmatic classmate Na Il-Deung, who values education above all else.

A fateful encounter at the abandoned theme park leads Ah-ee to the enigmatic magician, Annarasumanara, altering the course of her life. In this captivating tale, Annarasumanara weaves a poignant narrative exploring the essence of self-discovery and the journey towards embracing one's true identity.

basic_info.title: Girls of the Wild's
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Harem
            
                Harem,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Shoujo the Wild's

content.synopsis:
At the prestigious Wild's Private High School, renowned for shaping exceptional martial artists, the stage is set for the intense Wild's League tournament where only the fiercest prevail. At the pinnacle stands the reigning champion, "Queen," a skilled S-Class fighter named Yoon In Gyi, feared for her mastery of diverse combat styles.

When Wild's High deviates from its long-standing all-female tradition, one unlikely male contender emerges: Song Jae Gu, a disadvantaged underdog granted a rare scholarship. Encountering the spirited taekwondo specialist Choi Dal Dal, the lively boxer Lee Moon Young, and the formidable Queen herself, Jae Gu faces a daunting challenge to survive in this perilous arena of combat.

basic_info.title: The God of High School
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    Urban Fantasy
            
                Urban Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 갓 오브 하이스쿨

content.synopsis:
In the heart of the thrilling "God of High School" competition, Korean high schoolers battle fiercely to claim the title of the ultimate fighter. All martial arts and weapons are fair game, with the coveted prize being the fulfillment of the victor's deepest wish, no matter the sacrifice.

Jin Mo-Ri, proficient in taekwondo through his grandfather's teachings, hungers for formidable challengers, driving him to join the high-stakes tournament. Along his journey, he crosses paths with Han Dae-Wi, a karate virtuoso set on winning to save his ailing friend, and Yu Mi-Ra, a swordswoman with a legacy to uphold.

As Jin Mo-Ri and his companions plunge into the intense competition, what unseen trials await them? Will they have the mettle to confront the unforeseen challenges that lie ahead?

basic_info.title: Sweet Home
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 스위트 홈

content.synopsis:
Cha Hyun, a secluded high school student immersed in video games, faces a life-altering tragedy when he loses his entire family in a devastating car crash. Forced to abandon his carefree existence, he moves into a new apartment alone. However, his bothersome neighbors and financial struggles pale in comparison to the sudden monstrous transformation of those around him, triggering an apocalyptic nightmare.

As Hyun finds himself slowly morphing into a creature, an ominous voice in his mind grows louder. Racing against time, he teams up with fellow residents to unravel the origins of the catastrophic epidemic and navigate this bleak reality. Amidst the chaos, Hyun battles to preserve his humanity while fighting for survival in a world on the brink of collapse.

basic_info.title: The Breaker: New Waves
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Breaker 2, The Breaker: NW, The Breaker: Part 2, The Breaker: Martial Arts City

content.synopsis:
After Yi "Shioon" Shi-Woon's master, Goomoonryong, shatters his ki-center, rendering him powerless in the realm of martial arts, Shioon seeks solace in the ordinary routine of school and home with his mother. Yet, Murim, the hidden world of warriors, has plans of its own.

Recognized as Goomoonryong's sole heir and bestowed with the Phoenix Medallion of the Sunwoo Clan by Lady Sosul, thrusting him into the role of the Sunwoo Clan's temporary leader, Shioon finds himself ensnared in Murim's intricate web. New adversaries, including the enigmatic Soldiers Under Command, emerge to challenge him, driven by their own ambitions. As they close in to eliminate him, Shioon grapples with the daunting task of defending himself without his ki-center.

basic_info.title: The Horizon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 수평선

content.synopsis: In a war-torn world, a young boy traverses a desolate road following his mother's passing. Amidst military tanks and ruins, he embarks on a solemn journey, his spirit weighed down by sorrow. One fateful day, he encounters a girl in an abandoned bus, just before chaos erupts around them. Seeking refuge in a forgotten lane, the duo forges an unlikely bond as they commit to walking together towards an uncertain future. In the remnants of devastation, a spark of hope flickers in their weary souls.

basic_info.title: Noblesse
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 노블레스

content.synopsis:
In a forgotten structure in South Korea rests a mysterious white coffin, the vessel for the awakening of Cadis Etrama Di Raizel, known as Rai—a man of unparalleled beauty, grace, and nobility. Emerging into an unfamiliar era, Rai seeks solace in his trusted ally, Frankenstein. To navigate the complexities of the present, Rai dons the modern attire of Ye Ran High School, where he discovers that the school's principal is none other than his devoted servant, Frankenstein.

After centuries of slumber, Rai leans on Frankenstein to guide him through the nuances of contemporary life, leading to his enrollment as a student to immerse himself in the ways of the world. Yet, their efforts are thwarted by the challenges of the modern age and the shadows of their tumultuous history. Faced with unforeseen obstacles, Rai must harness his enigmatic powers to shield those he cherishes from impending danger.

basic_info.title: Omniscient Reader's Viewpoint
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jeonji-jeok Dokja Sijeom

content.synopsis: Kim Dokja lives a life where he's not the hero, but a solitary soul engrossed in web novels. Following "Three Ways to Survive the Apocalypse," he delves into the trials faced by Yoo Joonghyuk, the novel's protagonist. After devouring over 3,000 chapters while others lose interest, Dokja accepts the story's end. But a mysterious message from the author thrusts him into a dark reality where fiction turns real. Armed with future knowledge, Dokja navigates a world where survival is uncertain. Will he seize the chance to rewrite his role from passive observer to active hero?

basic_info.title: Bastard
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
