                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hulejasig

content.synopsis: Seon Jin is trapped in a world devoid of solace. Bullied mercilessly at school for his quiet demeanor and frail appearance, his true terror lies closer to home - his own father. Despite the facade of a successful businessman and caring parent, Jin's father is a twisted serial killer, with Jin unknowingly aiding his gruesome deeds. When his father sets his sights on the new transfer student, Yoon Kyun, Jin faces a harrowing choice: betray her to save himself, or defy his malevolent parent at the risk of his own life.

basic_info.title: The Breaker
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 브레이커

content.synopsis:
Yi "Shioon" Shi-Woon's daily routine at Nine Dragons High School includes enduring beatings from the school bully, Ho Chang, and his gang—a far cry from an ideal life. But everything changes when a mysterious figure, Han Chun Woo, witnesses one of these brutal assaults. Instead of extending a supportive hand, Chun Woo ridicules Shioon for not fighting back, deepening the wounds of humiliation. To Shioon's astonishment, he soon discovers that Chun Woo is his new substitute English teacher.

Fed up with the relentless torment, Shioon makes a bold decision to join a martial arts academy to equip himself with self-defense skills. On his way there, he chances upon Chun Woo in a dire situation—surrounded by a hostile group in a dark alley! In a surprising turn of events, Chun Woo swiftly incapacitates the aggressors using his martial arts prowess, a spectacle secretly captured by Shioon. Seizing this opportunity, Shioon uses the footage to manipulate Chun Woo into becoming his martial arts mentor. Reluctantly, Chun Woo agrees, plunging Shioon into the enigmatic realm of Murim, a world of martial arts. However, Shioon remains oblivious to his mentor's dubious history and the hidden depths of society. As Shioon navigates this unfamiliar territory, how will Chun Woo guide him and safeguard his survival in the complex world of Murim?

basic_info.title: Tower of God
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sin-ui Tap

content.synopsis:
Alone his whole life, Twenty-Fifth Bam's world changes when he meets Rachel. But Rachel's ambition to climb the Tower leads her to vanish, leaving Bam determined to follow her. The Tower unveils its perilous nature, with ancient mysteries, monstrous foes, and treacherous individuals lurking within its walls.

Challenged by each floor's Administrator, Bam discovers he is an ''Irregular''—a rare individual who entered the Tower on his own accord. Despite this revelation, he forges ahead, facing Headon, the Administrator of the first floor. The Tower promises fulfillment of all desires—be it riches, power, fame, or a reunion with Rachel—at its peak.

basic_info.title: Solo Leveling
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Na Honjaman Level Up, I Level Up Alone

content.synopsis:
A decade ago, the mysterious "Gate" emerged, bridging our reality with a world of magic and malevolence. In response, everyday individuals were bestowed with extraordinary abilities and dubbed "Hunters." Among them is Sung Jin-Woo, a 20-year-old labeled the "World's Weakest" due to his feeble power as an E-Rank Hunter. Despite this, he relentlessly battles monsters in lesser Gates to cover his mother's medical expenses. 

Jin-Woo's desolate existence takes a drastic turn when, after a mission gone awry, he awakens in a hospital to find a peculiar floating screen—the "Quest Log." Tasked with completing a grueling training regimen or facing dire consequences, Jin-Woo is initially hesitant. Yet, as he delves into the challenge, he realizes that it might just propel him to become one of the most formidable Hunters worldwide.

basic_info.title:
Gakkougurashi!
School-Live!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense

content.synopsis:
Within the walls of Megurigaoka Private High School lies the second home of Yuki Takeya and the dedicated School Living Club. Their sole purpose: to embrace independence and immerse themselves in the vibrant school life around them. With Yuuri Wakasa's poise, Kurumi Ebisuzawa's reliability, Yuki Takeya's enthusiasm, and their mentor Megumi Sakura's guidance, the club appears to have everything in order—on the surface.

Yet, the reality of living at school presents its own set of obstacles. To navigate their journey to graduation and beyond, the members of the School Living Club must confront daily challenges while cherishing each moment within the school's walls.

basic_info.title: Hinamatsuri
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hina Festival

content.synopsis:
Yoshifumi Nitta, a mid-level yakuza member, has his world turned upside down by a mysterious capsule crashing into his head. What he thinks is a bizarre dream becomes reality when he discovers the capsule has left behind a young girl named Hina. With psychokinetic powers, Hina manipulates Yoshifumi into catering to her whims for clothes and toys. Reluctantly, Yoshifumi becomes her guardian as he navigates the challenges of balancing his yakuza career with caring for Hina. 

Their unconventional journey unfolds as Hina's powers propel Yoshifumi up the yakuza hierarchy. In "Hinamatsuri," the odd pair's dynamic is at the core of the story, with Hina's mischievous adventures roping in a mix of new companions and old connections. As Yoshifumi strives to keep Hina's abilities under wraps while managing the yakuza affairs, their bond is tested in a blend of humor and chaos.

basic_info.title:
Ashita no Joe
Ashita no Joe: Fighting for Tomorrow

content.synopsis:
Joe Yabuki's turbulent upbringing in orphanages and on the mean streets of San'ya has hardened him, making him distrustful and quick to fight. Living a delinquent life, he relies on his fists to survive.

When washed-up boxing coach Danpei Tange recognizes Joe's raw fighting talent, he takes the wild teen under his wing. Despite their explosive dynamic, they form a deep bond, united in caring for other homeless kids in San'ya.

Despite Joe's run-ins with the law due to his violent tendencies, he finds himself in jail where he encounters old friends and foes, including skilled boxer Tooru Rikiishi. Though repeatedly bested by Rikiishi's refined technique, Joe eventually earns his respect with a decisive victory, setting the stage for a future professional showdown.

Embracing boxing as his newfound purpose, Joe navigates the challenging world of amateur and pro boxing in Japan. Along the way, he grapples with loss and injury, realizing that his all-consuming passion for the sport may define his very existence.

basic_info.title: Hiyokoi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ひよ恋

content.synopsis: Fifteen-year-old Hiyori Nishiyama's life takes a sudden turn when a fateful accident lands her in the hospital, her bones fractured and growth stunted. Despite her recovery, her shy demeanor keeps her away from school. A year later, she musters the courage to return, only to face an unexpected encounter with the lively Yuushin Hirose. His teasing leaves her flustered, but his friendly presence begins to ease her social anxieties. With Yuushin by her side, Hiyori sets out to conquer her fears and forge new friendships.

basic_info.title:
Fuufu Ijou, Koibito Miman.
More Than a Married Couple, but Not Lovers
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Polygon
            
                Love Polygon,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 夫婦以上、恋人未満。

content.synopsis: Forced to participate in the "Couple Practical" course, high school senior Jirou finds himself living with a gal named Akari. The twist? They must pose as a married couple to secure their desired romantic partners. Will this unusual arrangement lead to unexpected sparks flying between them?

basic_info.title:
Bishoujo Senshi Sailor Moon
Sailor Moon

content.synopsis:
"In the name of the moon, I shall punish you!"

Meet Usagi Tsukino, a lively 14-year-old student at Juuban Municipal Junior High School. With a penchant for gaming over studying, she's notorious for her lackluster grades and quick temper. Branded a troublemaker and crybaby, Usagi's life takes a dramatic turn when she encounters Luna, a mysterious black cat.

Bestowed with a magical brooch by Luna, Usagi transforms into the valiant Sailor Moon, defender of justice! Tasked with safeguarding Earth from dark forces, she embarks on a quest to locate a missing princess and the coveted Mystical Silver Crystal. As she navigates this new destiny, Usagi crosses paths with the enigmatic Tuxedo Mask, gains new allies, and embraces the weight of responsibility in this iconic tale of magic and heroism.

basic_info.title:
Yamada-kun to Lv999 no Koi wo Suru
My Love Story with Yamada-kun at Lv999
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Lv999 Love for Yamada-kun, Loving Yamada at Lv999

content.synopsis:
When Akane Kinoshita's gamer boyfriend strays with a virtual flame, she discovers that online romances can sting just like real-life ones. Fueled by fury, she unleashes her wrath on in-game foes, crossing paths with Akito Yamada, a guildmate sporting an afro and Noh mask.

Yamada's aloof demeanor doesn't scream "dream guy" to Akane. Yet, beneath his impressive gaming prowess lies a novice in love. As unlikely connections bloom, can Akane penetrate Yamada's heart - a fortress akin to a high school final boss?

basic_info.title: Black Lagoon
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Adult Cast
            
                Adult Cast,                    Military
            
                Military,                    Organized Crime
            
                Organized Crime
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ブラックラグーン

content.synopsis:
Synopsis Rewrite:
Rokuro Okajima, a typical Japanese salaryman leading a mundane existence, has his life turned upside down when he gets abducted by the Black Lagoon crew. Plunged into a perilous realm of renegade heroes, ruthless foes, and intense shootouts, Rokuro's fate hangs in the balance. Uncertainty looms over his destination, but one thing remains clear—his journey promises a thrilling adventure beyond imagination.

basic_info.title:
Boku no Kokoro no Yabai Yatsu
The Dangers in My Heart
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 僕の心のヤバイやつ

content.synopsis: Kyoutaro Ichikawa may seem like an ordinary middle school student, but deep down, he harbors dark thoughts of murder. His target? Someone who is always nearby. While engrossed in reading at the school library, he unexpectedly crosses paths with Yamada, who sneaks in to indulge in her favorite candies. Ichikawa soon learns of Yamada's quirky nature and finds himself drawn to her, offering silent support. In return, Yamada playfully teases Ichikawa, enjoying his flustered reactions. As their daily encounters unfold, their distant connection blossoms beyond mere library acquaintances. Could it be that Ichikawa's sinister fantasies are transforming into something entirely unexpected?

basic_info.title:
Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui!
No Matter How I Look at It, It's You Guys' Fault I'm Not Popular!

content.synopsis:
Witness the misadventures of Tomoko Kuroki, the epitome of uncool. Struggling with her lack of charm and social grace, she immerses herself in video games to escape reality. Yet beneath it all, Tomoko yearns for popularity like no other. Determined and delusional, she concocts schemes that she believes will elevate her status. From mimicking beloved anime characters to splurging on pricey undergarments, Tomoko navigates the precarious path to social acceptance.

Embark on a journey of cringe-worthy comedy and endearing awkwardness in Watashi ga Motenai no wa Dou Kangaetemo Omaera ga Warui! as Tomoko battles her daily demons of social anxiety with a touch of humor and heart.

basic_info.title: Choujin X
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Superhuman X

content.synopsis:
High school slacker Tokio Kurohara may not take his studies seriously, but when it comes to standing up against injustice in his town, he joins forces with his capable childhood friend, Azuma Higashi. While Azuma effortlessly handles the local troublemakers they face, both friends steer clear of Choujins—supernatural beings with formidable powers.

However, a vengeful adversary forces Tokio and Azuma into a corner, leading them to take a risky step by transforming themselves into Choujins using a mysterious drug. While Azuma remains unchanged, Tokio finds himself with a surprising transformation—a beak.

Struggling to conceal his new identity, Tokio must navigate a world where their actions have consequences, and some individuals are determined to expose their secret use of the Choujin drug. As tensions rise, Tokio and Azuma must confront the repercussions of their choices while facing threats from both enemies and the shadows of their own past.

basic_info.title: Devilman
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Devilman: The Classic Collection

content.synopsis:
Soft-hearted Akira Fudou, known for his gentle nature, discovers a startling truth from his childhood friend, Ryou Asuka. Ryou unveils a chilling revelation about Akira's father's research: demons are real and are plotting to seize control of the earth once more.

Determined to aid in humanity's defense, Akira agrees to join the infamous Black Sabbath, a gathering steeped in darkness and vice, in a risky bid to fuse with a demon. Through a harrowing ordeal, he merges with Amon, a feared demon even among its kin, leading to the birth of Devilman—a fusion of Amon's might and Akira's unblemished soul.

Empowered by Amon, Akira embarks on a crusade against the demonic forces, using his newfound abilities to thwart the impending collapse of human civilization.

basic_info.title: Planetes
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Adult Cast
            
                Adult Cast,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    Space
            
                Space,                    Workplace
            
                Workplace
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: プラネテス ΠΛΑΝΗΤΕΣ

content.synopsis: Yuri, still haunted by a tragic space flight incident that took his wife's life, now works alongside an eclectic team on the spacecraft Toy Box. Together with Hachimaki, a skilled debris-man who navigates the celestial seas with ease, Fee, a tough and alluring chain-smoker, and Pops, a seasoned orbital mechanic, they clear space junk to ensure safe space travel. Join them on their mission as they navigate both the dangers of outer space and their own personal struggles.

basic_info.title: Angel Densetsu
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Delinquents
            
                Delinquents,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Legend of Angel

content.synopsis:
At Hekikuu High, the mere mention of Seiichirou Kitano strikes fear into every student's heart. His intimidating appearance and ruthless reputation have earned him the title of the school's new guardian after defeating the top thug in a single day. However, behind the menacing facade lies a kind-hearted boy misunderstood for his demonic features.

Despite his best intentions, Seiichirou's acts of compassion often backfire, perpetuating the false image of him as a merciless figure. As he navigates through misinterpreted gestures and misconceptions, he yearns for acceptance and friendship beyond the tales of his fearsome persona. Will he ever shed his demonic mask and reveal the angel within?

basic_info.title:
Übel Blatt
Ubel Blatt
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Evil Blade

content.synopsis:
When Wischtech threatened to invade the fiefs of Szaalanden, the Emperor called upon fourteen youths. Among them, the Seven Heroes rose to defend the land, ushering in an era of peace, while the four Lances of Betrayal were thought to be vanquished.

Now, twenty years later, the Lances of Betrayal resurface, rallying as bandits near the border fief of Gormbark. A mysterious figure with a black sword and a scar across his left eye emerges, swiftly eliminating a militia group. Known as Kóinzell, he strikes both fear and hope into the hearts of those he encounters, his true past and intentions shrouded in enigma as he journeys on.

basic_info.title:
Ookami Shoujo to Kuro Ouji
Wolf Girl and Black Prince
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Junketsu Lullaby, Pierrot ja Nee yo, Kamatte-chan de Gomenasai!!, Kimi wo Suki ni Natta Riyuu, The Reason I Love You, Wolf Girl & Black Prince

content.synopsis:
Erika Shinohara firmly believes that the first two months of high school determine one's destiny. In her quest for belonging, she befriends Marin Tachibana and Aki Tezuka, who are fixated on their boyfriends. Feeling left out, Erika fabricates a boyfriend by snapping a not-so-sneaky photo of a random guy on the street, only to discover he is Kyouya Sata, a popular student. Desperate to keep up the charade, Erika confesses her predicament to Kyouya.

To her surprise, Kyouya agrees to play along but with an unexpected demand: she must obey his whims like a dog. As Erika navigates this strange relationship, she grapples with the consequences of her lies. Will she unravel under the weight of deception, or will Kyouya reveal a side beyond his facade?

Additional one-shot volumes include "Junketsu Lullaby," "Pierrot ja Nee yo," "Kamatte-chan de Gomenasai!!," and "Kimi wo Suki ni Natta Riyuu (The Reason I Love You)."

Love is anything but simple—it's a complex, frustrating, and often baffling emotion that resonates deeply with many high school students. In the bustling halls of Fujisaki High School, love weaves its intricate web, touching the lives of childhood friends, tsunderes, classmates, delinquents, and even student council presidents. Amidst this diverse tapestry of emotions, unlikely pairs find themselves entangled in the delicate dance of romance, concealing their true feelings and struggling to utter those three daunting words: "I love you."

Within the heartwarming chaos of Tsurezure Children, we witness the myriad tales of love-struck duos navigating the highs and lows of teenage romance. From the nerve-wracking confession of feelings to the comical mishaps of a first kiss, this series illuminates the joys and tribulations of young love with heartfelt sincerity.

basic_info.title:
Hoshi no Samidare
Lucifer and the Biscuit Hammer
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Wakusei no Samidare, Lucifer and Biscuit Hammer, Lucifer BH

content.synopsis:
College student Yuuhi Amamiya's ordinary day takes a wild turn when a talking lizard named Sir Noi Crezant appears out of the blue. Crezant reveals a mind-blowing tale: the Earth faces imminent destruction by the mighty mage Animus and his ominous Biscuit Hammer hovering menacingly in orbit. The fate of the planet rests on the shoulders of the princess and her loyal Beast Knights, tasked with thwarting Animus's diabolical plan.

Yuuhi finds himself unexpectedly chosen as the Lizard Beast Knight, reluctantly stepping into a dangerous world where he must fend off impending threats against Earth.

In the opulent slums of a wealthy town, Rudo and his foster father Regto navigate a delicate existence among the town's affluent populace. Rudo, deeply resentful of the upper class's extravagance, forges his own path by scavenging through the town's refuse in defiance of the ominous "Abyss"—a chasm where society discards its unwanted, even people like his late biological father, accused of a crime he didn't commit.

Tragedy strikes when Rudo returns home to a grievously injured Regto, only to be wrongfully accused of his foster father's murder. Cast into the treacherous depths of the Abyss, Rudo discovers a nightmarish realm teeming with monstrous entities crafted from discarded remnants.

Facing imminent peril, Rudo is rescued by Enjin, a mysterious figure wielding extraordinary weapons known as Vital Instruments. Reluctantly embracing the role of a "Cleaner," Rudo joins Enjin to battle the grotesque denizens of the Abyss and pursue justice for Regto's untimely demise.

basic_info.title:
NHK ni Youkoso!
Welcome to the N.H.K.
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Welcome to the NHK!

content.synopsis: Meet Tatsuhiro Satou, a 22-year-old recluse trapped in a cycle of unemployment and hallucinatory escapades. Convinced of a shadowy organization's grip on his fate, he dives deep into conspiracy theories, notably the Nihon Hikikomori Kyoukai (NHK). Determined to break free from this insular existence, Tatsuhiro sets out to confront NHK. Yet, as he grapples with the simplest social interactions, his aspirations seem bleak. Enter the enigmatic Misaki Nakahara, offering a lifeline for change. Can she guide Tatsuhiro towards a new dawn, or is his transformation just a mirage in the making?

basic_info.title: Love So Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: LOVE SO LIFE

content.synopsis: In "Love So Life," meet Shiharu Nakamura, a high school girl with a heart for kids, residing in an orphanage with big dreams of operating a daycare. Her path crosses with the adorable twins, Akane and Aoi Matsunaga, at the nursery school where she works part-time. When the twins resist going home with their uncle Seiji Matsunaga and dash towards Shiharu instead, a surprising bond forms. Seiji, struck by the twins' connection to Shiharu, urgently seeks her babysitting services, offering double her current daycare wage. With the opportunity to cover her living costs and pursue her dream, Shiharu dives into this new chapter, embracing the love and growth that unfold within this unconventional family dynamic. Join Shiharu and the twins as they navigate the simple joys and challenges of everyday life in "Love So Life."

basic_info.title:
Watashi ni xx Shinasai!
Missions of Love

content.synopsis:
Unbeknownst to her peers, Yukina Himuro leads a double life as the renowned cell phone novelist Yupina. Despite her classmates labeling her the "Absolute Zero Snow Woman" due to her icy facade, they remain oblivious to her hidden identity. Facing a dilemma as her ratings plummet, Yukina seeks to infuse romance into her stories but struggles due to her lack of firsthand experience with love.

Fate intervenes when she crosses paths with the charismatic student council president, Shigure Kitami. Upon discovering his manipulative tactics of toying with girls' affections, Yukina devises a daring plan. She confronts Shigure, exposing his true nature, and strikes a deal to learn about love from him in exchange for her silence.

However, complications arise when Yukina's cousin and closest confidant, Akira Shimotsuki, unexpectedly confesses his feelings for her. As Yukina navigates this tangled web of emotions and schemes, she finds herself embarking on unexpected "missions of love" with both Shigure and Akira by her side.

basic_info.title: Banana Fish
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BANANA FISH

content.synopsis:
In the heart of New York's shadowy underworld, Ash Lynx is a striking enigma—a lethal mix of beauty, brilliance, and blood on his hands. Raised by the notorious mafia kingpin, Dino "Papa" Golzine, Ash was molded into a cold-blooded assassin from a tender age. Now, a fierce 17-year-old gang leader in his own right, Ash commands respect and fear with equal measure.

Enter Eiji Okumura, a young Japanese photographer embarking on a project in the gritty streets of New York. Drawn into Ash's world, Eiji finds himself captivated by the enigmatic teen, while Ash, intrigued by Eiji's innocence, begins to question his own life choices.

As a string of cryptic murders rocks the city, all linked by the mysterious term "Banana Fish," Ash, Eiji, and their allies are thrust into a dangerous game with personal stakes. With chaos looming, they must unravel the secrets of "Banana Fish"—its origins, its purpose—and eliminate it before their world plunges into darkness.

basic_info.title:
Kamisama ga Uso wo Tsuku.
The Gods Lie.

content.synopsis:
Natsuru Nanao, the star of the soccer team, grapples with shyness around girls due to a past incident at his new school. Raised by his mother since his father's passing, Natsuru's soccer dreams drive him. A chance encounter with classmate Rio Suzumura marks a pivotal moment in his life.

Intrigued by Rio, Natsuru's world shifts when he assists a stray cat and connects with Rio and her brother, Yuuta. Offering to care for the cat reveals a startling truth - the siblings live alone in a hidden world of neglect. As Natsuru delves deeper, secrets unravel, shedding light on their dire situation.

basic_info.title:
Kimi no Koto ga Daidaidaidaidaisuki na 100-nin no Kanojo
The 100 Girlfriends Who Really, Really, Really, Really, Really Love You
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hyakkano

content.synopsis:
Upon graduating middle school, Rentarou Aijou faces his 100th rejection from the girl he loves. Seeking solace at a matchmaking shrine, he prays for a high school romance. To his surprise, the shrine's god appears, promising Rentarou a staggering one hundred soulmates in high school. 

As Hakari Hanazono and Karane Inda swiftly confess their affections, Rentarou realizes the god's prophecy holds true. However, a grim revelation follows: any unrequited love will result in the soulmate's demise. Determined to save them all, Rentarou embarks on a daring quest to date each soulmate.

With a heart vast enough for a hundred loves, Rentarou's unexpected high school journey unfolds, as the Rentarou family grows with each new connection!

basic_info.title: Kengan Ashura
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ケンガンアシュラ

content.synopsis:
In the shadows of Japan's corporate world, power struggles are settled not with paperwork, but with blood and sweat. From the era of the Edo period, the country's top companies have relied on fierce hand-to-hand combat to resolve disputes, orchestrated by the enigmatic Kengan Association.

Meet Ouma Tokita, known as "The Ashura," a man driven to claim the title of the ultimate martial artist. Taking up arms as a Kengan fighter under the banner of the Nogi Group, he crosses paths with Kazuo Yamashita, a Nogi employee trapped in a mundane routine. When Yamashita is unexpectedly thrust into the role of Ouma's manager, the pair find themselves thrust into the unforgiving battlegrounds of the Kengan world.

Amidst the chaos of relentless clashes, can this unlikely duo carve out a path to survival and dominance in the cutthroat realm of the Kengan Association?

basic_info.title:
Meitantei Conan
Case Closed
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Detective Conan, Detective Conan Kaito Kid Special Collection

content.synopsis:
In the world of the Japanese Police Department, the renowned teenage sleuth Shinichi Kudou is celebrated for cracking impossible cases with his keen eye for detail and sharp intellect.

During a casual outing with his childhood friend Ran Mouri, Shinichi stumbles upon a shady deal between two individuals, leading to a dangerous encounter that forces him to ingest a peculiar poison. Rather than meeting his demise, the poison transforms him into a young boy, prompting Shinichi to adopt the alias Conan Edogawa to conceal his true identity.

Under the guise of Conan, a nod to literary legends Arthur Conan Doyle and Ranpo Edogawa, Shinichi resides with Ran and her detective father, navigating the complexities of life as a seven-year-old while secretly continuing his detective work.

Join Conan in his quest for justice as he tackles intricate murder mysteries, all the while unraveling the truth behind his transformation and striving to reclaim his original form.

basic_info.title: Beast Master
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Fly, Cactus Summer Surprise, Saboten Summer Surprise

content.synopsis:
In the midst of a stormy night, Yuiko Kubozuka, a 17-year-old high school student known for her love of animals, inadvertently terrifies her own cat, sending it scrambling up a tree. A mysterious boy, with eyes as fierce as a wild creature, comes to their rescue, then vanishes silently into the darkness. The next day, this enigmatic savior is revealed to be the new transfer student, Leo Aoi, whose intimidating presence unsettles the entire school.

Despite the rumors surrounding Leo, Yuiko summons the courage to express her gratitude. As she gets to know him, she discovers that beneath his fearsome exterior lies a gentle soul with a unique affinity for animals—a talent that both impresses and intimidates her. However, Leo harbors a dangerous secret: the sight of blood triggers a primal instinct within him, turning him into a savage beast.

Can Yuiko help Leo control his inner wildness, or will he, like the animals before him, flee from her care? Explore the depths of their bond and Leo's inner turmoil in the accompanying one-shots: "Fly" in Volume 1 and "Saboten Summer Surprise" (Cactus Summer Surprise) in Volume 2.

Hyakkaou Private Academy caters to the elite, where future business tycoons and politicians' offspring roam the halls. Academic prowess takes a backseat here; instead, it's all about cunning strategies and the ability to decipher people's intentions. As the sun sets, the campus transforms into a hub of underground gambling spots overseen by the powerful student council, where students wager for prestige, wealth, and more.

Ryouta Suzui knows the sting of being a "house pet," consigned to menial tasks as one of the lowest-ranked students. His world shifts when enigmatic transfer student Yumeko Jabami arrives, unravelling the school's gambling underworld. Ignoring Suzui's caution, Yumeko plunges into high-stakes games against formidable adversaries, catching the eye of the influential student council. Suzui strives to shield Yumeko from danger, only to discover she embodies the essence of a Hyakkaou student: a thrill-seeking gambler.

basic_info.title:
Kaze no Tani no Nausicaä
Nausicaä of the Valley of the Wind
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kaze no Tani no Nausicaa

content.synopsis:
In a world devastated by the cataclysmic war known as the Seven Days of Fire, humanity teeters on the edge of extinction. Forced to seek refuge in scattered kingdoms to evade the relentless encroachment of the Sea of Corruption—an immense forest teeming with deadly mutant creatures and toxic spores.

Nausicaä, the heir to the throne of the agricultural realm Valley of the Wind, is plunged into conflict when the imperialist Torumekia kingdom invades the Dorok Empire. Amid the chaos of war, Nausicaä allies with the Torumekian forces, led by the formidable Princess Kushana. Through the brutality of battle, Nausicaä confronts the grim realities of war and its impact on both humankind and the environment.

With her remarkable charisma and compassionate spirit, Nausicaä emerges as humanity's beacon of hope. As the ongoing war and the encroaching Sea of Corruption threaten mankind's very existence, she stands as a symbol of resilience in a world plagued by destruction.

Set in a post-apocalyptic landscape, Kaze no Tani no Nausicaä weaves a tale of human arrogance and nature's enduring power, painting a vivid portrait of a world grappling with the consequences of its own folly.

basic_info.title:
Kumo desu ga, Nani ka?
So I'm a Spider, So What?

content.synopsis: Revised synopsis: Watch out, world! Once a regular high school girl, now reborn as a spider in a fantastical realm. This isn't the typical tale I expected! Struggling as one of the weakest creatures in a daunting dungeon, it's every spider for themselves. To survive, I must quickly grasp the rules. Without a do-over, mastering this new reality is my only shot at staying alive for more than a fleeting moment.

basic_info.title:
Mairimashita! Iruma-kun
Welcome to Demon School! Iruma-kun
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 魔入りました!入間くん

content.synopsis: Fourteen-year-old Iruma Suzuki's luck hits rock bottom as he's unable to refuse his parents' dangerous demands. But when they strike a deal with Sullivan, a powerful demon craving to be his grandfather, Iruma's world flips upside down. Embracing his new role, Sullivan whisks him off to Babyls, a demon school where hiding his human identity becomes his top priority. As Iruma navigates this treacherous path, he realizes both demons and himself hold hidden depths waiting to be uncovered.

basic_info.title:
Kishuku Gakkou no Juliet
Boarding School Juliet
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis: At Dahlia Academy, a prestigious school for gifted students, Romio makes a bold confession to Juliet, vowing to revolutionize the world by her side. Despite her acceptance, the couple must conceal their relationship to uphold peace within the school's walls. As they embark on their mission to enact change, will these forbidden lovers manage to safeguard their love from prying eyes?

Inuyashiki, an elderly father grappling with the struggles of life, finds solace in adopting a dog despite his lonely existence and terminal illness. A chance encounter with an extraterrestrial entity transforms his frail body into a powerful, mechanical form, robbing him of his tears and his sense of humanity.

Moved by saving a homeless man from peril, Inuyashiki rediscovers his compassion and embarks on a mission to use his newfound abilities for good. However, his newfound purpose is swiftly challenged by a sinister force embracing its own dark powers, forcing Inuyashiki to evolve from a humble neighborhood savior to a formidable protector against a malevolent threat.

basic_info.title: Innocent
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: イノサン

content.synopsis: In the 18th century, amidst the quest for "freedom and equality," the French Revolution ignited, shaping modern French society. Amidst the shadows stood Charles-Henri Sanson, the fourth in line to lead the Sanson family, Paris' executioner. Join him on his courageous journey as he confronts his daunting destiny in the face of turbulent times.

basic_info.title: Eden: It's an Endless World!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: EDEN ～It's an Endless World!～

content.synopsis:
In the midst of a global pandemic that claims 15 percent of the world's population, the shadowy Propater organization seizes control after toppling the UN. Two youngsters, a boy and a girl raised in a deserted virology research center and immune to the virus, face an attack by the Propater but manage a daring escape.

Fast forward twenty years, the boy has risen as a formidable drug lord in South America, silently supporting his son who, with the aid of Nomad mercenaries (some with ties to the Propater), takes on the oppressive regime. As the narrative unfolds, the focus broadens to encompass terrorism, human enhancement, power struggles between developing nations, and the conflicts between drug syndicates and the Propater.

Drawing heavily from Gnostic mythology, the characters bear names of gnostic deities, each playing a significant role in this intricate web of intrigue.

basic_info.title:
Shimanami Tasogare
Our Dreams at Dusk: Shimanami Tasogare
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: しまなみ誰そ彼

content.synopsis:
Perched atop a steep hill in the charming town of Onomichi lies a building known as Anonymous Lounge, a haven for an eclectic group of individuals with tales to unfold.

Tasuku Kaname, a troubled high school student grappling with his sexual identity, contemplates ending his life after facing scrutiny from classmates. Witnessing a mysterious woman's leap from a nearby structure shocks him to the core. Rushing to her aid, Tasuku discovers her unscathed, revealing herself as the enigmatic owner of Anonymous.

Drawn to Tasuku's inner turmoil, Anonymous extends a compassionate ear, coaxing him to share his innermost struggles. Through their poignant exchange, Tasuku confronts his deepest anguish – the struggle to embrace his own truth. Emotional and raw, "Shimanami Tasogare" delves into Tasuku's journey alongside fellow LGBTQ+ individuals navigating the tumultuous path to self-acceptance.

basic_info.title: Platinum End
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: プラチナエンド

content.synopsis:
Following the tragic loss of his parents, a despondent Mirai Kakehashi finds himself under the oppressive guardianship of his relatives. Consumed by darkness and despair, he reaches a breaking point on the night of his middle school graduation, attempting to end his own life. Just as all seems lost, a radiant figure named Nasse appears, revealing herself as a celestial being—a guardian angel with a proposition.

Nasse offers Mirai a transformative gift: extraordinary abilities and the opportunity to ascend as the new God, tasked with vanquishing 12 rival "God Candidates" in a high-stakes competition spanning 999 days. As Mirai navigates this treacherous contest for supremacy, a harrowing battle royale unfolds, pitting him against formidable adversaries vying for ultimate power.

basic_info.title:
Lovely★Complex
Love★Com
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Love Com Plus, Lovely Complex Plus

content.synopsis:
Synopsis Rewrite:

Risa Koizumi, towering at 172 cm, finds herself in an unexpected alliance with her shorter rival, Atsushi Ootani, standing at 156 cm, when they discover their crushes have eyes for each other. Despite their constant squabbling, Risa and Ootani share more similarities than they care to admit – from their unique heights and poor grades to their love for the same foods and penchant for childish antics.

Their amusing camaraderie as a duo of misfits draws laughter from their peers. As they navigate the complexities of unrequited love, Risa and Ootani embark on a journey to find new romance while supporting each other. Could the love they seek be closer than they realize?

This heartfelt tale unfolds across various volumes, including Volume 12: "Hoshi ni Nattemo Aishiteru" and Volume 16: "Bokura no Ibasho," offering glimpses into their endearing and sometimes comical pursuit of happiness.

basic_info.title:
Boku wa Mari no Naka
Inside Mari
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I'm in Mari

content.synopsis: Isao Komori leaves the tranquility of Gunma for the vibrant Tokyo city lights, hoping for a fresh start in college. But as time slips by, he remains friendless. Abandoning his studies, Isao becomes a recluse, finding solace in video games. His daily ritual of visiting the local convenience store brings him face to face with "The Angel of the Convenience Store," Mari Yoshizaki. A silent observer, Isao's world shifts when Mari gazes back at him. Inexplicably, Isao wakes up in Mari's body, with no memory of how he got there. Embracing this mysterious twist, Isao steps into Mari's shoes, navigating a life that is now his own.

In the heart of it all lies the Clow Cards, their power capable of wreaking havoc upon this world if their seal is shattered...

Meet Sakura Kinomoto, a spirited and kind-hearted 10-year-old student at Tomoeda Elementary School. A fateful discovery awaits her one day in the fourth grade when she stumbles upon a mysterious tome titled The Clow tucked away in her father's collection. As she cracks open the book, a whimsical creature with an Osakan flair emerges—Keroberos, the guardian of the magical Clow Cards imprisoned within its pages.

But the unexpected has occurred—the mischievous Clow Cards have broken free, setting off a chain of unpredictable events that threaten the peace of Tomoeda. With the help of her newfound plush companion, affectionately nicknamed "Kero," and her loyal friend Tomoyo Daidouji, Sakura must embrace her role as the Cardcaptor. Armed with a mystical bird-shaped key and newfound abilities, she must capture the rogue cards to restore order and protect her world.

basic_info.title: Strobe Edge
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Colorless Dreamer

content.synopsis:
Step into the world of Ninako Kinoshita, where the essence of love is a puzzle waiting to be solved. Amidst her unspoken feelings for childhood friend Daiki Korenaga, an unexpected encounter with school heartthrob Ren Ichinose shatters the illusion of her emotions. As Ninako navigates the bittersweet taste of unrequited love, her friends' own romantic journeys shed light on the intricate flavors of affection. Yet, in the midst of it all, she remains oblivious to the gaze of a special someone who sees only her.

Dive deeper into the emotional whirlwind with the one-shot included in Volume 6: "Colorless Dreamer."

basic_info.title:
Omoide Emanon
Emanon: Memories of Emanon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: おもいでエマノン

content.synopsis:
In the winter of 1967, a 20-year-old man returns home from his travels on a ferry, embarking on a journey that will forever change his worldview. In the cozy cabin, he encounters a captivating girl named Emanon, who sparks a profound connection. Over dinner, Emanon, both beautiful and mysterious, offers to share her life story with him, revealing a mind-bending secret: her memories span over three billion years, tracing back to the dawn of life on Earth.

Thus unfolds "Omoide Emanon," a mesmerizing saga of a girl bearing witness to the planet's evolution. Gifted with ancestral memories passed down through generations, Emanon unveils a tale that transcends time and illuminates the essence of existence itself.

basic_info.title: Blood Lad
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Delinquents
            
                Delinquents,                    Mythology
            
                Mythology,                    Vampire
            
                Vampire
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ブラッドラッド

content.synopsis:
In the heart of the Demon World reigns Staz Charlie Blood, a formidable district leader with an unexpected quirk - he's a vampire who shuns human blood, captivated by all things human, especially Japan. When the charming human girl Fuyumi Yanagi stumbles into his domain, Staz seizes the chance to delve into human culture through her eyes.

Their intriguing exchange is abruptly halted by a rival demon's challenge. After swiftly securing his dominance, Staz returns to find Fuyumi consumed by a carnivorous plant. Yet, Fuyumi lingers as a ghost in the Demon World, devoid of the allure that drew Staz to her.

Determined to revive Fuyumi, Staz embarks on a journey to the human realm, a realm he's long admired. Joined by Fuyumi and their comrades, their whimsical and perilous odyssey unfolds, promising new adventures and challenges on the horizon.

basic_info.title:
Koukou Debut
High School Debut
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Osananajimi wa Gakunenchou, Enren Debut, Koukou Debut Enrenhen

content.synopsis:
In middle school, Haruna Nagashima devoted herself to softball, longing for romance in secret. Now in high school, the ideal opportunity for love has arrived. But there's a catch—she's clueless on where to start!

On her first day, Haruna collides with You Komiyama, the school heartthrob. Enlisting his help, Haruna is certain his charm can assist her. Reluctantly, You agrees to be her love guru with one rule: she must not develop feelings for him. Can Haruna navigate high school with You's mentorship and secure a boyfriend of her own?

basic_info.title: Kagurabachi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: カグラバチ

content.synopsis:
Eighteen years ago, amidst the Seitei War, Kunishige Rokuhira stood as a legendary figure in Japan, renowned for his mastery as a swordsmith. Crafting six mystical blades, each pulsating with unique powers that sealed the nation's triumph. Following the war's end, Kunishige retreated to the mountains with his son, Chihiro, who diligently absorbed the art of swordmaking. Approaching his 15th year, the steadfast Chihiro vowed to carry on his father's legacy. Yet, his aspirations shattered when a band of formidable sorcerers brutally slayed his father and plundered the sacred blades.

Now, three years later, Chihiro harbors a heart burning with animosity and a fierce thirst for retribution. Brandishing the Enten, Kunishige's clandestine creation and the seventh enchanted blade, Chihiro dispatches wrongdoers affiliated with the Hishaku—the group he holds accountable for his father's demise. While still unraveling the full potential of Enten and honing his swordsmanship, Chihiro remains resolute in his quest to reclaim the stolen katanas, avenge his father, and uphold his father's revered heritage.

basic_info.title:
Ao no Flag
Blue Flag
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 青のフラッグ

content.synopsis:
In his final year of high school, Taichi Ichinose is surprised to find himself in the same class as his childhood friend, the popular Touma Mita, for the third consecutive year. Alongside them is the shy and clumsy Futaba Kuze, who Taichi hesitates to engage with despite recognizing himself in her. 

A chance library encounter brings Taichi and Futaba together, revealing Futaba's unrequited feelings for Touma. Moved by her resolve to change, Taichi sets aside his doubts and decides to assist her. As spring blooms, the trio's complex emotions and personal struggles weave a tangled web, defining their interconnected future amidst uncertainty.

basic_info.title: InuYasha
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Inu-Yasha, Inu Yasha

content.synopsis:
Embark on a riveting journey with Kagome Higurashi as her tranquil existence takes a sudden turn when a malevolent demon pulls her into a well, hurtling her five centuries into the past. Amidst this ancient realm, Kagome discovers a startling reality: demons coexist with humans, and she unwittingly carries a perilous artifact from her world—the Shikon Jewel, a tiny yet potent sphere. This mystical orb grants immense power to any demon who wields it, making Kagome a prime target for those craving its might.

During a fierce encounter with a demon, a rash move by Kagome shatters the jewel, scattering its fragments across feudal Japan. As she grapples with the repercussions of her actions, Kagome joins forces with the enigmatic half-demon Inuyasha. Together, they must race against time to recover all the shards of the jewel before they fall into malevolent hands.

basic_info.title: Another
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery

content.synopsis:
In the spring of 1998, in the mysterious town of Yomiyama, Kouichi Sakakibara's start at a new school is delayed by a collapsed lung. While navigating the hospital halls, he unexpectedly encounters Mei Misaki, a dark-haired girl in his school's uniform. Little does he realize, this fateful meeting will set off a chain of chilling events.

Upon joining Yomiyama North Middle School, Sakakibara is perplexed by his classmates' eerie treatment of Misaki, as if she is invisible. As he delves deeper into the enigma surrounding her, the bizarre behavior of his peers only intensifies. When students from Class 3-3 meet gruesome fates without explanation, Sakakibara begins to suspect a sinister connection between Misaki and the escalating death toll.

basic_info.title:
Kawaii dake ja Nai Shikimori-san
Shikimori's Not Just a Cutie

content.synopsis: Yuu Izumi, a high school student plagued by a string of misfortunes since childhood, always found himself returning home with injuries. His days were a series of unfortunate events until he crossed paths with Micchon Shikimori. Shikimori, Izumi's lovely and devoted girlfriend, exudes charm but can also transform into a formidable force when needed. Her unwavering care for Izumi leaves him breathless. With Shikimori's endearing yet fierce presence, Izumi's luck turns around, ushering in a new chapter of joy and contentment in his life.

basic_info.title: Absolute Regression
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jeoldae Hoegwi

content.synopsis: The winds of change have altered the course of time, yet Mugi Hwa remains a blazing force, soaring through the skies of Murim with unrivaled prowess. Known as the indomitable hero, he has vanquished all who challenged him, including the formidable Cheonma, father of Mugeuk Geom. Refusing to yield, Mugeuk delves into the forbidden realms of a time-altering ritual, hurtling back into his own history. Racing against time, he retraces his path, anticipating the inevitable return of Mugi. This time, the stakes are higher as he seeks not only power but also reconciliation, forging new alliances to unite his people in anticipation of the looming bloodtide.

basic_info.title: The Male Lead's Girl Friend
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Namja Juingong-ui Yeoja Saram Chingu-imnida

content.synopsis: Imagine waking up inside the pages of your beloved novel, only to find yourself reincarnated as the despised villainess, Louise Sweeny. Now, she must rewrite her own narrative to escape the grim destiny of being snuffed out at the story's conclusion. Familiar with every twist and turn, Louise is thrown off balance as the plot takes unexpected detours. Can she navigate the intricate dance of the main characters' love story without sealing her own tragic end?

basic_info.title: I Woke Up as the Ugly Duckling
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Ugly Lady, Monnan-i Gongnyeo-ga Doeeotseumnida

content.synopsis: Reborn as the duke's daughter, Sylvia finds herself the family's black sheep. Branded as fat, ugly, and ill-tempered unlike her talented and beautiful siblings, she rebels for her father's affection only to face exile and tragedy. Awakening five years before her demise, the new "Sylvia" disregards judgment, determined to forge her own path. In a realm teeming with demons and rogues, she must harness every tool to survive solo. As she gains independence, she severs ties with her kin and critics... but unexpected attention from indifferent individuals raises eyebrows.

basic_info.title: She Scares Me
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: She's Scary

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, the effortlessly charming yet chaotic Jin Eun Jung crosses paths with the impeccably organized and admired student council president, Moon Seo Young. Their worlds collide as they find themselves unexpectedly sharing a roof, sparking a transformation that is both heartwarming and poignant.

basic_info.title: Days of Hana
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hana-ui Haru

content.synopsis: Since childhood, Haru and Hana have shared an extraordinary bond – she's a human, and he's her loyal werewolf guardian. Despite some progress in werewolf rights, society still views them as mysterious creatures. As their love blossoms, the question lingers – what lies ahead for this unlikely pair?

basic_info.title: Cassmire: The Loyal Sword
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Tried to Be a Loyal Sword, I Was Planning to Become a Loyal Sword

content.synopsis: Kashumir, a mercenary dedicated to providing medicine for her beloved younger half-sister, Aria, experiences a life-changing revelation after a head injury on her way home from a mission. She recollects her previous existence and realizes she has been reincarnated into the world of the novel "The Night of the Fairy." In this tale, Aria is the central figure of a reverse-harem love story, while Kashumir finds herself cast as a villain responsible for her sister's suffering. Driven by unwavering devotion, Kashumir commits to safeguarding Aria until her anticipated adoption into the count's household, mirroring events in the book. Unexpectedly, the male suitors vying for Aria's affection become captivated by Kashumir instead, complicating her mission to shield her cherished sibling.

basic_info.title: Am I Your Daughter?
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Naega Ttal-ieyo?

content.synopsis: Imprisoned for years by the abusive Count Zackary, Hailynn's life takes a strange turn when a tragic event sends her back to being eight years old. Determined to break free from her past torment, she flees and encounters a courageous boy and the watchful Duke Callisto. Unveiled as part of the esteemed Callisto lineage through a mystical elixir, Hailynn faces rejection from the honorable Duke. As she unravels the mystery of her origins, the burning question remains - will she discover a loving family at last?

basic_info.title: Please Marry Me Again!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Please Marry Me Again, Husband!, Let's Get Married One More Time!

content.synopsis: In the realm of high society, Shurya Littenheim, the so-called "half-noblewoman," faced rejection from all except her husband, Grand Duke Kardi Esperand. When Kardi's inherited powers threaten his life, Shurya strikes a fateful bargain to save him by sacrificing her own. Reborn as her younger self after death, she seizes a second chance. Determined to win back Kardi's heart, Shurya embarks on a quest to rewrite their love story. Yet, can she alter their fate and evade another heartbreaking conclusion?

basic_info.title:
Hell Blade
Jack the Ripper: Hell Blade
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 헬블레이드

content.synopsis: In the grim streets of London in the year 1888 A.D., terror grips the city as a notorious serial killer, Jack the Ripper, strikes fear into the hearts of all. His savage attacks target female prostitutes with unfathomable brutality. Unbeknownst to many, his victims harbor a chilling secret that drives Jack on a relentless pursuit to track them down.

basic_info.title: Gilgamesh
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Epic of Gilgamesh, Ae Neulgeuni

content.synopsis: Tludia's dream of becoming a Knight with the Order takes an unexpected turn when she's expelled for her knack for breaking weapons and insatiable appetite. However, her idle days are short-lived as she rushes to rescue an old man from a group of robbers. Surprisingly, it is Tludia who ends up needing help. The old man, appearing far older than he seems, feels a connection with Tludia and vows to find a cure for her ailment, all while tempting her with delicious food. Thus commences their quest to heal one and bring solace to the other in a journey filled with unexpected twists and heartfelt bonds.

basic_info.title: A Flame Reborn
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Regressor of the Fallen Family, Returner of a Ruined Family

content.synopsis: In the heart of the kingdom, Logan MacLine, a seasoned knight in the struggle for independence, seeks vengeance against the empire that seized power and unjustly executed his brother. Fate takes a twist as Logan perishes in combat, only to awaken in a younger form, his past misdeeds still unexposed. Drawing on his past life's wisdom, Logan enlists a band of skilled comrades to innovate weaponry, amass forces, and secure the necessary funds. Yet, as he embarks on this daring journey, can Logan reconcile with his kin and thwart the empire's relentless advance?

basic_info.title: False Confession
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jalmotdoen Gobaek

content.synopsis: "I believe my heart has been captured by you." Renesha's vision of a peaceful existence is abruptly overturned by a tipsy declaration of affection. Unintentionally, she professes her love not to just any man, but to the formidable Duke Cavert Willard, known as the Grim Reaper of the Battlefield! This misstep adds to her challenges in this mystical realm where she awoke to discover her divine abilities. Amidst a raging war with a neighboring nation, Renesha must navigate her role as a healer while entangled in a romantic tug-of-war between two captivating knights. As love blossoms amidst the chaos of battle, the ultimate question arises: who will emerge victorious in the fierce contest for Renee's heart?

basic_info.title: The Demon King Levels Up
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Martial Demon King, The Demon Lord Levels Up With Martial Arts, Mugong-euro Level Up Haneun Mawang-nim, Demon Lord's Martial Arts Ascension

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of a truce between the demonic realm and the heavenly realm, peace reigns in the human world. Jeon Minchul, an unassuming college student, stumbles upon a relic from the war and uncovers a startling revelation: he was once the fearsome demon king who once threatened the world. As his dormant powers resurface, Minchul grapples with the challenge of wielding both light and darkness to safeguard the hard-won peace.

basic_info.title: Slave B
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 슬레이브 B

content.synopsis: In a world shattered by the Shadow Lord, Secneum, peace is but a distant memory. Niro, a boy of mixed heritage - part elf, part human - was orphaned in infancy and taken in by a pair of enslaved souls. Here, slaves endure inhumane treatment, a fate that eventually claims the lives of Niro's adoptive parents, leaving him to fend for his younger siblings alone. To rewrite their future, Niro must navigate the trials of Excanum Academy, the very institution that transformed the former slave, Emperor Muren, into a ruler. Can Niro break free from the shackles of his past and forge a new destiny for his family?

basic_info.title: I'm All Out of Health!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Have No Health, Geongang-i Eopseumnida

content.synopsis: Since birth, Ninenya Seiah has faced a series of misfortunes due to her mother's betrayal and subsequent demise. Cast out from the esteemed Seiah family, Ninenya is now gravely ill with little time left. To rescue her, her father, Lord Rubenio Seiah, seeks help from the enigmatic Count Adelman. Together, Ninenya and Adelman must join forces to restore her health and prevent her from falling prey to a lethal family conflict.

basic_info.title: Steel-Eating Player
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gangcheor-eul Meongneun Player

content.synopsis: Steel Emperor Hyeonuk Lee, humanity's final savior, has passed away. Surprisingly, he has chosen the military as his stage for altering the future. Why this unexpected setting? Enter Corporal Hyeonuk Lee, igniting his steel-eating spectacle as he embarks on a swift quest for vengeance!

basic_info.title: Rewriting the Villainess
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Angnyeo 18-se Gongnyakgi

content.synopsis: Commander Liza Mary triumphantly returns to the Empire of Phaeton after conquering an enemy kingdom, only to discover her fiancé Illian has betrayed her for Princess Flora. Devastated, Liza drowns her sorrows and wakes up in the body of high-schooler Doeun. Determined to unravel this mysterious twist and return to her reality, Liza teams up with Doeun's friends Ian and Lora, who bear a striking resemblance to Illian and Flora.

basic_info.title: The Apothecary Prince
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Crown Prince That Sells Medicine

content.synopsis: In a fateful turn of events, Doctor Han Lee's world is turned upside down overnight. Transformed into Lachiel, the ailing Crown Prince of the Empire of Magentano, Han now wields unparalleled medical expertise in a foreign realm. Can he restore the empire's health while also curing his own ailing body? Follow Han's tale of self-discovery and determination as he navigates destiny's path, seeking the acupoint that could change his destiny.

basic_info.title: The Maxed-out Player
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Max Level Player, Man-Level Player

content.synopsis: After two decades of intense training, Juhyuk's stats are at their peak, poised to embark on his journey into Olympus, a virtual reality realm. Entrusted by his late master with the daunting mantle of the Ultimate Evil, Juhyuk faces a harsh reality upon leaving the tutorial zone – every player aims to eliminate him, forcing him back to square one at Level 1! Faced with this unexpected setback, Juhyuk must rally all available allies to conquer his SSS-rank mission and ascend as the forthcoming Ultimate Evil.

basic_info.title: The Dragon Slayer Academy's Hotshot
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Little Brother Is the Academy's Hotshot, Yongsa Dongsaeng-eun Academy Goinmul, The Little Brother Is the Academy's Hotshot

content.synopsis: Ruud Denatos has always lived in the shadow of his brilliant older brother, Aesir, a renowned dragon slayer. When tragedy strikes and Aesir falls in battle, Ruud's world is turned upside down. A mysterious dragon lord intervenes, catapulting Ruud into a past where Aesir is nonexistent. Determined to uncover the truth and locate his brother, Ruud assumes Aesir's identity at the academy, showcasing unexpected talents that astound his peers. Yet, as he strives to maintain this facade, the question lingers: Can Ruud sustain the charade with his former mediocrity looming in the background?

basic_info.title: Can We Become Family?
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Can We Become a Family?, Uri-ga Gajog-i Doel Su Isseulkkayo?

content.synopsis: Inherited from a destitute countryside orphanage by a prosperous duke, Naviah Agnus yearned to capture her newfound father's affection. Yet, the cunning Duke views Naviah solely as a pawn, a temporary replacement for his ailing daughter Vivian, destined to wed the heir to the throne. As Vivian unexpectedly recovers, Naviah is cast aside and led to her demise. Upon awakening, she finds herself back at age eight, determined not to be underestimated. Will their fractured bond ever transform into genuine family ties?

basic_info.title: Mookhyang: The Origin
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 묵향 디 오리진

content.synopsis: In the prequel to Mookhyang: Dark Lady, we delve into Mookhyang's journey in the martial arts world of Murim. Starting as a young member of the Demonic Sect, he undergoes intense training, eventually earning a spot among elite assassins. Yet, his thirst for mastery propels him towards a unique path few have trodden. Through years of dedication to the sword and harnessing his inner qi, Mookhyang aspires to achieve the elusive State of Demon Transcender, unseen by any Demonic Sect warrior. Accompany Mookhyang as he challenges formidable adversaries, battles sinister forces, and pushes the boundaries of his abilities to the brink... and beyond.

basic_info.title: So I Married the Anti-Fan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Geuraeseo Naneun Anti-Fan-gwa Gyeolhonhaetda

content.synopsis: In a world of lost dreams and burning grudges, Geunyeong Lee embarks on a perilous mission to dismantle her archenemy, Korean idol Who Joon. With nothing to lose, she plunges into a high-stakes game of revenge. However, as their paths intertwine, the line between vendetta and understanding blurs. Will Geunyeong succeed in toppling the beloved national icon once she uncovers the secrets hidden beneath the star's facade?

basic_info.title: I Only Want to Beat You
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Status Quo
            
                Love Status Quo,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Oroji Neo-reul Igigo Sipeo

content.synopsis: In a world where victories define them, Gigo Lee, undefeated, meets his match in the form of Roji Oh, the one who bested him. As they face off in a high-stakes "bet," the question looms: who will emerge triumphant in this ultimate showdown?

basic_info.title: The Girl from Class
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 수업시간 그녀

content.synopsis: Have you ever found yourself falling for a girl seated beside you? For him, love sparked in just that way.

basic_info.title: The Extra Is Too Powerful
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Extra-ga Neomu Gangham, The Extra Is Too Strong

content.synopsis:
Every day, the question remained the same, yet the answer remained elusive. All that remained were pitying looks and monthly insurance bills, alongside the harsh truth of my partial paralysis. They speak of enduring trials gifted by a higher power, but death seemed a kinder fate. And then, awakening marked the turning point.

Welcome to the realm of the "Magician Who Dominates the World."

Henceforth, my existence intertwined with the character "Mord Vernars," thrusting me into the very novel I once perused.

basic_info.title: Precious Daughter of the Greatest Martial Arts Villain
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Am the Precious Daughter of the Greatest Villain in a Martial Arts Novel, Muhyeopji Choego Akdang-ui Gwihan Ttar-imnida

content.synopsis: Entwined in the world of a captivating Wuxia tale, I find myself embodying Lihwa, the compassionate daughter of the notorious Cheon Ma, known as the feared Demon King overseeing the malevolent Demonic Sect. As my father schemes to thwart the rise of a young boy named Ak Wuryeon, a sense of impending doom looms over me. Despite Wuryeon's seemingly innocuous nature, I am aware of the vengeance he harbors against my father, a vendetta that includes me in its path. Can I navigate the treacherous web of my father's dark legacy and alter the course of my inevitable fate before it seals my demise?

basic_info.title: I Didn't Mean to Seduce the Male Lead!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Namju-reul Kkosi-ryeodeon Geon Anieotseumnida

content.synopsis: Renowned novelist and relationship expert Baroness Eleanor Mariche is called upon by an ambitious duke to persuade his son, Count Ryan Calabria, to marry the princess. However, a twist unfolds as the count shows no desire for the princess but instead, appears to be captivated by Eleanor. Caught in a web of love and power struggles, Eleanor must navigate the fury of the displeased duke and fend off the cunning princess. Will she triumph in this battle for both love and influence?

basic_info.title: A Man's Man
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Real Man, The Man, Sangnamja

content.synopsis: When Yuhyeon unexpectedly wakes up two decades younger just as his career journey began at Hansung, the thriving yet toxic electronics company, he seizes the opportunity to mend old wounds and confront the toxic work culture that propelled him to become its youngest CEO. Armed with invaluable experience and insights from his future self, he embarks on a quest to reshape the company's ruthless environment and reconcile with his fractured relationships. As he delves into altering the course of his past, Yuhyeon grapples with the unknown consequences that may alter the trajectory of his future.

basic_info.title: Song of the Cloud
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 구름의 노래

content.synopsis: In a world where dreams are suppressed, Ga Yeon yearns to sing, trapped in a system that stifles individual aspirations. Jae Hee, a gifted pianist, battles inner demons blurring reality and fantasy. Talented musicians Dong Woo and Min Seo struggle against the constraints of the Korean music industry. Hyuk, a skilled guitarist, is molded into an idol band member against his true desires. These five souls, united by a shared longing for creative freedom, join forces to forge their own musical destiny. This captivating tale, initially a webcomic and later embraced by Random House Korea, delves into the poignant journey of reclaiming one's passion amidst societal pressures.

basic_info.title: Never Die Extra
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Reincarnation
            
                Reincarnation,                    Video Game
            
                Video Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jukji Anneun Extra

content.synopsis: In the popular game "Demon War 3," extras meet their demise daily in various creative ways. Among them is Evan D. Shelden, an extra with a remarkable death scene that captivates the production team. Strangely, this is the same name our protagonist received upon reincarnation in this virtual world. Now, as a non-main character facing countless deaths, survival becomes paramount for Evan.

basic_info.title: Return of the Bloodthirsty Police
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Organized Crime
            
                Organized Crime,                    Reincarnation
            
                Reincarnation
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Killer Police, Killer Gyeongchal

content.synopsis: When the notorious assassin Bi-Gwang is betrayed and murdered by the very organization he served, he is reborn as police officer Gyeongsoo Kim. Determined to avenge his death, he sets his sights on Hwaguksa, the treacherous group of killers that wronged him.

basic_info.title: Heavenly Sword's Grand Saga
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    Reincarnation
            
                Reincarnation,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Thousand Sword Techniques, Cheongeom Gihyeop

content.synopsis: In a world where some believe themselves to be the "chosen" ones, chaos and conflict have raged for decades among heroes. Enter a disciple under the guidance of six masters, tasked with shaping the destiny of the central plains. With determination in his heart, he declares, "If you are the heavens, then I am the sword destined to pierce them." Little did anyone mention, he's a tad on the heavier side. Nevertheless, as he embarks on his mission to save the world, perhaps shedding a few pounds wouldn't hurt.

basic_info.title: Rebirth
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: ЯEBIRTH

content.synopsis: Three centuries past, the Dark Magician Deshwitat Lived Rudbich faced his nemesis, the vampire Rudbich, and was trapped in limbo by the Light Magician Kalutika. In modern times, Deshwitat rises anew with a singular mission: to vanquish Kalutika. Assisted by a band of spiritual warriors, he embarks on a quest to harness Light Magic for his revenge.

basic_info.title: The Lady I Served Became a Master
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Lady I Served Became a Young Master, Mosideon Agassi-ga Doryeonnim-i Doeeo Beoryeotda

content.synopsis: When Sua awakens in the enchanting realm of her beloved novel embodying the persona of Blair, her mission is clear: to guide Chloe, the resilient female lead, through her tumultuous journey. Struggling against society's harsh judgment as an illegitimate child, Chloe finds solace in Blair, who assumes the roles of both maid and confidante in her world. Yet, Chloe's true essence deviates from the book's portrayal – mastering dark magic, dispatching Blair on mysterious quests, and shunning the advances of potential suitors. The narrative takes a compelling turn when a striking man resembling Chloe arrives unexpectedly at Blair's abode. Could this mysterious figure be the lady Blair once served? Brace yourself as layers of intrigue unfold in this spellbinding saga of love and transformation.

basic_info.title: The Queen's Knight
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Queen's Knight, The Queens Knight

content.synopsis:
When Yuna Lee's mother relocates to Germany for a music degree, she finds herself under the watchful eyes of her university professor father and three protective older brothers. 

During a summer trip to Germany, a fall off a cliff leads Yuna into the arms of Rieno, an 18-year-old knight from the mystical land of Phantasma. Grateful for saving her life, Rieno strikes a pact with Yuna: she must wed him and reign as his queen. Caught between her familiar home and the allure of being Phantasma's Queen, Yuna faces a heart-wrenching dilemma.

basic_info.title: The Genius Assassin Who Takes It All
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Genius Assassin Who Eats Everything Alone, Honja Da Hae Meongneun Cheonjae Amsalja

content.synopsis: In the realm of fantasy, a renowned writer's misstep unleashes havoc in his own created world, where betrayal reigns and a demon king seizes power. Amidst reader outrage, he plunges into his novel, embodying the villainous Shin Kang Ho. With a chance to rewrite destiny, Kang Ho opts for self-gain over heroism, navigating a brutal, avaricious world with cunning and ruthlessness. Through devouring all in his path, he aims to ascend as the ultimate victor, amassing riches and power beyond measure.

basic_info.title: The Red Knight Seeks No Reward
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Red Knight Does Not Blindly Follow Money, Jeokgisa-neun Nunmeon Don-eul Jotji Anneunda

content.synopsis:
Amidst a sea of debts, Black Knight Judith's existence was a tapestry woven with threads of greed. Her every move calculated for profit, no matter how dark the path she tread. But when betrayal strikes from within her ranks, a new chapter unfolds.

Cast back in time before her days with the Black Knights, Judith seizes the chance for redemption. Determined to rewrite her legacy, she pledges to embody the true essence of knighthood—valor untainted by the lure of wealth. The turning point emerges when Captain Kaillou Lewalmeigh beckons her to the Order of Red Knights.

Shedding her former identity, Judith embraces the scarlet garb, a symbol of her rebirth. With a newfound resolve, she renounces her money-driven past, embracing the virtues and nobility that define a knight's path.

basic_info.title: The Villainess's Days are Numbered!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Dying Villainess's Path to a Happy Ending, Sihanbu Angnyeo-ui Happy Ending

content.synopsis: Reborn as Clea Rino, the notorious villainess of the world, I find myself in quite the predicament. In a past life, Clea struck a deal with the Demon King to wed her beloved, Isaac Detroi, before meeting her demise. Now, to reclaim my existence, I must honor this pact for a mere six months. However, a cruel catch awaits me - every step I take saps my strength, draining me of 1 HP each time. Time is of the essence as I sacrifice Clea's family fortune to secure Isaac's hand in marriage, a transaction purely for survival. Yet, against all odds, emotions start to bloom within me. Could it be that beneath the villainess facade lies a heart yearning for something more?

basic_info.title: Return Survival
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Survival
            
                Survival,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 리턴 서바이벌
