content.synopsis: In a world overrun by flesh-eating zombies, chaos reigns as law and order crumble. Amid the mayhem, Yohan holds a secret weapon: he has already faced this nightmare once. Thrust back in time to six months before the outbreak, he sets out to stockpile supplies and prepare for the imminent battle against the undead. But survival is not just about fighting zombies; Yohan must also navigate the treacherous threats of bandits, gangs, and rival factions vying for power. As the timeline shifts unexpectedly, Yohan realizes that his past experiences may not be enough to secure his future. To emerge victorious, he must conquer both the living and the dead.

basic_info.title: Heavenly Grand Archive's Young Master
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cheonhwa Seogo Daegongja

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, the soul of the formidable Murim Alliance Leader, Hu Gong, finds itself inhabiting the body of a lackluster young man named Beom Hang, the heir to the prestigious "Heavenly Grand Archive" in the Jianghu realm. As Hu Gong delves into unraveling the mystery behind this unexpected body swap, he takes it upon himself to hone Beom Hang's physical prowess. The sudden transformation in the once feeble young master's demeanor catches the eye of the Jianghu, setting the stage for intrigue and discovery.

basic_info.title: Beatrice
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 베아트리체

content.synopsis: In the ruins of Elpasa, Beatrice, the final princess, witnesses the Nosteros Empire's devastation of her kingdom. Renamed Chloe, she endures life as a slave, concealing her royal identity. Duke Alessandro, the architect of Elpasa's fall, discovers Chloe's talents and allure, sparking a clandestine romance between a disguised princess and a malevolent nobleman.

basic_info.title: Princess in the Rough
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Princess in the Dumpster, Sseuregijang Sok Hwangnyeo-nim

content.synopsis: In an abandoned palace, a girl with luminous, jeweled eyes and a diminutive dragon is discovered, unmistakably the Emperor's long-lost daughter. Raised in the wilderness, oblivious to her uniqueness as her eyes perceive unseen realms, she is embraced by the Emperor and his three siblings. Will she find trust in her newfound family? And will her presence herald prosperity or downfall for the empire?

basic_info.title: Mystical
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mystery, Sinbi

content.synopsis: Ever since his mother's passing, Garam's artistic aspirations have been in limbo. Seeking independence and artistic growth, he relocates to his grandmother's vacant seaside house. Here, he encounters a captivating water creature devoid of her past. As Garam aims to assist her in unraveling her forgotten memories, he discovers his ultimate muse.

basic_info.title: Empress of Another World
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Isegye-ui Hwangbi

content.synopsis: After a sudden twist of fate transports Korean high school student Sabina into a new world and era, she finds refuge under the care of a duke in the Crentia kingdom. However, her safety is short-lived as she is unexpectedly presented as a concubine to the unattractive elderly emperor. Following the king's untimely demise at the hands of a shadowy assassin, Sabina is thrust into a perilous competition against rival contenders for the throne. To emerge victorious, she must navigate a treacherous web of alliances and rivalries to secure the support and loyalty of those essential for her survival. Can Sabina win over the hearts and minds of her allies in this ruthless battle for power?

basic_info.title: Sixth Sense Kiss
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kiss Sixth Sense

content.synopsis: Yesul Hong harbors a unique gift - a mere kiss unveils glimpses of others' futures. Yet, her own fate remains elusive, casting doubt on ever finding her true match. Her dormant ability springs to life when an inadvertent kiss with her enigmatic boss, Minhu Cha, reveals a startling vision of intimacy between them. To further complicate matters, her first love joins her team at work, stirring up conflicting emotions. As Yesul navigates the complexities of her intertwined destinies, will she withstand the challenges posed by her past and future loves in the workplace?

basic_info.title: Divorcing My Tyrant Husband
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I'm Divorcing My Tyrant Husband, I Will Divorce My Tyrant Husband

content.synopsis: In a captivating rofan novel, I find myself inhabiting the role of the empress. Initially, this seems like a stroke of good fortune. However, fate has a cruel twist in store as I realize I am destined to follow the same tragic path as the original empress - dethroned by the cunning emperor and succumbing to a fatal illness. Determined to rewrite my own story, I choose to embrace the role of the villain. I orchestrate a daring divorce, indulge in the spoils of the national treasury, revel in opulent luxury, and openly defy societal norms. To my surprise, my rebellious actions only seem to deepen the obsession of my detestable husband. Is he a deviant, or am I playing a dangerous game of seduction?

basic_info.title: Your Ultimate Love Rival
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Namju-ui Yeonjeog-i Doeeo Beoryeotda, I Have Become the Heroes' Rival

content.synopsis: Inherently charismatic, Irene effortlessly draws women to her, unintentionally igniting desire. When her loyal best friend, Claudia, rejects her suitors due to her deep bond with Irene, chaos ensues. Three formidable and volatile men, driven by their obsession with Claudia, see Irene as a romantic adversary and endanger her safety. Recognizing that none of them are worthy of Claudia, Irene is faced with a perilous dilemma – to protect her friend and herself, she must assert her dominance as their primary rival. Can Irene prevail in this high-stakes battle for love and survival?

basic_info.title: Talented Baby Squirrel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Baby Squirrel Is Good at Everything

content.synopsis:
Beatty, a timid squirrel shapeshifter born into a family of lions, endured a life of mistreatment at his aunt's house in the capital. When he confided in his only friend and fiancé, the second prince, about his plan to pursue his dreams, betrayal struck. "Ritter, you traitor...!"

In a fatal encounter, Beatty met his demise at the hands of the prince. Awakening in his childhood past, before his entanglement with the prince, Beatty knew swiftness was key. Escaping to the domain of his true father, the Lion Duke, held the promise of a revelation that could secure his place, even if unwelcome.

"Welcome, Young Miss!"

"OMG! How you've blossomed..."

"Such grace in your steps, Young Miss!"

Perplexed by the unexpected reception, Beatty wondered, could that figure be... his own likeness?

Sixteen-year-old Kira Asou is a shy artist who prefers solitude to the spotlight. When her schoolmate Rei Kashino, known for his womanizing ways, approaches her for directions in the park, Kira's distrust leads her to quickly sketch a map for him and flee. Little does she realize that Rei discovers her hidden talent when he finds one of her drawings on the map's reverse side.

Despite Kira's reluctance, Rei recognizes her at school and tries to engage her in conversation. His genuine admiration for her artistry gradually softens Kira's opinion of him, especially after witnessing his unconventional display of affection towards a statue of Mars. Moved by the experience, Kira boldly asks Rei to model for her.

As their unexpected bond deepens, the clash between Kira's introverted nature and Rei's rebellious spirit sparks a unique connection. Will their budding relationship withstand the stark differences between them?

basic_info.title: Dogs: Bullets & Carnage
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dogs: Bullets and Carnage, Dogs: Hardcore Twins, Dogs Hardcore Twins

content.synopsis: In a futuristic European city with multiple secretive underground levels holding the key to the past, Mihai, a retired assassin, returns to settle an old score and pursue a fresh start as a restaurateur. Haine, a man with canine traits from genetic experiments in his youth, teams up with his bumbling, chain-smoking partner, Badou, who goes haywire without his smokes. Naoto, an amnesiac orphan trained in swordsmanship, joins the fray. As they navigate their intertwined pasts, all roads lead to the enigmatic underground organization that wields control. Dive into the gripping saga in Volume 2: Dogs: Hardcore Twins.

basic_info.title:
Mahou Shoujo Site
Magical Girl Site
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    Mahou Shoujo
            
                Mahou Shoujo,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 魔法少女サイト

content.synopsis: In the midst of relentless bullying at school, Asagiri Aya seeks solace online and stumbles upon a cryptic site named "Magical Girl Site." With just a click, she is thrust into a perilous realm known as the Magical Girl Apocalypse. Amidst a horde of lethal yet cute magical beings clad in frilly skirts, Aya must now fight for survival against these bloodthirsty foes wielding destructive powers and a hunger for chaos.

basic_info.title:
Senpai ga Uzai Kouhai no Hanashi
My Senpai Is Annoying
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Adult Cast
            
                Adult Cast,                    Love Status Quo
            
                Love Status Quo,                    Workplace
            
                Workplace
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 先輩がうざい後輩の話

content.synopsis: Futaba Igarashi's fresh job holds promise, if only her senpai, Harumi Takeda, wasn't so irritating! His laugh grates on her, his imposing presence bothers her, and being treated like a child is the last straw. Despite Futaba's petite stature and youthful appearance, she's far from childish. Even though she's constantly in Takeda's company, she insists he's nothing more than a bothersome senpai... or is he?

basic_info.title:
Kuchi ga Saketemo Kimi ni wa
Even If You Slit My Mouth
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 口が裂けても君には

content.synopsis: Miroku, the slit-mouthed woman with a terrifying smile, faces a waning belief in her once infamous urban legend. Known as the "Queen of Folklore," she unexpectedly finds herself engaged to Kouichi Sano, a 17-year-old from a family tied to the supernatural world. Reluctant to the arrangement, Miroku aims to restore her former glory independently. Sano challenges her: if she can frighten him before his 18th birthday, he will annul the engagement. However, the twist lies in Sano's condition—he must make Miroku fall in love with him.

basic_info.title:
Sensei wa Koi wo Oshierarenai
The teacher can not tell me love
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sensei Can't Teach Me About Love

content.synopsis: High school teacher Rinko Yoshitaka appears to treat student Ryo Arase like any other student, but beneath the surface, a secret romance brews between them. Juggling stolen moments of passion amidst their professional facade, Yoshitaka enforces one strict rule: their forbidden love must remain hidden until Arase reaches 20. As desire threatens to expose them, they must navigate the delicate balance between temptation and discretion to keep their relationship under wraps.

basic_info.title:
Tengoku Daimakyou
Heavenly Delusion
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Heaven's Great Magical Barrier

content.synopsis:
In the shelter of the walls, young ones grow up nurtured by robotic caretakers in a nursery-like environment. Despite the apparent monotony, the children brim with untapped potential and insatiable curiosity, akin to a heavenly realm. Beyond the walls lies a nightmarish wasteland - a realm devoid of technology, ruled by enigmatic and formidable supernatural entities.

Accompanied by Kiruko, Maru ventures through the remnants of Tokyo in pursuit of paradise. However, amidst their relentless quest, the elusive idea of heaven begins to feel more like an unattainable mirage than a plausible existence.

basic_info.title:
Yozakura-san Chi no Daisakusen
Mission: Yozakura Family
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mission of Yozakura family

content.synopsis: Ever since his family perished in a tragic car accident, high school student Taiyou Asano has struggled with social awkwardness. His sole confidante is childhood friend Mutsumi Yozakura, scion of the world's most formidable spy dynasty. Mutsumi's elder brother, the fiercely protective Kyouichirou Yozakura, harbors a dangerous obsession with her, fixated since a past incident left her gravely wounded. Now, Taiyou finds himself in the crosshairs of Kyouichirou's lethal affections. To safeguard himself, Taiyou must wed Mutsumi and join the enigmatic Yozakura clan. As he plunges into a whirlwind of intrigue, Taiyou embarks on a quest to master the art of espionage, all while unraveling the shadowy truths of his own past and the secrets veiled within the Yozakura legacy.

basic_info.title:
Soredemo Ayumu wa Yosetekuru
When Will Ayumu Make His Move?

content.synopsis: When first-year student Ayumu Tanaka impulsively ditches the Kendo Club for the unconventional Shogi Club, he catches the attention of club president Urushi Yaotome, a shogi prodigy. Urushi eagerly embraces Ayumu as her new playing partner and takes on the role of his mentor. Despite Ayumu's straightforward nature, he can't help but tease Urushi, causing her to blush in embarrassment. As their friendship deepens through school life and intense shogi matches, Ayumu grapples with his growing feelings for Urushi. Determined to defeat her in a game before confessing, Ayumu faces a daunting challenge ahead. Will he ever find the courage to reveal his affection for Urushi amidst their shared laughter and competitive spirit?

basic_info.title:
Hanazakari no Kimitachi e
Hana-Kimi: For You in Full Blossom
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: HanaKimi, The Thirsty Moon, The Cage of Summer, Natsu no Ori, Kawaki no Tsuki

content.synopsis: Enthralled by Izumi Sano's high jump prowess, Mizuki Ashiya makes a life-changing move from the United States to Japan just to attend the same all-boys academy as him. Against the odds, Mizuki seamlessly integrates into the school community without her true identity being exposed. Surprisingly, she not only becomes Sano's classmate but also his roommate. However, Mizuki's joy is short-lived as she discovers Sano has abandoned high jumping and is unwilling to resume the sport. Meanwhile, the perceptive academy doctor, Hokuto Umeda, starts to suspect Mizuki's hidden truth. Now, Mizuki faces the daunting task of rekindling Sano's passion without uncovering her own secret. Explore additional stories in the one-shot volumes "Natsu no Ori (The Cage of Summer)" and "Kawaki no Tsuki (The Thirsty Moon)."

In the summer of 2006, the Nanba brothers, Mutta and Hibito, made a pact under a peculiar night sky. Hibito vowed to reach the Moon as an astronaut, while Mutta set his sights on Mars. Fast forward to 2025 - Hibito is on the brink of making history with NASA, aiming to be the first Japanese to touch the lunar surface. Meanwhile, Mutta faces setbacks after losing his job. Just when things seem bleak, a letter from JAXA arrives, offering Mutta a shot at fulfilling his childhood promise. With destiny beckoning, Mutta embarks on a challenging journey towards the stars.

basic_info.title: Green Blood
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: GREEN BLOOD

content.synopsis:
As the civil war ended, the United States embarked on its industrial revolution, drawing immigrants worldwide seeking the American dream. However, instead of prosperity, many found themselves mired in poverty and despair upon reaching Manhattan, New York, where the influx of newcomers transformed the 6th district, Five Points, into a notorious slum. Here, mobsters held sway, corrupting the area and even law enforcement through bribery.

In the midst of this bleak landscape, a glimmer of hope emerged in the form of Luke Burns, a principled teenager who rejected the allure of the mob, recognizing it as the root of the community's suffering. Unbeknownst to Luke, his older brother Brad had become an assassin for the most powerful gang in Five Points, the Grave Diggers, known for their ruthless efficiency. Brad, known as the Grim Reaper, concealed his dark occupation to shield Luke from the dangers of his own path.

basic_info.title: Shamo
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 軍鶏

content.synopsis: At just sixteen, Ryo Narushima was a prodigy destined for Tokyo University and the upper echelons of society. But one fateful summer, a dark shift occurred within him. In a chilling act, he viciously ended his parents' lives, sparing only his trembling sister. And so unfolds the chilling tale that starts with this gruesome turning point in Ryo's life.

basic_info.title:
Kuroiwa Medaka ni Watashi no Kawaii ga Tsuujinai
Medaka Kuroiwa Is Impervious to My Charms

content.synopsis: Mona Kawai is not just cute; she is a vision of beauty that captivates everyone around her. At school, she basks in the adoration of her peers, until she encounters Medaka Kuroiwa, the one person seemingly immune to her allure. Determined to win him over, Mona amps up her charm to no avail. Unfazed by her tactics, Kuroiwa's resistance puzzles her until she discovers his monk training, which shields him from worldly temptations. As Mona pulls out all the stops to enchant him, she unknowingly finds herself drawn to his unintentional gallantry.

Real Account is not your average social media app. For Ataru Kashigawa, a second-year high school student, it's a lifeline to escape reality and find solace in his online community. But when the virtual realm of Real Account twists into a nightmarish game, Ataru is thrust into a deadly competition with ten thousand others.

In this cruel world, losing means not just virtual demise, but real-life obliteration for Ataru and his followers. Amidst the chaos, a doppelganger named Yuuma Mukai emerges, sparking a chain of events that challenge everything Ataru knows about friendship.

As betrayal runs rampant and Ataru is left with only one mysterious follower, he must navigate treacherous games where survival hinges on a fragile online connection. With each challenge bringing him closer to the brink, Ataru must fight to return to reality against all odds.

basic_info.title:
Hataraku Maou-sama!
The Devil Is a Part-Timer!

content.synopsis:
In the realm of Ente Isla, the citizens live under the shadow of fear and darkness, battling the Demon Lord Satan in a fierce war for world dominion. Just when humanity faces its darkest hour, the hero Emilia emerges as their savior, halting Satan's conquest in its tracks. Faced with this setback, Satan and his loyal general, Alciel, are forced to flee to a foreign realm known as Earth.

Determined to reclaim his power, Satan sets his sights on Earth, a world devoid of the magic he once wielded. Undeterred, he adopts the guise of a human named Sadao Maou and takes up a job at a fast-food joint, while Alciel seeks ways to restore their lost magic. Despite the challenges of this new world, Satan remains resolute in his quest for world domination, with ambitions that extend to both Ente Isla and Earth.

As Satan navigates the complexities of human life, embracing the role of a dedicated employee to climb the corporate ladder, his plans face a sudden obstacle in the form of Emilia's reappearance. She resurfaces with a vow to vanquish him once and for all, casting a shadow over Satan's ambitious schemes. Thus unfolds Satan's journey of balancing his human facade with his demonic aspirations, as the clash between good and evil reaches new heights.

basic_info.title:
Imamade Ichido mo Onnaatsukai sareta Koto ga Nai Onna Kishi wo Onnaatsukai suru Manga
How to Treat a Lady Knight Right

content.synopsis:
Leo Cornelia, known far and wide as the "Sacred Sword," bears visible scars that tell tales of her fierce battles. Raised in a lineage of knights, she embodies unmatched strength and resilience, devoting her life to mastering the art of combat. However, her unwavering focus on warfare is challenged when she encounters Fooly Dent, a boy who boldly declares his love for her.

Fooly, harboring unrequited affection for Leo, admires her unwavering determination and prowess despite societal expectations. Amid their joint quests, he praises her, eliciting rare moments of bashfulness from the stoic warrior. Can Leo, accustomed to suppressing her femininity, find the courage to embrace vulnerability, acknowledge her softer side, and reciprocate Fooly's heartfelt sentiments?

basic_info.title:
Zettai Kareshi.
Absolute Boyfriend
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Won't Let You Become a Star!, Ohoshisama ni wa Sasemasen!, Aromatic Boy, Shounen Aromatic

content.synopsis:
High school student Riiko Izawa has faced a string of one-sided crushes, each resulting in rejection. Feeling disheartened after another failed confession, Riiko stumbles upon a lost phone in a nearby park, which she returns to its owner.

The owner, Gaku Namikiri, is an eccentric traveling salesman who offers Riiko a peculiar reward from his company. Half-jokingly, she expresses her desire for a boyfriend, leading Gaku to introduce her to a website showcasing "lover figures," initially perceived as mere dolls. Despite her doubts about the company, Riiko is captivated by the charming "Nightly Series 01" model and signs up for a three-day trial. To her astonishment, a life-sized, unclothed boy is delivered to her the following day!

By kissing the robot as instructed, Riiko activates Night Tenjou, who proves to be the perfect boyfriend during the trial period. However, Gaku later reveals that Riiko missed the deadline to cancel the trial, leaving her with a hefty debt of one hundred million yen. She faces a tough decision: either pay up or keep Night and assist the company as a beta tester to enhance their products. With financial constraints and growing feelings for the artificially intelligent Night, what will Riiko choose?

basic_info.title: Rainbow: Nisha Rokubou no Shichinin
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: RAINBOW 二舎六房の七人

content.synopsis:
In a gritty reformatory, six minors - Joe, Mario, Suppon, Baremoto, Heitai, and Kyabetsu - find themselves plunged into a living nightmare for crimes ranging from assault to fraud. Under the watch of a tyrannical crew and a disturbing doctor, their new reality is a descent into hell.

Conflict brews when they clash with Anchan, a fellow inmate in their cell, leading to a violent confrontation. Their fate takes a surprising turn when a mysterious young man with exceptional boxing skills intervenes, leaving the six friends battered but intrigued.

As they navigate the harsh confines of their confinement, the story delves into their struggles for survival amidst inner turmoil and societal rejection. Amidst the chaos, the bonds forged between these young men prove to be unbreakable, showcasing the power of their extraordinary friendships.

basic_info.title:
Yuukoku no Moriarty
Moriarty the Patriot
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Moriarty's Patriotism

content.synopsis:
In the late 19th century, the British Empire reigns as a formidable force. Amidst rigid class divisions, the common folk face slim prospects of climbing the social ladder, under the oppressive thumb of the aristocratic elite.

Enter William James Moriarty, the sharp-witted second son of the Moriarty lineage, a brilliant mathematics professor with a knack for strategy from a tender age. Alongside his brothers Albert and Louis, he leads the unassuming life of nobility. Beyond academia, William operates as a reputable private advisor, offering solutions to those in need. Yet beneath his amiable facade lies the mastermind orchestrating a clandestine group bent on upending the existing order to forge a bold new world from the remnants of the old.

In "Yuukoku no Moriarty," a fresh take on Arthur Conan Doyle's classic, the narrative delves into the enigmatic origins of its central antagonist, unraveling the transformation of William into the pioneering "criminal consultant."

basic_info.title:
Ohayou, Ibarahime
Wake Up, Sleeping Beauty

content.synopsis:
In the quiet town, Tetsu Misato, a diligent high school student, steps into a new role at his father's housekeeping agency. Assigned to the mansion atop the hill from his childhood tales, Tetsu discovers a hidden garden and a solitary structure harboring the mysterious Shizu Karasawa, the reclusive daughter of the household.

A chance encounter leads Tetsu to Shizu, revealing her secluded life due to a puzzling illness that has kept her isolated for years. As their bond deepens, Tetsu grapples with his growing affection for Shizu. However, as he unravels the truth behind her affliction, he faces a profound revelation that challenges his feelings and beliefs.

Embark on a poignant journey with Tetsu in "Ohayou, Ibarahime," as he embarks on a quest to unveil the essence of Shizu beyond her supernatural ailment, navigating a path intertwined with love, self-discovery, and sacrifice.

basic_info.title:
Jigokusei Remina
Remina
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hellstar Remina, Okuman Bocchi, Army of One

content.synopsis:
In a futuristic Japan, esteemed astrologist Tsuneo Ooguro achieves the unimaginable: he uncovers a new planet from a parallel universe, sparking worldwide fascination. With the honor of naming the planet bestowed upon him, Tsuneo chooses his daughter, Remina, to carry this monumental legacy. However, as planet Remina reveals its bizarre nature, with erratic movements and a mysterious ability to extinguish stars, a chilling revelation emerges: the planet is hurtling towards Earth.

As panic grips the globe and admiration turns to animosity, the Ooguros become scapegoats for the impending calamity. Branded as Public Enemy No. 1, Remina must navigate a frenzied populace desperate to eliminate her family. Meanwhile, the ominous threat of the approaching hellstar looms large, casting a shadow of terror over humanity. Amidst chaos and betrayal, can Remina outrun both her pursuers and the relentless advance of destruction?

This gripping tale unfolds alongside the intriguing one-shot: Okuman Bocchi, adding another layer of suspense and mystery to this thrilling narrative.

Naoya Mukai's long-standing love for his childhood friend, Saki Saki, finally blossoms into a romantic relationship. However, their love story takes an unexpected turn when Naoya is suddenly confronted with a confession from Nagisa Minase. 

Caught between his loyalty to Saki and his desire not to hurt Nagisa, Naoya proposes a controversial solution—two-timing. Despite Saki's initial resistance, both Nagisa and Naoya persist, leading to an unconventional three-way relationship that challenges societal norms and tests the boundaries of love and trust.

basic_info.title:
Kuzumi-kun, Kuuki Yometemasu ka?
Kuzumi-kun, Can't You Read the Room?

content.synopsis:
In the halls of her high school, Erika Sakura reigns as the ultimate queen bee – adored by girls and desired by guys. But when it comes to her classmate Kuzumi, she dismisses him as dull and uninteresting, a mismatch for her glamorous image. Yet, against her better judgment, Erika finds herself strangely drawn to Kuzumi's offbeat charm and unconventional ways.

As Erika delves deeper into Kuzumi's world, she discovers a hidden depth to his character that surprises her. Amidst the school gossip swirling around the enigmatic "madonna," Erika's unexpected connection with Kuzumi leads her down a path she never anticipated.

In an intriguing one-shot tale, "Soga ga Kininaru!" unfolds in Volume 2, Issue 5, offering a glimpse into a captivating pilot story.

basic_info.title:
Ookami Shounen wa Kyou mo Uso wo Kasaneru
The boy who cried wolf tells a lie today also
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Crossdressing
            
                Crossdressing,                    Love Polygon
            
                Love Polygon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 狼少年は今日も嘘を重ねる

content.synopsis:
Despite his gentle nature, Keitarou Itsuki's intimidating gaze alienates those around him. Rejected by Aoi Tokujira after a failed confession, Keitarou becomes convinced that his unsettling eyes are the root of his romantic misfortunes. Seeking solace in his older sister, she intervenes with a transformative solution – a complete makeover that unexpectedly turns Keitarou into a girl.

As Keitarou navigates his new identity and heads home, a chance encounter with Aoi in distress brings unforeseen challenges when she finds herself targeted by a group of boys.

basic_info.title: Full Moon wo Sagashite
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Searching for the Full Moon, Ginyuu Meika, Mangetsu wo Sagashite

content.synopsis: Synopsis: Mitsuki Kouyama, a determined 12-year-old aspiring pop singer, faces a heartbreaking choice when diagnosed with throat sarcoma. Refusing to sacrifice her voice for a cure, she clings to a promise made to her childhood sweetheart, Eichi Sakurai. As her health declines, Mitsuki's fate takes a surprising turn when she encounters two otherworldly beings, shinigami Takuto Kira and Meroko Yui. With their revelation of her limited time left, Mitsuki is granted a miraculous opportunity by Takuto to transform into a healthy sixteen-year-old, enabling her to chase her dream under the alias Full Moon. Amidst the challenges and triumphs of her music career, Mitsuki embraces her newfound path, determined to fulfill her passion before her final curtain call. Plus, delve into Mitsuki's journey with the included bonus story, "Ginyuu Meika," in Volume 2.

basic_info.title:
Ningen Shikkaku
No Longer Human
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 人間失格

content.synopsis:
In a life fraught with shame, Yozo Oba grapples with the enigma of human existence, feeling perpetually adrift amidst the world's jubilation. Struggling with anxiety and a profound disconnection from happiness, he adopts a facade of jest in his descent towards darkness, a somber dance with mortality.

Junji Ito masterfully transforms Osamu Dazai's timeless tale, capturing Yozo's inner turmoil with haunting precision. Each stroke of his manga unravels the intricacies of Yozo's mind, blending fragility and horror seamlessly. Witness a chilling exploration of the human psyche, as art transcends to reveal the abyss within.

basic_info.title: Edens Zero
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi

content.synopsis:
On the distant planet of Granbell, Shiki has spent his days as the lone human resident in the whimsical Granbell Kingdom—an abandoned amusement park run by robots. Everything changes when the spirited Rebecca Bluegarden and her trusty feline, Happy, stumble upon the forgotten park, unaware of its century-long solitude. With dreams of creating captivating content for their B-Cube channel, they unexpectedly befriend the quirky Shiki.

As danger looms from the malfunctioning machines, the trio escapes back to Rebecca and Happy's homeworld, Blue Garden. There, Shiki joins the Shooting Starlight guild as an aspiring adventurer and delves into the enigmatic legend of the goddess, Mother. Intrigued by a strange sense of familiarity with her, Shiki embarks on a daring quest to seek out Mother, a task deemed impossible by many. Joined by Rebecca and Happy, the trio sets off on an exhilarating journey, forging new alliances and capturing thrilling moments on camera as they pursue the elusive Mother.

basic_info.title: Oresama Teacher
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ore-sama Teacher, Omae Watashi no Koto Suki daro

content.synopsis:
Mafuyu Kurosaki, once a tough ex-delinquent with a heart for justice and formidable combat skills, faces a daunting ultimatum: conform to societal norms or risk estrangement. Reluctantly, she embarks on a fresh journey at Midorigaoka Academy, grappling with the challenges of her new academic life and solitary living arrangements. Struggling with meager resources, culinary ineptitude, and an ambitious vision of transforming into an "ultra-shiny female high school student," Mafuyu's aspirations clash with her rough demeanor and a knack for attracting trouble.

Her pursuit is further complicated by the eccentric teaching techniques of Takaomi Saeki, her unorthodox homeroom instructor, and the unexpected camaraderie of Kaori Hayasaka, a fellow delinquent turned friend. Amidst a whirlwind of comedic mishaps, misunderstandings, and pulse-pounding showdowns, Oresama Teacher chronicles Mafuyu's whimsical quest to reconcile her former self with the desire to embody traditional femininity.

Included special chapter:
Volume 29: Omae Watashi no Koto Suki daro

basic_info.title: Toradora!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tiger X Dragon, Tora Dora

content.synopsis: Takasu Ryuuji knows better than anyone that first impressions can be misleading. Despite his gentle nature, his tough appearance earns him a reputation as a delinquent, making it tough for him to connect with others. As he starts his second year of high school, things take an unexpected turn for the better. Ryuuji finds himself seated next to his only friend, Yuusaku, and the girl he secretly admires, Kushieda Minori. But just when he dares to hope for a brighter future, a chance encounter with the school's formidable Aisaka Taiga turns her into his sworn enemy. To make matters worse, Taiga moves in next door to Ryuuji and happens to be Minori's best friend. Will this school year spell disaster for Ryuuji, or is there a glimmer of hope amidst the chaos?

basic_info.title:
Ousama Game
King's Game
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis:
Awakening from a chilling nightmare, Nobuaki Kanazawa is startled by a cryptic text message from a mysterious figure known as the King, introducing them to the dangerous "King's Game." The message sets a grim rule - the entire class must obey the King's commands within 24 hours without any chance to opt out.

Initially dismissing it as a prank, Nobuaki and his classmates soon realize the deadly seriousness of the situation. Disobeying the King's orders leads to gruesome deaths, plunging the class into a spiral of fear and dread. As the commands escalate in brutality, the survival of each student hangs by a thread, casting a shadow of uncertainty over their desperate struggle for life.

As Amu Hinamori navigates her new school, she finds herself known for her "cool and spicy" image, which doesn't align with her true self. Yearning for change, Amu discovers three mysterious eggs that hatch into Ran, Miki, and Suu—her Guardian Characters symbolizing her inner ideals. With their guidance, Amu embarks on a transformative journey, uncovering her hidden potential and facing challenges alongside other Guardian Characters in Shugo Chara!

basic_info.title:
Dosanko Gal wa Namara Menkoi
Hokkaido Gals Are Super Adorable!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dosanko Gyaru Is Mega Cute

content.synopsis:
Freshly transplanted from the bustling streets of Tokyo to the snow-covered landscape of Hokkaido, Tsubasa Shiki finds himself in a chilly predicament. Misjudging the vast distances between towns in this rural region, he inadvertently steps off the taxi in a town far from his intended destination. Determined to make the most of his unexpected detour, Tsubasa sets out to explore his surroundings, only to realize he's in for a three-hour trek to reach his true destination.

As he grapples with the frosty elements, Tsubasa encounters Minami Fuyuki, a charming Dosanko gyaru defying the bone-chilling negative 8-degree weather in the signature gyaru attire of short skirts and bare legs. Amidst the wintry backdrop, an unlikely connection forms between the city slicker Tsubasa and the resilient Hokkaido native Minami, setting the stage for a tale of unexpected encounters and cultural contrasts in the unforgiving winter of Hokkaido.

basic_info.title:
Dungeon ni Deai wo Motomeru no wa Machigatteiru Darou ka
Is It Wrong to Try to Pick Up Girls in a Dungeon?

content.synopsis: In the bustling city of gods and goddesses, beneath which lies a vast dungeon teeming with monsters, Bell Cranel is a young adventurer with grand aspirations. His journey takes a fortuitous turn when a chance encounter leads him to the girl he's always longed for. As he navigates his feelings for the skilled swordswoman and grapples with the attention of the goddess supporting his endeavors, Bell must find his place in this fantastical realm where ambition and jealousy collide.

basic_info.title:
Kareshi Kanojo no Jijou
Kare Kano: His and Her Circumstances
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: His and Hers, The Tiger and the Chameleon: A Promise for One Week, Ashita Mata Mori de Aou ne, Meet Me Again Tomorrow in the Forest, KKNJ, Abareru Ousama, The Raging King

content.synopsis:
Yukino Miyazawa, known as the flawless model student at Hokuei High, excels in beauty, kindness, and academics, all while concealing her true 'queen of vanity' persona. Her sole ambition is to bask in the adoration of her peers.

Her perfect facade is challenged when charismatic Souichirou Arima, a rival in looks, athleticism, and intellect, dethrones her as the top student. Consumed by enmity, Yukino aims to reclaim her former glory.

Unexpectedly, Souichirou, whom she despises, declares his love and uncovers her deceit, leveraging it against her. Through this tumultuous revelation, they unearth shared vulnerabilities, gradually unveiling their authentic selves.

Accompanied by captivating one-shots:
Volume 1: Tora to Chameleon: Yakusoku wa Isshukan (The Tiger and the Chameleon: A Promise for One Week)
Volume 4: Ashita Mata Mori de Aou ne (Meet Me Again Tomorrow in the Forest)
Volume 8: Abareru Ousama (The Raging King)

In the world of anomalies, Koyomi Araragi's life takes a sharp turn when a chance meeting with the vampire Kiss-Shot Acerola-Orion Heart-Under-Blade changes him forever during his high school spring break. When he rescues Hitagi Senjougahara from a fall, he discovers she's been robbed of her weight by a mythical crab. Despite Senjougahara's tough exterior, Araragi persuades her to accept his aid. Seeking a solution, they seek out the enigmatic Meme Oshino, the one who once saved Araragi from his own vampirism. Bakemonogatari delves into the shadows that lurk within each person Araragi encounters.

basic_info.title: Aria
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Aria The Masterpiece

content.synopsis:
In a distant future, humanity has transformed Mars into the oceanic haven of Aqua, a refuge for those seeking solace from the confines of Manhome, once known as Earth. In Neo-Venezia, a mirror image of the ancient city on Manhome, gondolas gracefully navigate the waterways, while quaint alleys beckon curious wanderers.

Akari Mizunashi, a spirited newcomer from Manhome, embraces Neo-Venezia as her new home, driven by her aspiration to become an esteemed gondolier guide, known as an Undine. Joining the prestigious Aria Company, Akari immerses herself in the serene rhythms of life on Aqua, finding joy in the enchanting blend of simplicity and wonder that defines Neo-Venezia—a place where everyday moments are infused with a touch of magic and the promise of miracles.

basic_info.title: Drifters
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Adult Cast
            
                Adult Cast,                    Historical
            
                Historical,                    Isekai
            
                Isekai,                    Samurai
            
                Samurai
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ドリフターズ

content.synopsis: In the midst of a brutal battle with the renowned Tokugawa clan during the Edo period, samurai Toyohisa Shimazu fights relentlessly to secure the retreat of the Shimazu forces. Despite the massacre of his comrades, Toyohisa valiantly forces the enemy to retreat, sustaining fatal injuries in the process. As he walks away from the battlefield, filled with despair, he inexplicably enters a white hallway and is thrust through a door, awakening in a strange new world. Here, he meets other fallen warriors known as Drifters, who join forces to conquer an empire using their past life experiences. Together, they confront a malevolent, enigmatic evil threatening the very existence of humanity.

basic_info.title:
Jahy-sama wa Kujikenai!
The Great Jahy Will Not Be Defeated!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jahy-sama Won't Be Discouraged!

content.synopsis:
Once revered as the Demon Realm's formidable second-in-command, Jahy, the loyal aide to the Demon King, once held sway with an iron grip. However, when a magical girl's destructive assault shatters a powerful, enchanted gem, the entire Demon Realm crumbles into oblivion.

Surviving the cataclysm, Jahy emerges severely weakened, now trapped in the human realm in a diminutive, childlike form. Determined to reclaim her lost might and rebuild the shattered Demon Realm, Jahy embarks on a quest to locate more mystical gems. To achieve her goal, she must navigate the complexities of mundane human existence, from toiling to meet living expenses to engaging in heated disputes with her landlord over tardy rent payments. Despite her diminished state, the indomitable Jahy refuses to be daunted by the challenges that lie ahead!

basic_info.title: Iris Zero
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アイリスzero

content.synopsis:
In the world of "Irises," unique abilities known as "Irises" are believed to be innate to most individuals. These powers range from detecting lies to foreseeing danger through visual cues. Unfortunately, high schooler Tooru Mizushima is an "Iris Zero," lacking this special gift. As a result, he faces constant bullying and strives to blend into the background.

Tooru's quiet existence is disrupted when popular student Koyuki Sasamori enters his life. Gifted with an Iris that identifies the most suitable person for any task, Koyuki enlists Tooru's help in finding the next student council president.

Reluctant at first, Tooru is gradually drawn into Koyuki's quest due to her unwavering optimism. With his sharp deduction skills, Tooru starts unraveling mysteries and connecting with new acquaintances, slowly breaking free from his isolated life as an Iris Zero.

Shintarou Kisaragi, a recluse known as a NEET, had withdrawn from the world for two years until a mysterious cyber girl named Ene unexpectedly appears on his computer screen following an anonymous email. When Ene disrupts Shintarou's computer, he is compelled to step outside for the first time in two years, facing the outside world once more.

basic_info.title: Kiss yori mo Hayaku
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Faster Than a Kiss, Tsuki to Himawari, Moon and Sunflower

content.synopsis: Orphaned siblings Fumino and her brother endure a nomadic existence, shifting between relatives until Fumino's resolve to provide for her brother leads her to consider leaving school. In a twist of fate, her teacher unexpectedly appears, offering to marry her and support them both. Is this a genuine proposal or a mere jest? The manga unfolds the tale of their uncertain future in "Tsuki to Himawari" (Moon and Sunflower), Volume 1.

basic_info.title: Trigun
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tri Gun

content.synopsis:
In the world of "Vash," chaos ensues as bounty hunters chase after the staggering 60,000,000,000$$ reward on his head for the devastation of July city. Despite his unparalleled gunfighting skills, Vash, driven by a desire for "love and peace," only draws his weapons to protect lives.

As the story unfolds, secrets of Vash's enigmatic past and the history of Gunsmoke, the barren planet where the tale unfolds, gradually come to light. Balancing humor with profound character growth, the narrative delves into emotional depths. Accompanied at times by the skilled gunfighter priest, Nicholas D. Wolfwood, Vash faces the enigmatic Gung-Ho Guns, a group of assassins with mysterious motives.

"Trigun" delves into thought-provoking themes of morality, challenging viewers to ponder the essence of moral codes, betrayal, redemption, and the pursuit of righteousness. Amidst the action, the series sparks intense philosophical debates on ethical dilemmas and personal integrity.

Also included: Volume 2 - "Trigun (pilot)" - offering a glimpse into the captivating world of Vash and his tumultuous journey.

basic_info.title:
Takopii no Genzai
Takopi's Original Sin
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Takopii's Original Sin

content.synopsis:
On a mission to spread joy throughout the galaxies, a squid-like creature named Happian ventures from his home planet to Earth. His arrival sparks a series of events that place him in jeopardy of being captured by Earth's inhabitants. A chance encounter with a solemn young girl, Shizuka Kuze, changes everything when she rescues him and dubs him Takopii. Grateful for her kindness, Takopii vows to bring a smile to Shizuka's face.

However, the path to happiness is fraught with challenges. Shizuka faces bullying at school, lacks a father figure, and rarely sees her mother—obstacles that Takopii, in his innocence, struggles to fully comprehend. Yet, Shizuka's bond with her dog, Chappy, serves as a beacon of light that fuels Takopii's determination to brighten her world.

Despite his well-intentioned efforts leading to unexpected outcomes, Takopii remains resolute in his mission. As he delves deeper into understanding human emotions and relationships, he navigates a journey filled with twists and turns in pursuit of his ultimate goal: spreading happiness far and wide.

basic_info.title:
Mahou Shoujo of the End
Magical Girl Apocalypse
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mahou Shoujo OTE, Magical Girl of the End

content.synopsis:
One ordinary day, high school student Kogami Kii is unexpectedly thrust into a bizarre zombie outbreak intertwined with 'magic girls.' Peering out of his classroom window, Kii witnesses a chilling scene: a young girl causing a teacher's head to violently explode. Initially brushing it off as a dream, he soon realizes the terrifying reality as he encounters the eerie girl chanting "magical" while mercilessly attacking his peers.

Joined by his childhood friend, the timid Tsukune, Kii witnesses the unthinkable resurrection of their deceased friends turned into bloodthirsty zombies echoing the haunting word "magical." As they struggle to survive alongside other traumatized survivors, Kii and Tsukune embark on a quest to unravel the mysteries shrouding their shattered world.

basic_info.title: Nichijou
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Everyday, My Ordinary Life

content.synopsis:
Synopsis: At Tokisadame High, the daily routine is anything but ordinary for Yuuko Aioi and her quirky companions. From witnessing their principal wrestle a deer to engaging in chopstick showdowns over sausages, each day brings a new adventure.

Their world gets even more peculiar when they meet a timid robot maid, her enthusiastic inventor, and a wise-cracking feline. In Nichijou, the ups and downs of everyday life never fail to surprise. Also included is a special one-shot: Volume 2 - Nichijou no Prototype (2 chapters).

basic_info.title:
Ballroom e Youkoso
Welcome to the Ballroom

content.synopsis:
In the midst of aimless days at middle school, Tatara Fujita craves a passion to ignite his spirit. Plagued by bullies and self-doubt, his world shifts when the enigmatic Kaname Sengoku rescues him from trouble. A dance maestro on wheels, Sengoku whisks Tatara to Ogasawara Dance Studio, mistaking him for an eager recruit.

Paired with the graceful Shizuku Hanaoka, Tatara takes a leap of faith into a trial lesson. Determined to shed his timid facade, he pleads for dance lessons after another rescue from tormentors. Embracing a vibrant new realm, Tatara immerses himself in the rhythm of the dance floor, his journey unfolding with each step.

basic_info.title:
Mahou Shoujo Madoka★Magica
Puella Magi Madoka★Magica

content.synopsis:
Fourteen-year-old Madoka Kaname experiences a surreal dream featuring a mysterious creature and a girl in distress. The following day, an enigmatic transfer student named Homura Akemi joins Madoka's class, bearing a striking resemblance to the girl from her dream.

As fate would have it, Madoka hears a distress call in her mind, leading her to an injured Kyuubey, the same cat-like being from her dream. Encountering Homura at the scene, Madoka is shocked when her classmate seems to have harmed the helpless creature. Acting swiftly, Madoka, aided by her loyal friend Sayaka Miki, rescues Kyuubey and flees.

Following their escape, Kyuubey presents the girls with an alluring proposition: the chance to become magical girls in exchange for fulfilling any desire. However, the path to fulfilling their wishes may prove to be laden with unforeseen challenges and consequences.

basic_info.title:
Tsuki ga Michibiku Isekai Douchuu
Tsukimichi: Moonlit Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Moon-led Journey Across Another World

content.synopsis: When high school student Misumi Makoto is summoned into a magical realm by the god Tsukuyomi to fulfill the role of a hero, he faces unexpected challenges from formidable beings who push him to the world's fringes. As Tsukuyomi bids him farewell, Makoto is left alone to navigate his own path in this unfamiliar land. Now, the fate of Makoto rests in his own hands as he embarks on a journey of self-discovery and resilience.

basic_info.title: Judge
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery

content.synopsis: Hiroyuki "Hiro" Sakurai grapples with envy as his brother Atsuya dates his childhood crush, Hikari. Tragically, Hiro's jealousy escalates to a fatal outcome for Atsuya. Two years later, Hiro awakens to find himself restrained in darkness, donning a rabbit mask, with his captor's identity shrouded in mystery. As eight others clad in animal masks join him, the haunting "Judge" game unfolds: a harrowing ordeal where participants must scrutinize each other's transgressions to determine who will survive—only four can emerge alive. Amidst the dire stakes, Hiro must navigate treacherous alliances, unravel the secrets behind his selection, and confront the repercussions of his choices on those around him.

basic_info.title: Akumetsu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アクメツ

content.synopsis: Amid Japan's economic crisis, Shiina Nagasawa turns to prostitution to support her family post her father's bankruptcy. At a scandalous party filled with government elites seeking pleasure, Shiina's world collides with chaos when a masked intruder, revealed as her classmate Shou Hazama or "Akumetsu," violently confronts a corrupt official. As the shocking events unfold, leading to a bizarre demise, Shiina grapples with the aftermath. The next day at school, she faces a resurrected Shou Hazama, leaving her to ponder his mysterious agenda and the unsettling truth behind his return.

basic_info.title:
Vanitas no Karte
The Case Study of Vanitas

content.synopsis:
In a world where vampires thrive under crimson moons, one outcast named Vanitas emerges under a rare blue moon, shunned by his own kind. To seek retribution, he crafts the cursed Book of Vanitas, a grimoire destined to unleash havoc upon vampires.

Enter Noé Archiviste, a determined young traveler aboard an airship navigating 19th-century Paris, driven by one mission: to locate the infamous Book of Vanitas. A sudden vampire assault brings him face to face with the mysterious Vanitas, a seemingly ordinary human doctor with a dark secret. Despite his benevolent facade, this enigmatic figure wields the legendary grimoire to cure his vampiric patients, concealing a sinister agenda beneath his caring guise.

basic_info.title:
Kubo-san wa Mob wo Yurusanai
Kubo Won't Let Me Be Invisible
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kubo-san wa Boku wo Yurusanai, Kubo-san Doesn't Leave Me Be (a Mob)

content.synopsis: In his quest for a vibrant youth, high schooler Junta Shiraishi faces an unexpected challenge—his extreme lack of presence renders him virtually invisible to others, leading to bizarre rumors and misunderstandings about his constant absence from school. The only exception is Nagisa Kubo, his mischievous seatmate who delights in teasing him relentlessly. As Kubo's pranks push Shiraishi out of his comfort zone, he begins to realize that his seemingly dull existence may hold unexpected surprises. Explore their dynamic in the pilot "Kubo-san wa Mob wo Yurusanai" in Volume 6.

basic_info.title: Gangsta.
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Adult Cast
            
                Adult Cast,                    Organized Crime
            
                Organized Crime
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: GANGSTA.

content.synopsis:
In the gritty metropolis of Ergastulum, a breed of superhuman individuals known as "twilights" dominates the landscape, stirring up a perpetual clash between them and the ordinary populace. The city's delicate equilibrium is intricately maintained by formidable factions—the Corsica Family, the Monroe Family, the Cristiano Family, and the Paulklee Guild—all leveraging the twilights' prowess.
 
Meet the affable human, Worick Arcangelo, and his taciturn twilight companion, Nicolas Brown, inseparable comrades and co-owners of the impartial group, "The Handymen." Embracing a mercenary lifestyle, they tackle any task that comes their way to make a living. However, their routine takes a surprising turn when they are assigned what appears to be a routine job.

basic_info.title:
3-gatsu no Lion
March Comes in Like a Lion
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sangatsu no Lion, Lion of March

content.synopsis:
Rei Kiriyama, a remarkable shogi player, blazes a trail as a young pro in a sea of seasoned elites. Despite his genius on the board, a weighty burden looms over his teenage shoulders, cast by demanding family ties and sky-high shogi world expectations. Seeking solace from this suffocating pressure, Rei embarks on a quest for independence, yet his disordered existence and introverted nature remain steadfast.

A serendipitous encounter alters the course of Rei's journey when he crosses paths with the nurturing Kawamoto sisters—Akari, the maternal figure, Hinata, the spirited soul, and Momo, the bundle of energy—who extend a helping hand. As 3-gatsu no Lion unfolds, witness Rei's transformation as he navigates through his somber reality, finding the strength to confront the challenges he once eluded.

basic_info.title:
Akagami no Shirayuki-hime
Snow White with the Red Hair
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Akagami no Shirayukihime, Red-haired Snow White, Hachigatsu no Shikisai, Four-Season Color of August, Bind Us, Bokura wo Tsunaide, Shizuku no Saki ni, Natsuyasumi 00-nichime

content.synopsis:
In the vibrant kingdom of Tanbarun, Shirayuki, the beloved herbalist with striking red locks, captures the eye of the conceited Prince Raji Shenazard. When he demands she become his concubine, Shirayuki courageously shears off her hair and escapes under the cover of night.

Lost in the forest, she crosses paths with Zen Wistalia, the noble prince of neighboring Clarines. Their fates intertwine when Zen falls victim to a poisoned apple sent by Prince Raji, and Shirayuki's herbal prowess saves his life.

Joined by Zen's loyal companions, Kiki and Mitsuhide, Shirayuki embarks on a journey to Clarines, aspiring to establish herself as a court apothecary. As her bond with Zen deepens, they navigate the complexities of their blossoming relationship amidst societal expectations.

Delve into their enchanting tale in these captivating one-shots:

Volume 1: Hachigatsu no Shikisai (Colorful Seasons of August)

Volume 2: Bokura wo Tsunaide. (Connect Us)

Volume 13: Shizuku no Saki ni (Beyond the Drops)

Volume 14: Natsuyasumi 00-nichime (00 Days of Summer Vacation)

basic_info.title:
Kusuriya no Hitorigoto
The Apothecary Diaries
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Drugstore Soliloquy

content.synopsis:
In a grand imperial court, the spirited 17-year-old girl Maomao was abducted and thrust into servitude within the emperor's palace. Unfazed, she embraces her role with curiosity and practicality, biding her time until freedom. However, when news of the emperor's ailing infants spreads, Maomao, a former pharmacist from the impoverished red-light district, takes clandestine action.

Despite her efforts to remain incognito, Maomao attracts the attention of Jinshi, a powerful eunuch who appreciates her skills. Ascending to the inner court, Maomao gains renown for her unorthodox methods and expertise in unraveling medical enigmas.

basic_info.title: Battle Royale
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    Survival
            
                Survival
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: バトル・ロワイアル

content.synopsis:
Once a year, fate selects a group of students to face a grim reality: survival at any cost in a desolate wilderness. Mistakenly embarking on what they thought was a graduation trip, Shuuya Nanahara and his classmates from Shiroiwa Junior High's Class B are thrust into an unforgiving game called The Program.

Stranded on an isolated island, the 42 students awaken to the chilling truth of their predicament – metal collars around their necks primed to explode if they disobey the rules. To secure their freedom, they must eliminate their peers by any means necessary, with only the last one standing declared the victor. Amidst the chaos, Shuuya resolves to defy the system, determined to escape the island without succumbing to the game and end the cycle of violence once and for all.

basic_info.title:
Yuu☆Yuu☆Hakusho
Yu Yu Hakusho
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yuu Yuu Hakusho, YuYu Hakusho, Two Shots

content.synopsis:
Fourteen-year-old rebel Yuusuke Urameshi is a troublemaker who thrives on street brawls with rival Kazuma Kuwabara and teasing his childhood friend Keiko Yukimura. However, his life takes a drastic turn when he sacrifices himself to save a child from an oncoming car.

Guided by the spirit guide Botan, Yuusuke witnesses the impact of his death on those he left behind. Deeply moved by their grief, he is given a chance to return to life by Koenma, the son of the Spirit World ruler.

Now reborn, Yuusuke becomes a "Spirit Detective" under Koenma's command, tackling a series of supernatural mysteries. Alongside allies like the alluring Kurama and the fierce Hiei, he hones his combat skills while facing looming threats from the Underworld. As he fights to protect his world, Yuusuke discovers newfound strength in defending the people he once took for granted.

basic_info.title: Billy Bat
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BILLY BAT

content.synopsis: Japanese-American Kevin Yamagata, a former Allied Forces member in World War II, is now the creative force behind the popular detective comic book "Billy Bat." When Kevin realizes that his iconic character may not be as original as he thought, having possibly been inspired by a pre-existing Japanese comic, he embarks on a journey to Japan to track down the original creator of Billy Bat. As he delves into the character's origins, Kevin uncovers a chilling trail of murders intertwined with the creation of Billy Bat, leading him into a sinister and mysterious past that challenges his own perception of reality.

basic_info.title: Dragon Ball Super
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dragon Ball Chou, DBS

content.synopsis: After triumphing over Boo, Goku finds himself growing weary of the mundane routine on Earth. Despite his wife Chi-chi's pleas for him to seek employment, Goku's heart remains set on honing his fighting skills and facing formidable adversaries. Meanwhile, in distant galaxies, the formidable God of Destruction, Beerus, accompanied by his enigmatic companion Whis, roams the cosmos in pursuit of sustenance and amusement. Following his destructive tendencies, Beerus recalls a figure from his visions known as the "Super Saiyan God," sparking his interest in locating this enigmatic individual. With Beerus setting a course for Earth in search of this mysterious being, could this new threat offer Goku the exhilarating challenge he craves?

In the 19th century, amid the vibrant tapestry of a tribal town near the Caspian Sea in Central Asia, life unfolds along the ancient Silk Road. Deep-rooted customs and traditions shape the existence of the townsfolk, including the striking Amir Halgal. A master of archery, hunting, and horseback riding, the 20-year-old beauty arrives from a distant village for an arranged union with the youthful Karluk Eihon, a charming 12-year-old.

Navigating the complexities of their significant age gap, Amir and Karluk embark on a journey of discovery and understanding. Through their daily interactions, a tender bond blossoms, intertwining love and mutual respect. "Otoyomegatari" intricately weaves the tales of Amir and Karluk with those of other couples in Central Asia, painting a vivid mosaic of the era's brides and their enduring traditions and challenges.

basic_info.title:
Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou
Girls' Last Tour

content.synopsis:
In a desolate post-apocalyptic setting, Chito and Yuuri emerge as the sole survivors of a catastrophic war that has obliterated civilization. With no fixed abode, the girls traverse the city on their trusty half-track motorcycle, scavenging for essentials to sustain their nomadic existence. Despite the grim prospects looming over them, the duo manages to find solace in simple pleasures amidst their poignant journey. 

Shoujo Shuumatsu Ryokou unfolds in a stark winter landscape, where the carefree Yuuri and pragmatic Chito embark on a seemingly futile quest for remnants of society. Their expedition, tinged with a blend of hope and despair, could well mark humanity's final odyssey.

In a world where shamans bridge the gap between the living and the spiritual realm, the Shaman Fight stands as the ultimate test of their power. Once every five hundred years, shamans converge from across the globe to vie for the coveted title of Shaman King, a privilege that bestows authority over the Great Spirit itself.

When Manta Oyamada, a regular middle schooler, stumbles upon the enigmatic You Asakura in a cemetery one fateful night, his ordinary life takes a supernatural turn. You, a budding shaman, enlists Manta's aid as the only one who can see the spectral companions that surround them. With the guidance of the ancient samurai spirit Amidamaru, the unlikely duo embarks on a quest to fulfill You's destiny of claiming the mantle of Shaman King.

As alliances form and rivalries ignite, the stage is set for a thrilling clash of shamanic prowess where the boundaries between the physical and spiritual worlds blur. Join Manta and You on an exhilarating journey towards the pinnacle of shamanic power in the original saga of Shaman King.

basic_info.title:
Kuroko no Basket
Kuroko's Basketball
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kuroko no Basuke, The Basketball Which Kuroko Plays

content.synopsis: At Teikou Middle School, the legendary basketball team known as the "Generation of Miracles" once reigned supreme. Comprised of five extraordinary prodigies, each possessing unmatched skills, they were considered unbeatable by their third year. However, their pride led to their downfall, causing them to disband and pursue separate paths after graduating. Amidst this legacy, a new player, Taiga Kagami, emerges on the scene, poised to challenge the shadows of the past.

basic_info.title:
Hibi Chouchou
Like a Butterfly
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Daily Butterfly

content.synopsis:
Suiren Shibazeki is known for her enchantingly cute appearance that turns heads wherever she goes. From elementary school, where boys' excessive attention led her to avoid them completely, to a stint in an all-girls middle school that still couldn't shield her from constant adoration, Suiren now wears a mask of silence and impassivity.

Upon entering high school, Suiren finds herself once again in the spotlight, dubbed "Takane no Hana" by the boys – a flower on a lofty peak, admired from afar. Amid her admirers stands Kouha Kawasumi, a quiet and skilled karate practitioner who captures her attention unlike the rest. Though initially unresponsive to her affection, Kouha steps in to protect Suiren from a group of boys, igniting a tender romance between these two reserved souls.

basic_info.title:
Gyo: Ugomeku Bukimi
Gyo: The Death-Stench Creeps
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Sad Tale of the Principal Post, The Enigma of Amigara Fault, Daikokubashira Hiwa, Ashura no Dansou no Kai

content.synopsis:
When diver Tadashi and his girlfriend Kaori Sawahara embark on a coastal getaway to Okinawa, their troubled relationship takes a backseat to a chilling discovery. A bizarre four-legged fish launches a terrifying assault on their cabin, leaving behind a foul stench of death that lingers ominously.

This initial attack heralds a wave of horrors as more otherworldly creatures emerge from the sea, unleashing chaos. Fleeing to Tokyo provides no respite, as the eerie death stench pursues them relentlessly, nowhere to escape its creeping dread.

Amigara Dansou no Kai (The Enigma of Amigara Fault)

Following a catastrophic earthquake near Amigara mountain, a massive fault line emerges, revealing a haunting secret. Human-shaped holes dot the rock face, each seemingly tailor-made for specific individuals, beckoning them into the depths of the mountain with an inexplicable pull.

Daikokubashira Hiwa (The Sad Tale of the Principal Post)

As a family celebrates their new home, their joy is shattered by the father's anguished cries from the crawl space below. What they witness there is a bizarre tragedy beyond comprehension, a haunting mystery that defies explanation.

basic_info.title: Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yokohama Shopping Log, Yokohama Shopping Trip, Touge

content.synopsis:
In a world reshaped by a catastrophic event that submerged Yokohama after Mt. Fuji's eruption, humanity's era is waning. Meet Alpha Hatsuseno, an android overseeing a quaint cafe near Yokohama, abandoned by her absent owner. Despite the sparse clientele, Alpha exudes a sunny disposition.

While awaiting her owner's return, Alpha embarks on adventures through the area on her scooter, capturing moments with her camera and forming connections with fellow androids and humans. 

Yokohama Kaidashi Kikou is a serene tale that follows Alpha's daily routines, highlighting the gentle passage of time amidst the backdrop of a transformed world.

basic_info.title:
Kage no Jitsuryokusha ni Naritakute!
The Eminence in Shadow
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy

content.synopsis: In a realm of great heroes and diabolical villains, one man stands apart—Cid Kagenou. Unlike those who seek glory, Cid craves the power to orchestrate it all. Reincarnated into a world of magic, he is determined to unveil the supremacy of shadow! Disguised as a mere mob character, Cid forms the deceptive Shadow Garden and sets his sights on dismantling the enigmatic Cult of Diablos. With cunning schemes and unexpected twists, Cid's journey unfolds as he navigates a world where illusion and reality collide.

basic_info.title: Juujika no Rokunin
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cross of the Six

content.synopsis:
Dubbed "Experiment A" by a group of tormentors during his turbulent sixth-grade year, Shun Uruma clung to survival amidst relentless bullying. But when his attackers turned their cruelty towards his family, pushing him to his breaking point, Uruma found solace and resolve in his WWII veteran grandfather. Seeking retribution, Uruma implored his grandfather to mentor him in the art of vengeance.

After years of rigorous preparation, Uruma sets out on a relentless quest for justice, vowing to confront the five tormentors who inflicted unimaginable suffering during his school days.

basic_info.title:
Namaikizakari.
Cheeky Brat
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Team Sports
            
                Team Sports
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: なまいきざかり。

content.synopsis:
As the eldest sibling in a bustling household, Yuki Machida carries the weight of responsibility from a tender age, always putting her siblings' needs before her own, familiar with the ache of unspoken emotions and constant disappointments.

Joining the basketball club on a whim to be closer to her crush, Machida's world shifts when the talented and enigmatic Shou Naruse joins the team. Intrigued by Machida, Naruse's persistent pursuit challenges her composed facade, from unexpected kisses to seeking consent for intimate gestures. Balancing her composure with Naruse's unabashed advances proves to be a tough feat, especially as he makes no effort to hide his intentions, leaving Machida torn between her focus on basketball and the allure of his desires.

basic_info.title: Eyeshield 21
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アイシールド21

content.synopsis:
At Deimon Private High School, Sena Kobayakawa, a timid and small student often picked on by bullies, starts a new chapter. When he evades trouble with lightning speed, a skill honed from years of escaping tormentors, he catches the eye of the fearsome captain of the Devil Bats football team, Youichi Hiruma.

Dazzled by Sena's remarkable speed, Hiruma recruits him as a running back, dubbing him "Eyeshield 21" to keep his identity hidden. Despite Sena's initial reluctance and dream of being the team manager, he finds a new passion for the game. Together, they set their sights on the ultimate goal: winning the Christmas Bowl, the prestigious high school football championship.

In high school, Makoto Okazaki faces relentless bullying, serving as the errand boy for his classmates. However, everything shifts one fateful night when a mysterious girl attacks him, drinking his blood and presenting him with a life-altering decision: join her immortal ranks or face death. Awakening in a hospital, Makoto grapples with newfound sensitivity to light and an insatiable thirst that water cannot satiate.

basic_info.title:
Ao no Hako
Blue Box
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Team Sports
            
                Team Sports
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アオのハコ

content.synopsis:
Taiki Inomata, a third-year student at Eimei Academy known for its top-notch sports program, is determined to excel in badminton. Despite his efforts to be the first at open practice, he always finds Chinatsu Kano, a talented first-year basketball player and his crush, one step ahead.

Chinatsu's popularity and skills overshadow Taiki's, posing a challenge for him to win her attention. However, fate takes a surprising turn when Chinatsu moves into Taiki's home. Motivated to match her prowess, Taiki sets his sights on the Nationals, pushing himself to the limit to establish a bond with his unexpected housemate.

basic_info.title: Dead Dead Demons Dededede Destruction
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: デッドデッドデーモンズデデデデデストラクション

content.synopsis:
Gaze up at the sky above Tokyo, and you won't find blue serenity or promising freedom. Instead, a foreboding alien mothership dominates the cityscape, casting a shadow over its people.

The "Invaders" descended three years ago, plunging humanity into its fiercest conflict yet—a war with the power to shatter the world. The Japanese authorities mobilized against the threat, igniting debates and resistance movements over the mass production of weapons.

Despite this pivotal moment, life for Kadode Koyama and Ouran Nakagawa remains unchanged. They navigate their final high school days with routine innocence—attending classes, cherishing friendships, and embracing carefree moments.

Growing up reveals harsh truths in a world where adults embody deceit and destruction. Amidst the chaos, Kadode and Ouran discover that the true peril to mankind lies not in the Invaders above, but in the inner demons of humanity itself.

basic_info.title:
Karakai Jouzu no Takagi-san
Teasing Master Takagi-san
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Skilled Teaser Takagi-san

content.synopsis:
In a classroom filled with whispered giggles, the cunning middle schooler Nishikata shoots a sly glance at Takagi, his teasing nemesis seated beside him. Determined to turn the tables on her relentless pranks, he hatches a brilliant scheme. But just as he prepares to execute his plan, Takagi effortlessly disrupts his strategy with a simple yet powerful remark, leaving Nishikata stunned in his tracks. Once again, she outwits him.

Their unspoken challenge, "If you blush, you lose," has defined their rivalry since their fateful meeting in middle school. Each day brings new attempts by Nishikata to make Takagi blush in defeat, yet his efforts only invite more teasing. Caught in this never-ending game of one-upmanship, can their dynamic ever shift beyond these playful yet poignant exchanges?

basic_info.title:
Suki tte Ii na yo.
Say I Love You.

content.synopsis:
Despite a past scarred by bullying, 16-year-old Mei Tachibana shuns friendship to shield herself from hurt. In stark contrast is school heartthrob Yamato Kurosawa, a charming flirt with a string of past romances. Intrigued by Mei's aloofness, Yamato resolves to befriend her against all odds.
