When Yamato shields Mei from a stalker one night, she starts to question her true feelings for him. Their unlikely bond blooms into a relationship, stirring jealousy among Mei's peers. As their connection deepens, Mei must confront her emotions and find the courage to express her love.

In the enchanted kingdom of Clow, the amiable Syaoran shares a deep bond with Sakura, the princess blessed with the power to reshape reality. When a sinister figure schemes to harness Sakura's extraordinary gift, her memories disperse across diverse realms as ethereal feathers. To rescue Sakura from this perilous plight, Syaoran enlists the enigmatic Dimensional Witch's aid and crosses paths with two fellow wanderers—Kurogane, a skilled warrior with a shadowy past, and Fai D. Flourite, a charming magician fleeing his own secrets.

Kurogane, an exiled ninja yearning for redemption, seeks a way back to his forsaken homeland, while Fai, a wanderer from Celes, craves escape from his haunting history. Each traveler must relinquish their prized possession to traverse dimensions, and Syaoran, in a selfless act, sacrifices his cherished bond with Sakura to secure their passage. United by a shared resolve, Syaoran, Kurogane, and Fai embark on a perilous odyssey through myriad worlds, defying the threads of fate that seek to ensnare them.

basic_info.title:
Shigatsu wa Kimi no Uso
Your Lie in April
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis:
From a young age, Kousei Arima's piano prowess earned him the title of "Human Metronome." Yet, tragedy struck when his mother's passing left him tone-deaf and withdrawn from the limelight. Now, living a mundane existence with his pals Tsubaki Sawabe and Ryouta Watari, Kousei's musical spark seems all but extinguished.

Enter Kaori Miyazono, a vibrant violinist who shatters Kousei's world of rigid scores with her free-spirited playing. As Kaori guides him back to music, a tale of friendship, love, and one fateful falsehood unfolds, painting Kousei's once-dull life in vibrant hues of change and redemption.

basic_info.title:
Totsukuni no Shoujo
The Girl From the Other Side: Siúil, a Rún
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Foreign Girl

content.synopsis:
In ancient times, the realms were ruled by the god of light and the god of darkness. The devoted followers of light basked in joy and prosperity, while the shadowy deity brought mischief and sorrow to the people. To teach the dark god a lesson, the god of light transformed him into a fearsome monster. Enraged, the now cursed god of darkness unleashed his wrath on others, leading to his eternal exile to the forbidding lands of the Outside.

In the divided world of Insiders and Outsiders, a young girl named Shiva, belonging to the Inside, crosses paths with an Outsider known as Sensei. Despite the taboo against contact, Sensei becomes Shiva's protector, forging an unlikely bond that defies the ancient rules. As they navigate a precarious existence, dangers loom not only from the Outside but also from within Shiva's own community, threatening to unravel their fragile happiness.

basic_info.title:
Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun
Monthly Girls' Nozaki-kun

content.synopsis:
Confessing to your crush is already a nerve-wracking ordeal, especially for Chiyo Sakura at Roman Academy. When Umetarou Nozaki swoops in to save her from lateness on the first day of school, Sakura finds her heartstrings tugged. As their second year unfolds, Sakura summons the courage to lay bare her feelings in a post-school confession. Little does she know, Nozaki is the renowned shoujo manga artist, "Sakiko Yumeno," celebrated for his empathetic portrayals of girls' emotions. Yet, the twist? Nozaki is clueless about love in reality. 

Misinterpretations abound when Nozaki mistakes Sakura's heartfelt admission for mere fan admiration, gifting her an autograph in return. This mix-up propels Sakura into an unexpected role as Nozaki's manga assistant. Gekkan Shoujo Nozaki-kun tracks Sakura's comedic journey as she navigates her unrequited love for the oblivious Nozaki, all while aiding him with his manga creations and encountering other eccentric classmates at Roman Academy who are also part of his manga team.

basic_info.title: Btooom!
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            High Stakes Game
            
                High Stakes Game,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    Survival
            
                Survival
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BTOOOM!

content.synopsis:
In the mundane world, Ryouta Sakamoto is a detestable NEET, but in the virtual realm, he reigns as a formidable player in the explosive game Btooom! After soaring to the 10th global rank, his triumph is abruptly halted as he awakens on a remote island, a stark contrast to his familiar surroundings.

Transported by an unknown malevolent force, Ryouta finds himself plunged into a deadly real-life version of Btooom!, alongside the alluring Himiko and the resourceful Kiyoshi Taira. The virtual bombs he once controlled now pose a real threat, capable of inflicting fatal consequences. With survival at stake, Ryouta must summon his resolve to navigate this brutal battleground, where the sole escape route demands the elimination of seven adversaries.

basic_info.title: Tomodachi Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Friend Game

content.synopsis:
Yuuichi Katagiri has faced financial struggles his entire life, finding solace in his tight-knit group of friends. Determined to fulfill a promise, he diligently saves up for a school trip, only to have the funds vanish under suspicious circumstances. The blame falls on his friends Shiho Sawaragi and Makoto Shibe, despite their innocence.

Soon after, Yuuichi and his friends are lured into separate traps through enigmatic letters, leading them to a mysterious encounter. They awaken in a strange room, face to face with the enigmatic "Manabu-kun."

basic_info.title:
Beck
BECK: Mongolian Chop Squad
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis:
During his uninspired middle school days, Yukio "Koyuki" Tanaka finds solace in Japanese pop tunes until a chance encounter with the mysterious guitarist Ryuusuke "Ray" Minami transforms his world. Introduced to the electrifying realm of western rock music, Koyuki's dormant passion for guitar ignites.

As Koyuki navigates the hurdles on his journey to rock stardom, he tenaciously holds onto his newfound purpose, juggling music with the demands of school, work, and friendships. Beck chronicles the trials and triumphs of chasing a musical dream, as Koyuki and Ray strive to create the ultimate band.

basic_info.title:
Bokutachi wa Benkyou ga Dekinai
We Never Learn
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: BokuBen, We Can't Study

content.synopsis:
In memory of his late father's wise words, Nariyuki Yuiga, a third-year high school student at Ichinose Academy, embarks on a mission to transform his academic destiny. Despite a past plagued by academic struggles, Nariyuki sets his sights on securing the prestigious VIP nomination scholarship, a beacon of hope for his struggling family's future.

While Nariyuki seems poised to clinch the coveted nomination, his path is fraught with unexpected challenges. Outshone by his peers Rizu Ogata in mathematics and Fumino Furuhashi in literature, Nariyuki's journey takes a dramatic turn when he is granted the scholarship under one condition: he must tutor his brilliant yet academically mismatched classmates.

Thrilled by the opportunity yet daunted by the daunting task ahead, Nariyuki must navigate the complexities of tutoring Rizu and Fumino in subjects they not only struggle with but also aspire to pursue in their academic pursuits. With the looming deadline of university applications drawing near, Nariyuki races against time to devise a tutoring strategy that will unlock his classmates' full potential before their dreams slip away.

basic_info.title:
Mugen no Juunin
Blade of the Immortal
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Inhabitant of Infinity

content.synopsis: In the heart of feudal Japan, the infamous swordsman known as the "Hundred Man Killer," Manji, strikes fear into the hearts of many with his immortal existence, a gift from the ancient nun Yaobikuni. To rid himself of this curse, Manji pledges to slay one thousand evil souls. His path crosses with Rin Asano, a determined young woman seeking vengeance for her murdered parents. Reluctant at first, Manji eventually agrees to aid Rin in her quest for justice. Bound by a shared purpose, they set off on a dangerous journey of retribution and redemption, each fighting for their own salvation.

Alone since the passing of his parents, Kimihiro Watanuki navigates high school life while grappling with the constant presence of otherworldly beings drawn to him. Eager to be free from these spectral disturbances, his escape leads him to a peculiar store during a harrowing chase by a pack of spirits. Within its walls, he encounters Yuuko Ichihara, the enigmatic proprietress who offers to fulfill his deepest desires in exchange for a steep cost.

Bound by this mystical pact, Kimihiro embarks on a journey within Yuuko's realm, where he must confront the supernatural and serve in her shop to earn the price of his wish. As he delves deeper into this mysterious world, he faces strange and daunting challenges that will test his resolve. How will Kimihiro navigate the uncharted waters of his newfound reality and the inexplicable encounters that lie ahead?

basic_info.title:
Imawa no Kuni no Alice
Alice in Borderland
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    High Stakes Game
            
                High Stakes Game,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    Survival
            
                Survival
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 今際の国のアリス

content.synopsis:
High school student Ryouhei Arisu is grappling with uncertainty about the future, seeking solace in fleeting moments away from reality. One night, after a visit to a bar with his closest companions, Daikichi Karube and Chouta Segawa, they witness a mesmerizing display of fireworks that plunges them into darkness.

When they awaken, they find themselves back at the bar, only to realize that the once-familiar cityscape has transformed into a desolate wasteland. Surprisingly, rather than fear, Arisu is invigorated by the newfound freedom amidst the urban decay. However, their newfound tranquility is shattered when they stumble into a vibrant festival that seems too good to be true—a fatal misconception that plunges them into a perilous game.

Joined by his friends, Arisu ventures into the enigmatic realm called the Borderland—a treacherous land where every move is a gamble, and survival hinges on their ability to outwit the deadly challenges that await them.

In the towering utopia of Zalem, casting a shadow over the horizon, lies the grim underbelly known as The Scrapyard, a repository for the city's refuse. Amidst the heaps of detritus dwell both humans and cyborgs, scrabbling for survival by any means necessary.

One day, Daisuke Ido, a skilled cyborg repair doctor, uncovers the head of a young female cyborg amidst a mound of discarded android parts. Crafting her a new body, he christens her Gally. Upon awakening, Gally possesses no recollection of her past, yet finds solace in Ido's presence.

Unbeknownst to Gally, Ido leads a double life as a hunter-warrior, a mercenary in the employ of The Scrapyard's ruling authority. Ignoring Ido's cautionary words, she embarks on her own path as a hunter-warrior, tapping into latent combat skills. Empowered by her newfound abilities, Gally navigates the treacherous alleys of The Scrapyard and beyond, piecing together fragments of her history in pursuit of her true identity.

basic_info.title:
Tonikaku Kawaii
Fly Me to the Moon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Generally Cute

content.synopsis:
Growing up with a name that invited mockery, Nasa Yuzaki aspires to carve out a memorable legacy. His chance arrives as he clinches the top spot in the national mock exams, securing admission to his dream high school. 

Life takes a dramatic turn one fateful night when a captivating girl catches his eye. Smitten by her irresistible charm, Nasa plunges headfirst into love at first sight. Oblivious to the imminent danger hurtling towards him, he narrowly escapes death, saved by the mysterious girl. Grateful for her intervention, Nasa summons the courage to declare his feelings, afraid she might disappear forever. As he gradually recuperates, his fate intertwines with hers in ways he never imagined.

Rabbit Doubt has swept through Tokyo like a whirlwind. In this chilling cellphone game, players band together as "rabbits" on a mission to unmask the elusive "wolf" among them. Failure to expose the cunning predator means facing ruthless elimination, one by one, until the entire group vanishes.

When Yuu Aikawa crosses paths with Rei Hazama, Haruka Akechi, and Eiji Hoshi, the game transcends the digital realm as they gather in the real world. Alongside Yuu's loyal friend, Mitsuki Houyama, the group opts for a lively karaoke night. However, the festive atmosphere takes a dark turn when Yuu ventures to check on a friend and is ambushed by a shadowy figure donning a twisted rabbit mask. Awakening in an eerie deserted asylum, Yuu finds himself confined with a cryptic boy. As they reunite with the others, a bone-chilling message appears on a cellphone: "Rabbit Doubt, Start!"

In Doubt, six high schoolers are thrust into a perilous survival showdown that challenges their principles and bonds. With their very lives hanging in the balance, they must swiftly unveil the wolf hidden among them—or face a harrowing fate as hunted prey.

In a world teeming with life, there exist the enigmatic Mushi: entities that simply "exist," unfettered by the concepts of good or evil. These elusive beings take on myriad forms, from mimicking plants to embodying diseases and even phenomena like rainbows.

To most, Mushi remain a mystery, hidden from human awareness. Enter Ginko, a Mushishi driven by the relentless pursuit of understanding these ethereal creatures and their place in the intricate tapestry of existence.

With a thirst for knowledge, Ginko tirelessly tracks whispers of Mushi-related phenomena, seeking answers that could unlock the very essence of life itself. As the mysteries of the Mushi unravel, so too do the profound questions that shape their existence.

basic_info.title: Goblin Slayer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ゴブリンスレイヤー

content.synopsis:
In a realm haunted by gigantic beasts and terrifying monsters, a seemingly lesser evil lurks in the shadows: the goblin. Though not as imposing as the monstrous creatures that dominate the land, goblins possess a capacity for savage violence, banding together to unleash destruction.

Meet the renowned Goblin Slayer, whose unwavering purpose is to eradicate goblins, relentlessly hunting them down. Through the realm's established adventurer mission system, Goblin Slayer eagerly takes on any task related to goblins.

During one mission, he crosses paths with a young Priestess, whom he saves from a brutal goblin assault that left her companions brutally attacked. Despite his initial reluctance towards forming bonds, Goblin Slayer gradually forms a connection with Priestess and their growing party. As they embark on perilous adventures that challenge his single-minded focus on goblin-slaying, he strives to protect his comrades from harm while confronting the childhood trauma that shaped him into a relentless killing machine.

basic_info.title:
Kaoru Hana wa Rin to Saku
The Fragrant Flower Blooms with Dignity

content.synopsis:
Adjacent yet worlds apart, Chidori Public High School and the prestigious Kikyo Private Academy coexist with a stark divide. Kikyo, known for its affluent student body and pristine reputation, holds a deep-seated animosity towards their delinquent Chidori counterparts.

Meet Rintarou Tsumugi, the enigmatic sixteen-year-old from Chidori with a forbidding visage that keeps others at bay. Unfazed by his intimidating facade, Rintarou finds solace among his loyal friends, all while harboring a secret: his involvement in his family's beloved cake shop.

During a routine day at the shop, a mysterious customer catches Rintarou's eye, only to vanish before their encounter can unfold. As he grapples with this fleeting connection, an unexpected apology sets off a chain of events that will intertwine the fates of Chidori and Kikyo in unforeseen ways.

basic_info.title:
Boku dake ga Inai Machi
Erased

content.synopsis:
Satoru Fujinuma, a struggling 29-year-old pizza deliveryman with an unsuccessful career as a mangaka, harbors a unique gift: an ability he dubs "Revival" that catapults him back in time to prevent impending tragedies. Plunged into turmoil when a loved one falls victim to a mysterious killer, Satoru finds himself framed for the crime. In a bizarre twist of fate, he is hurled 18 years into the past, facing the haunting disappearance of his classmate, Kayo Hinazuki.

Now a young elementary school student, Satoru must unravel the enigma surrounding Kayo's fate to alter her grim destiny. As he delves deeper, the ties between Kayo's murder and the present-day mysteries slowly unravel, leading to a gripping tale of redemption and revelation.

basic_info.title: Jagaaaaaan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jagan

content.synopsis:
Shintarou Jagasaki, a disillusioned neighborhood police officer, masks his discontent with a facade of goofiness as he dreams of a life less ordinary. His mundane routine takes a dark turn when he witnesses a chilling murder by a monstrous-faced man, leading to a tragic loss. Confronted with his regrets, Shintarou discovers an unexpected power within himself: the ability to shoot lethal projectiles from his fingertips.

Marked by this newfound power, Shintarou learns from a wise owl that the monstrous beings were once human, transformed by a malevolent entity known as the "Mad Xenopus." Initially reluctant to engage with this supernatural world, Shintarou is compelled to act when his fiancée falls under the creatures' influence. Determined to protect his loved ones and survive, he embarks on a perilous mission to eliminate the transformed former humans.

basic_info.title: Holyland
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Delinquents
            
                Delinquents,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Holy Land

content.synopsis:
In a cruel world that rejects him, Yuu Kamishiro is a lost soul seeking acceptance. Bullied and ostracized at school, he abandons his studies to wander the night streets in search of a sanctuary where he belongs.

Amidst the shadows, Yuu discovers a path to validation through violence and the lawless realm of the streets. Embracing his fists as tools of empowerment, he hones his skills in a singular boxing punch, transforming into the formidable "Thug Hunter." Word of his prowess spreads like wildfire, drawing challengers seeking to test his mettle.

With every brawl, Yuu delves deeper into the gritty underworld, battling not only external foes but also the darkness gnawing at his soul. As he inches closer to his envisioned "holyland," the stakes escalate, and Yuu must confront the twisted society that threatens to consume him.

In the bustling hallways of high school, Miko Yotsuya's ordinary life takes a chilling turn as she begins to witness grotesque and terrifying monsters lurking in plain sight. Despite her overwhelming fear, Miko bravely navigates her daily routine, feigning ignorance to the horrors that now haunt her reality. With her loyal friend Hana Yurikawa by her side, Miko must confront her deepest fears head-on to ensure their safety in the face of unspeakable danger. Bridging the realms of humor and terror, "Mieruko-chan" follows Miko's extraordinary journey as she confronts the supernatural by adopting an air of nonchalance.

basic_info.title:
Kamisama Hajimemashita
Kamisama Kiss
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Divine Nanami

content.synopsis:
Nanami Momozono, a high school student burdened with her father's runaway gambling debts, finds herself homeless after debt collectors evict her. Serendipity strikes when she saves a man from a dog attack, leading to an unexpected offer of shelter in a decrepit shrine. Despite initial hesitations, Nanami's world turns upside down when she is mistaken for the shrine's former master, Mikage, by its magical inhabitants—a fox familiar named Tomoe and two shrine spirits.

Tomoe, resentful of Nanami's presence, initially rejects serving her. However, as peril threatens Nanami's life, she forges a contract with Tomoe, making her the new deity of the shrine. Now embroiled in a world of divine duties, formidable foes, and an enigmatic familiar with a fiery temperament, Nanami must navigate her newfound role as a human land god with courage and wit.

When an insane magician sinks the Golden Kingdom underground, its king emerges with a tempting offer: all his treasure to whoever defeats the magician. Guilds eagerly embark on a perilous journey through the labyrinthine dungeon. Laios Touden, leader of one guild, faces a devastating loss when a dragon destroys his party and devours his sister, Falin. Undeterred by their dire situation, Laios, along with Marcille Donato, an elven healer, and Chilchuck Tims, a halfling thief, bravely venture back into the dungeon to rescue Falin.

With time running short, Laios proposes a daring plan to survive by eating the dungeon monsters, a taboo practice. Their unconventional meal preparation catches the eye of a dwarf named Senshi, an expert in monster cooking, who joins their group. Senshi, intrigued by Laios' mission, eagerly offers his culinary skills, sparking a food-filled adventure as they delve deeper into the dungeon together.

basic_info.title: Area D: Inou Ryouiki
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: AREA D 異能領域

content.synopsis: In a world where special powers have suddenly surfaced among some individuals, the enigmatic "Area D" prison stands as a stronghold for managing these extraordinary beings known as the "Altered." This gripping tale delves into the challenges of survival within this remote island facility, where a thrilling prison action unfolds amidst the emergence of newfound abilities.

basic_info.title:
Watashi no Shiawase na Kekkon
My Happy Marriage
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Blissful Marriage

content.synopsis:
Miyo Saimori's life was shaped by the shadow of a loveless, arranged marriage that left her as the undesired daughter in her own home. When her mother passed away, her father's new partner, Kaya, and her psychic gifts, became the center of attention. Miyo was left to toil as a mere servant, devoid of any special abilities.

Enduring years of servitude, Miyo mastered the art of concealing her suffering and submitting to every command. Thus, it was no shock when she was betrothed to the notoriously harsh military captain, Kiyoka Kudou, known for scaring off previous suitors.

From a troubled past to a daunting future, Miyo anticipated more hardship ahead. However, her preconceptions are shattered as Kiyoka turns out to be unexpectedly compassionate. What unfolds for Miyo is a future she never dared to dream of—a loving and enduring marriage that promises happiness beyond measure.

basic_info.title:
Majo to Yajuu
The Witch and the Beast

content.synopsis:
In a realm filled with enchantment, witches wield curses that defy all but a few remedies: a prince's kiss, a witch's change of heart, or an enigmatic third option.

Guideau and Ashaf, an unconventional pair linked to the Order of Magical Resonance, navigate the realm's mystical enigmas. Guideau, a spirited woman with beast-like eyes and a vendetta against witches, clashes with the calm and cryptic Ashaf, who carries a mysterious burden on his back. Together, they pursue magical mysteries while seeking the witch responsible for Guideau's curse.

Their quest leads them to a city rumored to house a witch, revered by its inhabitants as a guardian. Despite their distrust of witches, Guideau and Ashaf confront the unexpected truth behind this witch's reputation.

Delve into their latest venture in Volume 6: "Majo no Kimagure" (Witch and Whim).

In the shadowy world of the relentless bounty hunter Chateau Dankworth, a formidable challenge arises when she sets her sights on the infamous killer, Song Ryang-ha. Renowned for his ruthless efficiency in dispatching 18 high-ranking officials in a single night, Song Ryang-ha proves to be a cunning adversary as he unexpectedly turns the tables on Chateau in their initial confrontation. Surprisingly, his agenda takes a romantic turn as he declares his pursuit of her heart.

In a bizarre twist of affection, Song Ryang-ha allures Chateau with a peculiar courtship ritual - offering her captured targets as gifts, bound and bruised, in a twisted display of affection. Despite her reservations, Chateau becomes entangled in this deadly dance of desire, giving rise to a perilous game of attraction between two lethal individuals.

basic_info.title:
Hadashi de Bara wo Fume
Stepping on Roses
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 裸足でバラを踏め

content.synopsis: In a family of six siblings, Sumi Kitamura finds herself responsible for her younger brothers and sisters after they are suddenly taken away. Desperate to reunite her family, she embarks on a mission to earn a substantial amount of money. As she searches for a solution, a man proposes a deal: he will provide the money in exchange for her hand in marriage. Sumi faces a difficult decision that could determine the fate of her family.

basic_info.title: Karate Shoukoushi Kohinata Minoru
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Karate Shoukoushi Kohinata Kairyuu

content.synopsis:
Kohinata Minoru, a college student at a renowned sports-centric university, finds himself entangled in the cutthroat world of gymnastics, where bullying is rampant among the elite athletes. His loyal friend Nana stands by his side as a pillar of support. However, fate takes a surprising turn when a karate prodigy, Mutou Ryuuji, intervenes in a bullying incident involving Minoru. Instead of offering a conventional rescue, Mutou introduces Minoru to the realm of karate, sparking a life-altering journey for the young gymnast.

As Minoru delves deeper into the karate community, he forges new friendships while uncovering the haunting secrets that haunt his newfound companions. Tragic revelations emerge, including a shocking death that unravels hidden motives for vengeance. Minoru's transition from gymnastics to karate becomes a pivotal moment of self-discovery as he navigates through a world where strength, loyalty, and betrayal intersect in unexpected ways.

basic_info.title:
Tonari no Furi-san ga Tonikaku Kowai.
No Matter What You Say, Furi-san Is Scary!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: となりの布里さんがとにかくコワい。

content.synopsis:
As Namito Taira gears up for his freshman year in high school, he anticipates new experiences and challenges. Little did he expect to find himself seated next to Youko Furi, a striking blonde exuding an air of delinquency that sends shivers down his spine. Despite Taira's initial apprehension, he discovers that Furi is actually a sweet and endearing girl harboring a secret crush on him.

Their interactions, however, are often marred by misunderstandings, fueling Taira's misconception of Furi as a troublemaker. Yet, amidst these missteps, their time together blossoms into a heartwarming journey, paving the way for a delightful and promising relationship to unfold.

basic_info.title:
Break Blade
Broken Blade
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Adult Cast
            
                Adult Cast,                    Mecha
            
                Mecha,                    Military
            
                Military
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ブレイクブレイド

content.synopsis:
Rygart Arrow is an 'unsorcerer,' a rare individual in a world where quartz stones fuel everything. Deprived of this ability, he struggles with basic tasks and faces social ostracization. Despite his limitations, Rygart forms strong bonds with friends who later become rulers in the Country of Krisna. 

Summoned to the capital, Rygart learns of imminent war and unrealistic surrender terms. As enemy forces, including his old friend Zess, threaten Krisna, Rygart feels powerless due to his inability to wield quartz. However, a chance encounter with an ancient mecha could turn the tide. With loyalties divided and facing a monumental conflict, Rygart must navigate treacherous waters to determine his path.

basic_info.title:
Toshokan no Daimajutsushi
Magus of the Library

content.synopsis:
In the heart of Aftzaak—the City of Books, the Magus of the Library safeguards the essence of knowledge within the Central Library. In the dusty slums of Amun, young Theo Fumis finds solace in the pages of forbidden texts, his spirit yearning for the literary haven beyond his reach.

Tormented for his elongated ears, Theo's existence is a tapestry of hardship until the arrival of the enigmatic Kafna, elite librarians from the Central Library. Among them, Sedona Bleu extends a lifeline in the form of a treasured book, kindling a spark of hope within Theo's downtrodden heart.

As the Kafna depart, Theo's longing for Aftzaak intensifies, fueled by Sedona's rare act of compassion. With renewed determination and an unfinished story in hand, Theo sets his sights on the City of Books, his dreams intertwined with the allure of knowledge and the promise of a brighter future.

basic_info.title: Hyouka
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hyoka

content.synopsis: In the vibrant world of Kamiyama High School, 15-year-old Houtarou Oreki prefers to conserve energy and stay detached from the colorful and mysterious events surrounding him. His peaceful routine is disrupted when his sister urges him to join the Classics Club. Reluctantly, Houtarou steps into the club room and encounters the elegant and curious Eru Chitanda. Alongside his cheerful friend Satoshi Fukube and former classmate Mayaka Ibara, the quartet embarks on a captivating journey exploring the hidden enigmas of everyday life as members of the prestigious Classics Club.

basic_info.title:
Amagami-san Chi no Enmusubi
Tying the Knot with an Amagami Sister

content.synopsis:
After a lifetime in an orphanage, young Uryuu Kamihate's quest for a home leads him to the Amagami Shrine. But there's a twist—he's a staunch atheist. Entering the shrine, Uryuu meets the trio of shrine maidens: Yae, the eldest with a childlike demeanor; Yuna, the fiery middle sister; and Asahi, the playful youngest sibling. While Yae and Asahi embrace Uryuu, Yuna vehemently opposes his presence due to their differing beliefs. As Uryuu's faith—or lack thereof—is questioned, a revelation from Asahi sheds light on his disbelief.

Just as tensions ease, the sisters' grandfather, Chidori Amagami, drops a bombshell: Uryuu must wed one of the sisters and take over the shrine to stay.

basic_info.title: Sengoku Youko
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Warring States Youko

content.synopsis:
In a world divided between humans and katawara monsters, Tama, a katawara who adores humans, pledges to safeguard them at all costs, even if it means confronting her own kind. Meanwhile, her brother Jinka harbors a deep disdain for humans, despite his own human side. Their quest is joined by Shinsuke, a timid swordsman seeking strength.

When the trio stumbles upon a sinister scheme to mutate humans into monsters, they vow to thwart the mastermind, even if it entails facing an entire army of adversaries.

Their journey introduces them to intriguing individuals, exotic locales, and formidable foes, ensuring that their encounters are destined for legend!

basic_info.title:
Red Hood
The Hunters Guild: Red Hood
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yadokari no Kuni, The Land of Hermit Crabs, Myakunashi, No Hope, No Pulse

content.synopsis:
In a realm teeming with fantastical beings and fearsome creatures, the Hunters Guild stands as a formidable band of mercenaries, taking on perilous missions to vanquish beasts in exchange for coin. Despite whispers of their avarice, none can dispute their unerring success in completing each task.

When a remote village falls prey to a man-eating werewolf, the mayor enlists the services of a hunter. Enter Grimm, an enigmatic figure whose youthful visage raises doubts among the townsfolk. Yet, with no other recourse, they cling to hope that she embodies the guild's renowned prowess.

Velou, haunted by a childhood tragedy where his parents fell victim to a werewolf, yearns to partake in the hunt but is deemed unseasoned. Fate intervenes as he embarks on a journey to guide Grimm through the treacherous woods and ultimately confront the werewolf alongside her, leading to an invitation to join the esteemed Hunters Guild. While enticed by the prospect of eradicating werewolves, Velou's concern for his village looms large. Determined to bolster the guild's ranks with fresh recruits, Grimm sets out to allay his fears.

Intriguing one-shot tales await:

Volume 2: Yadokari no Kuni (The Land of Hermit Crabs), Myakunashi (No Hope, No Pulse)

Volume 3: Red Hood (pilot)

basic_info.title:
Slime Taoshite 300-nen, Shiranai Uchi ni Level Max ni Nattemashita
I've Been Killing Slimes for 300 Years and Maxed Out My Level

content.synopsis:
When salarywoman Azusa Aizawa suddenly succumbs to overwork, she is granted a chance at a new life by an angel. Reborn as an immortal witch in a new world, she leads a tranquil existence exterminating slimes for a living, aiming to maintain her leisurely routine. However, with time, even the humble slime-hunting yields immense power, and Azusa unwittingly reaches the pinnacle of strength. Desperate to avoid drawing unwanted attention and returning to a life of toil, she opts to conceal her abilities and uphold her peace.

Despite her discreet efforts, rumors of the legendary "Witch of the Plateau" at max level spread far and wide, attracting the attention of a formidable dragon named Laika. Through a battle that ends in friendship, Azusa's harmonious existence is disrupted as allies and adversaries alike seek out the reclusive witch.

basic_info.title:
Baraou no Souretsu
Requiem of the Rose King
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Rose King's Funeral Procession

content.synopsis:
In the tumultuous era of the Middle Ages, the battle for the English crown rages on in the infamous War of the Roses. The ambitious Duke of York, fueled by his desire to claim the throne, sets his sights on overthrowing King Henry VI and his successor.

Amidst a foreboding atmosphere, the Duke welcomes a new addition to his family - Richard Plantagenet, a unique child embodying traits of both genders. From the start, Richard faces his mother's intense animosity, shaping his formative years with self-loathing and a rejection of his own identity, haunted by unsettling visions of the legendary Joan of Arc foretelling doom in his wake.

Driven by a fervent belief in fulfilling his father's royal aspirations, Richard strives to secure his family's legacy. Yet, burdened by the weight of maternal scorn and prophetic warnings, he grapples with the haunting question: Will his pursuit of greatness lead to salvation or plunge his kin into irreversible darkness?

basic_info.title: Hikari no Machi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sun Village, City of Light

content.synopsis: In the town above a hill known as the City of Light, where the sun's glow surrounds everything, a hidden darkness lurks. Meet Tasuku, a young messenger for a clandestine group orchestrating phone suicides. Alongside him, other youths navigate their harsh realities: Satoshi drifts between odd jobs, Momoko, abandoned by her prostitute mother, seeks solace, and Hoichi treads a shady path, dreaming of transforming the city back into the peaceful village of his birth. As their stories intertwine in this enigmatic cityscape, secrets and desires collide, shaping their fates in unexpected ways.

basic_info.title:
Ichinose-ke no Taizai
The Ichinose Family's Deadly Sins
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Doujin Seiji, Sanka

content.synopsis: Awakening in a hospital room, a boy named Tsubasa Ichinose finds himself surrounded by unfamiliar faces claiming to be his family: Minako, Kakeru, Sachie, Kozo, and Shiori. A tragic accident has robbed them all of their memories. As the Ichinose family grapples with amnesia, they must rebuild their lives. Returning home, they confront shadows of their past selves. Tsubasa remains determined that their bond can withstand the secrets each member hides. In the midst of chaos, a tale of resilience and rediscovery unfolds in "Doujin Seiji, Sanka," Volume 6.

basic_info.title: Binbougami ga!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Binboukami ga!, Binbou Kami ga!, The God of Poverty Is!, Kaette Kudasai.

content.synopsis: In the enchanting world of "Binbougami ga!," 16-year-old Sakura Ichiko shines with beauty, brains, and health, blessed with an abundance of "Happiness Energy" that uplifts those around her. However, her gift comes at a cost – she unwittingly drains this energy from her environment, disrupting the world's harmony. Enter Momiji, a Poverty God on a mission to restore balance by stripping Ichiko of her power. As their fateful encounter unfolds, a battle of energies ensues, shaping destinies in this captivating tale. Explore the pilot chapter "Kaette Kudasai" in Volume 1 for a glimpse into this whimsical world.

basic_info.title:
Isshuukan Friends.
One Week Friends
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life

content.synopsis: Kaori Fujimiya lives in a world where cherished memories vanish like clockwork every Monday, leaving her isolated and alone. Undeterred by this strange phenomenon, Yuuki Hase is determined to forge a friendship with her. Week after week, he endeavors to draw closer to Kaori, yearning for the day she'll consider him a true friend.

basic_info.title:
Shikkakumon no Saikyou Kenja: Sekai Saikyou no Kenja ga Sarani Tsuyokunaru Tame ni Tensei Shimashita
The Strongest Sage with the Weakest Crest
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Strongest Sage of Disqualified Crest

content.synopsis:
In a realm where magic reigns supreme, a mage's destiny is foretold by their "Marks"—four symbols that dictate their magical prowess from birth. Disheartened by his perceived lack of combat potential, a masterful sage makes a bold choice to be reborn millennia later.

As Mathias Hildesheimr, the youngest scion of a noble family, he finally obtains the close combat mark he craved. Yet, to his dismay, the world has regressed in magical and swordsmanship knowledge, with scarce resources and forgotten spells. His once-revered mark is now scorned as the weakest.

Accepted into the prestigious Second Royal Academy at the tender age of 12, Mathias's exceptional sword skills disrupt the status quo. Amidst prejudice, he sparks waves of change within the academy and beyond. But lurking shadows reveal a sinister plot at play, and with humanity at its weakest, Mathias must rise to thwart the encroaching darkness.

As they pitch a tent, light a fire, and savor noodles against the backdrop of Mt. Fuji, Rin and Nadeshiko revel in their shared passion for camping. Join them in embracing the thrill of adventure and discover valuable insights for surviving in the wilderness. Let their enthusiasm inspire you to embark on your own camping journey!

basic_info.title:
Kono Kaisha ni Suki na Hito ga Imasu
I Have a Crush at Work

content.synopsis: Yui Mitsuya and Masugu Tateishi share a sizzling chemistry that's impossible to ignore. Despite their efforts to conceal their budding romance at work, their undeniable attraction keeps drawing them together. Yui is captivated by Masugu's considerate nature, while he can't help but beam at her adorable charm. As they struggle to keep their love hidden, the office becomes a hotbed of stolen glances and secret touches, teetering on the brink of revealing their forbidden affair.

basic_info.title:
Code Geass: Hangyaku no Lelouch
Code Geass: Lelouch of the Rebellion
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: コードギアス 反逆のルルーシュ

content.synopsis:
In the heart of Area 11, once the proud nation of Japan, resides the cunning Britannian student Lelouch Lamperouge. The year is 2010, and Japan's former glory has been overshadowed by the dominating Holy Britannian Empire. 

Lelouch's life takes a dramatic turn when he stumbles upon a military plane crash and encounters the enigmatic survivor, C.C., hidden within the wreckage. She bestows upon him the formidable power of Geass, compelling unwavering obedience from anyone he commands. 

Embracing his newfound abilities, Lelouch transforms into the masked revolutionary Zero, determined to bring down the oppressive Britannian regime that shattered his past. With vengeance burning in his heart, he sets out to rewrite the destiny of a world engulfed in conflict.

In this whimsical 4-panel manga, meet Yoshiko, a girl known for her remarkable lack of intelligence, often scoring all zeros on tests without fail. She spends her school days in the company of her childhood friend, whom she professes to have feelings for, despite his constant exasperation with her eccentric antics. Join them for a lighthearted journey through school life filled with comedic misadventures and heartwarming moments.

Included one-shot:

Volume 12: Nandemo Shiteageru (I'd do anything for you.)

basic_info.title:
Yesterday wo Utatte
Sing "Yesterday" for Me
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: イエスタデイをうたって

content.synopsis:
Fresh out of college, Rikuo Uozumi finds himself stuck in a mundane cycle of working part-time at a convenience store to make ends meet. However, his routine takes an unexpected turn when two intriguing women enter his life: Shinako Morinome, a former classmate who still holds a place in Rikuo's heart, and Haru Nonaka, a quirky high school dropout accompanied by a pet crow.

As Rikuo grapples with unspoken feelings for Shinako, she struggles with inner turmoil that keeps her guarded against love. On the other hand, the vivacious and unabashed Haru openly expresses her growing fondness for Rikuo. Amidst this emotional whirlwind, Rikuo attempts to navigate his quiet existence, but with Haru's presence, tranquility becomes a thing of the past—and perhaps, Rikuo will find himself embracing the unexpected excitement that comes with the change.

basic_info.title:
Tonari no Seki-kun
My Neighbor Seki
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: となりの関くん

content.synopsis: In class, Yokoi is constantly intrigued by her desk neighbor Seki-kun, who skillfully engages in elaborate activities without the teacher noticing. From dominos to shogi, go, mecha models, and even cat play, Seki-kun's antics never cease to captivate. Despite her initial reluctance, Yokoi inevitably gets entangled in his mischievous pursuits, landing her in trouble with the teacher.

basic_info.title:
Meteor Methuselah
Immortal Rain
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Meteo Metosera

content.synopsis:
Rain Jewlitt, also known as the Methuselah, is an enigmatic figure - an immortal, 624-year-old man clad in priest's attire. His eternal youth has made him a target with a hefty bounty on his head, coveted by those seeking the key to his endless life.

Enter Machika Balfaltin, a spirited 14-year-old girl with a tomboyish nature. Following her grandfather's passing, she embarks on a mission to eliminate Methuselah, the sole mark that eluded her grandfather, the feared assassin Zol the Grim Reaper. Yet, fate takes a turn as Rain repeatedly steps in to shield Machika from relentless bounty hunters aiming to claim the prized bounty on his head.

basic_info.title:
Zelda no Densetsu: Toki no Ocarina
The Legend of Zelda: Ocarina of Time
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ゼルダの伝説 時のオカリナ

content.synopsis: In the enchanting realm of Hyrule, the fate of the world rests on three mystical stones that unlock the power of the Triforce. Enter Link, a brave young boy tasked with delivering the Emerald, the sacred stone of the forest, to Princess Zelda. As he embarks on this treacherous journey, facing countless dangers, Link must summon all his bravery and prowess to overcome the forces of darkness. The epic struggle for control of Hyrule and the Sacred Realm unfolds before us!

basic_info.title: Himouto! Umaru-chan
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Two-Faced Little Sister

content.synopsis: Meet Umaru Doma, the model student at school renowned for her diligence and poise. However, once she steps through the door of her home with her brother Taihei, she transforms into the mischievous little sister we all love to hate, sporting her iconic hamster hoodie. Embracing her inner otaku, Umaru indulges in a world of gaming and snacks, leaving her hardworking brother to manage the household single-handedly. Join this uproarious tale of family dynamics, camaraderie, and the quirks we endure as Umaru and Taihei navigate the chaos with humor and heart.

basic_info.title:
Hoshi Mamoru Inu
Stargazing Dog
basic_info.genre:
Genre:
                            Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Star Protector Dog

content.synopsis: Happy, once abandoned as a puppy, now thrives under the care of Miku's family. He frolics with the young child, strolls with the jovial Father, and savors the delicious meals lovingly prepared by Mother. Life couldn't be sweeter. However, a shadow falls when Father falls ill. The once-tight bonds within the family begin to fray, leaving only Happy and Father. With Father's health failing, the duo embarks on a journey to the distant south. Through highs and lows, Happy proves unwavering in his loyalty as man's best friend.

basic_info.title: Kuroko no Basket: Extra Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kuroko's Basketball, Kuroko no Basuke, The Basketball Which Kuroko Plays. Extra Game

content.synopsis:
The renowned college basketball team Strky, known for their prowess in past Interhigh tournaments, is geared up to take on the Jabberwock, a celebrated American street basketball squad that has just landed in Japan. What was anticipated to be a friendly game escalates into a heart-wrenching defeat when the Jabberwock's captain Nash Gold Jr. degrades the Japanese people as inferior basketball players.

Furious at the disparagement, Kagetora Aida suggests a rematch with a fresh Japanese team, a challenge promptly accepted by Nash, who remains confident of a repeat victory. In response, Kagetora gathers the formidable Vorpal Swords, featuring the exceptional Generation of Miracles alongside Tetsuya Kuroko and Taiga Kagami—the sole squad capable of delivering a poignant lesson to the Jabberwock.

basic_info.title: Ultra Heaven
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ウルトラヘヴン

content.synopsis:
In a world where emotions are manufactured and addiction lurks around every corner, little peddler Kabu is a heavy user caught in a cycle of highs and lows. Despite despising the society that led him to this point, he finds solace in the ecstasy of hallucinogens. When a dangerous cocktail lands him in a desperate search for his next fix, a mysterious figure introduces him to a new illicit substance: Ultra Heaven. 

As Kabu embarks on a mind-altering journey, reality blurs with dreams, unleashing a whirlwind of emotions and agonizing pleasures. Questions arise about the true nature of Ultra Heaven, its elusive creator, and a guru promoting meditation as a cosmic force. Equipped with an amplifier helmet, Kabu delves deep into his psyche, uncovering a nightmare he never knew existed...

basic_info.title: Arachnid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アラクニド

content.synopsis: In this gripping tale, follow Alice, a high school senior enduring daily torment from her uncle. Everything changes in an instant when she witnesses her uncle's demise at the hands of an assassin known as "Kumo" (Japanese for Arachnid). After a mysterious turn of events, Alice awakens in Kumo's residence, now under the care of the very person who took her uncle's life. Watch as Alice, without family to call her own, is now being raised by the enigmatic assassin.

basic_info.title:
Youkoso Jitsuryoku Shijou Shugi no Kyoushitsu e
Classroom of the Elite
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ようこそ実力至上主義の教室へ

content.synopsis: At Tokyo Metropolitan Advanced Nurturing High School, students enjoy unparalleled freedom, with a near-perfect placement rate into prestigious jobs and universities. The catch? Success hinges on accumulating points to climb the school's hierarchy. Kiyotaka Ayanokouji finds himself in the despised Class D, where he crosses paths with Suzune Horikita, set on advancing to the coveted Class A. Together, can they outmaneuver the ruthless competition and defy the unforgiving system of this elite academy?

basic_info.title: Shinrei Tantei Yakumo
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Psychic Detective Yakumo

content.synopsis: In "Shinrei Tantei Yakumo," follow the journey of Saitou Yakumo, a college student with strikingly mismatched eyes – his left one a piercing red. This unique feature grants him the extraordinary gift of perceiving ghosts and spirits. Convinced that these restless beings are tethered to the earthly realm by unresolved issues, Yakumo aims to facilitate their peaceful departure by identifying and resolving the root cause. When approached for aid by Ozawa Haruka, the duo embarks on a collaborative investigation into the supernatural.

basic_info.title:
Saint Seiya
Knights of the Zodiac
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Zodiac Knights

content.synopsis: In ancient times, the mighty goddess Athena was revered by valiant warriors known as Saints, entrusted with harnessing the cosmic energy within them. Today, a determined young man named Seiya embarks on a quest to achieve the prestigious title of a Saint, having earned the legendary Cloth of Pegasus through rigorous training. Alongside fellow Saints adorned in their unique Cloths, Seiya joins forces to protect and serve the revered goddess Athena in a battle of cosmic proportions.

basic_info.title:
Helter Skelter
Helter Skelter: Fashion Unfriendly
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ヘルタースケルター

content.synopsis: Renowned Japanese supermodel and fashion icon, Haruko "Liliko" Hirukoma, dazzles in the glamorous world of high-end brands, captivating audiences with her flawless beauty sculpted by full-body plastic surgery. Yet, as Liliko's body starts deteriorating from the strain of surgeries and medications, her deep-rooted terror of aging and fading into obscurity spirals her into madness. "Helter Skelter" delves into Liliko's fierce battle to cling to her coveted spotlight in a cutthroat industry where replaceability looms large.

basic_info.title:
17-21: Fujimoto Tatsuki Tanpenshuu
Tatsuki Fujimoto Before Chainsaw Man: 17–21
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Niwa ni wa Niwa Niwatori ga Ita., There Were Two Chickens in the Garden., A Couple Clucking Chickens Were Still Kickin' in the Schoolyard, Sasaki-kun ga Juudan Tometa, Sasaki Stopped a Bullet, Koi wa Moumoku, Love is Blind, Shikaku

content.synopsis: In a quaint schoolyard known as Niwa, two chickens, Niwa and Niwatori, were the talk of the town. Their clucking echoed through the halls, bringing joy to all. But when trouble struck and a bullet threatened the peace, Sasaki stepped in to save the day. Love bloomed amidst the chaos, proving that sometimes, love truly is blind. Secrets and mysteries lurked in the shadows, waiting to be unraveled in the unfolding tale of "Shikaku."

basic_info.title: Out
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: OUT -アウト-

content.synopsis: After his release from juvenile detention, 17-year-old Iguchi Tatsuya finds himself in a new neighborhood under the watchful eye of his aunt, determined to steer clear of trouble. Despite his efforts to turn over a new leaf by working diligently at his aunt's restaurant, his old habits die hard. With his persistent violent tendencies and a magnetism for troublemakers, Iguchi faces an uphill battle to break free from his past and avoid a return to lockup.

basic_info.title: Fujimura-kun Mates
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Fujimura-kun Meitsu

content.synopsis: Fujimura, the solitary troublemaker of his school, strikes fear in his classmates from day one. Known for skipping classes and keeping to himself, his tough exterior is challenged when not one, but three eccentric class presidents set their sights on him. As the unlikely tsukkomi in a world of boke, Fujimura finds himself entangled in a comedic clash of personalities.

basic_info.title:
Kawaii Joushi wo Komarasetai
I want to annoy the pretty boss.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 可愛い上司を困らせたい

content.synopsis:
Shun Aoki, a charismatic and popular 23-year-old newcomer, attracts the disapproving gaze of Megumi Ira due to his perceived laziness and lack of respect at work. Determined to guide him back on track, the diligent 31-year-old, who dedicated her youth to education and career, takes on the role of his mentor.

Despite her intentions, Megumi finds herself waking up in her apartment next to Shun, sans clothes. Surprisingly, Shun remains calm and helps piece together the events of the previous night, which involved a company outing, alcohol, a walk home, and an ill-fated stripping game. The night culminated in a drunken pinky promise between them to go on a date, leaving Megumi in an unexpected dilemma.

basic_info.title: Shiori Experience: Jimi na Watashi to Hen na Ojisan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Shiori Experience: My Plain Self and an Odd Old Man

content.synopsis: Years ago, Shiori's dream of performing live was shattered when her brother fled with a hefty debt to chase his musical aspirations in Tokyo. Now a mundane high school teacher, Shiori is burdened by her past until she encounters the ghost of the legendary guitarist, Jimi Hendrix. This unexpected twist sets the stage for a 27-year-old woman's journey towards music stardom.

basic_info.title:
Himegoto: Juukyuusai no Seifuku
HIME-GOTO: uniforms at the age of nineteen
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Crossdressing
            
                Crossdressing,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ヒメゴト ～十九歳の制服～

content.synopsis: Yuki "Yoshiki" Ichihara disguises herself as a boy, yearning to embrace her femininity despite being perceived as male by her peers. In contrast, Mikako Nagao, believed to be innocent and sweet, leads a double life, selling herself to older men while posing as a 15-year-old. Caught in this web of secrets is Kaito Aiba, captivated by Mikako's facade and yearning to embody her essence. As their paths converge, these college students grapple with hidden identities, embarking on a journey to uncover their true selves amidst a tangle of fate.

basic_info.title: Tokyo ESP
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 東京ESP

content.synopsis:
Urushiba Rinka, a typical high school girl facing financial struggles with her father as her sole family, encounters an extraordinary sight one day: a penguin and shimmering fish soaring through the sky. This surreal experience becomes all too real when a schoolmate, bearing mysterious facial injuries, also witnesses the spectacle.

After a peculiar fish-induced blackout, Rinka awakens to discover a newfound ability to phase through solid objects, including the very floor of her apartment. To her surprise, her father reveals that others have been granted similarly perplexing powers by the airborne fish. As Rinka delves deeper into this enigmatic phenomenon, she questions the extent of her classmate's involvement in the unfolding events. The mystery deepens, leaving Rinka to ponder the true nature of these inexplicable superhuman abilities.

basic_info.title: Majin Tantei Nougami Neuro
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Demon Detective Nougami Neuro, Rikon Choutei, Divorce Conciliation

content.synopsis: In the realm of mortals, the Demon Neuro harbors an insatiable craving for "enigmas," unsatisfied with his infernal domain. Venturing into the human world, he sets his sights on a murder case involving the father of a young girl. As the Demon delves into the intriguing puzzle, what unexpected twists await in this encounter? Don't miss the gripping tale in Volume 23: Rikon Choutei (Divorce Conciliation).

basic_info.title:
Subete no Jinrui wo Hakai suru. Sorera wa Saisei Dekinai.
Destroy All Humans. They Can't Be Regenerated.
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Strategy Game
            
                Strategy Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Destroy All Humankind. They Can't Be Regenerated.

content.synopsis:
In the year 1998, Hajime Kanou, a dedicated junior high student fascinated by the card game Magic: The Gathering, known simply as "Magic," engages in daily matches with his friends during school breaks. Their boisterous games often draw the attention of Emi Sawatari, the school's top student who disapproves of their hobby. Viewing Emi as his rival, Hajime challenges her to academic showdowns, where he consistently faces defeat.

During a visit to a Magic specialty shop, Hajime is surprised to find Emi inside, reigning as the store's champion player. This unexpected encounter marks the beginning of a gradual shift in their dynamic, as they bond through intense Magic duels. As the new millennium approaches, the tale of these two young competitors unfolds, intertwining fate with each card they play.

basic_info.title: Sekai no Owari to Yoakemae
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Before Dawn and the End of The World, Alfalfa, Nichiyou, Gogo, 6-jihan., Chou Mousou A-ko no Nichijou to Yuuutsu, Kyuujitsu no Sugoshikata, 17, Subarashii Sekai, Tokyo

content.synopsis: Experience the captivating tale of "Yoakemae (Before Dawn)" set in the serene town of Alfalfa. Join the enigmatic A-ko on a lazy Sunday afternoon at 6:30 as she navigates through the whimsical realms of her vivid imagination in "Chou Mousou A-ko no Nichijou to Yuuutsu (The Typical Day and Melancholy of Super-Imaginative A-ko)." Discover the art of leisure on a day off in "Kyuujitsu no Sugoshikata (How to Spend a Day Off)" at age 17, as A-ko revels in the beauty of "Subarashii Sekai (What a Wonderful World)." Immerse yourself in the bustling city of Tokyo, where A-ko contemplates the concept of "Sekai no Owari (The End of the World)."

basic_info.title:
Oniichan wa Oshimai!
Onimai: I'm Now Your Sister!

content.synopsis: Mahiro Oyama, an ordinary guy with a passion for erotic games, undergoes a bizarre transformation one morning, waking up as a woman! The culprit behind this unexpected change is none other than his brilliant yet mischievous little sister, Mihari. Unwilling to accept his new reality, Mahiro is desperate to revert to his former self and resume his reclusive gaming lifestyle. However, Mihari is resolute in her determination to observe and analyze this peculiar phenomenon. As their unconventional journey unfolds, one thing is certain - the already strange twists of life are about to escalate to unprecedented levels of peculiarity.

basic_info.title:
Maou ni Natta node, Dungeon Tsukutte Jingai Musume to Honobono suru
Now I'm a Demon Lord! Happily Ever After with Monster Girls in My Dungeon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Demon Lord so I Created a Dungeon and Spend Heartwarming Time There with Non-Human Girls

content.synopsis:
Yuki wakes up to a startling reality - he's now a demon lord in a whole new world, tasked with managing a dungeon! Embracing his role in a realm teeming with formidable beasts and lurking threats, Yuki sets out to fortify his stronghold with allies and defenses. In no time, he tames a legendary dragon, a lovable slime companion, and a vampire maiden. Yet, even with his vigilance, life as a dungeon-bound demon lord is oddly laid-back.

However, with a diverse crew by his side (and perhaps more to come), trouble is never far behind. Can Yuki execute a daring rescue mission? And when a hostile human kingdom launches an assault, how will he and his monstrous companions endure?

Step into Yuki's world as he navigates the challenges of demon lordship, daily routines, and caring for his ever-growing family of monster girls and pets.

basic_info.title:
Yasashii Sekai no Tsukurikata
A Method to Make the Gentle World
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: How to Make the World Gentle

content.synopsis: Yuu Tomonoga, a prodigious mind admitted to a prestigious American university at just 13, finds himself adrift when his research funding is cut. Undeterred, he returns to Japan seeking support, only to face financial strain. A lifeline appears in the form of an old acquaintance, leading him to an unexpected role as a teacher at an all-girls school.

basic_info.title: Super Secret
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Everybody's Got a Secret

content.synopsis: Emma Ji and Ryan Nam have been inseparable neighbors since forever. Emma, a scatterbrain, relies on Ryan and his quirky family, who have taken her under their wing in her parents' absence. Ryan, acting more like a hovering parent, is there for Emma around the clock – from waking her up to tidying her room. But the Nams harbor a supernatural secret that must remain hidden, a secret threatened by Emma's constant presence. One day, Emma returns home to find a massive dog snoozing on her balcony! Will she unravel the mystery behind the dog and why Ryan mysteriously disappears whenever it shows up?

basic_info.title: 100% Perfect Girl
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 100%의 그녀

content.synopsis: In "100% Perfect Girl," meet Jay Jin, the determined teenage rebel with a passion for art, and J. Max, the enigmatic foreigner with a hidden past, visiting Korea for business. Initially seeming worlds apart, a fateful meeting in a hotel lobby ignites a mysterious attraction between them. Can love transcend language barriers and miles? Amidst meddling friends, family, and a calamitous spicy chicken kebab incident, their romance blossoms. This enchanting tale showcases the triumph of chemistry in a globalized world, proving that true love knows no bounds.

basic_info.title: Into the Light, Once Again
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dasi Hanbeon, Bit Sogeuro

content.synopsis:
In the radiant Edenverre Empire, Princess Marianne shines as brightly as the sun, cherished by her adoring sister, Princess Alisa. But when a sinister plot frames Alisa for Marianne's murder attempt, she finds herself condemned to the shadows of the dungeons, unheard and misunderstood. Only Alisa witnesses the chilling truth behind Marianne's tears of victimhood—a twisted smile of satisfaction.

Betrayed and forsaken, Alisa endures a harrowing ordeal that robs her of sight, leading up to her fateful execution. However, her story takes an unexpected turn as she inexplicably awakens in Elmire Empire, reborn as Princess Aisha, embraced by love and luxury.

Haunted by her past torment, Aisha struggles with resentment while basking in newfound warmth and affection. As she navigates her conflicting emotions, Aisha discovers the power of forgiveness and the enduring light that guides her towards a hopeful future.

basic_info.title: Boundless Ascension
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Boundless Necromancer, Na Honja Teukseongppallo Muhan Seongjang

content.synopsis: As a young boy, Seong-yun Han faced tragedy when monsters unleashed during the "Dungeon Break" took his parents' lives. Now, years later, his dreams of becoming a Hunter are shattered as his fighting skills remain stagnant. Everything changes when he embarks on a journey to the Tower of Trials, a mystical domain where warriors confront challenges against both monsters and humans. Will Seong-yun find the strength to overcome these trials and reshape his destiny?

basic_info.title: The Tutorial Is Too Tough!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Tutorial Is Too Hard!, Tutorial-i Neomu Eoryeopda

content.synopsis: Former pro gamer, Lee Hojae, abandons his old life until a cryptic message changes everything: "Congratulations! You've been invited to the Tutorial World." Curiosity piqued, he dives in, opting for the "hell" difficulty level, only to find himself ensnared. With a survival rate of just 0.01%, Hojae faces excruciating trials within the game, driven by the need to uncover the purpose behind his invitation. The tutorial's challenges are brutal, but the hidden truths lurking within are the real nightmare.

basic_info.title: Hero Killer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 히어로 킬러

content.synopsis: In a world plagued by endless conflict between Heroes and Villains, a solitary girl, armed with extraordinary powers, embarks on a vengeful quest against the world's injustices. Amidst the relentless battles of these powerful beings, safety is a luxury. As chaos reigns, the distinction between hero and villain blurs, prompting a profound question: Who truly safeguards the innocent, and where does the line between good and evil truly lie?

basic_info.title: Reality Quest
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: IRL Quest, Hyeonsil Quest

content.synopsis: In a world where gamer Dowan Ha is pushed to his limits by relentless bullies, he's coerced into tirelessly grinding for in-game treasures. When a bully cruelly tasks him with acquiring an ultra-rare item or facing public humiliation, Dowan embarks on an intense gaming marathon that leads to his untimely demise from sheer exhaustion. Yet, in a twist of fate, he awakens back in his classroom one week prior to his death. Armed with skills honed from his gaming experiences, Dowan is presented with a unique opportunity to turn the tables on his tormentors. Can he leverage his newfound abilities in this gamified reality to stand up to his bullies once and for all?

basic_info.title: Winter Woods
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 윈터우즈

content.synopsis: In the wake of an ancient alchemist's creation, Winter emerges into a world transformed by millennia. Under the guidance of Jane, Winter navigates the intricacies of human existence, delving into the essence of life itself.

basic_info.title: The Hero Returns
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yeongung, Hoegwihada

content.synopsis: In the wake of mysterious dungeons appearing, humanity faces a ferocious wave of monsters, pushing them to the brink of destruction. Despite the efforts of the Awakened, individuals with unique powers to combat these creatures, the world succumbs to chaos. Sole survivor Sungin Kim, the formidable Awakened, unexpectedly finds himself transported two decades into the past, inhabiting the guise of unassuming high school student Soohyun Kim. Unsure of the reason behind this temporal shift, Sungin seizes this opportunity to rewrite history, determined to become the savior the world desperately needs.

basic_info.title: The 100th Regression of the Max-Level Player
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Max-Level Player's 100th Regression, Man-Level Player-ui 100-beonjjae Hoegwi

content.synopsis: In a world consumed by a deadly game spanning ages 15 to 29, Min Ryu is thrust into a heartless battle for survival. After 99 grueling attempts, he reaches the final boss only to face betrayal from the system for lacking four required players. As Min Ryu embarks on his 100th and ultimate try, will he secure the assistance necessary to conquer this unforgiving challenge?

basic_info.title: The Male Lead's Little Lion Daughter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Male Lead's Adopted Daughter, Namju-ui Ibyangttal-i Doeeotseumnida

content.synopsis: In the empire, the formidable Duke Voreoti strikes fear into all with his icy demeanor and lethal gaze. Imagine my surprise when he declares his desire to adopt a child - me! Rescued from a dubious orphanage, I am taken to his frosty palace without hesitation. Immersed in the enigmatic Voreoti family by his knights, I soon face scrutiny over my mysterious background. As the Duke questions my identity, could our shared features hint at a deeper connection between us?

basic_info.title: Marriage of Convenience
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Marriage Business, The Wedding Business, Gyeolhon Jangsa

content.synopsis:
Bianca de Blanchefort's life takes a dramatic turn when she is thrust into marriage with Count Zachary de Arno before she fully grasps the concept of matrimony. Despite her longing for the opulence of her past, she is branded as a covetous and malevolent wife due to her husband's neglect. When Zachary meets a tragic end on the battlefield without leaving an heir, Bianca's world crumbles, reducing her to a beggar.

A miraculous twist of fate grants Bianca a second chance at youth. Vowing to shed her former vanity and immaturity, she navigates the uncertainties of her future with newfound humility. Despite her apprehensions about history repeating itself, Bianca musters the courage to approach Zachary for an heir, even as he remains aloof. As desperation sets in and her husband continues to rebuff her, Bianca is forced to explore unconventional paths to secure her future, prompting her to reconsider Zachary's indifference and unveil the hidden truths beneath his facade.

basic_info.title: The Gamer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 더 게이머

content.synopsis:
Synopsis Rewrite:
Meet Jihan Han, an ordinary high school student with an extraordinary twist—he sees the world through the lens of a video game. His life takes an unexpected turn when he uncovers a secret realm teeming with individuals who share his unique ability. Balancing schoolwork and embarking on quests, Jihan embarks on a journey to master his newfound power and elevate his real-life skills to the next level.

basic_info.title:
Majeh
King of Hell
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Demon King

content.synopsis:
Majeh, once a renowned swordsman in the realm of the living, now serves as a messenger for the King of Hell in the afterlife. Unveiling his legendary status, it is revealed that he resides in the enchanted Moorim, a domain reserved for the fiercest warriors.

When a calamity strikes and malevolent demons break free from hell into the Mortal world, the King of Hell entrusts Majeh with the critical task of capturing these rogue entities.

basic_info.title: Dreaming Freedom
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kkum-eseo Jayu-ro, Free In Dreams

content.synopsis: In high school, Jeongmin faces torment from the Queen Bee, Juhyeon, once a childhood friend turned tormentor. Bullied and isolated, Jeongmin seeks solace in lucid dreams. A stranger appears in her dreams, offering a chance for revenge against Juhyeon.

basic_info.title: Is This Hero for Real?
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Is This Warrior Real?, I Yongsa Silhwanya

content.synopsis: When a goddess whisks Hansoo Kang and his classmates away to a fantastical realm where they are destined to be heroes, it seems like a wish fulfilled. Yet, when Hansoo refuses to endanger himself for a foreign land, the goddess abandons him in the unforgiving wilderness. As he navigates this treacherous world, aided by a reclusive deity, Hansoo gains formidable blessings that enhance his chances of survival. His focus, however, isn't on rescuing the realm but on finding a way back home—though not before settling the score with the deceptive goddess.

basic_info.title: Study Group
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 스터디그룹

content.synopsis: Dubbed the "school for future criminals," Yusung Technical High School is far from a typical learning environment. Standing out from the crowd is Gamin, a determined student whose sole ambition is to secure a spot in university. In a cutthroat setting where collaboration is scarce, he faces rejection from multiple study circles until he takes matters into his own hands. The arrival of Hankyeong, Gamin's former mentor aiming to become a certified teacher at the high school, adds a twist to their already challenging journey. Together, can they defy the odds and turn their dreams into reality?

basic_info.title: Cheese in the Trap Season 3
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 치즈인더트랩 시즌3

content.synopsis: In the third season of Cheese in the Trap, viewers are captivated once again by the intricate web of relationships involving Yoo Jung, Seol, and In-ho at their university. As tensions rise and secrets unravel, the characters navigate the complexities of love, friendship, and ambition. Will Yoo Jung's manipulative ways continue to influence those around him, or will Seol and In-ho find a way to break free from his control? Dive into the latest installment of this gripping series to uncover the twists and turns that await in this compelling tale of college life and the pursuit of personal happiness.

basic_info.title: The Martial God Who Regressed Back to Level 2
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Martial God Regressed to Level 2, The God of War Who Regressed to Level 2, 2 Level-ro Hoegwihan Musin

content.synopsis: In the BattleNet system, Earth's survival hangs by a thread, pushing humanity to the brink of extinction. Enter Jihan Seong, granted a rare opportunity to rewrite history by traveling three years into the past, before the system turned deadly. Armed with foresight, Jihan sets out to dominate the game and alter humanity's grim destiny. Yet, as he strives to reshape the future, can Jihan safeguard his loved ones from formidable adversaries determined to thwart his mission? The ultimate question looms: Will Jihan triumph in changing the course of humanity's fate?

basic_info.title: This Villainess Wants a Divorce!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Survive as the Hero's Wife, Yang-pan-so Juingong-ui Anae-ro Saranamgi

content.synopsis: Carnelia Easter's destiny was sealed to meet her end at the hands of the male lead, Cesear, after being manipulated by the empress for political gain. Reborn after a fatal accident, Carnelia navigates her new life post-wedding with Cesear. Intent on a quiet exit once he finds his true match, she schemes to win his favor. Yet, as she plans her departure, the unexpected occurs—Cesear forms a bond with Carnelia, complicating her carefully laid-out escape.

basic_info.title: Questism
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Quest Jisang Juui, Quest Supremacy

content.synopsis: In the world of high school, Suhyeon Kim is a gaming enthusiast who can't wait to escape the daily torment from his peers. His wish for a more exciting life becomes reality when a mysterious quest appears, offering tempting rewards. Seizing the opportunity, Suhyeon embarks on a journey filled with challenges and unexpected turns. As he climbs the ranks, from a bullied outcast to a revered figure, the allure of power tests his limits. But with great rewards come greater risks. How deep will Suhyeon delve into these quests, and what consequences await if he chooses to step back?

basic_info.title: Love in the Mask
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 가면속의 사랑

content.synopsis: Hyun-Bin has been navigating the harsh realities of street life, concealing her true identity as a girl. When a heartbreaking loss strikes with the death of her cherished younger brother, Hyun-Bin is compelled to flee.

basic_info.title: My Life as an Internet Novel
