basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Inso's Law, Inso-ui Beopchik

content.synopsis: In the world of novels, clichés reign supreme: a stunning heroine, charming suitors, and a plain best friend in tow. Dani, a typical student and avid online reader, knows these tropes all too well. Little did she expect to find herself waking up at the heart of such a tale one day! Enter her new fictional realm, complete with the lovely Yeoryung as her bestie and four unbelievably attractive classmates. Dani's mission is clear: steer clear of the plot's twists and turns. But could she be more than just a supporting character? In this novel's universe, anything is possible!

basic_info.title: Descended from Divinity
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Heavenly Demon Can't Live a Normal Life, Cheonma-neun Pyeongbeom-hage Sal Su Eopda

content.synopsis: In the mystical realm of Murim, Junghyeok Baek, the divine demon overlord, questions if his current mission is divine intervention or punishment. Suddenly reincarnated into the body of Roman Dimitri, a frivolous nobleman's son fixated on luxury, Jung-hyeok seizes the opportunity to disrupt the tranquil continent of Salamander. Determined to fulfill his enigmatic purpose, will the divine demon succeed in his ambitious endeavors and unravel the enigma of his reincarnation?

basic_info.title: The Villainess Is a Marionette
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Angnyeo-neun Marionette

content.synopsis:
In modern-day Korea, a woman deeply engrossed in a captivating fantasy novel meets a tragic end at the hands of a vengeful man. The novel follows a tale of love and power, where Duke Raffaello Kidrey holds the heart of Olivia Grace, while Prince Regef Hill craves her for himself, using his sister Kayena as a pawn in his sinister game.

Reborn as the villainess Kayena, the woman is determined to rewrite her story. Embracing her newfound role, she forms an unlikely alliance with her former nemesis, Regef, and schemes to draw Raffaello into her plans. As she orchestrates a complex web of relationships to secure Regef's rise to power and unite Raffaello with his destined love, Kayena seeks a chance for a peaceful existence. Yet, the treacherous world of royalty proves unforgiving, forcing her to navigate a precarious path of manipulation to survive the ruthless game of power and love.

basic_info.title: Return to Player
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 리턴 투 플레이어

content.synopsis: A decade ago, a band of deities transformed all Earthlings into participants in a ruthless game where they must slay real-life monsters or face death. Sehan Kim foresees a grim outcome: global annihilation, with only himself spared. Now offered a shot to rewind time for a fresh playthrough, Sehan vows to alter destiny's course and outwit the divine schemers.

basic_info.title: Positively Yours
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Agi-ga Saenggyeosseoyo

content.synopsis: Hee-won is shocked to discover that her crush and her best friend are now a couple. Feeling heartbroken, she embarks on a wild night and ends up pregnant after a passionate encounter with a stranger. When fate reunites them, the disciplined Doo-joon steps up to marry her for the sake of their unborn child. Despite being practically strangers, their intimate connection complicates matters. Now faced with an unexpected future, Hee-won must navigate this complex situation as a soon-to-be mother.

basic_info.title: The Legendary Spearman Returns
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Return of the Legendary Spear Knight, Return of The Unrivaled Spear Knight, Yeokdaegeup Changgisa-ui Hoegwi

content.synopsis: In a world where swords reign supreme, Joshua Sanders rises as a spear-wielding hero, known for ending a savage civil war. Serving Emperor Caesar Van Briton faithfully, his loyalty is tested when betrayal lurks among his comrades. Left for dead, Joshua's trusted spear, Lukia, sparks a miraculous journey back to his past. Now armed with vengeance, he embarks on a quest for retribution that transcends time and space.

basic_info.title: A Fairytale for the Demon Lord
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Tale for Satan, The Demon Lord and the Knight, Picture Book for the Demon Lord, Mawangeul Wihan Donghwa

content.synopsis: In a realm where a curse ensnares a princess, valiant knights have repeatedly failed to break its grip, meeting their demise at the hands of a fearsome demon. However, when a determined knight rises to vanquish the malevolent creature, an unforeseen adventure unfurls, promising a fate unlike any before.

basic_info.title: Crepuscule
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 크리퍼스큘

content.synopsis: In a world where being different means being ostracized, Lark stands out with his red eyes, a trait associated with Vampires. Bullied by his peers, he finds solace in Setz, a noble Vampire who sees beyond appearances. As their friendship blossoms, Lark faces the prospect of returning to the orphanage. Determined not to lose his friend, Setz offers Lark a glimpse into his world - the mysterious realm of the Vampires.

basic_info.title: Pigpen
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dwaejiuri

content.synopsis: In a tranquil paradise turns sinister, a mysterious young man finds himself stranded on a stunning beach without any recollection of his identity or arrival. As he struggles to unravel this perplexing enigma, each hint unravels more bewildering enigmas. The seemingly hospitable family harbors dark secrets, complicating his quest for truth amidst the idyllic facade.

basic_info.title: He's Dedicated to Roses
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Roses Dedicated to Him, Roses tribute to him

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, "If you were a girl, we would never have met," becomes a pivotal statement in their unconventional love story. Plain as a girl, yet disguised as a guy, Ida possesses a remarkable physique, exceptional combat skills, and a striking appearance. Mistaken for a boy, Kang Naru finds himself drawn to Ida, unaware of her true identity. As their bond deepens, the truth looms large, threatening to unravel their connection. With the stakes high, Ida grapples with the decision to reveal her secret. Will their love survive the revelation, or will it come at too high a price?

basic_info.title: Duty After School
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Afterschool Military Activity, Banggwa hu Jeonjaeng Hwaldong, Afterschool War Activities

content.synopsis:
Class 3-2 at Sungdong High School seemed like any other group of students, absorbed in typical teenage concerns like crushes and looming exams. But when peculiar purple orbs descend from the sky, their world transforms in unimaginable ways.

These orbs possess the power to unleash sudden chaos, plunging the globe into panic. With the military strained, the government calls upon students and young adults to join the army. Overnight, Class 3-2 transitions from classrooms to combat, trading pens for rifles.

Assured of minimal danger and promised academic incentives, the students reluctantly embrace their new roles. With a nonchalant demeanor, they embark on military training, oblivious to the harsh realities awaiting them that will shatter their youthful innocence.

basic_info.title: Cheese in the Trap Season 2
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 치즈인더트랩 시즌2

content.synopsis: In the second season of "Cheese in the Trap," the intricate web of relationships at Seojoon University deepens as Yoo Jung's mysterious demeanor continues to captivate Seol. Bora and Eun Taek navigate the complexities of friendship, while Sang Chul's schemes threaten to disrupt the fragile balance. As Seol delves further into Yoo Jung's enigmatic past, she must confront the shadows looming over their blossoming romance. Will she unravel the truth behind the facade, or will the trap tighten its grip on their futures?

basic_info.title: Get Schooled
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: True Education, Chamgyoyuk

content.synopsis: In the Ministry of Education, Hwajin Na's unorthodox teaching methods raise eyebrows with their intensity. Yet, in a school plagued by bullies resistant to conventional discipline, his tough approach is unmatched. For some students, true learning only begins when the bullies face their reckoning.

basic_info.title: The Art of Reincarnation
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Standard of Reincarnation, The Essence of Reincarnation, Hwansaeng-ui Jeongseok

content.synopsis: In a world where honor and betrayal intertwine, Daven, a one-armed warrior, earns his place by defeating his cousin Kazin in battle, only to be betrayed and imprisoned for life. Centuries later, the minor god Yulian is reborn and inadvertently brings Daven's soul back in the body of a young boy named Vincent Adenka. Together, they unravel the mysteries of Daven and Kazin's past, as Vincent must rediscover the ways of combat while Yulian explores the depths of reincarnation.

basic_info.title: Dungeon Reset
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 던전 리셋

content.synopsis: In a sudden twist of fate, Dawoon's mundane existence is shattered when he is whisked away to the treacherous Dungeon. Here, a perilous game unfolds, pitting him against ferocious monsters and deadly traps. Plagued by his lack of combat prowess as a mere crafter, Dawoon's luck takes a turn after a harrowing trap triggers an unexpected reset, granting him a medley of peculiar yet advantageous skills. With an insatiable assistant and a charming ground squirrel by his side, he embarks on a daring quest to conquer the game and find his way back home. Unbound by the rules that once confined him, what new horizons will open up in the mysterious depths below?

basic_info.title: Flirting with the Villain's Dad
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Seduce the Villain's Father, Akdang-ui Appa-reul Kkyosyeo-ra

content.synopsis:
In the captivating web novel "Brigitte Wants to be Happy!", Princess Yerenika of Livovny faces a tragic fate as a side character. But when a mysterious woman is reborn as Yerenika, she seizes the chance to alter her destiny and cheat death. To her surprise, she enters the storyline at a crucial juncture before the main characters and the villain come into being.

Yerenika disrupts the narrative by foiling the abduction of her sister Theresia by Euredian, the king of Bellecourt, a pivotal event that would trigger a series of calamities. Yet, her plan takes a dangerous turn when Euredian captures her and whisks her away to his enchanted realm, where the magical air threatens her fragile health.

In the original timeline, Euredian marries Lady Soleia Elodia and begets Dekalb, the malevolent figure responsible for orchestrating numerous tragedies. Now, Yerenika must rewrite history by seducing Euredian, ensuring he weds her instead of Soleia and erasing Dekalb's existence from the web novel's dark tapestry.

basic_info.title: Kill the Villainess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Angnyeo-reul Jugyeo Jwo

content.synopsis:
In a desperate bid to escape her torment, Eris Miserian has tried every means possible to end her life and return to her true home in South Korea. Trapped within the pages of a novel she barely glanced at, Eris is compelled to fulfill her role as a malevolent minor character before she can meet her end. Surrounded by those who relish her downfall, Eris decides to embrace her fate as a villainess, determined to meet her demise through the unfolding plot.

With her social status as her only weapon, Eris navigates the treacherous world of the novel, manipulating others in her quest for a swift return to reality. Despite the constraints of the narrative, she resolves to defy all odds and seek out a way to break free from this bleak existence. Eris is prepared to bend every rule and face her execution, all in the hope of finally breaking free from this cruel world.

basic_info.title: A Business Proposal
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sanae Matseon, The Office Blind Date

content.synopsis:
In a bid to thwart another suitor of Jin Yeong-seo, Shin Ha-ri agrees to a blind date in her friend's stead, aiming to sabotage the meeting. Adorned in heavy makeup, a flamboyant pink wig, and a daring outfit, Ha-ri plans to drive the man away to put an end to Yeong-seo's string of blind dates. To her surprise, the man turns out to be Kang Tae-mu, the new CEO at her workplace.

Despite Ha-ri's outlandish behavior, Tae-mu remains unfazed and shockingly proposes to her, mistaking her for Yeong-seo. Caught in a web of lies, Ha-ri must navigate rejecting the persistent Tae-mu without revealing her true identity and jeopardizing her job. As Tae-mu's pursuit intensifies, Ha-ri finds herself grappling with unexpected emotions towards him.

basic_info.title: The Lone Necromancer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Na Honja Necromancer, The Only Necromancer, Solo Necromancy

content.synopsis: Seongwu, a former special forces soldier, dives back into the world of academics after his national service. His routine student life takes a thrilling turn when a cryptic message challenges him and his classmates to "choose a role." Opting for the rare necromancer, Seongwu unlocks the ability to command the undead. As chaos looms over campus and beyond, he must harness his newfound powers to combat menacing creatures and safeguard his peers. Can they survive the impending dangers?

basic_info.title: Goong
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Goong - The Royal Palace Story, Princess Hours

content.synopsis: In a Korea where monarchism never faded, grand palaces stand as more than mere relics—they house living royal families, preserving ancient customs. Enter Che-Gyeong, a high-school girl thrust into a world where tradition reigns supreme. Her world is upended when she learns she's been promised to the prince, a handsome facade that hides a cruel reality. Join Che-Gyeong as she navigates a realm where the past is present, and the future is uncertain.

basic_info.title: Father, I Don't Want This Marriage
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Daddy, I Don't Want to Marry!, Appa, Na I Gyeolhon An Hallae-yo!

content.synopsis: Lady Jubelian Eloy Floyen, an unloved yet lovestruck woman, clings to her disinterested lover Mikhail Hessen while yearning for affection from her indifferent father, Regis. Framed for attempted murder, both men abandon her, leaving her to face death alone. But when a modern-day Korean woman inhabits Jubelian's body, she resolves to alter her fate. Determined to break free from Mikhail, she opens the door for a new suitor—Regis's student, Max. Desperate to avoid marriage to the cruel crown prince Maximillian Casein Assiette, Jubelian proposes a contract with Max, determined to evade a doomed union.

basic_info.title: Trace
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 트레이스

content.synopsis:
In modern-day South Korea, a wave of chaos erupts as mysterious creatures known as "Trouble" wreak havoc, leaving destruction in their wake. These monsters have plunged the world into turmoil, prompting the emergence of a select group of individuals with extraordinary powers known as "Trace." Despite being humanity's only hope against the "Trouble," the "Trace" face discrimination and ostracism due to some individuals abusing their abilities for personal gain.

The narrative follows two central figures: Sah Gang-kwon, a high school student concealing his "Trace" abilities, and Kim Yun-Seong, who gains his powers in his thirties only to have his wife and daughter abducted for sinister experiments. As they navigate a world torn apart by chaos and division, their fates become intertwined in a gripping tale of survival and sacrifice.

basic_info.title: Marry My Husband
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nae Nampyeon-gwa Gyeolhonhaejwo

content.synopsis:
Stricken by cancer and dissatisfied with her life, 37-year-old Kang Jiwon discovers her husband of a decade, Park Minhwan, in a compromising situation with her supposed best friend, Jeong Sumin. As tensions escalate, Minhwan's violent outburst leaves Jiwon gravely wounded, his callousness evident even as she nears death. Betrayed and embittered by years of mistreatment, Jiwon inexplicably finds herself reborn as her 27-year-old self, a decade before her tragic demise at her spouse's hands.

Fuelled by a potent mix of resentment, fury, and a thirst for retribution, Jiwon leverages her past life's knowledge to right the wrongs inflicted upon her by her deceitful husband and treacherous friend. Determined to exact revenge and inflict misery upon them, she navigates a path fraught with vendettas while harboring the possibility of encountering a more deserving love interest in her newfound existence.

basic_info.title: Existence
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jonjae

content.synopsis: Lee Jain has roamed the Earth for 3.5 billion years, cycling through endless animal forms. In his ultimate existence, he emerges in South Korea as a human – the species he despises most. Endowed with a myriad of animal superpowers, Lee Jain navigates his final life.

basic_info.title: Villain to Kill
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 빌런투킬

content.synopsis: In a world where special abilities divide people into villains and psykers, Cassian Lee, a strong-willed psyker, finds himself in a peculiar predicament during a visit to Greece. Through a twist of fate, he suddenly inhabits the body of a Korean high school student who has turned to the dark side. As Cassian grapples with this unexpected transformation, his internal struggle between justice and malevolence intensifies. Will his innate goodness prevail, or will he succumb to the allure of villainy?

basic_info.title: Log-in Murim
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Murim Login, Login Murim

content.synopsis: In a world where hunters flourish by tracking down monsters emerging from Gates, Jin Tae-Kyung, a humble low-rank hunter, stumbles upon a VR device that transports him into a martial arts-themed game. Despite facing numerous challenges, Tae-Kyung manages to break free from this virtual realm. Surprisingly, the powers and abilities he acquired in the game seamlessly transition into the real world, enhancing his skills as a hunter. However, driven by his concern for his non-player character companions, he resolves to venture back into the Murim world, blending both realities as he continues his hunter's journey.

basic_info.title: See You in My 19th Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Let's Meet in the Next Life, Please Take Care of Me in This Life as Well, Ibeon Saengdo Jal Butakhae

content.synopsis: In possession of a remarkable gift, Jieum Ban can recall the memories of each of her past lives. Following a tragic end in her previous incarnation, she embarks on a journey to reunite with the individuals from her bygone existence. However, as she navigates her 19th life, will the lingering memories of her 18th life disrupt her chance at romance? Can love transcend through the ages, or will it falter under the weight of past recollections?

basic_info.title: The Reaper
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Reaper of the Drifting Moon, Death God of the Drifting Moon, Grim Reaper's Floating Moon, Sasin Pyowol

content.synopsis: Pyo Wol, an orphan wandering the continent, collides with a mysterious man and falls into a deep slumber. Awakening in a dim, cramped chamber with a solitary iron door, Wol endures grueling months, striving to maintain composure and physical prowess. As the door creaks open at last, he uncovers a grim reality - he is not alone in his plight. A masked collective has abducted 300 youngsters for ruthless training as lethal tools. In a brutal contest for survival, Wol must engage in deadly combat against his peers, vying for a select few spots. Can he secure a coveted position and break free from the clutches of his captors?

basic_info.title:
Hige wo Soru. Soshite Joshikousei wo Hirou.
Higehiro: After Being Rejected, I Shaved and Took in a High School Runaway
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Shaved. Then I Brought a High School Girl Home.

content.synopsis:
Yoshida, an office worker nursing a five-year crush on his coworker Airi Gotou, finally lands a date with her, only to face rejection. Disheartened and inebriated, he encounters a high school girl named Sayu Ogiwara on his way home. Sayu, seeking shelter for the night, tries to charm Yoshida, who, despite declining her advances, offers her a place to stay.

Come morning, Sayu discloses her escape from Hokkaido to Tokyo, where she resorted to trading sexual favors for survival over six months. Unmoved by her allure, Yoshida assigns her household chores instead. Thus unfolds a poignant bond between a despondent adult and a runaway teenager.

basic_info.title:
Hokuto no Ken
Fist of the North Star
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 北斗の拳

content.synopsis: In the bleak aftermath of a devastating nuclear war in the year 199X, Earth lies barren and desolate. The once lush seas have dried up, leaving a cracked wasteland where only the human race remains. Civilization has crumbled, giving way to a lawless world where the ruthless prey on the weak for the most basic of necessities - food and water. Enter Kenshirou, a enigmatic figure wielding the ancient martial art of Hokuto Shinken, a lethal technique passed down for 2000 years. As he dispenses justice with his deadly skills, can Kenshirou emerge as the beacon of hope in this chaotic new era?

basic_info.title: Hikaru no Go
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ヒカルの碁

content.synopsis:
In the depths of his grandfather's attic, Hikaru Shindou stumbles upon a dusty go board, unlocking a portal to an unexpected journey. A spectral figure emerges – Fujiwara no Sai, a revered go master from ancient times. Despite Hikaru's initial indifference towards board games, Sai's boundless enthusiasm for the game propels him into a realm of strategy and skill. Reluctantly at first, Hikaru embarks on a quest for the elusive "Divine Move," guided by the persistent spirit of Sai.

With the unwavering guidance of Sai and the rivalry with his peer, Akira Touya, Hikaru delves deeper into the intricate world of go. Fueled by a newfound determination to showcase his prowess, he embraces the challenge, gradually transforming from a reluctant player into a dedicated enthusiast. Through the lens of this ancient game, "Hikaru no Go" intricately weaves a tale of growth and self-discovery as Hikaru navigates the realms of strategy, competition, and passion.

basic_info.title: Toriko
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: トリコ

content.synopsis: In a realm where the flavors and feel of food hold immense significance, a man blessed with extraordinary abilities is sought after by top eateries and affluent patrons as a prized food seeker. Assisted by his hesitant partner, driven by Toriko's legend to join him, they journey to ensnare elusive and formidable creatures vital for crafting the perfect meal.

basic_info.title: Kyou, Koi wo Hajimemasu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Today, We'll Start Our Love

content.synopsis: Tsubaki enjoys styling her younger sister's hair daily but feels her own style doesn't measure up. At the High School Opening Ceremony, she sits beside Kyouta, the rude top student of the first years, after missing the opportunity to give the speech. Following a clash of words, Tsubaki impulsively cuts Kyouta's hair. In return, Kyouta demands repayment "with her body." Instead, Tsubaki trims his hair even shorter. Things take an unexpected turn when Kyouta kisses Tsubaki and vows to make her his partner.

basic_info.title: Ibitsu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: イビツ

content.synopsis: One night, while taking out the trash, Kazuki Itou encounters a mysterious dirty girl in a gothic lolita dress. Their brief exchange leads to a chilling question: "Would you have a little sister?" Intrigued, Kazuki soon discovers that this girl has infiltrated his life, fixated on becoming his sibling. As Kazuki grapples with this unsettling development, he realizes the girl's sinister intentions extend beyond mere obsession. His real sister, Hikari, becomes a pawn in a deadly game as a local urban legend foretells a dark fate for her at the hands of the enigmatic lolita. Caught in a web of deceit and danger, Kazuki must unravel the truth before it's too late, facing a choice between two equally ominous destinies.

basic_info.title: Tsubaki-chou Lonely Planet
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 椿町ロンリープラネット

content.synopsis:
In the wake of her father's overwhelming six million yen debt, sixteen-year-old high school student Fumi Oono and her father face eviction from their apartment. Desperate for shelter and a means to settle the debt, Fumi seizes the opportunity to work as a live-in housekeeper for the young writer Akatsuki Kibikino.

Their initial encounter is far from smooth, as Akatsuki dismisses Fumi as incompetent and treats her like a child. Driven by her determination to alleviate her father's burden, Fumi strives to prove her worth. Despite Akatsuki's abrasive and enigmatic demeanor, Fumi gradually uncovers a compassionate and devoted soul beneath the surface.

Accompanied by captivating one-shots:

Volume 7: Hirunaka no Ryuusei Bangai-hen: Blue

Volume 8: Hirunaka no Ryuusei Bangai-hen: Red

basic_info.title: The New Gate
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: THE NEW GATE

content.synopsis: In the virtual realm of "The New Gate," once a perilous game of life and death, the courageous veteran player Shin successfully liberates the multitude of entrapped gamers. However, as he vanquishes the final boss and ensures their release, a mysterious light engulfs him, transporting him five centuries ahead into the very world of the game.

basic_info.title:
Tasogare Otome x Amnesia
Dusk Maiden of Amnesia
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Koukin Otome x Amnesia, Dusk Maiden of Amnesia

content.synopsis: In the eerie halls of the deserted Seikyou Academy, a young woman finds herself trapped in a ghostly existence after a mysterious event leads her to the brink of death. Only Niiya Teiichi, a new freshman, possesses the ability to perceive her spectral presence. Together, they embark on a haunting journey to unravel the secrets shrouding her untimely demise and uncover the dark forces at play.

basic_info.title:
Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia Illegals
My Hero Academia: Vigilantes
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ヴィジランテ -僕のヒーローアカデミア ILLEGALS-

content.synopsis:
In a society where superhumans reign, standing out seems impossible for Kouichi Haimawari. With a modest Quirk called "sliding" that keeps him grounded, he resigns to admiring professional heroes from afar. Yet, Kouichi discovers fulfillment in small acts of kindness, like returning lost items and aiding the elderly.

His uneventful routine takes a dramatic turn when illegal hero Knuckleduster saves him from a dangerous scuffle. Recognizing Kouichi's latent heroism, Knuckleduster recruits him to hunt down a potent drug called Trigger, which enhances Quirks but corrupts the user's mind.

In the prequel to the original tale, Vigilante: Boku no Hero Academia Illegals traces Kouichi's transformation into a Vigilante, operating in the shadows to thwart crimes, challenging the boundaries of heroism and villainy.

basic_info.title:
Usagi Drop
Bunny Drop
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Usagi Drop: Bangaihen

content.synopsis:
When Daikichi Kawachi attends his grandfather's funeral, he stumbles upon a surprising discovery in the garden: a mysterious young girl named Rin Kaga. Shockingly, it is revealed that Rin is the illegitimate child of his late grandfather, shrouded in family scandal.

Facing rejection from his relatives due to the girl's tainted origins, Daikichi takes a stand against their callous attitudes. Determined to provide a loving home for Rin despite his own uncertainties as a young, single man, he embraces the role of her guardian.

In "Usagi Drop," we follow the heartwarming journey of Daikichi and Rin as they navigate the complexities of family bonds, seeking solace and purpose in their unanticipated connection.

basic_info.title:
Hikaru ga Shinda Natsu
The Summer Hikaru Died
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 光が死んだ夏

content.synopsis:
In a small village, lifelong best friends Yoshiki and Hikaru have always been inseparable. But when Yoshiki notices a disturbing change in Hikaru's behavior after a pivotal summer, he realizes his friend is not the same person anymore. Despite looking identical, Hikaru reveals a chilling secret - transforming into a supernatural entity who threatens Yoshiki's life unless he accepts this new reality, all while declaring love for him.

Caught between mourning the loss of his dear friend and embracing this enigmatic Hikaru, Yoshiki grapples with profound grief. As their bond deepens, strange and unsettling events grip their village, plunging them into a mysterious whirlwind of chaos.

basic_info.title: Chikan Otoko
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Molester Man

content.synopsis: In the world of online forums, Molester Man is known as a socially awkward otaku with a penchant for mischief. His life takes a bizarre turn when a misunderstanding leads to his mistaken arrest as a stalker. Resolving the confusion, Molester Man discovers that the girl, dubbed Miss Understanding, has been deeply affected by a previous stalker. Determined to make amends, he extends a surprising offer to date her. As their unexpected relationship unfolds, Molester Man finds himself drawn into the lives of Miss Understanding's friends - the lively Kansai and the innocent Loli Jugs.

basic_info.title:
Kozure Ookami
Lone Wolf & Cub
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lone Wolf and Cub

content.synopsis: Once revered as the Shogunate's top executioner, Ittou Ogami's life crumbles when the deceitful Yagyuu Clan frames him for treason, tarnishing his name and wiping out his family, sparing only his son Daigorou. With vengeance burning in his heart, Ittou transforms into a hired assassin, embarking on a relentless quest for retribution alongside his son. As they journey through the land, Ittou's lethal skills earn them the notorious title of "Lone Wolf and Cub," feared as the elite assassins who deliver justice with deadly precision.

basic_info.title: World Trigger
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ワールドトリガー

content.synopsis:
In Mikado City, a peaceful urban landscape is shattered by an unexpected invasion through a mysterious interdimensional gate. Neighbors, monstrous beings from another world, unleash chaos upon the city, rendering conventional weapons useless. Amidst despair, the enigmatic Border Defense Agency emerges, wielding advanced Triggers to push back the Neighbors and safeguard the populace. 

Fast forward four years, and Mikado City now hails the agency as its saviors. Yuuma Kuga joins First Mikado City High School, closely linked to Border, sparking curiosity and suspicion due to the dangerous environment. Bullied and isolated, Yuuma finds an ally in Border trainee Osamu Mikumo, who defends him despite his own reservations. Their camaraderie faces a pivotal test when a Neighbor breaches the forbidden zone, prompting a showdown. As Osamu struggles, Yuuma effortlessly dispatches the threat, revealing a startling truth—he is not just a student, but a Neighbor in disguise.

basic_info.title: Chihayafuru
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama

content.synopsis:
Forever overshadowed by her older sister, the determined yet directionless Chihaya Ayase harbors no aspirations of her own. Meanwhile, Taichi Mashima, the brilliant but insecure son of a surgeon, grapples with the weight of his mother's relentless demands for perfection. Their lives take a transformative turn with the arrival of Arata Wataya, a transfer student.

Enthralled by Arata's ambition to dominate the ancient game of competitive karuta, Chihaya swiftly embraces this new passion. Refusing to be outdone by the gifted Arata, proud Taichi joins the fray, dedicating himself to surpassing his destined competitor. The trio spends their youth honing their karuta skills until fate intervenes, pulling them apart.

Years later, reunited in high school, the trio, along with newfound allies and adversaries, embark on a journey of self-discovery, camaraderie, and love within the realm of competitive karuta.

basic_info.title:
Kaette Kudasai! Akutsu-san
Please Go Home, Miss Akutsu!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yankee Musume, Please go home! Akutsu-san

content.synopsis:
In a bustling high school setting, Ooyama, a shy student who lives independently, finds his sanctuary invaded by the spontaneous Riko Akutsu. Claiming his bedroom as her personal hangout spot, this rebellious classmate indulges in his manga collection, snacks, and bed for daily siestas. Despite Ooyama's desire for peace, Akutsu's stubborn presence disrupts his routine, stirring unexpected feelings within him.

As Ooyama grapples with Akutsu's unwavering presence, their dynamic evolves from irritation to a peculiar bond marked by teasing and growing comfort. In this tale of unexpected companionship, their daily escapades reveal a deeper connection blossoming amidst the chaos of teenage life.

basic_info.title:
Naruto Gaiden: Nanadaime Hokage to Akairo no Hanatsuzuki
Naruto: The Seventh Hokage and the Scarlet Spring
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Naruto Side Story: The Seventh Hokage and the Scarlet Spring Month

content.synopsis:
As the sun sets on Naruto Uzumaki's youth, a new dawn breaks for the next generation, including Sarada Uchiha, daughter of Sasuke Uchiha and Sakura Haruno. Resembling her father strongly, Sarada is puzzled by her lack of her mother's traits. A chance discovery of a photo with Sasuke's former ally, Karin, reveals a shocking truth - Sarada shares more similarities with the mysterious woman than with her own mother.

When Sasuke returns to the village with grave news, Naruto, now the Seventh Hokage, joins his friend on a mission. Unbeknownst to them, Sarada and her friend Chouchou Akimichi follow, determined to uncover the secrets of Sarada's lineage.

basic_info.title: Black Cat
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Stray Cat

content.synopsis:
In a world where justice comes at a price, Train Heartnet is the affable "Sweeper" renowned for his unmatched marksmanship skills. Teaming up with the composed Sven Vollfied, they navigate the underworld, chasing fugitives for a living. Yet, their pockets remain perpetually empty until a lucrative offer comes from the captivating thief Rinslet Walker and the enigmatic Eve.

Their routine pursuit takes a dark turn when they uncover a sinister conspiracy orchestrated by an old nemesis of Train's. Beneath his carefree facade lies a haunted past and a thirst for vengeance that threatens to consume him. As the gears of a malevolent scheme begin to turn, secrets unravel, and loyalties are tested in a high-stakes game of cat and mouse.

Special Feature:
Volume 8: Stray Cat (pilot)

basic_info.title:
Yancha Gal no Anjou-san
Anjo the Mischievous Gal
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Status Quo
            
                Love Status Quo,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: やんちゃギャルの安城さん

content.synopsis: In the bustling halls of high school, Seto, a studious and somewhat dull student, finds himself constantly pestered by the troublemaking Anjou. Despite their contrasting personalities – Seto being serious and Anjou exuberant – the dynamic duo forms an unlikely bond. Anjou takes delight in teasing Seto, who remains oblivious to the charm his reactions hold for her. As their banter escalates, the line between playful teasing and genuine affection blurs. Dive into the lively world of Yancha Gal no Anjou-san, where the amusing daily escapades of these opposites captivate and transform into a precious connection.

Life in the advanced city of No. 6 is a dream come true for the exceptional student, Shion. But on his 12th birthday, everything changes in an unexpected turn of events. Attacked by a mysterious boy named Nezumi, Shion chooses compassion over fear, unknowingly setting off a chain of revelations.

As their paths intertwine again years later, Shion's faith in the city's authorities is shattered. Branded as fugitives, he and Nezumi embark on a journey to expose the hidden truths behind the perfect facade of No. 6. In a world of deceit and danger, they must navigate the shadows to uncover the city's darkest secrets.

basic_info.title:
Bokura ga Ita
We Were There
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Run Baby, Run.

content.synopsis:
Fifteen-year-old Nanami "Nana" Takahashi craves friendships above all else at school, yet struggles with keeping up with the latest gossip and remembering names. Enter the popular Motoharu Yano, adored by most girls but a source of irritation for Nana due to his playful demeanor. Little does she know, Yano carries a heavy heart since his ex-girlfriend's tragic passing in a car accident, leaving him unable to trust or see the world clearly.

As Nana tries to connect with Yano, she faces unexpected barriers. Despite her growing feelings for him, the question remains: can she break through his walls and offer support, or are their challenges too immense to overcome?

basic_info.title: Nijigahara Holograph
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Rainbow Field Holograph

content.synopsis:
Amidst a haunting proliferation of butterflies in town, whispers of a mysterious creature dwelling in the tunnel near the school capture the imaginations of the children. When Arie Kimura's mother is discovered lifeless near the tunnel entrance, alongside eerie human-like markings, the chilling legend gains credibility. Is doomsday looming? To placate the creature's anger, the children opt for a grim solution: sacrificing Arie, blamed as the curse's source, into a well leading to the Nijigahara tunnel. This fateful act propels Komatsuzaki, harboring unrequited feelings for Arie, into a descent towards darkness.

Yet, this macabre event is merely the prelude to the intricate, enigmatic tale of Nijigahara Holograph. Unfolding across dual timelines, it intertwines the lives of the suicidal Suzuki, his obsessive admirer Higure, the mysterious Miss Sakaki with her veiled visage, and a web of interconnected characters—siblings, parents, colleagues, mentors, perpetrators, and victims. Bound by a shared past, they will all confront the consequences of their actions or ordeals a decade later, grappling with the haunting legacy that ties them together.

basic_info.title:
Jitsu wa Watashi wa
My Monster Secret: "Actually, I am..."
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Truth Is I Am...

content.synopsis: Introducing Kuromine Asahi, known as "the man who can't lie." A chance encounter on his way home reveals a startling truth: his crush, Shiragami Youko, is no ordinary girl—she's a vampire! Can Asahi navigate the complexities of keeping her supernatural secret? Get ready for a charmingly awkward and unique vampire romantic comedy!

basic_info.title: Hideout
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: HIDEOUT

content.synopsis: On a serene vacation island in the southern seas, a young couple grapples with the loss of their only son. Yet, for Seiichi Kirishima, the husband, the trip harbors a sinister agenda. His intention? To eliminate his wife and conceal her remains within the dense forest. But as his scheme unravels and his wife flees, Seiichi pursues her into a shadowy cave, unwittingly sealing his fate. Trapped within, he becomes the prey of a ravenous creature with an unquenchable appetite for human flesh.

basic_info.title: Black Bird
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ブラックバード

content.synopsis:
Since childhood, Misao Harada has possessed the unique ability to see demons lurking in the shadows. Her past is intertwined with a mysterious boy who once shielded her from these malevolent beings, promising to return one day. Fast forward to her high school years, Misao yearns for a normal life, dreaming of love and companionship. However, fate takes a curious turn when a striking stranger named Kyou moves in next door, unveiling himself as none other than her long-lost childhood friend and first love.

As Misao commemorates her 16th birthday, a shocking betrayal unfolds as a classmate reveals his demonic nature, launching a vicious attack on her. In a desperate bid for eternal youth, he aims to consume her flesh. Yet, just as darkness threatens to engulf her, Kyou emerges as her savior, disclosing his true identity as the esteemed leader of a Tengu clan. Propelled by the belief that Misao's union with him will bring prosperity to his kin, Kyou presents her with a challenging ultimatum: accept him as her betrothed and secure her safety, or confront a relentless onslaught of demon assailants drawn to the potent allure of her blood.

basic_info.title:
Zom 100: Zombie ni Naru made ni Shitai 100 no Koto
Zom 100: Bucket List of the Dead
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bucket List of The Dead, Zombie 100: 100 Things I Want to do Before I Become a Zombie

content.synopsis: In a cluttered apartment, 24-year-old Akira Tendou numbs his spirit with a zombie movie, his eyes devoid of spark. Enduring three grueling years at a ruthless Japanese corporation, his confidence shattered, he struggles to reveal his love for the stunning Ohtori. One fateful day, he catches his landlord feasting on a fellow tenant, revealing a city overrun by zombies. As Akira flees for survival, the chaos ignites a newfound sense of vitality within him.

Fifty years ago, the wielders of the sacred Rave stones clashed with the malevolent Dark Bring demons, triggering a cataclysmic event known as "Overdrive." This unleashed a mighty force that lulled the Dark Bring into dormancy, scattering the Rave pieces worldwide.

In the tranquil present of Garage Island, Haru Glory's life takes an unexpected turn when he reels in the enigmatic creature Plue. The seemingly chance encounter leads him to Shiba Roses, the legendary Rave Master. Shiba unveils a grim truth—the Dark Bring has resurfaced, and only by reuniting the fragmented Rave can this threat be quelled. But before Shiba can embark on this vital quest, a sinister agent of Demon Card strikes, compelling him to pass the mantle of Rave's power to Haru.

Now burdened with humanity's destiny, Haru embraces his new role as the Rave Master, determined to track down the scattered Rave remnants and thwart the looming peril.

basic_info.title:
Watashi ga Motete Dousunda
Kiss Him, Not Me

content.synopsis:
Embracing a unique twist on fairy tales, Kae Serinuma, a second-year high school student known for her passion for imagining romantic relationships between male classmates Nozomu Nanashima and Yuusuke Igarashi, experiences a transformation after the tragic death of her beloved anime character. Emerging from seclusion a week later, Kae surprises everyone with a stunning physical metamorphosis.

Now, the boys who used to be mere objects of her affection are vying for her attention. But Kae's heart yearns for a different kind of love story—one where the boys find love with each other, not with her. As she navigates this unexpected turn of events, Kae leads the boys into the whimsical realm of a fujoshi's fantasies, challenging their perceptions and sparking a unique battle for her affections.

basic_info.title:
Kimi wa Houkago Insomnia
Insomniacs After School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 君は放課後インソムニア

content.synopsis: In the depths of the Astronomy Club's abandoned observatory, a mysterious figure haunts the shadows following the sudden passing of one of its own. Gruff and sleep-deprived Ganta Nakami crosses paths with the spirited rebel Isaki Magari, sparking an unexpected bond within the eerie confines of the observatory. As insomnia plagues them both, Nakami and Magari find solace beneath the starry skies, forging an unlikely friendship that offers respite from the relentless grip of sleeplessness. In "Kimi wa Houkago Insomnia," their journey unfolds against the backdrop of twinkling stars as they navigate the challenges of student life and the enigmatic presence that lingers within the club's walls.

basic_info.title:
Tenkuu Shinpan
High-Rise Invasion
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sky-High Survival, Sky Violation

content.synopsis:
Witnessing a grisly scene of a man's head being split open by an axe, 16-year-old Yuri Honjou is consumed by fear and confusion. Fleeing from the masked attacker, she stumbles into an abandoned building, where every door is inexplicably locked. Trapped, Yuri's only hope lies in navigating this eerie place. Racing to the rooftop, she is met with a desolate world, devoid of life, surrounded by towering structures.

Despite the overwhelming despair, Yuri's resolve strengthens upon discovering her brother's presence in this surreal realm. Determined to reunite with him and break free, she faces a chilling revelation—more masked killers lurk nearby, eager to inflict terror and satisfy their darkest urges. As the threat looms larger, Yuri grapples with the grim question of survival in this harrowing ordeal.

basic_info.title: Darwin's Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ダーウィンズゲーム

content.synopsis: Unassuming Sudou Kaname receives an intriguing invitation to test a cutting-edge mobile app known as Darwin's Game. Little does he know, this seemingly innocent offer will plunge him into a perilous world with no exit strategy. As the truth unfolds, Sudou discovers that escaping this enigmatic game is not an option.

basic_info.title:
Sachi-iro no One Room
One Room of Happiness
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 幸色のワンルーム

content.synopsis:
In a heart-wrenching turn of events, a 14-year-old girl vanishes, prompting a frantic police search. Her anguished parents yearn for her safe return, oblivious to her unexpected refuge with a former stalker, now affectionately known as "Oniisan." Far from the assumed distress, she finds solace in his company, shunning a past marred by parental abuse and merciless bullying at school.

Embracing their unorthodox connection, she adopts the name "Sachi," symbolizing a fresh start. Despite the odds stacked against them, a daring pact emerges: to evade capture and parental wrath, or face the ultimate sacrifice together. Amidst a harsh reality, they cling to the promise of a shared future, a rare beacon of light in their tumultuous world.

basic_info.title: Terra Formars
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: テラフォーマーズ

content.synopsis: In the year 2577, the inaugural manned expedition to Mars has touched down, brimming with anticipation and determination. However, what awaits the six intrepid crew members on the red planet is beyond their wildest nightmares—monstrous humanoid cockroaches of immense power, born from a fateful experiment long ago. Despite their valiant efforts, the crew falls to the superior might of the mutants, leaving a desperate message for Earth. Now, humanity must rally its finest warriors to reclaim Mars from the grip of these evolved pests.

basic_info.title:
Sousei no Onmyouji
Twin Star Exorcists
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sousei no Onmyouji: Adashino Benio-hen

content.synopsis:
For ages, the land of Japan has been plagued by the terror of otherworldly beings called "Kegare" emerging from the parallel realm of Magano. Standing against this malevolent force are the covert exorcists, sworn to eliminate all Kegare threats.

In the modern era, 14-year-old Rokuro Enmadou stands out as a gifted and formidable exorcist. Haunted by a tragic past that soured his view on exorcism, he abandoned his ambition to be the strongest. On the flip side, Benio Adashino, also 14, embodies beauty and exceptional talent, bearing the aspirations of many.

Despite their contrasting personalities, Rokuro and Benio are the fated "Twin Star Exorcists," destined to conceive the Miko—the ultimate exorcist tasked with purging the world of Kegare and impurities. Yet, as inexperienced youths, they face a challenging path ahead, filled with trials and tribulations as they strive to fulfill their destiny.

basic_info.title: Act-age
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Performing Arts
            
                Performing Arts,                    Showbiz
            
                Showbiz
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アクタージュ act-age

content.synopsis:
Since childhood, Kei Yonagi has been captivated by the art of acting, keenly observing the nuances of character portrayal. Now a struggling teenager supporting her siblings, she relentlessly auditions for roles with little success.

Fate takes a turn when esteemed director Sumiji Kuroyama witnesses Yonagi's raw talent for method acting. Recognizing her potential, he offers to refine her skills, knowing that her intense approach could also harm her. With this mentorship, Yonagi gains a chance to shine, but the path to success is fraught with obstacles she must navigate and adapt to.

basic_info.title:
Pocket Monsters Special
Pokémon Adventures
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Pokémon Special, Pokespecial, Pokemon Adventures, Pokémon Black and White, Pocket Monsters Special XY, Pocket Monsters Special Omega Ruby Alpha Sapphire ORAS, Pocket Monsters Special Sun Moon, Pocket Monsters Special Sword and Shield

content.synopsis: In the quiet town of Pallet, a young boy named Red embarks on a thrilling journey into the world of Pokémon, joined by his rival, Green. As they forge new friendships with both humans and Pokémon, a dark shadow looms over their adventures. Team Rocket's sinister agenda involves capturing the elusive Mew and conducting dangerous experiments on innocent Pokémon to enhance their abilities. Red and his allies are faced with the daunting task of confronting Team Rocket, putting an end to their malevolent schemes, and uncovering the mysteries of the Pokémon universe.

In a humble rural town, twelve-year-old Touta Konoe yearns for the towering capital with its promise of reaching the stars. His chance arrives when tasked with a daunting challenge by his mentor and guardian, Yukihime. To earn his journey, Touta must overcome Yukihime in combat.

But fate intervenes when a relentless bounty hunter threatens Yukihime's existence. In a bold move to protect his loved ones, Touta imbibes Yukihime's blood, transforming into an immortal being capable of defeating the interloper.

Unveiling herself as Evangeline Athanasia Katherine McDowell, a legendary vampire, Yukihime leads Touta on a daring escape to the capital. Their enthralling odyssey begins, promising to reshape their destinies in ways they never imagined.

basic_info.title:
Shingeki no Kyojin: Kuinaki Sentaku
Attack on Titan: No Regrets

content.synopsis: In this captivating shoujo manga spin-off, delve into the enigmatic pasts of Levi and Erwin. Witness Erwin Smith's meteoric rise within the Survey Corps, the last line of defense against the monstrous Titans. His calculating mind fixated on tactics and secrets, Erwin navigates a world teeming with danger. Meanwhile, beneath the surface lies the "Underground," a realm of destitution and decay, where Levi, a resourceful outlaw, thrives amidst the refuse. As their paths converge, a gripping showdown unfolds - unveiling the clash of two formidable ambitions.

basic_info.title:
Yubisaki to Renren
A Sign of Affection

content.synopsis: Yuki Itose, a hearing-impaired university student enveloped in a world of perpetual silence, finds solace in her lifelong home, rarely engaging with others except for her closest confidante, Rin Fujishiro. One fateful day during her routine commute, she encounters the silver-maned and polyglot traveler, Itsuomi Nagi, a mutual acquaintance of Rin. Itsuomi's unwavering acceptance of Yuki's condition, coupled with his worldly experiences, captivates and moves her deeply. As their paths diverge, Yuki's affection for him blossoms, ushering in a transformative journey for both as they delve into each other's contrasting realities. "Yubisaki to Renren" is a heartwarming romantic comedy that tenderly explores the silent existence of a university student, unveiling how one man's perspective can gradually reshape her world.

basic_info.title:
Sabishisugite Lesbian Fuuzoku ni Ikimashita Report
My Lesbian Experience with Loneliness
basic_info.genre:
Genre:
                            Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Private Report on My Lesbian Experience with Loneliness

content.synopsis: When Kabi Nagata's life spirals downward post-college dropout, she battles depression and an eating disorder, haunted by societal pressures and a craving for belonging. Despite efforts to heal, her pain deepens. At 28, she reaches out to a lesbian escort service, viewing it as a transformative step into adulthood. Though the encounter unfolds differently than anticipated, it catalyzes Kabi's journey of self-discovery and reinvention.

When Shinpei Ajiro's life takes a tragic turn after the loss of his parents, he finds solace living with the Kofune sisters, Mio and Ushio. However, a heartbreaking incident leads to Ushio's untimely death while rescuing Shiori Kobayakawa, prompting Shinpei's return to their home to grieve. As questions arise surrounding Ushio's demise, mysterious bruises hint at a sinister truth.

Driven by a deep-seated conviction, Shinpei delves into the shadows lurking within the island community, guided by a spectral message from Ushio urging him to protect Mio. Unraveling a web of malevolent forces, he realizes Ushio's passing is just the beginning of a perilous mystery.

Joined by Mio and allies, Shinpei navigates a treacherous path to safeguard his loved ones and uncover the island's dark secrets. Yet, with each revelation, the prospect of a safe future grows dimmer, casting a shroud of uncertainty over their homeland. Will Shinpei endure further trials to secure a brighter tomorrow for all, or will the encroaching darkness consume everything he holds dear?

basic_info.title:
Fairy Tail Zerø
Fairy Tail Zero

content.synopsis:
Long before she would establish Fairy Tail, the young prodigy Mavis Vermillion finds herself entrusted to the care of the Red Lizard guild. Enduring relentless mistreatment and backbreaking tasks, Mavis's unwavering resolve is tested. Amidst the dark clouds of her reality, she holds back tears, knowing that shedding them would sever her connection to the mystical fairies she dreams of meeting.

The tides turn abruptly when the ruthless Blue Skull guild descends upon her sanctuary, leaving only Mavis and Zera, the guild master's daughter, as survivors. Alone but united, Mavis and Zera navigate a world devoid of compassion, relying solely on each other for solace and support.

Their solitude is disrupted by the unexpected arrival of treasure hunters in pursuit of the revered Tenrou Jade, a gem of unparalleled significance to the island. As new faces emerge on the horizon, Mavis finds herself at a crossroads once more. The long-cherished desire to encounter the fairies beckons her, promising a glimmer of hope amidst the shadows of her past.

basic_info.title:
Arifureta Shokugyou de Sekai Saikyou
Arifureta: From Commonplace to World's Strongest
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: From Common Job Class to the Strongest in the World

content.synopsis: When a mysterious magical circle materializes at school, Hajime Nagumo and his classmates are whisked away to a church in the fantastical realm of Tortus. While his peers excel in newfound powers and prestigious classes, Hajime is labeled as inept due to his "Synergist" class, lacking combat prowess. As the group ventures into a treacherous dungeon, a grave error leads them to a perilous encounter with a menacing demon on a precarious bridge. In a selfless act, Hajime offers himself as bait to save his comrades but is unexpectedly hurled into the abyss by a fiery attack. Surviving against the odds, Hajime embarks on a harrowing journey towards survival, determined to ascend from the depths back to the surface world.

In the intricate tapestry of unrequited love, Hanabi Yasuraoka and Mugi Awaya navigate a facade of the perfect high school romance while concealing hidden desires for others. Hanabi longs for Narumi Kanai, her homeroom teacher and childhood friend, while Mugi harbors feelings for Akane Minagawa, his former tutor. As Kanai and Minagawa gravitate towards each other, Hanabi and Mugi seek solace in a bond forged by shared heartache.

Caught in a web of unfulfilled yearning, the two students grapple with a poignant dilemma: confront their unattainable desires or risk deeper entanglement in their love charade. Amidst the bittersweet melody of their intertwined emotions, the saga unfolds across volumes like "Nyan Nyan Prelude," "Nyan Nyan Serenade," "Nyan Nyan Oratorio," "Nyan Nyan Cantata," and "Nyan Nyan Andante."

basic_info.title: The Fable
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense

content.synopsis: In the shadowy world of contract killing, Fable is a renowned assassin with a long list of successful hits. But when the body count from his latest job raises eyebrows, Fable's boss orders him to vanish for a year. Embracing a civilian facade, Fable and his driver-turned-"sibling" partner, Youko Satou, must navigate life incognito. The stakes are high - if Fable breaks the no-kill rule, both will face a lethal consequence. Thus, the undercover odyssey of Akira and Youko Satou commences, a daring hiatus from their lethal profession.

basic_info.title: Paradise Kiss
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: ParaKiss

content.synopsis:
When high school student Yukari Hayasaka is ambushed by two eccentrically dressed individuals, she faints from shock. Upon waking up, she finds herself in the basement studio of Paradise Kiss, a fashion design club from Yazawa School for the Arts. Initially feeling like she's been kidnapped, Yukari discovers that the club members only want her to model for their upcoming fashion show.

Despite being a busy senior, Yukari adamantly refuses their offer but accidentally leaves her student passbook behind. The group's leader, George Koizumi, seizes this opportunity to persuade her to reconsider. Intrigued by their passion and ambition, Yukari eventually agrees to help them.

As Paradise Kiss' new model, Yukari juggles her commitments with her hectic life. However, the charm of the fashion world, especially George and the team, starts to captivate her, making it increasingly challenging to resist the allure of glamour and excitement.

basic_info.title:
Koi to Uso
Love and Lies

content.synopsis:
In a future Japan grappling with a declining birth rate, the government enforces the "Yukari Law" - a matchmaking program based on genetic compatibility for 16-year-olds. Known as "The Red Threads of Science," it's a revered system that promises a rewarding life for the compliant and punishes those who resist.

Approaching 16, Yukari Nejima is running out of time. He musters the courage to confess his feelings to his long-time crush, the popular Misaki Takasaki. To his astonishment, Misaki returns his affections. However, their tender moment is interrupted when Yukari receives a government directive - he is to wed his assigned partner, the outspoken Ririna "Snooty" Sanada. Caught in a web of love and deceit, Yukari must navigate his emotions as he grapples with this unexpected turn of events.

basic_info.title: Re:Monster
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Reincarnated: Monster

content.synopsis:
After meeting an untimely demise, Tomokui Kanata finds himself reborn as the feeble goblin known as Goburou. Despite his lowly stature, Goburou possesses a remarkable gift - the memories of his past life. Through a unique evolution, he grows powerful by feasting on foes, gaining strength with each bite.

Set in a ruthless realm where only the strongest thrive, Goburou navigates this new existence with loyal allies and skilled companions. Amidst the challenges he faces, a heartwarming bond forms between him and a tail-wagging canine companion, adding a touch of joy to his perilous journey.

basic_info.title: Azumanga Daioh
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: あずまんが大王

content.synopsis:
Meet Chiyo Mihama, a young genius who's leaped ahead to high school. Her first day reveals a class brimming with unique personalities. Towering over Chiyo is the aloof and imposing Sakaki, while the boisterous and exasperating Tomo Takino steals the spotlight. The absentminded yet riddle-savvy Ayumu "Osaka" Kasuga adds a whimsical touch. Koyomi "Yomi" Mizuhara's passion for karaoke clashes with her less-than-perfect singing, and the competitive tomboy Kagura rounds out the group.

As these classmates bond and navigate the ups and downs of school life, they embark on a journey filled with laughter, friendship, summer adventures, and a medley of mischievous escapades.

basic_info.title: Dai Dark
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Big Dark, Great Dark

content.synopsis: In a galaxy teeming with monstrous threats, Zaha Sanko harnesses incredible powers through his extraordinary bones. Rumored to fulfill any wish, even dominion over the universe, Sanko navigates the chaos as a regular teenage guy, refusing to be torn apart by the galaxy's malevolent forces. Alongside his skeletal companion, Avakian, they wield their dark abilities to repel relentless assailants while embarking on a quest across space to uncover the origin of the bone curse. The key to restoring sanity may lie in confronting the culprit. And after vanquishing the source of turmoil, Sanko looks forward to a simple reward – indulging in his beloved spaghetti.

basic_info.title:
Koukaku Kidoutai: The Ghost in the Shell
The Ghost in the Shell

content.synopsis:
In the year 2029, after enduring four world wars, the world has embraced a new era of technological evolution. Cybernetic enhancements, AI robots, and cyborgs have reshaped society, blurring the lines between humanity and machinery. Amidst this transformation, a surge in high-tech crimes emerges, with hackers and corrupt figures exploiting innovative systems for personal gain.

In Japan, a hotbed for such criminal activities, the government forms Section 9—a covert team of elite operatives tasked with combating these threats. At the helm is Major Motoko Kusanagi, a fearless and formidable leader, guiding Section 9 in their crusade against cyberterrorism to safeguard the nation's stability amidst the relentless march of progress.

basic_info.title:
Kakkou no Iinazuke
A Couple of Cuckoos

content.synopsis: In the vibrant Umino household, where energy and dynamism abound, Nagi stands out as the serious and introverted academic-focused young man amidst his extroverted family. His life takes a drastic turn when he discovers he was switched at birth. On a journey to meet his biological parents, Nagi crosses paths with Erika Amano, a popular social media influencer trapped in a forced marriage. To his surprise, Nagi learns he is Erika's intended spouse, orchestrated by their families to unite them. As they navigate living together under their parents' scheme, Nagi's heart belongs to another - the captivating and intelligent Hiro Segawa. Despite their parents' efforts, Nagi remains steadfast in his pursuit of love, refusing to marry Erika as his heart belongs elsewhere.

basic_info.title: Bonnouji
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 煩悩寺

content.synopsis:
Freshly single after a five-year relationship, 26-year-old Michiyo Ozawa finds herself in a quirky predicament when her apartment elevator breaks down one fateful night. Desperate for a restroom, she turns to the nearest neighbor, Zenji Oyamada, who appears unassuming at first glance but harbors a room overflowing with mysterious boxes. These boxes, sent by Oyamada's hobbyist brother, hold treasures from his eclectic global ventures.

Intrigued by the enigmatic boxes, Ozawa is invited by Oyamada to unlock one, setting off a chain of heartwarming tales about an ordinary couple entwined with the secrets of these curious containers.

basic_info.title:
Nijiiro Days
Rainbow Days
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Aru Toshi to Sorekara no Watashitachi, Shinbun-bu no Yoriko-kun

content.synopsis:
Enter the world of "Nijiiro Days," where the lives of four high school boys unfold in a delightful blend of romance and mischief. Meet the dreamy Natsuki Hashiba, the tough Keiichi Katakura, the charismatic Tomoya Matsunaga, and the knowledgeable Tsuyoshi Naoe. Juggling their studies and adventures, they navigate through the highs and lows of teenage life.

On a fateful Christmas Eve, Natsuki's heartbreak takes center stage as he finds himself unexpectedly single. Amidst his tears, a mystery girl in a Santa Claus costume offers him a simple yet profound gesture of kindness. In a twist of fate, Natsuki crosses paths with the enigmatic Anna Kobayakawa, a fellow student at his school. Captivated by her, he sets out on a quest to win her heart, despite his friends' well-meaning but often hilarious interference.

Delve into the captivating tales of "Nijiiro Days," including the charming one-shots "Aru Toshi to Sorekara no Watashitachi" in Volume 1 and "Shinbun-bu no Yoriko-kun" in Volume 5. Brace yourself for a rollercoaster of emotions as friendships are tested, love blossoms, and the journey of self-discovery unfolds in this heartwarming high school drama.

In the lively spring of their freshman year, Kanji Sasahara finds himself at a crossroads. Will he take the leap to join the otaku club he's always yearned for? Meanwhile, Saki Kasukabe grapples with her own dilemma: can she transform her anime-loving boyfriend, Kousaka, into a regular guy? As fate would have it, Kanji and Kousaka both decide to join Genshiken: The Society for the Study of Modern Visual Culture.

Undaunted, Saki embarks on a journey through the club's diverse activities, from cosplay and comic cons to gaming and anime collectibles. Along the way, she delves into the whimsical realm of Japanese fandom, discovering more than she bargained for...

basic_info.title:
Yu☆Gi☆Oh!
Yu-Gi-Oh!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yuu Gi Ou Shadow Games, Yugioh Duelist, Yu-Gi-Oh! Millenium World, Game King, King of Games

content.synopsis:
High school student Yuugi Mutou endures bullying by day and finds solace in board games and puzzles at night in his shared home and game shop with his grandfather. Yuugi unlocks the Millennium Puzzle, unleashing his dark alter ego, Yami Yuugi, who emerges in times of crisis. Transforming into a daring vigilante, Yuugi challenges wrongdoers to high-stakes games, where defeat spells doom.

Yuugi forms deep bonds with former bullies, uniting against new foes who wield games as weapons. As they face sinister adversaries, Yuugi and his friends must navigate deadly challenges that jeopardize their very existence.

basic_info.title: Helck
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Helck the Hero

content.synopsis:
As humanity revels in the triumph over the Demon King at the hands of a solitary hero, the inhabitants of the demon realm gear up for an epic showdown—a tournament to determine the next ruler, the Demon King. Surprisingly, the leading contender is none other than the human champion, Helck! Despite his victories over demon opponents and his outwardly cheerful demeanor, his vehement disdain for humans raises suspicion about his true motives.

Among the Four Heavenly Kings governing the demon domain, Red Vamirio harbors doubts about Helck's hidden agenda. As the competition heats up and the coveted title of Demon King hangs in the balance, Red Vamirio embarks on a quest to unravel the enigma surrounding the hero, knowing that the destiny of the demon world hinges on her discoveries.

basic_info.title:
Special A
S.A: Special A
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mikansei Chorus, Incomplete Chorus, Shoku no Miyako, Food Paradise

content.synopsis: Since childhood, Hikari Hanazono has excelled in every endeavor, until she meets her match in the form of Kei Takashima. Their first wrestling match ends in Hikari's first defeat, sparking a lasting rivalry. Now at Hakusen Academy's elite Special A class, where the top seven students reside, Hikari remains second to Kei's first. As they navigate high school life, their competition intensifies, while their unspoken bond blossoms. Additional one-shots include "Mikansei Chorus" in Volume 1 and "Shoku no Miyako (Food Paradise)" in Volume 11.

basic_info.title:
Shingeki no Kyojin: Before the Fall
Attack on Titan: Before the Fall
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of a Titan attack, a baby is discovered wailing amidst the remains of the colossal beasts. Dubbed the "child of titan," he faces hostility from those within the walls. Growing at an unusual pace, the child, known as Kuklo, breaks free from his troubled past and takes a daring leap of faith by joining the scouting legion, staking his future and humanity's on a dangerous gamble.

basic_info.title: Bloody Monday
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense

content.synopsis:
In the shadows of Vladivostok, Russia, a perilous transaction concludes, ushering in a new era of threat. Enter Maya, a woman shrouded in mystery, now in possession of a lethal virus that spells doom within three hours of exposure.

Meet Fujimaru Takagi, a seemingly unassuming student at Mishiro Academy in Japan. Unbeknownst to many, he is the renowned hacker "Falcon," celebrated for unveiling the misdeeds of the elite before vanishing from the digital realm. Only a select few, including his father Ryunosuke and friend Otoya Kujou of the clandestine Third-I division of the Public Security Intelligence Agency, are privy to his past.

When a KGB operative is found murdered in Japan, a lone memory chip emerges as the sole lead. Third-I enlists Fujimaru to unravel its contents, revealing a chilling video known as the "Christmas Massacre." As his father digs deeper, he uncovers a cryptic term, "Bloody Monday," and is framed for a superior's death. Now, Fujimaru must harness his cyber skills to foil impending terror, clear his father's tarnished reputation, and safeguard Japan from devastation.

basic_info.title:
Apocalypse no Toride
Fort of Apocalypse

content.synopsis:
Framed for a crime he didn't commit, Yoshiaki Maeda steps into the daunting confines of Shouran Academy Juvenile Detention Center. Assigned to Cell 4, he meets his cellmates Gou Iwakura, Masafumi Yoshioka, and Mitsuru Yamanoi, each with their own troubled pasts. As Yoshiaki grapples with his harsh reality, he discovers that the prison is a powder keg of violence and unrest.

But just when things couldn't seem bleaker, a sudden twist of fate plunges them into an even greater nightmare. Unbeknownst to them, a zombie apocalypse has engulfed the outside world, and the prison becomes ground zero when a van carrying infected individuals crashes inside, unleashing the undead menace upon them all.

basic_info.title:
Suki na Ko ga Megane wo Wasureta
The Girl I Like Forgot Her Glasses
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: SukiMega

content.synopsis: Kaede Komura always finds himself captivated by his deskmate, Ai Mie. Enchanted by her endearing charms, he yearns for a glimpse of her beautiful eyes behind the glasses. When Kaede notices Ai's squinting gaze and missing glasses shortly after meeting her, his fondness for her only deepens. Despite her forgetfulness with glasses due to poor vision, Ai struggles through her school days. Kaede steps in to lend a helping hand, fostering a bond that blossoms with each passing day. As Ai leans on him for support, Kaede's affection for her flourishes, gradually becoming the person she longs to see.

basic_info.title:
Shingetsutan Tsukihime
Lunar Legend Tsukihime
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: True Lunar Chronicle Tsukihime, Lunar Legend Chronicles

content.synopsis:
Shiki Toono wakes up in a hospital surrounded by black lines that no one else can see, a lingering reminder of a near-fatal accident that left him with a mysterious fragment in his chest. Drawn to these enigmatic lines, Shiki discovers his unique ability to destroy by tracing them. Gifted with special glasses to conceal his sight, he embarks on a new life with relatives.

Years later, a family tragedy brings Shiki back to the Toono mansion where he encounters a mysterious woman that triggers his powers once more. As he delves into his past, a blend of adventure, romance, and mystery unfolds, leaving Shiki to confront the shadows that have trailed him for so long. In "Shingetsutan Tsukihime," the past and present converge, unveiling a haunting journey of self-discovery and revelation.

basic_info.title: Gokurakugai
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gokurakugai Sanban-doori no Ken, The Gokuraku District's Third Avenue Incident

content.synopsis: In the vibrant yet gritty district of Gokurakugai lies a hidden underbelly teeming with secrets. Enter Tao and Alma, the troubleshooters navigating the chaos of this lawless realm. Their tasks range from reuniting a lost boy with his missing friend to unraveling the mystery behind vanishing individuals and mutilated animal remains. As they delve deeper, malevolent spirits lurking in the shadows force them to confront their own inner demons. In Volume 2, "Gokurakugai Sanban-doori no Ken," their journey continues.

basic_info.title:
Ookami to Koushinryou
Spice & Wolf
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
