                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Spice and Wolf

content.synopsis:
In pursuit of his dream to own a shop, the wandering merchant Kraft Lawrence seeks trade opportunities across distant lands. His ordinary routine takes a thrilling turn when he stumbles upon a slumbering wolf girl named Holo in his carriage - who claims to be the wolf deity of Pasloe.

Tired of the locals' ingratitude, Holo implores Lawrence to escort her to her hometown of Yoitsu. In exchange for his aid, she offers her sharp intellect and wise insight to assist him in his business ventures.

As they journey through towns, navigating challenges and encounters with various individuals, a bond forms between them. Yet, as they draw closer to their destination, the inevitable end of their shared adventures looms on the horizon.

basic_info.title: Barakamon
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life

content.synopsis:
Renowned calligraphy prodigy Seishuu Handa is known for his exceptional talent, but his ego takes a hit when his masterpiece is criticized as uninspired. His outburst jeopardizes his career, prompting his calligraphy master father to send him to the remote Goto Islands for a reality check.

Stripped of city luxuries, Handa settles into a rustic village home, hoping to focus on his art. However, the house is already occupied by spirited youngsters led by Naru Kotoishi, and the quirky villagers find Handa's city ways amusing.

Forced out of his comfort zone, Handa embarks on a journey of self-discovery through unexpected friendships and eye-opening experiences, discovering new perspectives on life, art, and himself.

basic_info.title:
Code:Breaker
CØDE:BREAKER
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: C0de:Breaker

content.synopsis:
Sakura Sakurakouji is haunted by a chilling sight: a crowd engulfed in eerie blue flames while a boy, his gaze devoid of mercy, looks on. Driven by her unyielding sense of justice, she revisits the scene, only to find no trace of the horrifying incident. 

At school, Sakura encounters the enigmatic transfer student Rei Oogami, whose charm captivates their classmates. Recognizing him as the perpetrator, she uncovers Rei's identity as a renegade "Code:Breaker" who operates beyond the confines of law. Despite his creed of "an eye for an eye, a tooth for a tooth, and evil for evil," Sakura is resolute in her belief that his methods are unjust. Determined to thwart Rei's actions and prevent further harm, she sets out to confront the dangerous Code:Breaker.

basic_info.title:
Gin no Saji
Silver Spoon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 銀の匙 Silver Spoon

content.synopsis: Yuugo Hachiken, a dedicated scholar striving for top marks, reaches a breaking point from the weight of parental demands. Escaping urban pressures, he enrolls at Ooezo Agricultural High School, a far cry from his familiar city life. Despite his lack of farming background, Yuugo embarks on a journey to unravel the essence of dreams and unearth his own aspirations. As challenges surface unexpectedly, he navigates the complexities of life, discovering that adversity often arrives unannounced.

basic_info.title:
Skip to Loafer
Skip and Loafer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: スキップとローファー

content.synopsis:
Fresh off the train from her quiet hometown in Ishikawa Prefecture to the fast-paced streets of Tokyo, Mitsumi Iwakura is set on paving her way to law school and a future in public service at her new prestigious high school. Yet, amid her meticulous life plans, Mitsumi learns that unexpected detours can lead to exciting new paths.

A missed train stop on her first day jeopardizes Mitsumi's role as the new students' speaker at the entrance ceremony. Enter Sousuke Shima, a charming fellow tardy student, who offers to escort her to school. Despite a series of mishaps tarnishing her debut, Mitsumi's and Sousuke's undeniable connection catches the attention of their peers, sparking curiosity about their contrasting personalities.

As the school year unfolds with a promising twist, Mitsumi eagerly dives into school life, eager to bond with her classmates. Will this small-town girl thrive in the bustling city atmosphere? One thing is certain: Mitsumi's journey won't be a solitary one.

basic_info.title: Mx0
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Emu x Zero, emuzero, MxO

content.synopsis:
Taiga Kuzumi, a determined student aiming for a spot at the prestigious Seinagi Private High School, finds himself puzzled when the school rejects his application despite his confidence in acing the written test. Adding to the mystery is his inability to remember the interview, except for the infectious laughter of a captivating girl he encountered. Driven by curiosity and the desire to reconnect with her, Taiga ventures to the school gates only to witness a mind-boggling sight: a teacher levitating in the air!

To his astonishment, Taiga discovers that Seinagi Private High School is no ordinary institution; it is a clandestine academy for magic, where students master the art of spellworking. To maintain their hidden world, the school decides to enlist Taiga as a first-year student. However, a significant obstacle emerges - Taiga is the sole student incapable of wielding magic in a sea of talented young sorcerers!

basic_info.title: Fairy Tail: 100 Years Quest
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy

content.synopsis:
Embark on the legendary 100 Years Quest—a perilous mission that has defied success for a century. Despite the daunting history of failed attempts, Natsu Dragneel and his comrades—Lucy Heartfilia, Gray Fullbuster, Erza Scarlet, Wendy Marvell, Happy, and Charlés—boldly set out to tackle the impossible. 

Fresh from their victory against Acnologia and Zeref, the Fairy Tail guild ventures to the icy lands of Guiltina. Here, they are tasked with a near-impossible assignment: to seal away the Five Dragon Gods, beings of unimaginable power capable of catastrophic destruction. In the midst of this quest, a spirited new addition named Touka joins their ranks, her true motives shrouded in mystery.

As Natsu and his team plunge into the perilous hunt for the Dragon Gods, they cross paths with the sinister guild Diabolos and uncover surprising revelations about Touka. Amidst these escalating challenges, the 100 Years Quest proves to be just one of the trials that will test their resolve and unity.

basic_info.title: Gakuen Alice
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Alice Academy

content.synopsis:
Mikan Sakura and Hotaru Imai share an unbreakable bond, though Hotaru's distant demeanor may suggest otherwise. When Hotaru leaves for Tokyo's Alice Academy, a school for gifted children with unique powers called Alices, Mikan feels lost and abandoned. Determined to reunite with her friend, Mikan joins the prestigious academy, only to realize that it's not all sunshine and rainbows.

Navigating a complex hierarchy based on Alices, behavior, and academics, Mikan faces harsh treatment from her peers who doubt her place. Natsume Hyuuga, a top student, particularly targets Mikan with unwarranted hostility. As secrets within the academy start to surface, Mikan and her friends uncover dark truths that thrust them into a web of intrigue beyond their wildest dreams.

basic_info.title:
Nurarihyon no Mago
Nura: Rise of the Yokai Clan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Grandchild of Nurari Hyon, The Grandson of Nurarihyon

content.synopsis:
Rikuo Nura may seem like an average middle schooler, but his true lineage reveals a captivating secret. With a quarter youkai blood running through his veins, he is destined to lead a formidable youkai clan, following in the footsteps of his grandfather, Nurarihiyon. Despite his initial aversion to embracing his heritage due to the misdeeds associated with youkai, Rikuo's perspective shifts when he transforms into a powerful youkai resembling his esteemed grandfather.

Embracing his dual nature, Rikuo harnesses his newfound strength to safeguard others, embarking on a mission to unify the diverse youkai factions throughout Japan. His goal? To establish the legendary "Night Parade of a Hundred Demons" and fulfill his destiny as the heir to the Nura Clan.

basic_info.title:
Ase to Sekken
Sweat and Soap

content.synopsis:
Welcome to Liliadrop, where the elite creators of women's cosmetics shine just as bright as their luxurious products. Among them is Asako Yaeshima, known for her unique struggle with excessive sweating, earning her the nickname "Aseko."

In a quest to combat her condition, Asako concocts a daily ritual of blending various Liliadrop soaps and fragrance-free deodorants to mask her scent. However, her efforts are quickly uncovered by Koutarou Natori, a brilliant perfumer with an unparalleled sense of smell.

Determined to salvage the company's image, Koutarou proposes an unconventional solution: to craft new scents inspired by Asako's natural fragrance. Reluctantly agreeing to this bizarre arrangement, Asako finds herself unexpectedly drawn closer to Koutarou as they embark on a fragrant journey that transcends mere perfumes.

In the heart of the all-female Amamizukan apartment complex, Tsukimi Kurashita and her quirky hobbyist housemates live by two strict rules: steer clear of stylish folks and men at all costs. Tsukimi, dreaming of a fairy-tale life, has always adhered to these principles. But one fateful night, as she saves a spotted jellyfish, she crosses paths with a sophisticated, princess-like stranger. Little does Tsukimi know, this elegant guest harbors a surprising secret that will turn her world upside down.

basic_info.title: Pumpkin Night
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: パンプキンナイト

content.synopsis: After enduring relentless bullying in junior high, Naoko Kirino finds herself confined to a mental hospital. Years later, she brutally eliminates the hospital staff and flees. With a grotesque pumpkin head as her disguise, Naoko roams the town consumed by thoughts of vengeance against her tormentors. "Pumpkin Night" unfolds as her quest for retribution unfolds, sparing no one in its path.

basic_info.title:
Reimei no Arcana
Dawn of the Arcana
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Reicana

content.synopsis:
In a realm where nobility values their jet-black locks, Princess Nakaba of Senan stands out with her fiery red hair. Held captive in a tower, she is destined to wed Caesar, the haughty second prince of Belquat. Her sole companion is Loki, an ajin distinguished by his dog-like ears—a race shunned by society for their animalistic traits.

Nakaba, a pawn in her arrogant husband's game and the disgraced princess of her homeland, braces herself to endure the trials that lie ahead. Yet, a single drop of crimson transforms her world, unveiling her latent power—the Arcana of Time. With this gift, she can peer into the past, unlocking her own hidden history and foreseeing the fates of others.

However, altering destiny carries a steep cost. To safeguard one life, another must be sacrificed. As tensions escalate across the continent, Nakaba must harness her abilities not only to secure peace but also to protect those she holds dear.

Embark on a journey of intrigue and sacrifice as Nakaba navigates a world where the threads of fate are woven with blood, and the future hangs in a delicate balance. (Note: Chapter count includes extras.)

basic_info.title:
Bokura wa Minna Kawai-sou
The Kawai Complex Guide to Manors and Hostel Behavior
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 僕らはみんな河合荘

content.synopsis: Kazunari Usa's wish for independence comes true when he moves into the charming Kawai Complex, a cozy boarding house. With his parents supporting him financially and his kind landlady taking care of meals, Kazunari looks forward to a peaceful high school life. However, his dream takes an unexpected turn as he discovers he'll be rooming with the resident masochist Shirosaki and sharing space with Mayumi Nishikino, a lovelorn drinker, and Sayaka Watanabe, a seemingly innocent college student. Amidst these quirky housemates, Kazunari finds solace in being close to his crush, the enchanting second-year student Ritsu Kawai. As Kazunari navigates life in the boarding house, he quickly learns that the colorful personalities of Kawai Complex are set to shake up the tranquility he so eagerly sought.

basic_info.title: Gal Gohan
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Gourmet
            
                Gourmet,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gyaru Cooking, Gyaru Gohan

content.synopsis: In the vibrant world of high school, Miku Okazaki stands out as a lively "gal" who embraces self-expression through bold fashion choices. Despite her carefree spirit, academic success eludes her. A chance encounter with her Home Economics teacher, Yabe Shinji, leads to an unexpected collaboration: baking bribery cookies to mend her grades. As Miku discovers a spark in this sweet victory, Shinji is inspired by her passion. Fuelled by this newfound connection, Shinji initiates a cooking club to bridge the gap with his students, with Miku eagerly stepping up as the first member.

basic_info.title: Usogui
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            High Stakes Game
            
                High Stakes Game,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    Strategy Game
            
                Strategy Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Lie Eater, Igyou Tobakusha Usokui, Yakou-san

content.synopsis:
In the high-stakes world of gambling, risks are second nature, with the allure of great rewards often overshadowed by the lurking shadows of deceit and betrayal. Enter the enigmatic Baku Madarame, known as "Usogui," a brilliant strategist who gambles not only with money but with his very life. As a mastermind pitted against cunning adversaries in intense psychological duels, Baku, backed by the formidable organization "Kakerou," navigates treacherous games of wits and chance.

Volumes 12–15 introduce "Igyou Tobakusha Usokui," delving deeper into the intricate web of deceptions and gambits that define Baku's world. In Volume 25, the saga continues with "Yakou-san," as Baku's relentless pursuit of control over Kakerou propels him into ever more perilous gambles against the crafty players who seek to outwit him at every turn.

basic_info.title: Shadows House
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: シャドーハウス

content.synopsis:
Emilico resides in the enigmatic Shadows House, where pitch-black residents emit a perpetual soot that darkens their surroundings. Paired with her Shadow counterpart, Kate, Emilico embodies the perfect Living Doll, maintaining pristine cleanliness while masquerading as Kate's public facade. 

In this obscure realm, the peculiar connection between Shadows and their Dolls remains shrouded in mystery. Overseen by cryptic administrators, the true motives behind their scrutiny and judgment loom ominously from the mansion's upper echelons. As Emilico and Kate navigate this intricate dance of servitude and companionship, the unsettling truth beneath the shadowy veneer begins to unfurl.

basic_info.title: Zetman
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ZETMAN

content.synopsis:
Unassuming on the outside, Jin Kanzaki appears to be just another ordinary street urchin. Yet beneath this facade lies a supernatural strength, wielded for the betterment of others at the behest of his grandfather. However, there's a catch—each noble act demands a steep price of 10,000 yen from those he aids. Jin's simple existence is upended when he crosses paths with a player, a menacing being linked to a string of enigmatic murders.

As Jin grapples with the chaos through sheer force, a shadowy faction relentlessly pursues an individual bearing a ring-shaped mark. Their quest unveils a tapestry of hidden truths, hinting at Jin's pivotal role in the unfolding mystery. Amidst the escalating intrigue, Jin finds himself at the heart of a puzzle with the power to reshape their world.

basic_info.title:
JoJo no Kimyou na Bouken Part 9: The JoJoLands
JoJo's Bizarre Adventure Part 9: The JoJoLands
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ジョジョの奇妙な冒険 Part9 The JOJOLands

content.synopsis:
In the tropical paradise of the Hawaiian Islands, siblings Dragona and Jodio Joestar resort to petty crimes to aid their ailing mother, Barbara Ann. Acting under the dual authority of Meryl May Qi, a crime overlord doubling as their high school principal, the duo partners with their peers Usagi Alohaoe and Paco Laburantes. Their collective misdeeds span from brazen robberies to elaborate scams, targeting unsuspecting tourists and locals alike.

Fifteen-year-old Jodio idolizes his brother's unwavering resolve and his mother's unwavering dedication, yet harbors a sinister side – marked by chilling displays of violence executed with chilling composure. Labeled a sociopath, Jodio swiftly turns ruthless against any who endanger his family. His sole mission: amass wealth through any means necessary, not only to sustain his kin but also to carve his own path to opulence.

During a daring heist, the gang pilfers a seemingly ordinary lava rock from manga artist Rohan Kishibe. To their astonishment, the rock possesses a unique ability to attract valuables toward its possessor, defying logic and distance. Empowered by this newfound phenomenon, Jodio and his comrades embark on a quest to surpass their wildest riches.

basic_info.title: Yankee-kun to Megane-chan
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mr. Delinquent and Miss Glasses, Yankii-kun to Megane-chan, The Yankee Boy and Glasses Girl, Flunk Punk Rumble, Yanmega, Fairy Megane

content.synopsis:
In the school restroom, Daichi Shinagawa is dismayed by the sudden intrusion of the diligent class representative, Hana Adachi. Unfazed by boundaries, Adachi uncovers Shinagawa's hiding place in a heartbeat. Reluctant to join a class trip, Shinagawa finds himself at odds with Adachi's unwavering determination. Despite his resistance, Adachi persistently shadows him even after school hours.

A chance encounter with thieves reveals a surprising facet of Adachi, propelling Shinagawa into a whirlwind of unpredictable school escapades.

basic_info.title: Hana to Akuma
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Flower With Devil, Flower and Devil

content.synopsis:
Two winters have passed since the high-ranking demon Vivi ventured from the demon realm to the human world, seeking a change from the tranquility he once craved. The monotony of peace soon wears on him until a chance encounter with a weeping child named Hana alters his solitary existence. Taking her in on a whim, he names her Hana, intending her presence to be a fleeting distraction. Unattached and carefree, Vivi resolves to part ways if she proves to be a hindrance.

Over the next fourteen years, Hana blossoms under Vivi's care, sparking a transformation within him. Struggling with unexpected emotions and Hana's steadfast devotion, Vivi grapples with the possibility of dismantling the walls he once erected around his heart. Will he continue to shield himself from affection, or will Hana's presence challenge his resolve?

basic_info.title:
Super no Ura de Yani Suu Futari
Smoking Behind the Supermarket with You
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Super no Ura de Yani Suu Hanashi, A Story About Smoking at the Back of the Supermarket, YaniSuu

content.synopsis: In the daily grind of his unfulfilling job, middle-aged Sasaki finds solace in the bright smile of Yamada, the young woman at the 24-hour supermarket he frequents. However, one day, he arrives to find Yamada gone, only to be drawn into a chance encounter with the bold and mischievous Tayama behind the store. Tayama reveals Sasaki's fondness for Yamada, sparking an unexpected connection between the trio. As Sasaki's visits now include both Yamada and Tayama, their interactions over cigarettes pave the way for an unlikely friendship to take root.

basic_info.title:
Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon
Miss Kobayashi's Dragon Maid
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The maid dragon of Kobayashi-san

content.synopsis: In the bustling routine of her workdays and boozy nights with colleagues, Kobayashi's life takes an unexpected turn when a colossal dragon named Tooru appears at her doorstep one morning. Tooru, who morphs into a maid after their chance encounter in the mountains, becomes Kobayashi's live-in housekeeper. Together, alongside a quirky bunch of dragons, they navigate through their unique cohabitation, forging unlikely bonds and heartwarming moments in Kobayashi-san Chi no Maid Dragon.

basic_info.title: Undead Unluck
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アンデッドアンラック

content.synopsis: When Fuuko Izumo completes her beloved manga series, she resolves to end her life, burdened by a decade-long curse that brings calamity to those she touches. This curse has tragically claimed lives, including that of her parents. Standing on a bridge, Fuuko inadvertently causes a stranger's fall onto the train tracks, only to find him miraculously regenerate. Naming him Andy, Fuuko learns he shares her immortal curse and desire for death. Reluctantly joining forces, they embark on a quest for Andy's final peace. Yet, an enigmatic organization shadows their every move, eager to exploit their extraordinary gifts.

In the vast virtual realm of Yggdrasil, Momonga, a humble salaryman and leader of the Ainz Ooal Gown guild, faces the bittersweet end of his beloved game as its servers prepare to go dark in 2138. Eager to bid farewell, he ventures to the guild’s headquarters for one last hurrah.

Expecting a swift logout, Momonga is instead thrust into a strange new reality where he inhabits his powerful avatar, surrounded by NPC beings with newfound sentience. Embracing his guild's name as his own, Momonga navigates this bewildering world in search of answers, determined to uncover its enigmatic secrets and find his place in this uncharted realm.

basic_info.title:
Natsume Yuujinchou
Natsume's Book of Friends
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Natsume Book of Friends, Manabiya no Sumi, Natsu ni wa Tameiki wo Tsuku

content.synopsis:
Fifteen-year-old Takashi Natsume yearns for a simple life, yet he is burdened with a rare gift inherited from his late grandmother, Reiko – the ability to see spirits known as "youkai." Unveiling a hidden legacy, Natsume uncovers the "Book of Friends," a collection of bound youkai longing for freedom as Reiko never called upon them by name.

As benign spirits seek Natsume's aid, malevolent entities pose a threat, prompting the intervention of Madara, a feline spirit in corporeal form. Known as Nyanko-sensei to Natsume, Madara acts as a protective guardian with his own enigmatic motives.

In "Natsume Yuujinchou," witness a blend of supernatural encounters and everyday challenges as Natsume navigates between worlds, grappling with spirits and human dilemmas while gaining invaluable insights along his extraordinary journey.

basic_info.title: Bitter Virgin
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ビターバージン

content.synopsis: In a tranquil rural town, high school student Daisuke Suwa leads a quiet life with his mother. Known at school as a smooth-talking charmer, he pays no mind to the reserved Hinako Aikawa, whom he accuses of feigning innocence. Amidst a heated dispute with two rival admirers, Daisuke seeks refuge in a church, unwittingly stepping into a dilemma. Concealed in a confessional, he is startled when Hinako mistakes him for a priest and confides her haunting past of abuse and a hidden child. Bound by her trust, Daisuke's perception of Hinako shifts, leading him to question the depth of his feelings. As their bond deepens, will empathy blossom into something more profound?

basic_info.title: Kono Oto Tomare!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Stop This Sound!

content.synopsis:
Following the departure of all Koto Music Club members except Takezou Kurata, he finds himself the sole remaining member and the reluctant new club president. Struggling to rebuild the club's membership, Kurata faces a lack of interest from potential recruits. Just as hope dwindles, the notorious delinquent Chika Kudou steps in, vowing to join and take over as president.

Initially hesitant due to Kudou's troubled reputation, Kurata's perception shifts as he uncovers Kudou's hidden depths and his enigmatic ties to the club. The club's future takes a positive turn when koto prodigy Satowa Houzuki joins forces with Kudou and his spirited friends Saneyasu Adachi, Michitaka Sakai, and Kouta Mizuhara.

With their ranks bolstered, Houzuki sets a lofty goal for the group to become the nation's finest koto players, much to Kurata's apprehension. As this unlikely ensemble of musicians embarks on their journey, they must navigate challenges and differences. Through unity and courage, they inch closer to realizing their shared dreams.

basic_info.title: Gleipnir
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis:
In a world where monsters take many forms, from bloodsucking vampires to Frankenstein's creation, Shuichi Kagaya grapples with a secret that sets him apart from the norm. Blessed with exceptional talents but cursed with an inhuman transformation, Shuichi wakes one day to discover he is no longer human.

His new reality brings with it formidable strength, heightened senses, and a deep sense of loss. When he crosses paths with Claire Aoki, a manipulative girl fixated on uncovering the truth about monsters, Shuichi finds himself at her mercy. Despite his struggle to cling to his humanity, Shuichi's morals are put to the test in a world where survival may demand a darker path. How long can he resist the pull of his monstrous nature in the face of relentless scrutiny and moral ambiguity?

basic_info.title:
Kimi no Suizou wo Tabetai
I Want to Eat Your Pancreas
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: KimiSui

content.synopsis: In this poignant novel, the narrative unfolds through the eyes of an unnamed protagonist who stumbles upon a diary at a hospital, discovering it belongs to Sakura Yamauchi, a classmate battling a terminal illness in her pancreas. With only a few months left, Sakura entrusts her secret solely to the protagonist. Despite their contrasting personalities, the protagonist pledges to stand by Sakura as she navigates her final days, fostering an unexpected bond that transcends their differences.

basic_info.title:
Shinai naru Boku e Satsui wo Komete
My Dearest Self With Malice Aforethought
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense

content.synopsis: Eiji Urashima, a typical university student, spends his days socializing and chasing romance. One morning after a night of revelry, he wakes up to find Kyouka Yukimura, a stunning fellow student, claiming to be his girlfriend. Perplexed by this unexpected development, Eiji discovers that three days have mysteriously vanished from his memory. With the help of his friend Kashiwagi, Eiji delves into the baffling events that transpired during this missing time. Things take a dark turn when a journalist reveals Eiji's disturbing lineage as the son of a notorious killer. Determined to set things right and earn Kyouka's understanding, Eiji embarks on a quest to untangle the web of secrets shrouding the last three days of his life.

basic_info.title: L♥DK
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis:
When Aoi Nishimori's parents relocate for work, she opts to stay back, embarking on a solo apartment life. Little does she expect her neighbor to be none other than the elusive "prince" of her high school, Shuusei Kugayama, who spurns all admirers, including Aoi's friend, Moe Shibuya. Confronting Shuusei over his rejection of Moe ignites a fiery exchange, with Shuusei branding Aoi an eyesore, shattering her image of the "prince."

As fate would have it, Aoi's clumsiness wreaks havoc in Shuusei's apartment, forcing them into cohabitation in her own place. Amid this unexpected arrangement, Aoi discovers a different side to Shuusei, unraveling layers of his persona beyond the icy facade, leading her to reassess her initial impressions of the so-called "prince."

basic_info.title: Spirit Circle
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: スピリットサークル

content.synopsis:
Meet Fuuta Okeya, a 14-year-old who sees ghosts and conceals a striking birthmark under a bandage on his left cheek. His world turns intriguing when Kouko Ishigami, a girl marked with a scar on her forehead and accompanied by a friendly ghost, joins his class.

Captivated by Kouko, Fuuta wonders if it's love at first sight. A strange dream about her leaves him feeling a deep connection, sparking his determination to befriend her. However, a twist of fate leads Fuuta to reveal his birthmark to Kouko, who shockingly declares him her lifelong adversary.

Kouko unveils a fiery "spirit circle" and attacks Fuuta, triggering a startling journey through their intertwined past lives. As Fuuta delves into the mysteries behind their enigmatic bond, he uncovers the truth behind their shared destiny in Spirit Circle.

basic_info.title: Giji Harem
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Status Quo
            
                Love Status Quo,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Pseudo Harem

content.synopsis: In the bustling halls of high school, Eiji Kitahama yearns for popularity. Enter Rin Nanakura, a talented junior from the drama club, who devises a plan to make Eiji the center of attention. With her acting prowess, Rin crafts a charming entourage of adoring girls around Eiji. However, amidst the facade, genuine feelings blossom between Rin and Eiji. As Rin's captivating performances captivate Eiji's heart, the question remains: will the actress find her place in his affections beyond the stage?

basic_info.title: Karakai Jouzu no (Moto) Takagi-san
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Skilled Teaser (Former) Takagi-san, Teasing Master (Former) Takagi-san

content.synopsis:
After enduring years of Takagi's playful taunts, Nishikata finally grasps the irreplaceable role she plays in his life. Now happily married, their days are enlivened by the mischievous escapades of their daughter, Chii. Taking after her mother, Chii delights in pranking her father, much to his chagrin. While she attempts to outwit her mother too, it seems no one can out-tease the master teaser herself. 

Though the teasing saga within the Nishikata household appears endless, their spirited exchanges forge cherished family memories that promise to endure.

Synopsis Rewrite: From the moment she entered the world, Aristia La Monique's destiny as the future empress was foretold. Through relentless training, she aspired to stand by Crown Prince Ruvellis Kamaludin Shana Castina as an equal. Despite her unwavering dedication, she finds herself shunned by Ruvellis in favor of the ethereal Jieun.

Reduced to a mere queen overseeing state matters, Aristia loses her joy, dignity, and loved ones. Ultimately betrayed and executed by the man she loved, her journey takes a surprising turn as she awakens in a world seven years in the past. Armed with foreknowledge, the forsaken queen embarks on a quest to alter her tragic destiny and reclaim the life denied to her.

basic_info.title: The Advanced Player of the Tutorial Tower
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Tutorial Tower's Advanced Player, Tutorial Tap-ui Goinmul

content.synopsis: Trapped for over a decade in a tower teeming with relentless monsters, Hyeonu Kim emerges as a force unmatched by any human or creature. Liberated at last, he embarks on a relentless quest to uncover the enigmatic figures responsible for his long captivity. In his pursuit for justice, Hyeonu must confront legions of monsters, inadvertently becoming the world's unlikely savior in the process.

basic_info.title: Roxana
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Roxana: The Way to Protect the Female Lead's Older Brother, Roxana: Yeojuingong-ui Oppa-reul Jikineun Bangbeop

content.synopsis:
In "The Abysmal Flower," Sylvia Pedelian is entwined in a tragic tale of romance and vengeance. After her brother, Cassis, vanishes, Sylvia embarks on a dark journey of retribution. When a Korean student inexplicably finds herself in the novel's world, she is thrust into the role of Roxana, a sinister figure from the rival Agrece family. Roxana, daughter of the ruthless Lante who holds Cassis captive, orchestrates a daring scheme to rescue her brother and free herself from her family's malevolent legacy.

Within the treacherous confines of the Agrece castle, Roxana navigates a realm of deceit, brutality, and turmoil. As she witnesses the horrors inflicted by her kin, Roxana bides her time, awaiting the chance to aid the imprisoned Cassis. When an opportunity arises for Roxana to care for Cassis in secret, their fates become intertwined. Moved by Roxana's sacrifices and suffering, Cassis vows to reciprocate her kindness, setting the stage for a complex and gripping tale of loyalty and redemption.

basic_info.title: The Academy's Undercover Professor
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Got a Fake Job at the Academy, Academy-e Wijang Chwieop Danghaetda

content.synopsis:
Unknown to all, his identity shifts like sand between aliases such as Gerrard and Machiavelli, a shadowy figure known worldwide. Now known as Ludger Cherish, he assumes the role of a gifted professor at the esteemed Ceoren Academy. Yet, what appears to be a simple teaching position unravels into a complex web of intrigue.

Beneath the facade of Ludger Cherish lies a mysterious past intertwined with a clandestine organization of dubious intent. Striving to safeguard his secrets, this enigmatic individual navigates a perilous path between two rival factions poised to eliminate him with the slightest misstep.

basic_info.title: Kill the Hero
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 킬 더 히어로

content.synopsis: Synopsis Rewrite: When Woojin is slain by the honorable leader of his guild, he is granted a rare opportunity for a fresh start. However, this time around, he harbors no desire to be the hero destined to rescue the world.

basic_info.title: Your Letter
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yeon-ui Pyeonji, Yeon's Letter

content.synopsis:
Lee Sori, a kind-hearted and principled student, navigates the challenging landscape of bullying at her middle school, witnessing the distress it inflicts on her friend, Kim Julie. Driven by a fierce determination, Sori confronts the bullies, unwittingly becoming their new target.

Seeking solace from the torment, Sori returns to her former city and changes schools, hoping for a fresh start. Yet, the scars of her past experiences linger, isolating her from her new surroundings.

Amidst her inner turmoil, a cryptic letter hidden beneath her desk captures Sori's attention, setting off a chain of mysterious correspondences. As she delves deeper into the enigmatic messages, Sori embarks on a captivating journey to unravel the secrets within the letters and unmask the anonymous sender pulling the strings.

basic_info.title: Dr. Frost
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 닥터 프로스트

content.synopsis:
In the consultation room of Yonggang University's psychology department, the enigmatic Dr. Frost reigns supreme with his brilliant mind and striking appearance—his hair as white as snow, and his expression always composed. Yet, behind his analytical facade lies a void where emotions like love and empathy should reside. Despite this, he navigates every case with precision, drawing from his vast knowledge and keen insight.

Assisting him is the dedicated Yoon Seong-Ah, a budding psychology student at the university. Together, they delve into the complexities of human emotions and motivations, leading Dr. Frost to a profound self-discovery.

basic_info.title: My S-Class Hunters
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The S-Classes That I Raised, Naega Kiun S-geup-deul

content.synopsis:
Following the tragic loss of their parents, Han Yujin and Han Yoohyun's sibling bond deepens as Yujin takes on the responsibility of raising his younger brother. When mysterious gates to dangerous dungeons materialize worldwide, unleashing havoc on humanity, the brothers' lives take a drastic turn. Yoohyun emerges as an unparalleled S-rank hunter, while Yujin struggles to awaken his own powers, only to be labeled an F-rank, akin to an ordinary individual.

Over eight tumultuous years, Yujin is estranged from Yoohyun as the latter establishes the prestigious Haeyeon guild in Korea. An unexpected chance to have a wish granted leads Yujin to opt for a return to a happier past. Armed with newfound abilities after a surprising second awakening, Yujin seeks reconciliation with his brother, content with his F-rank status. Yet, as he navigates his new reality, Yujin becomes embroiled with influential figures whom he uniquely supports, all while yearning for a peaceful existence alongside Yoohyun.

basic_info.title: How to Use a Returner
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Regressor Instruction Manual, Hoegwija Sayong Seolmyeongseo

content.synopsis: Giyoung is thrust into a high-stakes game of survival, armed with the lowest stats among players. However, he possesses a unique skill: the power to read other players' status. His luck changes when he uncovers that Hyunsung is a veteran returner. To navigate this perilous world, Giyoung must ally with Hyunsung and strategize his way through the tutorial.

basic_info.title: How to Win My Husband Over
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: How to Get My Husband on My Side, Nampyeon-eul Nae Pyeon-euro Mandeuneun Bangbeop

content.synopsis:
In a bid to escape her oppressive adoptive family, an orphan becomes a master of feigned cheerfulness and submission. Her freedom finally comes with her untimely death, but fate deals a cruel hand as she is reborn as Rudbeckia "Ruby" de Borgia, a notorious antagonist from a novel. Raised in a volatile household, Ruby meets a tragic end at the hands of her husband.

Ruby's father, the ambitious pope, plots to use her in a scheme to destroy Britanya Kingdom. Tasked with marrying Britanya's renowned knight, Iske van Omerta, and poisoning his sister, Elenia, Ruby sees through her father's plan. She knows that facing Iske's wrath is inevitable, and survival hinges on winning his trust by playing the role of a clueless and subservient wife. As events unfold, Ruby must navigate treacherous waters to secure her innocence and outwit her impending doom.

basic_info.title: Id
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Id - The Greatest Fusion Fantasy

content.synopsis: Enter the realm of Chunwha, a world beyond his own, where he embarks on a journey to uncover his true purpose amidst a diverse population including elves, dwarves, and mages. Witness his growth in power and determination as the mangaka weaves a tapestry of captivating characters, transcending the traditional hero vs villain narrative. Join Id in this extraordinary odyssey through a world brimming with endless possibilities, and discover the twists of fate that await our courageous protagonist.

basic_info.title: 4 Cut Hero
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 4-Panel Hero, Four Cut Hero, Cartoon Hero

content.synopsis: After vanquishing the Demon King, the Hero's noble quest takes an unexpected turn when the Princess he rescued reveals herself to be a Prince. Embracing a newfound life of leisure as a NEET immersed in anime, he soon finds himself entangled in ancient prophecies, dark curses, and a complex conspiracy spanning kingdoms and guarded by formidable dragons. Amidst this chaos, he navigates a whimsical journey that leads him to unlikely alliances with supposed "villains."

basic_info.title: Jungle Juice
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 정글쥬스

content.synopsis: In the bustling college world of Suchan Jang, a student revered for his social prowess, a mysterious transformation occurs when he unveils a hidden secret: insect wings sprouting from his back. Triggered by the enigmatic "Jungle Juice" bug spray, his life takes a drastic turn as he reveals his unique trait to rescue another. As his world shatters, a new realm unfolds before him - a society of insect humans, where acceptance reigns supreme. However, within this clandestine world, survival hinges on adhering to the law of the jungle, where individuals must navigate the harsh realities to endure.

basic_info.title: The Academy's Genius Swordsman
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 아카데미의 천재칼잡이

content.synopsis: After a fierce battle against giants that shook the world, Ronan stands as the sole survivor of the imperial army. In a bittersweet moment with his fading leader, Grand Marshal Adeshan, they realize the war is not yet won as a new wave of giants threatens to crush them. With unwavering faith in Ronan's bravery, Adeshan sacrifices herself to send him back in time through a mysterious time slip. Now, Ronan has a chance to rewrite his destiny at the renowned Phileon Academy and claim the title of the empire's mightiest swordsman.

basic_info.title: FFF-Class Trashero
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: FFF-geup Gwansim Yongsa

content.synopsis: Hansoo Kang, a regular boy from the mundane world, finds himself whisked away to Fantasia, a realm ruled by demons. Proclaimed the Chosen Hero, he dedicates a decade preparing to vanquish the lord of Fantasia, only to accomplish it effortlessly. Anticipating his return home, his hopes are dashed by Fantasia's "god," who presents a report card exposing the true essence of heroism beyond sheer strength.

basic_info.title: Suicide Boy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jasal Sonyeon

content.synopsis: In the shadow of relentless torment, Seventeen-year-old Hoon Lee navigates the treacherous waters of high school while cloistered in his unpaid rental apartment as a hikikomori. After the loss of his mother to illness, Hoon is left in the clutches of his harsh father burdened by insurmountable debt. With despair as his only companion, Hoon teeters on the precipice of a fatal decision—until a moment of agony grants him a fleeting reprieve. As he grapples with his chosen path, a cast of enigmatic figures emerges, their motives shrouded in uncertainty. Despite his darkest intentions, Hoon perseveres through each grueling day in a relentless battle for survival.

basic_info.title: 66,666 Years: Advent of the Dark Mage
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Dark Magician Transmigrates After 66666 Years, Black Mage Reborn After 66666 Years, 66666-nyeon Man-e Hwangsaenghan Heukmabeopsa

content.synopsis: After being defeated and sealed by the 12 gods, the formidable dark mage Diablo Volpir awakens 66,666 years later in the body of Jamie Welton, a newborn baby. Now 9 years old, Jamie retains only a fraction of his former power. Fueled by a desire for revenge, he plots to take on the gods who imprisoned him, all while navigating a life filled with love and tranquility in his new surroundings.

basic_info.title: Seasons of Blossom
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cheongchun Blossom

content.synopsis: In the midst of youth and love, amidst the wildness and freedom of being young, the journey through the seasons of life unfolds. From the vibrant spring to the carefree summer, the contemplative fall, and the introspective winter, love's essence thrives, bringing forth intensity, tumult, and moments of bewildering confusion.

basic_info.title: The Frozen Player Returns
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Return of the Frozen Player, Eoreobuteun Player-ui Gwihwan

content.synopsis: After Seo Junho and his brave companions bravely sacrificed themselves to defeat the frost queen, they believed they had brought peace back to Earth. However, after being frozen for 25 years, Junho awakens to discover that nine new floors have mysteriously materialized during his absence, with just one cleared so far. With the fate of his frozen friends resting on his shoulders and the key to unlocking the next floor in his possession, Junho must rise to the challenge once more. But as he faces off against the world's formidable new adversaries, has this legendary hero been slumbering for too long to conquer these fresh threats?

basic_info.title: Hellper
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 헬퍼

content.synopsis: In the city guarded by the noble Captain Kwang-nam Jang, a mysterious car accident tragically claims his life. As the veil between this world and the next is lifted, intriguing tales of both realms begin to intertwine.

basic_info.title: Operation: True Love
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Pure Love Operation, Jakjeonmyeong Sunjeong

content.synopsis: Dating someone who barely notices you can be tough, and Su-ae Shim knows this all too well from her long-term relationship with her indifferent boyfriend, Minu Kang. While envying her charming stepsister, Ra-im, who appears to have everything figured out, Su-ae's world takes a bizarre twist when she stumbles upon Jellypop, a talking flip phone, in her locker. Jellypop becomes a quirky confidant, offering insights on her love life, especially as Su-ae's feelings shift towards Minu's friend, Eunhyeok. As suspicions of a possible connection between Minu and Ra-im arise, Su-ae finds herself in need of a miracle to navigate the complexities of high school romance.

basic_info.title: The Villainess Turns the Hourglass
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Villainess Reverses the Hourglass, Angnyeo-neun Moraesigye-reul Doedollinda

content.synopsis:
As Aria Roscente faces her final moments at the gallows, the crowd erupts in jubilation, reveling in the demise of a notorious villainess. A tale of contrasts unfolds as Aria's ascent from poverty to opulence through her mother's union with a count takes a dark turn with her abuse of power. Meanwhile, her sister, the virtuous Mielle, bears the burden of Aria's transgressions for years.

In a stunning twist, just before her execution, Aria uncovers a shocking revelation—her ruin was orchestrated by none other than Mielle. Awakening in the past with a mysterious hourglass by her side, Aria is consumed by a singular purpose: retribution. Armed with foreknowledge and the ability to manipulate time, she sets out on a path of vengeance, determined to claim everything her sister held dear, from the count's admiration to her own fiancé's love.

Navigating a web of deception and manipulation, Aria is willing to go to any lengths, even if it means exploiting others or masking her true intentions with a facade of smiles, to exact her revenge.

basic_info.title: Leviathan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: DeepWater, Deep Sea Water, Simhaesu

content.synopsis: In a world where the oceans have swallowed the continents, Bota and his family drift on a small boat across the endless expanse of water. Danger lurks beneath the surface as mysterious creatures haunt the deep, preying on unsuspecting hunters like Bota. Can they navigate the treacherous waters to find refuge from this aquatic nightmare? And amidst the chaos, a puzzling figure named Kana emerges, adding a new layer of mystery to their perilous journey.

basic_info.title: Kubera
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: One Last God Kubera

content.synopsis:
In a realm where gods reign immortal, suras wield unmatched might, and humans find themselves mere pawns, a girl named Kubera emerges—a harbinger of profound transformation.

When Kubera's tranquil village is razed to ashes, a enigmatic sorceress named Asha emerges as her savior. United, they embark on a quest for truths and retribution.

basic_info.title: A Good Day to Be a Dog
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lovely Again Today, Oneuldo Sarangseureopgae

content.synopsis: Schoolteacher Han Hana carries a peculiar family curse that sabotages her romantic endeavors – any kiss transforms her into a dog each night until she kisses the same person again in her canine form. Determined to evade this fate, she has refrained from kissing anyone. However, a tipsy moment with colleague Jin Seon, whom she believes despises her, shatters her resolve. After an accidental kiss, Hana morphs into a charming white dog, needing just one kiss from Seon to lift the curse. But there's a hitch – Seon harbors a deep fear of dogs.

basic_info.title: Solo Leveling: Ragnarok
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Na Honjaman Level Up: Ragnarok

content.synopsis: In the wake of a devastating loss, the Absolute Ones, revered architects of countless alternate universes, are thrust into chaos as they strive to restore balance following the demise of one of their own. Meanwhile, on Earth, a new threat looms as interdimensional gates unleash malevolent creatures into the world. Sung Suho, tasked with a monumental quest, delves into the shadow dungeon to claim his birthright and unearth the secrets of his father's fabled heritage, all while the fate of our existence hangs in the balance.

basic_info.title: Mythic Item Obtained
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Obtained a Mythic Item, Sinhwa-geup Gwisok Item-eul Son-e Neoeotda

content.synopsis: In a realm where technology and magic intertwine seamlessly, fearsome monsters and mythical creatures threaten humanity. In a time of great peril, extraordinary beings with divine abilities arise to defend the world—they are known as the Awakened. Enter Jaehyeon, a humble Awakened Raider facing hardships until a string of mysterious events leads him to acquire a potent artifact that will alter the course of history forever...

basic_info.title: About Death
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Regarding Death

content.synopsis:
In the realm between somewhere and nowhere, a mysterious man known as "God" stands at the threshold of life and death, offering a unique chance for reflection to those nearing their end. Encounter by encounter, he engages with the virtuous, the wicked, and all shades in between, guiding them through introspection. Some seek solace, while others grapple with remorse or penitence. Each soul faces a just reckoning from God before transitioning to the beyond.

In the tapestry of existence, time ticks inexorably forward. Yet, many squander the gift of life until faced with mortality's stark reality. Death, the great equalizer, eventually claims all. Delving deep into existential themes, "About Death" delves into the profound complexities of life and death, weaving together poignant narratives of individuals confronting their final moments and their profound dialogues with God.

basic_info.title: The Flowers of Evil
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Polygon
            
                Love Polygon,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Evil Flower, Flower of Evil

content.synopsis: Se-Joon and Se-Wa share a deep, intricate bond as siblings. Se-Wa, perceived as troubled by many, harbors an intense fixation on her brother that borders on obsession. To her, the world revolves solely around Se-Joon, leaving no room for anyone else. But where do Se-Joon's emotions truly lie amidst this tangled dynamic?

basic_info.title: Return of the Mad Demon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Return of the Crazy Demon, Gwangma Hoegwi

content.synopsis: In a world where the Mad Demon, Jaha Lee, harbors ambitions of becoming the revered God of Martial Arts, his aspirations come crashing down when he plunges off a cliff while evading the Demonic Cult for pilfering the sacred Jade of Heaven. Yet, as fate would have it, this mishap propels Jaha back to his youthful prime. Armed with both his foreknowledge and mastery of martial arts, he seizes the opportunity for redemption and retribution. Will Jaha finally achieve his long-sought dream, or is he condemned to repeat his past misfortunes?

basic_info.title: Shotgun Boy
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yeopchong Sonyeon

content.synopsis:
In the turmoil of high school, Yu Seongbin's malevolence targets the vulnerable Han Gyuhwan. With nobody intervening, Gyuhwan's resilience crumbles as he daydreams of confronting his tormentor and the indifferent adults, envisioning a drastic resolution with a shotgun in hand.

During a class trip, Gyuhwan's nightmare unfolds as Seongbin resumes his torment. Summoning his courage, Gyuhwan briefly stands up to him before fleeing into the woods, closely pursued by Seongbin. A fall off a cliff leads Gyuhwan to a peculiar shotgun and 30 bullets, which he, in a desperate and weary state, envisions using on his classmates and uncaring teacher.

As the class talent show progresses at the camp, a malevolent force lurks in the shadows, transforming individuals into savage monsters. Only Gyuhwan's enigmatic shotgun appears capable of halting the gruesome metamorphosis and bringing an end to the terrifying ordeal.

basic_info.title: The Skeleton Soldier Failed to Defend the Dungeon
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Skeleton Soldier Couldn't Protect the Dungeon, Haegol Byeongsa-neun Dungeon-eul Jikiji Mothaetda

content.synopsis:
In a realm where danger lurks at every turn, the Skeleton Soldier is unwavering in its vow to safeguard Lady Succubus, its cherished mistress. Tragedy strikes when invaders lay waste to their stronghold, ending both their lives. But a twist of fate thrusts the Skeleton Soldier back two decades, granting it a fresh start and a shot at rewriting destiny.

Armed with newfound knowledge and skills, the Skeleton Soldier navigates a world brimming with enigmas and companions unknown. Its quest for supremacy unfolds as it strives to shield its mistress from impending doom. Delving into the shadowy intrigues of rival factions, the Skeleton Soldier inches closer to unraveling the mysteries shrouding its own existence.

basic_info.title: The Max Level Hero Strikes Back
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Max Level Hero Has Returned!, Man-Level Yeongung-nim-kkeseo Gwihwan Hasinda!

content.synopsis: After being struck by an enemy's arrow, Prince Davey O'Rowane slips into a deep coma. His spirit embarks on a journey to the revered Hall of Heroes, where he endures rigorous training for a millennium under their vigilant guidance. Returning to his kingdom, Davey awakens with newfound strength, catching his enemies off guard. The once underestimated prince is now a formidable force to be reckoned with in the king's court.

basic_info.title: Vagrant Soldier Ares
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ares: Drifter Mercenaries

content.synopsis: Journey to the ancient Roman-inspired land of Chronos, where the Temple Mercenaries, a formidable group of fighters, roam. Among them are Ares, Michael, and Baroona—three gifted warriors shrouded in enigmatic pasts and unparalleled abilities.

basic_info.title: The Novel's Extra
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Soseol Sok Extra

content.synopsis: Imagine waking up in a world you've only dreamed of creating. For Hajin Kim, it's a nightmare come true. Somehow transported into his own web novel as a lowly extra, he's forced to navigate a treacherous storyline he thought he knew by heart. As the mastermind behind the narrative, Hajin should have the upper hand. But when unexpected twists disrupt the plot, he discovers that his authorial control may not be as absolute as he thought. Hajin must now confront a reality where the lines between creator and creation blur in unforeseen ways.

basic_info.title: I Shall Master This Family
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: In This Life, I Will Be the Lord, I'll Be the Matriarch in This Life, Ibeon Saeng-eun Gaju-ga Doegetseumnida

content.synopsis:
In the empire, the mighty Lombardi family reigned supreme with wealth that could move mountains, leaving an indelible mark on history, culture, and the arts, matching even the emperor's influence. Their downfall came swiftly after a misguided alliance with the first prince led to the unexpected crowning of the second-born, Perez Brivachali Durelli.

Reborn as Firentia, a Korean woman finds herself thrust into the tumultuous world of the Lombardis, born as the daughter of a nobleman and a commoner. Despite being seen as illegitimate, Firentia is cherished by her father and grandfather, driving her to uphold the family's honor with unwavering determination. When tragedy strikes and she is cast out, Firentia grapples with the shattered legacy of the Lombardi name.

Miraculously granted a second chance at life after a near-fatal carriage accident, Firentia awakens in her seven-year-old self, fueled by a fierce resolve not to squander this opportunity. To redeem her father's name and avert the family's impending ruin, she must convince her grandfather of her worthiness to assume the mantle of the Lombardi legacy.

basic_info.title: The Return of the 8th Class Mage
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Return of the 8th Class Magician, 8 Class Mabeopsa-ui Hoegwi

content.synopsis: Ian Paige, a formidable 8th class mage, once served Emperor Ragnar of the Greenriver Empire, taking numerous innocent lives at his command. Despite their bond, Ragnar perceives Ian as a danger and betrays him by poisoning. Through the mastery of time magic, Ian escapes death and finds himself thrust back 30 years into the past, inhabiting a young boy's form. Determined to avenge the betrayal and reclaim his former prestige, Ian immerses himself in training with an esteemed group of mages. His ultimate goal: to confront the once-trusted friend turned enemy and rise again as the revered 8th class mage he once was!

basic_info.title: A Stepmother's Märchen
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Stepmother's Fairy Tale, The Fantasie of a Stepmother, Eotteon Gyemo-nim-ui Märchen, Which Stepmother's Märchen

content.synopsis:
Intrigue surrounds the union between the late Marquess Johannes von Neuschwanstein and a 16-year-old bride, Shuli, who steps into the role of marchioness amid a web of responsibilities. Tasked with managing a grand estate linked to the empire's royal family and navigating the distrust of her four stepchildren, Shuli devotes seven years to their upbringing and safeguarding the family legacy.

Her hopes for freedom rest on her son Jeremy's assumption of leadership, but tragedy strikes on his wedding day. Awakening in the past, just before Johannes' funeral, Shuli seizes the opportunity to forge bonds with the children and pursue her own happiness, despite the mysteries shrouding her second chance at life.

basic_info.title: Beware the Villainess!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Geu Angnyeo-reul Josimhaseyo!

content.synopsis:
In a world where villainesses meet grim fates, Melissa Foddebrat stands apart. With her beauty and sharp wit, she defies the norm as a young woman whose petulant demeanor irks those around her. But when a modern Korean woman finds herself reincarnated as Melissa, her perspective shifts. She now inhabits a novel's world, embodying the life of a wealthy duke's daughter.

Rejecting her villainous path, Melissa aims for a life of luxury. To break free, she must end her betrothal to the womanizing crown prince. Yet, untangling herself from this unwanted future proves daunting, with the prince putting up a fierce resistance. Drawing on her past resilience, Melissa must navigate the challenges of her new existence to pursue her true desires.

basic_info.title: True Beauty
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Descent of a Goddess, Yeosin Gangnim

content.synopsis: Lim Jugyeong is tired of being judged for her plain looks at school. In a bid to transform herself, she dives into the world of makeup, experimenting with various products to enhance her features. With the magic of cosmetics, she evolves from a target of bullies to a stunning beauty, earning admiration from her peers. However, her newfound confidence is threatened when Lee Suho, a charismatic transfer student, sees her without makeup. To safeguard her image, Jugyeong must conceal her natural appearance while navigating her growing feelings for Suho. As she grapples with the idea of true beauty, Jugyeong finds herself at a crossroads between perception and reality.

basic_info.title: Latna Saga: Survival of a Sword King
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Survival Story of a Sword King in a Fantasy World, Otherworldly Sword King's Survival Records, Igye Geomwang Saengjongi

content.synopsis: Recently discharged from military service, Hanbin Ryu's life takes an unexpected turn as he is inexplicably whisked away to another world. But his supposed lifeline, the flawed "guide line" meant to aid in his survival, traps him in a prolonged tutorial phase spanning two decades. Upon breaking free from this ordeal, he discovers a hostile environment where fellow otherworlders are now shunned. As a novice in this new realm, Hanbin faces the daunting challenge of navigating this perilous landscape. How will he, a low-level newcomer, endure the hostility and emerge victorious?

basic_info.title: Level Up with the Gods
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Leveling with the Gods, Sin-gwa Hamkke Level Up

content.synopsis: In the wake of a crushing defeat, the resilient warrior Yuwon Kim refuses to be deterred. As he embarks on a fresh quest as a returnee, Yuwon is determined to reclaim his former glory. Armed with unwavering resolve, he sets out to conquer monsters, hone his skills, and tackle the Tower anew. But can he overcome the challenges that lie ahead and ascend to greater heights, or will his journey meet an untimely end?

basic_info.title: The Lazy Lord Masters the Sword
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Reformation of the Deadbeat Noble, The Lazy Prince Becomes a Genius, Natae Gongja, Noryeok Cheonjae Doeda

content.synopsis: In the wake of his mother's tragic demise, young Airen Farreira seeks solace in slumber, earning himself the moniker of "the lazy lord." Despite facing ridicule and gossip, Airen remains steadfast in his chosen retreat. However, a transformative moment unfolds when he emerges from a dream featuring a enigmatic swordsman, altering the course of his life forever.

basic_info.title: The Infinite Mage
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Infinite Wizard, Muhan-ui Mabeopsa

content.synopsis: Left to the elements in a stable as a newborn, Shirone's upbringing was entrusted to common folk. Despite his humble beginnings, he displayed remarkable insight and acquired the skill of reading at a young age. A visit to the nearby city unveiled the mesmerizing allure of magic, sparking a deep fascination within him. Determined to pursue his newfound passion, Shirone aspired to become a mage. Yet, the city's harsh and stratified society revealed a darker reality, exposing him to the hidden underbelly of the world long before his coming of age. Can Shirone navigate the twisted paths of this unforgiving world to realize his dreams of mastering magic?

basic_info.title:
Can't See Can't Hear But Love
See, Hear, Love
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 보지 못하고 듣지 못하고 사랑해

content.synopsis:
Min Geun Soo, a devoted manhwa artist, tirelessly cares for his special-needs mother, who struggles with daily tasks due to an intellectual disability. Drawing day and night to provide for them, he pushes himself to the limit, straining his eyes. Tragedy strikes when he suddenly loses his sight, leaving his artistic future in jeopardy.

Just as despair sets in, fate introduces him to Jeon So Ri, a deaf admirer of his work. Their unique bond sparks a poignant love story between a blind artist and a deaf woman, illustrating the resilience and determination to overcome life's challenges.

basic_info.title: The Archmage Returns After 4000 Years
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 4000-nyeon Man-e Gwihwanhan Daemadosa

content.synopsis: Lucas Trowman, once revered as the legendary archmage, faced eternal torment at the hands of Demigod, his mind slipping away. Now, after millennia, he awakens in the feeble form of Frei Blake, an underwhelming student at Westroad Academy. Magic remains stagnant, hinting at a sinister force at play. With vengeance burning in his heart, Lucas embarks on a quest to reclaim his lost power and uncover the truth behind this stagnant world.

basic_info.title:
The Bride of the Water God
Bride of the Water God
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 하백의 신부

content.synopsis: In a humble village, Soah, a young girl, faces a dire situation as the wrath of the Water God plunges the land into a relentless drought. To pacify the deity and bring rain to her people, Soah is offered as a sacrificial bride. Spirited away to the Water God's ethereal realm, she embarks on a new chapter in the enigmatic Water Kingdom. Amidst the mysteries and complexities of her fate, Soah navigates a journey of faith, life, and unexpected love.

basic_info.title: After Ten Millennia in Hell
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Player Who Returned 10,000 Years Later, Man Nyeon Man-e Gwihwanhan Player, To Hell and Back

content.synopsis:
In an unexpected twist, he plunges into the depths of hell, armed only with his will to survive and predatory abilities. From the lowest abyss to the highest echelons, he consumes legions of demons, commanding even the mighty seven archdukes.

"Why seek to return? Your Highness reigns supreme in the inferno."

"Supreme? Nonsense! Hell offers naught but desolation and fiendish foes! I yearn to depart."

After a millennia of exile, he at last emerges on Earth's soil.

basic_info.title: Overgeared
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Temppal

content.synopsis: In the world of the popular VR game "Satisfy," Shin Youngwoo, known as Grid, was once an unlucky underdog. However, his fortunes change when he stumbles upon a mighty artifact that bestows upon him the prestigious title of "Pagma's Successor." Transformed into a master blacksmith capable of crafting unparalleled weapons and wielding the game's most coveted gear, Grid sets out to carve a path to glory and wealth. Yet, as his rise to prominence disrupts the peace of Satisfy, Grid comes to understand that the mantle of a legend carries unforeseen challenges that may test him in ways he never imagined.

basic_info.title: Bartender
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Adult Cast
            
                Adult Cast,                    Workplace
            
                Workplace
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: バーテンダ

content.synopsis: Upon his return from an eight-year European adventure, bartender Ryuu Sasakura dives into his hometown's vibrant bar culture. With a wealth of experience under his belt, Sasakura crafts the perfect concoction to suit each patron's unique mood and situation. At Lapin bar, his skillful mixology and empathetic nature create an unforgettable experience for every customer, ensuring that they always leave with a touch of magic in their glass.

basic_info.title: Arakawa Under the Bridge
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 荒川アンダーザブリッジ

content.synopsis:
In the bustling city, twenty-year-old student Kou Ichinomiya is a stickler for his family's golden rule: steer clear of debts. But fate takes a wild turn when a perilous situation lands him in the arms of a mysterious savior named Nino, who claims to hail from Venus. Now, not only is Kou indebted but also tangled in Nino's unusual request for them to explore love together beneath the Arakawa River bridge.

As Kou grapples with this unexpected twist, he encounters a motley crew of eccentric dwellers along the riverbank, each more peculiar than the last. From the enigmatic Village Chief dubbing him "Recruit" to a seemingly gentle yet secretly sadistic animal farm overseer, Arakawa's vibrant community paints a vivid backdrop for Kou's unpredictable journey of obligation and discovery.

basic_info.title: Mahouka Koukou no Rettousei: Nyuugaku-hen
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Urban Fantasy
            
                Urban Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Irregular at Magic High School: Enrollment Arc

content.synopsis:
Discover a world where "Magic" is not just a myth but a cutting-edge technology shaping reality for over a hundred years. In the competitive domain of nurturing "Magicians," nations clash to excel.

Enter Shiba Tatsuya, an exceptional student lacking magical abilities at First High School, a prestigious institution for magic. Alongside his brilliant sister, the top freshman, he navigates a school life where he's scorned as a mere reserve among the elite chosen magical students. How will he carve his path in this intriguing realm?

basic_info.title:
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Watanagashi-hen
Higurashi WHEN THEY CRY: Cotton Drifting Arc
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Higurashi no Naku Koro ni Watanagashihen

content.synopsis:
Newcomer Keiichi Maebara never imagined he'd quickly find a tight-knit group of friends in the quaint village of Hinamizawa. Days filled with laughter and games with his newfound companions felt like a dream come true. But when he stumbles upon his friend Mion Sonozaki moonlighting at a maid café, his harmless jesting takes an unexpected turn as Mion reveals a shocking secret—she has a twin, Shion.

Fate intertwines as both sisters vie to accompany Keiichi to the revered Cotton Drifting Festival. Yet, a misstep by Shion, breaking a town taboo by trespassing into a sealed shrine with Keiichi in tow, unravels a chain of ominous events. Now, faced with the looming threat of being spirited away for their transgression, Keiichi and Shion must race against time to make amends before facing dire consequences.

basic_info.title: Marmalade Boy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ママレード・ボーイ

content.synopsis: Miki Koishikawa's simple wish for a normal family is shattered when her parents upend her life by moving in with another couple, creating a chaotic household with four parents and her charming stepbrother, Yuu. As Miki navigates her parents' unconventional arrangements, she finds herself entangled in a drama of her own. Juggling friends' romantic entanglements, school challenges, and the complexities of her own heart, Miki is torn between her longtime crush, Ginta, and the allure of her new stepbrother.

basic_info.title:
Inari, Konkon, Koi Iroha.
Inari Konkon
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Syllabary of Love

content.synopsis: In the heart of her high school crush turmoil, Fushimi Inari stumbles upon a fateful encounter with her classmate Tanbabashi that ends in a disastrous public humiliation. To compound her distress, she uncovers Tanbabashi's interest in the enchanting Sumizome. Amid this emotional storm, Uka-no-Mitama-no-Kami, a celestial fox deity, calls upon Inari. After aiding a tiny fox spirit, Inari is granted a wish by the goddess. Without hesitation, she wishes to become Sumizome herself. However, this transformation brings unexpected challenges, prompting the benevolent goddess to bend divine rules and bestow Inari with the power to revert to her original form. Now armed with the ability to shape-shift, Inari is tempted to use her newfound skill to win over Tanbabashi. But the peril of revealing her gift threatens not only her but also the goddess, risking the wrath of Amaterasu.

basic_info.title:
Rettougan no Tensei Majutsushi: Shiitagerareta Motoyuusha wa Mirai no Sekai wo Yoyuu de Ikinuku
