The Reincarnation Magician of the Inferior Eyes.
basic_info.genre:
Serialization:
    Suiyoubi wa Mattari Dash X Comic
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 劣等眼の転生魔術師 ～虐げられた元勇者は未来の世界を余裕で生き抜く～

content.synopsis: In a realm where one's eye color dictates their strength, the brilliant magician Abel wields unmatched power with his amber eyes. Yet, the fear and disdain from his peers prompt him to embark on a soul-transferring journey into the distant future in search of acceptance. Anticipating a utopia that embraces him, he soon discovers a startling twist in people's perception of his eye hue, leading to unexpected revelations.

basic_info.title: Baki-dou
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Baki's Path

content.synopsis:
In the wake of settling the score with his formidable father Yuujirou, Baki Hanma, known as the "World's Strongest Boy," grapples with a sense of monotony. Dominating challengers in the Kourakuen Underground Arena, Baki's victories come effortlessly, leaving him battling only his own ennui. Meanwhile, his companions and mentors navigate their own struggles in this newfound era of peace, engaging in rigorous training routines with waning zeal.

Amidst this lull, Japan is rocked by the revelation of a groundbreaking scientific breakthrough: the successful cloning of the renowned samurai Musashi Miyamoto. Eager to test his mettle against Baki and Tokyo's fighting elite, Miyamoto's ancient principles of honor clash with the contemporary world. As he aims to carve his path by besting Baki's allies, the resurrected warrior's clash with the young prodigy becomes inevitable, sparking a thrilling confrontation that both eagerly embrace.

basic_info.title: Flying Witch
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis: In a quiet corner of rural Aomori Prefecture, young witch-in-training Makoto Kowata embarks on a new chapter. With her trusty black cat familiar by her side, she joins her distant cousins to hone her craft and fulfill her destiny as a full-fledged witch.

basic_info.title: Mirai Nikki: Paradox
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            High Stakes Game
            
                High Stakes Game,                    Survival
            
                Survival
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Future Diary Paradox

content.synopsis:
In the vast realm of time and space, the powerful deity Deus Ex Machina and his loyal servant Mur Mur gear up for an intense battle royale. The stakes are high as the last contender standing will ascend to godhood. However, a fateful error by Mur Mur creates a rift in the Law of Cause and Effect, leading to the disappearance of Yuno Gasai, the Second Future Diary holder. In a bid to restore balance, Mur Mur steps into Yuno's shoes to avert further disruptions.

As events unfold, the First, Yukiteru Amano, falls victim to a brutal attack, rendering him incapable of continuing the deadly contest. Faced with dire circumstances, Mur Mur turns to the resourceful detective Aru Akise to temporarily fill Yukiteru's place. Can Akise alter the course of the wounded boy's destiny and turn the tide of fate?

basic_info.title:
Umineko no Naku Koro ni Chiru - Episode 8: Twilight of the Golden Witch
Umineko When They Cry Episode 8: Twilight of the Golden Witch
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: When Seagulls Cry Episode 8: Twilight of the Golden Witch

content.synopsis: In the final episode of Umineko no Naku Koro ni, Ange joins her family at the 1986 conference to unravel the core of the mystery and bring an end to the enduring battle between mystery and fantasy.

basic_info.title: Fate/stay night
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: Fate/stay night

content.synopsis:
In the heart of Fuyuki City, a seemingly ordinary Japanese town, a clandestine war rages unseen by society. Seven sorcerers, known as "Masters," wield their mystical prowess to summon formidable beings known as "Servants," locked in a ruthless battle until only one victor remains. The coveted prize? The legendary Holy Grail, rumored to grant any wish to its possessor. As whispers of the impending conflict echo through the city, the stage is set for a new chapter of the age-old war to unfold.

Meet Emiya Shirou, a young man haunted by tragedy, orphaned in a devastating fire and taken in by a self-proclaimed sorcerer. Inspired by his late mentor, Shirou strives to master the arcane arts, despite his lack of natural talent, wielding only a fragment of sorcery's vast power. Bereft of guidance following his mentor's passing, Shirou finds himself thrust into the perilous conflict of the Holy Grail War when a chance summoning brings forth Saber, the formidable and enigmatic Servant renowned as the pinnacle of strength...

basic_info.title:
Somali to Mori no Kamisama
Somali and the Forest Spirit

content.synopsis:
In a world where the human race teeters on the brink of extinction, strange and enigmatic creatures roam freely. Deep within a forest, a solitary Golem stumbles upon a remarkable discovery: a ragged, chained human child. Named Somali, the girl has no memory of her past. Despite their differences, a profound bond blossoms between them, resembling that of a father and daughter.

Moved by compassion, the Golem forsakes its duty as the Forest Guardian to accompany Somali on a quest to find her lost parents or any surviving humans. But to Somali, the only family she craves is already by her side.

Embark on an unforgettable journey with Somali and the Golem as they navigate a perilous world, concealing Somali's true nature to safeguard her existence. "Somali to Mori no Kamisama" weaves a tale of love, sacrifice, and the unbreakable bond between a protector and his beloved charge.

basic_info.title: Tokyo Crazy Paradise
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 東京クレイジーパラダイス

content.synopsis: In the unforgiving streets of Tokyo in 2020, crime thrives, with women facing threats as menacing as murder itself. Tsukasa, molded by her parents to masquerade as a boy for safety, dreams of upholding justice as a cop, mirroring her late parents' valor against the notorious yakuza. Tragedy strikes, leaving Tsukasa and her brothers orphaned, burdened with debts. To settle the score, she becomes the shield for Ryuji, her schoolmate and Tokyo's yakuza kingpin, navigating a treacherous path where duty and honor collide.

basic_info.title: Osananajimi ni Najimitai
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Want to Get Along With My Childhood Friend

content.synopsis: In college, Fujimino Daisuke reunites with his childhood friend Hino Matsuri, who has blossomed into a beautiful young woman. However, Daisuke is surprised to find that Matsuri still carries her tomboy persona from their past, making their dynamic as challenging as ever.

basic_info.title: ReRe Hello
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mebuki Kimidori

content.synopsis:
In the wake of her mother's early passing, Ririko steps up as the caregiver in her family. With her father falling ill and hospitalized, Ririko steps into his shoes as a handyman to keep their business afloat. Her first challenge? A demanding wealthy teenager. Can she meet his high standards while navigating her new responsibilities? 

Volume 3: Mebuki Kimidori

basic_info.title:
Hotaru no Yomeiri
Firefly Wedding
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ホタルの嫁入り

content.synopsis:
Satoko, the esteemed eldest daughter of the Kirigaya family, has turned down numerous suitors enamored by her charm and beauty, all due to her concealed heart condition. Determined to alleviate her father's worries, Satoko remains open to the idea of marriage despite her ailment.

During a leisurely walk, Satoko is abducted by a band of mercenaries, led by none other than Shinpei Gotou—a renowned assassin assigned to eliminate her. Despite her attempts to negotiate her release, Satoko's efforts are in vain. Left with no choice, she takes a daring leap: she proposes marriage to Gotou, feigning love at first sight.

To her surprise, Gotou accepts and pledges to safeguard her. As they flee to safety, Satoko grapples with upholding the façade and unraveling the enigma of the man she now calls her husband.

basic_info.title: Real no Heroine wa Irimasen!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Even If It Is Second Hand, I Want to Fall in Love!, Chuuko demo Koi ga Shitai!, Genjitsu no Kanojo wa Irimasen!

content.synopsis:
Aramiya Seiichi, an average high school student and devoted eroge otaku, has lost faith in real-life girls following a troubling incident. His disillusionment deepens when a seemingly perfect eroge character disappoints him. However, fate takes a surprising turn when he saves a girl from a dangerous situation.

To his surprise, the rescued girl is none other than Ayame, his classmate known for her delinquent reputation and the rumors surrounding her past. Determined to challenge his perception, Ayame sets out to win his heart and become his ideal partner as they navigate the complexities of high school life.

basic_info.title:
Dogs: Stray Dogs Howling in the Dark
Dogs: Prelude
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dogs: Volume 0

content.synopsis: In a world stripped of seasons by mankind's technological hubris, four unlikely souls - the former hitman turned bartender Mihai, the unhinged Haine, the compassionate yet wrathful Naoto, and the freelancer Badou - cross paths in their quest to unlock the entrance to the depths of hell.

basic_info.title: Zombie-Loan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ZOMBIE-LOAN

content.synopsis: Michiru Kita is a timid girl struggling to speak her thoughts. When she spots enigmatic ring-shaped patterns on the necks of her peers, Chika Akatsuki and Shito Tachibana, survivors of a tragic incident, she realizes these marks signal imminent doom. With her unique gift to perceive these warnings, Michiru seeks to intervene to prevent their demise. However, she soon discovers that the boys have entered into a perilous pact, entangling them in a profound debt.

basic_info.title: Shachiku Succubus no Hanashi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tales of the Corporate Slave Succubus

content.synopsis:
Introducing Lily, a diligent succubus dedicated to sourcing men daily to extract their life force through dream manipulation. In exchange, she grants their deepest, often depraved wishes. With the succubi numbers dwindling, Lily faces mounting pressure to meet escalating targets. 

During one fateful encounter with a weary corporate worker, Lily pledges to fulfill his most outlandish fantasies. However, his request leaves her taken aback.

basic_info.title:
Musume ja Nakute Mama ga Suki nano!?
You Like Me, Not My Daughter?!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Musume ja Nakute Watashi ga Suki nano!?

content.synopsis: For the past decade, Ayako Katsuragi has selflessly raised her niece Miu as her own child after a tragic accident claimed her sister and brother-in-law. As Miu enters high school, Ayako finds herself fretting over potential suitors, particularly their neighbor Takumi Aterazawa, who is twenty years old. When Takumi reveals he needs to have a serious conversation with Ayako, she is taken aback by his unexpected confession - his affection is not directed towards Miu, but towards her. Can Ayako set aside her uncertainties and embrace this newfound love?

basic_info.title: Corpse Party: Blood Covered
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis:
As the students bid farewell to a classmate at Kisaragi Academy, their sorrow prompts them to engage in the mysterious Sachiko-san Ever After charm. Unexpectedly, the ritual goes awry, plunging them into a dark abyss beneath the floor.

Upon regaining their footing, the students find themselves in a twisted version of Tenjin Elementary School, the site of past horrors that befell Kisaragi Academy. Haunted by vengeful spirits of slain children, they must navigate this eerie labyrinth, confronting the malevolent force behind the ghastly murders.

Trapped in a spectral realm with no apparent escape, the students must unravel the chilling truth behind the gruesome events that bind them to this ghostly nightmare.

basic_info.title: Criminale!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: クリミナーレ！

content.synopsis:
From the day Tamito Ichimura entered this world, misfortune has shadowed his every step. Each day brings new crimes, each more absurd than the last. Armed with a sense of foreboding, he navigates life's treacherous path.

When a criminal targets Tamito on his first day at a new school, it seems like just another day in his unfortunate existence. Yet, when he spots a girl in danger, his instinct to protect kicks in. Inside the school, strange behaviors among his classmates raise suspicions. It dawns on Tamito that everyone around him is either a wrongdoer or under suspicion – including the very girl he tried to rescue.

Despite his urge to flee, Tamito finds himself reluctantly drawn into the enigmatic school community. Surrounded by criminals and suspects, he forges unexpected bonds with his unlawful classmates. As his bizarre journey unfolds, Tamito will confront a series of criminal encounters, discovering camaraderie in the unlikeliest of places within the absurdity of his new school.

basic_info.title: Fukushuu Kyoushitsu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Revenge Classroom

content.synopsis:
Enduring relentless torment from her peers, Ayana Fujisawa has mastered the art of silence as a means of survival. But when the bullying takes a dangerous turn, propelling her into the path of oncoming traffic, Ayana finds herself hospitalized, facing a stark realization: to remain passive is to court a deadly fate. 

With no alternative in sight, Ayana resolves to unleash a merciless retribution upon her tormentors, the bystanders who reveled in her suffering, and those who turned a blind eye to her plight. As she plots her vengeful course, Ayana knows that the time for silence has passed, and that her only path to safety lies in meting out justice of her own making.

basic_info.title: Rozen Maiden
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: Rozen Maiden

content.synopsis:
The renowned dollmaker Rozen crafted extraordinary dolls known as Rozen Maidens, each infused with a precious gem called the Rosa Mystica that grants them life. These dolls are destined to partake in the Alice Game, a fierce contest where the victor earns the title of Alice and the opportunity to meet their creator.

When the reclusive middle schooler Jun Sakurada meets Shinku, the fifth Rozen Maiden, his world is forever changed. Despite initial clashes due to Shinku's prideful demeanor, Jun becomes her ally in the face of danger. As Shinku's medium, Jun sacrifices his own vitality to empower her in battles against rival dolls.

Following a skirmish, more Rozen Maidens seek refuge in Jun's home, raising tensions as they are fated to engage in combat. Can harmony prevail among these enchanted beings who are bound by destiny to confront one another?

basic_info.title: Life
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life

content.synopsis:
Ayumu Shiiba, perennially struggling with her grades, resolves to double down on her studies to secure a spot at Nishidate High School alongside her bosom buddy, Yuuko Shinozuka. Despite Ayumu's triumph in the entrance exams, Shinozuka faces a heartbreaking setback. Their bond shattered, Shinozuka reveals a well of resentment towards Ayumu.

In the depths of her solitude, Ayumu seeks solace in a dark escape: self-harm. Embracing her isolation, she shuns companionship at her new school, becoming an outcast. Unexpectedly, Manami Anzai extends a hand of friendship, offering a glimmer of hope in Ayumu's bleak existence. Little does she suspect the storm looming on her horizon.

This poignant narrative delves into the harrowing journey of a girl consumed by loneliness and persecution, teetering on the edge of madness. Yet in the face of insurmountable odds, only the resilient can grasp the flicker of hope amidst the darkness.

basic_info.title: Maison Ikkoku
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: めぞん一刻

content.synopsis:
In the quaint town of Tokeizaka, there lies the charming yet weathered boarding house known affectionately as Maison Ikkoku. Within its walls reside a lively bunch of tenants, among them the young 20-year-old Yusaku Godai, who has recently taken up residence. Tired of the constant uproar disrupting his studies, Yusaku decides it's time to bid farewell to this chaotic abode.

Just as he's set on leaving, a striking woman named Kyoko Otonashi emerges as the new caretaker. Instantly smitten by her beauty, Yusaku's heart takes a turn, and he resolves to stay, hoping to win Kyoko's affections.

As Yusaku tries to woo Kyoko, he uncovers the sorrow she harbors from losing her husband. Despite her budding feelings for Yusaku, Kyoko remains steadfast in her decision not to pursue a new relationship. Driven by empathy, Yusaku enlists the help of his fellow Maison Ikkoku residents in a bid to help Kyoko heal from her grief, all while yearning for the day she sees him as more than just a tenant in the building.

basic_info.title:
Loose Senki: Old Boy
Old Boy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ルーズ戦記 オールドボーイ

content.synopsis:
Shinichi Gotou awakens in a haze, his mind clouded by drugs, to find himself imprisoned in a mysterious facility known as the private prison. Despite his desperate pleas, the enigmatic guards remain tight-lipped about his captors and the reasons behind his confinement. Trapped in solitude, Shinichi struggles to maintain his grip on reality, channeling his anguish into rigorous mental and physical training as he awaits his chance for retribution.

A decade later, Shinichi emerges into a world drastically altered by his absence. Cut off from society during his prolonged captivity, he embarks on a quest for justice, fueled by his lost years and shattered dreams. Yet, his pursuit is met with a chilling revelation - his tormentor is far from finished with him. Thus commences a sinister game of survival, where the stakes are high and only the victor will prevail.

basic_info.title:
Re:Zero kara Hajimeru Isekai Seikatsu: Dai-1 Shou - Outo no Ichinichi-hen
Re:ZERO -Starting Life in Another World- Chapter 1: A Day in the Capital

content.synopsis:
On his way back from the convenience store, Subaru Natsuki is inexplicably transported to a strange city where he is met with unfamiliar faces and languages. Realizing he's been swept into another world, Subaru faces trouble when a shop owner accuses him of being broke. Things take a dangerous turn when he crosses paths with a group of menacing thugs.

Just as despair looms, a mysterious girl named Satella intervenes to save Subaru from the thugs. With a shared goal of catching a thief, Subaru joins forces with Satella. Their pursuit leads them to a hidden cellar filled with stolen goods, where they are ambushed by a shadowy figure, meeting a tragic end. 

To Subaru's bewilderment, he awakens to find himself back in time, reliving the same day in a perplexing cycle of events.

basic_info.title: Bloody Kiss
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kyuuketsuki ni Onegai, Please Mr. Vampire, Angel Koiuta, Angel Love Song

content.synopsis: When Katsuragi Kiyo unexpectedly inherits a mysterious mansion from a long-lost grandmother, her life takes a supernatural turn. Inside the estate, she encounters Kuroboshi, a peculiar figure who is part human, part vampire, along with his devoted servant, Alsh. As Kiyo navigates this newfound world of the unknown, what unforeseen events will shape her destiny? Delve into a captivating journey filled with intrigue and the unexpected in this compelling tale. Additionally, the volumes also feature intriguing one-shots: "Angel Love Song" in Volume 1 and "Please Mr. Vampire" in Volume 2.

basic_info.title:
Shiawase Kissa 3-choume
Happy Cafe
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Shiawase Kissa Sanchoume, Suitei Seinen Shoujo, Hana to Ageha, Natsu, Number One DX, Sora no Namae

content.synopsis:
Uru, a petite girl often mistaken for a child, defies expectations with her extraordinary strength. Choosing independence after her mother's remarriage, she finds herself working alongside two intriguing colleagues at a cozy cafe. Shindou, with a tough exterior but a passion for baking delectable treats, and the handsome yet narcoleptic Ichirou, who succumbs to sleep until he's fed. As they navigate life's challenges, what adventures lie ahead for this unlikely trio? 

Additional one-shots include:

Volume 2: Suitei Seinen Shoujo

Volume 4: Hana to Ageha, Natsu.

Volume 7: Number One DX

basic_info.title: Trinity Blood
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: トリニティ・ブラッド

content.synopsis:
In a distant future ravaged by Armageddon, a second "Vampire's" moon emerges, igniting a brutal war between humans and the bloodthirsty "Methuselah" vampires. 

Orphaned Esther Blanchett finds solace in the Church of St. Matthias in the city of Istvan until a fateful encounter with Abel Nightroad, a seemingly unassuming priest with a hidden persona known as "The Crusnik" – a vampire feeding on his own kind and a formidable weapon of the Vatican, humanity's ally.

When the church is bombed and Esther is betrayed by her friend Dietrich, she joins forces with Abel and the enigmatic Tres Iqus, a human-disguised machine, on a journey to Rome in search of answers. As they unravel the mysteries of Abel's past and confront perilous challenges, Esther's quest for truth propels them towards a destiny fraught with danger and revelations.

basic_info.title: Aqua
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Othello Game, Ebony & Ivory

content.synopsis:
In the year 2301, after centuries of terraforming efforts transformed Mars into the aquatic world of Aqua, its capital Neo-Venezia stands as a breathtaking replica of Venice on Earth. Gondolas gracefully glide through the city's waterways, enchanting residents and visitors alike with its rustic beauty.

Skilled women known as Undines, hailing from Earth, expertly guide these gondolas, with prestigious companies calling Neo-Venezia home. Among those dreaming of joining this elite group is Akari Mizunashi, who embarks on her apprenticeship at Aria Company. There, she meets her mentor Alicia Florence, the lovable feline Aria Pokoteng, and fellow apprentice Aika S. Granzchesta from Himeya Company.

As Akari navigates the challenges of becoming an Undine, she immerses herself in the magical wonders of Neo-Venezia alongside her new friends. In the second volume, the charming tale continues with the Othello Game (Ebony & Ivory).

basic_info.title:
Yondome wa Iya na Shizokusei Majutsushi
The Death Mage
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Death Mage that doesn't want a fourth time, Death Attribute Magician

content.synopsis:
In a cruel twist of fate, Hiroto Amamiya's life ends abruptly with his classmates. Reborn with extraordinary magic but cursed with unrelenting misfortune, his second life meets a violent end at the hands of former friends. Obsessed with vengeance, Hiroto is offered a chance at peace by God—if he can find forgiveness in his third life.

Emerging in the realm of Lamda as a dark elf-vampire hybrid named Vandalieu, his potent magic is sealed by divine intervention. Raised with affection by his mother, Darcia, tranquility is shattered by tragedy. Rejecting the prospect of a fourth life, the young death mage embarks on a perilous odyssey alongside undead allies and creatures of the night.

basic_info.title:
Houkago Hokenshitsu
After School Nightmare
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Afterschool Nightmare

content.synopsis:
In high school, Mashiro Ichijou is admired and well-liked, yet harbors a secret inner turmoil about his dual gender identity. Concealing his femininity from the world, Mashiro grapples with insecurity and confusion about his true self.

His life takes a sudden turn when a strange nurse beckons him to a newly appeared infirmary in the school basement. Stepping into this enigmatic room, Mashiro's existence is forever altered, leaving behind his previous self.

Navigating the maze of his own heart, Mashiro embarks on a journey to unravel his authentic identity while safeguarding his innermost vulnerabilities.

In a mysterious land where shadows lurk and whispers of the past echo through the air, a chilling tale unfolds. Amidst the flickering flames and the lingering scent of blood, a haunting figure known as AERN-BBC broadcasts on PTSD Radio. As the chilling words weave through the minds of listeners, a story of children, straw, shears, and a sinister presence unfolds, sending shivers down the spine. No tuning required, for the darkness is already here.

Step into the bustling world of the human body, where trillions of cells buzz with purpose. Meet the bubbly yet bumbling Sekkekkyuu AE3803, a fresh recruit eager to navigate the intricate pathways of oxygen delivery and carbon dioxide collection, despite her knack for taking wrong turns. On the flip side, Hakkekkyuu U-1146 is a fierce warrior, ever poised to vanquish any invading pathogen in his path.

As fate intertwines their journeys, Sekkekkyuu and Hakkekkyuu find themselves crossing paths time and again, forging an unlikely bond that transcends their clashing personas. Join this dynamic duo and their diverse allies in "Hataraku Saibou," a captivating blend of humor and enlightenment as they unite their efforts to safeguard the body's well-being.

basic_info.title:
Mairimashita, Senpai
You Got Me, Sempai!

content.synopsis:
In her first year of high school, Serina Koshino stumbles upon a love song adorning her desk, sparking curiosity about the mystery admirer. Her search leads her to Asuma Mizukawa, a senior with a distant demeanor. Surprisingly, Mizukawa extends a helping hand, prompting Serina's heart to flutter with affection.

Despite her efforts, Serina's advances go unnoticed by Mizukawa, but she persists in pursuing him. Bravely confessing her feelings, Serina wins Mizukawa's heart, leading to an unexpected romance. As their relationship unfolds, Serina begins to discover the hidden charms of her enigmatic boyfriend.

basic_info.title:
Fukakai na Boku no Subete wo
Love Me for Who I Am
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: FukaBoku, Love me for What I am.

content.synopsis: Mogumo, a non-binary student widely perceived as an easy target at school, finds solace in an unexpected encounter with Tetsu Iwaoka. Tetsu introduces Mogumo to a maid cafe, assuring them of acceptance. Eager to connect with like-minded individuals, Mogumo is disheartened to realize the cafe is labeled as a "girlyboy" establishment, mistakenly identifying them as a cross-dressing boy. Through Tetsu's reassurance, Mogumo embraces their identity and joins the cafe staff. Thus unfolds a poignant journey of self-realization and inclusivity, delving into the exploration of gender norms and personal acceptance.

basic_info.title:
Sekimen Shinaide Sekime-san
Don't Blush, Sekime-san!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 赤面しないで関目さん

content.synopsis: In this charming rom-com set in bustling city of Bright City, we meet our protagonist who finds himself in a unique predicament with his girlfriend, the ever-popular Lily. While everyone else sees her as the epitome of confidence, he is the only one privy to her endearing tendency to blush bright red at the drop of a hat. Join us as we follow their heartwarming journey through laughter, love, and the occasional blush in "Bright Red Love."

basic_info.title:
Asper Kanojo
That's My Atypical Girl

content.synopsis: Taku Yokoi struggles to connect with others, prompting his move to Tokyo after high school. Living a solitary life, he supports himself through newspaper delivery and creating doujinshi, although his non-erotic works go unnoticed. Unexpectedly, Megumi Saitou appears at his door one day, expressing admiration for one of his doujinshi and revealing she traveled from Tottori just to meet him. Despite her own challenges, Megumi decides to stay with Taku, forging an unlikely bond in their shared solitude.

basic_info.title:
Best of Best: Itou Junji Tanpenshuu
Venus in the Blind Spot
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ningen Isu, The Human Chair, Umezu-sensei to Watashi, Master Umezz and Me, Umezz Kazuo & Me, Miirareta Kirida Kyouju, How Love Came to Professor Kirida, Kono Yo no Hoka no Koi, An Unearthly Love, Wasuregatami, Keepsake

content.synopsis:
Discover a collection of chilling tales that will captivate your imagination:

1. Dive into the world of "Billions Alone" with Okuman Bocchi.
2. Experience the spine-tingling mystery of "The Human Chair" in Ningen Isu by Edogawa Ranpo.
3. Uncover the haunting secrets of "Venus in the Blind Spot" in Mouten no Venus.
4. Beware the unsettling legend of "The Licking Woman" in Name Onna.
5. Journey alongside "Master Umezz and Me" in Umezu-sensei to Watashi.
6. Witness the unexpected arrival of love in "How Love Came to Professor Kirida" with Miirareta Kirida Kyouju.
7. Explore the depths of "An Unearthly Love" in Kono Yo no Hoka no Koi by Edogawa Ranpo.
8. Puzzle over "The Enigma of Amigara Fault" in Ashura no Dansou no Kai.
9. Experience the heartbreaking tale of "The Sad Tale of the Principal Post" in Daikokubashira Hiwa.
10. Hold onto your memories with "Keepsake" in Wasuregatami.

Delve into these gripping narratives collected in Jigokusei Remina, Tensai-tachi no Kyouen, Black Paradox, and Gyo: Ugomeku Bukimi.

basic_info.title: Witch Watch
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ウィッチウォッチ

content.synopsis: After completing her six-year witch training, Nico Wakatsuki returns to town solo, ready to pick her unique familiar. Against tradition, she opts for Morihito "Moi" Otogi, her childhood friend and an ogre. Reluctantly bound by a curse that threatens to transform him into a bizarre cow-tiger hybrid if he disobeys her, Morihito becomes Nico's companion. Living together due to their parents' absence, Nico's magical misadventures clash with Morihito's skepticism. As a prophesied disaster looms over Nico, Morihito must juggle his protective role as her bodyguard with his duties as her unconventional familiar.

basic_info.title:
Sakurai-san wa Kizuite Hoshii
Sakurai-san Wants to Be Noticed
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Status Quo
            
                Love Status Quo,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 桜井さんは気づいてほしい

content.synopsis: During his afternoons in the classroom, Mako is typically found lounging and studying. However, his attention shifts when his captivating friend and classmate, Sakurai, is present. Is she hinting at something more? Can Mako decipher the unspoken messages she sends? Join Mako as he navigates the mysterious signals Sakurai is revealing to him.

basic_info.title:
High Score Girl
Hi Score Girl
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: High Score Girl Continue

content.synopsis:
In the realm of arcade gaming, Haruo "Beastly Fingers" Yaguchi reigns supreme, masking his ordinary sixth-grade life under this formidable gaming persona. Unremarkable in popularity, intellect, and athleticism, his prowess shines solely in the world of video games. Preferring the local arcade's glow to the seriousness of life and academics, Haruo hones his skills relentlessly.

A twist occurs when Haruo crosses paths with classmate Akira Oono, an academic achiever adored by many, a world away from arcades. Despite her pristine image, she not only achieves a remarkable 29-game win streak but also bests Haruo seven times in succession. Determined to overturn this defeat, Haruo challenges Akira to a Street Fighter 2 showdown, resorting to cunning tactics that earn him a resounding slap from the reserved girl. Thus begins a peculiar and tumultuous bond between these rival gamers.

basic_info.title:
1-nen A-gumi no Monster
The monster of 1st grade, class A.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 1年A組のモンスター

content.synopsis:
When Tarou Jimi becomes the homeroom teacher of class 1-A at an exclusive all-girls high school, his colleagues offer sympathetic glances. Class 1-A appears to be a collection of beautiful and talented young women on the brink of adulthood. Yet, behind their facade of grace lies a group notorious for tormenting their teachers into resignation through subtle intimidation and overt manipulation.

Leading the charge is Momo Hananaka, a cunning model who wields her charisma like a weapon. Upon hearing of Jimi's assignment, she sets her sights on making his tenure a living nightmare. However, Momo and her cohorts may find themselves outmatched, for beneath Jimi's unassuming exterior lies a shadowy history that could reveal a darkness to rival their own.

basic_info.title:
Versailles no Bara
The Rose of Versailles
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Berusaiyu no Bara, Lady Oscar, Rose of Versailles

content.synopsis:
In a bid to forge an alliance between nations, The Empress of Austria orchestrates a marriage between her daughter, the charming yet pampered Marie Antoinette, and the French crown prince, Louis XVI. Set against the opulent backdrop of Versailles, the Austrian princess encounters Oscar François de Jarjayes, Captain of the Royal Guards—a figure who, to her surprise, is not the expected man but a woman!

Oscar, the youngest daughter of a noble house lacking a male heir, was raised as a boy to carry on the family's military tradition. As Antoinette seeks solace from the constraints of her new role, she forms a bond with this enigmatic young woman. Yet, as the naïve queen misuses her authority, Oscar grapples with the dilemma of upholding loyalty to the monarchy while acknowledging the plight of the impoverished populace.

Caught between familial obligations and personal desires, Antoinette and Oscar navigate a treacherous path, destined to leave an indelible mark on history's stage.

basic_info.title:
Satsuriku no Tenshi
Angels of Death

content.synopsis:
Thirteen-year-old Rachel "Ray" Gardner finds herself in a bewildering situation after a traumatic incident, waking up in the depths of an abandoned building with no recollection of her past. Branded as a "sacrifice," she crosses paths with a mysterious, bandaged figure named Isaac "Zack" Foster, armed with a scythe and initially intent on her demise.

Despite Zack's deadly intentions, he soon decides that Ray is not worth the trouble and opts to assist her in escaping the sinister structure. Based on the Japanese horror game, "Satsuriku no Tenshi" chronicles the hair-raising journey of Ray and Zack as they navigate through treacherous obstacles, unraveling the dark secrets that bind them together.

basic_info.title: Shishunki Bitter Change
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Magical Sex Shift
            
                Magical Sex Shift,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Puberty Bitter Change

content.synopsis:
In tales where bodies are swapped, the norm is to return to one's rightful form. But what if that norm is shattered? This is the dilemma faced by Yui Ootsuka and Yuuta Kimura.

Following a sudden collision, Yui and Yuuta find themselves trapped in each other's bodies with no way back. Embracing their new reality, they navigate through their swapped lives in secrecy, their destinies intricately intertwined by this inexplicable twist of fate.

As the years pass, Yui and Yuuta grapple with the challenges of living in unfamiliar skins, gaining profound insights into empathy and understanding as they tread the paths meant for the other.

basic_info.title: Demon King of the Royal Class
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mawang-eun Hagwon-e Ganda, The Demon Prince Goes to the Academy

content.synopsis:
Cursed with a cruel twist of fate, our protagonist meets their end while wading through a storm of cruel critiques on their book. As if death itself wasn't shocking enough, a mysterious figure, known as the "Grim Reaper," reprimands them for their lackluster writing skills. To earn a shot at redemption and secure a place in the afterlife, they must navigate beyond the final chapter of their own creation, the renowned "The Demon King is Dead."

"Unbelievable! Why me, of all people?!"

In a stroke of unparalleled misfortune, our hero finds themselves inhabiting the character of the Demon Prince—a feeble being destined to meet their demise right at the story's onset.

basic_info.title: Villainess in Love
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Angnyeo-ui Namju-nim, The Evil Lady's Hero

content.synopsis: Introducing Yunifer Magnolia, the infamous villainess consumed by envy as the dashing hero, Duke Ishid Lucrenze, only has eyes for her best friend, Raelle. Yunifer's jealousy leads to her demise. However, a twist of fate transforms me into Yunifer just before her tragic destiny unfolds. With a chance to rewrite history, can I secure Ishid and Raelle's happily ever after and avoid Yunifer's fatal missteps? The catch? Waking up to find Ishid by my side after a night of revelry. Oh, the complications!

basic_info.title: Witch of Mine
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Witch, Naui Manyeo, This Witch of Mine

content.synopsis: In a world where being exceptional means being labeled a witch, a tale unfolds of an outcast youth and an enigmatic witch. As they navigate through challenges of destiny and era, their journey transcends mere magic, relying instead on the power of their unlikely bond to overcome the odds.

basic_info.title: Cutie Boy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 큐티보이

content.synopsis: Once the target of teasing in elementary school for her distinctive physique, Lee Han-Ah has risen to fame as the esteemed captain of Il-Hwa Girls High School. Her quest for a charming beau leads her to the laid-back and seemingly flawless Yoo-Min. Will their encounter rewrite the story of her enduring grudge against her childhood tormentor?

basic_info.title: The Nine Heavens Swordmaster
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Heavenly Inquisition Sword, Gucheon Gugeom

content.synopsis: Yeon Jeokha endured relentless abuse from his father's first wife due to his status as the favored second wife's son. His life takes a turn when he discovers a mystical mirror inhabited by a spirit that imparts to him the ancient Nine Heavens Sword Art, a formidable skill crafted by his father. Following ten grueling years of mastering the art, he breaks free and ventures to the mountains, aligning himself with the Obong Outlaws as their most formidable member. As his strength grows, so does the number of adversaries and competitors who seek to challenge him...

basic_info.title: My Boyfriend Is a Vampire
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Magical Sex Shift
            
                Magical Sex Shift,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 내 남친은 뱀파이어

content.synopsis: In a fated encounter, Yoo Da-in, often confused for a girl due to his striking looks, crosses paths with Seo Kang-hoo, a charming man who captivates all. When Seo Kang-hoo bites Yoo Da-in, his heart halts, leading to a bewildering transformation. "I'm certain I perished... yet why am I now a girl?!"

basic_info.title: The Perks of Being an S-Class Heroine
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Spirit's Special Treatment, Preference for the Possessor, A Transmigrator's Privilege

content.synopsis:
In "The Age of Transmigration," a worldwide mystery unfolds as the dying receive ominous spam texts offering life insurance. Following a premature end, one woman is thrust into the afterlife after receiving such a message. Presented with a unique opportunity, she must select a fictional world for her reincarnation.

Seeking solace from a turbulent past, the woman longs for the simplicity of a lighthearted fantasy novel. However, fate steers her towards "Infinite Returns to Save the World," a tale known for its perilous challenges. Reborn as Ailette Rodeline, the daughter of a lowly servant in a noble household plagued by abuse, she faces a grim destiny.

Against all odds, the woman discovers she holds the complete insurance package, granting her vast wealth for skills and tools. Determined to alter Ailette's tragic narrative, she must navigate treacherous waters and forge her own path to survival.

basic_info.title: Jack Frost
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 잭 프로스트

content.synopsis: On her debut day at Amityville High School, Noh-A faces a frosty welcome that borders on brutal. But as she navigates the eerie halls, she discovers a chilling truth: supernatural beings wage a secret war for dominance within the school's walls. Now entangled in this otherworldly conflict, Noh-A must consider an alliance with the enigmatic and dangerous Jack Frost. Is he her savior or her downfall?

basic_info.title: Memorize
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Isekai
            
                Isekai,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 메모라이즈

content.synopsis: Summoned a decade ago by enigmatic angelic beings to the game-like realm of the Whole Plane, Soohyun now stands at the pinnacle—the Apex. Yet, reaching this height has come with a price. With the authority of the Apex at his fingertips, Soohyun wields the formidable power of Code Zero to journey back in time, intent on righting the tragic wrongs of his past.

basic_info.title: Light and Shadow
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bit-gwa Geurimja, Golden Time

content.synopsis:
In the realm of Earlswald, a kingdom torn by rebellion, the demise of its oppressive monarch and his family paves the way for Cayden, the fearless leader of the uprising, to ascend the throne. His loyal companion, Eli, a commoner turned duke, is both hailed as a war hero and feared for his enigmatic and ruthless nature.

Compelled by past allegiances, a nobleman is compelled to offer his daughter's hand in marriage to Eli, but instead, he sends his servant, Edna, disguised as the nobleman's illegitimate offspring. 

As Edna and Eli navigate their reluctant union, they are surprised to find themselves drawn to each other's hidden depths. While Edna conceals her true identity and motives, risking everything to protect the realm, Eli remains unaware of the truths lurking beneath the surface—a revelation that could shatter not only their fragile marriage but also Edna's very existence.

(Note: This entry includes the sequel series Golden Time as they are serialized on the same page on Kakao.)

basic_info.title: The Player Hides His Past
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Player-ga Gwageo-reul Sumgim

content.synopsis: In the immersive virtual reality game "History of the Archana Continent," the line between game and reality blurs, bringing forth "players" synchronized with human hosts to defend the realm. Ordinary salaryman Hoyeol Lee finds himself inhabiting the character he crafted in his school days, the formidable "Grandfell Claudi Arpeus Romeo," a renowned "demon hunter." Despite his mundane origins, Hoyeol, now Grandfell, stands tall against the demonic forces, becoming the sole beacon of hope in a world threatened by darkness. Embracing his newfound role, Grandfell (= Hoyeol) embarks on a journey that will test both his mettle and his destiny.

basic_info.title: Returning With Absolutely Nothing
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Worthless Regression, Possessing Nothing, Jwippul-do Eomneun Hoegwi

content.synopsis: In Aeria, a realm where individuals from diverse realms are brought forth, the path of the feeble leads to demise. Sungmin Lee, a lackluster mercenary, faced a similar fate. Yet, a fortuitous discovery of a cryptic artifact prior to his demise propels him back in time. Reborn as a 13-year-old, Sungmin embarks on a fervent quest to rise as the mightiest in Aeria, devoid of wealth or prowess. Can sheer determination alone sculpt a champion from a boy stripped of all?

basic_info.title: Leveling Beyond the Max
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Level Up from Max Level, Maxed Out Leveling, Man-Level-buteo Level Up

content.synopsis: Following a car crash, Cha Shinhyun finds himself in a realm of martial arts, where he trains relentlessly for 140 years, emerging as the supreme force in Murim. Upon his return to Earth, he discovers a transformed world overrun by hunters battling monsters to enhance their abilities. Reunited with his sister, he confronts the harsh reality of starting anew at level 1, driven by a thirst for vengeance against the one who reshaped his destiny.

basic_info.title: Model
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: MODEL 모델

content.synopsis:
In the heart of Europe, Korean art student Jae faces setbacks but refuses to yield. When her friend Melissa brings a drunken stranger, Michael, to crash at her place, Jae reluctantly agrees. A haunting dream of Michael drinking her blood shakes her, only to realize it's no mere dream.

Rather than fear the vampire, Jae finds herself captivated by his allure and begins painting his portrait. In a strange pact, Michael offers to model for her if she consents to his feeding. Could his unearthly charm and captivating presence be the key to unlocking Jae's artistic success?

basic_info.title: The Crow's Prince
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Of All Things, I Became a Crow, Hapir-imyeon Kkamagwi-ga Doeeo Beoryeotda

content.synopsis:
A Korean woman embarks on her dream job as a zookeeper, reveling in the care of wild animals she adores, even finding joy in cleaning their cages. However, the dangerous nature of the job leads to her untimely demise. Awakening in an unfamiliar forest, she discovers her reincarnation as a crow, known for its ominous presence.

With a fierce determination to survive, she seeks companionship and encounters a wounded man perched in a tree. After aiding him in evading an orc ambush, a bond forms, and he affectionately dubs her Rainelle.

As memories resurface, she recognizes him as Camute Ivel Volphric, the Volphric empire's first prince and a character from a game she once played. Tasked with safeguarding Camute from his treacherous brother, Rainelle grapples with her fading recollections of the game while navigating the perilous political landscape to shield her newfound ally.

basic_info.title: Mystic Musketeer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Arcane Sniper, Matan-ui Sasu

content.synopsis: Paralyzed former sniper Ha Yiha embarks on a new journey within the virtual realm of "Middle Earth." His goal: to excel in the game, amass wealth for crucial surgery. However, a hiccup arises when an unexpected exit thrusts him into the role of a musketeer, known for its inefficiency. Leveraging his real-world marksmanship, Yiha revolutionizes musketeering, attracting attention and unlocking fresh challenges. Confident in his strides towards victory, Yiha soon realizes that danger lurks closer than he anticipated.

basic_info.title: The Celestial Returned from Hell
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Constellation That Returned From Hell, Jiok-eseo Doraon Seongjwa-nim

content.synopsis: Yeonseung Choi shatters records by becoming the inaugural human to ascend to celestial status! Tasked with defending Earth from celestial threats, he embarks on rigorous training in the Abyss. Can Yeonseung overcome the odds and safeguard his home planet from impending doom?

basic_info.title: Jack Be Invincible
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Legendary Youngest Son of the Marquis House, Hujakga-ui Yeokdaegeup Mangnae Adeul

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of his vengeance against the Thulcaan Empire, Jack Valantier breathes his final breath. However, his tale doesn't end there. Suddenly, he awakens to find himself back at the age of 14, surrounded by the familiar faces of his neglectful family, loyal servant, and caring sister. Armed with the wisdom of a lifetime, Jack is determined to right the wrongs of his past. Now, equipped with unparalleled experience, he is prepared to mete out justice to those who once crossed him. This time, Jack is unstoppable, and his enemies will face the full force of his newfound power.

basic_info.title: Tyrant of the Tower Defense Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Tyrant of a Defense Game, Becoming the Tyrant of a Defense Game, Defense Game-ui Pokgun-i Doeeotda

content.synopsis: "Defending the Empire" stood unchallenged for a decade until the renowned streamer "Mr. Gamer Geek" shattered its invincibility, conquering the game's toughest level. Just as he basks in his triumph, he's mysteriously transported into the game's realm, inhabiting the body of Prince Ash. Ash confronts the grim reality that his every move in the game caused actual, tragic consequences, including the lives of his comrades sacrificed for victory. Determined to redeem himself, Ash vows to protect his team while navigating a relentless onslaught of monsters using his strategic prowess. Yet, as he grapples with this perilous new world, the identity and motives of his enigmatic abductor remain shrouded in mystery. To unveil the truth, Ash must first survive the brutal battlefield that awaits him.

basic_info.title: After School Lessons for Unripe Apples
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 20th Century Green Apple School, 90's Cram School for Unripe Apples, Segimal Putsagwa Boseup Hagwon

content.synopsis:
Kim Cheol can't stand being in the spotlight, but his towering height and a distinctive scar beneath his eye make him impossible to miss. On the other hand, his new seatmate, Hwang Mi-ae, is a lively soul and the shortest in their class. Their stark physical differences create a humorous contrast, made even more amusing by the fact that they share names with a hilariously famous dancing duo.

Cheol grapples with his quick temper and shies away from social interactions, while Mi-ae is all about comics, her adored boy band, and hanging out with friends. Despite their differing interests, fate brings them together as neighbors, with a shared history from their early years. Despite the rumors swirling around Cheol's intimidating reputation, Mi-ae sees beyond his rough exterior to his vulnerability and kind heart, determined to break through his walls. As they navigate the pressures of preparing for high school entrance exams, Cheol gradually becomes the most important person in Mi-ae's life.

basic_info.title: Designated Bully
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Bully in Charge, Iljin in Charge Iljin, The Best Man in Charge, Iljin Damdang Iljin

content.synopsis: When Daegun Kwon quits high school, he takes up a job at a convenience store to study for his GED. When a gang bothers him at work, Daegun stands up to them. Soon after, a mysterious woman approaches him.

basic_info.title: Surviving Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Saranameun Romance

content.synopsis:
Eun Chaerin, the beloved protagonist of a conventional romance tale, captivates onlookers with her presence. Once a mere reader of her own story, she now navigates its twists firsthand alongside her intended love interest, Yu Jeha. However, their fateful moment is marred by Jeha's transformation into a disfigured zombie, leading to a tragic turn of events as he bites Chaerin.

Rather than succumb to death, Chaerin finds herself trapped in a perplexing cycle of a zombie apocalypse, endlessly repeating the same day without saving Jeha. He remains the sole recognizable figure amidst a sea of shadowy silhouettes that populate her reality. After countless iterations, a mysterious classmate intervenes, offering a glimmer of hope before Chaerin meets her demise once more.

Driven by the newfound prospect of uncovering hidden characters, Chaerin resolves to shift her focus from saving Jeha to unearthing this enigmatic figure in her next loop. By embracing this unexpected path, she may yet discover the key to unlocking her longed-for happy ending.

basic_info.title: Manager Kim
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Directory Kim, Kim Bujang

content.synopsis: In a quiet town, Mr. Kim, a single father, company manager, and ex-black-ops member, led a routine life until his daughter, Minji, vanished without a trace. When fears of her demise surface, Mr. Kim's demeanor transforms into one of unwavering determination. Unleashing a relentless pursuit for answers, he embarks on a mission to save Minji at all costs, prepared to obliterate anything and anyone obstructing his path.

basic_info.title: Doctor, Live Again
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Doctor's Rebirth, Uiwon, Dasi Salda

content.synopsis:
While on a medical mission in a foreign land, I tragically perish shielding a patient during a civil war. To my bewilderment, I awaken as a child in the aftermath of the chaos, surrounded by a peculiar group of unconscious strangers and a wrecked carriage.

As I hasten to administer aid, I realize I have transmigrated into the world of "The Supreme Demon King," a beloved Murim novel. Encountering the renowned "Three Great Doctors," I learn that I have rescued the novel's protagonist, the destined Demon King "Yeoharyun."

Bound by gratitude, Yeoharyun insists I address him as 'hyung.' Our bond deepens as I am initiated as his sworn brother and taken under the wing of the esteemed Baekrineuison. Thus unfolds my journey to becoming the most revered healer in Gangho.

basic_info.title: The Breaker: Eternal Force
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Breaker 3: Eternal Force

content.synopsis: Haje Kang reaches his breaking point, tormented by bullies until he finds himself on the school roof, teetering on the edge. Just as he prepares to leap, a mysterious upperclassman, Si-un Lee, gives him a literal push. To Haje's surprise, he wakes up unharmed the next day. Unbeknownst to him, Si-un is a formidable martial artist in the secretive realm of Murim. Desperate for guidance, Haje implores Si-un to mentor him, setting off a chain of events that will thrust them both into the turbulent world of martial arts.

basic_info.title: The Second Coming of Gluttony
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tamsig-ui Jaerim

content.synopsis: On the edge of demise in a mystical battleground, Jihoo Seol is given a rare opportunity to start anew. However, the magic bestowed upon him comes with limitations, leaving Seol with mere glimpses of his future self. Haunting visions of a life he has yet to experience visit him through fleeting dreams, while unexpected strokes of luck grace him. But when his magic falters, Seol's fortunes plummet. Struggling and isolated, he encounters a enigmatic woman who presents a life-altering proposition. Can his premonitions guide him through the impending dangers?

basic_info.title: Cleric of Decay
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Priest of Corruption, Bupae-ui Saje

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, Marnac finds himself thrust into a mysterious game, embodying the dreaded role of a decay cleric. Tasked with serving a goddess reduced to a haunted hand chanting "MURDER!", he must rise as the sole cleric of the Order of Decay. As the prophesied "end" looms near, can he harness enough power to avert the impending doom?

basic_info.title: Disciple of the Holy Sword
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Leveling Up with the Sword, Overpowered Sword, Geomppal-ro Level Up

content.synopsis: Leon, a seasoned swordsman, struggles to surpass his rival, Lionel, at the royal academy despite his years of training. Everything changes when the legendary holy sword Elsyd selects Leon as its destined hero and student. As Leon navigates the challenging teachings of Elsyd, including the unexpected task of learning to see, he faces a crucial question: Can he endure this training to gain the strength needed to defeat the formidable Lionel and carve out his own place in the world?

basic_info.title: Romance 101
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bareun Yeonae Giljabgi, A Guide to Proper Dating

content.synopsis:
University student Jung Bareum leads a meticulously organized life, prioritizing efficiency and unwavering determination in reaching her goals. Despite her structured existence, the one missing piece in Bareum's life is romance. Brushing off inquiries about her love life with excuses tied to her hectic timetable, Bareum's world takes an unexpected turn with the arrival of the charming schoolmate, Shin Jaehyun.

Eager to foster a connection with Jaehyun, Bareum impulsively joins his intimate programming club, hoping to deepen their bond. However, the path to love is far from smooth sailing. As she navigates the complexities of romance, Bareum finds herself entangled with Na Yuyeon, a club mate known for her love of online games and habitual tardiness. Initially deeming them incompatible due to their contrasting lifestyles, Bareum soon discovers hidden depths beneath the surface.

Balancing her tightly packed schedule, newfound romantic possibilities, and the challenges posed by her peers, Bareum must navigate the intricacies of her evolving relationships. Will she find harmony amidst the chaos of her structured life, budding romance, and unexpected connections?

basic_info.title: The Worn and Torn Newbie
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dalko Dareun Newbie, A Newbie Who's Nobody's Fool

content.synopsis: In the wake of a revelation that his past 15 years were a gaming nightmare, Lee Eojin embraces a fresh start as a newbie named Old-timer. Determined not to relive past failures, he dives into the game world, battling monsters, acquiring valuable gear, and amassing wealth. As his reputation grows, Eojin faces admiration from fans and animosity from foes, old and new. Will he achieve victory and dominate the game, or will history repeat itself, leaving Eojin shattered once more?

basic_info.title: Priest
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 프리스트

content.synopsis: In the wild frontier of the American West, a sinister force looms, threatening to plunge humanity into darkness. The minions of the fallen archangel Temozarela are scheming to revive their malevolent master. Enter Ivan Isaacs, a former priest who made a pact with the devil Belial to combat wickedness. With his trusty blade and silver bullets, Ivan embarks on a bloody quest to thwart the apocalypse and cleanse the world of heresy.

basic_info.title: Devil Number 4
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Agmawa Gyeyag-yeon-ae, A Love Contract with the Devil

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, a struggling student faces financial and emotional turmoil until a peculiar offer from the devil himself changes her course. However, this devil, a mere pawn in Satan's hierarchy, grapples with his own challenges as the girl hesitates to surrender her soul. As she reluctantly works at his coffee shop, he endeavors to persuade her that she can attain success without sacrificing her essence. But at what price? Her very soul hangs in the balance.

basic_info.title: Medical Return
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Medical
            
                Medical,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Medical Rebirth, Medical Hwansaeng

content.synopsis: In the bustling city of Seoul, Kim Jihyun, once known as a notorious surgeon, is granted a remarkable opportunity to rewind the clock of his life. Returning to his past in middle school, he seizes this fresh start with unwavering determination. This time, he immerses himself in relentless studying, aspiring to transform into a prosperous dermatologist. Watch as Kim Jihyun embarks on a journey to rewrite his destiny from rags to riches.

basic_info.title: Webtoon Character Na Kang Lim
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Harem
            
                Harem,                    School
            
                School,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Suyo Webtoon-ui Na Kang Lim

content.synopsis: Na Kang Lim, a devoted webtoon enthusiast, is thrown into a surreal adventure when the female lead from his beloved series materializes before him. Mirroring the dangers she faces in the webtoon, she becomes a target in the real world, with no hero to shield her. Na Kang Lim must step up as the unexpected protagonist, embarking on a time-bending quest to ensure her safety.

basic_info.title: Hot Blooded Woman
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 열혈여아

content.synopsis: In a world where the timid Ha Li Kang faces her brothers' harsh training in martial arts, seeking solace from her friend Te Hu Kang. Instead of finding comfort, she is challenged to rise above her fears. Determined, Ha Li transforms from a frightened girl into the formidable leader of the Doberman gang through relentless training. A twist of fate leads to a life-altering accident involving a truck, propelling her into a new existence as the delicate yet privileged Aram Han. Follow Ha Li's captivating journey of strength and resilience in "Bamboozled."

basic_info.title: Relife Player
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Re:Life Player

content.synopsis: In a world where despair loomed large, Eunha Noh found himself trapped in a cycle of longing for death yet unable to escape the clutches of life. With a heart hardened by loss and fueled by a deep-seated hatred for monsters, his existence seemed bleak. The fateful moment arrived in the foreboding depths of The Abyss, a notorious dungeon deemed insurmountable by humanity. As fate would have it, a miraculous twist rewound his life back to infancy. Now faced with a second chance, Eunha yearned for a purpose beyond vengeance and destruction. Determined to embrace a new path, he vowed to navigate the challenges ahead, unwavering in his quest for survival and happiness.

basic_info.title: Saver
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 세이버

content.synopsis: In a surprising twist of fate, Lena Ha, the fearless captain of the Kendo team, encounters Hye-Min Kang, the son of a prominent Korean company president. Their instant connection hints at love, but a shocking revelation shatters their budding romance: Lena and Hye-Min are half-siblings. Overwhelmed, Lena flees and plunges into an enigmatic body of water. Awakening in a mysterious kingdom, she discovers a daunting truth - she might hold the key to its salvation.

basic_info.title: Boy of the Female Wolf
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The female wolf Boy

content.synopsis:
Eun-soo Cha harbors deep resentment towards her mother for abandoning her, leading her to grow up under her grandmother's care as a rebellious troublemaker with a knack for brawling. Disguised as a boy, she earns a reputation as a skilled fighter, captivating even the attention of girls.

When her grandmother's health deteriorates further, Eun-soo vows to renounce her violent ways. Following her grandmother's passing, she reluctantly heads to Seoul, her mother's home, driven by necessity rather than affection.

In this unfamiliar city, she crosses paths with a formidable fellow student, sparking immediate conflict. Will Eun-soo remain true to her pledge? And amidst the chaos, could love unexpectedly blossom?

basic_info.title: My Gently Raised Beast
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Raised the Beast Well, Gopge Ki-woss-deoni, Jimseung

content.synopsis:
Blondina yearns to break free from the oppressive life that has haunted her since her mother's passing. To evade a harrowing fate of being bartered to a cruel nobleman, Blondina makes a daring move: she trades her late mother's cherished possession, a glimmering ring once owned by her elusive father, for a chance at solace. Little does she anticipate that this decision will lead her straight into the arms of her estranged father, the revered emperor of Ates, who bestows upon her the title of princess.

But life within the grand palace is far from idyllic for Blondina. She must conceal her modest origins and endure the scorn of her haughty half-siblings, leaving her feeling as isolated as ever. Just as loneliness threatens to consume her, a peculiar encounter changes her fate. A wounded feline, capable of speech, crosses her path, offering a newfound companionship. Yet, this enigmatic creature is no ordinary cat; he reveals himself as Amon Akin, the formidable leader of the revered Great Divine Leopard clan.

As tensions mount between the human realm and the leopard clan, can the bond between Blondina and Amon Akin tip the scales towards harmony—or will their connection spell doom for both worlds?

basic_info.title: Adelaide
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: La Dolce Vita di Adelaide, The Sweet Life of Adelaide

content.synopsis:
Seventeen years after a fateful car accident, Adelaide Chamille Borbon finds herself living a seemingly mundane life as a nobleman's daughter in the countryside, eagerly seeking adventure before an impending arranged marriage. Curiosity piqued by rumors of a mysterious black-haired woman from another realm, Adelaide embarks on a journey to the capital to encounter this enigmatic "saint" at a grand debutante ball.

Meanwhile, Felix Mikhail Noah Elias is embroiled in scandalous gossip linked to the same woman. Unmasking her true intentions, Felix realizes she is a cunning deceiver, using him for personal gain. Desperate to salvage his reputation, Felix enlists Adelaide to pose as his betrothed, aiming to dispel the rumors and rid himself of the unwelcome impostor.

As their worlds collide, Felix and Adelaide navigate a precarious charade of fake engagement. Despite his assurances of a platonic arrangement, the proximity of Adelaide challenges Felix's resolve, blurring the lines of their makeshift alliance.

basic_info.title: Ending Maker
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 엔딩메이커

content.synopsis: When "outboxer009" finds himself inhabiting the body of Yuder Bayel from Legend of Heroes 2, he's in for a wild ride. Things get even crazier when his rival, "sandstorm," shows up as Cordelia Chace. As two seasoned pros in the game world, they quickly learn that success goes beyond mere point-and-click skills. With the game hurtling towards an apocalyptic finale, they must merge his sharp wit, her sassy attitude, and their gamer instincts to rewrite the ending and avert disaster.

basic_info.title: The Villainess Flips the Script!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: It's Time to Change the Genre, I Will Change the Genre, I Will Make an Attempt to Change the Genre, Genre-reul Bakkwobodorok Hagetseumnida

content.synopsis:
Luca Winterwald's past was shrouded in darkness: abandoned by his father, orphaned by his mother's death, and tormented by his cruel aunt, Judith Maibaum. But when Luca reaches the age of ten, his uncle, the loyal Viscount Ruediger, whisks him away to the Winterwald Duchy. There, Luca is destined to claim his birthright as Duke and begin a relentless quest for retribution against those who question his heritage.

A devoted reader of the novel chronicling Luca's quest for vengeance unexpectedly finds herself reincarnated as Judith—the initial antagonist to meet her demise. Determined not to squander this second chance, she resolves to alter Judith's destiny and live a humble life once Luca departs with Ruediger. Despite Luca's skepticism of Judith's sudden change of heart, he surprises everyone by refusing to part ways with his aunt on the pivotal day of Ruediger's arrival.

Against all odds, Judith persuades Luca to let her accompany him, pledging to utilize her foreknowledge of the narrative to safeguard herself and secure a brighter future for her beloved nephew. Though their alliance strays far from the established storyline, together they vow to rewrite their fates and forge a new path filled with hope and redemption.

basic_info.title: A Tender Heart: The Story of How I Became a Duke's Maid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nalgeot: Gongjak-gaui Hanyeo-ro Bing-ui-haetseumnida, Sincerely: I Became a Duke's Maid

content.synopsis:
In the world of "Alejandro," a tragic tale unfolds as Liandro, a cursed outcast, faces a bleak destiny. Meanwhile, in modern Korea, a young woman named Evelina empathizes deeply with his plight. Suddenly transported into the very novel she was reading, Evelina becomes a maid caring for the ailing Liandro.

Despite his initial reluctance, Evelina's genuine kindness breaks through Liandro's walls. But when she accidentally breaks his curse, altering the story's course, their fates become uncertain. As they navigate the consequences of this twist of fate, their bond is tested, leaving them to ponder the unknown future ahead.

basic_info.title: My Boo
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Transparent Cohabitation

content.synopsis: At 27 years old, So Yeori finds herself burdened with an unexpected talent – the ability to converse with spirits. Reluctant to engage with the supernatural, she moves into a new home determined to ignore the resident ghost. However, the ghost, Go Joon, craves companionship even in death. Despite her initial resistance, Yeori agrees to cohabit with Joon for a year. As two solitary souls navigating the complexities of living together, they embark on a journey of shared joys and challenges in their unique human-ghost arrangement.

basic_info.title: Crazy Girl Shin Bia-Ah
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Harem
            
                Harem,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Crazy Girl Shin Bia-Ah Goes to the Alien World!!

content.synopsis: Shin Bia is a high school student known for her tough attitude, laziness, and love for money, despite her beauty. One day, while pondering about different eras, she inexplicably finds herself transported back to ancient times. In this unfamiliar world, she must adapt to the role of an elegant lady and navigate through challenging obstacles.

basic_info.title: Gosu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Master

content.synopsis: After the death of his master, Gang Yong vows to seek vengeance no matter the price. With his martial arts honed in isolation, he embarks on a mission to confront the traitors. To his surprise, upon reaching the town, he finds the traitors already deceased. Now faced with a perplexing dilemma, what will Gang Yong do next?

basic_info.title: I Killed the Main Player
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Killed an Academy Player, Academy Player-reul Jugyeotda

content.synopsis: In the beloved game world, Corin may be just a minor NPC, but his expertise rivals that of any main player. All is well as he teams up with Sihu, the game's protagonist, until a shocking revelation shatters his reality—Sihu has been ruthlessly eliminating innocent NPCs for personal gain. Powerless to intervene, Corin braces for the inevitable end until fate takes a twist. Suddenly transported three years into the past, Corin seizes the opportunity to alter destiny. With a newfound resolve, he sets out to confront Sihu, vanquish the ultimate enemy, and rewrite the game's ending to save the realm.

basic_info.title: Legend of an Asura: The Poison Dragon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Poison Dragon: The Legend of an Asura, Legend of Asura: The Venom Dragon, Sura Jeonseol Dongnyong

content.synopsis: In a devastating blow, the powerful Medicine Faction succumbs to the malevolent grip of the Venom Clan. Zhen Ziqiang, once a member of the fallen faction, endures torturous experiments at the hands of the Venom Clan's Elder, emerging as a vengeful Asura. Fueled by fury and driven by a thirst for retribution as the faction's lone survivor, Ziqiang plots to dismantle the Poison Faction and make them rue the day they crossed him.

basic_info.title: The Makeup Remover
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Man Who Cleans Up Makeup, Hwajang Jiwojuneun Namja

content.synopsis:
Photography student Kim Yeseul has always followed the path dictated by others, adhering to her mother's relentless push for academic excellence. Despite her relentless focus on studies, Yeseul's grades remain average, she lacks companionship, and her appearance fails to turn heads.

In a spur-of-the-moment decision, Yeseul ventures into a makeup salon, yearning to emulate the beauty of Joo Heewon, the school's stunning icon. Disappointment strikes when the transformation leaves her looking more like a clown than a beauty. Meanwhile, Cheon Yuseong, a prodigious makeup artist, seeks the ideal muse for his artistry. A serendipitous meeting sparks an unexpected alliance between the unassuming Yeseul and the gifted Yuseong as they join forces to enter the cutthroat competition "Face Off Cinderella," broadcasted nationwide.

Their journey is fraught with formidable adversaries, including fierce rivals, Heewon herself, and avaricious corporate figures. To emerge victorious, Yeseul and Yuseong must transcend expectations and prove that makeup is not solely for others' approval but a means of self-expression and empowerment.

basic_info.title: The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Swordmaster
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hwansaenghan Amsalja-neun Geomsul Cheonjae, The Reincarnated Assassin Is a Genius Swordsman

content.synopsis: Formerly a devoted assassin under House Robert, Raon meets his demise at the hands of Derus. Refusing to succumb, Raon seeks retribution through a twist of fate, awakening in the esteemed House Sieghart, renowned for its influence and wealth. Tasked with avenging his own death, Raon must harness the vast resources of his new allegiance. While retaining the deadly knowledge of the Flame Link technique, he bears the burden of the insidious Curse of Bitter Frost, a slow agent of his demise. To complicate matters further, the malevolent spirit of Wrath hungrily seeks to dominate his very being.

basic_info.title: Divine Melody
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 仙曲

content.synopsis: In a mystical village nestled at the foot of a legendary mountain, the captivating tale unfolds. Meet Duo Xi, a spirited young boy, and Xiao Que, a gentle maiden, as they encounter extraordinary legends. This village is rumored to be inhabited by female fox demons, including the remarkable Cai Sheng—a young fox with the potential to transcend into a celestial being. Plagued by loneliness, Cai Sheng ventures down to the village and forms a unique bond with Duo Xi and Xiao Que. When danger strikes, it is the human children who come to the rescue, sealing a fateful connection. Bound by an ancient debt, the trio's destinies intertwine across two centuries. Witness Cai Sheng's evolution into a powerful entity capable of fulfilling her promise to the reincarnated children, as the saga transcends time and loyalty endures.

basic_info.title: Da Wang Rao Ming
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Spare Me, Great Lord!
