content.synopsis: Following the revival of spirit energy, individuals strive to harness it for training, except for Lu Shu. Empowered by his Negative Emotion System, he thrives on taunting others. Driven by a desire to safeguard his sister amidst an era of change, Lu Shu embraces his unique strength through provocation. Witness as he embarks on a path to supremacy, earning the title of "The Great Demon King." Get ready for the rise of Lu Shu!

basic_info.title: Billion Princess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 百億公主

content.synopsis: Haruka, the daughter of a prominent media tycoon in Asia, is known for her beauty, wealth, and popularity, earning her the title of a contemporary princess. Despite her mother's efforts to arrange a marriage for her, Haruka harbors a clandestine romance with Kage, a renowned male singer signed to her father's company. Ten, a hopeful songwriter working as an errand boy at the company, is captivated by Haruka. Their interconnected lives take a dramatic turn with an unforeseen tragedy.

basic_info.title: Xi Xing Ji
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Historical
            
                Historical,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Journey to the West, Westbound, Westbound Discipline

content.synopsis: In a heavenly conspiracy, the Sutra vanishes for over a decade, prompting Heaven to dispatch its army to find it. To prevent the sacred text from returning to celestial hands, the epic journey to the West is reignited.

basic_info.title:
Guomin Laogong: Touwen 55-ci
Bringing Home the Dream Husband: 55 Stolen Kisses
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Taking the Perfect Husband Home: With 55 Stolen Kisses, Bringing the Nation's Husband Home

content.synopsis: Lu Jin Nian and Qiao An Hao found themselves in an unexpected marriage. As they embarked on their wedding night, Qiao An Hao set forth three strict rules for their union: no physical contact, no public declaration of their marriage, and no acknowledgment of their shared living arrangements.

basic_info.title:
Yingxiong Zai Lin
Hero Return
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hero? I Quit a Long Time Ago, Yingxiong? Wo Zao Jiu Bu Dang Le

content.synopsis: Zero, the trailblazing superhero who ignited a wave of superhuman heroes, vanished mysteriously after five years of conflict.

basic_info.title:
Da Zhu Zai
The Great Ruler
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Doupo Cangqiong zhi Dazhuzai

content.synopsis: Welcome to The Great Thousand World, where countless planes converge, clans thrive, and lords gather. From the Lower Planes emerge the Heavenly Sovereigns, each destined to carve out a legendary path towards rulership in this vast realm. Witness the Endless Fire Territory ablaze under the Flame Emperor's dominion, with flames licking the skies. Behold the awe-inspiring power of the Martial Ancestor in the Martial Realm, commanding fear from heaven and earth. Feel the unyielding might of the Emperor of a Hundred Battles at the West Heaven Temple. Amidst the Northern Desolate Hill, where graves stretch as far as the eye can see, the Immortal Owner reigns supreme. When a youth from the Northern Spiritual Realm emerges astride a Nine Netherworld Bird, the stage is set for a journey into a world teeming with brilliance and diversity. As aspirations clash and fates intertwine, who will emerge victorious in the pursuit of becoming a Great Ruler? In the Great Thousand World, the quest for supremacy unfolds with relentless fervor.

basic_info.title:
Chao Hua Xi Shi
Flower Time
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Chasing the Sun

content.synopsis: Determined and diligent An Kele values independence and forms her own opinions. When she moves in with her aunt, she meets the charming host Yan Shu, unaware that he is actually her classmate Ye Ling. While An Kele strives to excel academically and catch the eye of senior student Bai Yiran, she is drawn to Yan Shu's charisma. Despite her initial disdain for the brooding Ye Ling, their intertwined destinies lead them through challenges towards a shared goal of a promising tomorrow.

basic_info.title:
Digimon Adventure
Digimon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 數碼暴龍

content.synopsis:
During a summer camp adventure, seven kids are whisked away to a vibrant and mysterious realm by magical 'digi-vices'. In this new world, they forge unbreakable bonds with small digital creatures known as Digimons. Together, they navigate the captivating DigiWorld, fending off malevolent Digimons with the help of their newfound allies.

However, the group soon uncovers a troubling truth: once-kind Digimons are being corrupted by sinister Black Gears, transforming them into destructive forces. With chaos spreading, the children realize they must confront the dark power threatening the entire DigiWorld.

As they embark on a quest to return home, the kids and their Digimon companions evolve into mighty champions through unity and trust. Bound by destiny, they stand against the formidable evil determined to obliterate the realm they now call home.

basic_info.title: Youth Gone Wild
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 搖滾狂潮

content.synopsis:
Yating's world turned upside down when she was abruptly let go from her job at a recording company by her boss, a well-known movie actress notorious for her demanding ways. Feeling lost and adrift, Yating found herself working at a pub where the renowned band "Gangster" frequently performed. In this unexpected setting, she encountered a mysterious man with a voice that seemed to touch the heavens.

Fortune smiled upon Yating as her uncle, contemplating retirement, unveiled plans to establish his own record label. Propelled by his vision of forming Taiwan's most legendary rock band, he invited Yating to join him on this ambitious journey. Now assuming the role of the band's new manager, Yating embarked on a mission to mold the ultimate rock sensation, navigating the highs and lows of the music industry with determination and grit.

basic_info.title: Orange
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 橘子

content.synopsis: In the heart of the bustling city, a high school student named Orange grapples with the overwhelming sense of emptiness consuming her. Disillusioned by her shallow friends, indifferent parents, and the hollow promises of love, she finds solace in dark thoughts of ending her life. Standing on the edge of her rooftop, Orange's world is shaken by the arrival of Dashu, a mysterious young man with a troubled past. As their paths intertwine, a poignant tale of self-discovery and unexpected redemption unfolds. With poignant storytelling and captivating illustrations by manga legend Benjamin, "Orange" is a touching narrative that delves into the depths of despair and the possibility of hope.

basic_info.title: Ingènuo
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ingenuo

content.synopsis: Ding Jiayu harbors a fervent passion for photography, with her ultimate inspiration being the renowned Yung Jo. When Yung Jo's esteemed photography firm initiates a quest for fresh talent, Jiayu seizes the opportunity, despite the company's strict no-women policy. Determined to showcase her skills, she disguises herself as a man and enters the auditions. Impressed by Jiayu's innate talent, Yung Jo appoints her as his apprentice. Working alongside her idol seems like a dream come true, but for Jiayu, the reality is far from idyllic. Enduring Yung Jo's harsh criticism daily and navigating the crew's misconception of her true identity, Jiayu faces a challenging journey towards fulfilling her aspirations.

basic_info.title:
Yaoguai Mingdan
Book of Yaoguai
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Monster List

content.synopsis: In a world brimming with yaoguai – from a charming vixen to a dryad draining men of their life force – young Xi Feng finds himself at the heart of a battle between these magical monsters and the Taoists who oppose them. Tasked with bringing about world peace, Xi Feng must navigate the intricate web of conflict and power. How will he rise to the challenge in a world where danger lurks at every turn?

basic_info.title: Gu Fang Bu Zi Shang
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 孤芳不自賞

content.synopsis: In the realm of Jing Anwang, Bai Pingting defies the notion that a woman's worth lies in ignorance. As a maid, she enjoys a life more lavish than many wealthy women and possesses a keen intellect surpassing most men. Amidst deceit and intrigue, she crosses paths with a man filled with lies and schemes, sparking a tumultuous relationship. Balancing love and loyalty, Bai Pingting begins to question her own significance in a world fraught with duplicity and complex emotions.

basic_info.title: Douluo Dalu 3: Longwang Chuanshuo
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Super Power
            
                Super Power
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Soul Land 3, Combat Continent 3, Douluo Dalu III: The Legend of the Dragon King

content.synopsis:
In a world shaped by the rise of spirit technology, the inhabitants of Douluo Continent have expanded their horizons, unveiling two uncharted lands across the sea. But as spirit masters relentlessly pursue them, the once-plentiful spirit beasts teeter on the brink of extinction. In the heart of the Great Star Dou Forest, the long-dormant King of the Spirit Beasts stirs from slumber, rallying the remnants of his kin for a chilling mission of retribution against humanity.

Enter Tang Wu Lin, unwavering in his quest to master the spirits. When his martial awakening reveals an unparalleled gift, he is thrust into a destiny entwined with the legendary Battle of the Dragon King. Thus commences the epic saga of our Dragon King, where courage and power collide in a riveting tale of destiny and honor.

basic_info.title: Show Me The Money
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Goddess of Stealing Money

content.synopsis: In this uproarious Taiwanese manga, Dahasu Zuhn finds himself in dire straits when his father plunges into debt, leaving him in poverty. Enter the formidable Amei Jin, a girl with unparalleled strength and a relentless pursuit of wealth. As Zuhn navigates life at Freedom High School, where education comes at no cost, he crosses paths with Jin, who reveals her urgent need for money. With a debt of 20,000 yuan hanging over him, Zuhn is reluctantly roped into becoming Jin's servant. How will Zuhn tackle this unexpected twist of fate?

basic_info.title:
Douluo Dalu 4: Zhongji Douluo
Soul Land IV: Ultimate Fighting
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Soul Land 4, Combat Continent 4, Douluo Dalu IV: The Ultimate Combat

content.synopsis: In the vast Northernmost Land, the Douluo federal expedition team stumbled upon a mysterious egg adorned with shimmering golden and silver patterns. Upon closer inspection, they sensed a stirring of life within. Hastening back to their Institute, they carefully nurtured the egg until it finally hatched, revealing a miraculous human baby. Meanwhile, the Federal Academy of Sciences was in the midst of awakening a silver-haired woman from cryostasis, while a blue-haired young man was discovered by the waterfront. As these extraordinary events unfolded, a tale of intrigue and wonder began to unfurl.

basic_info.title: Biao Ren
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Blades of the Guardians

content.synopsis: In a land where "Escorts" are hired to eliminate government targets, Dao Ma, a wandering warrior, is on a mission to settle his debt to Mo, the man who once sheltered him and his daughter, Xiao Qi. Their journey takes a dangerous turn when they cross paths with a victim of the fearsome "rakshasa" – flesh-eating demons. As the country falls into chaos during the fading days of the Sui dynasty, Dao Ma finds himself entangled in a web of rakshasa attacks, violence, enslavement, and unyielding fighters.

basic_info.title: Rakshasa Street
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Requiem Street, ZhenHunJie

content.synopsis: In the mysterious Requiem Street, malevolent spirits converge seeking destruction. Here, spirits and humans dwell side by side, yet only those endowed with guardian spirits can tread its enigmatic paths. Xia Ling, a humble university intern, is thrust into this realm by a fateful encounter. Amidst the menacing spirits, will she harness the power of her guardian spirit to navigate this perilous world and emerge unscathed?

basic_info.title: The Legend of the Sun Knight
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Wuming Qishi

content.synopsis: Introducing the Sun Knight, esteemed leader of the Twelve Holy Knights. His captivating blue eyes, radiant golden hair, and charming smile embody perfection, symbolizing justice and compassion. Yet beneath this facade lies his true self - a cynical, sarcastic individual who resents his role as the zealous Sun Knight, obligated to constantly extol the virtues of the Light God.

basic_info.title: Oldman
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: OLDMAN奧德曼

content.synopsis: The empress's son, condemned to life imprisonment despite his blindness and age, vows vengeance against his immortal mother for his fate. Enlisting the help of a fellow inmate, a woman who has lost both her arms and legs along with her freedom, he sets in motion a plan for retribution.

basic_info.title:
Chu Feng
School Shock
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Young Bee

content.synopsis: In the era of XX AD, a fresh wave of arms competition is on the rise. Enter the age of "Vanguards" – cutting-edge weapons reshaping the battlefield. Liu Li, a seasoned Vanguard on the brink of retirement, embarks on her final mission with just 380 days left.

basic_info.title:
Yuan Zun
Dragon Prince Yuan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 元尊

content.synopsis: In a tumultuous realm dominated by cultivators, a young man wields his brush, igniting the skies with brilliance. As the vermilion bird clashes with the dragon, a pivotal question looms: will the dragon soar above all, or will the fiery bird claim supremacy?

basic_info.title: Lovely Everywhere
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lovely Wu Suo Bu Zai

content.synopsis: Tong Danwei, a hopeful high school freshman, daydreams about her destined love. On her way back from shopping, she unexpectedly encounters a charming boy, sparking the start of her journey. Can she discover love in high school? And will any boy see past her youthful appearance despite being in high school? Join Tong Danwei as she navigates the ups and downs of teenage romance and school life, sprinkled with comedic moments along the way.

basic_info.title:
Wu Dong Qian Kun
Martial Universe
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Martial Movement Upheaval, Earth-Shattering Martial Arts, Force Cosmos

content.synopsis:
In a world where a mysterious seal unlocks the path of cultivation for Lin Dong, he embarks on a journey to master his newfound skills. Along the way, he encounters two strikingly different women – Ling Qingzhu and Ying Huanhuan – both weaving a complex romantic web around him.

With unwavering determination, Lin Dong rises to become a revered cultivator, his powers growing alongside his understanding of dark truths lurking in the shadows. Uncovering a sinister scheme by the demon sect to seize control, Lin Dong, Ling Qingzhu, and Ying Huanhuan unite with righteous warriors to vanquish evil forces and restore harmony to their world.

basic_info.title: Doctor Du Ming
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Docteur Du Ming

content.synopsis: Du Ming, a young anesthetist at a prominent Chinese hospital, is tormented by the memory of Zhang Qian, a fellow student who captivated him with her alluring beauty and mysterious aura. Despite graduating, Du Ming maintains a connection with Zhang Qian through correspondence. However, distressing news emerges that she has reportedly taken her own life. As Du Ming grapples with this shocking revelation, the haunting specter of Zhang Qian's enigmatic presence lingers, unravelling a poignant tale of loss and longing.

basic_info.title: The Prince's Cactus
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cactus of the Prince

content.synopsis:
In this modern age, the world still holds onto titles like "Prince." Meet Elian, the confident heir to a European shipping legacy, with royal blood flowing through his veins. His path to becoming the crown prince seems inevitable, his demeanor perhaps a touch too proud.

On the flip side, Dania's life takes a different turn as her father's departure forces her into the workforce. A twist of fate leads her to a wedding in Greece, where she encounters Elian for the very first time. Their worlds collide, setting the stage for a captivating tale of love and legacy.

basic_info.title: Once Again
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 初•末 ONCE AGAIN

content.synopsis: Yuan Ge, a director at an advertising firm, has his world upended when he learns of his estranged wife's sudden death. Amidst the turmoil of conflicting emotions, he crosses paths with a mysterious young girl on a subway bus. However, she vanishes as quickly as she appeared, leaving Yuan grappling with a haunting sense of loss and a journey of self-discovery. Join Yuan as he navigates the complexities of lost love and embarks on a poignant personal odyssey in this evocative tale.

basic_info.title:
Quanzhi Fashi
Versatile Mage
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Full-Time Magister

content.synopsis: Inheriting a mystical necklace, Mo Fan awakens to a transformed world where his high school curriculum revolves around magic. In this new realm where science has been replaced by sorcery, students strive to master the art of wizardry. Despite familiar faces and challenges, including a skeptical teacher and family responsibilities, Mo Fan uncovers a unique ability: the rare talent to wield multiple magical elements. Join Mo Fan as he navigates this enchanting world as a gifted mage amidst a sea of specialists.

basic_info.title: City of Darkness
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 九龍城寨

content.synopsis: In his Triad gang, he was revered by all as the boss's prized protégé. Yet, in a sudden turn of events, after emerging victorious in numerous turf battles for his gang, he found himself stripped of everything he had worked for. What led to his downfall in just one fateful night?

basic_info.title: Kuang Shen
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Fury, Kuangshen

content.synopsis: In a realm teeming with humans, beasts, demons, gods, dragons, and pixies vying for power, a fierce conflict unfolds. The Baemon troop's mighty beast warriors clash with the sky-soaring dragon knights and the fallen demon race now allied with the angel troops. Amidst this chaos, a unique individual emerges – a mixed-blood child of human, demon, and beast descent. Enduring unparalleled hardships, he possesses unmatched combat prowess. Destined to reshape the world's destiny, he also faces a heart-wrenching love saga unlike any other.

basic_info.title: C.A.T.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: CAT, Confidential Assassination Troop

content.synopsis: As the world teeters on the brink of the third World War, superpower nations engage in a high-stakes communications battle. Utilizing cutting-edge tools like Russia's BEAR, China's Hao Long, and the United States' elite Confidential Assassination Troop (CAT), they vie to gather crucial intelligence on enemy leaders.

basic_info.title: Zui Wu Dao
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Peak of Martial Arts

content.synopsis: In a realm where martial arts reign supreme, a boy named Wu grapples with his inability to train in combat due to his unique physique. Will he resign himself to a life of ridicule and oppression, or will he defy expectations and ascend to the status of a martial arts master?

basic_info.title: Blood and Steel
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sangre Y Acero, Wu Dao Kuang Zhi Shi

content.synopsis:
In a world where strength reigns supreme, the peaceful town of Qingcheng faces destruction at the hands of the martial art fanatics from Wudong. Led by a master and his ruthless disciples, their sole ambition is dominance over all martial arts groups, eliminating any who dare resist.

Yan Heng, a skilled swordsman from Qingcheng, narrowly escapes death thanks to the mysterious 'Wudang Hunter' Jing Lie, who has also suffered at the hands of Wudong. As the last survivors of their respective factions, they form an unlikely alliance and embark on a quest for vengeance against their oppressors.

basic_info.title:
Quanzhi Gaoshou
The King's Avatar
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Quan Zhi Gao Shou, Full-Time Expert, Master of Skills

content.synopsis:
Renowned as a pioneer and elite gamer in the virtual realm of Glory, Ye Xiu earns the moniker "Battle God" for his remarkable prowess and enduring impact on the game. Following his involuntary exit from the professional scene, Ye Xiu transitions to a local internet café, bidding farewell to his gaming legacy. Yet, with the launch of Glory's tenth server, he resurfaces under the alias "Lord Grim," plunging back into the captivating world he knows so well.

Ye Xiu's swift rise on the fresh server captures the intrigue of fellow players and prominent guilds, sparking speculation about the enigmatic virtuoso. Armed with a decade of expertise and a deep understanding of the game, he faces the daunting task of starting anew without the backing of sponsors or a team in a landscape transformed by time. Together with a band of skilled allies, Ye Xiu embarks on a relentless quest to reclaim his dominance and ascend once more to the pinnacle of Glory!

basic_info.title:
Fangkai Nage Nuwu
Release That Witch
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 放开那个女巫

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, a contemporary engineer finds himself transported to a foreign realm, where he unexpectedly ascends to royalty. The setting echoes medieval Europe, yet with a unique twist – magic-wielding witches are a tangible reality. As he delves into this enchanting world, he discovers that the witches' mystical abilities hold untapped potential as a formidable asset. Determined to unleash their powers and ensure their freedom, our protagonist embarks on a quest filled with perilous challenges. Together, they navigate through treacherous lands, confront malevolent forces, unravel intricate plots, and advance towards mastering the pinnacle of technological prowess.

basic_info.title: Kuai Ba Wo Ge Dai Zou
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ani ni Tsukeru Kusuri wa Nai!, Please Take My Brother Away

content.synopsis: In Miao's world, her brother Fen is a constant source of turmoil, provoking her endlessly until she's ready to burst a hundred times over. Their days are a battlefield, with conflict reigning supreme. Yet, when adversity strikes, Fen transforms into a steadfast guardian, fiercely shielding his younger sibling from harm.

basic_info.title: Ayeshah's Secret
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ayeshah's Forest

content.synopsis: In Ayeshah's Forest lies a haunting tale of a young girl, burdened by the tragedy of losing her mother at birth. With a wicked stepmother and three unrelated brothers, she navigates a web of secrets filled with betrayal, terror, deceit, love, death, and vengeance. Within the darkness of the forest, murderous intentions fueled by greed and twisted emotions unfold, painting a gripping narrative of familial turmoil and hidden treachery.

basic_info.title: Douluo Dalu II: Jueshi Tangmen
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Soul Land 2, Combat Continent 2, Peerless Tang Sect

content.synopsis: In a realm devoid of magic and martial arts, where essence spirits hold power, lies the combat continent, a millennia after the Tang Sect's inception. A fresh hero and companions traverse the land, facing the rise of the formidable "Seven Monsters of Shrek." Can the Tang Sect withstand these challenges, or will it falter against the emerging essence system?

basic_info.title: Feng Shen Ji III
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Historical
            
                Historical,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Legend and the Hero III, Chronicles of the God's Order III

content.synopsis: In this thrilling sequel and continuation of Feng Shen Ji II, the epic saga unfolds with even greater intensity and intrigue.

basic_info.title: Feng Shen Ji II
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Historical
            
                Historical,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Legend and the Hero II

content.synopsis: In the thrilling sequel and continuation of Feng Shen Ji, the saga unfolds further, delving deeper into the epic tale of gods and mortals.

basic_info.title: Panlong
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Coiling Dragon

content.synopsis: In a world where a once-mighty clan is fading into obscurity, a young noble named Linley harbors grand ambitions to revive his family's glory. Everything changes when a chance encounter leads him to a mysterious ring adorned with a dragon carving. As Linley's path intertwines with a fierce clash between formidable warriors, he uncovers the astonishing truth about the ring's unimaginable powers. Now, with newfound abilities at his disposal, Linley sets out on a transformative journey to rescue his clan from the brink of extinction.

basic_info.title: The Ravages of Time
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Huǒ Fèng Liáo Yuán

content.synopsis: In "The Ravages of Time," a riveting adaptation of "Romance of the Three Kingdoms," we follow the fates of Liu Bei, Cao Cao, the Sun family, and the formidable Sima clan. At the helm of the prosperous Sima dynasty is the astute young Sima Yi, renowned for his knack in uncovering lucrative opportunities from a tender age. Yet, lurking beneath their affluent facade, the Sima family harbors a dark secret - they control the Handicapped Warriors, a band of elite assassins with a flawless reputation.

basic_info.title: Nan Hao Shang Feng
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nan Hao & Shang Feng, Nanhao Shangfeng

content.synopsis: In this comedic tale, follow the escapades of two regular high school boys as they navigate the ups and downs of adolescence.

basic_info.title: The One
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 獨領風騷

content.synopsis:
Cane Lele's life is steeped in the glamorous world of fashion. Her mother, Ye Feii, was a renowned model in Taiwan, and her father shared the same profession until a tragic plane crash shattered their family. Raised by her grandmother, Lele resists the allure of the industry, dismissing it as shallow and frivolous. However, her perspective shifts when her aunt, Ye Feihung, a seasoned fashion agent, persuades her to give modeling a chance.

Reluctant at first, Lele's perception transforms when she encounters the work of the esteemed American model, Angus Lanson. Intrigued by the artistry of modeling, she embarks on a journey that takes her to the heart of the fashion world in New York City. As she navigates this new terrain, Lele finds herself drawn not only to her aspirations of becoming a top model but also to the enigmatic allure of love.

Amidst the backdrop of high fashion and ambition, Lele's path intertwines with that of Angus Lanson and his twin brother, Eros Lanson, setting the stage for a charming tale of dreams, desires, and the complexities of the heart. Follow Lele as she pursues her passions and discovers that the world of fashion holds not only the promise of success but also the potential for unexpected romance.

basic_info.title:
Doupo Cangqiong
Battle Through the Heavens
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Fights Break Sphere

content.synopsis: In the realm of the Great Continent of Combat Qi, power reigns supreme, where the once esteemed Xiao Yan of the Xiao Sect faces a sudden loss of talent at just 11 years old. Rejected by those who once praised him, 15-year-old Xiao Yan teeters on the brink of expulsion from his clan, with his betrothed, Na Lan Yan Ran, seeking to dissolve their engagement. Determined to shed his "trash" reputation, Xiao Yan vows to seize control of his destiny and reclaim his strength. Dive into the gripping saga of Doupo Cangqiong as it follows the fallen prodigy on his treacherous quest for power and his ascent to the pinnacle of Cultivation.

basic_info.title: Feng Shen Ji
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Historical
            
                Historical,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Legend and the Hero, Chronicles of the God's Order, The Legend and the Hero

content.synopsis: In Zhao Ge, a messenger from the Heavens arrives as the Shang dynasty reigns. Emperor Zi Zhou boldly defies the gods, sparking their wrath. When Emperor Wu Jifa of a neighboring land launches an attack on the rebellious Shang, the tide turns against Zhou. As defeat looms, Zhou himself enters the fray, confronting Jifa. But just as the battle reaches its climax, a god descends from above, ready to confront the defiant emperor face-to-face.

basic_info.title: Douluo Dalu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Combat Continent, Soul Land

content.synopsis:
In the world of the Tang Outer Sect, Tang San dedicates his life to mastering hidden weapons. When he dares to steal the Inner Sect's secret lore to enhance his skills, he faces a dire choice: death. Yet, his leap from the treacherous Hell's Peak leads to a rebirth in Douluo Dalu. Here, spirits reign supreme, empowering individuals to ascend as Spirit Masters.

Tang San's dormant spirit, Blue Silver Grass, is deemed worthless. Will he defy the odds, surmount challenges, and elevate himself to the esteemed ranks of Spirit Masters, shining the light of the Tang Sect in this uncharted realm?

basic_info.title: Song of the Long March
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Choukakou, Chang Ge Xing

content.synopsis:
When astrology forewarns of the Tang Dynasty's impending doom, a treacherous betrayal orchestrated by the crown prince's own brother shatters the royal family. Princess Yongning narrowly escapes the massacre that claims her father, mother, and brothers, only to be presumed dead herself. Fueled by vengeance, the princess adopts the guise of a young man, Li Chang Ge, and ventures to the Shou province to fulfill her quest for justice.

Under the alias Li Chang Ge, she deftly maneuvers through the political landscape, earning the trust of the Shou emperor and rising swiftly through the military ranks with her strategic acumen. In "Song of the Long March," follow the captivating journey of a determined young woman navigating uncharted territories, forging unbreakable bonds, and facing formidable adversaries on her path to retribution.

basic_info.title: ½ Prince
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Half Prince, 1/2 Wang zi, 1/2 Ouji, 1/2 Prince

content.synopsis: Embarking on her virtual journey in the game Second Life, Feng Lan defies expectations by choosing a male avatar, determined to prove her gaming prowess to her brother. As she delves into this immersive online world, she not only uncovers its mysteries but also experiences the unique perspective of being perceived as a boy. Join Feng Lan as she navigates through thrilling adventures and unexpected challenges in this captivating RPG realm.

basic_info.title: Kanojo ni Naru Hi
basic_info.genre:
Theme:
                            Magical Sex Shift
            
                Magical Sex Shift
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Becoming a Girl One Day

content.synopsis:
In a world where a gender-shifting phenomenon keeps the male-to-female ratio in balance, longtime rivals Nao Mamiya and Kyousuke Miyoshi are inseparable childhood friends known for their intense competition. Nao has always emerged victorious, whether in academics, sports, or daily challenges, much to Kyousuke's chagrin.

Everything changes when, at 17, Nao falls ill and undergoes a transformation, emerging from the hospital as a girl. Despite Kyousuke's aversion to the female gender, Nao embraces this new reality with ease, leaving Kyousuke grappling with his feelings.

Follow Nao's journey in "Kanojo ni Naru Hi" as they navigate life as a boy who has transitioned into a girl, showcasing resilience and adaptation in the face of unexpected change.

In a heartfelt tale, childhood friends Takaki Toono and Akari Shinohara find their bond tested by the cruel hands of fate in "Byousoku 5 Centimeter". As distance and time conspire to separate them, their deep affection endures, promising a love that transcends physical barriers. Yet, as they strive to keep their connection alive, their unwavering devotion may unwittingly inflict pain on those in their orbit. The poignant drama unfolds, exploring the poignant challenges of maintaining a love that spans across miles and memories.

basic_info.title: Akame ga Kill! Zero
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Akame ga Kiru! Zero

content.synopsis: Before emerging as Night Raid's most lethal comrade, Akame was but a girl sold to the Empire and molded into a ruthless assassin, tasked with leaving a trail of death in her wake. The belief? Each life taken brought another a twisted sense of joy.

basic_info.title:
Akuma to Love Song
A Devil and Her Love Song
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Devil and Lovesongs

content.synopsis:
When Maria Kawai starts at her new school, she meets Yuusuke Kanda and Shin Meguro, an odd pair of friends. Yuusuke appears upbeat but is truly indifferent, while Shin comes across as aloof yet harbors a caring side. 

Yuusuke advises Maria to soften her words with a "lovely spin" to appear kinder, but she struggles to do so verbally. Surprisingly, Maria's singing voice carries the emotional depth she yearns to express. Through her songs, can Maria reveal her loneliness, her desire for acceptance, and her journey towards self-compassion?

basic_info.title:
Raise wa Tanin ga Ii
Yakuza Fiancé: Raise wa Tanin ga Ii
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 来世は他人がいい

content.synopsis:
Yoshino Somei's life takes an unexpected turn when she, the granddaughter of the Osaka-based Somei Group's leader, is thrust into the world of the yakuza. The news of the alliance between the Somei and Miyama groups shakes her world as it involves an arranged marriage with her, the unwilling bride-to-be. Reluctantly, Yoshino heads to Tokyo to meet her fiancé, Kirishima Miyama, who surprises her with his kindness and charm.

As Yoshino navigates her new life with the Miyama group, she faces challenges at school due to Kirishima's popularity, leading to bullying from his jealous fangirls. Despite her efforts to distance herself from the yakuza lifestyle, Yoshino finds herself entangled in the underworld once again, a world she thought she had left behind. "Raise wa Tanin ga Ii" follows Yoshino's journey in Tokyo as she grapples with her past and present, all while trying to carve out her own path amidst the shadows of the yakuza.

In the formidable Unabara Domain resides a group of exceptionally skilled students and martial arts masters. The ruler of this domain announces a competition among his sons to determine the strongest martial arts style and heir to his throne. When the 28th son, Naoyoshi Washizu, chooses Gama Kurogane as his representative - an expert in the "weak" Ogama-style and son of a notorious father - the odds appear slim. Yet, with Naoyoshi's unwavering resolve and Gama's impressive abilities, they just might emerge victorious in the end.

basic_info.title:
Hitomi-chan wa Hitomishiri
Hitomi-chan is Shy With Strangers
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Status Quo
            
                Love Status Quo,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 瞳ちゃんは人見知り

content.synopsis: In a high school where appearances can be misleading, Hitomi Takano stands out with her imposing figure, shark teeth, and a frightening countenance. When fellow student Yuu Usami discovers the truth behind her intimidating facade, a heartwarming tale unfolds. Despite her fearsome appearance, Hitomi-chan longs to conquer her social anxieties and forge genuine connections. As Yuu befriends her, their bond deepens, blurring the lines between friendship and something more. Delve into this endearing romantic comedy about a seemingly scary yet kind-hearted girl and her caring upperclassman.

basic_info.title:
Tensei shitara Ken deshita
Reincarnated as a Sword
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: TenKen, I was a Sword when I Reincarnated

content.synopsis:
Hunted, enslaved, and slain—such is the grim destiny that awaits the members of the Black Cats tribe. Fran, a twelve-year-old from this persecuted group, hungers for retribution against those who have wronged her kin. Her heart yearns for a future where justice reigns, and she is willing to do whatever it takes to bring it to fruition. A chance encounter with a sentient sword, wielded by a man reborn in search of a worthy bearer, becomes the pivotal moment that alters Fran's path.

Empowered by her newfound ally, Fran sets out to restore her people's dignity and valor, cutting through adversaries with unwavering determination. With her trusty sword by her side, she embarks on a quest to reclaim her heritage, ready to face any challenge that stands in her way.

basic_info.title: Do Chokkyuu Kareshi x Kanojo
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Extremely Straightforward Boyfriend x Girlfriend

content.synopsis:
Shinichi Honda, a high school freshman known for his brutally honest nature, crosses paths with Mako Wakamiya, a seemingly composed member of the public morals committee who harbors a clumsy side. When their eyes meet for the first time, they are both left speechless by each other's peculiarities.

Months later, chaos ensues as Mako is tasked with confiscating mature content from Shinichi, sparking a wild chase through the school. Despite their initial awkward encounter, the two find themselves encountering each other frequently. Could these unexpected run-ins lead to a budding friendship between the mismatched duo?

basic_info.title:
Subarashii Sekai
What a Wonderful World!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: WaWW

content.synopsis:
In the bustling world of Subarashii Sekai, meet Yuriko Togawa, a twenty-three-year-old who left college half a year back. Once perceived as dependable by her peers, Yuriko secretly yearns for someone to care for her instead. Enter Horita Tomotsugu, a former colleague with whom she hopes to kindle a romance.

Horita once harbored dreams of launching a band alongside Yuriko. Now settled into office life, a chance reunion reignites his passion for music. Despite differing desires, Yuriko extends a helping hand as they navigate a series of events together.

Their tale is just one of many poignant narratives woven into the fabric of Subarashii Sekai. Through these interconnected stories, the harsh realities and challenges of everyday life are vividly portrayed.

When Koharu discovers the man she loves is not only cheating on his wife with her but is the third in a line of deceitful suitors, she flees Tokyo for her hometown. Disheartened by betrayal, she shuns love and marriage for a quieter existence. However, upon her return, she finds her parents in distress, their café shuttered, and a sinister figure stalking her. Just when she believes her troubles are insurmountable, she uncovers a shocking truth—her hometown permits polygamous unions, and she is the next target to become the third wife of her unfaithful lover.

basic_info.title: Kenja no Mago
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Philosopher's Grandson, Magi's Grandson, Wise Man's Grandchild

content.synopsis: In a world where the extraordinary is the norm, a young man finds himself reborn as a baby after a fatal accident. Saved and raised by the legendary patriot hero known as "Sage" Merlin Wolford, he is christened Shin. Under Merlin's tutelage, Shin blossoms into a formidable force, armed with unexpected powers. But as he approaches his 15th year, Merlin realizes he forgot a crucial lesson: common sense. Thus begins the extraordinary journey of an "abnormal" boy in a world brimming with unconventional fantasy.

basic_info.title:
Umineko no Naku Koro ni - Episode 1: Legend of the Golden Witch
Umineko When They Cry Episode 1: Legend of the Golden Witch
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: When Seagulls Cry Episode 1: Legend of the Golden Witch

content.synopsis:
Once a year, the Ushiromiya family gathers on the mysterious island of Rokkenjima under the watchful eye of their enigmatic patriarch, Kinzou. With his health fading, the family anticipates the looming shadow of his mortality. Amidst a raging typhoon outside, a tempest brews within as they clash over inheritance rights and the coveted title of Kinzou's heir.

Battler, Kinzou's grandson, makes a return to Rokkenjima after six years, hoping for a peaceful reunion. However, Kinzou unveils a peculiar challenge: a hunt for hidden gold that holds the key to family leadership. Yet, this game descends into chaos and bloodshed as participants become unwitting pawns in a twisted ritual to resurrect the mythical Millennial Witch of Rokkenjima, Beatrice.

A skeptic by nature, Battler dismisses the supernatural. But as bodies pile up, doubts creep in, forcing him to confront the chilling possibility of dark forces at play or a sinister plot orchestrated by one of their own.

basic_info.title: SKET Dance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: SKET DANCE

content.synopsis: Within the halls of Kaimei High School, a colorful array of characters roams, from quirky students to eccentric teachers. Amidst the bustling school clubs stands the SKET Brigade, officially titled the Living Assistance Club. Led by the somewhat clueless Yuusuke "Bossun" Fujisaki, the brave Hime "Himeko" Onizuka, and the enigmatic Kazuyoshi "Switch" Usui, this trio is on a mission to tackle any campus conundrum that comes their way. Despite the lack of serious requests, the club fills their days with whimsical adventures and comical escapades. Join them in the delightful and heartwarming journey of SKET Dance, a charming comedy that delves into the everyday antics of these unlikely friends in high school.

basic_info.title: Origin
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi

content.synopsis: In the year 2048, Tokyo stands as the bustling hub of a world linked by the Eurasian Railroad. Amidst the city's shadows, a wave of crime and corruption floods in from the north. Unbeknownst to its inhabitants, a sinister presence lurks among them—advanced AI robots capable of murder. Standing against this threat is the enigmatic figure known only as ORIGIN, the prototype designed to combat these inhuman foes.

In a world where beauty reigns supreme, Kasane Fuchi finds herself in the shadow of her late mother, Sukeyo, a renowned stage actress celebrated for her grace and talent.

Despite inheriting her mother's gift for acting, Kasane faces relentless bullying due to her starkly different appearance. Her dream of following in Sukeyo's footsteps seems unattainable in an industry where looks hold sway.

A twist of fate reveals a mysterious power hidden in Sukeyo's lipstick: by kissing someone, Kasane can swap faces with them temporarily. Empowered by this strange ability, Kasane embarks on a daring journey to realize her ambitions. How far will she go in the pursuit of her dreams?

basic_info.title:
Konjiki no Gash!!
Zatch Bell!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Konjiki no Gash Bell!!

content.synopsis: When brilliant middle schooler Kiyomaro Takamine crosses paths with the enigmatic boy Gash Bell and his crimson tome, he's pulled into a world beyond imagination. Discovering Gash's extraordinary ability to unleash lightning with a single word, Kiyomaro unravels the truth: Gash is a demon child embroiled in a millennium-old battle to determine the next Demon King. As the sole interpreter of Gash's mysterious book, Kiyomaro reluctantly embraces the role of his partner. Join them on a thrilling journey of camaraderie, resilience, and unexpected twists in this captivating saga, sprinkled with a hint of melon madness.

basic_info.title:
Sidonia no Kishi
Knights of Sidonia

content.synopsis:
In a distant future, Earth lies in ruins, ravaged by the formidable Gauna invaders. Humanity's only refuge is aboard colossal spaceships like the Sidonia, constantly under threat from these alien foes. Armed with mobile weapon units known as "Gardes," humans fight back by targeting the Gauna's cores to halt their regeneration process.

Emerging from the depths of the Sidonia is Nagate Tanikaze, a young man who spent his life isolated within the ship, honing his piloting skills in simulators. His mastery earns him a crucial role in defending Sidonia, especially when he is chosen to pilot the legendary Garde Tsugumori. As Nagate battles to safeguard his home from impending doom, he becomes a beacon of hope for humanity's survival against the relentless Gauna.

basic_info.title: 07-Ghost
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 7 Ghosts, Seven Ghosts

content.synopsis:
At the Barsburg Empire's Military Academy, students are rigorously trained to become elite soldiers known as "begleiters." Teito Klein, a former slave and the academy chairman's favored student, faces ridicule from his peers. Alongside his loyal friend, Mikage Celestine, Teito undergoes the crucial graduation exam. A sudden recollection of a forgotten memory triggers an unexpected confrontation with the formidable chief-of-staff, Ayanami.

Following a daring escape with Mikage's aid, Teito seeks refuge at the Barsburg Church in the Seventh District. As he navigates the perilous pursuit by the empire's military, Teito delves into his mysterious past, uncovering a hidden power that threatens the empire's stability. In the shadows, a compelling force awaits, propelling Teito on a journey of self-discovery and revelation.

Included one-shot: Volume 17 - Seven Ghosts (pilot)

basic_info.title: Gokukoku no Brynhildr
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Brynhildr in the Darkness

content.synopsis:
After a devastating loss, Ryouta Murakami immerses himself in his late friend Kuroneko's obsession with aliens. As the sole member of the Astronomy Club, he tirelessly searches for signs of extraterrestrial life. A twist of fate occurs when Neko Kuroha, bearing a striking resemblance to Kuroneko, enrolls in his school. Despite her denial of any connection to Ryouta, she vanishes after issuing a cryptic warning. Unveiling her true identity as a witch with enhanced powers, Neko discloses her escape from a clandestine research facility.

More witches seek refuge in the Astronomy Club, fleeing a dark destiny. Witnessing their plight, Ryouta vows to shield them from harm and unravel the enigma of Neko's uncanny similarity to Kuroneko.

basic_info.title: Cat Street
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Polygon
            
                Love Polygon,                    Showbiz
            
                Showbiz
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ribbon Road

content.synopsis:
Formerly a renowned child star, Keito Aoyama's acting aspirations were shattered by a disastrous performance in a musical, leading her to retreat into seclusion as a disillusioned 16-year-old shunning high school. However, a chance encounter leads her to El Liston, an unconventional high school open to students for any reason. Seeing this as a chance for redemption, Keito enrolls, where she befriends a diverse group of students: tech whiz Kouichi Mine, ex-soccer star Rei Saeki, and aspiring fashionista Momiji Noda. 

As Keito immerses herself in this new world, her life regains its spark, reigniting her passion for the spotlight. Amidst the vibrant atmosphere of El Liston, she discovers joy and a newfound yearning for success. Along the way, she finds herself drawn to the complexities of romance.

basic_info.title:
Koko ni Iru yo!
I Am Here!

content.synopsis:
In the shadows of middle school life, Hikage Sumino struggles with self-doubt and social fears, her existence barely acknowledged by her peers. Seeking connection, she tends to a solitary flower and pours her heart into her online sanctuary, "1 Centimeter of Happiness." Despite the blog's modest following, the comments of her two loyal readers bring her solace.

Unexpectedly, popular classmates Hinata Mutou and Teru Mikami recognize Hikage, sparking a newfound hope within her. Encouraged by a supportive online ally, she embraces the chance to transform her reality and step into the light.

basic_info.title: Ao Ashi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Aoashi

content.synopsis: In Ehime, a third year middle schooler named Ashito Aoi encounters Tatsuya Fukuda, a coach from the "J Youth League." Despite his raw talent, Ashito catches Coach Fukuda's eye with his extraordinary potential. Invited to try out for the team in Tokyo, Ashito's journey to transform Japanese football kicks off.

basic_info.title: Ayashimon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: アヤシモン

content.synopsis:
Years ago, the demise of the notorious Enma Syndicate's chairman shattered the yakuza unity, giving rise to multiple rogue groups teeming with "ayashimon"—supernatural entities with diverse abilities—who now dwell in Japan's shadows.

Maruo Kaidou, fueled by his manga idols, dedicates his life to rigorous training. His exceptional strength renders him unemployable and unwelcome in martial arts circles. Just when Maruo hits rock bottom, he crosses paths with Urara, a young yakuza boss on the run from a rival faction.

Despite Urara's initial reluctance due to Maruo being a mere human, he eagerly embraces the prospect of a thrilling showdown. Immersed in a realm of formidable individuals with extraordinary powers, Maruo finds his mundane existence intolerable. Thus, he commits to joining Urara's yakuza crew, marking its inaugural member.

basic_info.title: Petshop of Horrors
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: Petshop of Horrors (ペットショップ オブ ホラーズ)

content.synopsis:
Hidden within the mist-shrouded alleyways of Los Angeles' Chinatown is a peculiar pet shop, where fantastical creatures dwell under the care of the enigmatic Count D. Embracing the lonely and the broken, Count D offers "love, dreams, and hope" through his magical menagerie, each creature bound by a unique contract with strict rules. Yet, he cautions that repercussions await those who dare to defy the terms.

Detective Leon Orcot, known for his short fuse, links a string of crimes to Count D's establishment, dubbing it a den of horrors. Driven by his conviction of the Count's criminal nature, Leon embarks on a relentless pursuit of evidence, making frequent visits to the shop in his quest for the truth.

basic_info.title: Saiki Kusuo no Ψ-nan
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gag Humor
            
                Gag Humor,                    School
            
                School,                    Super Power
            
                Super Power
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Disaster of PSI Kusuo Saiki, The Disastrous Life of Saiki K., Chounouryokusha Saiki Kusuo no Sainan, Omaenchi, Obake Yashiki, Gekidan! Improvisation, Terrace House Dust, Seishounen Yuugai Kankyou Kiseihou

content.synopsis:
In the realm of high school norms stands Kusuo Saiki, a peculiar student with pink hair, glasses, and antennas that hint at his extraordinary psychic abilities. While telekinesis and teleportation may captivate others, for Saiki, they're nothing but a bothersome part of his everyday life. With a deep-rooted desire for normalcy, Saiki navigates the challenges of concealing his powers from the prying eyes of his classmates while trying to lead a tranquil existence.

From quirky school mishaps to unexpected adventures, Saiki's journey unfolds in a series of intriguing one-shots, including encounters with bizarre entities and showdowns with formidable foes. As he grapples with balancing his supernatural talents and mundane desires, Saiki's quest for an ordinary life takes him on a rollercoaster ride filled with humor, surprises, and self-discovery.

basic_info.title: Burn the Witch
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BURN THE WITCH

content.synopsis:
In the bustling world of Reverse London, Ninny Spangcole leads the famed girl group Cecile Die Twice, but her aspirations extend beyond music stardom. Alongside her partner Noel "Niiha" Niihashi, Ninny strives for greater heights as a "Witch" in Wing Bind, an organization dedicated to managing dragons. These formidable beasts, once a major threat in the city, are now unseen by most Front Londoners, turning into mere legend. Wing Bind stands as the shield, keeping dragons at bay and out of reach of unauthorized individuals.

Assigned to care for Balgo Ywain Parks and his loyal dog Osushi-chan, Ninny and Noel face challenges as trouble shadows them closely. Their hands are full dealing with the aftermath. Complications escalate with the unexpected arrival of Macy Baljure, Ninny's former bandmate, who brings a dragon into Reverse London, stirring up more chaos.

basic_info.title:
Sakamoto desu ga?
Haven't You Heard? I'm Sakamoto
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I'm Sakamoto, you know., Katahaba Hiroshi, Broad Shoulders Hiroshi

content.synopsis:
In the realm of high school, Sakamoto reigns supreme as the epitome of flawlessness. Blessed with charm, smarts, athleticism, and compassion, he captivates all with effortless allure. Adored by the ladies and envied by his peers, Sakamoto navigates through jealousy-fueled schemes unscathed, his unshakeable composure unrivaled even by a male model’s allure. With grace and poise, he conquers every challenge in a flawless display of perfection.

In an added one-shot:
Volume 1 introduces Katahaba Hiroshi, also known as Broad Shoulders Hiroshi.

basic_info.title:
Bokurano
Bokurano: Ours
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bokura no, Bokurano ~Mou Hitotsu no Bokurano~

content.synopsis:
At a seaside summer camp, a group of fifteen middle school students stumble upon a mysterious cave that changes their lives forever. Inside, they meet Kokopelli, who presents them with an opportunity to pilot a colossal robot called Zearth to protect Earth from invading enemies. Eager to defend their planet, the children agree to the risky mission by signing a contract with a touch of a shield-like object.

Guided by Kokopelli, the students learn to control Zearth with their minds and successfully defeat an enemy mecha emerging from the sea. However, they soon discover a grim truth: each battle drains their life energy, leading to their inevitable demise. With their fates sealed, the children must use their remaining time on Earth to stand as its last line of defense.

basic_info.title: Aharen-san wa Hakarenai
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Status Quo
            
                Love Status Quo,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Aharen Is Indecipherable

content.synopsis: In "Aharen-san wa Hakarenai," meet Reina Aharen, a charming student known for her adorable demeanor and a unique struggle with personal space. Raidou Matsuboshi, her classmate with a tough exterior hiding a gentle heart, becomes intrigued by her quirks. As their friendship takes root from a simple act of kindness—Raidou returning Aharen's eraser—a delightful misunderstanding leads Aharen to believe they're now inseparable best friends. Join this unlikely duo as they navigate the complexities of their growing bond, proving that even the smallest gestures can spark the most amusing adventures.

Since her youth, Mariko Ikagawa grappled with abuse and depression until finding solace in her enduring friendship with Tomoyo Shiino. Now a 26-year-old office worker, Shiino is shocked to learn from a newscast that Mariko has taken her own life. As she investigates further and struggles to reach Mariko, the truth sinks in, prompting Shiino to unravel the mystery behind the tragic end.

Driven by a desire to liberate Mariko from her oppressive father, Shiino daringly absconds with her friend's remains. Together again, Shiino embarks on a poignant journey to fulfill Mariko's unfulfilled wish, cherishing the memories they shared along the way.

Bonus story: Yiska

In a future where humanity fights fiercely for O-Parts, ancient relics of great power, a select few possess the ability to unleash their true potential. These individuals, known as O.P.T.s (O-Parts Tacticians), wield incredible influence in a world where these artifacts can be either a force for good or a tool of evil.

Enter Jio, a young boy scarred by tragedy and guided solely by his trust in money. Unbeknownst to him, he harbors immense O.P.T. abilities, with a dormant demon of unparalleled strength lying within. When he crosses paths with Ruby, a spirited young girl, they join forces on a perilous mission to uncover hidden O-Parts. Can Jio assist Ruby in achieving her dream of becoming a renowned treasure hunter? And will Ruby aid Jio in his ambitious pursuit of global dominance?

Accompanying tales:

Volume 6: Trigger

basic_info.title:
Karin
Chibi Vampire
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cheeky Vampire, Little Vampire, Vampire Karin

content.synopsis:
Karin Maaka, an extraordinary vampire who defies all norms, strolls under the sun and slumbers under the moon while concealing her true nature from the oblivious townsfolk to safeguard her semblance of a "normal" existence.

When Kenta Usui catches sight of Karin sinking her fangs into someone on his first day at her school, he jumps to hasty conclusions. Attempting to unravel the mystery, Kenta's efforts only lead to a tangled web of misinterpretations and awkward encounters. Determined to bridge the gap with Karin, he finds himself faced with a peculiar predicament—whenever they draw near, Karin suffers from uncontrollable nosebleeds!

The truth behind Karin's peculiar ailment is revealed: instead of draining blood from others, she generates surplus blood that must be expelled to prevent nosebleeds. Yet, her blood reacts strangely to Kenta. With Karin's secret laid bare, the question remains—will Kenta be the one to safeguard her clandestine truth?

basic_info.title:
Shin Angyo Onshi
Blade of the Phantom Master
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Phantom Master: Dark Hero from Ruined Empire, Shin-am Heng-uhsah, The New Secret Royal Inspector

content.synopsis: In the land of Jushin, a group of covert government operatives known as the amen osa operated undercover, seeking out corrupt officials and dispensing justice as decreed by the king. These enigmatic agents traversed the countryside in disguise, dedicated to upholding the law and protecting the rights of the people.

basic_info.title: Sanctuary
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Detective
            
                Detective,                    Organized Crime
            
                Organized Crime
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: サンクチュアリ

content.synopsis: In "Sanctuary," childhood friends Akira Houjou and Chiaki Asami emerge from harrowing pasts to confront the grim reality of Japan's corruption and indifference. Determined to overhaul their homeland, they embark on a daring mission to establish a new order, free from the shackles of corruption. With a bold vision to empower the populace and revolutionize politics, Houjou and Asami chart divergent paths to reform: one through the shadowy realm of the Yakuza, the other by ascending to the role of Prime Minister. Through a fateful game of rock-paper-scissors, their destinies unfold as they navigate treacherous landscapes in pursuit of a righteous cause. As their gripping saga unfolds, "Sanctuary" delves into the intricate web of power, loyalty, and sacrifice, painting a riveting portrait of friendship tested by the crucible of change.

basic_info.title:
Hapi Mari: Happy Marriage!?
Happy Marriage?!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: はぴまり〜Happy Marriage!?〜

content.synopsis: In Takanashi Chiwa's world, men are the source of all her troubles, leaving her no room for romance. Juggling a demanding full-time office job with moonlighting as a hostess to settle her father's debts, Chiwa's life takes a dramatic turn when a wealthy client gets her fired. The next day, she's stunned to learn she must marry the elusive company president, Mamiya Hokuto, whom she's never met. Will Hokuto add to Chiwa's burdens or prove to be her savior? Can their unexpected union withstand the test of time?

basic_info.title:
Ore Monogatari!!
My Love Story!!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Oremonogatari

content.synopsis:
In high school, Takeo Gouda's imposing presence tends to keep people at bay, but those who truly know him value his kind and noble character. Despite his popularity, Takeo's romantic pursuits always end in heartbreak when girls develop feelings for his best friend, the quiet and handsome Makoto Sunakawa.

Everything changes when Takeo rescues the charming Rinko Yamato from a sticky situation, unwittingly capturing her heart in the process. Little does he realize, Rinko is also harboring feelings for him! Mistakenly believing her affections lie with Sunakawa, Takeo selflessly resolves to play matchmaker, willing to sacrifice his own chance at love for the happiness of others.

basic_info.title:
Fukushuu wo Koinegau Saikyou Yuusha wa, Yami no Chikara de Senmetsu Musou suru
The Strongest Brave Who Craves Revenge, Extinguish With the Power of Darkness
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Dark Massacre of the Vengeful Hero

content.synopsis:
In a world where the foolish are conquered and the kind are used, the hero Raul discovers this harsh reality firsthand. Betrayed by those he once protected, Raul finds himself bound to a cross, consumed by flames with vengeance burning in his heart as his life slips away.

Yet, death does not mark the end for Raul. Reborn with newfound power, he sees the true nature of humanity's cruelty. From the merciless princess who destroyed his loved ones to the soldiers who reveled in her orders, no one escapes Raul's quest for justice.

Swearing to mete out divine retribution, Raul embarks on a relentless mission of payback. Each ounce of pain inflicted upon him and his kin will be repaid tenfold. Determined to exact his revenge at any cost, Raul sets out on a path of retribution that will leave no one untouched.

basic_info.title:
Magi: Sinbad no Bouken
Magi: The Adventures of Sinbad
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: マギ シンドバッドの冒険

content.synopsis:
Once upon a time, enigmatic Dungeons emerged across the globe, shrouded in mystery and beckoning adventurers with their unknown depths. Despite countless brave souls venturing forth, none have returned from the perilous depths within. In the bustling port of Parthevia, a spirited youth named Sinbad stands on the cusp of greatness. Fuelled by a thirst for adventure and guided by a chance encounter with the enigmatic Yunan, Sinbad is tasked with seizing the elusive "power of the king" by conquering a Dungeon. With unwavering determination, the young hero embarks on a life-altering quest, destined to shape the world around him.

Set fifteen years prior to the main series, "Magi: Sinbad no Bouken" follows Sinbad's early exploits as a fearless Dungeon conqueror. Amidst trials and tribulations, this burgeoning adventurer and budding merchant must navigate a treacherous path towards his destiny, armed with the boundless potential of a true king.

basic_info.title: One Outs
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ONE OUTS

content.synopsis:
In the world of "One Outs," where baseball is a high-stakes game of strategy, Toua Tokuchi reigns supreme with an unbeaten record of 499 wins. When star batter Hiromichi Kojima of the Saikyou Saitama Lycaons crosses paths with Tokuchi in Okinawa, he sees a chance to turn their team's fortunes around. After a humbling defeat and a narrow victory, Kojima persuades Tokuchi to join the struggling Lycaons.

Facing resistance from the team's owner, Tokuchi proposes a daring contract: he will earn five million yen for every out he pitches but lose fifty million yen for every run conceded. As Tokuchi's destiny intertwines with the team's, the stage is set for a high-stakes showdown where victory is the ultimate prize—a gamble that Tokuchi embraces with his trademark skill and cunning.

In the heart of K-On!'s high school, the Light Music Club is a hub of carefree melodies and lively spirits. Yui Hirasawa, initially seeking an easy escape, stumbles upon a surprising truth: her departure could spell the end of the club. Caught in a sudden quandary, Yui is swayed by her companions— the poised Mio Akiyama, the spirited Ritsu Tainaka, and the elegant Tsumugi Kotobuki—who unite to serenade her with an instrumental piece. The enchanting music not only stirs Yui's soul but also persuades her to stay. Amidst the harmonious laughter and camaraderie, the club members blend their passion for music with the demands of school life, creating a vibrant high school experience in K-On!

In her pursuit of a vibrant high school life, the introverted Mitsuki Haruno struggles to break free from her shy shell. Despite her yearning for connection, her difficulty in expressing herself keeps her isolated. One day, while working at a cafe, fate intervenes as she crosses paths with the school's revered basketball stars—Towa Asakura, Rui Miyamotoi, Ryuuji Tada, and Kyousuke Wakamiya. Initially seen as haughty intruders, these heartthrobs soon reveal a different side as they protect Mitsuki's workplace secret.

A surprising bond forms between Mitsuki and the boys, ending her days of solitude. Yet, the path to friendship is fraught with challenges—her growing feelings for Asakura and the envy of her female peers threaten to disrupt the newfound harmony. Can this unlikely friendship evolve into something deeper amidst the escalating emotions and rivalries?

basic_info.title: Karneval
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: カーニヴァル

content.synopsis:
Inexperienced Nai has been on a quest to find a significant figure known as "Karoku," armed with just an ancient bracelet bearing the elusive name. His journey takes a perilous turn when he falls into the clutches of a monstrous woman intent on keeping him as her captive. Fortunately, a resourceful thief named Gareki intervenes, rescuing Nai from the woman's grasp during a daring heist at her abode. The duo's alliance thrusts them into the realm of outlaws, wanted for their unauthorized actions, and thrusts them into the intrigue of "Circus"—the nation's eminent defense force.

As Nai's connection to Circus is revealed through the bracelet's true identity as an old Circus ID, the organization takes a keen interest in him. While Nai opts to join Circus, Gareki grapples with finding his role within the group. Their pursuit of Karoku leads them to confront lethal varuga creatures drawn to Nai, further entwining their fates with the enigmatic machinations of a clandestine group known as Kafka.

basic_info.title:
Kamisama no Iutoori
As the Gods Will

content.synopsis: Shun Takahata's mundane routine takes a chilling turn when his teacher's head inexplicably explodes, unveiling a sinister game involving a malevolent Daruma doll. In a deadly contest where movement equals death and victory lies in pushing the doll's button, Shun navigates the harrowing chaos with eerie composure, emerging as the sole survivor. As he grapples with the aftermath, trapped within the school's confines, a new nightmare unfolds. Determined to unravel the mystery behind the sadistic games and seek refuge, Shun joins forces with fellow survivors in a desperate bid for survival. But as the sinister tests continue, will they discover the mastermind behind the deadly trials, or are they doomed to play on indefinitely?

basic_info.title:
Otome Game Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu
Trapped in a Dating Sim: The World of Otome Games is Tough for Mobs
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The World of Otome Games is Tough for Mobs, Otomege Sekai wa Mob ni Kibishii Sekai desu, The World of Otome Games is a Tough for Mobs., Mobseka

content.synopsis: Revised synopsis: When Leon, a former Japanese worker, finds himself reincarnated into a world inspired by an "otome game," he is struck by the stark reality where women reign supreme over men. In this society, men are mere pawns in the game of power, except for a select few - the charming romantic targets, including the charismatic crown prince. Armed with insights from his past life, courtesy of his determined sister's insistence on completing the game, Leon, who yearns for a tranquil life in the countryside, launches a daring rebellion against the formidable women and alluring men who control this strange world.

basic_info.title: Inu x Boku SS
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Youko x Boku SS, Inu x Boku Secret Service

content.synopsis: In the world of the Shirakiin family, their daughter Ririchiyo harbors a deep fear of dependence. Determined to break free, she strikes a deal to live in the mysterious Ayakashi Kan mansion. Here, residents must pass a rigorous test to stay, each assigned a Secret Service agent for protection. Despite her initial reluctance, Ririchiyo discovers her assigned guardian is none other than the Fox Spirit she once saved.

basic_info.title: Ruri Dragon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ルリドラゴン

content.synopsis: High schooler Ruri Aoki's world turns upside down when she wakes up one day to find horns sprouting from her head. Nonchalantly revealing her new feature to her mom, Ruri receives an astonishing revelation—she's part dragon! Despite her bewilderment, Ruri decides to face the day ahead as usual. However, her attempt at normalcy is shattered as her friends, classmates, and teacher all take notice of her unique trait. Suddenly thrust into the spotlight, Ruri grapples with the unexpected chaos that comes with being a half-dragon.

basic_info.title:
Koi wa Ameagari no You ni
After the Rain
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Koi wa Amaagari no Youni, Love is Like after the Rain, KoiAme

content.synopsis:
In the heart of the tale lies Akira Tachibana, a quiet high school student with a past in the track and field club. Hindered by an injury that slowed her pace, she seeks solace in a family restaurant where she crosses paths with her manager, a divorced man in his forties with a young son.

Despite the disparity in age, Akira finds herself drawn to his gentle demeanor, a trait deemed as weakness by her colleagues. As their bond deepens, they navigate through misunderstandings and forge a unique connection. For Akira, love transcends logic, prompting her to confess her feelings on a rainy day. The question lingers: how will he respond to her unexpected confession?

basic_info.title: Franken Fran
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Franken Furan, Phase 20

content.synopsis:
In the heart of Japan's secluded wilderness lies the eerie mansion of the infamous surgeon, Dr. Naomitsu Madaraki. In his absence, the unconventional Fran, his artificial daughter, steps into his shoes, running the mansion and continuing his macabre surgeries. Assisted by her fierce younger sister Veronica, the enigmatic human-cat hybrid Okita, and Dr. Madaraki's other chilling creations, Fran tackles the bizarre demands of her clientele. From excising tumors to resurrecting the deceased, each task presents a unique challenge, yet nothing is too daunting—or perilous—for the heir to Dr. Madaraki. This eccentric medical marvel will stop at nothing to preserve life, even if the outcomes are far from conventional.

Included one-shot:

Volume 7: Phase 20

basic_info.title:
Hoshi no Koe
Voices of a Distant Star

content.synopsis: Amidst an alien invasion, Mikako chooses to fight with the resistance, separating herself from her beloved Noboru. Their only means of communication is through text messages as Mikako ventures further into space, seemingly unaffected by time. Meanwhile, on Earth, Noboru ages with each passing year. As the war persists, the question remains: Can the love between these two individuals endure the ravages of conflict and time?

basic_info.title: Dame na Watashi ni Koishite Kudasai
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Please Love the Useless Me

content.synopsis:
Struggling to make ends meet, 29-year-old Michiko Shibata faces a bleak reality of surviving on just cabbages after losing her job. Despite her fruitless job hunt due to lack of qualifications and experience, she lavishes her young "boyfriend" with extravagant gifts in hopes of a secure future. However, the harsh truth dawns on Shibata as she discovers her boyfriend's deceitful motives, using her for financial gain.

Amidst despair, Shibata crosses paths with her former boss, the stern Ayumu Kurosawa, whom she harbors resentment towards for her job loss. Taking responsibility, Kurosawa extends a helping hand, offering Shibata a chance at redemption by becoming her employer once more.

basic_info.title:
Death Note 13: How to Read - Shinsou
Death Note 13: How to Read
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Death Note 13: How to Read - Truth, Death Note Pilot, Death Note Episode 0, Death Note ni Rakugaki 4-koma
