content.synopsis: Discover the enigmatic world of "Death Note 13: How to Read - Shinsou." Within this guidebook lies the secrets of the captivating spin-off series, "Death Note ni Rakugaki 4-koma," and the intriguing pilot one-shot. Explore the depths of this enthralling universe as you delve into its pages.

basic_info.title: 7 Seeds
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Seven Seeds

content.synopsis:
Natsu Iwashimizu's final recollection of her family revolves around sharing cherished meals together. But her reality shifts dramatically when she awakens on a mysterious island named Japan, unaware of the cataclysmic event that reshaped the world. Following a devastating meteorite impact that decimated humanity, the landscape transformed drastically.

In a bid to revive civilization, the government launches the ambitious "7 Seeds" initiative, enlisting five distinct teams—Spring, Summer A, Summer B, Autumn, and Winter—comprising seven resilient youths and a designated guide. Natsu finds herself belonging to the Summer B cohort, branded as societal disappointments.

Tasked with securing vital resources, the group embarks on a quest to locate one of the seven sanctioned shelters. Amidst the harsh terrain and the absence of familiar faces, Natsu and her companions must forge alliances and navigate their way through this inhospitable new world to secure their survival.

basic_info.title:
Hachimitsu to Clover
Honey and Clover
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: HachiKuro, Honey & Clover, Sora no Kotori, Hoshi no Opera, HoneyClo

content.synopsis: In a shabby student apartment, Takemoto frets about his next meat meal and making it to class. Despite being on his own, he's still on the path to maturity. Joined by his quirky pals Morita, Mayama, Yamada, and Hagumi, Takemoto embarks on a journey of self-discovery and life's adventures. Also features one-shots in Volume 10: "Sora no Kotori, Hoshi no Opera."

basic_info.title:
Kamibukuro-kun wa Koishiteru
Mr. Paper Bag Is in Love
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Paperbag-kun Is in Love

content.synopsis:
University student Umi Asagi is the recipient of both gifts and confessions from Kamibukuro-kun, a mysterious figure who hides his face behind a paper bag. Despite his shy nature, Kamibukuro-kun persistently pursues the woman he adores, shadowing her every move. Meanwhile, Umi's best friend sees Kamibukuro-kun as a bothersome stalker. Tensions escalate when her friend threatens Kamibukuro-kun, demanding he stay away from Umi.

Unexpectedly, Kamibukuro-kun disappears, leaving Umi's friend pleased. However, Umi secretly cherishes his presence. As Umi finds herself in a precarious situation, will Kamibukuro-kun emerge to rescue her?

basic_info.title:
Adolf ni Tsugu
Message to Adolf
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tell Adolf, The Stories of Three Adolfs

content.synopsis: In a tale of three Adolfs, Japanese reporter Sohei Toge finds himself in a whirlwind of mystery and tragedy during the 1936 Berlin Olympics. Shocked by his younger brother's sudden murder after sharing a crucial document with him, Sohei is further bewildered to discover that all traces of his brother's existence in Germany have been meticulously erased. Across the world in Japan, the paths of two young boys, Adolf Kauffmann and Adolf Kamil, converge unexpectedly with the unfolding events. Bound by fate and linked by the enigmatic figure of the third Adolf—Adolf Hitler—their lives are forever changed by secrets too immense to comprehend.

basic_info.title: Rookies
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ROOKIES

content.synopsis:
Professor Kawato steps into the notorious halls of Futagotamaga High School as the fresh face in the Japanese teaching department. His arrival sets the stage for a remarkable journey with the school's baseball club, a group of troublemakers and rebels who have just returned from a year-long suspension following a chaotic brawl at a match.

With their interests confined to women, smoking, and idling away their time, the club members seem adrift. That is until Professor Kawato ignites a spark within them, introducing a new aspiration - the prestigious Koushien tournament. But the path to Koushien is riddled with challenges. The club must whip themselves back into shape, master the art of baseball, and earn the trust of a skeptical school community, including the skeptical principal and faculty.

Through sweat and determination, the baseball club begins a transformative journey towards their dreams, fueled by Kawato's unconventional and inspiring methods. As they navigate the hurdles ahead, the club not only discovers their true strength but also witnesses a shift in the attitudes of those around them.

basic_info.title: Moe Kare!!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Double Prince, Moe Boyfriend, Moe Boys

content.synopsis: In the bustling world of high school, Wakamiya Hikaru, a 15-year-old with a penchant for shoujo manga and a desire for a protective boyfriend, finds herself entangled in a whirlwind of unexpected events. A chance encounter with the enigmatic "Perverted Prince" leaves her reeling after a surprising kiss. But when a doppelgänger bearing a striking resemblance appears, with only the eyes as a telling difference, Hikaru is left questioning the mysterious connections that bind them. What secrets lie beneath this intriguing twist of fate?

On an ordinary day, high school students Ie and Kazu find themselves trapped in a sinister nightmare. A mysterious gas fills the bus they're on, causing them to lose consciousness. When they awaken, they are horrified to discover they are on a truck filled with frozen human bodies being dismembered by living staff. Surrounded by this chilling scene, they must unravel the mystery of their whereabouts and find a way to escape this macabre ordeal.

basic_info.title: Soredemo Sekai wa Utsukushii
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sore demo Sekai wa Utsukushii, Even So, the World is Beautiful, The World Is Still Beautiful, SoreSeka

content.synopsis: In the kingdom where she controls the rain, Princess Nike embarks on a journey to wed Sun King Livius of the Sun Kingdom, a young ruler who swiftly conquered the world. To her surprise, the powerful king is just a child. Their union takes an unexpected turn when Livius demands Nike's rain-summoning abilities for his own whims.

basic_info.title:
Kitchen no Ohimesama
Kitchen Princess
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Gourmet
            
                Gourmet,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis:
Najika Kazami adores everything about food, from savoring it to creating culinary delights. Her heart is deeply tied to Lavender House, the orphanage in Hokkaido run by the caring Hagio. Despite the love she receives from Hagio and her fellow orphans, Najika makes a bold choice to depart for a prestigious academy in Tokyo, driven by her ambition to master the art of pastry.

Yet, there's a hidden motive behind Najika's decision—to track down the boy she fondly remembers as the "Flan Prince," who left a lasting impression on her with a cup of flan years ago. At 13, Najika discovers a clue linking the mysterious boy to the emblem on a spoon, leading her to the renowned Seika Academy.

Filled with anticipation, Najika steps into the enchanting campus of Seika as a new student in the junior high division. Despite facing initial rejection from her peers due to her love for indulging in meals, she finds unexpected allies in the form of the talented Kitazawa brothers, Daichi and Sora. Can Najika carve out her niche at the academy through her culinary skills, and possibly rekindle her connection with the elusive Flan Prince?

basic_info.title: Gigant
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: GIGANT

content.synopsis: Rei Yokoyamada is a high school student with big dreams, fueled by his father's work in the film industry. Encouraged by his friends, he embarks on a journey to create his own short film. However, his plans take an unexpected turn when he stumbles upon tabloid notices revealing that the adult film star Papico resides in his neighborhood. In a twist of fate, Rei crosses paths with Papico while trying to protect her privacy. Unbeknownst to him, this encounter sets off a chain of events that lead Papico into a bizarre and supernatural phenomenon—transforming her into a giantess.

basic_info.title:
Sora wa Akai Kawa no Hotori
Red River
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Anatolia Story, Heaven by the Red River, Orontes Renka, Orontes Love Song, Where the Sky and the Red River meet

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, Yuri, an ordinary teenager, finds herself catapulted from modern times to the ancient Hittite empire in Anatolia. There, a power-hungry queen plots to sacrifice her in a bid to secure the throne solely for her son. Prince Kail steps in just in time to rescue Yuri from the clutches of the queen. Despite Kail's vow to return Yuri home, the queen's relentless pursuit to eliminate them and the blossoming bond between Yuri and Kail continually thwart their escape plans. Volume 28: Orontes Renka.

basic_info.title:
Hyouryuu Kyoushitsu
The Drifting Classroom
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 漂流教室

content.synopsis:
In the gripping tale penned by horror maestro Kazuo Umezu, we meet Shou Takamatsu, a sixth grader known for his rebellious ways and reluctance to embrace maturity. But everything changes in an instant when a mysterious earthquake strikes during a seemingly ordinary school day, whisking Shou and his classmates away to a desolate wasteland, cut off from civilization.

Now faced with a dire scarcity of food and a slew of unforeseen dangers, Shou must navigate the treacherous landscape alongside his peers, all while internal conflicts brew among the stranded students. As the adults falter in adapting to their new reality, Shou shoulders the weight of responsibility to swiftly mature in order to survive the harsh dystopian world they find themselves trapped in.

Hyouryuu Kyoushitsu unfolds as a revered classic in the horror genre, masterfully blending the suspenseful mystery of their confinement with the relentless struggle for existence that Shou and his companions must endure.

basic_info.title:
Watashi no Ookami-kun
That Wolf-Boy Is Mine!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis: In Tokyo, Kusonoki Komugi struggles to connect with her classmates while living with her mother. However, when her mother goes on a business trip, she is forced to spend a year with her father in Hokkaido. Hoping for a fresh start, she finds herself seated next to Ookami Yuu, a charming boy who notices her pleasant scent. As their friendship blossoms, Komugi stumbles upon a surprising secret about Yuu that changes everything.

basic_info.title: Renai Boukun
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Love Tyrant

content.synopsis:
Seiji Aino's mundane life takes a bizarre turn when a mysterious girl named Guri appears at his doorstep, claiming she'll perish unless he plants a kiss on someone. Brushing off the odd encounter as religious zealotry, Seiji makes a hasty exit, only to witness Guri's ability to walk through closed doors!

Armed with a potent "Kiss Note," Guri can spark instant love between individuals listed in it. Playing the role of cupid, she accidentally inscribes Seiji's name, compelling him to find a partner for a smooch.

Stunned by the fantastical tale, Seiji locks lips with his crush, the school's belle, Akane Hiyama. But Akane's infatuation escalates into an unhealthy fixation on him. Adding to the chaos, Guri declares her own affection for Seiji, setting the stage for his uproarious and tumultuous romantic escapades. Can either girl capture Seiji's heart, or will personal entanglements derail their romantic aspirations?

basic_info.title:
Aishiteru Game wo Owarasetai
I Want to End This Love Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Want to End the "I Love You" Game, I Want to End the Game That I Love, I Want to End the Game of Love.

content.synopsis:
In sixth grade, Yukiya Asagi and Miku Sakura, childhood friends from Cherry Blossom Town, devised a playful game where they aim to outwit each other by uttering "I love you." Fast forward four years to their high school days, and the spirited rivalry continues. Yet, as emotions stir within them, the once lighthearted game transcends into something deeper.

With each day, the desire to transition from friends to something more intensifies. Both Yukiya and Miku grapple with their growing affections, reluctant to take the leap and uncertain of what awaits once their game of words transforms into something more profound.

basic_info.title:
Boku wa Tomodachi ga Sukunai
Haganai: I Don't Have Many Friends
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 僕は友達が少ない

content.synopsis: Kodaka Hasegawa is just trying to navigate his school life when he stumbles upon the cute yet perpetually irritable Yozora Mikazuki, engaged in animated conversations with herself. Their quest for friendship leads to the formation of a unique club, spearheaded by Yozora's flair for dramatic gestures. As other reluctant but endearing girls join their ranks, they embark on various adventures like playing galgames, swimming, and even performing on stage. Can Kodaka, unwittingly drawn into this whirlwind, forge genuine connections with his newfound companions? Witness the birth of a bittersweet yet captivating tale of youthful romance, where imperfections only add to the charm.

basic_info.title: Hitoribocchi no ○○ Seikatsu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hitoribocchi no Marumaru Seikatsu, Hitori Bocchi's ○○ Lifestyle

content.synopsis: In the midst of her intense social anxiety, Hitori Bocchi faces a daunting challenge as she enters middle school without her only friend, Yawara Kai, by her side. Struggling to communicate with others, Bocchi resorts to extreme measures and excels at avoiding social interactions. Her solitude fuels her confidence, yet she battles physical ailments like leg cramps and nausea when overwhelmed. Now, she must navigate a sea of unfamiliar faces and forge new friendships to regain Kai's companionship.

basic_info.title: Gakuen Babysitters
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Childcare
            
                Childcare,                    Iyashikei
            
                Iyashikei,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: School Babysitters

content.synopsis:
Ryuuichi Kashima has always been responsible for his younger brother Kotarou, as their parents are frequently away. Tragedy strikes when the Kashimas perish in a plane crash, leaving the brothers orphaned. Stepping in, Youko Morinomiya, a grieving widow who lost her own son and daughter-in-law in the same accident, offers to care for Ryuuichi and Kotarou until they come of age. To Ryuuichi's surprise, he is granted admission to the school where Youko is the chairwoman, under the condition that he joins the "babysitting club" - a group dedicated to looking after the professors' children.

Although Ryuuichi starts off unsure about his new role, with the support of his classmate Hayato Kamitani and other club members, he embarks on a series of heartwarming and exciting adventures with the children under their care.

basic_info.title:
Tondemo Skill de Isekai Hourou Meshi
Campfire Cooking in Another World with My Absurd Skill
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Gourmet
            
                Gourmet
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Regarding the Display of an Outrageous Skill Which Has Incredible Powers

content.synopsis:
In the realm of a majestic kingdom, Tsuyoshi Mukouda, a 27-year-old, finds himself whisked away to a mystical land along with three other champions. Tasked with saving the kingdom from an enigmatic menace, Tsuyoshi realizes he was summoned by a twist of fate. His singular talent? "Online Supermarket," a power that grants him access to a virtual marketplace brimming with delectable, modern-day Japanese cuisine.

Cast out of the royal court, Tsuyoshi embarks on a solitary journey in this unfamiliar universe. Yet, his gift for preparing extraordinary dishes foreign to this realm proves invaluable, even catching the attention of the legendary wolf, Fenrir. Enchanted by Tsuyoshi's culinary creations, Fenrir forges a pact with him, becoming his loyal companion. With the mythical wolf by his side, Tsuyoshi embraces the roles of both a merchant and an adventurer, traversing the lands and crafting tantalizing feasts that leave the locals spellbound.

basic_info.title:
Gunnm: Last Order
Battle Angel Alita: Last Order
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi

content.synopsis:
In the aftermath of an explosion orchestrated by Desty Nova, Gally encounters a resurrection in the bustling city of Tiphares under the cunning scientist's hand. Amidst the turmoil of a civil war sparked by the revelation of brain biochips, the artificial substitutes for human brains, Gally delves into the floating city's strife. To quell the violence, she allies with Nova's eclectic ensemble comprising Elf, Zwölf, the combat android Sechs, and the repair robot Deckman 100.

Tiphares' tumult is merely a fragment of a mysterious star system awaiting Gally's exploration. Seeking truths about her enigmatic past, she embarks with her companions on a cosmic odyssey that promises to reshape the destiny of humanity.

basic_info.title:
Tougen Anki
Tougen Anki: Legend of the Cursed Blood
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tougen Anki: Dark Demon of Paradise

content.synopsis:
In a world where individuals with Momotarou and Oni lineage clash in an age-old feud, the reckless and defiant teenager, Shiki Ichinose, stands at the center of chaos. With Oni beings running amok, the Momotarou act as guardians of humanity, striving to contain the unruly forces.

Shiki, known for his rebellious streak and expulsion from school, finds himself under the care of his foster father, Tsuyoshi. Unbeknownst to Shiki, Tsuyoshi harbors a secret—he is a Momotarou who has been shielding Shiki from his own Oni heritage. When Tsuyoshi sacrifices himself to protect Shiki, the truth unravels, triggering Shiki's transformation into a vengeful monster fueled by his dormant Oni blood.

Caught in a whirlwind of rage and newfound powers, Shiki's path crosses with Naito Mudano, an Oni teacher at the Rakshasa Academy. Tasked with honing his abilities and taming his inner demon, Shiki must reconcile with his dual nature, confront his impulsive tendencies, and ultimately, face the demons within himself.

basic_info.title: Basara
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Legend of Basara

content.synopsis:
In a future Japan ravaged by a catastrophic event, the emperor and his four sons rule with an iron grip, awaiting the prophesied "Child of Destiny" who can break their hold over the land. Sarasa, twin sister to Tatara, the rightful chosen one, stands by her brother until tragedy strikes. When the emperor's youngest son, the Red King, slaughters their village and kills Tatara, Sarasa assumes her brother's identity to avenge his death.

Struggling with the weight of her new role, Sarasa seeks solace at a hot spring, where she crosses paths with Shuri, a captivating and enigmatic young man. Their encounter sparks a connection that transcends the chaos around them, binding them together in a destiny woven with war, enmity, and an unexpected love that defies the turmoil of their time.

basic_info.title:
Ookami Kodomo no Ame to Yuki
Wolf Children: Ame & Yuki

content.synopsis: Embark on a heartfelt journey spanning 13 years, following the life of 19-year-old college student Hana. Witness her enchanting encounter and deep, fairy tale-like love story with a mysterious "wolf man." As their union blossoms, Hana becomes a mother to two extraordinary children: Yuki, the elder sister born on a snowy day, and Ame, the younger brother born during a rainy downpour. Together, they lead a discreet existence in a hidden corner of the city, concealing their unique identity. Tragedy strikes when the wolf man passes away, prompting Hana to make a life-altering decision to relocate to a remote rural town, far from prying eyes. Join this family as they navigate love, loss, and the trials of embracing their extraordinary heritage.

basic_info.title:
Kono Subarashii Sekai ni Shukufuku wo!
KonoSuba: God's Blessing on This Wonderful World!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy

content.synopsis:
In a twist of fate, 16-year-old Kazuma Satou meets an untimely demise in a bizarre yet comical accident. Upon his unexpected passing, he encounters Aqua, the self-proclaimed water goddess, offering him a choice between ascending to heaven or being reborn in a fantastical realm. Opting for the latter, Kazuma's new mission is to vanquish the Demon King, a looming threat in this unfamiliar world. However, Aqua's sassy demeanor sparks a clash, leading Kazuma to impulsively drag her along on his quest.

Venturing forth in this strange land, Kazuma and Aqua are joined by two more comrades: Megumin, a powerful archwizard armed with explosive magic; and Lalatina "Darkness" Dustiness Ford, a masochistic crusader. Together, this mismatched quartet forms an unconventional party, each member contributing their own blend of skills and quirks. Yet, as they face daunting challenges and mounting costs on their adventure, Kazuma realizes that his new life may prove to be more of a headache than he ever imagined.

basic_info.title: Durarara!!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: DRRR!!

content.synopsis:
In the vibrant and bustling streets of Tokyo's lively Ikebukuro district, 15-year-old student Mikado Ryuugamine steps into the whirlwind of city life, eager to embrace its pulse. Beyond his prior online glimpses, he learns of Ikebukuro's fabled legend: the enigmatic "Black Rider," a headless biker dispensing its own brand of justice.

Yet Ikebukuro's eccentricities run deeper; rival color gangs, including the mysterious Dollars with its anonymous members and shadowy leader, fuel endless clashes. As eerie stories materialize and the line blurs between reality and myth, Mikado is drawn into a realm of intrigue, deception, and orchestrated chaos. In this perilous but enticing landscape, he may find a place he never knew he belonged.

basic_info.title: Taishou Otome Otogibanashi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Taishou Maiden Fairytale

content.synopsis:
Tamahiko Shima, the youngest scion of the esteemed and opulent Shima dynasty, has known only wealth and privilege. Yet, his heart aches for the warmth and closeness absent in his family's lofty halls.

Tragedy strikes when a fateful accident claims his mother and his very strength, leaving him broken and forsaken by his own father. Banished to a solitary existence in the rural expanse, Tamahiko embraces a future of solitude—until a radiant young woman named Yuzuki Tachibana arrives, bearing an unexpected proposal from his father.

As Yuzuki tends to Tamahiko, a gentle breeze of hope unfurls in his desolate world, guiding him on a path towards healing the wounds of his past. Bound by the tender thread of newfound love, Tamahiko and Yuzuki embark on a journey where their destinies converge in the tender bloom of their affection.

basic_info.title: Hanma Baki
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Grappler Baki - Son of Ogre

content.synopsis:
After 18 relentless years of pushing his body to the brink, Baki Hanma is on the brink of confronting his father, Yuujirou, in the ultimate showdown. With a bold challenge thrown down for the title of "World's Strongest," Baki embarks on a rigorous training regime. His quest leads him to face formidable opponents like the renowned "Unchained" bounty hunter Biscuit Olivia and the ancient warrior Pickle, resurrected from the Mesozoic era.

Yuujirou, the formidable "Ogre," watches his son's progress with a sinister eagerness, viewing Baki as a delectable morsel awaiting his consumption. Yet, atop the mountain of strength, Yuujirou yearns for a worthy adversary to test his might. Despite his disdain for Baki, a glimmer of hope stirs within Yuujirou, longing for his son to rise up and provide the challenge he craves.

As Baki delves into his father's formidable legacy, Yuujirou grapples with his complex emotions toward his son. The Hanma duo hurtles towards a climactic battle that will determine once and for all who truly holds the title of the "World's Strongest."

basic_info.title:
Futari Ashita mo Sorenari ni
It Takes Two Tomorrow, Too
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Two Gets by Tomorrow Too, More or Less

content.synopsis: After a year and three months of dating, the composed Yuuya Aida invites his stunning girlfriend Rio Aihara to share his home. Juggling hectic work lives and an age gap, their unwavering love is evident in playful squabbles over desserts and heartfelt talks about their future. Despite their nerves and shyness, Yuuya and Rio's endearing interactions mirror the bliss and excitement of genuine romantic devotion, reminding them of the early days of their relationship.

basic_info.title: Rikudou
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: リクドウ

content.synopsis:
Following the tragic death of his abusive father, the young Riku Azami finds himself under the care of his mother, who is in a tumultuous relationship with a dangerous yakuza member. A fateful altercation leads Riku to defend himself, resulting in a fatal confrontation with his mother's partner.

Recognizing Riku's fighting prowess, Kyousuke Tokorozawa, a former boxer and yakuza, guides him into the world of boxing. Driven by past trauma and a newfound purpose, Riku embraces the sport wholeheartedly. Amidst his stoic facade, Riku uncovers motivations worth fighting for, including his loyal childhood friend, Yuki Naeshiro.

After rigorous training at the renowned Baba Boxing Gym, Riku nurtures a burning ambition to ascend to the pinnacle of boxing. Now a seasoned 18-year-old pugilist, Riku sets his sights on clinching the esteemed Oriental and Pacific Boxing Federation title, determined to carve his name as a boxing legend.

basic_info.title: RWBY
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ruby

content.synopsis:
In the fantastical realm of Remnant, humans and Faunus coexist amidst the constant looming threat of Grimm monsters. Skilled Huntsmen and Huntresses, armed with personalized weapons and mystical Semblances, bravely confront these creatures fueled by the essence of their souls. Harnessing the power of Dust, a crystallized energy source, these warriors imbue their weapons with elemental might. Survival in this perilous profession demands rigorous training, prompting the establishment of specialized academies across Remnant to nurture aspiring Huntsmen.

At Beacon Academy in the Kingdom of Vale, the dynamic quartet of Ruby Rose, Weiss Schnee, Blake Belladonna, and Yang Xiao Long form Team RWBY, showcasing their diverse backgrounds and clashing personalities. Yet, when united, they emerge as a formidable unit catching the eye of the esteemed Headmaster Ozpin. Alongside allies like Team JNPR, the talented Ruby and her companions embark on thrilling escapades that pit them against the radical Faunus faction, the White Fang. Each high-stakes confrontation draws them nearer to the enigmatic masterminds orchestrating sinister schemes in the shadows.

basic_info.title:
Samurai Deeper Kyou
Samurai Deeper Kyo
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: SDK

content.synopsis: In the turbulent aftermath of Japan's civil wars in the 17th century, the legendary Battle of Sekigahara unfolds, marking the rise of a mysterious figure known as 'the unconquerable.' Kyoshiro, a gentle medicine vendor concealing a deadly past, partners with a spirited bounty hunter to track down a killer and unravel the dark truths hidden within his own enigmatic heritage. Join them on a gripping journey across Japan as they confront destiny and deceit in the quest for redemption.

basic_info.title:
Historie
Historié
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ヒストリエ

content.synopsis: Renowned for his strategic prowess, Alexander the Great's trusted companion, Eumenes, navigated a tumultuous path to prominence. While Alexander's legacy shines brightly, Eumenes' remarkable journey remains in the shadows. Through resilience and intellect, Eumenes journeyed far and wide, forging alliances with the era's most eminent figures. Discover the captivating tale of Eumenes, whose rise to power was fueled by unwavering determination and unwavering will.

basic_info.title:
Amaama to Inazuma
Sweetness and Lightning
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Gourmet
            
                Gourmet,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life

content.synopsis:
After losing his wife, high school teacher Kouhei Inuzuka struggles to cook for his daughter Tsumugi. Their reliance on convenience store food changes when they meet his shy student Kotori Iida during a flower-viewing outing. Moved by Tsumugi's attempt to eat her lunch, Kotori invites them to her mother's restaurant.

Desperate to give Tsumugi a homemade meal, Kouhei surprises Kotori at the restaurant one night. Together, they navigate the kitchen and create a simple dish. Discovering Kotori's loneliness at dinnertime, Kouhei vows to share meals with her and Tsumugi. Thus begins a heartwarming journey of bonding over food and forging new connections.

basic_info.title:
Hana-kun to Koisuru Watashi
When We're in Love

content.synopsis: In a high school full of contrasts, diligent class president Nanase Sakashita finds an unexpected connection with the rebellious loner, Hana-kun, after he comes to her rescue. As they form an unlikely bond, Nanase sets out to guide Hana-kun back on track academically, while he introduces her to a world beyond textbooks. Can these opposites bridge the gap between them and discover a common ground?

basic_info.title:
Danshi Koukousei no Nichijou
The Daily Lives of High School Boys
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Joshikousei wa Ijou

content.synopsis: Sanada North High School hosts three typical boys - Tadakuni, Hidenori Tabata, and Yoshitake Tanaka - embroiled in everyday high school antics. Instead of pursuing romance or sports glory, the trio dives into trying on skirts, making the most of summer break, and engaging in deep conversations by the riverside with a lovestruck companion. Their contrasting personalities collide, setting the stage for a series of amusing and relatable events that capture the whimsical essence of high school life.

Meet Beni, a spirited rebel who's unafraid of risking it all just to defy her haughty father. When fate brings her face to face with Kagetora, a ninja plummeting from the heavens, pledging unwavering allegiance to her as her protector, her world turns upside down. Kagetora, a warrior from a distant era, has traveled through time to safeguard Princess Beni at all costs. Unbeknownst to Kagetora, the Beni he serves isn't the royal he expects. Can love and loyalty endure across centuries in a madcap contemporary setting?

basic_info.title:
Hana yori Dango
Boys Over Flowers
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: HYD, Boys Over Flowers: Jewelry Box, End of the Century

content.synopsis: Tsukushi Makino, a determined girl from humble beginnings, finds herself navigating the exclusive world of Eitoku Academy, a prestigious institution for the elite. Surrounded by the affluent and privileged students, known as the "Flower" Four (F4), Tsukushi stands out as the school's resilient "weed." The enigmatic leader of the F4, Tsukasa Domyoji, scion of Japan's wealthiest dynasty, becomes intrigued by Tsukushi's independence and refusal to bow to his status. Despite Tsukasa's initial brash demeanor and intimidating reputation, Tsukushi remains steadfast in her own aspirations, even as her heart yearns for another. In this captivating tale, Volume 1 delves into the complex dynamics of power, love, and defiance at the cusp of a new century.

basic_info.title:
Kimetsu no Yaiba Gaiden
Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba - Stories of Water and Flame
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kimetsu no Yaiba: Tomioka Giyuu Gaiden, Kimetsu no Yaiba: Rengoku Kyoujurou Gaiden, Kimetsu no Aima!

content.synopsis: Explore the riveting tales of "Kimetsu no Yaiba: Tomioka Giyuu Gaiden" and "Kimetsu no Yaiba: Rengoku Kyoujurou Gaiden" as they delve into the captivating world of demon slayers. Join them on their courageous journeys filled with action, loyalty, and the eternal battle between good and evil. For those seeking a lighter touch, "Kimetsu no Aima!" offers a delightful spin-off to the beloved series.

basic_info.title:
Itou Junji no Neko Nikki: Yon & Muu
Junji Ito's Cat Diary: Yon & Mu

content.synopsis:
Renowned horror manga creator Junji Itou revels in the pristine beauty of his new home: the spotless white walls, the gleaming floors, the fresh scent. Yet, his joy is short-lived when his fiancée, A-ko, announces her plan to introduce her cat Yon into their pristine sanctuary. Junji, a devoted dog lover, shudders at the memory of Yon's eerie appearance with what seems like a skull pattern on his fur. Matters escalate when A-ko decides to bring in another cat, Muu, to keep Yon company, leaving Junji apprehensive about the chaos that may ensue.

As Yon and Muu enter the scene, the once immaculate walls are shielded with protective coverings, the floors bear scratches, and the air is heavy with the scent of a litter box. Surprisingly, the two felines quickly bond and even manage to win over Junji. Their growing closeness leads the artist to reconsider his initial dread of living with cats, suggesting that perhaps sharing his space with them isn't as dreadful as he had feared.

basic_info.title:
Seishun Buta Yarou wa Bunny Girl Senpai no Yume wo Minai
Rascal Does Not Dream of Bunny Girl Senpai

content.synopsis:
While at the local library, Sakuta Azusagawa stumbles upon a surprising sight—a bunny girl gracefully wandering the halls. To his amazement, he discovers that this mysterious bunny girl is none other than his famous upperclassman, Mai Sakurajima. The twist? Only Sakuta possesses the ability to see her.

Drawn by curiosity and compassion, Sakuta dives headfirst into helping Mai with her peculiar invisibility predicament. As he unravels the layers of her enigmatic issue, memories of his own past struggles and his sister's challenges surface. All these are linked to the enigmatic "Adolescence Syndrome," a supernatural phenomenon that twists the fates of teenagers in inexplicable ways.

With Mai's condition deteriorating, Sakuta races against time to unearth the cause behind her fading presence from the public eye. Will he unlock the key to Mai's vanishing act before it's too late for her to reclaim her visibility and place in the world?

basic_info.title:
Alive: Saishuu Shinkateki Shounen
Alive: The Final Evolution

content.synopsis: In the bustling world of high school, 16-year-old Taisuke Kanou navigates life with his loyal friends, Hirose and Megumi. While Hirose grapples with bullies, Taisuke valiantly stands by his side, facing the brunt of the attacks. A peculiar incident during class exposes Taisuke to a cosmic revelation, momentarily unveiling the mysteries of the universe to him. On his way home, a tragic event unfolds as he witnesses a girl's fatal fall, triggering an unexpected emotion within him—jealousy. Soon, he discovers this unearthly phenomenon spreading across Japan, driving individuals to either self-destruct or undergo a transformative "evolution." However, those who evolve harbor sinister motives, casting a shadow over the fate of the world.

basic_info.title:
Brutal: Satsujin Keisatsukan no Kokuhaku
Brutal: Criminals the Law Can't Judge Deserve the Finest Death.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Brutal: Satsujin Kansatsukan no Kokuhaku, Brutal: Confessions of a Homicide Investigator

content.synopsis:
In the bustling city, Detective Hiroki Dan is known for his charm, success, and sharp skills. With each case cracked, he adds another triumph to his record. Yet, despite his accomplishments, Hiroki grapples with the limitations of the law enforcement system. When he encounters criminals slipping through the cracks of justice, he embarks on a personal crusade.

Driven by a code of retribution, Hiroki metes out his brand of justice to those who evade the law, balancing the scales one dark deed at a time.

basic_info.title: Baby Steps
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ベイビーステップ

content.synopsis: In the bustling halls of the school, Maruo Eiichirou, a diligent first-year student, comes to a realization - he yearns for change and craves physical activity. A chance encounter with a Tennis Club flyer sets his path in motion. Despite his lack of athletic prowess, Eiichirou is drawn into the world of tennis with unwavering determination and intellect as his allies. Join him on a transformative journey fueled by grit and passion as he navigates the challenges of the court.

In the heart of Tokyo, the indomitable Baki Hanma, a young fighting prodigy, pushes his physical limits to challenge his fearsome father, Yuujirou Hanma. Despite the monotony of high school life, Baki finds solace in his blossoming romance with Kozue Matsumoto. However, tranquility shatters as five deadly death row escapees unleash chaos in the city, showcasing their brutal strength.

To counter this menacing threat, Baki joins forces with yakuza Kaoru Hanayama, rival Retsu Kaiou, mentor Doppo Orochi, and jujitsu master Gouki Shibukawa. United in their mission, these warriors vow to confront and defeat the notorious criminals. Amidst the turmoil, Baki must also shield Kozue from these malevolent foes while striving to earn his father's recognition. The stage is set for a gripping showdown where strength, loyalty, and love are put to the ultimate test.

basic_info.title:
Barajou no Kiss
Kiss of the Rose Princess
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kiss of the Rose Maiden

content.synopsis:
Since her childhood, Anís Yamamoto has always worn a protective talisman from her father—a black choker with a silver rose. But as a first-year student at Shoubi Academy, the talisman feels more like a curse, drawing unwanted attention. When a bat-like creature collides with Anís and her choker mysteriously vanishes, she embarks on a frantic search.

In her quest, Anís discovers her true identity as the Rose Princess, with four Rose Knights at her command: Kaede Higa, the fiery Red Rose; Mitsuru Tenjou, the stalwart White Rose; Seiran Asagi, the mystical Blue Rose; and Mutsuki Kurama, the enigmatic Black Rose. These handsome, popular boys hold unique magical powers that Anís can summon with a simple kiss to their corresponding cards.

basic_info.title:
22-26: Fujimoto Tatsuki Tanpenshuu
Tatsuki Fujimoto Before Chainsaw Man: 22-26
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Little Sister's Elder Sister, Ningyo Rhapsody, Siren Rhapsody, Mermaid Rhapsody, Me ga Sametara Onnanoko ni Natteita Yamai, When I Woke up I Had Become a Girl Disease, Woke-Up-as-a-Girl Syndrome, Yogen no Nayuta, Nayuta of the Prophecy, Imouto no Ane, Little Sister's Elder Sister, Sisters

content.synopsis: In the mesmerizing tale of "Mermaid Rhapsody," we follow the intriguing journey of "Woke-Up-as-a-Girl Syndrome" as the protagonist navigates through the mysterious prophecy of "Nayuta of the Prophecy." Along the way, the bond between "Sisters" adds layers of complexity to the unfolding narrative. A captivating blend of fantasy and reality awaits in this enchanting story.

basic_info.title:
Tsuyokute New Saga
New Saga
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Be Stronger! New Saga

content.synopsis: After defeating the Demon Lord, hero Kyle Lenard and his companions have brought peace to the land, but at a great cost. As the land lies in ruin and most heroes have perished, a gravely injured Kyle finds himself the sole survivor. Struggling against his fading strength, Kyle unknowingly triggers a mysterious artifact that transports him back in time to a period before the demonic onslaught. With a newfound opportunity, Kyle joins forces with his friends Seran and Riize. Together, they must gather allies and leverage Kyle's foreknowledge to ready the world for an impending war unbeknownst to all.

basic_info.title: Otomen
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Glass no Otomen: Sen no Kamen wo Motsu Otomen, Love-Tic

content.synopsis:
In a world where Asuka Masamune is a young man torn between his love for all things cute and his duty to embody manliness, a chance encounter with transfer student Ryo Miyakozuka sets his heart ablaze. Asuka, a kendo champion suppressing his softer side, is intrigued by Ryo's tough exterior and fiery spirit.

Opposites in every way, Asuka and Ryo find themselves drawn together, sparking a journey of self-discovery and unexpected romance. With the help of his friend Juta Tachibana, Asuka navigates the complexities of friendship, love, and embracing his true identity as an "otomen."

As their bond deepens, Asuka must confront his past and embrace his passions, all while navigating the delicate dance of young love. Join them in this captivating tale of finding courage, acceptance, and the true meaning of being an "otomen." 

Included one-shots: 

Volume 10: Glass no Otomen: Sen no Kamen wo Motsu Otomen 

Volume 11: Love-Tic

basic_info.title: Opus
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Satoshi Kon's Opus

content.synopsis:
In the thrilling conclusion to his manga series "Resonance," mangaka Chikara Nagai faces a daunting decision: to kill off the beloved character Lin in a shocking twist. Struggling with negative feedback from his editor, Nagai embarks on a sleepless night to illustrate the final moments of his creation.

In a haze of exhaustion, Nagai stumbles upon the rebellious Lin fleeing with the pivotal manga spread depicting his demise. Before he can comprehend the situation, Nagai is whisked away into the very world he crafted, where he joins forces with the heroine, Satoko Miura, in a battle against the menacing "The Masque." Lost between realms, Nagai and Satoko must rewrite the narrative to secure an escape route back to reality.

basic_info.title:
Aishiteruze Baby★★
Aishiteruze Baby
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Love You, Baby

content.synopsis:
High school heartbreaker Kippei Katakura has a reputation for charming every girl in sight, but his heart belongs solely to the lovely Kokoro Tokunaga. Everything changes when his family entrusts him with the care of his abandoned five-year-old cousin, Yuzuru Sakashita. Tasked with looking after Yuzuru until her mother's return, Kippei finds himself forming an unexpected bond with the young girl.

As Yuzuru touches his life in profound ways, Kippei discovers the complexities of caregiving and the depth of genuine connections. Juggling his attention between Kokoro and Yuzuru, they navigate through life's challenges together, unraveling their emotions and uncovering the essence of family along the way.

When Kotoko Iwanaga was just 11 years old, she was whisked away by youkai for a fortnight and tasked with becoming their "God of Wisdom." Trading her right eye and left leg for the role, she now serves as a bridge between the spirit and human realms. Six years on, youkai seek Kotoko's counsel whenever they seek solutions to their dilemmas.

Enter Kurou Sakuragawa, a 22-year-old university student reeling from a recent breakup following a chilling encounter with a kappa. Seizing the opportunity to draw closer to Kurou, Kotoko sets her sights on him, harboring hopes of a future together. Yet, as she delves deeper, she uncovers hidden layers within Kurou. Seeking his aid in resolving supernatural quandaries, Kotoko yearns for more than just a partnership, dreaming that Kurou may one day return her affections.

story_elements: Mediator between spirit and human worlds

basic_info.title: Ragna Crimson
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ラグナクリムゾン

content.synopsis: In a realm where dragons reign over the skies, seas, and earth, those daring to challenge and triumph over them must exceed ordinary human capabilities. Determined to achieve victory by any means necessary, dragon hunter Ragna allies with the enigmatic Crimson. While Crimson's intentions remain shrouded in mystery, their shared objective is clear: to vanquish the dragon rulers.

basic_info.title:
Kuro no Shoukanshi
Black Summoner
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Black Summoner: A combat maniac's ascension, The Berserker Rises to Greatness.

content.synopsis: As Kelvin is whisked away to a new world, he forfeits his memories in exchange for formidable powers. Embracing his role as the unrivaled Summoner, his initial ally is none other than the goddess responsible for his arrival. Thrust into a life of endless battles, Kelvin finds his passion as a warrior. With each challenging adversary he encounters, his excitement knows no bounds. Join the dark-clad hero and his companions as they etch their names into the chronicles of time in this thrilling saga!

basic_info.title:
Shonan Junai Gumi!
GTO: The Early Years
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Shounan Junai Gumi, Shonan Pure Love Gang, Young GTO

content.synopsis: In the heart of their biker gang, Oni Baku, Eikichi Onizuka and Ryuuji Danma rule the streets with a rebellious spirit. But when they're not tearing through the roads, they're navigating the challenges of school life and charming the ladies. Follow the journey of the spirited Onizuka as he transforms from a wild youth into Japan's most legendary educator.

basic_info.title:
Heroine Shikkaku
No Longer Heroine
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Thank You Last Samurai, Souri de Sorry

content.synopsis:
In a world where she's always played the lead, Hatori Matsuzaki sees herself as the destined heroine for her childhood friend and crush, Rita Terasaka. Despite his relationships with other girls, she remains steadfast in her belief that they are meant to be together.

But when Rita unexpectedly turns his attention to their classmate Miho Adachi, a quiet and unassuming girl, and they become a couple, Hatori's reality crumbles. Is she just a supporting character in her own story?

Don't miss these captivating one-shots:
Volume 7: Thank You☆Last Samurai (Thank You For the Last Samurai)
Volume 10: Souri de Sorry

basic_info.title:
Kono Bijutsubu ni wa Mondai ga Aru!
This Art Club Has a Problem!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: There's a problem with this art club!

content.synopsis:
Mizuki Usami is a dedicated member of Tsukumori Middle School's art club, pouring her heart and soul into its activities. However, she soon discovers a major issue—the other members lack the same level of commitment. The club's president prefers napping on the couch to creating art, while the lively Collette Colletour enjoys teasing her peers. Meanwhile, Subaru Uchimaki, a talented artist with a penchant for winning awards, focuses on crafting his ideal 2D bride instead of more conventional artwork.

Despite the chaos and lack of seriousness, Usami's time in the art club is far from boring. As she navigates the ups and downs of middle school life, one thing is certain—art and adventure go hand in hand in this vibrant tale.

basic_info.title:
Litchi☆Hikari Club
Lychee Light Club
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Raichi Hikari Club

content.synopsis:
During the day, Hiroyuki Tsunekawa blends in as an ordinary student at Keikou Middle School, nestled in the dreary industrial town. But once classes end, he transforms into "Zera," the mysterious, beauty-fixated emperor of the secretive Hikari Club. For months, the club has been crafting an advanced humanoid robot fueled by lychee fruit, designed to abduct stunning young women.

When the robot, dubbed "Litchi," successfully captures a girl, chaos ensues within the Hikari Club. Zera's fixation on punishing traitors leads to internal strife and dwindling membership. With rebellion brewing among the remaining members and Litchi displaying unexpected human qualities, the future of the Hikari Club hangs in the balance. Will they manage to regain their footing, or is their fate sealed by their own creation?

basic_info.title: Kengan Omega
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ケンガンオメガ

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of Kengan Ashura, Narushima Kouga emerges with a mysterious mission: to confront Tokita Ouma in the intense Kengan matches. Under the guidance of Yamashita Kazuo, Kouga encounters Gaou Ryuuki, who bears a striking resemblance to Ouma. Amidst the brewing clash between the Kengan Association and rival organization Purgatory, Kouga must harness his strength to compete in the legendary Kengan battles.

basic_info.title: Perfect World
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis:
During a fateful business meeting, Tsugumi Kawana, a 26-year-old woman, is taken aback when she comes face to face with Itsuki Ayukawa – a blast from the past and her first love from high school. The joy of seeing Ayukawa fulfill his dream of becoming an architect warms Tsugumi's heart as she navigates her own successful career in an interior design company.

As they delve into old memories, Tsugumi is struck by the revelation that Ayukawa, following a tragic accident, now grapples with a disability that confines him to a wheelchair, unable to walk independently.

Navigating the complexities of romance with a disabled partner, Tsugumi is torn between treasuring their friendship and exploring her resurfacing feelings for Ayukawa, who staunchly resists any romantic entanglements. Yet, as Tsugumi immerses herself in Ayukawa's world and gains insight into his struggles, she begins to question the depth of her emotions for him.

basic_info.title:
Kekkon suru tte, Hontou desu ka
365 Days to the Wedding
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Are You Really Getting Married?

content.synopsis: At the J.T.C. travel agency, Takuya Oohara and Rika Honjouji face an unexpected opportunity to lead the new Irkutsk branch. However, the prospect of leaving Tokyo doesn't sit well with them. Their solution? A faux engagement! With their manager seeking unmarried candidates, the duo decides to tie the knot. The catch? They are virtual strangers! Can they bluff their way through this charade long enough to secure their dream transfer?

basic_info.title: Nabari no Ou
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 隠の王

content.synopsis: Miharu Rokujou dreams of a quiet life, but fate has other plans. Unwittingly in possession of the powerful ninja art, "Shinra Banshou," he is thrust into the hidden realm of Nabari. Balancing high school with the potential to rule Nabari, Miharu faces constant threats on his life. Meanwhile, his sensei pushes him to join the nindo club, adding to the chaos. With the fate of Nabari resting on his shoulders, Miharu must navigate treacherous waters to survive.

basic_info.title:
Ma no Kakera
Fragments of Horror
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Shards of Evil, Futon, Mokuzou no Kai, Tomio: Akai High-neck, Yuruyaka na Wakare, Kaibou-chan, Kuroi Tori, Nanakuse Magami, Mimikosuri suru Onna, Haunted Wood Mansion, Tomio: Red Turtleneck, Lingering Farewell, Dissection Girl, Black Bird, Nanakuse

content.synopsis: In "Futon," the story revolves around various intriguing characters such as Tomio in his distinctive red turtleneck and the enigmatic Dissection-chan. The narrative delves into themes of farewell and mystery, with the enigmatic presence of Wooden Spirit and the haunting Blackbird. As the plot unfolds, Whispering Woman and Magami Nanakuse add layers of complexity to the tale. Explore the world of "Futon" where secrets lurk beneath the surface, waiting to be uncovered.

basic_info.title:
Kodomo no Omocha
Kodocha: Sana's Stage
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Child's Toy

content.synopsis: Child actress Sana Kurata encounters a significant challenge in her classroom: her bully, Akito Hayama. Despite his gloomy demeanor, Sana's determination to fix their issues intrigues and annoys Akito. In turn, his demeanor pushes Sana to transform him. Through their tumultuous journey, these opposites forge a bond that leads to a deeper connection and mutual understanding.

On a fateful day, the world as we knew it crumbled into a nightmarish abyss. A swarm of deadly wasps unleashed chaos, their venomous stings causing gruesome decay. Soon after, monstrous "Dollies" emerged—giant doll-like beings armed with sinister tools of destruction.

Months later, with only a mere 1% of humanity left, survivor Iruma Ikaruga grapples with the haunting memories of that catastrophic event. Desperate and on the brink of despair, he intervenes just in time to rescue Yuu Banira from a perilous situation. Grateful for his heroism, Banira welcomes Iruma into the ranks of the resistance group, Trial and Error.

Reluctantly joining their cause, Iruma witnesses the group's daring mission to capture a Dolly, a seemingly impossible task. Yet, their success is short-lived as a formidable "Pygmy Doll" emerges, unleashing destruction and death. Amidst the chaos, a crucial connection forms between Iruma and the enigmatic Pygmy, leading them towards uncovering the dark secrets shrouding the Dollies' ominous purpose.

basic_info.title:
Sentai Daishikkaku
Go! Go! Loser Ranger!

content.synopsis:
Thirteen years ago, Earth faced an invasion by the Monster Army. In response, the Divine Dragon Rangers emerged as humanity's champions in the ongoing war. However, behind the facade of heroism lies a darker reality. The defeated invaders now produce a weekly monster for the Rangers to vanquish in staged battles. 

One defiant monster decides to challenge this cycle of oppression. Determined to overthrow the Dragon Rangers, he plots to dismantle them from within, sparking a thrilling confrontation that will test the true depths of power and heroism.

basic_info.title:
Arslan Senki
The Heroic Legend of Arslan
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy

content.synopsis:
Under the rule of the fierce warrior King Andragoras III, the kingdom of Pars thrives, as the gentle prince Arslan trains to uphold his father's legacy. Arslan's perception of Pars as a just and joyful land is shattered when he is held captive by a slave his age from the rival nation of Lusitania. Witnessing the brutality faced by slaves opens Arslan's eyes to the harsh realities beyond the kingdom's borders.

Years later, Arslan faces his first battle against the invading Lusitanian forces. Despite the enemy's cunning tactics leading to devastating losses for Pars, Arslan narrowly escapes with the help of his steadfast companion Daryun. With his father missing and Pars under occupation, Arslan is left with nothing.

Taking refuge with Daryun, Arslan seeks assistance from the unconventional yet brilliant strategist Narsus. Together with newfound allies, Arslan embarks on a perilous journey to reclaim his homeland. Along the treacherous path, he confronts challenges from corrupt nobles and a mysterious adversary known as Silver Mask. Undeterred, Arslan remains resolute in his quest to rescue Pars from external threats and internal decay.

In the realm of cyberpunk tales, where The Matrix has The Second Renaissance and The Bible has its Genesis, comes BLAME! with its own prelude, NOiSE.

Join Susono Musubi, a dedicated officer of the police force, as she unveils the secrets of a world teetering on the edge before the Netsphere's upheaval. Explore the origins of chaos within the technologically advanced society: from the ominous Megastructure's expansion to the emergence of Silicon Creatures, and the creation of the formidable Safeguards.

Delve into Tsutomu Nihei's early masterpiece, BLAME, the precursor to the acclaimed 10-volume series, BLAME!, all within this compact volume.

basic_info.title:
Boku to Kimi no Taisetsu na Hanashi
Our Precious Conversations

content.synopsis: Nozomi Aizawa decides to take a leap of faith and confesses her feelings to her crush, Shirou Azuma, after bravely following him all the way to the train station. Their encounter takes an unexpected turn as a heated debate ensues instead of a romantic confession. Despite their differing views on romance and the opposite gender, Nozomi and Shirou find themselves drawn to each other, meeting at the station for passionate yet meaningful discussions. As their bond strengthens through these unique exchanges, the once awkward distance between the two teenagers slowly fades away. Don't miss the one-shot included in Volume 3: Miracle☆Gift.

basic_info.title:
Mata, Onaji Yume wo Miteita
I Had That Same Dream Again
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Too Saw the Same Dream

content.synopsis: Elementary school student Nanoka Koyanagi embraces her quirky nature as a shield against tasks she dislikes, like dodging gym class and socializing with her peers. Assigned a special mission by her teacher to unravel the mystery of "happiness," Nanoka's world takes an unexpected turn. Amid contemplation, she crosses paths with Abazure-san, a vivacious woman who aids her in a feline rescue mission. Regular visits to the enigmatic Obaa-chan, a forest-dwelling elderly lady, provide Nanoka with moments of reflection. Lost in the woods one day, Nanoka encounters Minami, a high school student grappling with self-harm. Drawn into the lives of these three individuals, Nanoka embarks on a journey of introspection and self-discovery, guided by their unique tales and experiences.

basic_info.title:
Hitoribocchi no Isekai Kouryaku
Loner Life in Another World
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lonely Attack on the Different World

content.synopsis: Haruka, an isolated high school student, is unexpectedly transported to a different world along with his classmates. To his dismay, the coveted cheat skills are swiftly claimed by others, leaving him with only scraps to choose from. Hindered by his inherent loner trait, Haruka struggles to form alliances in this unfamiliar realm. Despite his predicament, a determination sparks within him when he learns of a grave danger threatening his classmates. Rejecting the allure of cheats, Haruka embarks on a unique journey to power, vowing to protect his peers through sheer strength and resilience. Witness the unconventional tactics and unwavering resolve of the ultimate loner in his quest for survival and salvation in this new world.

basic_info.title:
Donten ni Warau
Laughing Under the Clouds
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Cloudy Laugh, Utakata ni Warau

content.synopsis:
During the Meiji period's dawn, the formidable Gokumonjou prison emerges in the heart of a vast lake to combat the surge in criminal activities. Guiding the prison ferry are the renowned Kumou siblings: the quirky patriarch, Tenka; the daring yet honorable second brother, Soramaru; and the innocent youngest, Chuutarou. Despite their grim duties, they dwell peacefully in the perpetually overcast town of Oumi, along with their caretaker, Shirasu Kinjou.

Entwined in Oumi's ancient lore is the chilling tale of Orochi, a monstrous serpent that stirs every three centuries within a human host. Unbeknownst to Soramaru and Chuutarou, the Kumou clan's true mission is to seal Orochi's power before its full revival, lest the world face ruin. As Orochi's impending awakening looms, the Kumou family must summon the strength to find laughter amidst the looming clouds.

Featuring a captivating one-shot:

Volume 1: Utakata ni Warau (2 parts)

basic_info.title: Tonari no Kashiwagi-san
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kashiwagi-san, My Desk Neighbour

content.synopsis:
High school student Yuuto Sakuraba wears his otaku badge proudly, openly embracing his love for moe drawings by artist Sayane. Seated next to the school idol, Kotone Kashiwagi, who openly disdains otaku culture, Yuuto's worlds collide when he discovers Kotone's hidden otaku side during a chance encounter at his workplace, an otaku store!

Their unexpected bond deepens as they share secret meetings to revel in their shared passions. Little does Yuuto realize, Kotone Kashiwagi is none other than the mysterious moe artist Sayane herself!

basic_info.title: Prunus Girl
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: プラナス・ガール

content.synopsis: Beneath the fluttering cherry blossoms, Makito Maki's fateful encounter with the charming Kizuna Aikawa takes an unexpected turn when a startling truth is revealed on the first day of school – Kizuna is not who Maki thought. Despite the initial shock, their paths continue to intertwine, leading Maki to grapple with newfound feelings. As Aikawa extends a hand of friendship, Maki wrestles with preconceptions, but through shared escapades, discovers the depth of Aikawa's character and a valuable lesson on looking beyond appearances.

basic_info.title: World Customize Creator
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ワールド・カスタマイズ・クリエーター

content.synopsis: Summoned by a mysterious voice, Tagami Yuusuke finds himself transported to the enchanting realm of "Caltsio." Once a mere video game enthusiast, he is now destined to reign as the formidable "Evil God of Calamity," wielding the power to shape and personalize every facet of this new world.

basic_info.title: Again!!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis:
In the realm of high school, Kinichirou Imamura, a misunderstood figure with striking blonde locks and an intimidating presence, is far from a troublemaker. Despite his solitary existence and air of intimidation, he and his female peer Akira "Aki" Fujieda face an unexpected turn of events on their graduation day, leading to a bewildering journey back in time to their school entrance ceremony three years prior.

Upon awakening in their past selves, Imamura and Aki grapple with the realization that they are stranded in the past with no clear path back to their present lives. Determined to seize the chance to rewrite his high school experience, Imamura embarks on a quest to immerse himself in a vibrant student life he once missed, starting with his enrollment in the spirited cheering club. However, navigating the turbulent waters of this new beginning becomes a formidable challenge as he encounters the formidable and spirited club president, Yoshiko Usami.

basic_info.title: New Game!
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            CGDCT
            
                CGDCT,                    Otaku Culture
            
                Otaku Culture,                    Workplace
            
                Workplace
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: NEW GAME!

content.synopsis:
Fresh out of high school, Aoba Suzukaze steps into the vibrant world of video game design at the renowned Eagle Jump company, creators of her beloved Fairies Story game. Joining a dynamic team led by her idol, Kou Yagami, Aoba dives headfirst into the fast-paced realm of game development.

In "New Game!", follow Aoba and her spirited colleagues as they pour their passion and dedication into crafting the highly anticipated Fairies Story 3. Through challenges and triumphs, the team navigates the intricate process of bringing their imaginative worlds to life, shaping the future of the beloved game series.

basic_info.title: Blue Giant
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BLUE GIANT

content.synopsis: In Ishizuka Shinichi's latest masterpiece, meet Miyamoto Dai, a third-year high school student deeply moved by Jazz music. Determined to become the greatest Saxophone player in the world, Dai pours his heart and soul into practicing alone in Kawahara, regardless of the weather or time of day. As he embarks on his journey to achieve his ambitious dream, the story unfolds in Hirosegawa, Sendai, exploring the compelling blend of effort, talent, faith, environment, and luck that shape Dai's path towards greatness.

basic_info.title:
Hi no Tori (1967)
Phoenix
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hi no Tori: Reimei-hen, Phoenix: Dawn

content.synopsis:
Throughout the ages, from ancient times to the era of interstellar exploration, the enduring legend of the immortal Phoenix has graced the pages of history books. This magnificent bird, rumored to possess blood that bestows everlasting life and infinite wisdom, stands as a guardian of sentient life across the cosmos, observing the rise and fall of human civilizations.

Despite the Phoenix's watchful presence, humanity remains ensnared by its own emotions, navigating through a tapestry of joy, grief, rage, and love that weaves the fabric of existence. As centuries pass, certain convictions and motives persist, threatening to disrupt the delicate balance of the world's ordained order and principles. It seems that destiny, with its ever-shifting variables, unfolds in mysterious ways, often tinged with a peculiar sense of irony.

Please note: This series remains unfinished following Tezuka's passing, leaving the legend of the Phoenix shrouded in uncertainty.

basic_info.title: Prison Lab
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kangoku Jikken

content.synopsis:
Aito Eyama, a target of relentless bullying, endures his tormentors' cruelty until an unexpected twist of fate leads him to an intriguing offer: an invitation to the Captivity Game. In this high-stakes challenge, victory promises unimaginable riches, but the cost is steep. To partake, Eyama must become a captor and select a single person to detain for a month. His target? Aya Kirishima, the leader of his tormentors.

Bound by the game's rules—permitting any treatment of the captive except for death—Eyama dives into a world of revenge and retribution, all while concealing his true identity to secure the win. The game provides him with all he needs: legal immunity, a secure cell, and funds for necessities.

As Eyama delves into his vengeful role, he encounters fellow captors each harboring their own secrets. Meanwhile, Aya, far from a compliant prisoner, fights tooth and nail to break free. Yet, her defiance risks awakening a darkness within Eyama, yearning to break loose and wreak havoc.

basic_info.title: Seitokai Yakuindomo
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gag Humor
            
                Gag Humor,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Seitokai Yakuin-domo

content.synopsis: At Ousai Academy, once an exclusive all-girls high school, a twist of fate transforms it into a co-ed institution. Enter Tsuda Takatoshi, a first-year male student thrust into a sea of girls. His debut is marred by a run-in with the stern student council president, Shino Amakusa. Despite this rocky start, Tsuda encounters the rest of the council during the scolding session, culminating in a tardy entrance to class. To make amends for the chaotic morning, Shino extends an unexpected offer for Tsuda to join the council for "various reasons." Reluctantly, he acquiesces. Thus unfolds Tsuda's journey as he navigates the eccentricities of Ousai Academy, soon realizing he may be the only semblance of normalcy in this new co-ed world.

basic_info.title: Witch Craft Works
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural

content.synopsis: Honoka Takamiya is your typical student, blending into the background of his school life. Ayaka Kagari, his classmate and the school's undisputed "Princess," stands out with her striking beauty and regal demeanor. Despite sitting side by side, their interactions have been minimal until one fateful day. As the final bell rang, Takamiya found himself under attack by a catered witch and her bunny-costumed lackeys! Just when things seemed bleak, he was unexpectedly rescued by none other than Ayaka Kagari herself – revealing her own hidden powers as a witch!

basic_info.title:
Lv999 no Murabito
The Villager of Level 999
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: LV999の村人

content.synopsis:
In a realm where levels determine one's fate, most folks only reach levels 1 to 5, except for the monster-slaying elite. Hunting monsters is a privilege granted by God's chosen roles: Warrior, Fighter, Cleric, Magician, Rogue, Merchant, Hunter, and Sorcerer. Those with exceptional powers fall into three categories: Royalty, Heroes, and Sages. Meanwhile, ordinary folks eke out a living through farming and trade, with the humble villagers propelling town development.

Venturing out to battle monsters spells doom for the powerless villagers—until a two-year-old villager discovers a vital secret: defeating monsters yields untold riches. This revelation could change everything.

basic_info.title: Kowloon Generic Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 九龍ジェネリックロマンス

content.synopsis:
In a distant future, within the confines of Kowloon Walled City, a haven for those enamored with the bygone era of Hong Kong, Realtor Reiko Kujirai seeks novelty amidst the shadows of nostalgia. Her colleague, Hajime Kudou, revels in the city's historical charm and shuns modern intrusions. Despite their constant squabbles over trivial matters, a peculiar bond forms between them. 

When a harmless prank triggers an unexpected gesture from Hajime towards Reiko, he quickly expresses remorse. Perplexed by his behavior, Reiko delves into her past, unearthing forgotten memories that challenge her perception of reality.

basic_info.title: Black Jack
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ブラック・ジャック

content.synopsis: In a world where the mysterious and unconventional thrive, Black Jack, an enigmatic "unregistered" doctor with a shadowy past, navigates through medical cases that are as bizarre as they are obscure. Assisted by the devoted Pinoko, who harbors a deep admiration for him, Black Jack faces challenges that test the limits of his genius. Despite his skepticism towards matters not grounded in science, he finds himself repeatedly awed by the forces of love and nature that defy his rational beliefs. Renowned globally within medical and scientific circles, Black Jack is a beacon of hope for those in need, provided they can afford his services.

basic_info.title: Mayo Chiki!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: まよチキ！

content.synopsis: Kinjiro Sakamachi, a seemingly ordinary seventeen-year-old boy plagued by an unusual fear of women, known as gynophobia, finds his controlled world unraveling after a surprising encounter in the school restroom. The charming and popular Konoe Subaru is revealed to be a girl, throwing Kinjiro into turmoil. To make matters worse, the principal's daughter, Kanade Suzutsuki, a relentless and authoritarian figure, is determined to keep this revelation under wraps at any cost. Despite her cruel tactics to cure Kinjiro's phobia, the question remains – is Kanade truly malevolent or is there a genuine desire to assist him? For Kinjiro, caught in a maelstrom of torment and confusion, the distinction is irrelevant as his once ordinary life descends into a nightmarish ordeal.

basic_info.title:
Fushigi Yuugi
Fushigi Yugi
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mysterious Play, Curious Play

content.synopsis: During a visit to the National Library, junior-high students Miaka Yuuki and Yui Hongo are whisked away into the pages of "The Universe of The Four Gods," a mystical book unfolding in ancient China. In this enchanting realm, Miaka is chosen as the priestess of Suzaku, tasked with gathering her celestial warriors to summon the benevolent deity for three wishes. Meanwhile, Yui is ensnared by the enemy nation of the god Seiryuu, compelled to serve as their priestess. What ensues is a gripping tale of betrayal and destiny as former best friends turn into foes, embarking on a tumultuous journey to fulfill their desires by summoning their respective gods...

basic_info.title: Kingdom Hearts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: KH, Disney Square Enix's Kingdom Hearts, Kingdom Hearts Final Mix, Kammatsu Yomikiri: Winnie the Pooh, Kingdom Hearts: Final Mix

content.synopsis: Sora, a spirited young boy, eagerly anticipates embarking on adventures with his companions, Riku and Kairi.
