Together, they toil on constructing a raft to journey beyond their island. However, a sudden inexplicable force gifts Sora with a remarkable weapon called the Keyblade. Battling peculiar monsters, he finds himself whisked away to an unfamiliar town. Meanwhile, Donald and Goofy depart their castle on a quest to locate the king and the fabled individual possessing the "key" to salvation. Attacked once more by enigmatic foes known as Heartless, Sora receives aid from the seasoned Cid and valiant Leon. Their paths converge as Sora reunites with Donald and Goofy, uniting to seek out his missing friends and the King.

basic_info.title: Fujiyama-san wa Shishunki
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Fujiyama's Adolescence

content.synopsis:
As the school year winds down, a peeping incident throws middle schooler Yuuichi Kanba into an unexpected reunion with his childhood friend Makio Fujiyama, a towering girl at 181 cm. Witnessing her vulnerability sparks newfound affection in Kanba, despite Fujiyama's unconventional beauty. Emboldened, Kanba impulsively asks her out, and to his surprise, she accepts.

Amidst school events and festive celebrations, Kanba navigates the challenges of dating a girl who turns heads wherever she goes. Despite his own lack of popularity, Kanba finds himself enamored by Fujiyama and strives to keep their relationship under wraps.

Join Kanba and Fujiyama as they stumble through amusing escapades hand in hand, discovering the nuances of young love and unraveling the depths of their bond in Fuijyama-san wa Shishunki.

basic_info.title:
MeruPuri: Märchen☆Prince
MeruPuri
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: めるぷり メルヘン☆プリンス

content.synopsis:
Airi Hoshina diligently maintains her punctuality streak in hopes of attracting a wonderful partner. Her heart is set on a future filled with love and family bliss. But Airi's world is upended when a mysterious young boy emerges from her hand mirror.

The boy introduces himself as Aram Astale Ei Daemonia Eucalystia, the prince of Astale, seeking refuge from a powerful enchantment. Through a twist of fate, he finds himself trapped in Airi's mirror, his escape only partially successful.

basic_info.title:
Ikigami
Ikigami: The Ultimate Limit
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Death Paper, Death's Notice: The Ultimate Limit

content.synopsis:
In a dystopian nation governed by the National Welfare Act, a chilling mandate unfolds: young citizens aged 18-24 are chosen to sacrifice their lives for the greater good. Known as the Ikigami, these death notifications arrive 24 hours before a fatal nanocapsule is activated. The government's purported aim is to instill a deeper appreciation for life through this grim practice.

Enter Kengo Fujimoto, a reluctant Ikigami messenger grappling with conflicting feelings about the controversial law. To navigate the scrutiny of the authorities, Kengo embarks on a journey to personally deliver these life-ending messages, hoping to clarify his own stance.

As the selected individuals face their imminent demise, their reactions range from acts of kindness to bursts of passion-fueled crimes. These final choices reverberate through the lives of those around them, shaping Kengo's evolving perspective and guiding him towards a pivotal decision.

basic_info.title:
Hananoi-kun to Koi no Yamai
A Condition Called Love

content.synopsis:
Hotaru Hinase, a first-year high school student, holds her family and friends dear above all else. Romance is a foreign concept to her, and she is content with the idea of never experiencing love. However, a chance encounter at a café with her friend leads her to witness the heart-wrenching breakup of the handsome honor student, Hananoi.

Moved by his solitude in the snow, Hotaru offers him her umbrella in a simple act of kindness. The following day, Hananoi surprises Hotaru in her classroom with a bold proposal to be his girlfriend. Despite her initial refusal, Hananoi persists in his pursuit, showering Hotaru with selfless gestures to win her over.

As Hananoi's presence lingers by her side, Hotaru finds herself grappling with unfamiliar emotions stirring within her. Could these feelings evolve into something more profound than she ever imagined? With a newfound openness to love, Hotaru embarks on a journey of romance with Hananoi.

basic_info.title:
Wagatsuma-san wa Ore no Yome
My Wife Is Wagatsuma-san

content.synopsis: In high school, Aoshima Hitoshi dreams of having a girlfriend. Suddenly, he awakens ten years ahead to find himself married to the most beautiful girl in school, Wagatsuma Ai! Witness the evolution of their relationship from mere acquaintances to husband and wife.

basic_info.title: Bocchi the Rock!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ぼっち・ざ・ろっく!

content.synopsis:
High school student Hitori "Bocchi" Gotou finds solace in her guitar, her only companion in a world devoid of friends. Her dream of forming a school band to boost her social status remains distant despite her relentless dedication to mastering the guitar over the past two years.

Known for her online guitar covers, Bocchi's social ineptitude continues to hinder her aspirations. However, a chance encounter with drummer Nijika Ijichi in a park changes everything. Nijika, in need of a guitarist for her band alongside bassist Ryou Yamada, swiftly recruits Bocchi into the ranks of Kessoku Band.

Thrown into a whirlwind of social interactions, Bocchi grapples with the sudden shift but soon realizes the potential of this newfound connection. As she embarks on this unexpected journey, Bocchi begins to see a glimmer of hope that her dream may not be as unattainable as she once thought.

basic_info.title: Are You Alice?
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: Are you Alice?

content.synopsis: In a quest for meaning, a disenchanted youth finds himself in the fantastical realm of Wonderland. Taking on the persona of "Alice," he is coerced by the formidable Queen of Hearts into a dangerous game of "Kill the White Rabbit." Resisting his assigned fate, Alice must navigate treacherous rules where deviating from the narrative could prove fatal.

basic_info.title:
Youkai Kyoushitsu
Junji Ito's Dissolving Classroom

content.synopsis:
In a twisted tale of apologies and horror, Yuuma Azawa arrives as a new student with a peculiar compulsion for saying sorry. Classmate Keiko Arisu tries to help him break the habit, but Yuuma can only apologize endlessly. The strange events escalate when Keiko is stalked by a girl who craves her brain. In a panic, Keiko narrowly escapes a truck and lands in the hospital.

When Yuuma visits Keiko, he reveals the stalker is his own sister, Chizumi. As Keiko befriends Chizumi, she uncovers Yuuma's dark secret: a past pact with the devil, where apologies were a sinister offering.

Returning to school, Keiko is horrified as people's brains melt out of their heads—Chizumi blames Yuuma's apologies for the gruesome phenomenon. Barely escaping, Keiko realizes the demonic siblings' reign of terror is far from over, with more horrors looming ahead.

Bonus stories: "Reunion" and "Child of the Earth"

basic_info.title:
Diamond no Ace
Ace of the Diamond

content.synopsis:
Middle school student Eijun Sawamura faces a crushing defeat in his final baseball game, where his unique fastball costs Akagi Middle School their shot at the nationals. As team captain, he shoulders the blame for their loss and makes a heartfelt vow to lead his friends to victory in high school. However, with poor grades and no school offers in sight, Sawamura grapples with disappointment as he strives to uphold his promise.

A chance encounter with a scout from the prestigious Seidou High School changes everything. Reluctantly, Sawamura agrees to visit the school and observe their powerhouse baseball team in action. Spirited competition with one of Seidou's star batters leads him to meet Kazuya Miyuki, a skilled catcher who sees the potential in Sawamura's pitching abilities.

Inspired by his time at Seidou, Sawamura sheds his initial doubts about transferring to Tokyo. Despite lingering guilt over leaving his friends behind, they rally around him and urge him to seize the opportunity at Seidou. Fueled by a newfound determination, Sawamura embarks on the challenging path to becoming Seidou's ace player, aiming for national glory while carrying the unwavering spirit of his former team.

basic_info.title:
Sasurai Emanon
Emanon: Emanon Wanderer
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Wandering Emanon '67, Wandering Emanon '73, Wandering Emanon '80, Wandering Emanon '88, Wandering Emanon '90

content.synopsis: In "Sasurai Emanon," we delve into the extraordinary life of Emanon, the girl with a memory spanning three billion years. After her fateful night on the ferry, Emanon embarks on a journey without a clear destination, wandering through life in perpetual contemplation. Across the years 1967 to 1980, we witness her cyclical existence as a wandering teenager, grappling with her enigmatic past. As she meets a man and later gives birth to a daughter destined to inherit her memories, Emanon's tale unfolds from her ferry voyage to a poignant reunion at a train station.

basic_info.title:
Kamikaze Kaitou Jeanne
Phantom Thief Jeanne
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Divine Wind Phantom Thief Jeanne

content.synopsis:
As the century draws to a close, whispers abound of a notorious figure named Kaitou Jeanne, a divine thief wreaking havoc by pilfering precious paintings across the city. Little do they know, behind the mask is Maron Kusakabe, a spirited 16-year-old student at Momokuri Academy and a secret wielder of justice. Her closest confidante, Miyako Toudaiji, unknowingly finds herself on the tail end of Jeanne's exploits, leading the hunt to capture the elusive thief.

Unbeknownst to many, the artworks harbor dark secrets—demons unleashed by the malevolent demon lord, intent on subverting the divine order. With the guidance of the angelic companion Finn Fish, Maron embraces her destiny as the modern incarnation of Jeanne d'Arc. Her mission: to retrieve the cursed paintings, banish the sinister demons, and safeguard humanity's souls.

Yet, the line between her sacred duty and mundane teenage existence blurs when a mysterious rival emerges—Kaitou Sinbad, a charming enigma whose presence complicates Maron's already precarious balance. Amidst the shadows of deception and temptation, will Maron uphold her celestial calling while navigating the trials of high school life?

basic_info.title: Angel Beats!: Heaven's Door
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: Angel Beats! －Heaven's Door－

content.synopsis: In a post-death realm, angels wage a fierce battle for their destiny. Yuri, head of the Shinda Sekai Sensen, defies the god who decreed her unfair existence. Meanwhile, Tenshi, student council chair of the afterlife, clashes with the SSS rebels. Armed with weapons, the SSS challenges the angelic beings wielding mystic abilities.

basic_info.title:
Yaiteru Futari
How to Grill Our Love

content.synopsis:
Insecure in matters of the heart, 30-year-old Kenta Fukuyama has always grappled with romance. Everything changes when he crosses paths with Chihiro Yamaguchi, a designer whose aloof exterior belies her warm and caring nature. As Kenta falls for Chihiro, his genuine kindness captures her heart in return, leading to a decision to tie the knot.

Despite their shyness and the challenges of a long-distance relationship, Kenta and Chihiro navigate the complexities of marriage together. United by their love for BBQ and supported by their inner circle, the couple embarks on a journey of growth, overcoming obstacles and nurturing their unique and heartfelt bond.

basic_info.title: Yokujou Climax
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Desire ©MAX, Yokujou©MAX, Passionate Climax, Desire Climax

content.synopsis: In Yokujou Climax, Mio Omori navigates the challenges of her tough life, working multiple jobs to care for her ailing mother and younger brother, Hinata. Her world is turned upside down when Shoei Jinnai, a brash young man, forcefully enters her life by claiming ownership after a surprising encounter. As their tumultuous relationship unfolds, Mio discovers unexpected depths in Shoei and learns profound lessons about herself and those around her.

In the bustling city of Tokyo Tower, three high school students cross paths: the fiery Hikaru Shidou, the proud Umi Ryuuzaki, and the kind-hearted Fuu Hououji. Their chance encounter takes a sudden turn when a cry for help leads them into a fantastical realm. They are met by the youthful Guru Clef, who reveals their destiny as the fabled Magic Knights summoned by Princess Emeraude to rescue the enchanting land of Cephiro.

While Hikaru embraces the adventure, Umi and Fuu yearn to return home. Yet, Clef unveils a harsh truth—only by saving Cephiro from the menacing Lord Zagato and his monstrous threat can they find their way back. To succeed, they must awaken the legendary Rune Gods and free Princess Emeraude from captivity.

Empowered by Clef with magical armor, the trio faces an imminent attack from Zagato's minion, prompting their retreat to seek aid from the skilled weaponsmith Presea and the enigmatic guide Mokona. As they set forth on their perilous quest, Hikaru, Umi, and Fuu will prove themselves as true Magic Knights, determined to bring hope and deliverance to the troubled realm of Cephiro.

basic_info.title:
Genjitsu Shugi Yuusha no Oukoku Saikenki
How a Realist Hero Rebuilt the Kingdom
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Realist Hero's Kingdom Restoration Chronicle

content.synopsis: In a world where the phrase "O, Hero!" kicks off the extraordinary, Kazuya Souma is whisked away to a new realm, but the typical adventure is nowhere in sight. Instead of the expected quest, he is unexpectedly handed the throne after proposing a bold plan to boost the nation's strength. Now burdened with rulership and an unforeseen engagement to the king's daughter, Souma must navigate uncharted waters. To rebuild the nation, he enlists the help of the wise, the skilled, and the exceptional. As five remarkable individuals assemble by Souma's side, their diverse talents and capabilities come to light. Guided by his pragmatic approach, Souma charts a new course for himself and his people. Step into a realm of revolutionary administrative fantasy as a tale of strategic governance unfolds!

basic_info.title:
Ansatsusha de Aru Ore no Status ga Yuusha yori mo Akiraka ni Tsuyoi no da ga
My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Hero's
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Status as an Assassin Obviously Exceeds the Brave's

content.synopsis: Magically transported to another world, Akira and his classmates gain extraordinary powers. While some are hailed as Heroes, Akira is designated as an Assassin. Despite this, he discovers the hidden might of his role. Suspicious of the king's motives, Akira utilizes his shadow mastery to unveil royal secrets and plots.

basic_info.title:
Nozomanu Fushi no Boukensha
The Unwanted Undead Adventurer
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Unwanted Immortal Adventurer

content.synopsis: In the world of Rentt Faina, a seasoned adventurer stuck in a rut, battling lowly creatures like slimes and goblins is a daily grind for meager rewards. But everything changes when he stumbles upon an uncharted path within the mysterious Labyrinth of the Moon's Reflection. At its end lies not treasure, but a fearsome dragon that swallows him whole! Miraculously, Rentt awakens transformed into a sentient skeleton, armed with his sword and a determination for Existential Evolution. Can he navigate this perilous journey to reclaim his humanity, or will the labyrinth keep him trapped in undeath forever...?

basic_info.title: Hotarubi no Mori e
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Into the Forest of Fireflies' Light, Hanauta Nagaruru, Kurukuru Ochiba, Hibi, Fukaku

content.synopsis: In the enchanting world of "Hanauta Nagaruru," we follow the poignant journey of Hotarubi as she navigates the mystical forest in "Hotarubi no Mori e." Amidst the swirling leaves of "Kurukuru Ochiba," she forms a deep connection with Gin, a spirit bound by a bittersweet fate. As their bond deepens through the passing seasons of "Hibi, Fukaku," their love story unfolds with a delicate blend of beauty and melancholy.

basic_info.title:
Kanata no Astra
Astra Lost in Space
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 彼方のアストラ

content.synopsis:
In the year 2063, humanity's reach spans the vast cosmos. Join the thrilling journey of eight Caird High School students and a young child as they set off on an interstellar adventure to MCPA, a planet nine light-years away. Among them are the courageous Kanata Hoshijima and the charming Aries Spring.

Upon reaching MCPA, a mysterious ball of light sets off a chain of events. The students find themselves whisked away to a distant corner of space, 5,012 light-years from safety. Lost and with dwindling resources, their only hope lies in an abandoned spaceship nearby. As they struggle for survival, dark revelations unfold about their perilous expedition.

basic_info.title:
Shangri-La Frontier: Kusoge Hunter, Kamige ni Idoman to su
Shangri-La Frontier

content.synopsis: In his second year of high school, Rakurou Hizutome has a singular passion: seeking out and conquering "shitty games." Renowned for his unmatched gaming prowess, he fearlessly tackles even the worst games with gusto. When he encounters the latest VR sensation, Shangri-La Frontier, Rakurou dives in headfirst, bypassing the prologue to delve into the heart of the game. Yet, as he delves deeper, will Rakurou, the master gamer, uncover all the enigmatic secrets concealed within Shangri-La Frontier?

basic_info.title: Superior
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: シューピアリア

content.synopsis:
In a world plagued by the ruthless Demon Queen Sheila's deadly rampage, hope emerges in the form of Exa, the unconventional hero chosen to end her reign of terror. Unbeknownst to Exa, his act of saving a monster girl sets in motion a captivating tale of deception and unexpected emotions. Little does he realize that the very monster he rescued is the Demon Queen in disguise.

As Exa embarks on his quest, Sheila, masquerading as a lovestruck creature, shadows his every move, torn between her original malicious intent and the stirring influence of Exa's compassion for all beings. Despite her determination to betray him, Sheila finds herself drawn to his noble ideals, leading her to question her own motives. Will she succumb to her dark purpose, or will the budding feelings she harbors for Exa alter the course of their intertwined destinies?

In Kayaba Akihiko's deadly game, survival is a daunting challenge. With 2000 casualties and counting, players brave the treacherous VRMMO world. As Kirito prepares for a crucial 1st floor boss strategy meeting, he encounters a mysterious female warrior amidst the chaos. Her solitary battle against formidable foes shines like a shooting star in the darkened sky. The game's ruthless grip tightens, testing their will to survive against all odds.

basic_info.title:
Hazurewaku no "Joutai Ijou Skill" de Saikyou ni Natta Ore ga Subete wo Juurin suru made
Failure Frame: I Became the Strongest and Annihilated Everything With Low-Level Spells
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Strongest with the Failure Frame "Abnormal State Skill" as I Devastated Everything

content.synopsis:
Summoned to another world by the Goddess Vicius alongside his entire class, Touka Mimori finds himself the weakest among powerful peers. Despite being marked for disposal by the seemingly benevolent deity, Vicius reveals her true cruel intentions. Turning his classmates against him, she condemns Touka to a treacherous labyrinth of doom and hopelessness.

Though lacking in strength, Touka possesses a unique skill: Abnormal State Skill. With his arsenal of "poison" and "paralyze" abilities, he methodically incapacitates foes in the labyrinth, eroding their health until they succumb without resistance.

As he gains new powers and allies on his journey, Touka is driven by a singular purpose: to avenge himself against the vengeful goddess who thrust him into this nightmarish realm.

basic_info.title: Bocchi na Bokura no Renai Jijou
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Circumstances of Our Lonely Love

content.synopsis:
After a summer of non-stop studying and exams, Hajime Ichijou returns to school only to find himself surrounded by lovey-dovey couples. Feeling like the odd one out, Hajime discovers a new transfer student, the striking redhead Chitose Ninomiya, who is also unattached like him.

Their single status makes them the center of attention, sparking rumors of a budding romance. But despite the speculation, Hajime and Chitose's relationship is far from smooth sailing. Constant disagreements and differing perspectives may just make finding love a rocky road for this unlikely pair.

basic_info.title: Shimeji Simulation
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: シメジ シミュレーション

content.synopsis:
After spending two years in self-imposed seclusion, Shijima Tsukishima emerges from her closet sanctuary to embark on a new chapter at high school. To her surprise, she finds two shimeji mushrooms sprouting on her head when she gazes into the mirror. Battling social awkwardness and past bullying, Shijima initially keeps to herself.

Her solitude is interrupted by Majime Yamashita, a quirky classmate sporting a fried egg atop her head. Intrigued by Shijima's unique adornment, Majime dubs her "Shimeji" and persistently seeks friendship. Reluctantly, Shimeji accepts and forms an unlikely bond with the persistent Majime. Together, they navigate the peculiarities of high school life, uncovering the mysteries and marvels of their bizarre world.

basic_info.title: +Anima
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Plus Anima, Parallel +Anima

content.synopsis: In a world where +Anima, enigmatic beings with the power to transform into animals, face rejection from society, Cooro—a young orphan with crow-like abilities—longs for acceptance and understanding. Ignorant of his origins, he sets out to find his kind, accompanied by his new friends Husky, Nana Alba, and Senri. Together, they journey through a harsh world, forming unbreakable bonds and embracing endless adventures. Yet, as they seek a place to belong, they confront unexpected challenges, discovering the harsh realities and prejudices endured by their kind. Join Cooro and his companions on a poignant and thrilling quest in +Anima, where the quest for acceptance unfolds amidst trials and camaraderie.

basic_info.title:
Yumemiru Taiyou
Dreamin' Sun
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bambi no Tegami, Heart no Tomato

content.synopsis: Shimana Kameko's decision to skip school leads her to an unexpected adventure. Seeking refuge, she finds herself at a boarding house where she's greeted by Taiga Fujiwara, the 21-year-old landlord known for his love of alcohol. Her housemates include Zen Nakajou, the energetic panda enthusiast, and Asahi Tatsugae, a fellow student from Yuumei High School with a warm smile. In this newfound abode filled with charming men, Shimana's life takes a thrilling turn, brimming with excitement. Also featured is the one-shot "Heart no Tomato" in Volume 1.

basic_info.title:
Tobaku Mokushiroku Kaiji
Gambling Apocalypse Kaiji

content.synopsis: Itou Kaiji, a down-and-out man known for his petty thefts, finds his monotonous life upended when a mysterious man named Endou appears, revealing himself as a debt collector. Kaiji's world is rocked when he learns he's on the hook for a massive loan he co-signed for his missing colleague, Furuhata Takeshi. Facing a staggering debt of 3,850,000 yen, Kaiji is offered a risky solution - board a gambling boat with other debtors to wager borrowed money. As the high-stakes games unfold, Kaiji must navigate between winning big and sinking further into financial ruin. Reluctantly seizing the opportunity, Kaiji plunges into a perilous gamble to secure his freedom and a chance at prosperity.

basic_info.title:
Maoujou de Oyasumi
Sleepy Princess in the Demon Castle
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sleeping in Devil's Castle, Sweet Dreams in the Demon Castle

content.synopsis:
In a realm where humans and demons share space, Demon Lord Tasogare seizes Princess Aurora Suya Rhys Kaymin of the human empire. He seeks total dominion over the world, prompting humanity to resist. Enter Yuusha Akatsuki, dispatched to rescue the captive princess.

While confined in the demon castle, Princess Suya Rhys faces lethargy and poor treatment, hindering her rest. Determined to improve her situation, she embarks on whimsical escapades in pursuit of comfort and much-needed sleep.

basic_info.title:
Sekai Saikou no Ansatsusha, Isekai Kizoku ni Tensei suru
The World's Finest Assassin Gets Reincarnated in Another World as an Aristocrat

content.synopsis: In a world where danger lurks at every turn, the reign of the skilled assassin known as Lugh comes to a sudden halt. But instead of meeting his end, he is faced with a divine encounter with a goddess. Entrusted with a crucial task to save her world from impending catastrophe, Lugh embraces his new identity as a member of the Tuatha Dé clan, armed with unparalleled powers and lethal expertise. Now reborn as a young assassin named Lugh, he embarks on a mission to take down the most formidable figure in this realm—the hero.

basic_info.title:
Isekai Ojisan
Uncle from Another World

content.synopsis: Seventeen years ago, Takafumi's uncle slipped into a coma, but today he returns like a man reborn.

basic_info.title: Shiki
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Corpse Demon

content.synopsis:
In the quiet village of Sotoba, where time seems to stand still, a spirited young resident named Megumi Shimizu yearns for the excitement of city life. Dismissing her fellow villagers as backward, Megumi's curiosity is piqued when a sophisticated European-style house emerges on a hilltop. Intrigued by the new residents, she ventures to visit them one fateful evening.

The night unfolds ominously as Megumi fails to return, sparking a frantic search that culminates in a chilling discovery. Found weakened and marked by mysterious bites, Megumi becomes the initial casualty in a series of inexplicable deaths that grip Sotoba in fear. As the body count rises, the village doctor Toshio Ozaki, the introspective priest Seishin Muroi, the enigmatic loner Natsuno Yuuki, and siblings Kaori and Akira Tanaka band together to unravel the haunting secrets shrouding their community.

However, the harrowing truth they uncover surpasses their worst nightmares, threatening to tip the fragile balance between life and death. In the escalating turmoil, the line between the living and the dead blurs, casting a sinister shadow over the once-tranquil village of Sotoba.

basic_info.title: Tokyo Babylon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 東京 BABYLON

content.synopsis:
Subaru Sumeragi, the 13th head of his esteemed onmyouji clan, resides in Tokyo with his lively twin sister, Hokuto, awaiting the day he inherits his grandmother's legacy. While Subaru is gentle and reserved, Hokuto is brimming with energy, often creating daring matching outfits for them. She also enjoys playing matchmaker between Subaru and their veterinarian friend, Seishirou Sakurazuka, who curiously always accompanies them around the city.

Amid Tokyo's spiritual conflicts, Subaru grapples with cases brought by clients and those he chooses to involve himself in. Empathetic to a fault, he shares the burdens of others, leaving himself exposed in a city driven by self-interest. Hokuto wishes for Seishirou to capture Subaru's heart, believing their bond will endure any trial. Yet, as Subaru delves deeper, he questions if Seishirou harbors hidden motives that could jeopardize everything he holds dear.

basic_info.title: Kobato.
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis:
In the bustling city of Japan, a unique soul shines faintly amid the crowd – the charmingly naive brunette, Kobato Hanato. Despite her carefree demeanor, Kobato harbors a profound desire to reach a mysterious destination. To realize her dream, she embarks on a heartfelt mission: to mend broken hearts and store them in a magical vessel.

Navigating the complexities of the world proves challenging for the innocent Kobato, aided by the gruff but wise Ioryogi – a peculiar blue canine companion with a penchant for tough love. Yet, amidst the chaos, a quaint and troubled locale emerges as a beacon of possibility, its history intertwined with the promise of redemption.

basic_info.title:
Devils Line
Devils' Line
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance

content.synopsis:
In a realm where vampires share a genetic likeness with humans, distinguishing between the two is a challenge. But when these vampires, known as devils, catch a glimpse of human blood, they spiral into uncontrollable frenzy.

Ordinary girl Tsukasa Taira attracts the attention of vampire Shouta Akimura, who struggles to resist his urge to harm her by satisfying his thirst with the blood of others. Walking a dangerous tightrope, Shouta teeters on the brink of losing all restraint.

Enter detective Yuuki Anzai, swooping in to shield Tsukasa from becoming Shouta's prey. As he escorts her to safety, Tsukasa becomes captivated by Anzai, a vampire himself. Together, they embark on a precarious journey, delving into a treacherous web of conspiracy, teeming with violence and secrets.

basic_info.title: Yandere Kanojo
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yan-Dere Kanojo, Yandere Girlfriend, Nekura Musume to Internet, Miss Gloomy and the Internet, Kinomiya Shoten: Kaiganji Ekimaeten

content.synopsis: Embark on a quirky journey with Tanaka Manabu, a nerdy student whose ordinary school day takes a thrilling turn when he encounters Ryuuzaki Reina, a fierce leader of the school's female delinquents wielding a mysterious bloody bat. Their unexpected meeting sparks a unique romance, blending humor and suspense in a captivating gag manga format that seamlessly weaves between 4-koma and standard pages. Dive into the world of a yandere girlfriend and explore intriguing one-shots like "Miss Gloomy and the Internet" in Volume 15, and "Kinomiya Shoten: Kaiganji Ekimaeten" in Volume 16.

basic_info.title:
Ojisama to Neko
A Man & His Cat
basic_info.genre:
Genre:
                            Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Uncle and Kitten, A Man and His Cat

content.synopsis:
In a cozy pet shop called Paws & Whiskers, there resides a lone cat patiently biding his time for a forever home. Despite his charm, he's been overlooked by visitors due to trivial reasons like not meeting their ideal cuteness standards or having a bit of an attitude. Then, a turning point arrives when an elderly man named Fuyuki Kanda walks in and decides to give him a chance. A widower feeling the ache of an empty nest, Kanda hopes that this furry companion, now dubbed Fukumaru, will fill his days with companionship and joy.

Through endearing and amusing moments, "Ojisama to Neko" unfolds the heartening tale of Kanda and Fukumaru navigating the ups and downs of their new life together, discovering the true meaning of friendship and family.

basic_info.title:
Boku no Hatsukoi wo Kimi ni Sasagu
Secret Unrequited Love
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: BokuKimi, Kare wa Ike mo Shinai Sarukoen wo Mezasu, Motto Ikitai..., I Give My First Love to You

content.synopsis:
From the tender age of 8, Takuma and Mayu's journey embarked upon a poignant path. Takuma, grappling with a fragile heart, found solace in the friendship of Mayu, the doctor's daughter overseeing his care. As the days passed, their connection deepened. Yet, a pivotal promise made by Takuma at 8 summers old loomed over them. Follow their poignant tale as they navigate the trials of growing up, their bond resilient against the passage of time.

Included one-shots:

Volume 1: Motto Ikitai...

Volume 7: The Things I Want

Volume 11: Kare wa Ike mo Shinai Sarukoen wo Mezasu

basic_info.title: Sunny
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: Sunny

content.synopsis: In the heart of Star Kids Home, a unique blend of group home and orphanage, a diverse group of children navigate the challenges of adolescence along with the unique struggles faced by those who have been abandoned or orphaned. Their sanctuary lies in the form of a battered car named Sunny, parked just a short distance away from the home. Within the confines of Sunny, the children embark on imaginary journeys around the globe, voyage into outer space, or simply seek solace from the hardships of their reality.

basic_info.title: Ponkotsu Fuuki Iin to Skirt-take ga Futekisetsu na JK no Hanashi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Story Between a Dumb Prefect and a High School Girl with an Inappropriate Skirt Length

content.synopsis: In the corridors of the school stands Sakuradaimon, the stern prefect tasked with upholding order among the students. Despite his duty to set an example, perfection eludes him. Kohinata, a spirited student, resists his efforts to enforce the school's dress code. Their clash sets the stage for a compelling tale of authority and defiance as their paths converge.

High school student Miko Sonoda's life takes an unexpected turn when family circumstances compel her to reside at her uncle's boarding house. Even before reaching her new home, Miko encounters a foreboding incident: a sense of being trailed. To her relief, her uncle intervenes, only to reveal that the supposed stalker is none other than one of his tenants, leaving Miko red-faced on her inaugural day.

Among the five distinctive adults she will be sharing quarters with is the accused individual, Jun Matsunaga, a 27-year-old designer known for his short fuse. Despite the rocky start, Miko anticipates a dreary existence. Yet, as she navigates life alongside Jun, she discovers that cohabiting with grown-ups may not be as daunting as she feared—and perhaps, it could even pave the way for unexpected romance.

basic_info.title: Kyou kara Ore wa!!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: From Today On, It's My Turn!!, Today, It's My Turn!!

content.synopsis:
On the first day of high school, freshmen Takashi Mitsuhashi and Shinji Itou forge an instant bond. United by their shared goal of becoming school delinquents, they sport bold hairstyles to set themselves apart. 

Though they project a tough image, their motivations diverge - Itou seeks to defend the weak with his fists, earning admiration, while Mitsuhashi aims to dominate as the strongest in Japan, instilling fear.

Despite their contrasting aspirations, their prowess in combat is legendary. Together, they are an unbeatable duo, feared by all who cross their path, whether friend or foe.

basic_info.title:
Haruka na Machi e
A Distant Neighborhood
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Harukana Machi-E

content.synopsis:
When middle-aged salaryman Hiroshi Nakahara boards the wrong train from Kyoto to Tokyo, he embarks on an unexpected journey back to his hometown of Kurayoshi. As he wanders through the familiar streets, memories flood back, revealing the stark changes since his mother's passing two decades ago.

A visit to his mother's grave at Genzen Temple triggers a surreal transformation: Hiroshi finds himself inhabiting his 14-year-old self, armed with the knowledge and experience of his adult life. Struggling to navigate his newfound youth, he escapes the responsibilities of his current family life and immerses himself in the challenges of junior high school.

Lost in time and yearning to unravel the mystery of his father's abandonment, Hiroshi delves into his past, seeking understanding and closure. Trapped in his teenage self, he grapples with the complexities of family dynamics and the poignant truths of his own history.

basic_info.title: Cross Game
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Team Sports
            
                Team Sports
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: クロスゲーム

content.synopsis: In the heart of the bustling city, young Kou Kitamura spends his days honing his skills at his family's sporting goods store, frequented by the Tsukishima Batting Center's four spirited sisters - Ichiyo, Wakaba, Aoba, and Momiji. Kou, a batting prodigy thanks to endless hours in the cages, is oblivious to all things baseball beyond hitting. Contrasting him is Aoba, younger but a stellar pitcher and hitter. Wakaba, Kou's classmate, harbors a secret dream of marrying him one day. Their tranquil world shatters with a sudden tragedy. Fast forward four years, Kou, still training fervently, has yet to step onto the baseball field. As he finally returns to the game, the question looms - can he fulfill the untapped potential hidden within him, meeting the lofty expectations set by those aware of his dormant talent?

basic_info.title:
Kamisama no Iutoori 2
As the Gods Will: The Second Series

content.synopsis:
High schooler Yasuto Akashi's ordinary day takes a dark turn when a disagreement with his best friend, Senichi Aoyama, leads him to skip school. Recognizing his mistake, Akashi hurries back, only to find the school mysteriously cut off from the outside world. Chaos erupts as a colossal cat's head bursts through the windows, revealing Aoyama in a rat costume, bloodied.

Only three students survive the harrowing ordeal, but this is just the beginning. Similar bizarre incidents unfold globally. Akashi's safety is short-lived as he is drawn into a lethal game involving those absent on that ominous day.

basic_info.title:
Zetsuen no Tempest
Blast of Tempest
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Zetsuen no Tempest: The Civilization Blaster, Forsaken Tempest

content.synopsis:
A year ago, Aika Fuwa and her parents met a tragic end under mysterious circumstances. Seeking retribution for her untimely demise, Aika's determined older brother, Mahiro, embarks on a quest to uncover the truth behind her murder. Unexpectedly, Yoshino Takigawa, Aika's longtime secret boyfriend and Mahiro's childhood friend, is thrust into the investigation when a strange woman threatens him at gunpoint.

Yoshino soon discovers that Mahiro is under government scrutiny due to outbreaks of a puzzling "iron sickness" in places where he had been present. Fleeing from authorities, Mahiro and Yoshino's pursuit of Aika's killers grows increasingly perilous.

In a bid to unravel the mystery, Mahiro strikes a pact with Hakaze Kusaribe, the formidable sorceress of the Kusaribe Clan imprisoned on a remote island. As the clan's princess and leader, Hakaze offers her assistance to Mahiro in exchange for her freedom. Her mission: to thwart the resurrection of the ominous "Tree of Exodus" and prevent global catastrophe. Meanwhile, Samon Kusaribe, Hakaze's ex-aide, plots against her, stripping her of her magical abilities and exiling her to the island.

As Mahiro and Yoshino delve deeper into the enigma surrounding Aika's death to avert the looming crisis caused by the "Trees of Exodus and Genesis," they uncover unsettling truths. The investigation reveals that Aika's murder holds more complexity than anticipated, leading to a world teetering on the brink of chaos.

basic_info.title: Nidome no Jinsei wo Isekai de
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Second Life in Another World

content.synopsis:
"Kunugi Renya-san, you have died."

Thus begins the tale of a protagonist who meets his end in one world only to be beckoned by a self-proclaimed God to embark on a new life in a distant realm.

basic_info.title: Switch Girl!!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: スイッチガール!!

content.synopsis:
In the bustling halls of high school, Tamiya Nika reigns as the epitome of beauty and popularity. With her flawless appearance and charm, she effortlessly captivates everyone around her. But beneath this facade lies a stark contrast - at home, Nika transforms into a slovenly, frugal gamer sporting unflattering attire and a curt demeanor.

Unbeknownst to her peers, Nika meticulously toggles between these dual identities, known only to her loyal best friend. However, a chance encounter with the enigmatic transfer student, Kamiyama Arata, exposes her hidden worlds. Arata, who harbors his own concealed personas, challenges Nika's perception with his striking transformation from a geeky schoolboy to a stunning enigma behind closed doors.

As their paths intertwine, secrets unravel, unveiling a complex web of dualities in "Switch Girl!!" Volume 3.

basic_info.title: Hetalia Axis Powers
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hetalia: Comic Diary

content.synopsis:
In an unexpected twist, Germany finds an unlikely ally in the descendant of Ancient Rome, North Italy. Shocked to discover the once-mighty empire now a pasta-loving crybaby, Germany faces the challenge of navigating this eccentric partnership. Adding to the chaos is the enigmatic Japan, with equally peculiar quirks. As the Allies close in for battle, Germany must juggle his unconventional allies and prepare for the looming conflict.

With a blend of personified nations and witty humor, "Hetalia Axis Powers" humorously retells the events of World Wars I and II. Delving into the unique relationships between nations and sprinkled with cultural anecdotes, this quirky series offers a light-hearted take on history.

basic_info.title: Pupa
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: pupa

content.synopsis:
In the wake of enduring years of torment at the hands of their abusive father, siblings Utsutsu and Yume Hasegawa find themselves alone, with Utsutsu shouldering the responsibility of caring for his sister.

Their fragile peace shatters when Yume undergoes a horrifying transformation, becoming a monstrous entity that embarks on a deadly rampage, consuming flesh in its wake. This transformation is the result of a mysterious virus known as "Pupa," which also infects Utsutsu, granting him extraordinary regenerative abilities.

Determined to shield his sister at any cost, Utsutsu grapples with the harrowing consequences of the virus, willing to sacrifice his own well-being for Yume's survival. As they delve into the enigmatic origins of their affliction, the siblings confront a web of dark secrets that threaten to engulf them in a new wave of horrors.

basic_info.title:
Ore to Akuma no Blues
Me and the Devil Blues: The Unreal Life of Robert Johnson
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Me & the Devil Blues

content.synopsis:
In the year 1929, amidst the heart of the Mississippi Delta, a young farmer named R J harbors a burning desire to master the art of blues. Whispers of a mystical pact at a crossroads swirl around him, promising musical prowess in exchange for a soul. As the witching hour descends, R J embarks on a fateful encounter that alters his destiny forever.

Step into the phantasmagorical world of Ore to Akuma no Blues, a riveting tale inspired by the legendary Robert Johnson's infamous deal with the devil. Join us on this transformative journey where music, magic, and the price of fame converge in a haunting crescendo. Are you ready to discover the soul-stirring melodies that come with a devilish bargain?

basic_info.title: Dagashi Kashi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dagashikashi

content.synopsis: In a quaint rural town, Shikada Kokonotsu's destiny seems set as the heir to his family's traditional sweets shop. But his passion lies in creating manga, not running the shop. Enter the quirky and endearing Shidare Hotaru from a renowned sweets company, seeking Kokonotsu's father's expertise. She must win over Kokonotsu to inherit the shop if she wants his father to join her family's business. A sweet yet challenging summer unfolds as Kokonotsu grapples between his dreams and his family legacy.

basic_info.title: Oroka na Tenshi wa Akuma to Odoru
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Foolish Angel Dances with Demons, The Foolish Angel Dances with the Devil

content.synopsis: Akutsu Masatora, a demon on a mission to recruit allies for Hell in their eternal battle against the heavenly angels, cunningly blends into a high school in the human realm. When seated beside the captivating Lily Amane, a recent transfer student, Akutsu is entranced by her allure and sets his sights on enlisting her in his dark cause. However, as their connection deepens, Akutsu discovers that Lily harbors secrets that challenge his loyalties and stir unexpected emotions within him. Caught between his duty and his growing affection, Akutsu faces a dilemma that could alter the fate of both realms.

basic_info.title:
Real mo Tama ni wa Uso wo Tsuku
Sometimes Even Reality Is a Lie!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Genjitsu mo Tama ni wa Uso wo Tsuku, Game-zuki no Tomodachi to Iroiro suru Hanashi, Hanging Out with a Gamer Girl, Sometimes Reality Lies, Too.

content.synopsis: Kaoru Terazaki, a young boy, assumes the identity of a female character in his online gaming world. His frequent companion, the user Nanami, portrays a male avatar. As their virtual personas collide with reality, they decide to meet in person for the first time. However, their long-kept secrets unravel when they discover Nanami is actually a girl, contrary to Kaoru's assumptions. This revelation leaves them both reeling, particularly Nanami, who has already painted a different picture for her family. To navigate this unexpected turn of events, Nanami suggests a solution: Kaoru will don the guise of a girl. Despite their friendship being built on deception, this unconventional union marks the start of a unique bond.

basic_info.title:
Kimi wa Pet
Tramps Like Us

content.synopsis: Tired of feeling undervalued and overlooked, Sumire Iwaya reaches a breaking point and takes matters into her own hands by taking in a young boy she finds on the streets. Despite their contrasting personalities, they discover a surprising harmony as they embark on a journey to create a sense of normalcy in their lives.

basic_info.title: Jisatsu Circle
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Suicide Circle, Suicide Club

content.synopsis: In the world of "Jisatsu Circle," a manga inspired by the film of the same name by Sion Sono, a chilling tale unfolds. When 54 girls take their lives by throwing themselves in front of a train, the mystery deepens as one girl, Saya Kota, survives. She then forms a new Suicide Club with fellow survivors. Concerned for Saya's well-being, her best friend Kyoko delves into the enigmatic secrets of the club, determined to prevent further tragedies. As the story unravels, a haunting narrative of survival and sacrifice emerges, shedding light on the dark forces at play within the Suicide Club.

basic_info.title: Ping Pong
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ピンポン

content.synopsis: In the heart of their hometown, high schooler Makoto Tsukimoto, known as Smile, shares an enduring friendship with the spirited Yutaka Hoshino, also called Peco. Bonded by their love for table tennis, both possess remarkable skill, yet Smile's reserved nature consistently yields victory to Peco. As they navigate the dynamics of their table tennis club, their teacher recognizes Smile's hidden potential and endeavors to nurture his competitive spirit.

basic_info.title: Villain with a Crush
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Pure Love Villain, Sunjeong Villain, Pure Villain

content.synopsis:
Ever since special abilities emerged in humans, none have rivaled the esteemed police officer Han Do-Ryeong in popularity. With his striking looks, kindness, and unparalleled talents, he has become a beacon of hope in combating superpowered criminals, leading to a drastic reduction in crime across South Korea. However, all seems threatened when an enigmatic figure known as "Blackdog" emerges, challenging Do-Ryeong's invincibility and causing chaos in a daring confrontation.

Dubbed by the Bureau of Special Abilities, Blackdog's sinister agenda becomes clear – to target and take down Do-Ryeong. As threats escalate, Do-Ryeong is forced to step back for his safety, grappling with an uncertain future and the realization that his unique skills may no longer be enough to protect the public. Amidst this turmoil, a chance encounter with the mysterious Park Rosa unveils a surprising alliance that may hold the key to turning the tide against the looming darkness.

basic_info.title: I'm Not That Kind of Talent
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jeo Geureon Injae Animnida

content.synopsis: In the tumultuous life of Deon Hart, a frail individual plagued by bouts of bloody vomit from stress, exists another persona: Demon Arut. Misinterpreted as a figure of strength, Demon Arut instills fear in all who encounter him.

basic_info.title: The Broken Ring: This Marriage Will Fail Anyway
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: This Marriage Is Bound to Sink Anyway

content.synopsis: The enigmatic six-year-old Inés Valeztena de Perez stunned society by choosing Cárcel Escalante de Esposa as her betrothed, spurning the allure of a royal match. Despite her stoic facade, Cárcel believed in her love, only to find himself entangled in a web of deceit as he sought solace in other women. In a shocking turn of events, Inés confronts his infidelity with chilling indifference, sparking a twisted dynamic between them. As secrets unravel, it becomes clear that Inés' mysterious past holds the key to their dark and entwined fate.

basic_info.title: The First Night With the Duke
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Stole the Male Lead's First Night, Namju-ui Cheonnalbam-eul Gajyeo Beoryeotda

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, an ordinary college student wakes up as Ripley, a minor character in her beloved romance novel. Determined to relish the lavish lifestyle of her character while spectating the plot from afar, her intentions are disrupted when she unexpectedly wakes up next to Duke Zeronis, the novel's illustrious hero. Now, navigating through the treacherous plans of the antagonist, the Duke's amorous pursuits, and her own conflicting emotions, Ripley grapples to steer the narrative back on course and endure the challenges that arise beyond this fateful night.

Ariadna Lereg Ilestri Pre Agrigent. A name fit for royalty and a life destined for drama. Born into the spotlight as the daughter of the infamous tyrant king, conqueror of empires, and terror of all lands—my own father. Can I navigate life under the rule of this madman and come out unscathed?

basic_info.title: My Secretly Hot Husband
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Husband Hides His Beauty, Nampyeon-i Mimo-reul Sumgim

content.synopsis:
In a realm where nobles gossip and sympathize with the unfortunate Letitia Grey, who was wed to the infamous Lord Erden Halstead, whispers abound. Many scorn Erden as a monstrous killer, believing Letitia should not endure such a grim fate. Surprisingly, Letitia spurns all suitors and chooses to stand by her husband, defying all expectations.

Unbeknownst to all, Letitia's body harbors the spirit of a woman from Korea in this mystical land. Letitia was offered as a bride to the Halsteads by her uncle, who sought to protect his own kin from Erden's dark reputation. Anticipating a dreadful existence with Erden, Letitia is stunned to find a man who defies the malicious tales. And when she beholds his visage, Letitia is overcome with emotion as she witnesses the unparalleled beauty of her enigmatic husband, Erden.

basic_info.title: The Druid of Seoul Station
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Seoul-yeok Druid

content.synopsis: When an ordinary day takes a drastic turn, Suho Park finds himself whisked away from Earth to a mysterious planet due to a sudden catastrophe. In this unfamiliar world, he must quickly adapt and navigate the challenges to ensure his survival. Just as abruptly as he arrived, Suho is unexpectedly transported back to Earth, only to discover a new reality where the planet is under siege by monstrous creatures. Now faced with a relentless battle for Earth's survival, Suho must draw upon his newfound skills to confront the invading monsters. Will he be able to survive this perilous threat and protect his world from destruction?

basic_info.title: I Was the Final Boss
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Boss-yeosseum, I Used to Be a Boss

content.synopsis:
In the heart of the Abyssal Tower, a haunting dungeon teeming with monsters, resides the merciless and detached ruler, Baphomet. Countless Hunters have tried to vanquish him and dismantle the tower, yet all have faltered in their quest. Despite his infernal might, Baphomet finds himself intrigued by the ways of humanity. 
Everything changes when Raven, the most formidable Hunter, finally succeeds in defeating Baphomet. In his final moments, Baphomet discovers his desire to experience life as a human, a wish that transcends his former disdain for mankind. In a twist of fate, he is reborn as a mere mortal, stripped of his demonic powers.

basic_info.title: The Villainess Lives Again
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Villainess Lives Twice, Angnyeo-neun Dubeon Sanda

content.synopsis:
Artezia "Tia" Rosan has always sacrificed for her half-brother, Laurence. Their fickle mother constantly reminds Tia of her debt, leading her to use devious tactics to secure Laurence's path to the throne. But when Laurence turns on her, Tia is left to face the consequences alone.

Expecting a villain's end, Tia is unexpectedly rescued by Grand Duke Cedric Ebron, despite their animosity. Cedric urges her to change sides and help save their nation.

Instead of death, Tia finds herself two years in the past with knowledge of what lies ahead. With Cedric's support and her cunning, she navigates a treacherous path to break free from her troubled past and safeguard the empire.

basic_info.title:
My Heart Is Beating
Be Still My Heart
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life,                    Sports
            
                Sports
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Du-geun Du-geun Du-geun Geo-ryeo, It Beats and Beats and Beats

content.synopsis: In the bustling halls of the high school, 17-year-old model student Bae Sugu carries the weight of his father's high expectations as the school's vice principal. Yet, beneath his facade lies a hidden passion for swimsuits, a secret he guards fiercely. When caught snapping photos by the pool, his world is turned upside down by his homeroom teacher, thrusting him into a bizarre situation. Will Sugu break free from the stagnation of his life and rediscover the rhythm of his own heart?

basic_info.title: The Esper's Game
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Superhuman Battlefield, Choin-ui Game

content.synopsis: Seventeen years ago, the world narrowly escaped annihilation, thanks to the heroic actions of the Seven Heroes. However, their triumph came at a cost – the loss of the mightiest among them, Seomun Yeop. With peace prevailing, the once-mighty "espers" now find themselves obsolete, their extraordinary abilities lying dormant. Enter Battle Field, a cutting-edge VR game designed to reignite the spark in these beings. Despite Korea's recent struggles in tournaments, a stark reminder of its former glory, hope flickers anew as the long-lost Seomun Yeop makes a miraculous return. Can this legendary hero rise once more to defend his people in their hour of need?

basic_info.title: The Lord of Coins
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Lord's Coins Aren't Decreasing?!, Yeongju-nim-ui Coin-i Julji Aneum?!

content.synopsis: Aaron Steelegard's fate takes a dark turn when his enemies strip him of his wealth and life after he stumbles upon a mysterious book enabling him to traverse dimensions. Reborn as his younger self, armed with his memories, he seizes the opportunity for retribution. As he navigates the interdimensional trading circuits, he amasses wealth and skills, steadily climbing the ladder of power. Will Aaron accumulate the coins necessary to endure his quest for vengeance and restore his dignity?

basic_info.title: The Legendary Moonlight Sculptor
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dalbit Jogaksa

content.synopsis: In the realm of the immersive VR MMO Royal Road, Hyun is known for his resourcefulness, thriftiness, and some might even say stinginess. Despite facing setbacks after selling his prized character to pay off debts, his dedication remains unwavering. With a burning desire to succeed for the sake of his family, he dives headfirst into the game. Determined to avoid the fate of being a struggling sculptor, Hyun finds himself unexpectedly transformed into the Legendary Moonlight Sculptor. Now, he must navigate this new identity and forge his path to greatness in a world where strength and wealth reign supreme.

basic_info.title: A Kiss to the Prince
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kiss to My Prince, A Kiss for My Prince, A Kiss for the Prince

content.synopsis: Sei-Ann, a spirited orphan raised by a noblewoman, sets her sights on an ambitious goal - to become the bride of the prince. Fueled by her striking looks and regal aspirations, she is resolute in transcending her humble origins. Despite the prospect of marrying an unattractive prince, Sei-Ann believes it's a minor sacrifice to secure her destiny as the kingdom's future First Lady. From her youth, she has sensed her extraordinary nature and is determined to fulfill her grand purpose.

basic_info.title: Time-Limited Genius Dark Knight
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Terminally-Ill Genius Dark Knight, Sihanbu Cheonjae Amheuk Gisa

content.synopsis: "Inner Lunatic" is a challenging fantasy RPG known for its punishing difficulty. For Yoo Chan, facing a life-threatening illness from a young age, the game isn't just an escape—it's his new reality. As he steps into the shoes of Nox von Reinharber, the notorious villain of the game's first act, Yoo Chan must navigate this treacherous world. Can he outwit fate and conquer the game to reach a safe conclusion?

basic_info.title: Helmut
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Helmut: The Forsaken Child

content.synopsis:
Helmut, a child abandoned in the Demonic Beast Forest at birth, was raised by the very creatures that roamed its shadows. His encounter with the renowned Sword Saint Darien marked his first interaction with a human, setting in motion a destiny that would challenge the very core of his existence.

"Grow stronger if you want to escape this place."

Thrust into the realm of humans, the boy molded by beasts emerged with unmatched sword skills, striking presence, and keen intellect. Yet, amidst his prowess, one crucial element eluded him: his humanity. No longer prey but now predator, Helmut navigates a path where survival demands a transformation that goes beyond mere physical strength.

basic_info.title: I Am the Sorcerer King
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Naneun Madowang-ida

content.synopsis: Sunghoon Lee finds himself a mere casualty of a shifting world – a powerless individual in a realm overrun by beasts and magic. Amidst this chaos and danger, he must navigate his way through a treacherous landscape filled with monsters.

basic_info.title: Yongsa High: Dungeon Raiders
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Warrior High School: Dungeon Raid Department, Yongsa Gogyo Dungeon Gongnyakgwa

content.synopsis: In the 21st century, Earth collides with another world, giving rise to mystical "dungeons" filled with monsters and daring "adventurers." Enter Warrior High School, the prestigious South Korean institution shaping these heroes. Amidst false accusations and desperate dungeon runs to fund his father's health care, Jaryong Yoo, once renowned across Asia, encounters a fateful encounter: "You there, get in Warrior High School." Follow his journey of redemption as he navigates a world where secrets abound and self-discovery beckons.

basic_info.title: Spirit Fingers
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 스피릿 핑거스

content.synopsis: When you're almost 18, feeling awkward and insecure, what's the solution? Amy Song faces this dilemma. Staying holed up at home, buried in books, won't change a thing. Instead, she takes a leap and joins Spirit Fingers, an unconventional art club at her school. Amy soon realizes that embracing her authentic self involves more than just wielding a paintbrush.

basic_info.title: The Divine Twilight's Return
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Return of the Broken Constellation, Return of the Shattered Constellation, Buseojin Seongjwa-ui Hoegwi

content.synopsis: Following a trial, the ex-deity, known as "The Divine Twilight," receives an intriguing job offer from Thanatos, the ruler of the underworld. Reborn as Changsun Lee on Earth, he must now prevent interdimensional invaders. As Changsun readies himself for this mission, he senses ominous scrutiny. Will he grasp this opportunity for redemption, or is his fate sealed once more as the Divine Twilight?

basic_info.title: Transfer Student Storm Bringer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Stormy Transfer Student, Transfer Student The Storm Bringer

content.synopsis: In every school Ju Ingong sets foot in, his classmates quake in fear. With his naturally intimidating visage, he exudes a tough aura that earns him the moniker "Main Character." But beneath the surface, is he truly as fearsome as he appears?

basic_info.title: Heavenly Demon Reborn!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Chronicles of Heavenly Demon, Sinma Gyeongcheongi

content.synopsis: In a realm ruled by martial artists, Unseong witnesses his master's tragic death due to false accusations of forbidden arts. Despite a failed attempt at vengeance, he is granted a second chance at life. Reborn as a young warrior, he is destined to become a formidable member of a demonic sect. Unseong must now master dark powers to seek retribution against those who wronged him.

basic_info.title: Seoul Station's Necromancer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Seoul-yeok Necromancer

content.synopsis: On the unforgiving planet Alphen, Kang Woojin rose from a mere survivor to a formidable necromancer and ruler. Returning to Earth, he's reduced to a dungeon-crawling mercenary. Yet, his exceptional abilities quickly attract the interest of powerful guilds. As a familiar enemy plots invasion, Woojin's talents may be humanity's last hope against annihilation!

basic_info.title: Zippy Ziggy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 지피지기

content.synopsis:
In a world where reputation reigns supreme, Shinghi Kang has mastered the art of maintaining a false persona to win favor. Blessed with good looks and a disingenuously angelic demeanor, he captivates his school with his charm. But beneath the facade lies a complex family secret involving his cross-dressing devil of a father. Shinghi's carefully constructed world is turned upside down when Sung-Hae, a skilled martial artist with a penchant for playful deception, enrolls in their school.

As the clash of their fabricated identities unfolds, these two connoisseurs of deceit must engage in a battle of wits to determine who will emerge as the ultimate champion of deception.

basic_info.title: The Knight King Who Returned with a God
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sin-gwa Hamkke Doraon Gisawang-nim

content.synopsis: After three centuries of demon hunting in the otherworld, I made my long-awaited return to Earth. However, my homecoming was not a solitary one.

basic_info.title: Dice
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dice: The Cube that Changes Everything

content.synopsis: In a world where appearances, grades, and social status reign supreme, Dongtae finds himself at the lowest rung of the ladder. However, everything takes a drastic turn when the charismatic transfer student, Taebin, offers him a chance to rewrite his destiny. Entering the realm of DICE, Dongtae embarks on a journey where a simple roll of the dice holds the power to alter his entire existence.

basic_info.title: I Get Stronger the More I Eat
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Man-eun Surok Ganghaejim, I Grow Stronger By Eating!

content.synopsis: In the realm of "Pet Shop," Mr. Kim possesses an extraordinary gift - by consuming creatures, he assimilates their skills. Suddenly whisked away to a mystical land teeming with orcs, trolls, and beasts, Pet Shop encounters a cornucopia of fresh challenges, nourishment, and abilities. Fueled by ambition, Pet Shop embarks on a quest to reign supreme as the mightiest being. Witness his remarkable journey to dominance in a world where survival hinges on devouring the competition.

basic_info.title: The Warrior Returns
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hero Has Returned, Yongsa-ga Dorawatda, The Hero Has Returned

content.synopsis: Warrior Minsu Kim, having saved a world, returns to Earth only to face profound loss, leading him to a decision that shakes the very foundation of his former home. In a destructive frenzy, he unwittingly takes the life of teenager Jeongsu Park and his family. Yet, fate intervenes as Jeongsu is whisked away to a new realm, awakening as a warrior. With grit and valor, he vanquishes the demon king in this strange land, mastering the art of combat. Determined, Jeongsu comes back to Earth, consumed by a thirst for vengeance against Minsu. The clash of these two formidable warriors unfolds, the future of their nation hanging in the balance. Who will emerge triumphant in this epic battle of wills?

basic_info.title: Hardcore Leveling Warrior
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Yeol Level Jeonsa, Yeolleb Warrior

content.synopsis: Renowned as Hardcore Leveling Warrior, Ethan reigns as the top player in Lucid Adventure, the world's most massive game. Tragedy strikes when a shadowy adversary eliminates Ethan, resetting his character to level 1. Determined to reclaim his former glory, Ethan embarks on a relentless quest. Along the way, he encounters new allies, old adversaries, enigmatic powers, and confronts his haunting past. Will Ethan rise above the challenges and reclaim his dominance in the virtual realm?

basic_info.title: The Perks of Being a Villainess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Isn't Being a Wicked Woman Much Better?, It's Nice and Comfortable Because You're Villainess?, What's Wrong With Being the Villainess?

content.synopsis:
In the final moments before her demise, Yoon Dohee, a Korean architecture student, is struck by a revelation: she's perceived as a doormat, devoid of respect. However, a twist of fate transforms her into the audacious Deborah Seymour, a notorious villainess from a dark reverse harem novel. Envy over a precious pink diamond gifted to the protagonist Mia Binoche propels Deborah into a tumultuous journey that culminates in her confinement in a remote monastery.

Embracing her new persona, Deborah revels in the freedom of being a villainess from a powerful lineage, indulging in luxury and leisure. Despite her disinterest in the diamond, she must navigate the perilous realm of Mia and her suitors to avoid a tragic fate. Refusing marriage, a fate sealed for noblewomen, is not an option. To secure her autonomy, Deborah seeks wealth, assistance, and a mysterious informant cloaked in secrecy who may hold the key to her salvation.

basic_info.title: God of Blackfield
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 갓 오브 블랙필드

content.synopsis: In his ruthless path, Kang Chan, known as the fearsome "God of Blackfield," left destruction in his wake, with only ash and corpses as evidence. However, amidst the turmoil of combat, his life was abruptly extinguished by a mysterious bullet from behind. Three years later, he inexplicably returns to life, but as a timid high school student facing a new set of challenges—ruthless bullies, dubious dealings, and the complexities of teenage romance. While revenge appears within reach, navigating the treacherous terrain of high school proves to be a battle of its own for this once formidable "god."

basic_info.title: +99 Reinforced Wooden Stick
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: +99 Wooden Stick, 99 Ganghwa Namu Mongdungi

content.synopsis:
In the virtual realm of Chrono Life, players revel in freedom, thrills, and discovery. Yet, Lee Ji-u's experience is marred by rejection and ridicule despite his lavish spending on a sword. Plagued by criticism for his inexperience and meager gear, Ji-u's luck takes a turn when Luna extends an unexpected invitation to her party. Their camaraderie falters in a dark forest where Luna betrays and mocks Ji-u.

Crushed and demoralized, Ji-u seeks to enhance his gear, only to face failure after failure in reinforcing his items. A compassionate newcomer offers Ji-u a simple wooden stick, which he fortifies to an unprecedented level of +99. Astonishingly resilient, the stick shatters norms by splitting the continent with a single strike, setting a new record for mass player elimination.

Transformed from a scorned underdog to a legendary force in Chrono Life, Ji-u's extraordinary rise reshapes both his destiny and the virtual world itself.

basic_info.title: I Am the Real One
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Actually, I Was the Real One, Actually, I'm the Real One, Sasir-eun Naega Jinjja-yeotda

content.synopsis:
In the enigmatic House of Parvis, where "elementalists" are chosen by the water goddess, a destined protector emerges. Duke Ludwig Parvis anticipates the arrival of the prophesied sole elementalist from his lineage, his daughter Keira. Despite yearning for her father's approval, Keira's fate takes a dark turn when a mysterious girl named Cosette Weinberg claims to be the true heiress and elementalist, robbing Keira of her birthright. 

As Cosette's powers surface, Keira faces a swift and unjust demise for alleged deception. Miraculously, Keira awakens in the past, determined to reclaim her rightful place in the face of Cosette's deceit. With memories intact, Keira plots to expose the imposter and secure her rightful legacy, all while navigating a complex web of family secrets and betrayals.

basic_info.title: The Stellar Swordmaster
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Star-Fostered Swordmaster, Star-Embracing Swordmaster

content.synopsis: In the thriving trading town of Schoarra, known as the "Lighthouse of the North," a shadowy world thrives beneath its surface. Here, five brutal crime lords dominate the seedy slums. After a fallen knight devastates the brothel where he toils, street-smart orphan Vlad embraces a new destiny as a swordsman. Empowered by his sentient sword's wisdom, Vlad ventures into a dangerous realm of challenges and self-discovery, aligning himself with the formidable House Vayezid in pursuit of strength and influence.

basic_info.title: The Reborn Young Lord Is an Assassin
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Regressed Son of a Duke Is an Assassin, The Regressed Youngest Son of the Duke Is an Assassin

content.synopsis: In the realm where Cyan Vert, the illegitimate son of the duke, thrives as the empire's most skilled assassin, a treacherous act unfolds. His own righteous brother, the one whose shadow he has forever trailed, betrays him. Yet, as Cyan braces for the fatal strike, a mysterious twist occurs - he awakens to find himself a mere boy once more. A rebirth transpires, granting the young lord a fresh start, free from the shackles of living in another's shadow. Now, Cyan is determined to forge his own path, unbound by any looming silhouette.

basic_info.title: Author of My Own Destiny
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Wife of the Male Lead, Nae Namja Juingong-ui Anae-ga Doeeotda

content.synopsis:
In a captivating turn of events, the creator of the epic tale "The Emperor and the Saint" finds herself reborn as the enigmatic mage Fiona Green, the formidable final adversary she crafted to face a crushing defeat. Thrown into a world of treacherous snowscapes and monstrous perils by her callous family at a tender age, the 13-year-old Fiona embarks on a harrowing journey destined to rewrite her fate.

Determined to carve a new path and embrace a semblance of normalcy, Fiona seeks sanctuary in the ranks of Duke Abel Heylon's army, only to cross paths with Siegren, the emperor's illegitimate offspring whose valiant exploits are poised to shape the empire's destiny. As reality unravels in unexpected ways, Fiona grapples with the perplexing shifts in her relationships – from her former nemesis Abel's unexpected kindness to Siegren's unwavering loyalty.

Amidst the unsettling alterations in her characters' behaviors, Fiona fervently strives to unravel the threads of her predetermined narrative, yearning for a conclusion that transcends the confines of her own creation. For beyond the confines of her written tale lies a desire for her own well-deserved happily ever after.

basic_info.title: My F-Rank High School Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My School Life Pretending to Be a Worthless Person, Pyegeubin Cheokhaetdeon Hakgyo Saenghwal

content.synopsis: In a world where the human soul's essence, Edeya, holds immense power, society revolves around it. The invulnerable Edeya becomes the core of combat prowess, shaping humanity's focus. Meet Jinsong Park, bearing an F-rank soul and combat abilities. Branded weak due to a flawed military program and the Edeya rank system, he endures a decade of disdain from his peers. Little does he know, his Edeya harbors the S-rank "Absolute Killing Intent." Tormented by this revelation, Jinsong grapples with his soul's dark nature, seeing himself as worthless. Can he master his lethal instincts and shatter the notion of soul rankings?

basic_info.title: The SSS-Ranker Returns
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Return of the SSS-Class Ranker, SSS-geup Ranker Hoegwihada

content.synopsis: In a world where virtual reality games reign supreme, Rokan faces the ultimate betrayal by a powerful guild. Stripped of his accomplishments and dignity, Rokan seeks vengeance. However, a mysterious shift in time catapults him back to the game's inception.
