Armed with a second chance, this once top-ranked player seizes the opportunity to reclaim his former glory and outshine his adversaries before their rise even begins.

basic_info.title: Surviving the Game as a Barbarian
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Game Sok Barbarian-euro Saranamgi

content.synopsis:
For nine long years, Hansoo Lee immersed himself in the virtual realm of "Dungeon and Stone," until he stood at the precipice of a challenge no one had conquered: the boss stage. Yet, as he braced himself to face this ultimate trial, a startling twist awaited him. In a bewildering turn of events, Hansoo found himself seamlessly transposed into the body of Bjorn Jandel, a formidable barbarian within the game.

Within the remnants of a shattered world, only a lone city stood against the ravages of destruction. Regularly, a mysterious labyrinth materialized, beckoning daring adventurers with promises of riches. In this harsh landscape, barbarians like Bjorn were prized solely for their combat prowess, with survival hinging on their ability to fight. The city's ruthless tax system condemned those who faltered to a brutal fate, leaving no room for mercy.

In this unforgiving reality, being exposed as a player inhabiting their character spelled doom, branded as an insidious "evil spirit" destined for destruction. To escape this dire fate, Hansoo must navigate the perilous labyrinth, drawing upon his amassed expertise from years of gameplay and the formidable strength of his barbarian guise. Armed with his accumulated skills and a body honed for battle, Hansoo embarks on a treacherous quest for survival within the game's unforgiving confines.

basic_info.title: The Extra's Academy Survival Guide
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: How to Survive at the Academy

content.synopsis: In a world of gaming, Ed Rothstaylor finds himself cast as a lowly villain, shunned by his family and ousted from his dormitory due to his transgressions. But when he suddenly wakes up inhabiting the very body of Ed, he embarks on a quest to secure a scholarship for a chance at a prosperous future. Now dwelling in the wilderness, he strives to avoid the game's heroes, yet he is relentlessly pursued by four formidable female protagonists. As his mere existence begins to alter the game's course, Ed must navigate the delicate balance of shaping the narrative while evading the spotlight. Can he shape the story's progression without drawing unwanted attention?

basic_info.title: Distant Sky
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Simyeonui Hanuel

content.synopsis: In the heart of Gangnam, darkness reigns supreme. A lone voice whispers, "Am I the sole survivor? What mysteries enshroud me?" A young boy awakens amidst a sea of lifeless bodies within a desolate building. Streets devoid of cars, skies devoid of stars - the eerie stillness blankets not just Gangnam, but the entire city in a haunting emptiness.

basic_info.title: Dungeon Odyssey
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dungeon Gyeonmullok

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of the conflict between the surface and the depths, a new breed emerged known as "dungeon babies" - individuals with extraordinary powers fixated on underground mazes. Among them is Jinwoo Kim, who strives to lead a normal existence as a guide while nurturing his loved ones. However, fate takes a sharp turn during a failed expedition, thrusting Jinwoo into an unexpected role as the master of a labyrinth. As he grapples with his innate urges, he realizes that his extraordinary nature cannot be denied indefinitely...

basic_info.title: The Monstrous Duke's Adopted Daughter
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Monster Duchess and Contract Princess, The Monster Duchess and the Contract Lady, Goemul Gongjak-gaui Gyeyak Gong-nyeo

content.synopsis:
For over a century, the Speràdo family has awaited an heir with the power to command darkness. When Marquis Speràdo offers his second daughter, Leslie, to enhance her sister's feeble shadow abilities, fate takes an unexpected turn. Rescued from a sacrificial fate by enigmatic entities, Leslie awakens a formidable shadow magic surpassing even her sister's skills.

Disgusted by her family's cruelty and twisted traditions, Leslie resolves to break free. Seeking an alliance with the formidable "Monstrous Duke," Azela Benkahn Salvator of the Salvator duchy, she proposes a daring pact. In exchange for a new life within the Salvator clan until adulthood, Leslie offers to become Azela's protege as a "Dark Saint." With unwavering determination, she embarks on a path to liberation from the Speràdos' grasp, striving to claim her own happiness as a Salvator.

basic_info.title: My In-Laws are Obsessed with Me
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Si-World-ga Naege Jipchak Handa

content.synopsis:
Pereshati Zahardt, the heiress of her late father's county, once trusted her stepmother, stepsister Reina, and devoted fiancé Schiff. Betrayed by those she held dear, she faces her demise until an inexplicable twist transports her back in time. With a newfound chance to rewrite her fate, she strikes a deal with the formidable war hero Grand Duke Therdeo Lapileon to navigate a treacherous path.

Bound by a contract marriage to protect their interests, Pereshati soon uncovers a dark family secret—the Lapileon blood is lethal to most. Yet, she stands immune, opening a door to vengeance against those who wronged her. As she treads this delicate balance of revenge and reconciliation, Pereshati strives to mend the fractured ties within her newfound family.

basic_info.title: Cheese in the Trap Season 4
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 치즈인더트랩 시즌4

content.synopsis: In the thrilling conclusion of "Cheese in the Trap," viewers are taken on a rollercoaster ride through the lives of Yoo Jung, Seol, In-ho, and In-ha. Loyalties are tested, secrets are revealed, and unexpected alliances are formed. As the tension escalates at Seoyeon University, the characters must navigate through love, jealousy, and betrayal to uncover the truth behind their intertwined destinies. Get ready for a gripping finale that will leave you on the edge of your seat till the very last moment.

basic_info.title: Demon Devourer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Talent-Swallowing Magician, Jaeneung Samkin Mabeopsa

content.synopsis: Descended from a renowned wizarding lineage, Elric Mervinger finds himself bereft of magic abilities due to a peculiar ailment. In his quest for a cure, he encounters the demon Mephistopheles, seeking to escape a dragon's confinement by inhabiting Elric's body. Yet, a twist of fate leads to Elric absorbing Mephisto, intertwining their fates. Empowered by this unexpected fusion, can Elric revive his family's prestige, or will he succumb to darker forces?

basic_info.title: Daytime Star
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Naj-e Tteuneun Byeol

content.synopsis:
Hwang Yura's starry ambitions have burned bright for years, but success has remained elusive despite a debut seven years prior. Just when hope flickers low, a breakthrough arrives in the form of a promising movie role. Yet, fate's twist casts her once more in a minor part, dimming her hopes.

On set, Yura crosses paths with two figures from her past—her conceited ex, Kim Jeong-u, and the renowned actor Kang Seunghyeon. Determined to focus amidst Jeong-u's ego, Yura finds herself drawn to the charming Seunghyeon, who harbors a curious connection to her. As they navigate the challenges of filming, an unexpected bond forms between the aspiring actress and the leading star. Amidst the industry's trials, Yura strives towards her radiant dream of stardom.

basic_info.title: Player
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 플레이어

content.synopsis: After leaving a standout comment, our protagonist unexpectedly finds themselves thrust into the spotlight as the central figure of a popular webtoon series!

basic_info.title: My Daughter Is the Final Boss
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nae Ttar-eun Choejong Boss

content.synopsis: In a world decimated by his daughter, the witch Seola Lee, Seojun Lee is given a chance to rewrite fate. As he slips into unconsciousness, a new mission is bestowed upon him: "Change The Future." Upon waking, he is face-to-face with a young Seola. Determined to prevent her descent into darkness, Seojun must now navigate fatherhood to alter the course of destiny. Failure could mean the ultimate catastrophe.

basic_info.title:
Yureka
iD_eNTITY
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 유레카

content.synopsis: In the real world, Roto, Boromid, and Ah-Dol are just your everyday kids facing everyday challenges. But once they enter the virtual realm of Lost Saga, they transform into legendary heroes. To rise to the top, they must set aside their squabbles and focus on leveling up. From werewolves causing chaos to alluring yet troublesome thieves, our trio must stay on their toes. In Lost Saga, appearances deceive, and danger lurks at every virtual corner. Click by click, they'll learn that in this game, anyone can be a target.

basic_info.title: The Voodooist's Wrathful Return
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Returned as an FFF-Class Witch Doctor, Hoegwi Haenneunde FFF-geup Voodoo Sulsa

content.synopsis: As Jinsung Ma nears completion of a quest in the virtual realm of "Demon King Raid," his teammate's betrayal shatters his progress. But just as all seems lost, a mysterious force intervenes, offering a new path. Transformed into a Witch Doctor, Jinsung embarks on a thrilling journey, embracing a role he never imagined. Join the adventure with Jinsung Ma in "Demon King Raid"!

basic_info.title: My Unexpected Marriage
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: When the Count's Illegitimate Daughter Gets Married, Baekjakga-ui Sasaenga-ga Gyeolhonhamyeon

content.synopsis: Laritte Brumayer, the illegitimate daughter of a count, endured a harsh upbringing in an abusive home. Her fate takes a surprising turn when she is unexpectedly betrothed to Duke Ian Reinhardt, who was declared a traitor and supposedly killed, in place of her sister. Thrilled at the chance to break free from her past, Laritte embraces her new role as the presumed widow. However, her newfound peace is shattered when Ian resurfaces, insisting on his innocence. Despite her initial doubts, Laritte decides to aid him in proving his loyalty, unaware of the challenges awaiting her on this treacherous path.

basic_info.title: Iseop's Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Lee Seop's Love, Lee Seop's Romance, Lee Seob-ui Yeonae

content.synopsis:
At the helm of the prestigious TK Group stands the impeccable Tae Junseop, a man who outshines even the most captivating fictional characters. His high-profile romance with his non-celebrity girlfriend never fails to capture the public's attention. Meanwhile, his cousin Iseop grapples with feelings of inadequacy despite his decade-long commitment to TK Group, where he consistently falls short in comparison to Junseop, compounded by his lack of romantic experience.

Enter the competent Kang Mingyeong, a standout employee at TK Group for a decade. Having started her career alongside Iseop, she effortlessly ascends the corporate ranks, becoming the object of Iseop's envy. When Junseop unexpectedly appoints her as Iseop's personal assistant, Mingyeong is confronted with formidable challenges. Iseop's immature behavior, aversion to sharing his possessions, and apparent disdain for work test her patience. Driven by familial responsibilities, Mingyeong perseveres through the trials of assisting this unpredictable man, gradually uncovering a tender side beneath his eccentricities.

basic_info.title: Monster Duke's Daughter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Goemul Gongjak-ui Ttal

content.synopsis: When Lotilucia's mother mysteriously disappears, the three-year-old discovers a magical crest that whisks her away to the grand estate of House Frodium, ruled by Duke Damian Frodium, known as the feared "Monster Duke" due to his demon lineage. Recognizing him as her father, little Lottie navigates her way through the noble family's secrets. A chance encounter with a mystical book unveils a chilling tale of a previous Lotilucia's demise and a new adopted daughter taking her place. Determined to rewrite her destiny, Lottie embraces her bold nature, charming both her demon father and the estate's inhabitants. As she revels in her newfound identity, the question looms: can she outwit fate and thrive as the Monster Duke's spirited daughter?

basic_info.title: Skill Master Levels Up
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Level Up with Skills, Skill-ppallo Level Up

content.synopsis:
In 2020, Earth is under siege by mysterious creatures, prompting players to confront the menacing Labyrinth. Their choices: Easy Mode for survival, Normal Mode for a challenge, Hard Mode for the elite few, and the brutal Solo Mode.

Taesan Kang, a formidable Easy Mode victor, triumphs with unique skills like Addition, Multiplication, and more. Despite his prowess, his power falls short. As humanity teeters on the brink, a glimmer of hope emerges.

Determined to rise stronger, Taesan embarks on a daring Solo Mode quest. Brace for Skill-based Player Taesan Kang's epic return to the Labyrinth!

basic_info.title: The Moment When a Fox Becomes a Wolf
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 여우가 늑대되는 순간

content.synopsis:
In a twist of fate, Gook Eun-Song, a regular high school student, faces heartbreak when her charming younger sister snatches her crush away. Seeking solace, Eun-Song retreats to a supposedly cursed closet in her father's furniture store after drowning her sorrows in alcohol. Meanwhile, rebellious bad boy Yu Ha, known for his daring antics, finds himself in a wild chase with the law. 

As fate would have it, Yu Ha stumbles into the same cursed closet where Eun-Song lies in an alcohol-induced slumber. To their shock, they awaken the next day to discover their identities have inexplicably swapped! With this bizarre twist, Eun-Song and Yu Ha are left to grapple with the aftermath of their unexpected body switch. What further trials await our beleaguered heroine in this topsy-turvy tale?

basic_info.title: Perfect Marriage Revenge
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Wanbyeokhan Gyeolhon-ui Jeongseok

content.synopsis:
When Han Iju said "I do" to Jeong Sehyeok, it was a storybook romance. The union of the company heiress and the chauffeur's son seemed like a fairy tale come true. Despite the class disparity, Sehyeok showered Iju with affection, oblivious to societal norms. Iju endured a life of domestic strife with her oppressive in-laws, all for the sake of her beloved husband. The only thing that mattered was their togetherness.

However, Iju's world crumbles when she uncovers Sehyeok's secret love for her sister, Yura. Shocked and heartbroken, Iju meets a tragic fate while fleeing the scene, struck by a car. In her final moments, she witnesses Sehyeok's devotion to Yura, not to her.

Miraculously, Iju awakens a year in the past, on the eve of her ill-fated marriage to Sehyeok. This unexpected twist grants her a chance for redemption and retribution against those who led to her downfall. Determined to rewrite her destiny, Iju embarks on a journey of vengeance, determined to emerge victorious in the game of life.

basic_info.title: My 990 Thousand Past Lives Help Me
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 990k Ex-Life Hunter, 99-man Jeonsaeng-i Nal Dowajwo

content.synopsis: As an F-Rank hunter, Kang Hyeonjun faces the harsh reality of a world filled with dungeons and real monsters. Struggling to prove his worth in raids, he grapples with his plummeting self-esteem after facing criticism from his party members. To add salt to the wound, his girlfriend, who has advanced in ranks alongside him, ends their relationship on their anniversary. Lost and inebriated, Hyeonjun stumbles into a surreal dreamscape instead of his modest abode. Here, a man from his past lives emerges, offering him a chance to grow stronger. But strength comes at a cost – can Hyeonjun withstand the grueling trials ahead to achieve the power he craves?

basic_info.title: Ultra-Alternate Character
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ultra Alter, Choegang Bukae

content.synopsis: In the world of Ergosphere Online, Oreum Lee faces ridicule from his party members in the VR MMORPG for his lackluster healing skills. To make matters worse, he endures bullying from his in-game teammates at school. However, Oreum finds solace in his alter ego, a formidable Avenger class character he maneuvers with unparalleled expertise. When Oreum unexpectedly inherits his alter ego's powers due to a system glitch upon logging out, he is thrust into a battle against malevolent creatures from the game's universe. Can Oreum navigate both the treacherous game world and the challenges of his real-life school environment simultaneously?

basic_info.title: There Must Be Happy Endings
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bandeusi Happy Ending

content.synopsis: When Yeonu's contract marriage ends, tragedy strikes as her estranged husband, Seonjae, dies before her eyes. But a mysterious turn of events sends her back 100 days in time, offering her a shot at altering fate. Yeonu seizes this opportunity to prevent the fatal incident. Armed with hindsight, she embarks on a mission to rewrite their story and secure the happy ending they deserve.

basic_info.title: Necromancer Academy and the Genius Summoner
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Necromansa Hakgyo-ui Sohwan Cheonjae

content.synopsis: In a world where necromancers are renowned for their formidable magic, Simon Follentia stands out with his extraordinary innate abilities. Recruited by the prestigious necromancer's academy, this prodigious talent is poised for greatness. Yet, as Simon's powers reach unprecedented levels, the looming question remains: will his unmatched skills invite unexpected repercussions?

basic_info.title: Updater
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 업데이터

content.synopsis: In a glitched world, Aiden, an ordinary NPC struggling to provide for his sister, faces devastation when the omnipotent system administrator erases their entire town. Amidst the chaos, a twist of fate grants Aiden unexpected administrator powers, but tragedy strikes as his sister vanishes before his eyes. Determined to avenge her, Aiden harnesses his newfound abilities to confront the mysterious rulers of his realm and protect NPCs from further deletion.

basic_info.title: I'll Raise You Well in This Life, Your Majesty!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: In This Life, I Will Raise You Well, Your Majesty!, Ibeon Saeng-eun Jedaero Kiwo Deurigetseumnida, Pyeha!

content.synopsis: Upon awakening to the gaze of her son, Leon, brimming with affection and worry, Ellisa is struck by the gift of a second chance. In her previous existence, she believed thrusting Leon onto the throne was the sole path to safeguard his well-being. Little did she know that the crown, steeped in the blood of foes and loved ones, would drive him to a tragic end. Now reborn, Ellisa is resolute in securing a future where Leon thrives both in life and joy. Determined to rewrite their destiny, she embarks on a journey where fate will be reshaped, and a new dawn awaits.

basic_info.title: Zomgan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 좀간

content.synopsis: In a world ravaged by a viral outbreak that birthed the fearsome "zomgans," half-human, half-zombie rulers, humanity teeters on the brink of extinction. The Eradication Front, a defiant group led by the enigmatic "transcenders" with extraordinary abilities, wages a desperate battle against the oppressive zomgan regime. When hope seems lost, a glimmer appears in the form of Mirae On, an immortal boy whose presence may tip the scales in the fight for survival.

basic_info.title: Debut or Die!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: If I Fail to Debut, I'll Get a Killer Disease, Debut Mot Hamyeon Jungneun Byeong Geollim

content.synopsis:
After a night of heavy drinking following yet another failed civil service exam, Ryu Gunwoo wakes up in a motel room with a startling twist—he now inhabits the body of Park Moondae, a 20-year-old orphan who tragically ended his own life. What's more, Ryu finds himself thrust three years back in time, with no trace of his original self.

In a desperate bid to alter Moondae's fate, he must navigate the cutthroat world of the idol survival show, Idol Inc., and hone his skills to perfection. Drawing on Moondae's past as a paparazzo, Ryu has a glimpse into the intricacies of the idol industry. But as he treads this precarious path, one misstep could unravel his future aspirations—and unravel the very fabric of his being.

basic_info.title: Gwi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Demon, Ghost, Ears

content.synopsis: Embark on a riveting journey with Mu-Sang, who is on a mission to eradicate every last "Gwi" from existence. Despite facing the formidable imperial army, his resolve remains unshaken. Along his quest, he encounters a mysterious girl marked with the same symbol as him. Is their meeting predestined? What deep-seated vendetta drives Mu-Sang against the "Gwi"? Unravel the enigmatic truths and mysteries that await in this compelling tale.

basic_info.title: The Unintentionally Ideal Adopted Daughter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Acted as the Adopted Daughter Too Well, I Played the Role of the Adopted Daughter Too Well

content.synopsis: When Arin Han unexpectedly finds herself inhabiting the role of Viola Vellatoux in her beloved book, she's determined to change the narrative's tragic course. But in this treacherous world where familial betrayal runs deep, she must navigate a deadly game of power plays within her own adoptive family. As she strives to assert her authority, Arin faces the added challenge of a strangely familiar male lead whose presence unnerves her. Can she rewrite her fate without sacrificing her integrity?

basic_info.title: Your Smile is a Trap
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Neoui Miso-ga Hamjeong

content.synopsis: Former idol trainee Kiyu has always basked in adoration for his stunning appearance. However, yearning for a normal high school experience, he disguises himself with glasses to fit in. As he navigates this new world incognito, Kiyu discovers that friendship is elusive without his looks to rely on. Complicating matters, his social ineptitude, a perpetually scowling seatmate, and persistent fans from his past all converge at his new school.

basic_info.title: The Archmage's Restaurant
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Wizard's Restaurant, Eoneu Mabeopsa-ui Sikdang

content.synopsis: In a distant land, a man reborn as a 9th class wizard, turned savior of a continent in a fierce dragon war, now leads a tranquil life. His new venture? A quaint countryside restaurant with an unexpected guest residing upstairs – a black dragon in human form, known as Rurin. Despite her endearing qualities of greed, cuteness, and loyalty, Rurin remains blissfully unaware of the human realm. Together, they navigate a charming routine of serving patrons, tackling challenges, and nurturing violets in their garden, creating a cozy and delightful haven.

basic_info.title: Ashtarte
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 아슈타르테

content.synopsis: In the grand Firenze Empire, shadows loom over Princess Ashtarte, whose striking black hair marks her as a harbinger of darkness in a family of silver-haired royalty. Cast aside by her kin as an ill omen, Ashtarte seeks solace and acceptance. Embracing the forbidden art of magic, she embarks on a journey that leads her to a mysterious realm through a twist of fate. There she encounters Abelion Elforman, a captive youth burdened by his own troubled history. Bound by intertwined destinies, can Ashtarte and Abelion defy the looming darkness to unveil the light within their intertwined fates?

basic_info.title: Farmer of Spirits
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Spirit Farmer, Jeongnyeong Nongsakkun

content.synopsis:
Years ago, enigmatic portals materialized, unleashing monstrous beings. Simultaneously, certain individuals acquired extraordinary abilities, segregating into hunters who combat the monsters head-on and others who provide clandestine aid to both hunters and society.

Despite rigorous training aspiring to join the ranks of these gifted beings, Lee Geon Woo relinquishes his ambitions to toil on a farm and sustain his family. One fateful afternoon, a mysterious voice emanates from a sprouting plant, prompting him to nurture it. Rapidly maturing, the plant transforms into a young girl. To compound his bewilderment, Geon Woo learns she is a "spirit of farming," and he is now a superhuman.

Christened Hawa by Geon Woo, the girl aids him in cultivating crops of unparalleled quality, poised to revolutionize the world and alleviate the struggles of those in need.

basic_info.title: Lady Chef Royale
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Royal Chef Yeongae-nim

content.synopsis: In an unexpected turn of events, Sena finds herself transported to a new world where she is shunned as the daughter of a noble family. Determined to reclaim her place, she leverages her culinary prowess from her past life's little restaurant. Renamed Senianna, she embarks on a journey to win the prestigious title of Chef Royale by showcasing her exceptional cooking skills, including her specialty, Korean fried chicken. Can Senianna's delectable dishes secure her the ultimate victory and usher in a new era of influence and love in this empire?

basic_info.title: Lucia
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 루시아

content.synopsis: When Lucia discovers she is Princess Vivian Hesse, gifted with the ability to foresee her destiny through dreams, she learns of a terrifying marriage that lies ahead. Determined to alter this grim fate, she seeks the help of Hugo Taran, known as the feared "Black Lion of the Battlefield." In a bold move, Lucia proposes an unorthodox pact with Hugo, unaware of the unexpected bond it may forge between them.

basic_info.title: 3 Level Combination
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: 3-Part Transformation, Kim Chang-Nam

content.synopsis: In a future world dominated by robots, Hogu, a compassionate young boy, struggles to survive in poverty alongside his grandmother and sister. Despite his gentle nature, he faces constant bullying and isolation at school. Just when he feels most alone, Hogu's life takes a surprising turn when he encounters a mysterious robot girl, sparking the beginning of a remarkable journey.

basic_info.title:
Change Guy
Quantum Mistake
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 체인지가이

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, a brainy student named Tuji and the school's toughest guy, Usoo, find themselves in a mind-bending switcheroo after a daring experiment with a quantum teleporter goes awry. With their bodies swapped but minds unchanged, Usoo is thrust into Tuji's former life of chaos and rebellion. Now faced with enemies at every turn, Usoo must navigate this new reality with his former gentle nature. Will he rise to the challenge and embrace his inner fighter, or will his kind heart prove to be his greatest weapon in this battle of identities?

basic_info.title: My Daughter Is a Dragon!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nae Ttar-eun Dragon!

content.synopsis: Jihoon's mundane life takes a magical turn when his daughter mysteriously appears out of nowhere. With the help of the intelligent and enchanting Chaerin, Jihoon's fortunes change dramatically. His appearance improves, his intellect sharpens, and his stature grows, all orchestrated by his daughter's master plan. From a regular university student, Jihoon transforms into a groundbreaking AI researcher at the forefront of the Fourth Industrial Revolution.

basic_info.title: Whale Star: The Gyeongseong Mermaid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gorae-byeol, Gorae Byul

content.synopsis: In 1926, in Japan-occupied Joseon, the life of 17-year-old Soo-a, an illiterate handmaiden serving a prominent Japanese collaborator, takes a fateful turn. After finding the injured independence activist Eui-hyeon unconscious on the beach, Soo-a selflessly nurses him back to health. As their bond grows, Eui-hyeon shares the poignant tale of the "Little Mermaid" who saved a prince from death. Enchanted by Eui-hyeon, Soo-a embarks on a journey to reunite with him, unaware of the perilous destiny that mirrors the mermaid's tragic fate in her quest for love.

basic_info.title: I'm the Tyrant's Secretary
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Secretary of the Tyrant, Pokgun-ui Biseogwan-i Doeeotseumnida

content.synopsis: In a bid to rescue my family from an impending catastrophe, I volunteered to step into the role of the Emperor's secretary, replacing my bumbling brother. With a knack for exceeding expectations due to my past life experiences, I plunged into my duties with unwavering determination. Despite my flawless service to the oppressive Emperor, ensuring every task was executed flawlessly, the time had come for me to bid farewell to the relentless toil. Unexpectedly, upon tendering my resignation, the Emperor's chilling response echoed, "Do you seek death?" Your Highness, known for your aloof demeanor towards others, why hinder my path to a tranquil existence? Grant me the freedom to live out my days in peace!

basic_info.title: The Strongest Florist
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kkonman Kiuneunde Neomu Gangham

content.synopsis: In spite of his fighter-like appearance and intimidating scowl, Jaeho harbors a deep passion for floristry. Yet, his domineering father insists on Jaeho pursuing a career in MMA. Seeking refuge from his father's expectations, Jaeho immerses himself in the virtual realm of New World. Can he break free from his father's demands and pursue his floral dreams within this digital escape?

basic_info.title: An Uncomfortable Truth
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Bulpyeonhan Jinsil

content.synopsis: In a shocking turn of events, the typically reserved Yoseob finds himself at the police station, accused of attacking eight people with a knife. Doubts swirl about his involvement in the crime. As a high school student, what could drive him to such a gruesome act? Could his intense adoration for his older brother, Jaeha, hold the key to this chilling mystery?

basic_info.title: My Kitty and Old Dog
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Young Cat and My Old Dog

content.synopsis: Dive into the heartwarming world of "My Kitty and Old Dog," where the endearing bond between the old poodle Nang-nak, the adorable kitten Soondae, and their affectionate owners unfolds through a series of touching and episodic tales. Discover a blend of autobiographical narratives, sharing the artist's personal journey with these beloved pets, intertwined with a unique perspective from the pets themselves, offering a fresh and innocent approach to storytelling.

basic_info.title: Han Daesung, Back From Hell
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Han Dae Sung Returned From Hell, Jiok-eseo Doraon Han Daesung, Returned From Hell

content.synopsis: Middle schooler Daesung Han is plunged into a nightmarish underworld with a game-like twist. Battling for survival over 80 grueling years, he triumphs over the Demon God. Presented with a choice to return to Earth, Daesung awakens from a coma, realizing only a decade has passed. Earth now faces a new threat - Gates pouring out monsters, countered by the elite Hunters. Struggling to adapt to his lost powers, Daesung is thrust back into action as a hellish quest beckons once more.

basic_info.title: Ugly Duckling to Swan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Miunohri to Swan, Miunohri Baekjodoigi

content.synopsis: In the land of Fairview, our heroine, a short, plump, and unattractive girl named Lily, undergoes a magical transformation by an elderly gentleman, becoming a stunning beauty. However, a peculiar twist unfolds: whenever raindrops touch her, she reverts to her former appearance, only to regain her beauty once more. The catch lies in a fateful kiss – once bestowed upon another, her beauty is lost forever. Join Lily on her enchanting journey where beauty, identity, and love intertwine in unexpected ways under the capricious touch of raindrops.

basic_info.title: Knight Run
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 나이트런

content.synopsis: In an age of space exploration, humanity finds itself locked in a brutal conflict with mysterious monsters. With the outcome looking dire, a final desperate gambit is made. Enter the Knights, humanity's last hope to shift the tides of this grim war.

basic_info.title: Revelation of Youth
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Apocalypse of Youth, Cheongchun Gyesirok

content.synopsis: A perilous cohabitation commences as Chungah finds herself living with Yohan, the son of the cult leader! Betrayed by her uncle and abandoned by her parents in pursuit of him, Chungah now resides alone in an eerie abode. The notorious "Millennium Adventist" cult, like Chungah's family, fell victim to her deceitful uncle. Unexpectedly, Yohan arrives at Chung-ah's doorstep with his belongings in tow. Will this arrangement with the cult leader's son end in peace, or chaos?

basic_info.title: The Rebirth of a Tyrannical Empress
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I've Become the Villainous Empress of a Novel, Soseol Sok Angnyeo Hwangje-ga Doeeotda

content.synopsis: After a tipsy night of wine indulgence, Songha finds herself in the fantastical realm of her beloved novel, embodying the powerful Empress Yulia. Yet, the thrill of ruling an empire fades as she faces a grim destiny—Yulia's demise orchestrated by her loyal guard captain, Justo. With a mere three days before a treacherous coup unfolds, Songha must engineer a plan to alter the impending tragedy. Opting for compassion and kindness, she seeks redemption by uniting with the exiled subjects Yulia once spurned. Can Songha's newfound approach sway the populace back in her favor, or will her sudden transformation sow further seeds of doubt and rebellion?

basic_info.title: Men of the Harem
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Harem-ui Namja-deul

content.synopsis: Betrayed by her lover and thrust into leadership following her father's enigmatic murder, Latil faces a crucial decision: to solidify her rule over Tarium, she must wed. Rather than selecting a single suitor as her Royal Consort, she defies tradition by assembling a diverse Harem of five men. As Latil grapples with her father's unresolved death, she navigates the intricate dynamics within her unconventional court. Will she uncover the truth behind her father's assassination and maintain harmony among her chosen companions?

basic_info.title: Tale of a Scribe Who Retires to the Countryside
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nakhyang Munsajeon

content.synopsis: When scholar Son Bin flunks the national exams, he unexpectedly crosses paths with a martial arts master who entrusts him with the unique mission of chronicling his life story. As they venture together, Son Bin encounters remarkable individuals, leading him down a transformative path that echoes that of his mentor, ultimately becoming the revered Martial Arts King.

basic_info.title: The Executioner
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sahyeong Jiphaenggwan

content.synopsis: In a world where heroes abide by a strict no-kill rule, Gangyu grapples with his team's principles until tragedy strikes: the villain who destroyed his squad murders his brother behind bars. Driven by vengeance, Gangyu forsakes his oath and becomes the executioner in the infamous Ruculus prison. Tasked with eliminating the most dangerous criminals, he embarks on a perilous journey to confront the ultimate villain.

basic_info.title: The Age of Arrogance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: City of Arrogance

content.synopsis:
After nearly three decades of struggle, the barren land of Pervaz emerges victorious over the Lore tribe under the leadership of Commander Asha Pervaz Del Amir, the last surviving descendant of the Pervaz lineage. Yet, Asha's challenges are far from over. With her people facing starvation, she must secure the promised payment from the emperor, her late father's debt.

However, the emperor's intentions prove deceitful, offering Asha an alternative reward: a marriage of her choice. Uninterested in a husband, Asha astutely selects Duke Carlisle Haven Evaristo, the emperor's disinherited son. Opting for a strategic three-year contract marriage, Asha and Carlisle relocate to Pervaz, where she gains resources to rejuvenate her realm, while Carlisle finds sanctuary to reclaim his birthright and ascend the throne.

basic_info.title: A Royal Princess with Black Hair
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Black-Haired Princess, Geomeun-meori Hwang-nyeo-nim

content.synopsis: In the kingdom of Caruel and Euricienne, two young royals, both 16 years old, find themselves bound by an unwanted political marriage. Despite their shared disdain for the arrangement, they embark on a mission to force each other to seek a divorce. However, lurking enemies conspire to not only separate them but also endanger their lives. As Caruel and Euricienne navigate treacherous challenges hand in hand, they discover a growing attraction between them. Will they stick to their resolve to dissolve the marriage, or will destiny unveil a different path for the hesitant pair?

basic_info.title: What It Means to Be You
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: To Help You Understand, Dangsinui Ihae-reul Dopgi Wihayeo

content.synopsis: Princess Violet, a poised royal, is forced into marriage with Winter, a hotheaded nobleman's illegitimate son, to settle her family's debts. Despite her immediate affection, their union unravels, stripping her of royal status and tarnishing her reputation. After three tumultuous years, Violet reaches her breaking point, only to awaken in Winter's body. As they grapple with this inexplicable switch and face isolation, will they bridge the chasm between them?

basic_info.title: Estio
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 에스티오

content.synopsis: In a quaint village, Estio, a humble farmer's son, possesses a remarkable gift: the power to delve into the minds of both humans and animals. Yet, this unique ability sets him apart, leading to ostracization by the villagers. Seeking solace in the company of his animal companions, Estio endures years of isolation until his 19th birthday, when he decides to embark on a journey of self-discovery. Along the way, he forges unlikely alliances and faces unforeseen challenges that may reveal the true extent of his powers. Will these newfound connections help Estio realize the profound potential hidden within him?

basic_info.title: Queen in the Shadows
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Queen of the Shadows, Shadow Queen, The Shadow Empress, Geurimja Hwangbi

content.synopsis: In a tale devoid of fairy dust, we delve into the shadows beyond the facade of "happily ever after." Elena, once Princess Veronica, basked in marital bliss with the crown prince until betrayal cloaked in chivalry shattered her world. Emerging from obscurity, the real Veronica emerges, casting Elena into a cautionary narrative. But now, fuelled by vengeance, Elena is not merely a player; she is the mastermind behind the impending downfall of those who betrayed her.

basic_info.title: The Lady Needs a Break
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Lady Wants to Rest, Swigo Sipeun Lady

content.synopsis: Endlessly reborn through the ages, I have worn many faces - a king, an archmage, a slave, a saint, a witch. In my thousand years of existence, I've seen it all. Now, weary of the cycle, all I yearn for is a life of pure slothfulness. But alas, as Rubia, daughter of a grand duke with a bustling family and an impending marriage, leisure seems a distant dream. Determined to escape the chaos, I embark on a journey to evade my responsibilities. Yet, no matter where I turn, peace eludes me. All I desire is a moment of rest, but as it turns out, being idle is no easy feat!

basic_info.title: The Baengri Clan's Unwanted Granddaughter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Despised Granddaughter of the Powerful Martial Arts Family

content.synopsis:
Baengri Yeon, a misunderstood character in a martial arts novel, embraces her role as a minor villain, unaccepted for grieving her father, Euigang. Unexpectedly, the story takes a twist when the hero's enemy, Yayul, breaks the plot by killing Yeon.

Yet, Yeon finds herself transported back to her six-year-old self, a pivotal moment before a tragic incident halted her martial arts journey. Enduring her family's cruelty, she strives to mend her bond with Euigang. As she uncovers her father's unwavering love and works to alter his fate, even the stern family patriarch softens in the presence of his beloved granddaughter.

basic_info.title: The Tyrant's Only Perfumer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became The Sole Perfumer of A Tyrant, Pokgun-ui Yuilhan Johyangsa-ga Doeeotseumnida

content.synopsis: Synopsis: A young woman, afflicted by an incurable illness, drifts off to sleep one final time, only to awaken as Ariel Winston, the antagonist from her beloved novel. As she navigates this perplexing transformation, she realizes that following in the footsteps of the original Ariel will lead to her demise. Swiftly ending her relationship with Duke Cedric Evans, cursed to turn bloodthirsty without a specific scent, she faces a dilemma. Despite their coerced courtship, Cedric unexpectedly hesitates to part ways. Ariel grapples with the enigma surrounding Cedric's behavior and the unforeseen repercussions it may bring to the novel's narrative. Can Ariel forge her desired path amidst these unforeseen twists?

basic_info.title: Finding Camellia
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Please Be Patient, Grand Duke

content.synopsis:
Camellia, a flower amidst the grime of the streets, possessed a celestial beauty unrivaled by any. Plucked from her humble beginnings as a child, she was transformed into Camellius Bale, the assumed second son of House Bale by a highborn lady. Thus, her identity was stolen, and her destiny rewritten.

Bound by duty to safeguard her elder brother Kieran's legacy, Camellius navigates a world where her true self remains hidden. Constrained by her mother's commands, she weaves a web of deception to survive. Encountering Claude del Ihar, the heir to a prestigious dukedom, offers a glimmer of hope for Camellius to one day reclaim what was unjustly taken—her rightful existence as Camellia.

basic_info.title: Swimming Lessons for a Mermaid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Swim Classes for a Mermaid, Ineo-reul Wihan Suyeong-gyosil

content.synopsis: In the coastal town of Pearl Bay, Choa, a mermaid with a unique struggle, makes a daring decision to trade her ocean home for human legs. Feeling disheartened by her inability to swim, she catches the attention of Finn, the star of Pearl Bay High's swim team. When Finn uncovers Choa's secret, he extends a surprising offer to help her challenge her family's doubts. Thus begins an unlikely alliance between a mermaid and a swimmer, as Finn provides Choa with the opportunity to defy her limitations through free swimming lessons.

basic_info.title: His Majesty's Proposal
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: One Night with Emperor, A Night with the Emperor, Overnight with the Emperor, Hwangje-wa-ui Harutbam

content.synopsis: When Penelope Zecalion's broken engagement and a night of excess lead to an unexpected morning awakening in the emperor's bed, her life takes an unforeseen turn. With a sharp tongue and a guarded heart, Penelope is wary of the emperor's intentions after her past heartbreak. Will the emperor be able to break down her defenses and earn her affection despite her initial reluctance?

basic_info.title:
Youjo Senki
The Saga of Tanya the Evil

content.synopsis: Intrigued by a salaryman's lack of faith on his deathbed, a godlike entity called "Being X" reincarnates him into a magical, war-torn world to test his resolve. Reborn as Tanya Degurechaff, a young girl with exceptional strategic and magical skills, the salaryman joins the Empire's military to avoid succumbing to suffering. Rising through the ranks and leading the nation to victories, Tanya defies Being X's plan by aiming to stay away from the frontline. Despite her genius, Tanya discovers that some challenges may require more than just human abilities to overcome, challenging her beliefs and fate.

basic_info.title:
Tajuu Jinkaku Tantei Psycho
MPD Psycho
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Multiple Personality Detective Psycho

content.synopsis: In a gripping tale, detective Kazuhiko Amamiya grapples with multiple personality disorder, where variant identities seize control at unpredictable moments. What begins as a gritty detective narrative transforms into a riveting sci-fi saga woven with intricate conspiracies.

basic_info.title:
Umarekawattemo Mata, Watashi to Kekkon shitekuremasu ka
Will you marry me again if you are reborn?
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 生まれ変わってもまた、私と結婚してくれますか

content.synopsis:
In a tale of enduring love, Toranosuke Ibuki and his beloved wife Kaoru née Okouchi have shared a bond that transcends time. Now, two decades later, as Toranosuke lies confined to a hospital bed, their affection remains unwavering. Together, they reflect on cherished memories—from his heartfelt proposal to their initial encounter, navigating relationships, and the joys of their married life.

Despite Toranosuke's stubbornness and Kaoru's quick temper, their profound love is etched in the creases of their weathered faces and the unwavering gaze they share. Their connection is so deep that they are certain it will endure with equal fervor... even in their next life.

basic_info.title:
Heart no Kuni no Alice: Wonderful Wonder World
Alice in the Country of Hearts
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Harem
            
                Harem,                    Reverse Harem
            
                Reverse Harem
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ハートの国のアリス～Wonderful Wonder World～

content.synopsis: In this intriguing tale, Alice defies expectations as a practical and strong yet cynical individual. Unexpectedly kidnapped by a mysterious man with bunny ears, she is transported to the enigmatic realm of Heartland. Trapped by a clever ruse, Alice encounters a cast of fascinating characters, including Blood, a dashing mafia leader, and Ace, a charismatic yet unpredictable knight. As she navigates this strange new world, Alice faces a dilemma: how will she adapt to the challenges that await her in Heartland?

In a fleeting year, the bumbling yet endearing Nino finds himself tasked with looking after the mischievous class clown and neighbor, Kira-kun, who guards a dark hidden truth. Will Kira-kun, grappling with his own demons, be able to break down his walls and embrace the wisdom Nino offers, or will their worlds collide in chaos? Witness as their destinies entwine, forging a bond that may just be the "closest love to Heaven."

basic_info.title: Akane-banashi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: あかね噺

content.synopsis:
Immersed in the captivating world of rakugo storytelling, Akane Ousaki has always admired her father Tooru's mesmerizing performances. However, Tooru's dreams of attaining the prestigious rank of shinuchi are shattered when he is unexpectedly expelled from the rakugo school by senior master Issho Arakawa. Devastated by her father's abandonment of rakugo, Akane is determined to prove his talent to the world.

Seeking guidance from Tooru's former master, Shiguma Arakawa, Akane pleads for a chance to follow in her father's footsteps. Despite his reluctance, Shiguma challenges Akane to demonstrate her dedication by performing in front of a live audience. Will Akane's passion and determination be enough to break through the barriers of tradition and honor her father's legacy in the world of rakugo?

basic_info.title:
Toaru Majutsu no Index Gaiden: Toaru Kagaku no Railgun
A Certain Scientific Railgun
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: To Aru Kagaku no Choudenjihou

content.synopsis: In the cutting-edge world of Academy City, where students hone their esper powers, the gifted electromaster Mikoto Misaka stands out as "The Railgun," ranked third among the elite seven. When ordinary objects turn into deadly bombs, Mikoto's close friend Kuroko Shirai of the Judgement committee delves into the mystery. As the sinister truth lurking beneath the city's facade unravels, a shadow threatens not just Mikoto and her allies, but the very future of Academy City.

basic_info.title:
14-sai no Koi
Love at Fourteen
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 14歳の恋

content.synopsis:
In a school where Kanata Tanaka and Kazuki Yoshikawa stand out as the admired, emotionally mature 14-year-olds, their peers see them as unapproachable elites. Kanata, tall and striking, exudes a stern demeanor that keeps boys at bay, while Kazuki's charm and warmth keep girls at a distance.

But beyond their poised facades lies a hidden truth—the two are deeply in love. As they embark on a journey to nurture their clandestine romance, Kanata and Kazuki grapple with their emotions and strive to define their public personas amidst the whispers of their peers.

basic_info.title: Emma
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Emma Bangaihen, Emma Bangai-hen, Emma Further Tales, Victorian Romance Emma

content.synopsis: In the bustling landscape of Victorian England at the turn of the 20th century, a poignant tale unfolds, centered around the forbidden love shared between Emma, a humble maid, and the affluent aristocrat, William Jones. Against the backdrop of rigid societal hierarchies and staunch traditions, their unlikely romance blossoms, defying the disapproval of the elite, including William's own family. As they navigate the treacherous waters of wealth and power, Emma and William's bond deepens, their unwavering love proving stronger than society's harsh judgments. From the talented pen of Kaoru Mori, creator of Otoyomegatari, comes a gripping saga of resilience and passion, as the star-crossed couple faces a myriad of challenges that threaten to tear them apart. Will their love withstand the tests of time, or will fate conspire against their happiness? Join William and Emma on their tumultuous journey as they fight against all odds for a chance at a happily ever after.

basic_info.title: Abara
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Digimortal

content.synopsis:
In a dystopian world dominated by colossal structures, "Abara" unfolds a dark tale centered on the enigmatic beings called Gaunas. These creatures possess the ability to mold bone into formidable armor and weapons through a transformative process that initiates from the spine, creating intricate layered defenses. At the core of this narrative is Kudou Denji, a mysterious Gauna who initially adopts the alias Itou Denji. As the saga delves deeper into his journey, secrets unravel in the shadows of this grim reality.

Featured additional content:
Volume 2: Digimortal (two parts)

basic_info.title:
Yugami-kun ni wa Tomodachi ga Inai
He does not have any friends.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 湯神くんには友達がいない

content.synopsis:
Chihiro Watanuki is a new transfer student at the prestigious high school, where she crosses paths with the enigmatic Yuuji Yugami. Despite warnings from her classmates about his peculiar behavior, Chihiro finds herself seated next to him in class. Known as the Baseball Club's star player, Yugami's odd actions baffle those around him.

As Chihiro navigates the complexities of high school life, she discovers that there may be more to Yugami than meets the eye. When she finds herself in a tough spot with the older students, Yugami unexpectedly steps in to help, albeit in his own unique way. Determined to see beyond the rumors, Chihiro sets out to unravel the mystery of Yugami and find her place among new friends in this captivating tale of high school drama and unlikely friendships.

basic_info.title:
Death March kara Hajimaru Isekai Kyousoukyoku
Death March to the Parallel World Rhapsody

content.synopsis: Suzuki, a dedicated programmer, finds himself deep in the trenches of a death march, surviving on caffeine and marathon workdays. Desperately in need of a brief respite, he succumbs to a nap that spirals into a vivid dream. In this alternate realm, he wields RPG abilities akin to those in his own game. However, his dream takes a dark turn when he unknowingly unleashes a catastrophic event. As Suzuki grapples with this unsettling dream that refuses to fade, the boundaries between reality and fantasy blur ominously.

basic_info.title: Saotome Senshu, Hitakakusu
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 早乙女選手、ひたかくす

content.synopsis:
Satoru Tsukishima, a member of the high school boxing club, is taken aback when Yae Saotome, the reigning Female Featherweight Champion in the Kanto region, confesses her feelings for him. Despite his initial joy, Satoru grapples with the idea of distracting Yae from her boxing career, which the entire school pins its hopes on for Olympic representation. Feeling inadequate compared to Yae's exceptional skills, Satoru is torn between his feelings for her and his doubts about their compatibility.

Their coach devises a plan for Satoru to become Yae's trainer, allowing them to date discreetly and spend more time together under the guise of training. However, the success of their relationship hinges on maintaining secrecy within the club. As their relationship blossoms amidst the pressures of their dual roles, a tender and hesitant love story unfolds in the heart of their shared passion for boxing.

basic_info.title: D.N.Angel
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: DN Angel, DNAngel, N is for Nishiki, Protecting The Kanno House, Demonen Igen, Ou Magake Again, OumagaAGAIN

content.synopsis:
Meet Daisuke Niwa, a regular but somewhat unlucky middle schooler. On his fourteenth birthday, he inherits a peculiar 'condition' that has haunted his family for centuries. Whenever he lays eyes on his crush, Risa, he morphs into the elusive phantom thief Dark Mousy. The twist? If Dark Mousy sets sights on Risa's twin, Riku, he reverts to plain old Daisuke. The remedy? Daisuke must win Risa's heart to break the spell of this topsy-turvy transformation... 

Included Stories:

Volume 1: Namaiki no 'N' (N is for Nishiki)

Volume 2: OumagaAGAIN (The Demon Returns)

Volume 4: Kanno-ke wa Kanai Anzen. (Protecting The Kanno House)

basic_info.title:
Watari-kun no xx ga Houkai Sunzen
Watari-kun's ****** Is about to Collapse

content.synopsis:
Two years have passed since Naoto Watari tragically lost his parents, leaving him as the sole guardian of his younger sister, Suzushiro "Suzu" Watari. Their aunt became their new home, where Naoto's unwavering devotion to Suzu isolates him from social circles, earning him the nickname "siscon" at school. Despite the harsh judgment of his peers, Naoto remains resolute in prioritizing Suzu's well-being above all else.

Yet, the arrival of Satsuki Tachibana, a mysterious transfer student, disrupts Naoto's fragile peace. Satsuki's presence triggers haunting memories from Naoto's past, hinting at her involvement in his traumatic history. As hidden truths unravel in her wake, Naoto's carefully constructed world teeters on the brink of upheaval, threatening to shatter the tranquility he has fought so hard to protect.

basic_info.title:
Takane to Hana
Takane & Hana
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Takane and Hana

content.synopsis: Sixteen-year-old Hana Nonomura reluctantly steps in for her sister Yukari at a miai, an arranged marriage meeting. Across the table sits Takane Saibara, the affluent heir of Takaba company, a man ten years her senior. Despite their initial clash, Hana boldly challenges Takane's arrogance. She assumes their encounter would deter any further matrimonial talks. However, to her shock, Takane not only persists but also begins to take a keen interest in her. Thus unfolds the tale of an unlikely bond forming between two individuals on opposite ends of the spectrum.

basic_info.title:
Hourou Musuko
Wandering Son
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Transient Son

content.synopsis: In the heart of the story lies Shuuichi Nitori, a 5th grade student with a passion for baking and a natural inclination towards femininity. A twist of fate on his first day at a new school leads to Shuuichi being mistaken for his 6th grade sister. Fate further intertwines their lives as he sits beside Yoshino Takatsuki, known to all as "Takatsuki-kun," a tall and boyish girl harboring her own hidden truths. As their friendship blossoms, they navigate the delicate territories of being true to themselves in a world where secrets must be kept. The narrative delves into profound themes of transgender identity, gender complexities, and the onset of adolescence, painting a poignant portrait of self-discovery and acceptance.

In the bustling halls of Yagami High School, a second-year student named She is consumed by a single burning question: Will her crush ever take notice of her? Meanwhile, He, the school's infamous troublemaker, experiences a sudden awakening—he's harboring a massive crush of his own and must find the courage to confess his feelings. Amidst life-altering obsessions, comical mishaps, elaborate plans, inner turmoils, and youthful passions, School Rumble presents high school life in all its uproarious glory.

basic_info.title:
Shi ga Futari wo Wakatsu made
Until Death Do Us Part

content.synopsis: Twelve-year-old Haruka Touyama possesses an extraordinary gift – the ability to foresee the future with uncanny accuracy. However, her rare talent has made her a coveted target for greedy corporations seeking to exploit her powers for personal gain. When she is forcibly separated from her family, Haruka relies on her precognitive abilities to find a savior amidst the bustling streets of Tokyo. Surprisingly, her intuition leads her to a blind swordsman, whose hidden combat prowess is unleashed when he wields a sword concealed in his walking stick to fend off the corporation's henchmen. Aware of the constant threat looming over her, Haruka implores the enigmatic swordsman to protect her, binding their fates together with a solemn vow: "until death do us part."

basic_info.title:
Fetiple
What I Love About You

content.synopsis: In "Fetiple," Tatsu Yunoki wakes up after a wild night to discover a mysterious girl named Kotoka Hatsushima beside him. Recalling their alcohol-fueled confessions – Tatsu's hair fetish and Kotoka's back obsession – they decide to live together, turning their unusual desires into everyday reality. Join these quirky characters on a humorous journey filled with peculiar antics shaped by their unique personalities and eccentric passions.

basic_info.title:
Saihate no Paladin
The Faraway Paladin
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Paladin of the End, Ultimate Paladin

content.synopsis: In a city inhabited solely by the undead, William stands out as the only living human. Haunted by fleeting memories of a past life in modern-day Japan where he felt he had squandered his opportunities, he is resolute in his mission to lead a purposeful existence this time around. Raised by a community of the undead, William embarks on a quest to unravel the mysteries surrounding his presence in this city and among its inhabitants. As he grapples with the true essence of living versus merely existing, he strives to carve out a meaningful and fulfilling life for himself.

basic_info.title: Freesia
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: フリージア

content.synopsis: In a war-torn alternative Japanese society, the law permits retaliatory killings, sparking a deadly cycle of vengeance. When a loved one falls victim, one can seek retribution by taking the life of the perpetrator or hiring a killer to do so. The story centers on Freesia, who is employed by a specialized firm that carries out these acts of justice.

basic_info.title: Mousou Telepathy
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Super Power
            
                Super Power
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Delusion Telepathy, Moutele

content.synopsis:
In a world where reading minds seems like a gift, Ayako Nakano views it as a curse she never wanted. The burden of hearing people's innermost thoughts and desires weighs heavily on her, making it a challenge to assert her own choices. To avoid being ostracized, she conceals her extraordinary ability, resigning herself to a solitary existence. With a somber and solitary demeanor, Nakano enters her senior year of high school, resigned to her seclusion.

Everything changes when she crosses paths with Hayato Toda. Despite his enigmatic façade, Toda, a popular figure, harbors a surprising infatuation for Nakano. However, delving into his mind reveals a darker truth - his incessant lewd fantasies about her. Enduring this daily mental onslaught, Nakano finds herself drawn into Toda's social circle, experiencing her first taste of companionship and love.

basic_info.title: Biomega
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: バイオメガ

content.synopsis: In Tsutomu Nihei’s chilling futuristic world, the N5S virus has ravaged the planet, transforming people into zombie-like beings. Zoichi Kanoe, an agent of Toa Heavy Industry, emerges as the final beacon of hope for humanity, despite his non-human nature. Assisted by Fuyu, a digital intelligence within his Heavy Dual Coil motorcycle, Zoichi embarks on a quest for salvation that leads him through surreal terrains and pits him against unimaginable malevolence.

basic_info.title: Jisatsutou
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Suicide Island

content.synopsis: In a world where treating non-successful suicidal patients is a costly endeavor, one doctor is faced with a challenging decision. With limited resources and a deep commitment to personal autonomy, Dr. Smith confronts each patient with a crucial question: do they still desire to remain in this world? If the answer is no, the government is prepared to honor their choice. But the government's solution is far from simple...

basic_info.title: Shigurui
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    Historical
            
                Historical,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    Samurai
            
                Samurai
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Death Frenzy, Crazy for Death

content.synopsis:
In a chilling decree by the sadistic daimyo Tadanaga Tokugawa, Japan witnesses its inaugural martial arts competition featuring lethal swords, sending shockwaves through even his most loyal followers. The first match showcases the one-armed Gennosuke Fujiki facing off against the blind and lame Seigen Irako, prompting outrage among the spectators who deem the bout a mockery and the combatants' afflictions an insult to their honor.

Unbeknownst to many, Gennosuke and Seigen harbor a deep-seated enmity rooted in their fierce rivalry to inherit the legacy of the deranged samurai Kogan Iwamoto, head of the infamous Kogan-ryuu dojo. What was once a friendly competition for Kogan-ryuu and the affections of Kogan's daughter Mie escalates into a brutal showdown when a young warrior's misstep provokes the wrath of their master, setting off a chain of events culminating in grave injuries.

"Shigurui" unravels the fateful choices that drive Gennosuke and Seigen to their dire confrontation, shedding light on the harsh realities of samurai tradition that leave a trail of shattered lives in their wake.

basic_info.title:
Ran to Haiiro no Sekai
Ran and the Gray World
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ran and the Grey World, Ran and the Ash-Coloured World, Gray And Wonder Around Her

content.synopsis:
Young sorceress-in-training Ran Uruma is on a mission to find her special shoes that hold the key to her transformation into an adult. However, her mischievous nature and untamed magical abilities make her search a challenging one. Her brother Jin, a sorcerer himself, has hidden the shoes as a test for Ran to prove her responsibility by cleaning their home. Meanwhile, their mother Shizuka, a powerful sorceress, is away protecting the city, leaving Zen, the head of their sorcerer family, to entrust Jin with managing the household.

With the shoes out of reach, Ran's curiosity leads her into magical escapades, guided by her budding powers and thirst for adventure. As she navigates through whimsical challenges, Ran's journey unfolds with a mix of mischief and wonder, shaping her into a sorceress of great potential.

basic_info.title: Trigun Maximum
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: トライガンマキシマム

content.synopsis:
In the bustling world of "Vash," chaos reigns as bounty hunters swarm in pursuit of the staggering 60,000,000,000$$ bounty placed on his head for the annihilation of July City. Vash, a legendary gunslinger with an unmatched prowess, seeks only "love and peace" amidst the turmoil he unwittingly left behind. As the layers of his enigmatic past slowly unravel, revelations about the history of Gunsmoke, the barren planet that serves as the backdrop, come to light.

While humor infuses the series, a profound undertone emerges, delving deep into themes of morality and redemption. Along Vash's journey, he is accompanied by the skilled gunfighter and priest, Nicholas D. Wolfwood, and encounters the enigmatic Gung-Ho Guns, a ruthless band of assassins with unknown motives. As the narrative progresses, the stakes heighten, leading to intense emotional confrontations that challenge the very essence of right and wrong.

"Trigun" transcends mere entertainment, sparking poignant reflections on the complexities of morality. It provokes thought-provoking questions: What defines morality? Can conflicting moral beliefs be judged equally? When faced with moral dilemmas, does one's actions nullify their moral compass, and is redemption attainable despite past transgressions? Through Vash's gripping odyssey, the series navigates the intricate paths of human conscience, leaving viewers pondering the intricacies of ethics and the pursuit of absolution.

basic_info.title: Kekkaishi
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kekkaishi Ayakashi Hojinden

content.synopsis: After dark, Yoshimori Sumimura transforms into a "kekkaishi," a skilled demon-hunter adept at erecting mystical barriers. But by day, he faces different challenges: a sweet tooth and a grumpy grandfather. Tokine Yukimura, his beautiful 16-year-old neighbor and childhood companion, is also a kekkaishi. However, their families are embroiled in a feud over the rightful heir to their mystical craft.

In the heart of Akina, whispers swirl about the legendary "Ghost of Akina," who reigns supreme with unbeatable speed down the treacherous Akina Pass. Wrapped in mystery, the elusive driver of the white Toyota AE86 remains a shadowy enigma, shrouded in secrecy. Daily, the iconic AE86 cuts through the mist, shuttling to a mountaintop hotel, a ritual observed by all.

Takumi Fujiwara, an outlier among peers, harbors no passion for cars, his mind tethered to the pre-dawn Tofu deliveries for his father. Unfamiliar with street racing's allure and customs, Takumi's world shifts when he stumbles upon a rival crew at Akina Pass one fateful night. Driven by impulse, he seizes the wheel of his father's AE86, hurtling down the familiar slopes in a race against destiny.

Thus begins Takumi's adrenaline-fueled odyssey, veering from his routine into the realm of drift racing, where he embraces a newfound ardor for the asphalt battleground. Amidst a tapestry of formidable adversaries eager to challenge the legendary Ghost of Akina, Takumi unravels his destiny, steering towards a future where his name shall echo across the winding roads of Akina.

When humble salaryman Tetsuo Tosu uncovers the brutal truth of his daughter Reika's abuse at the hands of her boyfriend, the conniving Nobuto Matori, a chilling scheme unravels before him. Matori's sinister plan to exploit Reika's wealthy grandparents sends shockwaves through Tetsuo's world, revealing Matori's dark ties to a ruthless crime syndicate notorious for silencing its own.

Consumed by a potent blend of fury and dread for Reika's safety, Tetsuo takes matters into his own hands, confronting Nobuto in a fateful clash that alters their destinies forever. With the unwavering support of his wife, Kasen, they navigate the treacherous aftermath of Nobuto's demise, concealing the truth to shield their daughter from the malevolent forces closing in.

As the shadows of the syndicate loom ever closer, Tetsuo and Kasen must unite in a race against time to safeguard their family, ensuring that Reika remains untouched by the sinister legacy of her former tormentor.

basic_info.title: Kemono Jihen
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 怪物事変

content.synopsis: In a secluded village, a string of mysterious animal deaths puzzles the locals. Tokyo expert Kohachi Inugami is summoned to unravel the enigma. Upon his arrival, Inugami encounters Kabane, a boy toiling in the fields, sparking an unexpected bond. As they delve deeper into the investigation, Inugami suspects Kabane conceals a supernatural secret. Embracing this revelation, Inugami invites Kabane to join his detective agency, specializing in solving the uncanny.

basic_info.title: D-Frag!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: D-Fragments!

content.synopsis:
Kenji Kazama, the fearless leader of a renowned three-man gang, sets his sights on dominating Fujou High to cement his legacy. However, his delinquent plans backfire, leading him into an unexpected alliance with the Game Development Club. There, he encounters a quirky ensemble of individuals: the assertive student council president Chitose Karasuyama, the laid-back club advisor Minami Oosawa, the cheerful freshman Sakura Mizukami, and the cunning club president Roka Shibasaki, who holds a hidden reputation as a school troublemaker. 

Despite Kenji's desire to break free, his efforts only draw him deeper into the club's escapades and entangle him with their equally peculiar adversaries. As the club's misadventures unfold, Kenji slowly realizes that amidst the chaos, he might just be finding a sense of enjoyment he never expected.

basic_info.title:
Pashiri na Boku to Koisuru Banchou-san
I Belong To The Baddest Girl At School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: パシリな僕と恋する番長さん

content.synopsis: Fuyuhiko Unoki, a perennial target of bullying from his school days, finds himself under the control of the school's notorious troublemaker, Kanade Toramaru, who claims him as her own. Despite Fuyuhiko's constant fear, Kanade mistakenly believes they are in a relationship, unaware of his apprehension. As their bond deepens, their imaginary romance teeters on the brink of becoming a reality, setting the stage for high school drama and unexpected emotions to unfold.

basic_info.title: Sakamichi no Apollon
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Polygon
            
                Love Polygon,                    Music
            
                Music,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sakamichi no Aporon, Kids on the Slope

content.synopsis:
Constantly uprooted from one school to the next, Kaoru Nishimi has always struggled to fit in due to his intelligence and affluent background. However, everything changes when he moves to Kyushu for high school and forms an unexpected bond with the class president, Ritsuko Mukae, and the notorious troublemaker, Sentarou Kawabuchi. While Kaoru excels academically, Sentarou is known for his rebellious behavior.

Their worlds collide over a shared passion for music. Introduced to the world of jazz by Sentarou's mesmerizing drumming skills in Ritsuko's family record store, Kaoru, a classical pianist, embarks on a musical journey unlike any other. Together, they explore the realms of jazz through after-school sessions in the store's basement.

As Kaoru immerses himself in jazz and nurtures his newfound friendship with Sentarou, he discovers the true beauty of music and the profound connections it can create. "Sakamichi no Apollon" chronicles their tale of friendship and love intertwined by the enchanting melodies of jazz.

basic_info.title:
Machida-kun no Sekai
The world of Machida-kun
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kyou no Machida-kun, Ai, Aru Seikatsu

content.synopsis:
In a world where average meets extraordinary, Hajime Machida, a seemingly typical teenager, shines bright in the hearts of his loved ones and peers alike. His compassionate spirit draws him into unique daily connections, from bonding with his siblings to chance encounters in the city. Through these diverse interactions and newfound adventures, Machida embarks on a journey of self-discovery, unraveling the intricate tapestry of love in its many forms.

Included one-shot:

Volume 3: Ai, Aru Seikatsu

basic_info.title:
Shinigami Bocchan to Kuro Maid
The Duke of Death and His Maid
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Young Master the Grim Reaper and the Black Maid, The Duke of Death and his Black Maid

content.synopsis:
Ever since a witch cursed him in his youth, the young duke has harbored a deadly power – a mere touch from him can snuff out life. Exiled to a grand mansion nestled deep within the woods, he endures a life of isolation and rejection from society.

Yet, amidst the desolation, two steadfast companions remain – Rob, the loyal butler, and Alice, the mischievous maid whose playful taunts slowly kindle a bond with the duke. Determined to rid himself of the lethal curse, the duke embarks on a quest for liberation. With the aid of the mystical denizens dwelling in the shadows, he endeavors to defy his fate and unlock the secrets to his salvation.

basic_info.title:
Omoi, Omoware, Furi, Furare
Love Me, Love Me Not
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Love, Be Loved, Leave, Be Left

content.synopsis: In the heart of the tale are Yuna and Akari, each holding contrasting perspectives on love. Yuna, a dreamer, envisions love through rose-tinted glasses, while Akari approaches romance with a pragmatic mindset. Enter Kazuomi, an oblivious soul to love's intricacies, and Rio, who readily reciprocates affection if the admirer meets his standards of beauty. As their paths intertwine, the complexities of love unfold, revealing the diverse shades it embodies.

basic_info.title:
Boushoku no Berserk: Ore dake Level to Iu Gainen wo Toppa suru the Comic
Berserk of Gluttony
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Berserk of Gluttony: The One That Exceeds the Concept of Levels

content.synopsis: In a world divided between the skilled and the skill-less, Fate Graphite's power of Gluttony has always left him hungry for more. Rejected by society, Fate's curse turns deadly when he discovers the ability to consume others' skills by killing them. As Fate's insatiable hunger grows, the question remains: how many lives will satisfy his Gluttony?

basic_info.title: Innocent Rouge
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: イノサン Rouge

content.synopsis: In the backdrop of the impending French Revolution in 1772, Charles-Henri, the eldest Sanson sibling, has embraced his role as an executioner, while his sister, Marie-Joseph, enjoys a carefree life in Versailles. However, tragedy strikes when Marie-Joseph's beloved, Alain, falls victim to the cruelty of the aristocrats.
