The tale of innocence shattered unfolds against the tumultuous canvas of the crimson revolution, Rouge.

basic_info.title: Black Torch
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BLACK TORCH

content.synopsis:
Seventeen-year-old Jirou Azuma leads a serene life with his grandfather, utilizing his extraordinary ability to communicate with animals for companionship and protection. As descendants of a revered shinobi clan, both Jirou and his grandfather train diligently to uphold their family's martial legacy. However, Jirou's world is thrust into chaos when he saves a seemingly ordinary black cat, Ragou, only to unveil its true identity as a mononoke—a malevolent spirit locked in an age-old conflict with humanity.

When a vengeful mononoke targets Ragou, Jirou employs his shinobi skills to defend the feline, sustaining a fatal injury in the process. Faced with a critical choice to consume Jirou's waning life force for strength, Ragou surprises everyone by transferring his remaining energy to the young warrior instead. This selfless act not only resurrects Jirou but also bestows upon him formidable supernatural abilities that complement his shinobi prowess.

The clandestine observer Ryousuke Shiba, an operative from the Bureau of Espionage specializing in combating aggressive mononoke, witnesses this extraordinary event. Impressed by Jirou's newfound powers, Shiba offers him and his grandfather a compelling proposition: to join the Bureau's elite unit, Black Torch. Tasked with confronting formidable mononoke threats preying on the innocent, Jirou embarks on a perilous journey to protect both the human and spirit realms.

basic_info.title: Boruto: Two Blue Vortex
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: BORUTO-ボルト- -TWO BLUE VORTEX-

content.synopsis: In an unexpected turn of events, Boruto and Kawaki find themselves entangled in a mysterious jutsu that swaps their lives. Branded as a traitor, Boruto flees his village and seeks refuge with Sasuke for training. However, as Konoha faces a dire threat, a matured Boruto must confront his past and reveal his newfound strength to protect his home.

basic_info.title: Senryuu Shoujo
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Love Status Quo
            
                Love Status Quo,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Senryuu Girl

content.synopsis: In the bustling halls of high school, Nanako Yukishiro stands out not for her silence, but for her unique way of expression—senryuu, a form of haiku. Despite her inability to speak, Nanako's vibrant world is filled with an eclectic group of friends. From the misunderstood ex-delinquent Eiji Busujima to the stalkerish club president Amane Katagiri, each one adds color to her silent symphony. Alongside the shy artist Kino Yakobe, the enigmatic Tao Hanakai, and Eiji's self-proclaimed "big sister" Koto Ootsuki, Nanako finds joy in the beauty of her voiceless connection.

basic_info.title: Denpa Kyoushi
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Harem
            
                Harem,                    Otaku Culture
            
                Otaku Culture,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: He Is a Ultimate Teacher, Ultimate Otaku Teacher

content.synopsis: Renowned for his brilliance in physics during his youth, Kagami Junichirou's star dimmed once he abandoned science post-college, immersing himself in the world of anime blogging and quirky collections. Citing a bizarre condition dubbed "I can't do anything I don't want to do," he languished as a NEET until his determined sister orchestrated a teaching position for him at their alma mater. Embracing his unorthodox methods, Kagami captivates his students' interest, particularly after intervening to aid a bullied classmate. As he rediscovers his passion for teaching, the question looms: will he forge ahead on this unexpected path, return to his scientific roots, or remain adrift in indecision?

basic_info.title:
Koroshiya 1
Ichi the Killer
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Koroshiya Ichi

content.synopsis: In the bustling sin city of Shinjuku Kabukichou, we meet two eccentric individuals. Ichi, known for his cowardly demeanor, transforms into a formidable force at the drop of a tear, armed with lethal martial arts and a concealed blade in his boots. Swiftly dispatching foes, he leaves a trail of carnage in his wake. His nemesis is Kakihara, a jaded yakuza leader seeking meaning through self-inflicted pain and violence, a twisted path to feel truly alive. As their paths intertwine, a volatile clash of psyches and blades is inevitable in the unforgiving streets of Kabukichou.

High school teacher Nozomu Itoshiki yearns for an escape from the humdrum existence that has left him disillusioned. Despite his persistent desire to end it all, he is repeatedly entangled in the peculiar dilemmas of his eccentric students. Just when he edges closer to the edge, he is thrust into outlandish predicaments, striving to shield his students from the very despair that shadows him.

Amid his ongoing existential turmoil, Itoshiki navigates the absurdity of his daily escapades, seeking solace in the chaos while still chasing the elusive peace he craves.

basic_info.title: Ga-Rei
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Enchained Spiritual Beast Ga-Rei

content.synopsis: Freshman Nimura Kensuke possesses a unique gift – the ability to see ghosts in his daily life without flinching. When he crosses paths with Kagura, a girl with the power to summon a fearsome "spirit devourer" named Byakuei, his world transforms forever. Together, they embark on a thrilling journey to hunt down malevolent spirits, with Kagura unleashing Byakuei to consume them. Join Nimura and Kagura in their supernatural escapades and savor the gripping tale of their spectral battles.

basic_info.title:
Tokyo Ghoul: "Jack"
Tokyo Ghoul [Jack]
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Horror
            
                Horror
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Toukyou Kuushuu: Jack

content.synopsis:
Long before earning the fearsome title of the "Reaper" within the Commission of Counter Ghoul, a youthful Kishou Arima found himself thrust into the world of high school to probe a string of ghastly murders orchestrated by a ravenous ghoul. What began as a solitary mission swiftly spiraled into unexpected territory when he crossed paths with his rebellious schoolmate, Taishi Fura.

When Fura is forced to confront the chilling demise of his closest friend at the hands of the enigmatic ghoul known as "Lantern," his own life hangs in peril. In a moment of dire need, Arima intervenes, revealing to Fura the harrowing reality of ghoul investigations. Though Lantern slips away, Fura resolves to unite with his newfound ally and fellow student, pledging to avenge his friend and capture the elusive Lantern.

basic_info.title:
Hayate no Gotoku!
Hayate the Combat Butler
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ハヤテのごとく!

content.synopsis:
In the turbulent life of 16-year-old Hayate Ayasaki, misfortunes seem to follow him like shadows in the dark. Despite his tender age, he toils away at part-time jobs to cater to the whims of his extravagant parents. But fate takes a cruel turn when his parents vanish into thin air one fateful day, leaving Hayate saddled with an insurmountable debt of nearly 150 million yen. Soon, he finds himself hounded by relentless debt collectors, his every step haunted by financial doom.

Desperate and on the run, Hayate seeks refuge in a park, only to stumble upon a daring idea to alleviate his dire circumstances. With thoughts of a ransom scheme swirling in his mind, he sets his sights on a seemingly affluent blonde girl, ready to put his plan into action. However, before he can make a move, fate intervenes once more as the girl falls victim to a kidnapping.

In a twist of events, Hayate springs into action, rescuing the girl from peril. Grateful for his bravery, she offers him a unique proposition - to serve as her butler, unveiling her identity as the heiress of a wealthy household. Yet, even in his newfound role, misfortune continues to shadow Hayate's every step, plunging him into a whirlwind of challenging predicaments, all while grappling with the relentless grip of his ill-fated luck.

basic_info.title: Goth
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Goth: Wrist Cut Jiken

content.synopsis:
Itsuki Kamiyama's fascination with the macabre and gruesome knows no bounds, with a keen interest in the most chilling murders. Unfazed by the darkest deeds of humanity, he is irresistibly drawn to unsolved mysteries like a moth to a flame. Yet, Kamiyama is not just a mere spectator—he is a master at unraveling these enigmas.

Following a trail of peculiar crimes, Kamiyama crosses paths with his classmate Yoru Morino, only to discover a surprising kinship with her. As their acquaintance deepens, Kamiyama uncovers hidden layers of Morino's past with each case he solves.

As Kamiyama's own dark inclinations come to light, he dares to entertain a chilling question—could he be the one destined to end Morino's life?

basic_info.title: Mookhyang: Dark Lady
basic_info.genre:
Theme:
                            Magical Sex Shift
            
                Magical Sex Shift
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 묵향 다크레이디

content.synopsis: In a gripping twist of fate, Mookhyang, the revered leader of the Demonic Sect and a formidable martial artist, finds himself transported to a mysterious fantasy realm by a malevolent curse from his foes, the Blood Sect. However, his extraordinary mastery of qi sparks intrigue, leading to another unexpected curse that transforms him into a young woman. Amidst a realm teeming with elves, mages, knights, and dragons, Mookhyang must rely on his Chinese martial arts prowess to navigate this perilous new world. Will this resilient warrior overcome the odds to find a way back home, or will he ultimately embrace defeat in this mesmerizing tale of resilience and redemption?

basic_info.title: The Live
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 더 라이브

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of the tragic murders of his wife and daughter, Yoonjae finds himself adrift in a void of despair. However, a glimmer of hope emerges when a cryptic message in his journal hints at a chance for reunion: "You can see them again." Intrigued, Yoonjae is suddenly thrust into a parallel realm where a deadly competition unfolds. In this twisted game, every participant is a contender, battling for survival with the promise of any wish granted to the ultimate victor. Driven by an unwavering desire to be reunited with his lost loved ones, Yoonjae must navigate this nightmarish landscape and outmaneuver his adversaries. Will he emerge triumphant as the sole survivor in this brutal realm to reclaim what he has lost?

basic_info.title: 'Til Debt Do Us Part
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Bittersweet Couple, Dalkom Salbyeolhan Bubu

content.synopsis: Subin's mother, a firm believer in matchmakers, persistently arranges dates for her. Despite numerous rejections, Subin remains steadfast. However, her world is turned upside down when an old school friend reappears out of the blue and proposes marriage. Is he a savior in disguise or a deceptive figure? As Subin faces this unexpected twist, the opportunity to resolve her debts looms large.

characteristics: Panel layouts with focus on characters

basic_info.title: Act Like You Love Me!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sunjeong Malgo Sunjong

content.synopsis: In a whirlwind of stress and exhaustion, 25-year-old Ji-eon finds herself thrust into a bizarre turn of events. While filling in at a temporary job, she unexpectedly becomes the personal assistant to the renowned actor Doyun Nam. Frustrated and broke, Ji-eon's world takes a surreal twist when she unleashes her wrath on a peculiar doll, only to discover its extraordinary power to manipulate Doyun Nam himself. Suddenly in control, Ji-eon seizes the opportunity to turn the tables and become the one calling the shots.

basic_info.title: Mom, I'm Sorry
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mama Mian

content.synopsis: In a desperate plea, Henry begs his mother not to leave him. To save her, he strikes a risky bargain with a mysterious lifespan dealer, sacrificing his own years to grant her a new lease on life. Transformed into a vibrant young woman, his mother now embarks on a fresh journey, with Henry by her side every step of the way. Their bond is tested when a close friend unexpectedly develops feelings for her, sparking a complex web of emotions and challenges that threaten to unravel everything Henry has sacrificed for.

basic_info.title: The Pale Horse
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 창백한 말

content.synopsis: In a quaint French town gripped by fear, Rose Dupre endures relentless bullying due to being labeled as a witch's daughter. Initially skeptical, Marie and Pierre soon find themselves questioning their beliefs as a series of mysterious deaths plague the community, casting suspicion upon the trio. Will Rose be able to navigate through the menacing shadows of magic and distrust that loom over them? Embark on a captivating gothic journey filled with intrigue and vivid hues.

basic_info.title: Idol Shopping
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 아이돌 쇼핑

content.synopsis: Known as the formidable bully caretaker, "S" is a force to be reckoned with as she seeks vengeance for her tormented clients, all in exchange for a fee. But beneath this facade lies Kang Song Ih, an unassuming nerd deeply devoted to her twin brother, Kang Ah Eul. When Ah Eul, a student at the prestigious Chungha High School, makes a chilling suicide attempt during winter break, Song Ih embarks on a daring mission to infiltrate his school disguised as him. As she delves into the dark secrets behind her brother's desperate act, she encounters the enigmatic and dangerously appealing Suh Ga Yoon, whose involvement adds a mysterious twist to Ah Eul's tragic plight.

basic_info.title: Best Teacher Baek
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Number One Star Instructor Master Baek, Ilta Gangsa Baek Sabu

content.synopsis: Once revered as the top mentor within the Blood Cult, Suryong Baek meets his demise, only to awaken in the form of a martial arts teacher at a modest rural school. Despite inhabiting a physically feeble vessel, Suryong is no stranger to unlocking dormant potential. To restore his strength, he embarks on a quest for funds, setting his sights on achieving greatness as an instructor at a prestigious academy. Faced with formidable rivals, Suryong must unleash his full arsenal of skills to ascend as the ultimate teaching prodigy.

basic_info.title: Secret Alliance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Secret Dongmaeng

content.synopsis: Eun Sian, also known as Shanshan to her close friend Hyunee, is a popular figure among the girls at school. However, she doesn't share their romantic inclinations as she harbors a deep fear of men, fueled by her mother's overprotective nature. The plot thickens when Yuri, the school's most beautiful girl, confesses her feelings for Sian. As Yuri becomes increasingly possessive, shadowing Sian's every move, it becomes clear she desires exclusivity in their relationship. The tension rises as Sian wonders how far Yuri is willing to go to secure her affections.

basic_info.title: Teen Spirit
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 틴 스피릿

content.synopsis: Hwee Kang and his friends are rocking out in their band when JBL, a top-tier company known for spotting talent, swoops in. Their star quality lands them an audition, but the stakes are high. As the big moment arrives, a surprise twist awaits. What move will Hwee Kang make in the face of this unexpected turn?

basic_info.title: Yumi's Cells
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 유미의 세포들

content.synopsis: Follow Yumi on a captivating journey through her own mind, where her brain cells hold the key to a remarkable tale.

basic_info.title: Fight Class 3
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gyeokgi 3-ban, Gyeoggi 3 Ban

content.synopsis: In a world where Korea reigns as the epicenter of combat sports, Nam-Il High School stands as the pinnacle for martial arts prodigies. Jiu Ji-Tae, an unlikely underdog known for his lack of strength, is unexpectedly thrown into this elite group. By harnessing the power of jiu-jitsu to overcome his physical limitations, can he climb his way to the summit of the school's fierce fighting hierarchy?

basic_info.title: From a Knight to a Lady
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Geu Gisa-ga Lady-ro Saneun Beop

content.synopsis: In the Kingdom of Ersha, Estelle, a courageous knight, meets a tragic end. But death is just the beginning of her journey. Four years later, she awakens in the body of Lucifela Aydin, a cold-hearted count's daughter in the Empire of Jansgar. Shocked to learn her homeland's fall to Jansgar, she faces an unexpected betrothal to Zedekiah Heint, her former adversary. As Lucifela, can Estelle unravel the mysteries of her past while adjusting to her new life and identity?

basic_info.title: The Lady and the Beast
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Geunyeo-wa Yasu

content.synopsis: After a tumultuous past of conflict and sorrow, the esteemed Empress Martina finds herself reincarnated as Astina, the brilliant daughter of a modest count. Astina's tranquility is shattered when her father's financial woes compel him to wed her to the formidable Archduke Atalenta, known in high society as "Terriod the Beast" due to a family curse that transforms him into a savage creature. Armed with her formidable sword, the ex-empress effortlessly subdues the ferocious Atalenta, seizing control of the household. Astina is astonished when a simple kiss restores Terriod to his human form, resembling her former lover, yet devoid of any recollection of their wolfen encounters. Despite the awkwardness, can this unlikely duo unite to govern the archduchy with strength and unity?

basic_info.title: My Master Is a Backseat Gamer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Heavenly Demon Instructor, Backseating Heavenly Demon, Hunsu Duneun Cheonma-nim

content.synopsis: In a realm where super-powered heroes combat extradimensional monsters, Hyunsoo is a mere supporter lacking abilities. Everything changes when Chunma, a god-like grandmaster from the medieval era, appears mysteriously to mentor Hyunsoo. Hidden from others, Chunma trains Hyunsoo in martial arts. As Hyunsoo's newfound powers compel him to confront the monsters, he embarks on an exhilarating journey with Chunma by his side, navigating through thrilling battles and unexpected challenges.

basic_info.title: To Not Die
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jukji Aneuryeomyeon

content.synopsis: In the daily torment of school, Dajun faces relentless bullying. Driven to despair, he contemplates ending his own life, only to discover a deeper truth: it is not he who should perish, but the villains who plague this world. Pushed to the edge by a confrontation with his tormentors, Dajun is cast into the unforgiving streets, where he embarks on a quest for retribution. To succeed, he must transform into a formidable force. Yet, as he delves deeper, Dajun realizes that his adversaries extend far beyond the schoolyard bullies - a more formidable challenge awaits him.

basic_info.title: I Was Tricked Into This Fake Marriage!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: This Is an Obvious Fraudulent Marriage, Igeon Myeongbaekhan Sagi Gyeolhon-ida

content.synopsis: In the wake of the Delpice Empire's ruthless conquest to unite the kingdoms, noblemen who resisted were stripped of their titles. Leyrin Efran, now an unexpected countess following her father's downfall, faces a dilemma: she must marry to retain her family's legacy. Turning to the secretive Nine Night Guild for assistance, she seeks a lower-ranking suitor to maintain her independence. Their chosen candidate is undeniably attractive, but hidden truths soon unravel, casting doubt on the Guild's true intentions.

basic_info.title: Reverse Villain
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 리버스 빌런

content.synopsis: Jung-woo finds himself trapped in an endless cycle of reincarnation, eternally bound to his rival, Shin-Ryong. From a young age, he harbored a singular ambition: to rise as a formidable force in the realm of Murim. Yet, fate seemed determined to thwart his every move, with Shin-Ryong emerging victorious time and again. After five successive reincarnations ending in defeat, Jung-woo is reborn for the sixth time—this time into a world far removed from Murim. The shift to the modern era reshapes Jung-woo's aspirations, as the once-familiar battleground of Murim fades into obscurity.

basic_info.title: The Perfect Hybrid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Genius of the Unique Lineage, Extraordinary Descent Genius, Gyugyeok Oe Hyeoltong Cheonjae, Genius of the Unique Lineage

content.synopsis: In a world once invaded by beings from another realm, peace now reigns with the aid of extraordinary humans who emerged during the crisis. Gwangik Yu, born to two such supernaturals, walks a delicate line. His father, an immortal, and his mother, a shape-shifting warrior, each unaware of the other's abilities, yearn for Gwangik to embrace their legacy. As he navigates this parental divide, Gwangik's own destiny unfolds amidst the remnants of a world forever altered by the invasion.

basic_info.title: Abide in the Wind
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Abide by the Wind, Barami Meomuneun Nan

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, a young glider technician collides with a mysterious tree that happens to be the sanctuary of the last dragon on Earth. Through a chance encounter, the technician unwittingly forms a bond with the dragon's formidable powers as they unite against knights on a quest for the coveted "Dragon Pearl" – an artifact imbued with the essence and abilities of a dragon. As the technician learns that the Dragon Pearl is now intertwined with her essence, a perilous truth emerges: separating from the dragon would mean its demise. Thus unfolds a gripping tale of survival as the duo navigate treacherous foes and ethical dilemmas brought about by their extraordinary interspecies connection. But as the saga unfolds, could their bond hold secrets beyond what meets the eye?

basic_info.title: For My Derelict Favorite
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: For My Forsaken Beloved, For My Abandoned Love, Beoryeojin Naui Choeae-reul Wihayeo

content.synopsis:
When a woman dozes off while engrossed in her treasured novel, she unexpectedly awakens as Hestia, a solitary figure endowed with vast wealth but lacking family ties. Embracing her newfound affluence, she dedicates herself to silently observing the intricate lives of the main players—Diana, Helios, and Caelus. Hestia's heart beats for Caelus, the intricate secondary character she fervently supports. Yet, as Caelus veers into morally dubious territories to confront the antagonists, a schism forms between him and the central duo.

A year following Diana and Helios' nuptials, Hestia now resides in a dilapidated forest abode, her riches drained. Serendipity intertwines her path with Caelus, a shadow of his former self after being forsaken by his closest companion and unrequited love. Tragically, Caelus succumbs to self-inflicted demise, prompting Hestia to unleash a fervent curse upon those who led him astray, yearning to seek retribution. Miraculously, her pleas are heeded, propelling her back in time prior to Caelus' descent. With unwavering resolve, Hestia sets in motion a master plan to secure eternal joy for her cherished Caelus.

basic_info.title: Book Eater
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Book Eating Magician, Chaek Meongneun Mabeopsa

content.synopsis: Embark on a magical journey with Theodore Miller, a struggling student at Berghen Academy who stumbles upon a mysterious grimoire called "Gluttony." This enchanted book transforms into a voracious creature attached to his hand, devouring magical texts and artifacts. As Gluttony feeds, Theodore's powers soar, propelling him to the top of the academy's ranks. Despite the peril of being consumed by his newfound power, Theodore is on the thrilling path to mastering magic and becoming a true wizard.

basic_info.title: Ghost Teller
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gwijeon Gudam

content.synopsis: Prepare to be chilled to the bone as you delve into the eerie accounts told not by mere mortals, but by the very ghosts haunting the shadows of our world. If you believe your ghostly tales are spine-tingling, wait until you hear what these spectral storytellers have to reveal.

basic_info.title: Charlotte and Her 5 Disciples
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Charlotte Has Five Disciples, Charlotte-ege-neun Daseot Myeongui Jeja-ga Itda

content.synopsis: In a world where magic fulfills deepest wishes, the renowned sorcerer Charlotte Eleanor embraced this belief wholeheartedly. She not only saved the world but also mentored five loyal disciples in the ways of her extraordinary powers. Yet, for all her feats, true love remained elusive to her. Reincarnated as Aria Lisen after her passing, Charlotte faces a new chance at love. Guided by the Grand Duke Louister, will Aria unravel the mystery of love while concealing her true identity from her former followers?

basic_info.title: I'm the Queen in This Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Legitimate Queen, Sister, I Am the Queen in This Life

content.synopsis: After losing her fiancé, sister, and parent in a single day, Ariadne inexplicably finds herself back fourteen years in time. To her surprise, her fiancé now has a vastly altered persona, showering her with unexpected compliments. Meanwhile, the prince is captivated by her beauty upon their first encounter. Determined to seize her second chance, Ariadne plots to ascend to the throne and exact her revenge.

basic_info.title: Saving My Sweetheart
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Way to Protect the Lovable You, Dajeonghan Geudaereul Jikineun Bangbeop

content.synopsis:
Within the kingdom of Everbright, Leticia, known as the saintess's malevolent daughter, is rumored to crave blood and revel in wickedness. Yet her reality is far grimmer; trapped in servitude as a scapegoat, her suffering knows no bounds. Now, fate twists as she is thrust into marriage with King Ditrian, whose realm despises both saintess and daughter.

But Leticia's tale spans lifetimes. In a bygone era, she cherished King Ditrian, only to be ensnared by the saintess's treachery. Determined not to repeat history, Leticia vows to protect her beloved at any cost—even if it demands her life. Empowered by a long-dormant force, she seizes a slim chance at altering a destiny once set in stone.

basic_info.title: Barbarian Quest
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 바바리안 퀘스트

content.synopsis: Embark on an exhilarating journey as Urich and his friends push the boundaries near the mysterious Sky Mountains, only for Urich to be taken captive. Escaping after a fierce struggle, he discovers a whole new world awaiting him. Join him as he ventures through this uncharted territory, meeting allies and foes who shape his understanding of this civilization and his own growth as a warrior. Yet, the ultimate destination of Urich's quest remains shrouded in mystery...

basic_info.title: Miss Not-So Sidekick
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gugyeonghaneun Deulleoriyang

content.synopsis:
Kim Hyejung immerses herself in the enchanting world of The Flower of the Beast, a captivating fantasy romance novel featuring Ibelin Dott torn between the affections of the crown prince, a dashing duke, and the enigmatic master of the magic tower. Despite its predictable plot, the novel serves as a solace for Hyejung.

One fateful night, exhausted beyond measure, Hyejung slips into slumber only to awaken within the pages of The Flower of the Beast. Now embodying Latte Ectrie, the noble viscount's daughter and a mere side character in the tale, Hyejung—now Latte—faces slim chances of encountering the male leads. Determined, Latte channels her creativity into crafting boys' love narratives until the arrival of the female protagonist.

A decade later, as Ibelin prepares to grace the crown princess' birthday gala, Latte anticipates the unfolding drama from the periphery. Unbeknownst to her, her interventions have sparked unforeseen consequences. Through a twist of fate, Latte befriends Ibelin, while Arwin Hebrim, the perilous third suitor, diverts his attention to Latte instead of the leading lady!

basic_info.title: Hoarding in Hell
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jiog-eseo Doksik

content.synopsis: In a world where hunters rake in fortunes exploring dungeons, Hyunmoo Kang struggles as a miner. His luck changes when he inherits a cryptic hearthstone, whisking him away to a realm known as Hell where death is but a temporary inconvenience. As Hyunmoo navigates this perilous domain, he sharpens his abilities, amasses valuable treasures, and questions the mysterious link between Hell and his own world.

basic_info.title: Killer Peter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Killer Pietro, Killer Pedro

content.synopsis: In a life devoted to the crime organization Glory Club, legendary killer Peter eventually retires to run a peaceful used bookstore. However, a near-fatal ambush by his former associates leads to a miraculous transformation - Peter's body reverts to its teenage form. With his peak physical condition restored, Peter embarks on a mission to seek vengeance against Glory Club.

basic_info.title: Blink Master of the Magic Academy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Magic Academy's Genius Blinker, I Became a Flashing Genius at the Magic Academy, Quick Teleporting Genius from Magic School, Mabeop Hakgyo Apjeommyeol Cheonjae-ga Doeeotda

content.synopsis:
In the virtual realm of Aether World, Baek Yuseol faced ridicule as the underdog with no magical prowess. Labelled a "trash character," he struggled in a world where magic reigned supreme. But when a catastrophic event unfolds, plunging Aether World into chaos, a new path emerges for Baek Yuseol.

Transported to this fantastical realm, a mysterious voice guides him with a cryptic message: "You can use the skill 'Blink'." As he grapples with this newfound ability, Baek Yuseol questions his purpose in this unforgiving land.

Armed with only this unique skill, he navigates the elite circles of Stella Academy, a hub of prodigious mages. Despite his initial disadvantage, Baek Yuseol rises to become the enigmatic Blink Mage, carving his own destiny amidst a backdrop of magical intrigue and peril.

basic_info.title: To Love Your Enemy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Wonsu-reul Sarangha-ra

content.synopsis: Yeonhee Bae, a skilled manipulator, is determined to turn over a new leaf by pursuing college at 24. However, her plans unravel when a figure from her past threatens to expose a damaging secret, jeopardizing her newfound stability. As rumors swirl and tensions rise on campus, Yeonhee must confront her past and navigate complex relationships to secure her future. Will she and her adversary find common ground amidst the chaos of college life?

basic_info.title: The Friendly Winter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 다정한 겨울

content.synopsis: In "A Friendly Winter," we follow the story of a 19-year-old girl named Lily, who grapples with a rare growth disorder that stunts her physical growth, leaving her in the body of a small child. Alongside her is a boy named Jack, who, despite being 17 years old, has a mental disorder that gives him the mind of a small boy. Together, they navigate the challenges and delights of their daily lives, forming a heartwarming bond that transcends their unique circumstances.

basic_info.title: What's Wrong with You, Duke?
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Why Are You Doing This, Duke?, Wae Ireoseyo, Gongjak-nim!

content.synopsis: In the realm of Faucigny, the ruthless Duke Dreux finds himself under a spell, madly infatuated with Nöel as he teeters between declarations of undying love and menacing threats. As the magic's potency dwindles, Nöel navigates his unpredictable behavior, desperate to save her fairytale marriage and prevent losing her beloved "Ru" to the whims of the fading enchantment.

basic_info.title: A Villainess for the Tyrant
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Villain Is a Good Match for a Tyrant, Pokgun-ege-neun Angnyeo-ga Eoullinda

content.synopsis:
In the Navitan Kingdom, the striking illegitimate daughter of the royal family, Cecile Franvier, is chosen to wed Emperor Estian of the fearsome Arkia Empire. Known for his ruthless rule and superhuman strength, Estian strikes terror across neighboring lands. Amidst whispers of her doomed fate, Cecile defies expectations and stands her ground.

Presenting herself as fearless and resolute, Cecile challenges Estian to escort her down the aisle, surprised by both his acquiescence and his striking appearance. As empress, Cecile faces threats from assassins, yet finds an unlikely ally in Estian. To survive in this treacherous court, she must embrace her darker side and carve a reputation as a villainess feared even by the emperor himself.

basic_info.title: Bloody Sweet
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Honey Blood

content.synopsis:
Bullied and isolated, Shin Naerim yearns for escape from her lonely existence. With no allies and a propensity to endure suffering in silence, her life takes an unexpected turn when she crosses paths with Vlad Fetechou—an ancient vampire inadvertently forming a blood pact with Naerim. Their connection manifests as a crimson thread whenever Naerim bleeds, binding them together in a complex bond of master and servant.

Fetechou's heart's desire is to shed his immortal form and embrace humanity, a transformation attainable only by consuming the blood of a witch—Naerim herself. As their relationship deepens, they navigate personal wounds, fractured relationships, and haunting shadows from Fetechou's past, finding solace in each other amidst the chaos.

basic_info.title: The Taming of the Tyrant
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Tamed a Tyrant and Ran Away, Pokgun-eul Gildeurido Domangcheo Beoryeotda

content.synopsis: Charlize Ronan dreams of bringing honor to her family, but fate twists her path, transforming her into a "living sword" serving the emperors. Desperate for justice, she finds herself back in her original body. With unwavering resolve to dismantle the oppressive empire, Charlize sets out to locate Prince Dylan Blade. Her plan is bold: to seat him on the throne not as a just leader, but as a tyrant. The time has come for Charlize to tame the instrument of her vengeance.

basic_info.title: The Villain's Savior
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Agyeok-ui Guwonja

content.synopsis: In a world where divine blessings decree every person's destined partner, Aseph Randell faces a life steeped in sorrow. Han Jae finds herself unable to put down the book "Sentence of God," deeply moved by Aseph's tragic tale. After a year of tears and dreams, she resolves to complete the novel, only to be devastated by Aseph's demise. Overwhelmed by grief, she falls asleep as Elzay Tiathe, a character outside the story—twin to Elissa, the heroine. Now inhabiting a realm where Aseph's future miseries loom large, can she alter his fate?

basic_info.title: The Grand Mudang Saga
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Path of the Shaman, Wandering Warrior of Wudang, Mudang Gihyeop

content.synopsis: As the supreme dark leader lies on his deathbed, a twist of fate grants him a second shot at life. Reincarnated as Jinmu, a novice under his enemy's wing in the noble Mudang clan, he seizes the opportunity to sow seeds of corruption and decadence within their ranks. Unaware of his hidden agenda, the Mudang members are drawn to Jinmu's bold demeanor and skill in martial arts. Will Jinmu be the downfall of the Mudang Clan, or will he be the catalyst for their much-needed awakening?

In the realm of Heaven, the Angel Princess finds herself betrothed to the Emperor of the Underworld, the Demon King. Refusing to accept this fate, she flees to the human world in disguise as a schoolboy. As both heavenly and hellish forces scramble to ensure the impending wedding takes place, a dramatic chase unfolds across Earth.

basic_info.title: Like Wind on a Dry Branch
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mareun Gaji-e Baram-cheoreom

content.synopsis:
In the wake of Count Casarius' passing in Cevitas, Rieta Tristi faces a grim fate—vivisepulture, being buried alive as a sacrifice to join the deceased. The plague's grip tightens, having already claimed her first husband and led her daughter into the clutches of the slave trade. Now, the very person responsible for her daughter's plight demands her sacrificial company.

As Rieta resigns to her tragic end, the ritual is disrupted by the enigmatic Archduke of Axias Manor. Known for his brutal past and ostracized from the empire, he arrives unannounced at the funeral seeking to settle a debt. However, instead of the expected coffin, he finds intrigue in Rieta's somber presence.

In a surprising turn, the Archduke proposes to take Rieta under his wing in exchange for forgiving the debt. The late Count's son swiftly agrees, altering Rieta's fate from sacrifice to consort. Embracing her new role, Rieta, skilled in magic, uses her powers to bless those within the castle walls.

Amidst her newfound duties, Rieta delves into understanding the Archduke, who, in an unexpected twist, shows her kindness in a world devoid of it. As Rieta navigates this second chance at life, she must unravel the mysteries of her new surroundings and the enigmatic man who has taken her under his wing.

basic_info.title: Return of the War God
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Chronicles of the Martial God's Return, Chronicles of a Returner, Record of Return, Musin Gwihwanrok

content.synopsis:
In the realm of Martial Divine Demon, the formidable Woohyun Dan was sealed away due to his overwhelming power. Emerging from his millennium-long slumber, he found himself adrift in the desolate alleys, grappling with a sense of futility. Just as disillusionment threatened to consume him, a small hand extended towards him.

"What's this?" Woohyun inquired.

"A dumpling!" was the cheerful response.

For the first time, an act of genuine kindness touched his heart, altering the course of his destiny. Thus unfolds the saga of a martial deity who transcends a thousand years of history and dimensions, navigating a world where time and space converge.

basic_info.title: XO Sisters
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 엑소시스터즈

content.synopsis: When troublemaker Jo Cheul-Hee transfers to a new school, he's ready to assert his dominance. The twist? It's an all-girls school, and Jo's the lone male student. Suddenly, he's mistaken for something he's not: gay.

basic_info.title: I Married the Male Lead's Dad
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Namju-ui Eomma-ga Doeeo Beoryeotda, I Became the Hero's Mom, I Became the Male Lead's Stepmother

content.synopsis: In my everyday world, I delighted in admiring Abel Louvremont, the captivating protagonist of my beloved novel, Persona. However, a life-altering car crash transports me into the very pages of Persona, where Abel remains an innocent child. Embracing my new identity as Aisha Heathcliff, I revel in the chance to adore young Abel firsthand. Determined to protect and provide for him, I find myself unexpectedly betrothed to... his father?!

basic_info.title: Threads of Time
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sal rye tap, Sal-Le-Top

content.synopsis:
High schooler Moon Bin Lee is plagued by a haunting nightmare where he's transported a thousand years into the past, relentlessly pursuing a mysterious dark-haired girl into the depths of an ominous abyss. As the dream blurs the lines between his modern identity in Seoul and his historical counterpart, Sa Kyoung Kim, scion of a renowned warrior lineage, Moon Bin grapples with a disorienting dual existence straddling across time and space.

In his present-day life, Moon Bin's involvement in the kendo club's fierce championship battles mirrors his ancient self standing on the brink of a territorial conflict unfolding on the Mongolian plains. As he navigates this intricate web of past and present entanglements, Moon Bin strives to unravel the enigmatic threads of his true self and the daunting responsibilities that come with it.

basic_info.title: When the Villainess Is in Love
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Angnyeo-ga Saranghal Ttae

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, a young girl finds herself inside the body of her beloved character, villainess Princess Libertia. Overjoyed, she sets out to rewrite the tragic fates of her cherished characters. However, as Princess Libertia's reputation begins to shift, will the girl's adoration be enough to transform a villainess into a hero? Embrace a tale where one fangirl's devotion holds the power to reshape destinies and redefine the boundaries between good and evil.

basic_info.title:
K2♥: Kill Me Kiss Me
Kill♥Me Kiss Me
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: K2♥-Kill me Kiss me-

content.synopsis: When Tae Yeon Im discovers her beloved idol star attends the same school as her look-alike cousin, Jung-Woo Im, a mischievous plan takes shape. In a daring twist, they swap identities - Tae poses as Jung-Woo to get close to her crush, while Jung-Woo navigates the unfamiliar world of high school girls. However, their scheme hits a snag when they encounter a bully named Ga-Wun Kim, who threatens Jung-Woo's safety. As Tae dives into the complexities of her double life, Jung-Woo grapples with the unexpected challenges of living as a woman. Will their risky charade lead to love and laughter, or unforeseen consequences?

basic_info.title: The Slumbering Ranker
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sleeping Ranker, Ranker, Even if I Sleep, Jamman Jado Ranker

content.synopsis: In the virtual world of Idea, Lee Hyunsung has spent 10,000 hours immersed in the game until he emerges as a formidable player. With an exclusive hidden class and extraordinary skills, including the ability to battle while asleep, he gains attention from both developers and competitors. As Hyunsung climbs the ranks, the question looms: will he reach the pinnacle of success in Idea, or is it all just a tantalizing illusion?

basic_info.title: Shaman Warrior
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dangu, Dangoo

content.synopsis: In the thrilling world of Manshin-musas, where spirits are harnessed to unleash berserk power, Yarang stands out as a formidable warrior. Recognized for valor in battle, Yarang earns a prestigious government role. Amidst the chaos of bloodshed and mayhem, the enigmatic master wizard Yarong and his loyal companion Batu emerge from the desolate wastelands. Tasked with a crucial mission by the king, they soon find themselves entangled in a web of political intrigue and clandestine schemes that will forever alter their fates. When Yarong sustains a fatal wound, Batu must honor a secret vow to safeguard Yarong's child. As Batu races to protect the infant, Yarong unveils a perilous truth to those hunting him down—the lethal, untapped power of a Shaman Warrior! Fans of Blade of the Immortal and Vagabond will be captivated by the dynamic storytelling of this spellbinding fantasy series.

basic_info.title:
Zero
Zero - The Beginning of The Coffin
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 제로 - 시작의관

content.synopsis: Born in a clandestine government lab where psychic abilities are harnessed, Shuuichi and his sisters, Sumire and Katsumi, undergo a harrowing existence as experimental subjects before breaking free. Now hunted by mysterious factions, they must evade capture as Shuuichi, the coveted "zero-sample" possessing the dreaded power of "zero-shock," becomes the ultimate target.

basic_info.title: All-Master Necromancer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Absolute Necromancer

content.synopsis: In a mysterious tower where transformations happen in the blink of an eye, a decade passes before I find myself reborn into a young boy's body on Earth, nestled in South Korea. Fueled by the betrayal of those who wronged me, I vow to confront them head-on. Enter Spirit Master Cha Jinhyuk, the formidable "All-Master," who aims to settle scores by ascending the tower as a powerful necromancer.

basic_info.title: My Secret Brother
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Unstoppable Siblings

content.synopsis: On her very first day, she commits a grave error. Desperate to capture the interest of the boy who captured her heart instantly, she fabricates a tale about dating her brother, weaving a captivating narrative about the extraordinary school life of this remarkable sibling.

basic_info.title: Becoming a Magic School Mage
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Magic Academy Survival Guide, Life of a Magic Academy Mage, Surviving as a Mage in a Magic Academy, Mabeop Hakgyo Mabeopsa-ro Saraganeun Beop

content.synopsis: Ehan, a weary graduate student, swears off school until he mysteriously reincarnates as the third son of a noble mage family. To carve his destiny, he enters Einrogard, the empire's prestigious magic academy, where success is anticipated. However, Ehan's preference for easy victories clashes with the high expectations. Will he muster the drive to emerge as a skilled mage despite his reluctance towards ambition?

basic_info.title: Absolute Sword Sense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Perfect Sword Sense, Jeoldae Geomgam

content.synopsis: Woonhwi So has always been the outcast in his family and clan due to his shattered spirit core. Forced to work as a mediocre spy for the Blood Cult, his fate takes a drastic turn when a mission leads to his untimely death, only to awaken ten years in the past. Returning to the day of his abduction by the cult, Woonhwi discovers a newfound power - the ability to hear the whisper of a mysterious dagger.

basic_info.title: The Beloved Little Princess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mangnae Hwang-nyeo-nim, The Youngest Princess

content.synopsis: Princess Enisha's arrival heralds the dawn of the Hyperion Empire's destined rule. Blessed with an irresistibly adorable visage and an army of devoted attendants, life seems idyllic for the infant royal. However, navigating the treacherous waters of her deranged siblings and a belligerent father bent on destruction poses a formidable challenge. Amidst a relentless onslaught of assassins and haunting memories of a past life as a formidable high mage, Enisha must thwart the looming calamity threatening her realm. Despite the allure of reclaiming her former power, the mantle of Hyperion's beacon of hope offers its own regal rewards. Amidst the trials of her cherished princesshood, Enisha stands resolute, for the empire's sake.

basic_info.title: Enrolling in the Transcendent Academy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Transcension Academy, Chowolja Hagwon-ui Sugangsaeng-i Doeeotda

content.synopsis: In a world overrun by monsters for a century, aspiring monster hunter Seojun Kim's dreams are shattered by a tragic accident. However, a glimmer of hope emerges when he stumbles upon ads for the enigmatic Transcendent Academy on his phone. Offering virtual training alongside legendary warriors, Seojun dives into a realm of hunter academies, daring dungeon raids, and fierce tournaments. With each level he conquers, mysteries unravel about his companions, his own past, and the hidden truths of the Transcendent Academy, leaving him questioning everything he thought he knew.

basic_info.title: Charming the Duke of the North
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Will Seduce the Northern Duke, I Seduced the Northern Duke, Bukbu Gongjak-nim-eul Yuhok Hagetseumnida

content.synopsis:
Selena, the renowned star capturing global attention, finds herself mysteriously transported to the Northern Duke's domain while on a film shoot. The nobleman, Kalcion, rescues her from perilous beasts and proposes a deal: return home in exchange for posing as his lover to gather intel in exclusive social circles. Eagerly agreeing, Selena soon faces a dilemma - Kalcion's abysmal acting abilities.

Frustrated, she challenges the Duke's shortcomings, leading to a change in plans: she will seduce him instead. Thus, a peculiar contract binds them. Will Kalcion enhance his acting prowess first, or will genuine emotions surface between them?

basic_info.title: Do You Want to Try?
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 한 번 해봐?

content.synopsis: In a fiery encounter, the quick-tempered Han Hye Won unknowingly offends the charming leader of Han Hwa Go, Sun Woo Bin. In retaliation, Sun Woo Bin arrives at her doorstep accompanied by his fierce motorcycle crew, sparking tension and anticipation for a showdown. But amidst the chaos, unexpected sparks fly, culminating in a surprising kiss and an unusual request from the renowned captain. Curious to uncover the unfolding drama?

basic_info.title: Murim RPG Simulation
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Heavenly Demon Cultivation Simulation, Cultivation of Heaven, Cheonma Yukseong

content.synopsis: In the treacherous world of the Demon Cult, scout Seolhwi embarks on a routine patrol with his squad, only to face a chilling encounter with a formidable master from the Mount Hua Sect, long-standing foes of the cult. In a brutal twist of fate, the Mount Hua Cult master mercilessly wipes out Seolhwi's entire squad. As Seolhwi fades, regretting his unfruitful years of loyalty, a mysterious video game prompt appears, offering him a chance to reset. Determined to forge a different path, Seolhwi seizes the opportunity to rewrite his destiny, vowing to survive, grow stronger, and ascend to the pinnacle of the Demon Cult.

basic_info.title: Happily Ever Afterwards
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Picked up the Second Male Lead After the Ending, Ending Hu Sub-nam-eul Juwotda

content.synopsis: When a mysterious twist of fate grants a second chance at life to the protagonist, they find themselves thrust into a world where reality blurs with fiction. As they navigate this surreal existence in the realm of characters, they must grapple with the ultimate question: how will they shape their destiny this time around?

basic_info.title: Little Rabbit and the Big Bad Leopard
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Symbiotic Relationship Between a Panther and a Rabbit, Tokki-wa Heukpyobeom-ui Gongsaeng Gwangye

content.synopsis: Intriguingly, Vivi discovers she is a wererabbit, a rare breed known for transforming into humans, but her attempts at the shift fail, branding her as cursed and abandoned to a grim fate. However, her downfall is averted by Ahin from the Black Leopard Clan. Despite Ahin's unpredictable nature and demanding demeanor, Vivi grapples with doubts about her safety and sanity. Trapped in her rabbit form amidst a sea of predators exuding potent pheromones, she must navigate the perilous environment. Can Vivi unravel the secret to unlocking her inner strength and mastering her transformation abilities?

basic_info.title: The Stories of Those Around Me
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Story of Someone We Know

content.synopsis: Synopsis: Follow the lives of three ordinary women as they navigate the extraordinary challenges of their daily routines in a world where the line between the mundane and the exceptional blurs.

basic_info.title: Savage Garden
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Crossdressing
            
                Crossdressing,                    Historical
            
                Historical,                    School
            
                School
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 새비지 가든

content.synopsis: In 18th century England, Gabriel, an orphaned girl from a once prestigious family, forges an unlikely bond with Jeremy, a young man whispered to be a nobleman's illegitimate son. When circumstances demand it, Gabriel assumes Jeremy's identity and enters an elite all boys academy for nobles. What appears as a paradise to outsiders conceals a brutal reality beyond Gabriel's wildest imaginings.

basic_info.title:
Yongbi Bulpae
Yongbi the Invincible
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Historical
            
                Historical,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 용비불패

content.synopsis: Yongbi, the fearless bounty hunter with a love for drink, women, and adventure, is not one to shy away from danger. Alongside his loyal horse, he exudes charm despite his flaws. When a young boy with a coveted medallion seeks his protection, adversaries beware as they face the duo's formidable presence.

basic_info.title: Becoming the Monarch
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Story of a Low-Rank Soldier Becoming a Monarch, Maldan Byeongsa-eseo Gunju-kkaji

content.synopsis:
At 15, a battlefield claimed my right hand. By 24, I honed essential skills for survival. Yet, constant echoes haunted me:

"Just give up. Learning sojutsu will only age me faster."

"If only you weren't impaired, endless possibilities would be yours."

"Why fixate on swordplay? Let's gather herbs instead."

"Blend in with the crowd."

At 39, I plummeted off a cliff, losing my left hand. Consuming an unknown Artifact changed everything...

basic_info.title: Dark Air
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 다크에어

content.synopsis: In a world once brimming with magic, its sudden disappearance has left magicians powerless and scorned by warriors. Only two individuals retain this extraordinary ability: the formidable wizard and a young boy. Join Melrose and his companions on a thrilling quest to unravel this perplexing enigma.

basic_info.title: How to Live as a Villain
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Isekai
            
                Isekai,                    Psychological
            
                Psychological,                    Survival
            
                Survival
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Living like a Villain, Akdang-i Saraganeun Beop

content.synopsis: Seonghoon finds himself mysteriously transported to a game-like realm where players vie to be the successor to the next god in "the Mission." In this cutthroat world of alliances and betrayals, Seonghoon, lacking natural ability, must rely on cunning and ruthlessness to rise to power.

basic_info.title: Returned by the King
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Return to the Power of the King, Wang-ui Him-euro Hoegwihada, Regressing with the King's Power

content.synopsis:
"I'll devour all your abilities!"

"Screw this awakening nonsense."

"Damn being a failure."

Kim Taehyun, with his awakening status in question, was viewed as a failure for not awakening. Yet, as death loomed, he finally awakened his power, opening a gate to the king. Revived by the king's influence, Taehyun acquires a new skill named Predation and reverts from 35 to 19 years old.

[Skill absorption complete]

With this newfound strength, I can rise to the peak.

basic_info.title: The Great Wizard Transcendent
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Archmage Who Transcends by Returning, Hoegwi-ro Chowolhaneun Daemadosa, Archmage Transcending Through Regression

content.synopsis: When 9th-circle Archmage Mikhail Walpurgis was defeated by a cursed hero in battle, he unleashed the powerful spell "Time Reversal." Transported back 20 years, he resolves to rewrite his destiny by becoming the hero himself.

basic_info.title: House Mayton's Youngest
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Youngest Son of the Renowned Magic Clan, Youngest Scion of the Mages, The Youngest Son of a Magician, Mabeop Myeongga Mangnae Adeul

content.synopsis: In "Swordmaster Sade," author Sungmin Cha is unexpectedly reincarnated as Rasen Mayton, a disliked character fated to perish young. Trapped in a plot-hole-filled narrative, Sungmin faces the challenge of adapting to his new life as a scorned individual in an unfamiliar timeline before the story unfolds. Can Sungmin, now House Mayton's youngest member, navigate this uncharted world and evade his impending demise?

basic_info.title: The Villainess's Stationery Shop
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Angnyeo-ui Mungujeom-e Oji Maseyo!, Please Don't Come to the Villainess' Stationery Store!

content.synopsis:
When the impolite and inept Meldenique "Mel" Babelloa departs her opulent home with a grin, her disdainful family is left astounded. Despite being betrothed to Duke Lennox Hessman for political gain, Mel is blindsided by his affair with her own half-sister, Sheria. Battling her malicious stepmother's sabotage, Mel's entrepreneurial ventures have all floundered. Yet, fueled by determination, Mel now harbors a singular aspiration: to launch her very own stationery shop!

In a previous existence, Mel endured a solitary existence as an orphan in Korea. Simple pleasures like charming pens, unique toys, and delectable treats never failed to brighten her days. Reborn as Mel, her deepest desire is to spread joy to children in need of solace. Enlisting the help of crucial allies with magical abilities, Mel endeavors to craft enchanting experiences for these precious youngsters. Formerly seen as a villainess in this realm, those who harbor animosity towards her are poised to thwart her burgeoning enterprise at any cost.

basic_info.title: The Creator Is on Hiatus
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I'll Be Taking a Break for Personal Reasons, Temporarily Closed for Work Reasons, Ilshin-sang-ui Iyu-ro Jamsi Hyujaehamnida

content.synopsis: Meet Ilshin Yoo, a struggling web novel author who couldn't catch a break. Don't mistake him for a deity just because of his name. In a world that favors only hunters, rising up the ranks is the ultimate goal. However, not all hunters walk the same path once awakened. Your rank as a hunter is usually set in stone, unchanging. Until one fateful day when Ilshin's awakening grants him an unusual ability. Suddenly, in a pocket world accessed through his smartphone, he finds himself worshipped by the weak and insignificant as their savior. Can someone as unassuming as Ilshin truly be the world's last hope?

basic_info.title: The Siren: Becoming the Villain's Family
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Became the Villain's Contract Family, Siren: Akdang-gwa Gyeyak Gajog-i Doeeotda

content.synopsis:
Ariadne "Aria" Cortéz is the last siren whose captivating song enchants all who hear it, leading to her confinement in a cage. Robbed of the use of her legs, she sings until her voice grows hoarse and despair clouds her eyes. In her darkest moment, Grand Duke Lloyd Cardenas Valentine finds her, gently lifting her shattered body.

Aria recognizes a kindred spirit in Lloyd, who bears the weight of his own tragic past. Having made a pact with a devil at 18, he committed unspeakable acts, including turning on his own family and challenging the emperor. As Aria wakes up in a different time, she vows to protect Lloyd at any cost, offering him her body, soul, and most importantly, her voice to reignite his dwindling flame.

basic_info.title: Auto Hunting With My Clones
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Auto-Hunting With Clones, Bunsin-euro Jadong Sanyang

content.synopsis:
In the bustling world of the university campus, 20-year-old Sang-Woo stumbled upon an intriguing opportunity: the awakening program. This revolutionary system, initiated by the government and embraced by the masses, granted ordinary individuals extraordinary skills. Venturing into this new realm, Sang-Woo discovered his unique talent for cloning, a power far beyond mere illusion.

Emboldened by his newfound abilities, Sang-Woo embarked on a thrilling journey as a hunter, utilizing his cloning prowess to outmaneuver his adversaries. However, his path took an unexpected turn when he crossed paths with the enigmatic Jumper George Lucas. As Lucas recognized the untapped potential within Sang-Woo's skill, a complex web of intrigue and danger began to unravel.

Caught in the midst of Lucas's grand scheme, Sang-Woo found himself entangled in a web of deception and dark truths. As he delved deeper into the shadows of this twisted plot, the young hunter soon realized that his destiny was intricately linked to the sinister secrets lurking within the awakening program.

basic_info.title: My Reason to Die
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: What I Decided to Die For, Naega Jukgi-ro Gyeolsimhan Geos-eun

content.synopsis: Ji-o's fortunes take a turn for the worse as she sustains an injury just before the national taekwondo team tryouts. Amidst this pivotal setback, she crosses paths with Gyeol, a enigmatic young man who leaves an indelible mark on her life. Gyeol is the quintessential bad boy with a hidden kindness that captivates Ji-o. Despite the undeniable allure, she grapples with the realization that he is entangled with a dubious circle. Will Ji-o gamble her heart on Gyeol, knowing the high stakes involved?

basic_info.title: No Home
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jib-i Eopseo

content.synopsis:
In the outskirts of the school lies an eerie, abandoned dormitory teeming with ghostly whispers and chilling creaks. Enter Go Haejun, a high school student with a unique ability to see spirits. Due to missing the dormitory application deadline, he finds himself stuck in this haunted abode, with his unexpected roommate being the audacious first-year student, Baek Eunyeong.

Eunyeong, a reckless troublemaker, not only disrupts Haejun's plans but also depletes his savings without remorse. Amidst Haejun's internal turmoil from a recent spat with his mother, Eunyeong's carefree and deceitful ways further test his patience. Despite their clashing personalities and mutual animosity, these two must navigate cohabitation, bound together by the lack of alternative housing options.

basic_info.title: Odd Girl Out
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Sonyeo-ui Segye, Girl's World

content.synopsis: On her first day of high school, Nari, yearning for anonymity, unexpectedly finds herself joining forces with the school's three most glamorous girls to create an unlikely squad.

basic_info.title: Random Chat
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Girl From Random Chatting!, Random Chatting-ui Geunyeo

content.synopsis: In the halls of high school, Joon-Woo navigates his days as an outcast, finding solace in his phone conversations with strangers. The mundane suddenly turns thrilling when he stumbles upon a private chat with a mysterious girl, sparking a newfound excitement. To his surprise, the girl turns out to be none other than his classmate, Seung Ah. As Joon-Woo grapples with the realization, the prospect of first love looms in the air, challenging his sheltered world.

basic_info.title: Flow
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 플로우

content.synopsis:
In a realm where every child is bound to a deity, the strength of these gods varies greatly. While some wield immense power, others are feeble, casting their children into the shadows of society. These "defunct" individuals are barred from high school, forced into the workforce straight out of middle school.

High school serves a unique purpose here – honing students' abilities granted by their potent gods. These gods share a common trait: the ability to fulfill wishes, albeit at a steep cost.

When Leerang manipulates time with his cat god's power, he faces grave consequences. To undo his costly wish, he embarks on a journey back to high school, aiming to harness his deity's abilities once more.

basic_info.title: Secret Lady
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 시크릿 레이디

content.synopsis:
In her past life as Yoon Seolwoo in Korea, 26-year-old Rosentine Arzen inherited a haunting gift—the ability to see ghosts. This spectral power isolated her from loved ones, leaving her breathless with fear. Reborn as a noble lady, Rosentine conceals her supernatural talent, cherishing her newfound family's unwavering love.

When the spirit of Ranon uncovers Rosentine's secret, he mentors her in ghost control. Through this connection, she learns of a deadly plot against Prince Charteris Kartazen. Driven by a sense of duty and a desire to protect the prince and her country, Rosentine, disguised as a humble sorceress, gains Charteris's trust to thwart the assassination scheme. Yet, as she delves deeper into the empire's intrigues, she realizes that not all threats come from the living. To shield her family and uncover the realm's darkest secrets, Rosentine faces her most perilous challenge yet.

basic_info.title: Volcanic Age
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mount Hua Reincarnation, Hwasan Jeonsaeng

content.synopsis: Ju Seo Cheon, a man who miraculously outlives the tumultuous era of war, rises to lead the esteemed Hwasan faction, burdened by a lifetime of remorse and uncertainty. As he nears his final moments, resigned to his fate, he is unexpectedly thrust back into the past...

basic_info.title: 50 Tea Recipes from the Duchess
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Duchess' 50 Tea Recipes, Gongjak Buin-ui 50 Gaji Tea Recipe

content.synopsis: Duchess Chloé Battenberg finds herself trapped in a world of judgmental aristocrats, critical staff, and an unfeeling spouse. But when a meek office worker suddenly inhabits Chloé's body, she decides to turn the tables on her plight. Embracing a newfound assertiveness, she orchestrates a transformative tea party where every cup is a blend of courage, wit, and strategic finesse. Will her bold moves be sufficient to challenge her husband and secure the honor she craves? Join Chloé for a sip of empowerment and intrigue!

basic_info.title: Taming Master
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 테이밍 마스터

content.synopsis: In the virtual realm of Kaillan, Jinsung transforms from a regular college student into the formidable archer, Ian, at level 93. Surprising everyone by resetting his character, Jinsung unveils a mysterious hidden class. Battling monsters and grinding for experience points become his new challenges. With his VR mentor's ultimatum looming, Jinsung faces a race against time to level up and earn the title of the legendary Taming Master within two months.

basic_info.title: The Max Level Returner
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Na Honja Man-Level Gwihanja

content.synopsis: In a sudden twist, 120 million players of the beloved VR game, Eternal World, mysteriously vanish, plunging the world into chaos. Months later, they reappear, having perished in the game. However, they are not alone in their return—sinister monsters emerge, unleashing havoc on Earth. Amidst despair, the legendary Masked Monarch resurfaces, rallying his former comrades to combat these menacing creatures and the malevolent Demon King. Armed only with their wits, players struggle to progress without the game's essential tools. The Masked Monarch, a master strategist, leads the charge, but can his cunning maneuvers save humanity from impending doom?

basic_info.title: Trapped
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Olgami

content.synopsis: In the serene setting of church, Chae-a Han and Yunsu Park appear angelic, but beneath the facade lies a foul-mouthed ex-convict and a mysterious vampire. When Yunsu coerces Chae-a into a false murder confession, she seeks a way out until a chance for revenge arises. With Yunsu's fate in her hands, a deadly game ensues, drawing them into a perilous web of deceit and desire.

basic_info.title: Descent of the Demon Master
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Majon Hyeonse Gangnim-gi

content.synopsis: Once an ordinary teenager, Jinho Kang's life is forever altered by a tragic accident that claims his family and leaves him unable to walk. In a twist of fate, he is reborn in ancient China as the formidable Crimson Emperor. When his reign is abruptly ended, Jinho finds himself back in his former life, possessing his newfound powers and martial skills. Desiring only a peaceful existence, he is thrust into a modern world plagued by malevolent forces that only he, as the demon master, can vanquish.

basic_info.title: Ragnarok
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Comedy
            
                Comedy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ragnarok: Into the Abyss

content.synopsis: In the realm of Midgard, the winds of fate usher in the impending Ragnarok, the gods' prophesized downfall as the age of Man looms. Determined to alter destiny, the ancient gods dispatch their elite warriors, the Valkyries, to seek out those fated to trigger Ragnarok. Fenris Fenrir embarks on a perilous quest to locate the reincarnation of Balder, the fallen god, knowing that his aid could reshape the world. However, the Valkyries' pursuit threatens to thwart Fenris's mission before it can unfold. The fate of the gods hangs in the balance – will Ragnarok be averted, or will their rule endure for another millennium?

basic_info.title: The Dark Mage's Return to Enlistment
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gwihwan Haenneunde Ipdae Jeonnal-ida

content.synopsis: Synopsis Rewrite: When Minjun Kim, a typical high school senior in Korea, is unexpectedly transported to a parallel universe, he transforms into a formidable dark mage. Eager to find his way back home, he conquers numerous challenges using his black magic skills to ultimately save this alternate realm, leaving behind his riches and fame as a revered hero. Just as he settles back into his routine on Earth, a crisis unfolds as a dungeon breach unleashes menacing monsters, disrupting his peaceful existence. With no time to spare, Minjun, fresh from his return, is compelled to... enlist the very next day!

basic_info.title: Cherry Boy, That Girl
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 체리보이, 그녀

content.synopsis:
Strawberry "Berry" Shin stands out at the male-dominated school, basking in her godlike reputation and a touch of narcissism. Her allure captures the attention of the affluent upperclassman, Pierre "Pear" Kang. However, complications arise as Berry navigates the animosity of Pierre's friend, Walnut "Wally" Kang, who harbors unfounded disdain towards her. To add to the drama, her ex-boyfriend, Mandarin "Darin" Kim, is less than thrilled about her budding romance.

In a bold move, Darin adopts the persona of "Cherry Kim," a mysterious new student, to divert Pear's affections away from Berry. Thus, a new reign begins at Sausage Fest Private High School of Engineering. As Berry grapples with the irony of her boyfriend being infatuated with her disguised ex, the stage is set for a compelling love triangle. How will Berry navigate this complex web of emotions and relationships?

basic_info.title: Solitary Lady
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Untouchable Lady, Jeopgeun Bulga Lady

content.synopsis: In her eighth life, Noblewoman Hillis Inoaden breaks free from her meek past. Armed with her ancestral power and the Family Head title, she defies the nobles who once belittled her. No longer overshadowed by her malevolent brother and stepsister, she embarks on a quest for vengeance and to rewrite her ominous fate.

basic_info.title: Limit Breaker
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Man-Level Dolpa

content.synopsis: In a sudden upheaval, dungeons and monsters emerge, plunging the world into disarray. Gibong Kim, a regular part-time worker, is whisked away to a mysterious realm for 3000 years to hone his abilities. Upon his reemergence, he is a top-level gamer with a single desire—to mend relationships with his dear ones. Meanwhile, a decade has slipped by in reality. How will Gibong navigate this changed world with his newfound, boundary-shattering powers?

basic_info.title: Dear My Girls
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 작은아씨들

content.synopsis: Elizabeth March, a member of a distinguished family, is the ordinary one among her exceptional sisters, Meg, Jo, and Amy. Lacking their beauty, intelligence, and talent, she embarks on a new journey by joining them at the renowned school academy. Her uneventful life takes a thrilling turn when she crosses paths with the haughty noble, Adrian.

basic_info.title: Not Your Typical Reincarnation Story
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Not Your Typical Reincarnation Story, I Thought It Was a Common Isekai Story, I Thought It Was a Common Possession

content.synopsis:
Choi Suna once savored the familiar narrative of a novel revolving around Rhyse Sinclair—the honorable ward of the esteemed Rudwick family—embroiled in a complex love triangle with the Rudwick siblings. The elder Cliff emerges as her primary love interest, while the younger Killian remains perpetually lovesick, ensnared in a loveless union with the malicious Edith Rigelhof from a rival clan. Edith, alluring and scheming, embodies the archetypal villainess doomed to meet her demise at Killian's hands after incessantly tormenting Rhyse and acting as a spy for the Rigelhofs.

Upon Suna's unexpected rebirth as Edith, she discovers her new existence mirroring her own tragic past. Resolved to alter Edith's destiny and survive, Suna renounces villainy and refuses to tolerate mistreatment from Killian and his kin, proving that she differs from the other Rigelhofs. While plotting her escape and playfully engaging with the endearingly suspicious Killian, she pledges that her tale of reincarnation will defy conventions.

basic_info.title: What's Wrong with Secretary Kim?
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kim Biseoga Wae Geureolkka

content.synopsis:
Lee Young-joon exudes perfection in every aspect – from his striking looks to his sharp intellect and vast wealth. As the esteemed vice-president of one of Korea's leading corporations, he has spent nearly a decade under the competent wing of his secretary, Kim Mi-so. She is the sole individual to meet his exacting standards, standing by him faithfully like a devoted partner.

When Mi-so unexpectedly tenders her resignation after years of seamless collaboration, Young-joon is taken aback. Despite their shared successes, she expresses a desire to pursue her own path, including the possibility of marriage. Reluctant to part ways with his indispensable aide, Young-joon is determined to retain her at any cost, citing practical reasons while perhaps harboring deeper sentiments that even he may not fully comprehend.

basic_info.title: The Top Dungeon Farmer
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Solo Farming in the Tower, Na Honja Tab-eseo Nongsa

content.synopsis: In the bustling city of Seoul, Sejun, a typical underdog, found himself unexpectedly immersed in a mysterious dungeon teeming with monster quests and tempting rewards. Embracing his new role as a full-time tomato farmer, Sejun navigates the challenges of tending crops while tackling a myriad of quests that cross his path. With optimism, resourcefulness, and the unwavering support of his loyal furry companions, Sejun ventures towards the promise of lavish rewards awaiting him.
