Will he emerge victorious from the depths of the dungeon, or will the odds prove too formidable for even his resilient spirit to conquer?

basic_info.title: Dokgo
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 독고

content.synopsis: Following Kang Hu's tragic death due to bullying, his family shattered. His younger brother, burdened with suppressed rage, returns to school. A year later, our tale unfolds as he sets out to dismantle the unruly group responsible for his brother's demise.

basic_info.title: The Constellations Are My Disciples
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Seongjwa-deur-i Nae Jeja

content.synopsis: Three centuries ago, the legendary fighter Hyeon-oh Kim shattered the Tower of the End, averting global catastrophe. Despite facing certain death in the tower's collapse, Hyeon-oh mysteriously reawakens in the youthful guise of Juhyeok Kim after 300 years. Unveiling the enigmatic Constellations, his former pupils reborn in his absence, he embarks on a quest to reunite with them and rekindle their dormant powers. Can he locate his lost disciples and guide them once more towards their destiny?

basic_info.title: The Overpowered Newbie
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Newbie Is Too Strong, Newbie-ga Neomu Gangham

content.synopsis: As the orphanage he runs faces imminent closure, Jaeju Kim is desperate to amass wealth quickly. His risky gamble? Conquering the enigmatic tower that materialized seven years ago, notorious for swallowing those who dare to explore its depths. Struggling with his last resort, Jaeju is stunned to stumble upon a series of videos depicting his future self triumphing over the tower's challenges. Armed with an unexpected guide to his own success, can this unexpectedly empowered novice navigate the tower's treacherous secrets and emerge victorious?

basic_info.title: Not-Sew-Wicked Stepmom
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I'm the Stepmother, but My Daughter Is Too Cute, I'm Only a Stepmother, but My Daughter Is Just so Cute!, Gyemo-inde Ttar-i Neomu Gwiyeowo

content.synopsis:
Lee Lily had long abandoned her childhood fantasy of becoming a princess, her plain appearance seemingly dashing her dreams. Yet, her fervor for crafting children's attire ignited a different kind of spark within her. Tragically, her relentless dedication to her craft led to her untimely demise at the tender age of 30.

In a twist of fate, Lily finds herself reborn into the narrative of Snow White, embodying the role of the nefarious and conceited Queen Abigail Freidkin. Yearning to connect with her stepdaughter Blanche, a gentle soul who inspires her designs, Lily faces a formidable challenge as Blanche harbors fear towards her stepmother.

Adding to the complexity of her predicament is Sabrian, the reigning monarch and Abigail's indifferent husband and father. Though Abigail harbors no affection for Sabrian, she embarks on a mission to mend the fractured bond within the Freidkin family and secure a blissful future for her stepdaughter.

basic_info.title: The Ember Knight
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Knight of Embers, Janbul-ui Gisa

content.synopsis: After witnessing the murder of his twin brother, Najin, Nagyunn is determined to seek vengeance by taking on Najin's persona. Despite their identical appearance, Nagyunn struggles with the combat abilities that came effortlessly to his brother. To fulfill his quest for retribution, Nagyunn commits to honing his skills and transforming into the formidable knight-in-training his brother once was. As he navigates this dangerous charade, the pressing question remains: can Nagyunn uphold his deception or will his true identity be unveiled before his mission is complete?

basic_info.title:
Tokidoki Bosotto Russia-go de Dereru Tonari no Alya-san
Alya Sometimes Hides Her Feelings in Russian
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 時々ボソッとロシア語でデレる隣のアーリャさん

content.synopsis:
Masachika Kuze, a lackadaisical first-year student at the esteemed Seirei Academy, prefers gaming and napping over academics. Despite his laid-back reputation, he catches the eye of Alisa Mikhailovna "Alya" Kujou, the revered "solitary princess" seated beside him. Alya, known for her beauty and poise, conceals a sweet secret: she scolds Masachika in Russian while masking her affection.

To Masachika's surprise, he understands every word, leading to a playful dynamic as he pretends ignorance. Their interactions blossom into a unique and heartwarming bond, blending Alya's charm with Masachika's wit, all against the backdrop of Seirei Academy's halls.

basic_info.title:
Goblin Slayer Gaiden: Year One
Goblin Slayer Side Story: Year One
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ゴブリンスレイヤー外伝：イヤーワン

content.synopsis:
After three days of mourning his sister's tragic death, he finds the courage to rise again. In the wake of a brutal goblin attack that decimated his village and family, a lone boy is left to grieve. 

Fast forward five years, the same boy ventures to a frontier city, embracing a new identity as an adventurer. Despite his novice status and lowest rank, he eagerly embarks on a perilous quest to raid a goblin stronghold. Fueled by a fierce determination and a resolute sense of purpose, the saga of Goblin Slayer takes flight!

basic_info.title: Gunslinger Girl
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: GUNSLINGER GIRL

content.synopsis:
In Italy, the enigmatic Social Welfare Agency operates under a deceptive facade. While it saves traumatized girls, it also manipulates and transforms them into deadly operatives for the government's covert anti-terrorism efforts.

Meet Henrietta, a girl marked by tragedy after her family's brutal slaying. Rescued by the Agency, she undergoes advanced cybernetic enhancements to heal her wounds and erase her memories. Henrietta emerges as a top assassin, devoid of her former self, ready to carry out the Agency's lethal missions.

basic_info.title:
Shinshi Doumei Cross
The Gentleman's Alliance Cross
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Gentlemen's Alliance Cross, Shinshi Doumei +, Umi no Chikyuugi Nocturne, The Globe of the Sea - Nocturne, Shoujo Eve Ringo Jikake no 24 Ji, Shojo Eve: Eve's Applework 24 Hours, Kusame and Komaki and the Key of Love, Umi no C

content.synopsis:
Imperial Academy stands as a prestigious institution, its students divided into the esteemed ranks of Gold, Silver, and Bronze. Among them, Shizumasa Touguu reigns as the sole Gold student, known as "the Emperor" for his role as Student Council President.

Enter Haine Otomiya, captivated by Shizumasa since childhood when she discovered his enchanting picture book. Despite two prior encounters, their stark social divide as Gold and Bronze students has kept her at a distance. 

A twist of fate propels Haine into Shizumasa's inner circle, appointed as his protector and a council member. As she delves deeper, illusions shatter to reveal a web of Student Council secrets and her own haunting past.

Amidst this intrigue, mysterious one-shots await, adding layers to the unfolding drama.

basic_info.title: FLCL
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Fooly Cooly, Furi Kuri

content.synopsis: In the heart of Japan, young Naota's ordinary life takes a wild turn when his brother jets off to America, leaving behind his enigmatic 17-year-old girlfriend, Mamimi. Caught in a whirlwind of emotions, Naota grapples with Mamimi's confusing affections. As if that's not enough, a chance encounter with a Vespa-riding woman named Haruko sends Naota on a rollercoaster ride of chaos. With a guitar swing to the head, Naota sprouts a peculiar horn, sparking a series of bizarre events that push him into a realm of utter madness.

Satou Matsuzaka, known for her approachable nature and beauty, has a reputation as "New Guy Every Three Days" Satou. But her carefree existence takes a dramatic turn when she meets the love of her life, eight-year-old Shio Koube. Their pure bond faces threats from a judgmental society. Determined to protect their happiness, Satou sheds her cheerful facade and vows to fight for their peaceful life together.

Volume 2: White Sugar Garden, Black Salt Cage (pilot)

basic_info.title:
Tenshi Kinryouku
Angel Sanctuary
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 天使禁猟区

content.synopsis: In love with God yet defying Heaven, the angel Alexiel's rebellion stemmed from the unruly behavior of her fellow angels. Her defiance led to capture, resulting in an eternal cycle of tragic lives on Earth. Now residing within Setsuna Mudo, a troubled youth entangled in a forbidden love for his sister Sara, Alexiel's turmoil reflects the discord in the angelic realm. As their intertwined passions surge, the delicate balance between Heaven and Earth hangs precariously in the balance.

basic_info.title:
Higurashi no Naku Koro ni: Onikakushi-hen
Higurashi WHEN THEY CRY: Abducted by Demons Arc

content.synopsis: Keiichi Maebara and his family relocate to the mysterious village of Hinamizawa, just in time for the Cotton Drifting Festival. As the festivities unfold, Keiichi uncovers a chilling truth - a series of murders and vanishings have plagued the village every year post-celebration. Locals whisper about the deadly "Oyashiro's Curse," warning that those who displease the village's guardian deity will meet a grim fate. Initially dismissing the tales as mere superstition, Keiichi's skepticism crumbles when a murder and a disappearance rock the village, shrouded in eerie silence from his once-trusted friends. With dark shadows looming over his newfound companions, Keiichi fears he may be next in line to face the curse's wrath.

basic_info.title: X
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: X/1999

content.synopsis:
Six years have passed since Kamui Shirou, along with his childhood friends Fuuma and Kotori Monou, were torn apart by tragedy. Following the death of the Monou siblings' mother, Kamui was separated from them by his own mother, leaving Tokyo behind. As time went by, Kamui honed his telekinetic powers in solitude until his mother's dying wish calls him back to face his "destiny" in 1999.

Returning to Tokyo, Kamui reveals a transformed demeanor, showcasing his enhanced abilities through intense street clashes. As he encounters adversaries questioning his identity as "Kamui," it becomes clear they seek more than his name. Divided into the opposing Dragons of Heaven and Earth, these fighters vie for Kamui's allegiance, each with their own vision for the impending apocalyptic "promised day."

Unraveling the mystery surrounding this fateful event, Kamui grasps the pivotal role he plays in determining the world's future. With the power to either safeguard or doom the world, his choice of alliance between the Dragons will shape the ultimate outcome—salvation or destruction.

Tsutsui Hikari, an otaku who shies away from social interactions, faces relentless bullying from his classmates for being different. His only companion at school is a fellow outcast. Unexpectedly, he finds himself partnered with Igarashi Iroha, a rebellious girl who challenges his preconceptions. Despite her unconventional behavior, Iroha shows kindness towards Hikari and stands up for him. Initially guarded, Hikari struggles with his insecurities but Iroha's unwavering acceptance begins to thaw his defenses. Could Iroha be the first real-life girlfriend for Hikari, or will his past experiences hinder this budding relationship?

basic_info.title:
Tegamibachi
Tegami Bachi: Letter Bee
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Slice of Life
            
                Slice of Life,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tegami Bachi to Dingo

content.synopsis:
In the mysterious land of Amberground, where an artificial sun illuminates the capital city of Akatsuki amidst eternal darkness, danger lurks in every shadow. The outskirts of Yuusari and Yodaka are haunted by fearsome Gaichuu, colossal armored bugs that feed on human hearts. Amidst this perilous landscape, a brave group of mail carriers known as Letter Bees risk their lives to deliver messages across the realm.

Young Lag Seeing, inspired by his encounter with the legendary Gauche Suede five years ago when he was "delivered" as a letter by his own mother, dreams of following in his footsteps. Motivated by a desire to reunite with Gauche and unravel the mystery of his mother's vanishing, Lag embarks on a perilous quest to join the ranks of the Letter Bees.

basic_info.title:
Konya wa Tsuki ga Kirei desu ga, Toriaezu Shine
Can You Just Die, My Darling?

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, Taku Kamishiro's unrequited love for Mika Hanazono takes a dark turn when his adoration morphs into a deadly obsession. Brace yourself for an unpredictable journey as each page unravels a chilling tale of love and obsession.

basic_info.title:
Tennis no Oujisama
The Prince of Tennis
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Tennis no Ouji-sama

content.synopsis:
At Seishun Academy, renowned for its top-notch middle school tennis team in Japan, the arrival of freshman tennis sensation Ryouma Echizen shakes things up. Determined to carve out his own legacy apart from his father, the legendary Samurai Nanjirou, Ryouma sets his sights on securing a spot on the Boys' Tennis Team. Armed with unmatched skills and a bold demeanor, he faces resistance from teammates hesitant to embrace him.

Seishun Academy targets the National Tournament, but first, they must conquer the challenging Kanto Regionals for a shot at the title. Bolstered by their new "super rookie," the team braces for a fierce competition. As a mix of formidable rivals and obstacles looms, Seishun must unite and strive for greatness to ascend to victory.

Special Feature:
Volume 5: Tennis no Oujisama (pilot)

basic_info.title:
Reiraku
Downfall
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 零落

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of the conclusion of his initial series, as his marriage crumbles and the harsh realities of the manga industry tarnish his passion, the desperate protagonist grapples with the daunting task of launching a new series to reignite his creative spark. Amidst the void consuming him, the only beacon of hope lies in the pursuit of selling copies.

In this tale of adolescent reunion, childhood friends Youhei, Kei, and Yui find themselves back together in high school. A seemingly simple love triangle soon becomes a complex web of emotions when Kei reappears with a surprising transformation – now presenting as a girl. Through this exploration of gender, sexuality, and identity, Oshimi delves into the realms of awakening, unconventional love, and self-discovery.

basic_info.title:
Otome Game no Hametsu Flag shika Nai Akuyaku Reijou ni Tensei shiteshimatta...
My Next Life as a Villainess: All Routes Lead to Doom!
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Reincarnated into an Otome Game as a Villainess With Only Destruction Flags..., Destruction Flag Otome

content.synopsis: Eight-year-old Catarina Claes, daughter of a duke, has a startling epiphany after a head injury triggers memories of her past life—she's trapped in a world mirroring an otome game where she's the villain! Faced with grim fates in every scenario, from exile to death, she's determined to rewrite her destiny. Armed with game knowledge, Catarina navigates challenges, from honing farming skills to forming crucial alliances. Years pass, and her careful planning seems foolproof until a forgotten secret route emerges, potentially sealing her downfall.

basic_info.title: ib: Instant Bullet
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ib -インスタントバレット-

content.synopsis:
In a world where betrayal is a bitter truth, Kuro Fukase, haunted by past trauma and fueled by hatred, finds solace in the imaginary presence of the Ayakura sisters, Toiro and Iroha. Their tragic demise in a merciless arson leaves Kuro alone, lost in a sea of despair.

Everything changes on a fateful Christmas Eve when Fukase's existence takes a sharp turn. Encountering the enigmatic Sera Himeura, the mysterious witch Yume Furusuna, and a peculiar black creature, Fukase discovers he is among the select 20 "Instant Bullets" with the power to bring about the world's end.

Yet, the Instant Bullets are divided in their intentions—some seek salvation, while others, like Fukase, crave destruction. As past scars, conflicting morals, and tangled emotions collide, a gripping narrative unfolds. In a world where the powerful Instant Bullets clash, what fate awaits a fractured world on the brink of chaos?

basic_info.title: Konjiki no Word Master: Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Konjiki no Moji Tsukai: Yuusha Yonin ni Makikomareta Unique Cheat

content.synopsis: Meet Okamura Hiiro, the quiet bookworm whose world revolves around the pages he devours. His life takes an unexpected turn when he's mistakenly swept into a hero-summoning ritual alongside four classmates who are more acquaintances than friends. These classmates, the popular "riajuus," stand in stark contrast to Hiiro's solitary nature. Unwilling to aid the kingdom and unmoved by his classmates' pleas, Hiiro opts to embark on his own path, bidding them farewell with a simple declaration: "I'm no hero. My life is my own." Yet, unbeknownst to all, beneath his unassuming facade lies a power that could alter the course of their world forever.

basic_info.title: Dragon Head
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Award Winning
            
                Award Winning,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of a tragic train accident, Teru Aoki, Nobuo Takahashi, and Ako Seto find themselves as the only survivors among their friends and teachers. Stranded in the wreckage, they face hunger, isolation, and grief. Yet, a dark presence looms, testing their sanity and unity. As they navigate this bleak reality, the trio must resist the temptation of despair and confront the sinister forces that threaten to consume them.

basic_info.title:
Saikyou Densetsu Kurosawa
The Legend of the Strongest, Kurosawa!

content.synopsis: At 44 years old, still single, and devoted to his job at the construction company, Kurosawa yearns for respect and maybe a dash of popularity from his colleagues. Yet, his attempts often backfire. One fateful day, he unexpectedly gets entangled in a showdown with a group of rebellious middle schoolers.

basic_info.title:
Uruwashi no Yoi no Tsuki
In the Clear Moonlit Dusk

content.synopsis:
Whenever Yoi Takiguchi releases a simple sigh, her female peers erupt in admiration. Known as the "prince" of the school for her charmingly boyish looks and laid-back demeanor, Yoi remains unfazed by the attention she garners. Her routine existence takes an unexpected turn when the school's second prince, Kohaku Ichimura, unexpectedly enters her life and bestows upon her the title of beautiful.

Kohaku, far from a conventional prince, navigates life with reckless abandon. Yet, his unexpected compliment leaves Yoi flustered, his gaze stirring up a whirlwind of nerves within her. As the first boy to see her as a girl, Yoi's attempts to distance herself falter as Kohaku sets his sights on her. Though she convinces herself it's all in good fun, the undeniable flutter in her heart hints at something more profound.

basic_info.title: Bokutachi ga Yarimashita
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: We Did It

content.synopsis:
Content with his ordinary life, Tobio Masubuchi yearns for a future filled with joy and longevity, free from obstacles. Together with his close companions Sho Isami, Yuki "Maru" Maruyama, and Hidero "Paisen" Kosaka, they bask in carefree days, reveling in their freedom. However, a chance remark by Maru incites trouble when it reaches the ears of rival delinquents from a nearby school.

Following a harrowing abduction and brutal assault on Maru, his friends stumble upon him, aghast at the sight before them. Fueled by anger, Tobio suggests they seek retribution, devising a plan of action. What was intended as a mere prank takes a fatal turn, shattering Tobio's hopes for a tranquil existence forever.

basic_info.title:
Demi-chan wa Kataritai
Interviews with Monster Girls

content.synopsis: In the world of Ajin, where Succubus, Dullahan, and Vampire exist as known "demi"s, slightly different from regular humans, coexisting after years of persecution. Now accepted in society, the story unfolds in a high school setting, focusing on a biology teacher fascinated by demis. Delve into his encounters with the diverse demis at school, each grappling with their unique, endearing challenges.

basic_info.title:
Gaikotsu Kishi-sama, Tadaima Isekai e Odekakechuu
Skeleton Knight in Another World
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Skeleton Knight, going out to the parallel universe

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, gamer Arc dozes off mid-game and awakens to a startling reality: he is now a skeleton in the game world. Armed with formidable gear but cursed with a fearsome form, he navigates this strange realm. His quest for peace is disrupted by a chance encounter with the captivating elven warrior, sparking a thrilling odyssey of challenges and excitement.

basic_info.title:
Isekai Nonbiri Nouka
Farming Life in Another World
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 異世界のんびり農家

content.synopsis: After passing away from illness at 39, Machio Hiraku finds himself granted the chance to enter a different realm. When God inquires about his desires for empowerment, he opts for a robust physique. With a second wish, he seeks a tranquil existence, while a third wish is for linguistic proficiency in the new land. For his ultimate wish, he aspires to embrace the life of a farmer.

basic_info.title: Steins;Gate
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: STEINS;GATE

content.synopsis: Embark on a thrilling journey in Akihabara with "Steins;Gate," where a close-knit group of friends transforms a simple microwave into a miraculous tool that can communicate with the past through text messages. Their experiments catch the attention of a mysterious organization called SERN, experts in time travel, who are hot on their trail. Now, our heroes must outwit SERN's relentless pursuit to safeguard their freedom and future.

basic_info.title:
Munou na Nana
Talentless Nana
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 無能なナナ

content.synopsis:
Nestled on a secluded island is a prestigious school grooming the next generation of world saviors, the "Talented" individuals destined to vanquish the sinister "Enemies of Humanity." The elite student body welcomes new transfers, Kyouya Onodera and Nana Hiiragi. While Kyouya shies away from revealing his powers, mysterious Nana, rumored to possess mind-reading skills, captivates her peers.

Despite her popularity, Nana forms an unexpected bond with outcast Nanao Nakajima, who endures taunts for his perceived lack of ability. As Nana extends her kindness towards him, Nanao experiences a taste of acceptance he had longed for, if only fleetingly...

Thirteen-year-old Ichigo Momomiya finds herself caught in a whirlwind of events when a mysterious light beam merges her with a cat spirit at an endangered animal exhibit with her crush, Masaya Aoyama. Overnight, she starts exhibiting feline traits. Things take a dramatic turn when a monstrous creature threatens Masaya, prompting Ichigo to transform into a pink magical girl with cat-like features.

Enter Ryou Shirogane, who unveils a startling truth about the monster—a Chimera Anima, a product of alien parasites that mutate animals into rampaging beasts. With the guidance of Keiichiro Akasaka, proprietor of Cafe Mew Mew, they reveal a daring plan known as the Mew Project: using DNA from rare Red Data Animals to combat the Chimera Anima threat. However, an unexpected twist occurs when an earthquake disrupts the plan, causing the DNA to inadvertently fuse with Ichigo and four other girls she encounters.

Now branded a "biological weapon," Ichigo must navigate her newfound powers, battle against extraterrestrial foes, and recruit her unexpected allies—all while concealing her feline nature from Masaya.

basic_info.title:
Yamato Nadeshiko Shichihenge♥
The Wallflower: Yamatonadeshiko Shichihenge

content.synopsis: In a stunning mansion, four dashing fifteen-year-old pals land a sweet deal - free lodging! The catch? They must polish the owner's shy niece, turning her into a sophisticated lady within three years. Meet Sunako Nakahara, an agoraphobic, horror enthusiast with a quirky style and a knack for nosebleeds around handsome folks. The boys' mission to transform her into a socialite requires more than charm - it demands a miracle!

basic_info.title: Crows
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: クローズ

content.synopsis:
Suzuran – the notorious school where society's outcasts gather, earning the moniker "Crows" for their uncertain destinies entwined with brawling. In this brutal environment, might reigns supreme, defining the existence of teenagers bereft of purpose. Despite a rigid hierarchy, unity eludes the students, lacking a common purpose. At the helm stands no single leader, perpetuating chaos.

Meet Harumichi Bouya, a morally ambiguous youth with raw physicality but scant intellectual prowess. A quintessential troublemaker, Harumichi thrives on combat, confronting challenges head-on. Now a part of Suzuran, he seeks to assert himself and ascend the cutthroat social ladder, determined to carve his place among the school's fierce denizens.

In "Saint☆Oniisan," join Jesus and Buddha on a divine adventure as they explore modern Japan. From the bustling streets of Asakusa to the tranquil public baths, and even the wonders of the internet, these two iconic figures navigate daily life with humor and heart. Through their eyes, we witness a quirky blend of religion, culture, and customs, all seen through a comedic lens.

As Jesus and Buddha delve into the intricacies of Japanese society, their divine origins contrast with their everyday experiences, leading to humorous encounters where they are mistaken for celebrities or eccentric individuals. In a delightful twist, their journey sheds light on both their past greatness and their present anonymity in a world that sees them as mere look-alikes. Dive into this charming manga where the divine meets the mundane in unexpected ways.

basic_info.title:
Maou no Ore ga Dorei Elf wo Yome ni Shitanda ga, Dou Medereba Ii?
An Archdemon's Dilemma: How to Love Your Elf Bride
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I, the Demon Lord, Took a Slave Elf as My Wife, but How Do I Love Her?

content.synopsis:
Known for his aloof demeanor, intimidating appearance, and formidable powers, the mage Zagan strikes fear into the hearts of those who cross his path. Amidst his daily rituals of delving into the mysteries of magic and meting out justice to wrongdoers, an intriguing invitation to a clandestine auction catches his attention – a gathering showcasing artifacts once owned by a deceased Archdemon.

To Zagan's astonishment, the coveted prize at the auction turns out to be Nephelia, a delicate white-haired elf enslaved and up for bidding. Enthralled by her ethereal beauty, Zagan's heart is unexpectedly ensnared, prompting him to spare no expense in claiming her as his own. Yet, grappling with his own social awkwardness and lack of finesse in matters of the heart, he struggles to convey his affections to the enchanting elf.

Thus begins a captivating journey for this unconventional pair, as Zagan and Nephelia navigate their burgeoning bond with sincerity, gradually cultivating a love that transcends their initial differences.

basic_info.title:
Kakukaku Shikajika
Blank Canvas: My So-Called Artist's Journey
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Memoir
            
                Memoir,                    Otaku Culture
            
                Otaku Culture,                    Visual Arts
            
                Visual Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: かくかくしかじか

content.synopsis: Akiko Hayashi dreams big: a manga debut in school, her favorite actor as the lead, and marrying him. Lacking motivation and skills, she joins an unconventional art class led by tough teacher Kenzou Hidaka. Expecting an easy fix, Akiko faces a demanding mentor uninterested in manga. Through rigorous training, she forms a unique bond with Sensei, discovering the path to manga success and adulthood.

basic_info.title: Grappler Baki
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Gore
            
                Gore,                    Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Baki the Grappler

content.synopsis:
Deep below the iconic Tokyo Dome lies the clandestine battleground of Kourakuen, where fearless fighters clash in a symphony of martial arts.

Young warrior Baki Hanma is determined to carve his name among Kourakuen's elite, honing a distinct combat style forged through relentless perseverance and agony. Son of the notorious tyrant Yuujirou Hanma, known far and wide as the "Ogre," Baki carries the scars of his father's brutal reign of terror, driving him to ascend to unparalleled strength.

Driven by a thirst for vengeance against his progenitor, Baki confronts the most formidable adversaries ever spawned by the world. Amidst the echoes of triumph and despair, can Baki muster the power to confront the indomitable Yuujirou and claim his rightful place in the ultimate showdown?

In his fourth year at Momogaoka College of Music, Shinichi Chiaki harbors a secret dream of becoming a conductor, inspired by his famous pianist father. Despite his longing to return to Europe, a crippling fear of flying confines him to Japan. When a chance encounter leaves him unconscious, he finds himself under the care of Megumi "Nodame" Noda, an eccentric and messy yet talented pianist who becomes both his neighbor and unexpected collaborator. As Chiaki navigates this unusual partnership, he rediscovers his passion for music, reigniting a spark long thought lost. What musical adventures await this unlikely duo?

basic_info.title: Sewayaki Kitsune no Senko-san
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Meddlesome Kitsune Senko-san

content.synopsis: In the hustle and bustle of his corporate grind, Nakano's routine existence takes an unexpected turn when he encounters Senko-san, a centuries-old fox in the guise of a young girl. From culinary delights to household chores and mysterious "special services," Senko-san offers Nakano her unique brand of tender care, aiming to alleviate his work-induced weariness.

basic_info.title: Black Paradox
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Horror
            
                Horror,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural,                    Suspense
            
                Suspense
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Name Onna, The Licking Woman, Mystery Pavillion, Kaiki Pavilion, Strange Pavilion

content.synopsis: In the world of the suicide website Black Paradox, four individuals find themselves bound by a shared desire for death. Maruso, a disillusioned nurse; Taburo, haunted by his doppelganger; Pii-tan, an engineer with a robot clone; and Baracchi, tormented by her facial birthmark. United in their quest for the perfect end, they unwittingly unlock a door to a peculiar fate. Alongside one-shots featuring Name Onna and the enigmatic Kaiki Pavilion, their journey delves into the depths of destiny and the mysteries of existence.

basic_info.title: Hotel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Hotel: Since A.D. 2079, Present, Subete wa Maguro no Tame datta, It Was All for the Tuna, Stephanos, Diadem

content.synopsis: In the futuristic world of A.D. 2079, a mysterious tale unfolds at the renowned "Hotel: Since." Titled "Subete wa Maguro no Tame datta (It Was All for the Tuna)," the story centers around Stephanos and Diadem. Join them in the present as they navigate secrets, intrigue, and unexpected twists in this captivating narrative set in a time where everything revolves around tuna.

basic_info.title:
Koko wa Ima kara Rinri desu.
From Now On We Begin Ethics.
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: We Shall Now Begin Ethics

content.synopsis: In the realm of moral philosophy, ethics serves as the guiding light that illuminates the paths of right and wrong. Meet Takayanagi, a dedicated high school teacher entrusted with nurturing young minds through an elective course centered on ethics. Despite a sparse class attendance, Takayanagi is unwavering in his mission to impart the significance of ethical principles. As his students grapple with personal challenges, they find solace and insight in Takayanagi's teachings, discovering new ways to navigate their own dilemmas.

basic_info.title:
Gate: Jieitai Kanochi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri
Gate: Where the JSDF Fought
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gate: Thus the JSDF Fought There, Gate: Jieitai Kare no Chi nite, Kaku Tatakaeri

content.synopsis:
In the bustling Ginza district of Tokyo, a mysterious gate materializes one fateful day, unleashing a horde of soldiers and fantastical beings that transform the city into a nightmarish landscape. This gate serves as a portal to a parallel world ruled by a powerful empire teeming with supernatural entities. To unravel the secrets of this enigmatic realm, the Japanese Self-Defense Force dispatches a specialized team led by an unlikely hero – a soldier with a passion for all things otaku.

Their mission takes a perilous turn when they stumble upon a decimated village destroyed by a formidable fire-breathing dragon. Amidst the ruins, they discover a lone survivor – an elfin girl concealed in a well, her fate intertwined with theirs. Driven by duty and compassion, the team embarks on a journey to warn neighboring towns of the dragon's threat. Along the way, they forge alliances with mystical female allies, delving deeper into the mysteries of this treacherous new world.

Ever the restless spirit, Natsuo Ishidou thrives on physical prowess, effortlessly mastering every sport that comes her way. Yet her insatiable hunger for a true test has fostered a self-absorbed and indifferent persona towards those in her orbit.

Everything changes when Natsuo crosses paths with Yuzuko Mawatari, a schoolmate promoting a mixed martial arts club. Intrigued by Yuzuko's easygoing demeanor, Natsuo begrudgingly joins the club to unravel the mystery behind her carefree attitude.

As Natsuo delves into the world of mixed martial arts, her past confronts her, demanding retribution for her haughty ways. Will she confront the repercussions of her arrogance while facing a challenger who may outmatch her in strength?

basic_info.title: Wolf Guy: Ookami no Monshou
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Wolf Guy: Emblem of the Wolf, Wolf Guy: Wolfen Crest

content.synopsis: New student Akira Inugami stirs unease at his new school as he lands in the same class as the notorious troublemaker and gang leader. Teacher Aoshika is baffled by a puzzling mystery involving Inugami, who she swears she saw brutally attacked the night before, only to find him unscathed the next day. Little does she know, a savage, werewolf-like creature has a hand in the unexpected turn of events.

basic_info.title:
Chiyu Mahou no Machigatta Tsukaikata: Senjou wo Kakeru Kaifuku Youin
The Wrong Way to Use Healing Magic
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 治癒魔法の間違った使い方～戦場を駆ける回復要員～

content.synopsis:
Ken Usato, a typical high-school student with average grades and a disdain for anything out of the ordinary, crosses paths with the esteemed president and vice president of the student council, renowned for their exceptional qualities. Surprisingly, he strikes up a friendship with them. Their camaraderie takes a fantastical turn when the trio is unexpectedly whisked away to another realm, Ken included!

Initially disheartened by his predicament, Ken discovers a unique talent for healing magic in this new world. This rare gift not only boosts his self-assurance but also garners attention from fellow mages. However, the newfound spotlight comes with its challenges, especially when a peculiar healing magic practitioner takes a keen interest in him. Will Ken navigate this magical realm with caution and courage?

basic_info.title: Beauty Pop
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Beauty Pop Stage 2, Dream Come True, Teen Drop, Twisted Typhoon, I Want to Be a Prince, Shampoo's Concern, Hysteric Heart, Daily Life in the Narumi Family

content.synopsis:
In her first year of high school, Kiri Koshiba stands out as a talented hairstylist known for her magical makeovers that reveal the true beauty in others. At the school, the popular Scissors Project (SP) led by Shougo Narumi, Kei Minami, and Kazuhiko Ochiai, selects female students for stunning transformations.

When Kiri's friend Kanako Aoyama is falsely accused of bribing her way into an SP makeover, Kiri intervenes and astounds everyone with her makeover skills. The SP, unaware of Kiri's involvement, seeks a showdown with Kanako's hairstylist, sparking a rivalry between Narumi and Kiri.

Additional one-shots include "Dream Come True," "Teen Drop," "Twisted Typhoon," "I Want to Be a Prince," "Shampoo's Concern," "Hysteric Heart," and "Daily Life in the Narumi Family" in volumes 2, 3, 7, and 10.

basic_info.title:
Koori Zokusei Danshi to Cool na Douryou Joshi
The Ice Guy and the Cool Girl
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Comedy
            
                Comedy,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ice Guy and the Cool Female Colleague, The Ice Guy and His Cool Female Colleague

content.synopsis:
In the bustling realm of office life, Himuro stands out not for his spreadsheets but for his chilling secret - a supernatural heritage that turns his coworkers' reality into a frosty spectacle whenever his focus intensifies. Despite this wintry curse, Himuro's heart radiates warmth, his affections reserved for flowers and felines, yet kept at a distance.

Among his colleagues, Fuyutsuki, a serene problem-solver, holds a special place in Himuro's frostbitten heart. Her subtle gestures spark blizzards of emotions within him, oblivious to the frozen chaos he unwittingly conjures. While his icy outbursts hint at his feelings, Fuyutsuki remains unaware.

Driven by an unwavering love, Himuro embarks on a quest to thaw Fuyutsuki's heart, willing to navigate the snowstorms that swirl within him to win her affections.

basic_info.title:
Lv2 kara Cheat datta Motoyuusha Kouho no Mattari Isekai Life
Chillin' in Another World with Level 2 Super Cheat Powers
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Chillin Different World Life of the Ex-Brave Candidate was Cheat from Lv2

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, Banaza, a modest merchant, is unexpectedly whisked away to a parallel world where he is designated as a hero contender tasked with vanquishing the menacing demon forces. Despite his lack of apparent abilities, he is promptly rejected by his summoners. However, a glitch in the summoning process leaves Banaza stranded in this unfamiliar realm, unable to return to his own world. Determined to adapt and thrive in this foreign kingdom, Banaza uncovers latent powers within himself that could surpass even his own expectations.

basic_info.title: Chrno Crusade
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance,                    Sci-Fi
            
                Sci-Fi,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Chrno Crusade: Mary Magdalene, Chrono Crusade

content.synopsis: In the vibrant setting of America during the Roaring 20s, a facade of peace masks a lurking darkness from the aftermath of the Great War. Sister Rosette Christopher, a dedicated exorcist linked to the Magdala Order, stands as a beacon against the malevolent forces threatening this fragile tranquility. However, her partnership with Chrno often leads to unintended chaos. Their latest mission introduces them to Azmaria, a young girl with a captivating voice, facing danger from her own stepfather. As they strive to protect her, deeper layers of Rosette and Chrno's intertwined destinies unravel, revealing hidden complexities beneath their demon-fighting facade.

basic_info.title: Dungeon Seeker
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: ダンジョンシーカー

content.synopsis:
In the ordinary world, Junpei Takeda faces the relentless torment of Kido Shouta and his band of bullies, finding solace in the unwavering support of his childhood friend, Noriko Tatsumiya. However, their lives take a fantastical turn when they are mysteriously whisked away to another realm by a being who goes by the enigmatic title of "God." Despite his initial frailty, Junpei discovers a newfound power in this realm - the ability to acquire skills from his defeated foes. 

As they navigate the challenges of this unfamiliar world, a treacherous betrayal leads Junpei to unwittingly enter the perilous "Sacrificial Labyrinth," a foreboding dungeon teeming with formidable adversaries and untold dangers. Fueled by a thirst for retribution, Junpei embarks on a harrowing journey through the labyrinth's depths, determined to find a way out against all odds.

basic_info.title:
Tanaka-kun wa Itsumo Kedaruge
Tanaka-kun Is Always Listless
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 田中くんはいつもけだるげ

content.synopsis: In the bustling halls of high school, Tanaka yearns for one simple desire above all else – a day of tranquility. Supported by his dependable best friend Oota and a circle of classmates, Tanaka navigates each day in pursuit of serenity. From claiming the best nap spots to gazing absentmindedly out the window, Tanaka embraces a laid-back approach to life. Despite the whirlwind of daily nuisances, Tanaka skillfully evades chaos, seizing every opportunity for a peaceful snooze.

basic_info.title: Boku no Kanojo wa Saikou desu!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: My Girlfriend is the Best!, My Perfect Girlfriend

content.synopsis: When a boy is unexpectedly dumped by his girlfriend, he is left feeling downhearted. In a surprising twist, his tomboyish friend suggests they start dating to lift his spirits. Their contrasting personalities lead to playful arguments and lengthy banter as they navigate a new relationship. From festive Christmas celebrations to cozy nights at home, their daily routines become a mix of romance and entertainment.

basic_info.title: Nebula's Civilization
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Seulgiroun Munmyeong Saenghwal

content.synopsis: In the virtual realm of "Lost World," Seong-un Choi reigns as the ultimate player, conquering all challenges. But his supremacy is abruptly disrupted when a cryptic message propels him into the tangible "Lost World," where his gaming skills are tested in a battle for godlike power. Surrounded by rivals seeking the same divine status, Seong-un faces the ultimate quest: to claim his place as a true deity and rule over this mysterious domain.

basic_info.title: Island
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 아일랜드

content.synopsis: Miho, a woman of striking beauty, sharp intelligence, and a fiery temper, arrives on Cheju Island to take up a teaching position. Her peaceful new life takes a terrifying turn when she is attacked by a demon. In a moment of peril, a mysterious man intervenes, seemingly driven by a singular purpose: to eliminate demons.

basic_info.title: Serena
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Selena

content.synopsis:
Serena Serenity, the controversial figure of gossip, fits the rumors perfectly with her frail frame and defiant attitude, suffocating in her unwanted marriage. Despite the whispers, Serena remains unfazed. As the heiress of the prestigious Serenity Hotel, she wed the powerful businessman Eiser Leinz Grayan to salvage her family's fading honor. However, this union was not her heart's desire but a decree from her grandmother.

Rebelling against her grandmother's wishes, Serena transforms into a petulant and obstinate woman, feeling deceived by her family and disgusted by her spouse. In a bold move, she introduces Frederick Bloom—a strikingly handsome and compliant man who caters to her every whim—and boldly parades him before the high society. While Serena cherishes the hotel and dreams of ousting Eiser, her business acumen is lacking. Yet, a surprising shift in Eiser's demeanor forces her to confront reality, entangling her in a complex web between her gentle paramour and unyielding husband.

basic_info.title: Become Habituated to Kiss
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Taming through Kisses, Become Habituated with a Kiss, Get Used to Kissing

content.synopsis: In a small town resides Kang DaYeon, known for her fighting prowess despite being a simple-minded and voracious eater. Her life takes an unexpected turn when she saves a near-death stranger, Kang Uh yuk, a mysterious transfer student. In a twist straight out of a movie, he expresses his gratitude with a kiss that sparks a thrilling tale of taming and being tamed.

basic_info.title: Hanged Doll
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kyosuinhyung, The Hanged Doll

content.synopsis: In the year 1994, five 24-year-old individuals find their lives intertwined by a mysterious crime. Their shared journey begins with their earliest memories. As they navigate the shadows of this enigmatic past, will they elude the looming dangers that threaten their every move?

basic_info.title:
Book Club
Reading Club
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 독서클럽

content.synopsis: "Dare to open the pages of the magazine serializing this manhwa where courage meets death. Join the chilling world of the book club led by the eccentric book fanatic, President Kyungdo. As Eunsae attempts to shield him from the dark allure of books, Kyungdo's obsession spirals out of control. Uncover the sinister ties to the fabled Library of Alexandria and Truman Capote's 'In Cold Blood' that shape Kyungdo's destiny in this gripping tale."

basic_info.title: Forget My Husband, I'll Go Make Money
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Forget About My Husband, I'd Rather Go Make Money

content.synopsis:
Married to a man with a mistress, Aristine is thrust into a web of deceit. Ordered to sleep on the floor, she reluctantly complies, only to have her bed break on her wedding night. Known for possessing "The King's Eye," Aristine wields a power that foretells the future. Forced into a political union with a barbarian, she navigates treacherous waters.

Her mysterious husband offers comfort, yet harbors secrets. Determined to secure her freedom and wealth, Aristine faces the challenge of her husband's mistress. As she strives to carve a path towards independence, will she succeed in her ambitions or find herself entangled in unforeseen consequences?

basic_info.title: Philomel the Fake
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: No Place for the Fake Princess, There Is No Place for Fakes

content.synopsis: Intrigue abounds as Philomel, the deceptive impostor, collaborates with her mother to assume the identity of the imperial princess, sparking tensions between the Mage Tower and the Empire. Exposed for her treachery, she faces the ultimate punishment—execution. Amidst the looming threat of her fate, Philomel stumbles upon a mysterious book foretelling her demise, setting off a chain of events mirroring its ominous prophecies. Determined to outwit destiny, she embarks on a perilous quest to uncover the enigmatic origins of the ominous tome and secure her survival. Will Philomel defy her preordained end and carve her own path to redemption?

basic_info.title: I Became a Renowned Family's Sword Prodigy
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Martial Arts
            
                Martial Arts,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Widaehan Gamun-ui Geomsul Cheonjaega Doeeotda

content.synopsis: In a realm where swordsmanship and Aura reign supreme, Woojin Baek, the youngest scion of a legendary swordsman lineage, struggles against his lack of talent in combat. Despite his unwavering determination, he faces dishonor and meets a tragic end at the hands of his own kin. But in a twist of fate, he is reborn as the wielder of a powerful Magic Sword. Now driven by a singular purpose, Woojin seeks vengeance against his own family for the injustices he suffered.

basic_info.title: Hectopascal
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 헥토파스칼

content.synopsis: When a mysterious figure in a suit and carrying a briefcase of cash appears before high schooler Hanjun Park, his response is clear: follow his heart, unleash his inner strength, and take down anyone who blocks his path to vengeance. With determination in his fists, Hanjun is ready to confront his past and cleanse himself of old grudges. Let the rain of redemption begin.

basic_info.title: The Reincarnated King of Fists
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Time Slip of the Fist King, The Indomitable Martial King

content.synopsis: In a realm where humans dominate other species, the formidable wizard Leppenhardt establishes an empire to protect these creatures. His rule crumbles when the ferociously powerful Tesron, known as the "King of Fists," overthrows him. However, death is not the conclusion as Leppenhardt awakens in Tesron's youthful form. With newfound might and a fresh persona, he embarks on a quest to liberate the non-human races once more. Will the reborn King of Fists revolutionize the world for the better, or will his opportunity for redemption fade?

basic_info.title: Can't Lose You
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 세상과도 바꿀 수 없어

content.synopsis: In a whirlwind saga of vanity and ambition, "Can't Lose You" follows Lida, an heiress to immense wealth eagerly anticipating her arranged marriage. Fate intervenes when she encounters Yooi, a look-alike with a shared secret. Yooi agrees to impersonate Lida, embarking on a perilous journey dodging assassins and navigating unexpected love with Lida's betrothed. Unbeknownst to Lida, a stunning revelation awaits in this rapid-paced narrative of retribution and transformation.

basic_info.title: Baby Tyrant
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Born a Princess, Baby Dictator

content.synopsis:
When Yoon Gyeoul's tumultuous life comes to a tragic end at the hands of her alcoholic father, she finds an unexpected new beginning as Mabel, the cherished princess of the illustrious Ermâneau Empire under Emperor Estevan's reign. Much to her dismay, a prophecy foretells Mabel as the world's savior, leading to her father's decision to crown her as the empire's ruler on her very first birthday.

Determined to defy this unwelcome destiny, Mabel sets out to sabotage her own reign, only to unwittingly earn a reputation as a brilliant leader and gather a loyal band of supporters. Through the journey, she discovers the true meaning of love and friendship, eventually embracing her role in shaping the empire's fate. Will Mabel be able to safeguard the newfound world she holds dear against impending peril?

basic_info.title: The Reborn Ranker Chronicles
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Reincarnation of the Murim Clan's Former Ranker, Murim Sega Jeonsaeng Ranker

content.synopsis: In a stunning turn of events, the renowned SSS-rank hunter Kang Taeha meets his demise only to awaken in the midst of imperial China as Liu Xinyun, the rebellious heir of a prestigious corporation. Eager to leave his hunting days behind, Xinyun is thrust into a world of power-hungry relatives, forcing him to sharpen his abilities from scratch. With a distinctive fusion of necromancy and martial arts, can he transform from a mere outcast to a formidable leader amidst the challenges that await him?

basic_info.title: An Eye for an Eye
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Dear Boy

content.synopsis: In a tale seeped with bitterness, hate, and the thirst for revenge, Yongju witnesses his classmate being tormented by bullies without a flicker of empathy. However, fate takes a sharp turn when Yongju becomes the bullied. In a misguided bid to retaliate, he triggers a disastrous chain of events. Enter Yong Jin, his brother, now driven by a relentless desire for retribution. Thus begins a calculated and dark journey down the path of merciless vengeance.

basic_info.title: Regina Rena: To the Unforgiven
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Regina Rena: Yongseo Batji Mothan Geudae-ege

content.synopsis:
Rena Rubel's childhood was marked by loneliness, raised apart from her parents, the marquis of the north and his wife. However, a turning point comes when they re-enter her life with open arms. But just before her 12th birthday, Rena's world shatters as her father betrays her by selling her to a mysterious man, condemning her to a life of servitude.

Years later, on her way to the capital, Rena and her maid Yuni find themselves in peril, only to be rescued by Lin. Over a meal, Lin discovers that Rena is not just a pretty face; she conceals a strength and danger within her.

Gone is the innocent girl—Rena now seeks vengeance against her father, determined to make him pay for his heartless betrayal. If he proves to be the same callous man who cast her aside, Rena will ensure he faces the same torment she endured.

basic_info.title: The Lazy Swordmaster
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Nataehan Swordmaster

content.synopsis: In the aftermath of saving humanity, Jinwoo Baek is weary of heroics. Swearing off swords for good, his resolve is tested when he is reincarnated as Riley Finn Epheletta, youngest scion of a renowned sword-wielding lineage. Faced with a dire threat, Riley must choose: wield the sword once more or risk losing those he holds dear. Can the "Lazy Sword" rise to fulfill his destiny as a legendary swordmaster?

basic_info.title: Tales of the Unusual
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Horror
            
                Horror,                    Mystery
            
                Mystery,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Gigi Goegoe

content.synopsis: Explore the eerie intersection of urban legends and ancient myths where human instincts manifest in extraordinary ways. Delve into the mysterious and exhilarating world of Tales of the Unusual, where the true source of fear may lie within ourselves.

basic_info.title: Kingdom of Zombie
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 킹덤오브좀비

content.synopsis: In a world ravaged by zombies, Van, a spirited youngster, sneaks away from his grandfather's home to witness a gladiatorial showdown. Along his journey, Van is entrusted with a crucial message for his idol at the gates of the zombie enclosure. However, chaos ensues when a shadowy figure eliminates the guards, unleashing the undead. As the zombies close in, Van unveils surprising abilities and bravely fights back against the menacing horde. This thrilling tale of survival and heroism sadly remains unfinished, as the series was abruptly cancelled.

basic_info.title: 8th Circle Mage Reborn
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Rebirth of an 8th-Circled Wizard, The Rebirth of an 8th-Circled Mage, 8 Circle Mabeopsa-ui Hwansaeng

content.synopsis: In a land where magic and power collide, Henry Morris, an esteemed 8-circled wizard and a key figure in the realm's history, meets a tragic end when he is wrongfully accused and executed for alleged treason. However, his story doesn't end there. Henry awakens in the body of a young nobleman with the same name, embarking on a journey to reclaim his lost prowess. As he delves into the art of magic and swordsmanship, Henry sets out on a path of vengeance against those who betrayed him, determined to rewrite his fate as the first of his kind—a formidable magic swordsman.

basic_info.title: Past Life Returner
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Past Life Regressor, Jeonsaengja

content.synopsis: In a realm teeming with monsters and dungeons, Na Sunhoo and fellow Awakeneds battle to safeguard humanity. When Sunhoo falls in a fatal clash, a mysterious prompt offers him a shot at time regression. Reborn into the past, he resolves to amass wealth to acquire the dungeon's land and thwart the impending monster threat. With lives hanging in the balance, can Sunhoo amass a fortune and eradicate the monsters to secure a lasting victory?

basic_info.title: Kiss Wood
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: KissWood

content.synopsis: Following the loss of his job as a city gardener, the protagonist's sole solace lies in his prized home garden adorned with unique flora. However, his sanctuary is ruthlessly destroyed by a shadowy figure, leaving him barely clinging to life. Awakening in a hospital, he discovers he is now blind. Adrift in despair, a miraculous restoration of his vision reveals a startling revelation - he has been mysteriously transported to an enchanting realm blanketed by an otherworldly forest.

basic_info.title: God of Bath
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 목욕의 신

content.synopsis: In the bustling world of Scrub Battle, a man known as the "Hand of God" embarks on a quest to claim the title of the ultimate Bath Coordinator. Join him as he navigates challenges and rivals in this thrilling competition where only the best will emerge victorious.

basic_info.title: Your Majesty, Please Spare Me This Time
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Your Majesty, Please Don't Kill Me Again, Pyeha, Tto Juki-jin Mara-juse-yo

content.synopsis: On the day Laliette Isabelle De Bellua, 18, faces the gallows, memories of her family's unjust demise haunt her. Condemned by the ruthless Emperor Rupert Edgar Laspe Vellelum, known for his beauty tainted by bloodshed, even his wife fell prey to his brutality. But as Laliette meets her fate, she awakens on her 12th birthday, armed with foreknowledge of the tragedy to come. To alter destiny and protect her kin, she must win the favor of the future tyrant, currently living incognito as the neglected "Princess Rapertte." With determination as her only asset, Laliette embarks on a perilous journey to earn the princess's trust and rewrite the dark chapters of her family's story.

basic_info.title: Legend of Nereid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Legend of the Nereid

content.synopsis: General Temedes was unwavering in his loyalty to his country, placing it above all else. However, when he unexpectedly falls for Matia, a girl rumored to pose a threat to the nation, Temedes faces a heart-wrenching dilemma. For the first time, he must decide between duty and love: whether to sacrifice the girl he cherishes or jeopardize the safety of his beloved country and its people.

basic_info.title: The Duke's Bored Daughter Is My Master
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Invincible Princess Is Bored Again Today, The Max Level Princess Is Bored Today as Well, Man-Level Gongnyeo-neun Oneul-do Muryohada

content.synopsis:
Dante Renatus, once a formidable Emperor known for her unparalleled swordsmanship, finds herself reborn as Helena, the daughter of the Duke of Peresca five centuries later. Reluctantly embracing a second chance at life, Helena grapples with the ennui of having already savored all the pleasures of her past existence. When Prince Caesar seeks refuge at the duke's estate to avert a looming power struggle, Helena, impressed by his potential, resolves to mentor him in the art of swordplay.

"I shall mold you into an Emperor."

Thus begins Helena's quest to infuse purpose into her mundane existence by passing on her martial expertise to shape the destiny of her protege. As she navigates this new chapter, she contemplates the complexities of her evolving relationship with Prince Caesar and the unforeseen challenges that lie ahead.

basic_info.title: Legend of Tyr
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Tyr Chronicles

content.synopsis: Embark on a thrilling journey in the Fantasy Action Legend as Tyr receives his late brother Loki's diary on his 17th birthday. As Tyr delves into the diary's pages, he uncovers a startling revelation - every event unfolding around him has been meticulously documented beforehand. Join Tyr as he navigates the mysterious realm guided by his brother's words, discovering a world where past, present, and future intertwine in unexpected ways.

basic_info.title: The Divine Surgeon
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Reincarnated as a Legendary Surgeon, Hwata-ga Doen Oegwa Uisa

content.synopsis: Dr. Han Jinsoo's virtuous life ends tragically when he is fired, deceived, and murdered. Unexpectedly, a mysterious entity grants him a new beginning as Hua Tuo, the renowned Chinese healer, during the chaotic Eastern Han Dynasty. Facing the challenges of war-torn times without modern tools, can he thrive as a healer amid legends and battles?

basic_info.title: Chunchu: The Genocide Fiend
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Action
            
                Action,                    Adventure
            
                Adventure,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Supernatural
            
                Supernatural
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Chonchu, Cheonchu

content.synopsis: Born under a dark fate, Chunchu carries the cursed demon stone, granting its bearer unmatched invincibility. Forsaken by his father and raised among strangers, this enigmatic young man, infamous for leaving a trail of brutal massacres in his wake, elicits only dread and loathing wherever he treads. Despite the shadows that follow him, he embarks on a quest to unravel the mysteries of his ill-starred existence. Yet, his efforts are thwarted by his twin brother's vehement opposition. Amidst this turmoil, the series remains in limbo, as an internal conflict between creators Kim Sungjae and Kim Byung Jin leaves Chonchu's fate uncertain, with a promise that its gripping saga will persist.

basic_info.title: The Children's Teacher, Mr. Kwon
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            Childcare
            
                Childcare,                    School
            
                School,                    Workplace
            
                Workplace
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Kids' Teacher Kwon, The Teacher of the Children, Mr. Kwon

content.synopsis: In a twist of fate, a gangster finds himself at a quaint rural school, tasked with teaching a class of five exceptional children.

basic_info.title: Devil Returns to School Days
basic_info.genre:
Themes:
                            School
            
                School,                    Time Travel
            
                Time Travel
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ag-ui Deunggyo, School of the Malice

content.synopsis: With top grades, striking appearance, exceptional combat abilities, and an unwavering commitment to justice, the exemplary student Hyunsung Kim finds himself tragically pushed off a rooftop right before his graduation, leaving him in a vegetative state. Enduring a decade of torment, he remains conscious only through his hearing, unable to escape death. Suddenly, he is thrust back to the very day the torment first began.

basic_info.title: The Spark in Your Eyes
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Jeomuneun Hae, Sirin Nun

content.synopsis: In the land of the Northern Nations and Mormeratta, Erkin, a skilled pharmacist orphaned by war, rises to prominence in the Kingdom of Mormeratta. Summoned to aid a mysterious "master of the castle," whom none have glimpsed, he grapples with uncertainties about the illness and patient. Reluctantly accepting, Erkin seeks closure on his quest to avenge his parents, slain by the Witch of the Sun. Unbeknownst to him, his journey intertwines with a startling revelation: could his sworn enemy be his unexpected ally? As Erkin navigates this twist of fate, his resolve faces a profound test.

basic_info.title: Becoming the Dark Hero's Daughter
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: How to Be a Dark Hero's Daughter, Dark Hero-ui Ttar-i Doeneun Beop

content.synopsis:
Nine-year-old Lae, a street-dwelling survivor after her mother's passing, relies on the kindness of strangers for sustenance. One fateful encounter with a seemingly affluent man triggers a jolt of memory, revealing her past life as Yuna, once bedridden and ill. To her astonishment, the man is none other than Kallen de Lewelton, the infamous protagonist of the mystery novel "The Life of Duke Lewelton."

Despite his central role in the story, Kallen is no gallant hero but a ruthless figure known for relishing in the torment of fellow criminals. Driven by self-preservation, Lae opts to assist Kallen in apprehending a fugitive. Unbeknownst to her, Kallen harbors suspicions about her sudden insights and extends an invitation to his mansion as a gesture of thanks.

Hopeful for a reprieve from destitution, Lae envisions employment as a maid in Kallen's household. However, Kallen's proposal transcends her expectations, offering a life-altering opportunity—to be formally adopted as his daughter.

basic_info.title: The Little Lady Behind the Scenes
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: An Unseemly Lady, Biseon Silse Lady

content.synopsis: Julianne is the epitome of perfection - stunning, talented, and intelligent. The only flaw? Her questionable taste in men. Determined to steer her sister clear of romantic disaster, Lilianne steps in. But Julianne's suitors have a cunning plan - winning her over through Lilianne's weakness for sweets. How far will Lilianne go to ensure her sister finds true love? And which suitor will prove to be the most irresistible?

basic_info.title: Wished You Were Dead
basic_info.genre:
Genres:
                            Drama
            
                Drama,                    Fantasy
            
                Fantasy,                    Romance
            
                Romance
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ne-ga Jukgi-reul Baral Ttae-ga Isseotda

content.synopsis:
Forced into a marriage with the daughter of his sworn rival, King Karloi of Croisen grapples with his discontent over his union. His wife, Evonne Deluah, stands as a stark reminder of his past failures and the vengeful actions of her father. Despite his lingering affection for his first love, Karloi remains steadfast in his opposition to Duke Deluah, even going so far as to take a concubine—a controversial move that further challenges Evonne's authority.

In the shadows of the palace, Evonne conceals her own painful truths, a victim of her father's cruelty under the guise of nobility. Bound by a curse that silences her past as a peasant named Rue, she yearns to reveal her identity to Karloi, all while her mother remains captive to the duke's schemes.

As Karloi quests for a lost love amid political turmoil, a surprising bond begins to form between him and Evonne. Meanwhile, the neglected queen dreams of a quiet existence, where she and her mother can escape the burdens of power and simply find peace.

basic_info.title: I Stole the First Ranker's Soul
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Ranking 1-wi-reul Yeonghon-kkaji Teoreobeorim, I Stole the Number One Ranker's Soul

content.synopsis: In the dead of night, Moa Son, a regular office worker, finds herself in a dungeon, only to emerge as a collecting hunter. In a twist of fate, she tumbles back into the dungeon but is saved by the renowned hunter, Jihan Seo, who ropes her into a pact. He proposes to empower her under one stipulation—"Solemnly vow to strive towards vanquishing all dungeon bosses worldwide." Say what?

basic_info.title: Crowning a Spoiled Prince
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: She's the Sister of a Maniac, Second Life of a Trash Princess

content.synopsis: Following the assassination of her father, the emperor, Regina assumes the role of regent for her young brother, the Trash Prince. Despite her adept handling of internal affairs, the empire faces financial ruin due to her brother's extravagance. To add to her troubles, rumors of her fiancé's infidelity surface. Ultimately betrayed by her fiancé, Regina's world crumbles. In a desperate move, she uses a memento from the first emperor to rewind time, determined to outshine her brother in recklessness to rectify her mistakes.

basic_info.title: Shadow of the Supreme
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Childhood Friend of the Zenith, The Best Childhood Friend in the World, Cheonhajeirin-ui Sokkupchingu

content.synopsis: In the starlit realm of Sanseo, Yangcheon Ku, the promising heir of the noble House of Ku, met a tragic end as the infamous demonic martial artist of unparalleled notoriety. Amid the chaos of the Virtuous-Demonic War, he faced defeat and torment, only to awaken in a startling twist of fate. Cradled by his childhood companion, the renowned warrior Seol-ah Wi, Yangcheon Ku is granted a second chance at life, thrust back into the past with the hope of rewriting his destiny. Yet, as the hands of time shift, will the changes he makes be enough to avert the haunting specter of past regrets?

basic_info.title: The Twins' New Life
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: The Twin Siblings' New Life, Ssangdungi Nammae-ui New Life

content.synopsis: In a fantastical realm, Arienne Yuriana and her twin brother, Arhen, find themselves reborn as royalty. Expecting a life of luxury, they are instead left in a dilapidated castle with their abusive mother and unkind maids, neglected by the emperor. When a twist of fate removes their guardian, their father reappears, offering them a chance to live in the grand palace. As they navigate this new world of royalty, the twins must grapple with their father's past neglect. Will they thrive in this unfamiliar and potentially perilous environment, or will the dangers of palace life prove too much for them to overcome?

basic_info.title: The SSS-Rank Hunter's Lucky Draw
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: SSS-Class Gacha Hunter, Ppopgi-ro Ganghaejin SSS-geup Hunter

content.synopsis: In the wake of "The Change," dungeons teeming with monsters materialize, reshaping reality. Jin Jungdo, an aspiring hero inspired by the famed Mana Users, is disheartened to find his abilities lacking. However, a twist of fate grants him new skills to glean insights from the future and summon heroes of yore. Now, armed with this extraordinary gift, Jin must navigate a perilous game of chance to claim the title of the ultimate hunter.

basic_info.title: Nowhere Boy
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 지상 최악의 소년

content.synopsis:
Step right up to "Survival: 'I Am Unhappy,'" the electrifying game show that seeks out Earth's most miserable soul! The ultimate prize on the line? A wish from the divine himself!

When the game's champion dares to wish for the apocalypse, God grants it under one condition: the cataclysm will unfold slowly over 100 days, with just one chance to reverse the wish.

Enter Oh Duk Hee, an offbeat artist known for her gloomy humor, handpicked by God to bring joy to the world's saddest being. With the fate of humanity hanging in the balance, can she turn the tide before it's too late?

Join the quest to unearth the planet's unhappiest individual in this school fantasy-action saga by Jung Pil Won!

basic_info.title: Master Villainess the Invincible!
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Muhyeopji Angnyeo-inde Naega Jeil Sse!

content.synopsis: In modern-day Korea, the struggling writer Yeoju is unexpectedly thrust into a popular martial arts novel after a tragic accident. Now inhabiting the role of the notorious villainess Haewon Tang, she faces a perilous fate. To avert disaster, Yeoju must navigate treacherous alliances, master Haewon's inner chi, and embrace martial arts to protect the Sichuan Tang Clan. Can she rewrite her destiny within the novel and emerge as the valiant hero she yearns to be?

basic_info.title: My Life as a Loser
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Life Completely Ruined, Loser's Life, Insaeng Jonmang

content.synopsis: After enduring your torment in high school, you left my life in shambles. But why should you thrive while I suffer? It's time for you to experience the pain you inflicted. Brace yourself for a reckoning as you navigate the consequences of swapping bodies – a journey where redemption comes at a cost.

basic_info.title: The Villainess Is Retiring
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I'll Just Live on as a Villainess, Geunyang Agyeogeuro Salgetseumnida

content.synopsis: Reborn as Everia Oberon, an office worker finds herself thrust into the role of a romance novel villainess set for a dark fate. Determined to avoid the expected drama, Everia escapes to the countryside, settling in a cold land abundant with nonflammable wood. Seeking warmth, she enlists the help of archmage Theoharis and his azure flame, unknowingly sealing a lifelong pact. As the unexpected master of a strikingly handsome yet ferocious demon dog, Everia must bid farewell to her peaceful existence.

basic_info.title: A Talented Maid
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: A Capable Maid, Neungnyeok Inneun Sinyeo-nim

content.synopsis: In a realm where Maurina is the sole survivor of her kingdom's royalty, she flees in disguise as Marie, a humble maid in the conqueror's empire. Despite her lack of prowess, she yearns to aid and uplift others. A wish for the power to bring joy to those in need transforms her, endowing her with a multitude of talents in her sleep. However, her dual identity is at risk as the prince hunts for both Maurina and Marie.

basic_info.title: H20
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: H2O

content.synopsis: In a Korean high school, Menga is the hapless vice rep facing relentless bullying. Meanwhile, newcomer Hanako is stripped of everything after being robbed on her first day. Notorious troublemaker Na Hong Soo is always in hot water, while Eechan, also known as Bacchus, reigns as the esteemed student body president. Despite their stark differences, fate is about to intertwine their lives in unexpected ways.

basic_info.title: Mosquito War
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: Mogi Jeonjaeng

content.synopsis:
For eons, humanity lived in blissful ignorance as mosquitoes, the common pests, quietly schemed a deadly plot. Through DNA harvesting, these bloodsuckers gained power in secrecy, until they unexpectedly evolved into humanoid beings. Now impervious to traditional arms and wielding humanity's knowledge, they swiftly wiped out most of the human race.

A century later, only five thousand humans survive, vastly outnumbered by the trillion evolved mosquitoes. Yet, a glimmer of hope shines from the lost research of Dr. Kim, who foresaw the insects' transformation. Deep in mosquito territory lies his hidden bunker, a beacon for the dwindling human forces. Led by elite soldier Kisses and her team, humanity launches a final, desperate bid for survival, setting the stage for the ultimate showdown in the epic war of man versus mosquito.

basic_info.title: Absolute Witch
basic_info.alternative_titles: Japanese: 절대마녀

content.synopsis: In a world devoid of witches, Skyla, a young witch, embarks on a journey to reunite with her husband. Along the way, she encounters an easily bored old woman accompanied by her servant, and a mysterious alchemist. Join Skyla as she navigates the unexpected adventures awaiting her on the road to Wells.

basic_info.title: For the Sake of Sita
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: For Sita, Sita Wihayeo

content.synopsis:
While on a volunteer mission in Nepal, Sangmin Han, a Korean medical student, crosses paths with the enchanting yet sorrowful Sita. Once revered as a Kumari, a young girl embodying a deity, Sita has been shunned by society. Their love blossoms, leading to marriage and a move to Korea, but tragedy strikes when Sita passes away within a year.

Consumed by grief, Sangmin pleads with the divine for Sita's return. His wish is granted, but at a cost—he finds himself back in Nepal, aged, and facing a perplexing sight: a youthful Sita with no recollection of their past.

For the Sake of Sita delves into the intertwined destinies of two lovers as Sangmin navigates his quest to alter Sita's harrowing destiny, while unveiling the poignant tale of Sita's upbringing as a Kumari.

basic_info.title: The Fallen House of Ardan
basic_info.alternative_titles: Synonyms: I Regressed to My Ruined Family, When I Returned Home, My Family Was Ruined, Hoegwi Haetdeoni Gamun-i Manghaetda

content.synopsis:
As the eldest of a legendary lineage of swordsmen, I swiftly rose to unmatched strength, only to face the formidable threat of the dragons that ravaged our lands. In my final moments, resigned to the end, I closed my eyes, believing all was lost. Yet, as I opened them once more, I found myself inexplicably transported back in time to a world unfamiliar and altered.

Perplexed by my changed circumstances, I questioned the absence of my once-potent mana and the stark transformation of the grand castle into a humble wooden abode. To my astonishment, I discovered a surprising truce between the dragons and humankind, a reality at odds with the past I knew.

With a fallen family teetering on the edge of collapse and the ancient art of divination vanished, I faced a new existence devoid of mana. Determined to navigate this mysterious realm, I resolved to carve a different path for myself.

Thus begins the tale of the esteemed hero from the esteemed swordsman clan, embarking on a journey through time to a parallel world fraught with enigmas.
